2a1(rgyud): de nga ni nag shugs pashin tu kyi sl-i/ ta mdzad la phyag/ 
2b1(rgyud): mchog sang pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'khor le ra rtags
2b2(rgyud): po chen po sa sa rgyas kun// ma lus thub pa'i skyes
2b3(rgyud): mchog gis// rdo ru sems dpa' rgyal pa re// thub pa'i dngang
2b4(rgyud): phyug la gsel 'debs// rdul 'bor tshul chen sgrub byed cing / 
3a1(rgyud): / cho ga snga tshogs yang dag 'byung // rigs kyi dkyil
3a2(rgyud): 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i// 'khoraru le mche gar bri shing du gsol// dgen
3a3(rgyud): be kho skal na te// khyed ni ba bden sems bang // gas
3a4(rgyud): ba mkhyen cing dge ngas bra shang mkhon// rnal 'byor rig pas
3a5(rgyud): mchog gyur gsungs// de nyid rdzas kyi de nyid ldan// rnal 'byor bdag
3a6(rgyud): nyid rnal 'bar tshe// rdo rje chen po ngang chub sems// gsungs shog gsungs
3b1(rgyud): shig tshul chen po// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste// rdo rje rnal 'byor sna tshogs
3b2(rgyud): bdag/ gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor cha// chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed po// rtog
3b3(rgyud): pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don 'di ci yin be rjid// 'dir ni rtog pa ji
3b4(rgyud): lta bu// sgrub pa 'i don ni d+hI ltar lags// ci ra 'di ni rgyud phyi ma// 
3b5(rgyud): rgyud don gyi yin parjod par bgyi// ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags/ rgyud
3b6(rgyud): kyi don ni ji ltar byung // rdo rje 'chang dag 'di ci zhig/ dag po'i den ni ji lta
3b7(rgyud): byung / rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig/ ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjed// phyag na rdo rje
4a1(rgyud): tsa yi phyir// rdo rje gtum po'ang ci zhig lags// ci yi phyir ni gtum por brjod// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// ci por
4a2(rgyud): rdo rjer brjod par bgyi// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci// de yi rdo rje ji lta bu// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// rdo rje rigs kun gang gi
4a3(rgyud): lags// chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod// ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod// rigs bdag rang
4a4(rgyud): bzhin 'di ci zhig/ ci yi phyir na sems dpa' brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// ci yi rdo rje sem
4a5(rgyud): dpa' lags// rdo rje rgyal po tsa yin brjod// rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci// rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// rdo rje rin chen rtsa
4a6(rgyud): yi phyir// rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa che// gsungs shig ci yin brjod pa gsungs// 
4a7(rgyud): yi phyir na rdo rje chos// rdo rje rnon po tsa yin brjod// rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che// rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod// rdo rje las dang
4b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// rdo rje srung ba lu nur che// gsungs shig ci yin brjod par gsungs// sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung // de ban
4b2(rgyud): pa dang ma ni gang // dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi dang // dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags// gsang ba 'di ni gang las byung // khyab bdag 'di rnams gang
4b3(rgyud): nas byung // thog ma tha ma med 'di ci// gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// rab tu dga' nyid rab bzang nyid// rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bur// tsa yi phyir na
4b4(rgyud): kun tu bzang // de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung // chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// 
4b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan 'das
4b6(rgyud): ci yin brjod// de bzhin ston pa'i sbyin pa ci// tsa yi phyir ni ye shes brjod// shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod// tsaM byir shes rab brjod
4b7(rgyud): par bya// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin// tshul na ci zhig ting 'dzin gang // bsam gtan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ci// srid gsum 'jig
4b8(rgyud): rten gsum ngon ci// tsa yoM phyir yang khams gsum pa// 'khor ba'i donan ci zhog yon// mya ngan 'das pa'ang ci yon brjod// rtag dang
5a1(rgyud): 'jig dang de bzhin dag/ theg pa chen po tsa yin brjod// nam mkha' yang ni tsaM yo phyir// sa
5a2(rgyud): da kyang ni ci yon brjod// 'byung ba chen po gang las 'byung // 'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed// tsa yo byor na phyag rgyar brjod/ 
5a3(rgyud): ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya// tsaM yi phyir na rig sngags brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzung sngags rnams// phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid
5a4(rgyud): gsungs// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ba rjod par bya// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// de bzhin kho nar gzungs
5a5(rgyud): sngags rnams// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang // ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po/ phyag rgya dag ni 'chang ba na// ji ltar rdo rje can / 
5a6(rgyud): mnyes// rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi// thub pa chen po de gsungs shig/ rig sngags dag ni zlos pa ni// ji ltar yid kyi rdo rje bltas// dri ba'i tshogs
5a7(rgyud): mdor snyan pa'o// oM na tsa zhig yin par bshad// yi ge hUM na tsa yin brjod/ ci yi phyir na yig phaT// swAhA zhes pa ci yin brjod// mchod par ci phyir brjod
5a8(rgyud): par bya// de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor dang por zhugs pa yi// skyes pa yang na bud med kyis// 
5b1(rgyud): bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni// gsungs shog bsang ba'i dbang phyug che// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bgyi// de yis srog
5b2(rgyud): gi phyir yang ni// dor bar mi bya gang zhig lags// khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// de bzhin kho nar phyogs bcing ba// bgegs rnams bcing ba dang bcas pa'o// 
5b3(rgyud): log 'dren ji ltar bskrad par bgyi// dga' ba chen po ji lta bur// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bgyi// spos dang me tog de bzhin du// mar ma
5b4(rgyud): mchod sogs ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor brtag pa ji lta bur// gzhug pa yang ni dza ltar lags// dam tshig ci zhig yin par bshad// 
5b5(rgyud): slob ma'i cho ga gang // sngon du bsnyen pa rdza ltar bgyi// sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// ga sang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu// snyoms 'jug
5b6(rgyud): ji lta bu zhigs// mdun du dgugs pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// 'dir ni rdza su chags pa'ang ji lta bu// bcing bar bya ba'i las ni ji lta bu// 'dren pa rnams ni
5b7(rgyud): mnyes par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dir ni gshegs su gsol ba lags// dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdeg par bgyi// 'gro ba'i bya ba yang ji ltar bgyi/ 
5b8(rgyud): las kyi cho ga'i bya ba ji ltar bgyi// dge bstug po gsang chen ji lta bu// las rnams tha dad bya ba ji lta bu// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan ni ji ltar bgyi/ 
6a1(rgyud): mchod dang mchod pa'i lar ni ji ltar blang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar 'byung // 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i bye brag du zhig 'chis// dngos dang dngos med ji ltar
6a2(rgyud): spang ba lags// bla ma gsang byung 'od zer gsang ba ni// sbyid sreg rnam pa du ru brjod// thang khung ji lta bu zhig lags// sgyid sreg mdor bsdus ji lta bu// las rnams rnam pa du ru brjod// gsang
6a3(rgyud): ba rnams ni rnam pa du// mchog du gsang ba ji ltar brjod de nyid ji lta bu zhig lags// phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ni// mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags// rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// ji ltar sgrub bya/ 
6a4(rgyud): shin tu bsgrub/ rdo rje pra mo dzaM ltar brjod// bgeg ni dzi/ ltar bsal bar bgyi// mdor na rig pa 'dzin pa dang // slob dpon ji lta bu zhig lags// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i// 
6a5(rgyud): 'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod// dngos grub mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa'i// sna tshogs rtog pa ji lta bu// thig rnams brtag pa nyid dang ni// dngos grub ji ltar nye bar brjod/ dngos grub
6a6(rgyud): tshogs ni ji lta bu// gsang ba kun nas btus pa gsungs// bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bar// bya ba'i cho ga ji lta bu// yang na gzhan dag nyid la ni// dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar lags// ji
6a7(rgyud): ltar sems ni bskyed par bgyi// ting 'dzin ji lta bu zhig lags// de nyid rig pa 'di rtag tu// rdo rje ye shes ji lta bu// gzhan yang dgongs pa ji lta bu// spyod pa ji lta bu zhig lags// gang ya
6a8(rgyud): rung ba'i rtags las byung // ming dang ming min shes pa'i mtshan// las 'bras med par byed pa dang // 'dzin par byed par gang las bshad// lus ni nam mkha' bzhin 'byung ba// gang las
6b1(rgyud): las byung bar brjod par bya// ci yi phyir na thar bar brjod// rnal 'byor pa don ci yin brjod// rdo rje dbyings ni bskyed byed pa'i// rdo rje phra mo'i rnal 'byor gang // gzhan yang rang gi rigs ngag las/ 
6b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor rtul zhugs ji ltar brtsam// mdor na dbang du bya ba dang // de nyid bsang ba gang zhig lags// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// gsang ba rtag cher las gsungs pa// dgongs pa rnam pa
6b3(rgyud): du ma yis// gsang ba gsungs shig blo gros che// rnal 'byor rnam pa du ru brjod// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung du// ji ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud du brjod// gsang ba'i rigs byung ji lta bu// nga ni rang byung nyid
6b4(rgyud): yin te// khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'og dang // sa snyengs sa bla ma ngan 'das// ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba gzhan// rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin// nyi ma zla ba bshin rje drag
6b5(rgyud): po nyid // rang nying skye dgu'i bdag ste pha ma yin// gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ dri ba'i tshogs gnyis mdor sdud pa'o// tshangs pa 'jig rten gsum lus
6b6(rgyud): dbang phyug che// gdeng drug tshegs bcas lha'i rigs dkyil 'khor rnams// gzhan yang bza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa// nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// nga ni 'dod pa thar pa nga // 
6b7(rgyud): ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa// nga ni yi dgas dud 'gro ba dag/ cig de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan// lha bcas tshig ldan 'dzin pa'i lha la chags// mu stegs
6b8(rgyud): theg dman mngon dga' skye dgu'i rigs// ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtog byed cing // ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs dkyil 'khor// dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgongs mi shes/ 
7a1(rgyud): gi 'dod pas mu ngan rtog byed pa// de la skye dgu bdag chen brtse bas gsungs// mchod 'os chen po mchog dang po yi gnas// gsang nga'i bsang mchog mngon sdus dbye
7a2(rgyud): bar bsol// skye dgu'i bdag po'i dkyil 'khor gsang mdun du mtshan tshan pas ji sa mtshanas bya// 'dod yon lngar bcas rol bar byed pa yis// dngos grub tshogs mchog chen po thob par 'gyur
7a3(rgyud): dman pa'i 'dod las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung // 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de bzhin b+ha ga ji ltar rtags ci 'dra// de yi 'jug pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// rdzas de
7a4(rgyud): ngag ni ji ltar rab tu sgrub// 'jig rten gsum na dman pa ji ltar 'gyur// de nas 'dod chags zhen pas dngos grub thob// 'dod chags dag phyir de ni ji ltar rung // chags bral sdig pa
7a5(rgyud): chags dang bral ba la// gsang bstan pas sdig dngos rdza/ ltar 'gyur// tor bas bsod nams mchog thob ji lta bu/ skyes dgu bsad pas bsod nams ji lta bu// ma byin
7a6(rgyud): blang bas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i// 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dga' ba chen po'i bud meng sten pa yis// tshe 'di la ni sangs mchog 'grub pa// mi gtsang 'dod pa
7a7(rgyud): sten pas sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bar ji ltar 'gyur// 'dir ni rdzun dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams mang // ji ltar brdzun ni bsod nams ldan par brjod// 'dir ni se
7a8(rgyud): gzhan bsad bza' bar bya// 'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ 'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba dang // mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma yin// sadus rnal 'byor
7b1(rgyud): gyi ni rjes 'jug pa// chos mir 'gyur zhes ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dregs dang ser sna sdang ba'i sems ldan pa// chos min spyod cing brdzun pa'i tshig la chags// 'dod pa'i 'dod
7b2(rgyud): chags bcas pa'i lhag par rgyal// rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byung ji ltar 'grub// bla med go 'phang dngos grub 'dod pa yi// dag cing rnal 'byor rnal 'byor lhur blang bya// sbyor gcin
7b3(rgyud): mthung dang bshang pa za ba yis// dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod// mi gtsang ba shang gci zos shing 'thung ba yis// yid 'dod dngos grub ji ltar dngos grub 'dod// bung med bcas par ldan
7b4(rgyud): cig chos spyod cing // gnyis ka lhan cig gyur pas ngag gtsang bto dang / ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor mchod// dngos grub dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rigs 'brung
7b5(rgyud): kun ldan zhing // mchog tu mi bzang drag po'i las can te// dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang rdeg dang bsad pa lhur len zhing // bskrang dang
7b6(rgyud): drag pa'i las can de dag ni// dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin// gzhan yang bza' dang btung ba lhur len cing // snying 'byin pa yis dag par 'dod pa nyid// de ni dag cing
7b7(rgyud): sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin// gzhan yang nor bu rin rten 'phrog pa yis// sdug cing bstan la dag cing mthor 'gro dang // gzhan yang nga rgyal ser sna lhur len pas// dag par
7b8(rgyud): 'gyur ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin// gzhan yang las kyi rig pa byung ba yis// mi dge ba yid las rnams thang bya// 'khrig sogs las kyi the tshogs rnam mang po'o// las byed pa ni ji ltar spyod pa 'gyur/ 
8a1(rgyud): gan yang brdzur tshig de bzhin 'khrig pa yis/ dag 'dod 'phags pa ri pas gsang pa yi// rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud rtsi ltar/ sdug cing mthor 'gro rjes
8a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// kye mgor khyod ni dag pa'i chos kyi tshogs te khyod ni rtag tu rnal 'byor 'gyur// kye mgor khyod ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chang ba dam chos gsang ba'i 'thung gnas te// kye rgyal khyod ni dri med nyi ma
8a3(rgyud): bzhin du mi shas kun tu spyon mdzad pa// khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren cher byang sems dga' ston kye// mdor bsdus pa'o// // kun mchog thaMd rig pa ste// kun mkhyen dri ma
8a4(rgyud): gsum spangs pa// byang sems sangs rgyal po che// de/ zhin gshegs pa de nyid ni// ting 'dzin las bzhed nas kyang // phyog/ sa rnams kun tu gzib mdzad te// thub pas mgon rnams rab tud
8a5(rgyud): nas nas ngas kun la 'di skad gsungs// kye ma'o rnam ngag ye shes bdag kye ma'o sangs nyer thob pa// kye ma'o gar mkhan 'khor lo 'di// rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed// rtog pa thaMd kun bsdus
8a6(rgyud): pa'i// mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya// shin tu red dka' dam pa yi// rin chen sgrom gyi kha dbye bya/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi// rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng bar bya// rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye nas// shas/ 
8a7(rgyud): rab kyi ni snang bar bya// de nas gsang ba mchog gyur pa// dam pa yang dag bshad par bya// bya ba sgrub pa'i thabs chen po// rtog pa thad bsdus pa dang // gsang ba'i bye brag 'byed byed cing // rnal 'byor dgongs
8a8(rgyud): pa rnam par 'grol/ de nyid dam pa shes byed pa'o// rtog pa thang bsdus pa dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor tshig dang // 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor cho ga ste// mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya de'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa/ 
8b1(rgyud): dang / dus gsum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan// gsang ba rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing // bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyi// rtog pa thang bsdus pa dang // sangs rgyas rnal 'byor cho gar ldan// rdo chos ni rab 'jug pa
8b2(rgyud): sku gsum zhes bya gsang chen gyi// rtog pa thang bsdus pa dang // rdo rnal 'byor cho ga ldan// ma rungs thams cad 'dul byed pa/ khams gsum rnab rgyal zhes bya yi// rtog pa thaMng bsdus pa dang // chos kyi rnal 'byor
8b3(rgyud): tshi gar ldan/ pad+ma gar mkhan bskyed byed pa/ 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i// rtog pa thaMd bsdus pa dang / sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldaran/ rin chen 'khor lo bsgred byed cing / byang chub se pa yid ches byed/ 
8b4(rgyud): rtog pa thang bsdus pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs cher po// sna tshogs garang mkhan skyed byed pa// las kyi rnal 'byor cho ga yi/ ga pa thaMd bsdus pa dang / nga nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes// tshul che
8b5(rgyud): mchog ni shes byed cing // mchog dang po sangs mchog/ rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste// go rims bzhin du 'jug byed/ pa'i// gcig par ser bya ba byed// bya ba chen po mchog zhi ba// chos dang
8b6(rgyud): longs spyod mchog gyur pas// sangs rgyas gar mkhan 'khor lo ni// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di// skal ba ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin/ ji ltar sen 'dul 'gyur bshad// sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dusu
8b7(rgyud): ni/ byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing // thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na// spro ba chen pos ngo mtshar che'i// dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad// go rim bzhin du de yis ni/ 
8b8(rgyud): dbang bskur bar du lags thob 'gyur// shes rab chen pos sa mthar phyin/ gos kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas// 'og man stug po nyams dga' bar/ blo gros chen po zhugs par gyur/ bdag ni sangs mchog
9a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor ba yis bsangs ras de/ khyab mthar pa dag gis ni// sems can dod 'drung thob byazhes/ khra ba de la dbangs nas de// snod dang phye mar ba chen pang / chos kyis
9a2(rgyud): barmad chen po'i// dka' ba spyad par bya snyam ste// byang chub shing drung bzhugs gyur nas// byang ka'i bya ba kur ldad de// dbugs 'thung rngub pa 'gog pa dang // sems pa rad cing g.yo ba ra // lus mi gang yang mi
9a3(rgyud): 'gul zhing // yan lag skyed par mi byed de// de bas g.yo ba mang rnaMs la/ yun ring du ni gnas par 'gyur// phyogs bcu yi ni thub dbang po// sa dus kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dus/ 
9a4(rgyud): sdug bsngal bya bar rigs pa min// de bas bdag cag kur lhan cig/ skul bar bya pir 'gro snyam du// dgongs nas thang rab chas te// sU ga po ru ri byon par gyur// byer nas thub pa thad kyis/ bskul
9a5(rgyud): ba mchog ni mdzad par 'gyur// oM badz+ra uta tiSh+Tha ces pa'i// rigs bse sa gol brdabs nas ni// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bslang // phyogs rnams kun tu bltas pa ra// sang+yas kyi ni rdzu
9a6(rgyud): mdo mthong // thub pas mgon rnams la btud de// bka' stsol zhes ni gsol ba btab// mgon chen sadus thams cad kyis// gsung gcig gis de bka' stsal pa// sems kyi spyod yul ci 'dra nas/ rang
9a7(rgyud): gi sems ni se ser rtogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/ rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du// yun ring du ni gnas pa ni// sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste/ yan lag kun gyis rab btud nas// zhus pa
9a8(rgyud): bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste/ sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ de nas sang+yas kun gsungs pa// sems kyi spyod yul shes par dka'// khyod la snying po rab sprin gyis/ 
9b1(rgyud): me'i bzlas pa rab tu spyod/ oM tsit+pa pra ti be d+ha ku re li/ sring po dag pa blangs na ni// rang gi sems la rdog bzhin du// thang cig de la gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong // de nas sems 'di
9b2(rgyud): zhig yin// nyon mongs sa bor can dam ci// dag pa'am mi dge pa yi sems// kun gzhi'i sa bor can sems sam// chos kyi rgyu 'thun rtogs gyur nas// pha rol pa drug bsten pa// 'di ni sems can
9b3(rgyud): dag pa ste// kur ras nyon mongs gnas ma yin// yun ring du ni bsod nams dang // ya shes tshogs chen bsags pa ste// ji ltar zla ba gang ba 'di// dag cing dang la rnyog ma med// de bzhin tshogs ri rdzogs
9b4(rgyud): pa'i phyir// sems ni zla ba gang dang mtshungs// dngos po yid dang mang min pa// ji ltar zla ba marungs nyid yin// 'on kyang bsod nams ya she sa che// rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bstar// legs
9b5(rgyud): byas tshigs ldan rang sems kyi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni// dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nas kyang // slar yang tshig tu rab smra/ sa pa// bcom ldan mgon po bdag gis ni// nyon mengs
9b6(rgyud): dri ma kun dag cing // gzungs dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i// rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong // sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa// thog par byung ba'i sems 'di bzang // dang por rje
9b7(rgyud): sa rings rnams/ byang chung sams kyis dag par byed/ dngas po thams cad rnams spangs pa'i/ dag pa min spong po 'angs tha ba bral 'kho busu/ byang chub kyi ni sangs la rnams
9b8(rgyud): mi ngan du lung pa lam zhing po dag pa thangs nas de/ sems kyi dbusu rtog par/ zla ba'i dbusu yang thabag laba' gas pa ma ma thub pa rnams la tshog rnam pa
10a1(rgyud): 'khor gnyis pa dag mthong ngo // de ras sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin brdar/ brtan par bya ba'i chang du // de ri lags par sgrub par gyis/ 
10a2(rgyud): khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste// zlos shing de ri bstan par dgongs/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus gnas pa'i// rdo rje chen po sems byed cing // thang gcig ser brtags pa na/ shin tu
10a3(rgyud): brtan pa thong gyur ras// spras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ dkyil 'khor dbusu rdo rje mthong // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yi/ dbus na rdo dang ldan mthong // de ras sangs rgyas kun
10a4(rgyud): gsungs pa/ lha rnams kun gyi rdo rje ra// rdo rje dbyings ni bskyed pa yi// shin tu brtan pa 'di smos shig/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko&haM// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ rdo'i lusu rnam bsgoms pas// de ri swa
10a5(rgyud): brtar khong stong mang / rdo rje'i sku ni thob gyur nas/ spras pa rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rang bdag rdo rje'i skur mthong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// sangs rgyas
10a6(rgyud): gzugasu rnam par sgom// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tastA thA a haM/ snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// sangs rgyas gzung su rnam bsgoms pas/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// kun mkhyen yis thob
10a7(rgyud): par gyur// sangs rgyas kun la rab btud nas/ smras pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// mgon po bdag la byin rlob cing // bdag gi byang chub bstan par mdzod// grags chen sangs rgyas thang
10a8(rgyud): kyis/ rdo rje dbyings kyi tshig thos nas// mgon rnams thugs kar zhugs par gyur// rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gsungs/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sam bo d+hi dr-iT+Ta badz+ra bad+ha/ grags chen sangs
10b1(rgyud): mas ca kyis/ ga sngags chen po thong pas/ rdo na dbyings shin tu ga ma da su she la nas sarnas/  nams sargyas thams ca /  thugs gnas byung ste/ chos
10b2(rgyud): bsrung ban po 'o// de tshe thub pa dang bskur gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' byas pa 'i byang chub sams kyi dbang bskur ba/ 'bras bu byang chub sams ldan gang / rdo rje sems dpa'i dang bskur yid/ 
10b3(rgyud): bskal pa grangs rang gsum dag gi/ sbyin dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang // mkha' mtshungs rin chen thob byed pa/ nor bu rin chen dbang bskur yin// bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni// gzhan
10b4(rgyud): gyis dka' ba spyad pa dang // brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras sgrub pa// rdo las kyi dbang bskur yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen te// nyon mongs
10b5(rgyud): 'dam gyis ma gos pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur yin/ byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi/ dbang bskur bzhi po de rnams chos kyi dbyings// de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i
10b6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas rang bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru 'dod// rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru
10b7(rgyud): 'dod / rdo rjer chen dbang bskur bas/ de bzhi mtshan dang dpe byungango // sangs rgyas kun ni ye shes che// ma pa' mtshungs ches cing snying po can/ rdo rje las kyi dbang bsrur bas/ sprul pa yin srung
10b8(rgyud): ngo// gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob// de nas ming gi dbang bskur bas// thub de rnam snang mdzad chen gyur// chos nyid kyang ni yang dag rtogs/ chos dang
11a1(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs par brtag/ chos kun dngos po med pa ste// mtshan ma med cing gsal byed meng // mdzan cing med cing mnga' dang madrungs/ dmigs pa rnam par spangs
11a2(rgyud): pa ste/ rang bzhin meng cing brjong du mad chos kun cig gi spyod yul mod/ gzhan yang gsang bar brtags pa ste/  byir 'di na rdzogs par brjod / rtog pa med pa'i ches rnams kyi/ chos kyi don gyi min
11a3(rgyud): brjod// bdag med dngos po yod pa min// chos rnams med cing rtog pa med/ 'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par rdzogs// rtogs pa nyam su myong bar brjod// 'din ni ngo
11a4(rgyud): mtshar nyid du rtogs/ chos kun gzugs can min pa/ dang // gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan// chos kun cig gi spyod yul min// sgra ru yang ni 'dir bstan te// de bas ngo mtshar
11a5(rgyud): chos 'di ru// rtog pa rtog pa yin par brjod// ci phyir 'od ni ngo mdzar chos// de nyid gsang ba sgrub pa'i phyir// las rnams drugapo nyid dang ni// gzugs can tshig gir thu dag dang / 'bras phyir
11a6(rgyud): sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te// de phyir 'di ni phaya ma rgya'i ma dam ngo mtshar chos 'di ru// rtog pa 'ba' shig rtog pa yid// yang 'dir rtog pa ji lta bu// sems can kun gyi dor bya'i phyir/ byang
11a7(rgyud): nub tu ni sems bskyed pa/ pha rol byang drug sbyong ba dang / ldan pa rtog pa nyid yi/ sgrub pa'i don ni ji lta bu// gang dag chos las bdag meng dang / gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yi/ rab tu
11a8(rgyud): dga' ba'i sa sgrub po/  ci sgrub pa'i don nin/  byang ba na chung phyig/ chung rgyun chags nas bya ste/ 'khor bachung du 'dod pa yin/ khyi ma zhes bya la mong / drung rdzun dgas zhes
11b1(rgyud): sde 'phro ba sngam las byung ba'i dbang gsang bsdus shes pa rlung ni bro bar brjod pa yin ci phyir rlung dang phyi ba yin/ sa mthar phyid pa'i rgyal ba mar gamed pa'i rjod pa las chal med 'ang
11b2(rgyud): dag rgyal thung ba// rdung ri phyi ma yin par bshad / rlud kyi don na ji ltar byung // sems cad kun la phan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs spyod/ sangs rgyas drugs rjes bskul bani/ rlung ngo yang
11b3(rgyud): ngag byung ba yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byung ba'i/ chos dang longs spyod drung ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang cher ni// rlung don yang dag byung ba yid// rdo rje 'ang drag 'di tsa zhig/ sangs rgyas gzum
11b4(rgyud): kyis mi 'dul ba'i// sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir// rang gi ye shes byang chub sems// rdo drag por yang dag 'byung // drag po'i don ni ji ltar 'byung // drag po drag po'i mig gis ni// drag po'i khro ba
11b5(rgyud): zhes su bstan// drag po'i las ni spyod byed rnams/ 2chos shing bzlog par bya ba yid// rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig/ gdug pa de kun btul nas de// slar yang zhi bar yang dag byung // de nyid
11b6(rgyud): rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // sems can don gyi thabs spyor mdzad// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni// khro ba'i dbang phyug dag tu bstan// de nyid zhi dang drag po dang // phyagar rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// ci yi phyir ra'i
11b7(rgyud): bar brjod/ sna tshogs gdugs can rnal 'byor che// sems can spor b+ha 'ba' shig phyir// nyon mongs gdul la brtser dgongs shing // zhi ba'i don ni yang dag zung // phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// 'o pa
11b8(rgyud): gdug pa zhes gnos phyir/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhid pa dang / rdo rje phyag na bsnams mdzad pa// don phyog rdo rjer brjod/ dus gsum bdud rnams de bzhid du/ ma mthur phyogs kyis pa'i
12a1(rgyud): / khyung sa mas sa smra s+yA pa sa rnas du ngas / ga ma rnam
12a2(rgyud): radang ri phyag na rdo rjer brjod// rdo rje gtum po'i don ci zhig/ rdo rje gtum po garang sbyir te// rdo rje gnod sbyir shin tu brtan//  rgyal zhor mongs zhags pa za/ byang chub sems dpa' rang thung ba/ ci
12a3(rgyud): yi phyir na gtum por brjod// gtum gdug drag po chen po ri// rang byung nga nyid kho ra ste// srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing // drag po'i don ni gtum po yin// rdo rje khro bo ca yin brjod// gsod dang
12a4(rgyud): slong pa drag pos// de ni khro bo'i dor du brjod/ nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar// nyon mongs phyogs rnams sreg byed yin// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bya// sra zhing sring po 'ong
12a5(rgyud): stong med// bcad dang gzhig par bya ba min// bsreg par bya mi na 'dzag med pas// stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya// 'gro drug 'a khor lo spong byed cing // sdig pa bral bar byed pa yi// 
12a6(rgyud): byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ nyon mongs thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang // byang sems brtan pa gang yin pa// de ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin
12a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ de yi rdo rje ji lta bu// rdog pa thams cad dang bral zhing / chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod/ gzug
12a8(rgyud): sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang / 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa gang // de lta bu ni 'di rdo rje/ rdo rje rigs kyi dod 'di ci/ bden ning don yod de bzhin nyid/ 'gyur
12b1(rgyud): nga / des / nga yang 'gyung ba / sa su gas pa zung sems gsu
12b2(rgyud): zhes bya/ mam than med pa'i chos / byang chub sams dpa' 'asu brjod/ ngan zhing srub meng pa yi/ byang chub sems dang ngo rigs yo/ dzardza 'chang brnams ni dri// phyogs rnams thang
12b3(rgyud): khyab pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni/ chos dbyings dang mnyam thug pa med// rdo rje 'chang rnams de skang ngo // rdo rje'i rigs kur gang gi yin// chos kyi bdag po bla mang ba/ rnam par
12b4(rgyud): snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas// mgon des yongasu gzung ba de'i// dri yi dkyil 'khor yin gsungs pa/ ston pa gang zhig 'di rnamasu'i// / rjesu ston par byed pa gang // de yi spyod lam bya ba ci/ 
12b5(rgyud): gsang ba kun tu bsdus pas gsungs// 'di yi ston pa byang / chub sems// rjesu sngor byed shes rab thabs// phyag rgya rnams ni spyod lam ste/ sngags rnams de yi bya ba yin/ 
12b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang gi rigs gang yin// rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi/ rigs ni byang chub sems yin te// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs bzang // sangs rgyas kyi yang de nyid yul/ chen po gnas
12b7(rgyud): gang zhig na gnas/ chos rnams kun la gnas medang / rtsa ba mang sems skyeng yu'o chos rnams thang gizugs can mim chis kyi dbyings te spyong yul med rigs ri ma pa du yin brjod mi
12b8(rgyud): rnam pa brgyar gsus te/ mang du bsdun rnam pa lda/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang / chos dang las dang rnam pa lda ci ma phyir na rig su brjod/ mchog dang dman pa'i bye bragagis/ rigs nas bya
13a1(rgyud): de rnam gnyis/ sems can lam ngan zhugs pa yi/ rigs ni dpar pa yin par brjod/ lam ngan 'gro ba spangs nas ni// byang chub sems la 'jug pa chos// de bas rdo rje rigs brjod pa
13a2(rgyud): rigs de yang ni lnga pa yin// rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/ byang chub sems ni rgyal po che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs pa med// mgon po chen po rigs kyi bdag/ de ni rigs kyang lnga pa yin// ci yi
13a3(rgyud): phyir na sems dpar brjod// sems dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste// byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang // de bzhir byang chub sems dpa' dpa' dang // rnam gsum sems dpa' brjod par bya// yang gsungs pa/ 
13a4(rgyud): ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// sems dpa' ci yin byis pa brjod// sems dpa' mkhas pa ci yi phyir// byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// gnas gang zhig tu brjod bya ba// de ni de yi sems dpa
13a5(rgyud): brjod// chos sam yang na chos min dang // legs byas nyes par byas pa la// mi shes mun pas bsgribs gyur cing // chos la nyo na mongs bdag nyid 'dzin// dman zhing gti mug rigs
13a6(rgyud): can gyur// de lta bu ni byis par brjod// nyon mongs kun la chags pa dang // de bzhin srid pa ngan song gsum// mi shes mun pa la chags pa/ de 'dir byis par brjod par bya// sems dpa' mkhas pa
13a7(rgyud): gang zhig yin// dri ma las 'das nyon mongs spong // rnal 'byor ldan zhing brtul zhugs che// mi shes ling tog 'joms byed pa// de ni sems dpa' mkhas par brjod// 'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' gang // 
13a8(rgyud): chos kyi de nyid rtogs gyur cing // 'khor ba'i gnas nas sad 'gyur te// sems can rnams ni sang byed pa// de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// de la byang chub rnam/ 
13b1(rgyud): gsum ste// dman dang mchog dang bar ma'o// dman pa nyan thos sems yin te// bar ma rang rgyal byang chub bo// mchog ni byang chub sems yin te// de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje yin/ sku gsung thugs rnams bzhag
13b2(rgyud): pa gang // byang chub mchog tu brjod par bya/ ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin// byang chub mchog gi ye shes gang // de ni rdo rje nges par brjod/ ye shwa rdo las byung ba// de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod// rdo rje 'chang ba
13b3(rgyud): kun gyi rgyal/ ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po che// dga' chen de ni chags sam ci// sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir// sems can rnams la chags pa ste// de ni rdo
13b4(rgyud): 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje sems dpa' zhesu bsgrags// byang chub sem sa kyi 'bras bu ni// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang // de ni rdo rje sem sa rang bzhin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o// rdo rje rgyal
13b5(rgyud): po ci yin brjod/ rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu ni su brjod// dgug dang dbab pa'i rdo rje ni// de ni rdo rje rgyal por durje / bsdu ba yin dngos po bzhi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
13b6(rgyud): gang spyad pa// sems can dgug po'i thabs zhes pa// rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung // rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa/ rjesu chags pa zhesu brjod// rdo rje chags pa bdud
13b7(rgyud): chen po/ deni rdo rje chags par brjod/ sems can sman phyir bcom ldan gyi// gang che byang chub spyod pa spyad/ byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa/ rdo rje chags par yang dag 'thung // rdo rje lags pa ci yin brje
13b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing / legs zhes bya rab ster byed/ byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed/ de ni rdo rje legs par brjod/ sems can dag pa mgu byed cing // rdo rje 'chang rnams sgrub
14a1(rgyud): / ba byed / sems canam pas rnams dpa' bye cing // gsang ba 'dzin pa sa par byed/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs su 'byur/ bcom ldan 'das 'ang chos rnam drug
14a2(rgyud): go bodi sngor bsgrubs pa/ rdo rje legs par yang dag zung // rdo rje rin tin ci yi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang / mkha' mtsham rin chen lta bu ste/ rdo rje rin chen skal ba che// doni rdo rje rin chan
14a3(rgyud): brjod// sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur te// sems can kun gyi dbang bskur ba/ byang chub snying po'i dbang bskur gyis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pa
14a4(rgyud): gang tha mkha' mtshungs rdo rje yang dag byung // de ni rin chen don yod de// de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi/ mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing / thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid de/ de na
14a5(rgyud): rje gzi brjid brjod// ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan yin// rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// thar pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te// chos kyi rgyal mtshar rgyal mtshan cha// de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan
14a6(rgyud): brjod// rdo rje banang pa ci yin brjod/ rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje banang / sangs rgyas thams cad bzhang byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin// de ni rdo rje banang par brjod/ ci yi phyir na rdo rje
14a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos// sangs rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa/ dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po// de ni rdo rje cho su brjod// rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod/ shes rab rnon po ye shes che/ shin
14a8(rgyud): tu sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcong / shes bya'i sgri ba pa'ang gcod pas na/ den rdo rje rnon por 'arjod/ rdornga rgyu mi don tsa nig/ 'khor los sargyas gar byed pas// chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu
14b1(rgyud): ngam ches rol bcud las byung / de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya/ rdo rje smra bci yin brjed/ sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po// mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste/ tshig med tshig las yang dag byung / 
14b2(rgyud): ni rdo rje smra bar brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje las// sems can smon dang grol ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang // sangs rgyas las ni bdag med pa// de ni rdo rje las zhes bya// rdo rje bsrung ba
14b3(rgyud): bci yin brjod// byang chub sems dpa'i srung ba ste// theg pa dman pa spong byed cing // rtse mo nas lhung srung byed pa// de ni rdo rje srung bar brjod// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'di don ci// sdig pa thams cad zang
14b4(rgyud): byed cing // nyon mongs thams cad nges par gcod// srid pa za byed pa/ nod sbyin che// de ni rdo rje gning sbyin brjod// rdo rje khu dur ci yid brjod/ bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid// 'gyur mang de
14b5(rgyud): kho na nyid gang // sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes// de ni rdo rje/ khu dur brjod// sngon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang // rdo rjes mas dpa' yang dag byung // bsdu ba'i dngos po
14b6(rgyud): bzhi po ni// rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung // sems can smin byed chags pa'o// byang chub spyod pa lags pa ste// de nyid ces bya dam tshig che// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // sngon gyi sbyin pa'i
14b7(rgyud): spyod gyur gang // de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// nga ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod// 'byung po kun la byams pa ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag byung // chos kyi sbyin pa ba'ang ba
14b8(rgyud): s+ho// dbang bskur bzhi por brtan pa yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gang // rdo rje chos ni de las byung // nyon mongs gcod byed rdo rje che// rdo rje rnon por yang dag byung // mngon shes da
15a1(rgyud): ni mthu la sogs/ de ni rdo rje rgyu ru brjod// gzungs la sogs pa grub pa ni// rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung // ye shes chen po chos chen po// dam tshig ces bya'i dga' chen po/ 
15a2(rgyud): ye shes mngon par rtogs te ngag/ rdo rje chos las yang dag byung // 'dzin 'grus pha rol phyin rgyal po/ rdo rje la su yang dag byung // theg pa dman pa spong byed pa// de phyir rdo rje srung bar brjod / nyon mongs
15a3(rgyud): srid pa'i gdon chen po// rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag byung // de nyid ye shes mngor byang drug/ de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod/ las kyi dam tshig bzhi po ste// las kyi sems dpa' bdag nyid che// las kyi 'khor lo
15a4(rgyud): las byung ba'i// rdo rje las ni de las byung // gzhan yang byang chub sums ni bskyed pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung // rdo rje rang bzhin sems de yang // rnam pa bzhi ru byung ba ste// sgrol
15a5(rgyud): ba dang ni grol ba dang // dbugs 'byin mya ngan 'das 'god byed// sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa che// rdo rje legs par yang dag byung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs nyid lnga
15a6(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rab tu bsgrags// bsod nams rang bzhin rin chen de// rnam pa ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin// ye shes kyi ni tshogs brjod pa// de ni rdo rje chos zhes bya// ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang // rnam
15a7(rgyud): pa bzhir ni yang dag byung // brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa nyid// de ni rdo rje la su brjod// brtson 'grus rang bzhin las de yang // rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung // brtson dang sbyong ba zhes bya dang // sa
15a8(rgyud): sor rtog dang sgrub pa ste// brtson 'grus de bzhin las bzhi po// de las mthar gyis byung ba yin// sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung / rdo rje sems sogs de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
15b1(rgyud): las yang dag byung // pha rol phyin drug spyod pa las/ rdo rje can rnams byung bar 'dod// de bzhin pa dang ma ni gang / ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/ pad+ma las ni sangs rgyas sras/ 
15b2(rgyud): rdo rje can rnams gang las byung // rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin chags// rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang // rdo rje chos dang de bzhin no// de rnams shes rab gtso bor bstan// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje legs/ 
15b3(rgyud): gzi brjid de bzhin bshad pa nyid// rgyu dang smra ba sems dpa' che// de rnams thabs las byung ba yin// rdo rje las dang rdo rje srung // gnod sbyin de bzhin khu tshur nyid// shes rab thab su grags pa ste/ 
15b4(rgyud): bstan pa chen po tshigasu bshad// rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi gtso// rdo rje lcags kyu ma ru bshad// rdo rje rin chen mchog gyu ra pa// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin pa// pha ni rdo rje rdul
15b5(rgyud): po rgyu/ ma ni rdo rje rnon po ste/ pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po yi/ bang 'dzin gang las byung ba'o// rdo rje gzi brjid rin chen pa/ rgyal mtshan ma ni yin par bstan/ nor bu rigs chen
15b6(rgyud): bzang po yi/ rin chen gang las byung ba'o// pha ni rgyal po rdo rje las// ma ni gnod sbyin srung ba ste// las kyi rigs can bzang po yi/ las rnams gang las byung ba'o// dang po gang zhig ci zhe na/ 
15b7(rgyud): ngam thun dang pas pa te/ rdo rje cin kun dang po sems 'dun dang dran dang ting 'dzin/ rigs rnams kun gyi dang bor bshad/ yang med gan codon zhe ma/ gas gni la ni mangs/ 
15b8(rgyud): zung tshangam pa'i gnas na dang ldan pa/ nga rje ga nyid can rnams kyi tshong rje chen po gleng gzhi yon/ migs pa gang zhig yin den/ ga pa meng cing rigs pa mang nga ba byang chub ma
16a1(rgyud): drung ba'i// pha rol phyin pa mchog drug ni// de yi dmigs pa yin par bshad// rkyer gang zhe na// rtag tu sring gsum mngon dga' ba/ sems can sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas/ 
16a2(rgyud): snying rje dang ni ldan pa yi/ byang chub sems kyis bskul ba'o// gsang ba 'di ni gang du drung // 'og mir sdug po nyams dga' zhing // stug po'i zhing khams 'jig med pa// de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos// 
16a3(rgyud): rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'di byung // khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung // rdo rje rin chen mchog chen gyi// gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan pa// de nas khyab bdag 'di
16a4(rgyud): rnams byung // thog ma tha ma mang 'di ci// gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// sems can kun gyi shes pa dang // de bzhi na gshegs pa'i snying po gang // chos dbyings rdo rje chen po ste// thog
16a5(rgyud): ma tha ma med par bshad// rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di tsi/ bde rten rab tu grub bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla ra ma da// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ rab tu dga' ba nyid ces ba
16a6(rgyud): rab bzang nyid ni ji lta bu// dngos po kun mchog rdo rje ni// byang chub kyi ni sems zhes brjod// sangs rgyas skyed byed bzang po yi// rdo rje rab bzang nyid ces bshad // rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu// gdul bya 'phag
16a7(rgyud): ba'i skyes mchog nyid// de ni rdo rje snying por brjod/ de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni// rdo rje snying po'i bdag por bshad// ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang // byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ldan pa'o// 'gro ba srid
16a8(rgyud): skye gnas gang / de kun drug tu bzang bas na/ kun tu bzang por brjod par bya/ rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ba gang / byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ rdo rje rje
16b1(rgyud): 'chang bar brjod// dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis// grags chen rdzogs par byang chub pa// de ni dang po'i rigs byung ste/ de kho na nyid rigs laso// yang na rab tu
16b2(rgyud): mkhas pa rnams// bskal pa grangs med 'das nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob gang // de ni dang po'i rigs byung yin// chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de nyid rtogs
16b3(rgyud): shing shes pa yis// chos rnams thams cad rtog pa meng / chos dang gang zag bdag med las// rigs de byung ba nyid du 'dod// chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med // chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba
16b4(rgyud): mang/ rnam par rtog pa nyer zhi gang // de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen yin// byang chub se' ci yin brjod// chos rnams thams cang rtogs pa dang // 'khor ba'i gnas las sang gyur cing // ser ya
16b5(rgyud): kyis rdzogs byed pa/ nga ni byang chub sems dpar brjod/ ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin nyid bden shin tu/ brtan/ de kho na nyid gang rtogs nas/ chos kun rtogs pa zhes
16b6(rgyud): bya gang // deni rdzogs pas sangs rgyas brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod/ chos kyi de bzhin yang dag gnas/ slar yang gan du mi 'gyur zhing // de 'ang lamani sbeng byed pa/ de na de bdi/ 
16b7(rgyud): mamam tsha nas pa ma dang bzhi btsam par dzad 'ang pa'i 'a chags gang byang nga tsha sa meng pas byeng ga ni ma ma pa yang
17a1(rgyud): ston pa ci// nyon mongs bdud sogs gcod byed cing // skye dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis// ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa// ston pa'i ston par brjod pa yi// ci yi phyir na ye shes
17a2(rgyud): brjod// de nyid shes pas ye shes te// slar yang cho su rtog pa min// rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing // 'chi mang de bzhin ye shes yin// shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod// rnam pa mang po shes byed cing // rdo/ 
17a3(rgyud): pas sdug bsngal las grol byed// kun nas nyon mongs chos spong ba/ shes rab ye shes zhesu brjod// ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya// rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing // khyad par du ni rtogs par byed/ 
17a4(rgyud): bden pa de bzhin nyid shes pa'o// shes rab shes ra bzhe su bshad// shes rab pha rol phyin don ci// nyan thos rang rgyal phyi rol gyi// shes rab las ni bla mar brjod// de bzhin nyid gzhol pa
17a5(rgyud): rol phyin/ shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bshad/ rdzu la zhes bya don ci yin brjod/ na ni dgag pa'i don chen te/ dngos med dngos po med min pas/ gang du dri ma mang gyur pa// nga ni de yi tshul
17a6(rgyud): du brjod// ting 'dzin don 'di ci yin brjod// chos kun dngos po med ces pa'i// mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas pa'i// shes rab can gyis lhag par bsten// sems la dmigs par brjod par bya/ ci yi/ 
17a7(rgyud): phyir na bsam gtan brjod // sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed cing // nyon mongs dra ba rab 'joms pa'i// shes rab bcas par sems pa ni// srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog rnal 'byor
17a8(rgyud): don ni ci yin brjod/ chos rgyal chen po dam pa dang / zab mo'i mchog tu gyur pa des/ kun shes kun rig ldan 'byor pa'i/ rnal 'byor du ni brjod par bya/ rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod/ shes
17b1(rgyud): rab kyi ni nges sems pa// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems shing // sems can kun gyi don sems gang // de ni rnal 'byor pa don brjod// nga ni kun gyi rgyal po che// thams cad rig cing thams cad ster/ 
17b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang chen dang po ste// bde ba yi ni rgyu 'di yis// de bzhin nga ni 'jig rten gsum// khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog/ de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang / 
17b3(rgyud): 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod yin// srid gsum 'di yi don ci zhig/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// srid pa gsum du brjod par bya// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs mad las// 'di ltar thad
17b4(rgyud): rig pa mchog/ bdag med byed pa po yang med// chos kyang yod pa ma yin te// ngag dang mi dger byed pa yi/ bag chags kyis ni kun tu bsgribs/ chos ni thog med dus can te/ byed pa po ni yod ma yin/ 
17b5(rgyud): rtog pas nyams pa'i sems ldan pas// rgyu dang 'bras bur mthong bar 'gyur// kur gzhi sa bon thams cad pa/ da ni chos kun bskyed par byed// bsgos shing bag chags dang ldan
17b6(rgyud): pa 'di ni srid pa gsum zhes bya// 'dod pa'i las skyes khams gsum gyi// rgyur ni kun gzhi de nyid sdang // gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba yi// chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin// chos kun
17b7(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i phyir// nyes pa kun dang bral ba ste// thog ma reng 'byung chos spang po// glo bur dri mas nyon mongs 'gyur// nga ri kho na chos chen po// nga ni chos kyi snying por bshad// de bas nga ni rgyal por/ 
17b8(rgyud): nga ni srid pa gsum du bsgrags// 'jig rten gsum ri ci yin brjod// 'dod pa 'jig rten de bzhin gzugs/ gzugs med pa yi skye dgu rnams// 'jig rten gsum po zhes pa de// rang byung nga nyid kho na
18a1(rgyud): yin// 'dod pa zhes bya chos zin te// dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin nyid las sor rtog/ chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med phyir/ 
18a2(rgyud): chos de dag par byed// de bas nga ni rgyal po che// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan// ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs// de bzhin gzugs mad rab tu bsgrags/ stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pas// nga ni
18a3(rgyud): snying po'i bdag por bshad/ khams gsum pa yi don ci zhig/ 'dod khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang // gzugs med pa ni nyid dag dang / khams gsum bzang po 'di dag ni// rang byung ba
18a4(rgyud): kho na yin// 'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don// khams gsum gyi ni rgyu sa mas pa/ stong dang mtshan ma med bshad cing // smon pa med pa nga nyid bstun// 'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin/ byis pa rnams
18a5(rgyud): ni kun tu 'byung // de bzhin yang dang yang du 'khor// 'khor ba dag/ pa'i bdag nyid de/ rang 'byung ba nyid kho na yin/ gang la 'kho ra ba yod pa yi// chos ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ yang
18a6(rgyud): dag ma yin kun brtags phyir// de ni thog mtha' med pa yin// med gang de ni stong pa ste// stong pa nyid gang nga nyid do// de bas 'khor ba de nyid ni// rdo rje 'chang rgyal nga nyid bsgrags// mya ngan 'das pa ci
18a7(rgyud): yin brjod// gang zhig de bzhin nyid rtog stong // bden pazhi rang bzhin bzang po nyid/ mtshan nyid dang ni dngos po gzugs// mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs// tshig dang sgra yis gzung bya min// 
18a8(rgyud): rtog pa yod ma yin// de bas mya ngan 'das sgra ru// nga nyi kho na rab shes bya/ de yi rtag pa'i don ci zhig/ rtag nyid rtag la 'byung gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa dang bral gang / rtag pa de nyid kho na ni// 
18b1(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra ru bsgrags// 'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod// gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing // thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang / sdug bsngal 'byung 'gog byed pa yi// 'jig pa mya ngan 'a
18b2(rgyud): sgra yin// dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod// yod pa'ang ma yin meng pa'ang min/ brjod bya brjod byed ma yin min// dag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin// theg pa chen po ci yin brjod// sangs rgyas thams cad
18b3(rgyud): gshegs gyur cing // theg pa kun las nges rgyal ba// yang dag gyur pa'i sems can ni// theg pa chen po'isu bstan// mthu dang las rnams 'jug pa dang // tshogs rnams rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams/ 
18b4(rgyud): rgya che zhes pa theg chen te// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo mtshar mchog/  mkha'i don ni ci zhig yin/ sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod/ 'byung ba med cing rdzas kyang med/ skye ba med cing
18b5(rgyud): 'chi ba med// dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog namakha' zhes pa'i sgra ru bstan// yang dang yang du skye ba dang // de bzhin nyon mo ngas kun bdag nyid/ grangs med dpag med dang
18b6(rgyud): bral ba/ de ni sa nyid brjod par bya// 'byung ba chen po gang las byung // 'gog pa ci yin gang gis byed/ ma rig nyon mongs la sogs las/ 'byung ba chen po yang dag 'byung // sa bon kun ldan
18b7(rgyud): kun gzhi ni/ phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod// gnas ni yongasu gyur pa dang // kun gzhi sa bon mi 'byung zhing // rtog pa thaMd dang bral ba// 'byung ba chen po 'gog pa yin// rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po mchog
18b8(rgyud): tu gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las shin tu gsang ba stug po'i tshigs kyi las thams cad bsdus pa ste/ drug pa las sems dpa' bcu drug gi bshad pa zhes
19a1(rgyud): dru gang pa'ang brnags/ sas ga nga / gang gis byagasams su gdon drug gas pa da / gyu rmugs mas cad da / a
19a2(rgyud): na btab pa gyur/  phyir sngag su brjod par bya/ gsang sngags rnams ni 'bong byed cing // gdugs pa thams cad sod par byed/ na mongs sngags rnams 'joms byed cing / sangs rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren
19a3(rgyud): yin// ci phyir zhen rig sngags brjod// 'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul zhing // nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul// ma rig pa ni bzlog byed pa/ de ni rig sngags legs par brjod// gzungs sngags rnams
19a4(rgyud): ni ci yin brjod// chos rnams kyi ri rten byed cing // srid pa'i phyi gas ni rab 'joms byed// sangs rgyas chos rnams thob byed cing // / dge ba la rten sbyin pa'ang yin// phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid brjod// sangs
19a5(rgyud): rgyas kun dang brtul zhugs ldan// byang chub sems dpa 'a rnams dang ni// rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad dag/ spyod lam phyag rgyas mtshon par byed// sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid kyang // sangs
19a6(rgyud): kun gyi thugs yin te// chos kyi snying po sgrub byed cing // chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// 'khor bar myong ba'i sdug bsngal
19a7(rgyud): / dang // 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs// rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags kyi// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed
19a8(rgyud): cing // chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang // dge ba zhes bya 'dzin byed pa// gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod/ rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang // ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po// phyag rgya dag ni
19b1(rgyud): ni 'ching ba na// ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes// dang po kho nar khrus bya zhing // de bzhin phyogs dag bcing ba dang / log 'drer rnams kyang bcing bya ste/ gos dag gtsang ma bgo bya zhing / grong dang yul 'khor dag
19b2(rgyud): dang ni// grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams// de yi dbus phyag rgya dang // nam yang bcing bar mi bya ste// lha khang yang na dgon pa 'am/ ri bo yi ni phug dag gam/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dben zhing // 'du 'dzi
19b3(rgyud): med pa'i gnas gtsang ma// dar ni skyil krung bca' bar bya/ bkra shis skyil krung nyid bya ste/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yis// byang chub snying por bcings pa bzhin// dar ni mig dag btsum bya zhing // so
19b4(rgyud): la so ni bzhag par bya// macu gnyis dag kyang mnyam bya zhing // dran pa rtse gcig byas nas kyang / sbyor med sbyor ba'i sngags bzla zhing // phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya// phyag rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu'i// bcis
19b5(rgyud): pas rdo rje can kun mnyes// rig sngags ji ltar bzla bar bya// / dbang phyug chen po gsang ba gsungs// rig sngags dag ni ba zlas pa na// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas/ skyil krung ji lta ba bzhin bya/ 
19b6(rgyud): dran dang yid ni ma yengs pas// rig sngags dag ni bzla bya zhing / sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya// mchu yis ma yin lngas kyang min// dkan nyid kyis kyang ma yin te/ lce dang rkeg mas kyang ma yin// rtag tu snying
19b7(rgyud): ka nas kyang min// shin tu phra ba'i yid kyis ni// sems ni chos nyid nang rung bya// de ltar bzlas pa byas na ni/ yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin// oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad// mchog dang nor ster dpal dang
19b8(rgyud): g.yang / skal bdang rnam pa dang ldan zhing / ngam bca' ba dang bkra shis don// nor bu 'dzin pa'i snying po yin/ yi ge hUM ci yin brjod/ sdug bsngal 'chos shing 'joms par byed/ sring pa'i zhags
20a1(rgyud): pa gcod byed cing // gdug pa spangs shing gsod byed pa'i// hUM ni mchog tu dran par bya// yi ge phaT ni ci yin brjod// gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing // 
20a2(rgyud): ba dag ni 'gugs par byed// phaT ni 'joms byed sgra yin te// grogs dang bcas pa 'joms par byed// swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod// sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing // dge ba'i tshogs ni
20a3(rgyud): 'phel bar byed// nyes par byas pa 'phrog byed cing // sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ mchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya/ mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste// gang du bsad bya mi
20a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa'o// de yi mchod pa rnam mang 'gyur// phyi rol gyi ni mchod pa min// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod/ de bzhin du ni thar pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i mchod pa de rnams
20a5(rgyud): ni// 'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyi ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dang // nyid kyi sras kyi mtshungs med pa/ 'i// cho ga sgrub pa'i gsang ba ni// rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i
20a6(rgyud): mchog de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa// de ni dam tshig shes pa yin/ dam tshig goms par byed pa yang // dam tshig shes pa yin par brjod// bskal pa
20a7(rgyud): grangs med 'das pa yi/ byang chub sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i dam tshig la zhugs pa// de yi dam tshig shes par brjod// ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin// dam pa'i chos
20a8(rgyud): kyi bcung snying po// 'byung bas de ni dkyil 'khor brjod/ dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba che/ chos chen shin tu bstan pa'o// dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu// cho ga chos dang rnal 'byor te/ 
20b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i thar pa yang dag 'byung // skye ba 'di nyid kho ra la// rab dga' sgrub par byed pa'i mchog dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa yi// skyes pa 'am yang na bud med kyis// bya ba gang zhig/ 
20b2(rgyud): bya ba ni// gsungs shig gsangs pa'i dbang phyug che// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang // byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang // de bzhin du ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ shin tu bstan par
20b3(rgyud): bya ba yin// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya// khyod kyis srog chags bsad mi bya// ma byin par yang blang mi bya// 'dod pas log par g.yem mi bya// brdzun
20b4(rgyud): du yang ni smra mi bya// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi// chang dag 'thung ba spang bar bya// bya ba ma yin thams cad der/ mchog tu sems can gdul bar bya// dam pa rnams la rim gro dang // rnal 'byor
20b5(rgyud): pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya// rnal 'byor rig par sgrub pa'i phyir// mkhas pa rnams la bsnyen par bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi// yid
20b6(rgyud): kyi rnam pa gsum dag kyang // ci rus par ri bsrung bar bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste// bla ma sangs kun dang mtshungs// sngags dang phyag rgya rnams la yang // ram yang brnyas par mi bya'o// 'khor
20b7(rgyud): lo rdo rje pad+ma sogs// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa// 'gom pa nyid du mi bya zhing // bza' bar yang ni mi bya'o// de bzhin sman ma lha yi grib// rkang pa dag gis brdzi mi bya// de yi steng du 'dug mi bya/ 
20b8(rgyud): slar yang bzhag par mi bya'o// lha yi phyag mtshan bzang po dang // lha yi gzhon pa'i mtshan ma rnams// 'gom zhing brnyas par mi bya ste/ sems can la ni gnod mi bya// de yis srog gi phyir yang
21a1(rgyud): ni' 'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin/ 'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/ byang chub sems na ma bya/ rdo rdo dril bu'i drug tum dpa yang dor bar mi d+ha'o// kon pachog gsul la
21a2(rgyud): dad pa yang // rnam pa kun tu btang mi bya// sdom pa btang bar mi bya zhing // bdag nyid gdung bar mi bya'o// khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya/ mi dge bcu ni spangs na su// dge ba bcu ni ster byed cing // 'byung po rnams
21a3(rgyud): la phan 'dod pa// nang gi bdag nyid khrus su 'dod// bdag nyid rab tu dag bya'i phyir// bdag nyid phyag rgya rgyas gdab phyir// phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing / rnal 'byor pa yi khru su brjod// gsang ba'i
21a4(rgyud): mkhas ldan khas len pa'i// chu yi khrus ni bya ba ste// la/ sa 'di rnam par rtog pa'i khrus// rdo slob dpon dag gis bya// yang na to/ gus khrus bya ba// mchog tu ngo mtshar bshad bya ste// dang por bdag nyid
21a5(rgyud): go bgo zhing // khro bo yang ni dran par bya// don kun rab tu ba byed pa'o// yig gnyis po cha bzang po yid/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dragachen dang / khro bo bdud rtsi 'khril pa ste/ oM badz+ra kI li kI li badz+ra
21a6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM hUM go cha'o// oM hUM an+dog nod sbyin gyi'o// oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'o// rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di dang ni// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'bar rab bzod dka' bas/ 
21a7(rgyud): bdag nyid dag ni 'bar bar bya// oM d+hu pi d+hUd+hu pi Ti tsu dra na~M swA hA/ chu yi nang du 'jug pa dang / snyim pa gsum ni blugs pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la// rig sngags 'di ni 'dod pa yin// rig sngags
21a8(rgyud): mngon par bzlas pa yi// sa yi phung po gsum dag ni// bdag gi stong dang smad dang dbus/ rab tu dag byed mchog yin no// oM b+hu dza la hUM/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran pas// rig sngags thams cad
21b1(rgyud): mngon bzlas pa'i// chu ni phyag rgya kun gyis blang // rig sngags 'di ni gsang bar 'dod// phyogs ni ji ltar cing ba yin// me lha rgyal chen shar phyogasu// lho yi phyogasu gshin rje dang // nub tu rlung lha nyid
21b2(rgyud): dang ni/ byang du chu lha gzhom par 'dod// rnal 'byor pa yis gzugs bzhi ni// phyogs bzhi dag tu nges par bcing // de nas steng 'og mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje nag mos nges par bcad// bgeg cing ba ni
21b3(rgyud): ji ltar lags// rdo rje khu tshur rab 'bar dang // rdo rje nyi ma ltar 'bar dang / rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis// bgegs bcing ba ni brtan par 'gyur// dga' ba chen po dza lta bu// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bya/ 
21b4(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bzhi ru/ lnga pa brtsegs pa 'i phyag rgya yis/ stang dang 'og dang mtshams rnamasu// stong dang pa/ ces pa'i phyag bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyi/ chog tu gas
21b5(rgyud): nga'i dam pa yis// rtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'a/ khor du/ de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya// mchod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ rigs sngags mngon par zlas mchod dang // phyag rgya bcing ba lhur
21b6(rgyud): len dang // rnal 'byor sgom pa mchod pa dang // sgrub pa dag gi mchod pa'o// sbyin sreg las ni ji lta bu// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum ngag dang / sreg
21b7(rgyud): bya sbyir sreg mchog yino// rdo rnal 'byor las byung ba'o// de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi/ snying po gsang ba kun bsdus pa'i// shin tu spras pa dam pa'i mchog de kho na nyid bshang par bya// rdo rje slob dpon spyod
21b8(rgyud): chen ldan// dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs// slob dpon las ni dbang skur thob/ gsang dang dgongs pa kun shes shing // dpa' zhing brtan la brtson 'grus che// ying zhungs 'dzin cing
22a1(rgyud): gsal bar ldan// dul drang shes nyer can dag gis/ rdo rje sdong dpon zhing bya'o// dang por ji srid tshogs bar du// zla ba'am yang ra b+hA ba phyed// yang na lo yo bar du ra/ rig pa'i
22a2(rgyud): brtul zhugs spyang par bya// gal te de ni sangs rgyas kyi// rig 'dzir grub pa rnam gsu po// ji lnga rdo rje car gyi yin// rnam pa gsum du nges pa yin// nor bu rigs can bzang po la// rnal 'byor pa ni
22a3(rgyud): be nyid bya'i// ji ste pad+ma 'byung ba la/ rnal 'byor bani ri rab tu sgrub/ ji ste las kyi rang bzhid bzang // las rnams kun gyi rigs las ri/ sbyor ba bzhi ni yang dag byung // rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu
22a4(rgyud): 'gyur// snga dro phyo dro nyi phyang dang // nam gyi gung spang gung la ni// d+ma ba chen po kur bya ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs/ dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa// chen pos phyogs kur phyag bya
22a5(rgyud): steng / rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga yis// rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o// shaM sa rab chen po sangs rgyas kur// yang dang yang du dran bya ste// bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kur// rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bar
22a6(rgyud): bya Ta/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dze pa pra brta nA ya at+ma naM nir+ya tA ya bi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa mAM/ shar gyi phyogasu song nas ni// yan lag kun gyis phyag byas te/ rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di
22a7(rgyud): yis ni// bdag nyid dbul bar bya ba yin/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She ka ya at+ma naM nir+ya tA ya ma~M/ sarba ta thAg ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsA mAM/ rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ lho phyogasu ni phyag
22a8(rgyud): byas te// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad la// bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yi// de ras nub kyi phyogasu ni// sngags 'di yis ni phyag byas te// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dz+wa pra brta nA ya at+ma naM nir+yA ta ya mi/ sa
22b1(rgyud): ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya maM// dag pa'i chos can slob dpon ches// nub phyogs ni phyag byas te// rdo rje'i sngags 'dis skul bya zhing // bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza
22b2(rgyud): karma NaM at+ma na rir+yA tA ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mAM// mchod dang dbang skur las ldan zhing / byang du chos la nges sbyor bas/ byang phyogasu ni phyag byas te// bdag nyid rdo rje la su 'gyur/ 
22b3(rgyud): shar du mchod pa'i laMs yin te// lho phyogasu ni dbang bskur ba// nub phyogasu ni chos chen po// byang du chos la nges par sbyor// thub pa kun gyi nyi ma'o// mgon po chen po rab btud gnas// phyogs rnams
22b4(rgyud): kun tu sngags 'di yis// phyag ni rab tu btsal bar bya// oM sarba ta Tharba A la bkra tsit+ta pra ta me na badz+ra ban d+ha ne ka ro mo/ de nas ji skad bshad pa'i phyag bya ba// sangs la dmigs sems kyis ni// rab
22b5(rgyud): tu gus bcas phyag rgya rnams myur du bskyed pa'i sgrub pa yin// phyag byas 'og tu langs nas ni// bdag nyid kyis ni las rnam sa byA/ bdag nyid dbul ba bzang po yi// sangs kun
22b6(rgyud): la dbul bya ste// ma lus phyogs bzhugs mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongasu gsol// 'di ltar nye bar zhi pa bdag ci nas rdo rje nyid grur mdzod// rdo rje rigs kyi mchog gyur pa/ 
22b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sras bcas tha~Md la// rtag tu rnam pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid dag ni dbul bar bya/ rdo rje'i gsang sngags de yis ni/ bdag nyid dbul bar 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas sras
22b8(rgyud): bcas thams cad ni// yang dang yang du rjes dran te// sdig pa la son nyon mongs kun/ mya ngan 'das par bshags par bya// skye ba 'di 'am gzhan dag gi/ sdig pa tha~Md rnam spangs nas// sang+yas
23a1(rgyud): sras bcas thams cad kyi/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs skyed dang / de bzhin sems can kun gyi la// rje su yi rang bya ba yin// byang chub mya ngan mi 'dra bar// sangs rgyas kun la
23a2(rgyud): gsol ba gang ba/ byang chub sems ni thabs chen gyis// sems can sangs rgyas rjes dran bya// shin tu ngo mtshar mchod pa ni// ci nus par yang bsgrub par bya// yang na mya ngan 'das sogs dang / rnal
23a3(rgyud): 'byor dge ba sogs pa la/ ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis// mchod pa'i sprin dag dbul bar bya// gnas 'di 'am ni gzhan dag na// lha sogs bdag gir ma byas pa'i// me tog chu skyes thang
23a4(rgyud): skyes rnams/ thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas// thub pa'i dbang po rnams la dbul/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// me tog mchod pas rab mchod cing / 
23a5(rgyud): phyag rgya rnal 'byor bcas pa yis// phyogs rnams kun tu nges paraspro/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// gang dag spos kyi shing bzang po// thub pa'i dbang
23a6(rgyud): phyug rnams la dbul/ lha yi spos sogs rmad 'byung ba// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pho ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri yi shing rnams bzang po ni// thub
23a7(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug rnam la ni// phyag rgyar bcas rab bskul nas ni/ phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ti gan+d+ha pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho dang / rin
23a8(rgyud): chen ri bo la sogs mchog mchod pa'i sprin ni spro ba yis/ phyogs rnams kun tu dbul bar bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ti bo d+yAng ga ra t+na a le kA ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ cad 'ja/ 
23b1(rgyud): bde ba dga' chen dang / nod dang sgeg la sogs pa'i tshogs/ phyogs rnams kun tu thams cad nas// dga' ba'i mchog ni spro bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta hA srel se ra ti so khyA a nut+ta ra bAdz+ra
23b2(rgyud): me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ gos dang rgyan sogs 'byung ba yi// de bzhin dpag bsam shing bzang po// de yi sngags ni brjod bya zhing // sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA
23b3(rgyud): ga ta a nut+ta ra bo d+hi a lang ka ra wa stA pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// rin chen bzang po cher 'bar dang / snang ba'i shing las byung ba dang // zla ba nyi ma la sogs 'od // phyogs rnams
23b4(rgyud): kun tu spro bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA a lo ka pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal che// yang dang yang du rjes dran nas/ snying rje bskyed pa'i
23b5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya// byang chub tu ni se mas bskyed nas/ sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ 
23b6(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra bo d+hi tsit+ti pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can kun la bde legs dang // 'byung po kun la byams pa dang / dud 'gro kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// ngan 'gro thams
23b7(rgyud): cad zhi 'dod dang / byams dang snying rje btang snyoms dang // dga' ba tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor byung // rdo rje'i sngags ni brjod bya zhing // sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a
23b8(rgyud): nut+ta ra ma hA brah+ma bi hA ra pA dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can thaMd dpal dang ni// nor dang ldan pa grub par shog/ bde ba ma tshang med par shog/ zhes pas dbul zhing spro bar bya/ 
24a1(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ro ba da da pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM// sems can tha~Mng byang chub dang // sdom la rab tu gnas par shog/ rgyags sogs nyes
24a2(rgyud): pa chen po rnams// ni 'gyur kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a rut+tA ra ma hA bo dI hA ra shI la pa ra mi tAM pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM// 'jigs dang 'khor sogs sdug bsngal la/ 
24a3(rgyud): sogs pa'i 'jigs kun zhi gyur cig/ byams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// chos la bdag med bsgrub par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA d+harma a ba bo d+hi klin+d+ra pa ra mi tA pA dza me g+has
24a4(rgyud): mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ 'khor ba mthar thug bar du ni// bdag 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ de bzhin sems can thad ni/ de nyid sgrub pa byed par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA san sA ra pa ri t+yai ka a
24a5(rgyud): nut+ta ra bir+ya pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM// srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags so// / nyon mongs chen po zhi/ bar shog/ sems can thad g.yeng med cing // bsam
24a6(rgyud): gtan bzhi dang ldan pa re shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA sau khya bi hA ra d+hA na pA rA mi tA pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra NA sa ma ye hUM/ sangs rgyas ye shes shes rab che/ sdug bsngal gcod byed
24a7(rgyud): bla na med// shes rab sbyor bas dag byed pa'i// sang+yas sems can dag gyur cig/ oM sarba taM thA ga ta a nut+ta ra kle sha tshA da sarba d+harmA sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pA dz+ra ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na
24a8(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi/ bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing // mchod pa'i phyir ni rnams bsams nas/ sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya
24b1(rgyud): rirA ta na pAdz+ra me g+ha sa pu dra s+pha ra Ni sa pa ye hUM/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul skyed kyi// bdag nyid kyis ni rnams bsam zhing // lce ni de snyed ldan dang bcas/ sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod par/ 
24b2(rgyud): bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka nir+yA ta na pA dza mi g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// de nas rnal 'byor de nyid kyis// lus dang ngag sems byung ba yi// mchod pa dag ni bsdus nas su// sangs rgyas
24b3(rgyud): kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga to tsit+ta nir+ya tsan pA dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ grags chen ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ ma lus kun la mchod naso na// dge ba dag ni bsdus
24b4(rgyud): byas nas// sems can don du sngo bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cang rjes dran nas/ sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/ byams sor rnal 'byor chen po rnams// phyogs rnams
24b5(rgyud): kun tu spro bar bya// go cha mchog gi yog gnyis kyis// blo ldan bdag nyid go bgo zhing / rig sngags gang zhig mngon 'dod pa'o/  ga sngags de ni bzla bar bya// rlung chen gsang ba 'di run/ 
24b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i sngags bzlas pa// brgya rtsa bcu ru bshad pa yin/ yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig go// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'bring la ni// thun mong du ni rnam lngar bshad// gang gis sdig can 'grub 'gyur
24b7(rgyud): ba'i// gsang ba'i bzlas pa rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog la/ bzlas pa 'dzin mchog yin no// bkra shis skyil krung bcas nas ni/ sems kyis sangs la dmigs
24b8(rgyud): nas// blo dang ldan pa bdag nyid ni// rtag tu kun mkhyen sangs bsam// gtsug tor la sogs mtshan bzang dang / ldan par bdag gis lus bsams te/ sang+yas snying po nang 'dug cig / 
25a1(rgyud): nyid sangs rgyas zhesu bsam// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las byung ba'i// gang gis 'khor lo rnam sprul pa// mngon par byang dub chen po yis// chos kyi 'khor lo bsku
25a2(rgyud): bar bya// gdul bya'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa'i// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'ang 'grub// gnas ni yongasu gyur pa yis// sems ni kun bzhi las byung min// bsod nams ye shes rab rdzom
25a3(rgyud): phyir/ zla ba gang bar rnam par brtag/ zla ba gang ba dri med pa// snying ka rI ni bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom// de lta bu yi tshul mchog gis/ zlab
25a4(rgyud): phyed na 'grub par 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / da lo gcig na ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur ba 'i// de srid rnal 'byor chen pos bzlas/ lus ni/ 
25a5(rgyud): ngal bar gyur pa na// phyag rgya bcing ba brtsam par bya// de bzhi na gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i// de tshe byang chub mchog bcing bya/ yang na chos 'byung zhes pa 'am// shin
25a6(rgyud): tu rmad 'byung dpal be'u'o// de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/ phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid// byang chub snying po la gnas bdag/ bdag ni phyag na rdo bstan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
25a7(rgyud): ni// rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par sgom// gsang chen rdo rje'i dbus ni// rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgrom// de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa// pad+ma sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// zla ba'i dbusu
25a8(rgyud): pad+ma che/ pad+ma'i dbusu yi ge rnams/ de bzhin rin chen rigs bzlas pa'o// rin chen rgyal po rigs bdag nyid/ zla ba'i dbus rin chen che// rin chen dbusu'ang yi ge rnams/ de nas las kyi rigs bzang
25b1(rgyud): po rnal 'byor dor kun sgrub byed la// sangs rgyas snying po rang bdag nyid// rdo rje la su rnam par sgom// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbu su ni// rin chen rdo rje rdar sgom// rin chen rtse me rdo rje che// de yi dbu su la/ 
25b2(rgyud): yi ge rnams// rigs lnga yi ni bzlas pa 'di// gsang ba'i bzlas pa brjod par bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ bzlas rgyud gsang ba mchog 'dzin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas
25b3(rgyud): pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis 'dzin// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dar// sangs rgyas gzugasu rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas de yis thugs dbusu// rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom// rang
25b4(rgyud): gi lus ni bdag med cing // chos dang gang zag stong pa nyid// sangs rgyas de dag gi gzugs ni// bdag med par ni rnam par bsam/ lus ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod pas// sangs rgyas de
25b5(rgyud): yang yong ma yin// phung po dang ni skye mched khams// chos zhes bya ba/ 'i sangs rgyas med// gang zag nyid kyis sangs rgyas med// sa rgyas med pa yang ma yino// pha rol phyin drug sa bon te// 
25b6(rgyud): shes rab sa bor sbyong mdzad pa'o// gnas dang gnas min skal ldan pa/ de nyid byang chub bdag med 'dzin// de lta bus ni gsang chen gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na// myur bar slob po// 
25b7(rgyud): chen po yis/ rab tu dga' ba 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje rigs bzlas pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// rdo'i gzugasu rnam par sgo// rdo rje yi lha
25b8(rgyud): dbusu// rig pa'i yi ga rnam par sgo// dngos med zhes bya rngod de// byang chub 'bras bu gang yin pa'o// gang zhig rdo rje ni su bshad// gang zhig de nyid 'gyur med pa'i// lus kyi de nyid zhes brjod la/ gang
26a1(rgyud): zhig chos dang chos nyid stong // gzugs la sogs pa'i chos chen po// 'byung ba rje sgra 'dzin pa med/ lus ni gzugs zhes bya bar brjod/ gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma
26a2(rgyud): yin// gzugs de yang ni rnam phye la// phra mo'i 'du shes rnam par sgom// cha shasu ri rnam phye na// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs ni stong pa zhes bshad// 'di de rdo rje zhes byar bstan// 
26a3(rgyud): gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad ni// stong pa nyid ni rnam par sgor// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis// rab tu dga' ba sgrub par bya// rdo rje rin rten rigs bdag nyid// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig
26a4(rgyud): rten 'dir// stong nyid na mkhar rnam par skem// de ni na mkhar rnadal 'byor ches// rtog pa dang bcas yi ger bsam// chos kun da sa med zhes bya ba// stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces brjod/  // 
26a5(rgyud): med ces bya'i gzugs pa de// mkha' mtshungs sangs rgyas spyod yulo// gang la gzugs ni yod min pa'i// mig ces bya ba ci yid brjod// mig de yang ni gang zhig gi/ mig ces bya ba
26a6(rgyud): yin par brjod// bdag po rgyal po 'di gang zhig/ 'di yi skye ba'ang ji lta bu'i// 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus las// mig dbang po yang dag byung // mig de la'ang gzugs med la/ ci zhig byed de yod
26a7(rgyud): pa'ang min// mig ni ji lta ba bzhin du// thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs/ zlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// chos chen po yi dbang bskur 'gyur// de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa// pad+ma'i sems dpa
26a8(rgyud): rang bdag nyid// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ pad+ma'i gzugasu rnam par sgom/ pad+ma shin tu dag de la/ rig pa'i ye shes rnam par sgom// shes rab chen po pad+ma de// chos kyi snying por bas// 
26b1(rgyud): par bya// pad+ma hu yis mgos shing / 'das gyi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// sems can thams cad de bzhid dag/ chos de btsod nas ma skyes pa'i// de bzhi gshegs pang 'di gang zhig chos pa
26b2(rgyud): chos nyid stong gang yid// gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad kyi/ chos nying de bzhin nying du 'dod// de ras las kyi rigs bzlas pa'i// las kyi rnal 'byor rnam par bsapa/ sangs rgyas
26b3(rgyud): rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di// chos dang longs spyod thob byed yin// gang la chos zhes bya ba med// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul snang // e ma'o sangs rgyas de dag nga // rang gi las kyang sgrub par
26b4(rgyud): mdzad// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje slob dpor dka' thub che// de 'di nyid la dam pa yi// sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i sring sogs phyag rgya ni// rdo rje rigs
26b5(rgyud): la bdag por bshad// rin chen la sogs dbang bskur zhing / dag pa'i mchog ni pad mchog 'dzin// sangs rgyas sku ni chos nal// rdo rje rnal 'byor nges bstan bya/ byang chub ma
26b6(rgyud): ni kun 'dul ba/ 'di ni zlas pa dam par 'dod// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin/ phreng ba nges par sten par bya/ gang du zla ba bye ba byed// rnam gnyis rnab gsum nyung ba'ang rung / phreng ba sangs rgyas la
26b7(rgyud): 'dzub bcas/ gung mos rdo rje'i rnal 'byor skyes/ srid lag steng du rin chen smras/ mthe'u rlung gis ni pang kha phye/ las kyi phreng bas las byed pa/ sor mo kun gyi bya bar bshad/ rdo rje'i rig
26b8(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa yi// 'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa che// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor po de tsa// rdo can la ru rag sha/ phyi rol rdor rigs dbang po ste// mu tig nor bu'i rnal 'byor can/ pad+ma'i snying po'i
27a1(rgyud): phreng ba ni/ pad+ma'i rigs rnams kun la bsngags// yang na kun las mchog gyur pa// bod ceng de srog 'dzid pa/ ljags kyi zlas pa nyis 'gyur te/ zangs kyi yang ri bzhir
27a2(rgyud): 'gyuro// du rag sha yi bye ba gnyis/ mu tig gi ri brgyar 'gyuraro// dbang po'i sdong 'gyur rnal 'byor te// dngul gyi 'bum du 'gyur ba yin// pad+ma'i bye ba brgya 'gyur brjod/ be tse yi grangs pa/ 
27a3(rgyud): lag pa g.yod pas phyag rgya bcing / g.yas pa phreng ba dang ldan bya/ ji ltar sngar bshad bsang po sogs/ rmad 'byung chen po'i zlas pa bya/ ci yi phyir na bzlas pa brjod// dge ba la brtson rgyal
27a4(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // rmang 'byung rnams kyang mthong 'gyur zhing // byang chub spyod pa rgyal 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyal rol pa mngon par 'gyur// bzlas pas skyon langs nas ni// phyag rgya dag ni bcing bar bya/ se
27a5(rgyud): kun gyi dor bya'i phyir// phyogs kun tu ni 'dud pa bsha nga// byang chub sems tshul thob byed pa'i// mdo sogs gsang kha bklag par bya/ bsod nams tshegs ni bskyed pa'i phyir// sang+yas
27a6(rgyud): mchod pa yang dag bya// de nas zas kyi dus ni// rnam pa kun tu chang bu sbyin// sangs rgyas rigs pas mngon bsrungs pa/ bza' ba dag pa dbul bar bya/ sangs rgyas bdag nyid bze' bang dbul// legs
27a7(rgyud): par bgos nas bza' ba dbul// snga dro sdom pa blang bya ste/ de nyid nyi phyed dang mtshams// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// sangs rgyas rdo rje nor bu dang / pad+ma byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang / rnam pa bani
27a8(rgyud): bo de las sbyor/ sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs byang chub nyin dang mtshan la rnam pa drug rdo rje dril bu tshogs slob dpon// rdo rje can rnams de bzhin drug zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang ni// byams pa nyin
27b1(rgyud): zhag kun la brgyad// chos gsum tshangs pa bzhi zhes pa/ rnam pa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ 'di yi chos chen gsum po la/ rtag tu snyoms par 'jug par bya// gsang mchog dkyil 'khor mchog dang ni// de
27b2(rgyud): bzhin las kun byed pa'o// gang du sdig par mi 'gyur ba'i// thams cad bza' zhing thams cad len/ lus nas lhag mar gyur pa spang // de bzhin dri ma thams cad spang // nyid re zhing ni lan gsum du khrus
27b3(rgyud): gsum bya zhing gsang blang ba/ gos kyang lan gsum brje bar bya// gtsang gos lan gsum yang ni sbyin/ sha dang chang gtsang la sogs pa/ dri ngar la yi stegs pa dang // 'khrig pa 'dod dang bsted pa/ 
27b4(rgyud): dang // sems can 'tshe la dga' mi bya/ brtson zhing las mkhas spyod par ldan// sgron zhing dul la dga' dang ga/ tsang / bya ba byed cing bla ma khur// dge legs rgyad ni 'chang bar byed/ 
27b5(rgyud): kun rdzob don dam rnam pa gnyis// sgrub pa'i sdom pa blang bar bya// kha ni nang du lha yi ches// sngags dang phyag rgya rig sngags de // gzungs dang lha dang bla ma dang // rdo rje la sogs mtshon cha bzang / 
27b6(rgyud): lha yi gnas dang yang dag ldan// 'jigs min g.yo dang sgyu can mon// mi brtan pa yi blo can min/ mya ngan 'das la dga' ba mid// blo ldan 'jig rter 'dir mi dga'// de bzhin pha rol dga' ba min// 
27b7(rgyud): lus sreg btang sems mi bya zhing // slab pa las ni 'di' mi bya// skrag ldan nga rgyal ldan pa min// 'jig rten bya ba 'dod mi bya// de lnga'i ngo mtshar tshul la ni// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya/ 
27b8(rgyud): smra ba spang zhing brjod chen ldan/ rnyed pa spang zhing legs ring ldan/ dba' zhing rgyan la bla ma gus/ sdug pas 'jigs shing kun tu bsdams/  rjes ji ltar spro bar bya// zlaba'am ying na lo
28a1(rgyud): 'ams nyid zhag gcig la lan gnyi su// de bzhir bla ma blta bar bya/ mams med lnga po byed pa yang / de lta bu yi dul gnas shing / phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad bcings ma
28a2(rgyud): rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// brtul zhugs tshangs par rdzogs 'gyur nas// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'chang ba slob dpon la/ sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur
28a3(rgyud): 'gyur// rig pa kun bdag rgyal po ste/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi de nyid rig/ rnal 'byor cho ga de nyid shes/ de bzhin lnga yi rigs rnams mthong // sdom pa blangs shing rnam par mkhas/ rig pa'i slob
28a4(rgyud): dpon dbang bskur 'gyur// lam rnams chen po byed rgyal po// rig pa lngan zhing de nyid shes// phan pa dang ni gnod pa sha/ sa/ lhag la sogs pa kun dbang byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po lha dang
28a5(rgyud): sogs// rig pa'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa/ 'od ni chos kyi gru la gnas/ sangs rgyas mchod pa lags mchod bye/ nga/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rgyal po// matong 'dzin rtag tu
28a6(rgyud): gsang ba 'dzin// 'khor lo grong khyer chen por gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pa'i// dam chos bcud kyi snying po skyes/ snying po 'dzin cing dkyil 'khor mchod// dgongs pa de nyid tshul
28a7(rgyud): shes 'di/ theg pa chen po'i tshul don shes/ mchod sbyin lhag pa'i mchod dam pa'i// gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor bya/ rdo rje khro bo ting 'dzin gyis/ gang zhig gi ni thog mar ru/ bgegs kun nges
