28a8(rgyud): par 'joms pa yi// gsang sngags drag po brjod par bya/ bkra shis sdig pa 'joms byed pa// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga yang // nga ni rdo rje ma ltar 'bar// drag po'i bzod dka' ye shes 'dzin
28b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchod pa bya ba ni// yo byad yongasu rtag par bya// yang na phyi nas byed pa yis// ci rigs par ni rtag par bya// dpag tshad las lhag mi bya zhing // khru drug las ni chung ba min// sgrub pa
28b2(rgyud): bcu gnyis zhes bya ste// gzhan yang byed pa bcu gnyi so// gal te de ni rgyal por 'gyur// dpag tshad kyi ni khyod tsam bya/ yang na kun nas bzang po ste// ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// yang na sgrub
28b3(rgyud): pa blon po yin// khru stong yod pa mchog yin no// yang na kun nas bzang ba yi// khru drug pa las chung mi bya// yang na ded dpon yin yang rung / ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa las ni chu
28b4(rgyud): mi bya// yang na gang zhig gzhan dag gam/ sgrub pa po/ dag yin yang rung / bcu pa las ni chung mi bya// zur bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// rgya cher yang ni mi bya'o// yang na sgrub byed slob dpon
28b5(rgyud): yin// drug pa bas ni chub mi bya// yang na dpag tshad dang ldan pa'o// yang na lo byad ldan par bya// gal te sgrub byed de/ rgyal po// rin chen phye ma rab tu bya// rin chen bteg so las leg
28b6(rgyud): bya shing // shin tu khyad 'phags yid du 'ong // in+d+ra nI la sngon po che// tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya// pad+ma rA ga ra ga cha// tshon rtsi dmar po yang dag ldan// tshon rtsi ser po mdog bzang po// dri ma med pa'i
28b7(rgyud): 'od zer ldan// tshon rtsi dkar po ldan pa yi// dkar po dag ni shal las bya/ bai DUR+Ya dang btsong mdog ste// tshen rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad// gal te de ni ma 'byor na// rin po che dang bsres pas
28b8(rgyud): bya// tshong dpon yang na dang dponi rung / tshen rtsi dag la rab tu bya/ yang na gzhon ni 'ga' zhig yin/ tshon rtsi gzhan ni dam par sbyar// thal ba yis kyang dus ci bzhin/ 'dir ni slob pa
29a1(rgyud): ngag gi bya/ rin chen phye mar yang dag ldan// yang na yo byad dang ldan pa/ gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po/ sna tshogs bye ba'i tshad du bya// yang na 'bum dang yang dag
29a2(rgyud): ldan/ stong las nyung bar mi bya'o// spos dang mar me mchod bstod dang / dri yi bum pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin bum gang gtor ma dang / bum pa rnams dang mar me dag / tshong dpor yang na ded dpon
29a3(rgyud): rung // bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// gzhan dga' zhig ni 'ongs kyang rung // bca' bdag ni stong phrag bcu/ bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// bza' ba dag ni brgya 'am stong // bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// 
29a4(rgyud): g.yos kyi rnam pa kun dang ni// de bzhin dri rnams thang kun// ro// la mo sgeg dang rtsed mo dang // de bzhin phun sum tshogs pa kun// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de tshe mchod pa byas
29a5(rgyud): nasu/ ci nas sang ni khyed rnams cag/ grub par bya phyir brtul zhu gas brtsam/ rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs// dag cing gtsang ma'i gos gyon cing // rnam par dben pa'i gnas 'dug ste/ 
29a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ me tog spos snod lag thog shing // phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya'o// sang+yas ye shes mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs shing / 
29a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i spyan 'gugs pa yi// rdo phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rdo rje sngags dang phyag rgya yis// sangs rgyas thad spyan drang bya// de nas gnas ni yang dag sgrub/ dben zhing kun tu g.yeng ba med// ri bo
29a8(rgyud): 'am ni dgon pa 'am/ de bzhin phug gi nang dag gam/ shing drung gi ni gnas dgag ma/ chu bo'i 'gram 'am yang na ngogs/ dngos grub gan su 'dug nas ni/ lha rnams myur du gshegs
29b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rdo dang gseg pa rus par ldan/ thal ba lngar ldin mi gtsang bcas/ rngub cing rtsa ba'i khyab la sogs// de 'dra'i sa gni rnam par spang/ shin tu bzang zhing 'ong bzang snga ma/ 
29b2(rgyud): dang ldan zhing gseg pa med// 'dom gang yang ra khru gang tsam/ dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang bar bya// grong dang yul 'khor nyid dag dang // grong khyer dag dang ljongs dang ni// rgyal po'i pho
29b3(rgyud): brang tshong dus dang / dkyil 'khor chen po bya ba min// de 'dra'i sa bzhi sgrubs nas ni/ steng gi tar ni sgrub par bya// 'dob gang yang na khru gang tsam/ skas gdang bzhi dang ldan pa ru/ sbyangs te
29b4(rgyud): de nas gnas kyi ni// dbusu phur pa gzugs par bya// rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya yis// mchod pa'i sa gzhi mdzes par bya/ rig pa 'dzin pa byed pas bcag/ bgegs bcing ba yi phyag rgya
29b5(rgyud): yis// bgeg rnams kun tu bcing bar bya/ me dang gshin rje chu dang ni/ rlung dang dbang po rdo rje phyogs// rdo rje bzod dka'i// phyag rgya dang // rdo sngags kyi sbyang bar bya// mchod
29b6(rgyud): gnas dpag tshad tshad tsam du// bco lnga nas ni yang ngag rnam// gnyis pa 'am ni gsum pa yi// nya la nyes par mi 'gyuraro// ci ste 'byor pa med na ni// zla ba cig tsam rab tu sbyar// bco lnga
29b7(rgyud): las ni yang dag rtsam// bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya// ci ste zla ba phyed tsam du/ bco lnga la ni rdor spyang / ci ste rings na ches brgyad nas// bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya/ tshes dgu dang ni bcu
29b8(rgyud): dang ni/ bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa/ bdun pa lnga pa nyid nas ni// nya la nyes par mi 'gyuro// ci ste nyid zhag de rtsam nas/ de nyid la ni yongs rdzogs bya/ rnal 'byor chen po dag
30a1(rgyud): bya'i phyir// rnal 'byor sa bzhi rab tu sgrub/ rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byug/ rnam pa sna ngogs gos bge zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras/ rdo rje slob dpod rnam par
30a2(rgyud): rgyan// gtsang zhi sa pa'i gos dang ldan// gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu// sems can kun don yang dag ldan// byang chub sems ni yang dag bzung // skal pa brgya phrag stong du yang / cings dngon
30a3(rgyud): par brtson byas kyang / gang zag bzhi po 'jig rten tu/ bsgrub kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// sems ni bskyed par ma gyur dang // dang med 'grub par mi 'gyur nyid/ the rom 'dzin pa nyid dag dang / 
30a4(rgyud): bka' bsgo ba ni mi bya'o// dri yi chu yi legs skus pa'i// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ dri dang ldan pa'i chu dag gi/ phyogs/ rnams kun tu chag chag btag pa yi lci bas lags
30a5(rgyud): sbyang te// dri dang bcas pas lags byugs te// de nas gur gum la sogs pa'i// dri dag gtsang mar sbyar bar bya// rdo dkyor phyag rgya ya/ dkyor yang dag byin gyi brlab// rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis/ 
30a6(rgyud): pad+ma'i mig can dag gi blta// dkyil 'khor bar dang tha ma ru/ sbyin sreg las ni yang dag rtsam// sbyin sreg las ni rnam par sbyor// rig pa'i dngos grub cho ga la/ sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ 
30a7(rgyud): de bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya tshogs// de 'dra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ang min// sngon la bgegs rnams gzhom par bya/ de nas sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam// de 'og gsang ba'i mchod chen gyi/ 
30a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// sbyin sreg rnam par lnga ru bshad// yang na bcu drug dag du 'gyur// rang rang gi ni tshi ga bzhin// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag rtsam// dgongs pa'i gang zhig smra/ 
30b1(rgyud): pa'i phyir// gang zhig mchod pa yang dag rtsam// gal te mi nus skal chen gyis// bza' ba dag ni rab tu bya/ dri dang bcas pa dang sbyar ba'i// yang na dkur gsum bza' bar bya// 'di ltar rgyal po rje
30b2(rgyud): 'jim/ byin gyi rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur// bgeg rnams nges 'joms nga yi ni/ slob dpon gyi ni las bzang po// bgeg rnams zlog par byed pa'i mchog/ bcing ba dam pa bshad par bya// rtag
30b3(rgyud): tu rdo rje khro bo dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag bya zhing // rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje nags pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams tha~Mng drang bar bya// rdo rje lnga
30b4(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thaMd kun tu dgu/ sdig pa med kyis ma 'jig shing // sems can rnam par 'tshe ba'ang med// rang gi rnam rtog las byung bgeg/ ma rig las byung mi dge bzhin/ 
30b5(rgyud): rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad bcing / bar bya// rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad rdo rje rang bzhin bya/ dz+dza gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad
30b6(rgyud): gzir bar bya// rdo rje lug rgyud phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad bkri bar bya// rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgag rnams thams cad kun tu dbab// rdo rje brdab pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams
30b7(rgyud): thams cad brdab par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sbar bar bya/ rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad bcad par bya// rdo rje cong pan phyag rgya yis/ 
30b8(rgyud): bgeg rnams thams cad brdung bar bya/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje 'phrul 'khor phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thang btsir bar bya/ rdza
31a1(rgyud): ga phyag rgya yis/ dgeg rnams thams cad 'atub par bya// rdo rje mdung thung phyug tu yis/ bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ rdo rje sregs byed phyag rgya yis/ 6
31a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad bsreg par bya// rdo rje 'khor byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bskor bar bya// rdo rje srang bu'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad bskyong par bya// rdo rje bzlog byed phyag rgya
31a3(rgyud): yis 'bagegs rnams thams cad rnam par brlag/ rdo rje 'joms byed phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad 'jigapa
31a4(rgyud): byed// rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// rdo rje 'cha' byed phyag rgya yis// bgag rnams/ thams cad 'cha' bar bya// rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgag
31a5(rgyud): rnams thang dral bar bya// rdo rje sbal byed phyag rgya yis/ khe gag rnams thams cad skyel bar bya/ rdo rje spong ba'i phyag d+ha yis/ bgegs rnams thams cad bslang bar bya/ rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag
31a6(rgyud): rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad bsad par bya// rdo rje 'tsho byed phyag rgya yis// bgag rnams thams cad 'tshe bar bya// rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis// dgeg rnams thaMd yang dag sprug/ rdo rje rgyas 'debs
31a7(rgyud): phyag rgya yis// gdug pa thams cad rgyas gad ba bya// rdo rje rlung gi phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad rlung la bskur// rdo rje chu yis phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad tshul g.yang // rdo rje me ni/ 
31a8(rgyud): rab rno bas// bgegs rnams thams cad sreg par bya/ rdo rje rgyal byed phyag rgya yis/ bgeg rnams thams cad brgyal bar bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin sreg bya/ 
31b1(rgyud): rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bzung bar bya// rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sos gdab bya/ rdo rje 'big pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thad
31b2(rgyud): dbug par bya// rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/ bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje bka' bzhin byed pa yis// bkug nas bka' la dgod par bya// rdo rje bsdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis/ 
31b3(rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad bsdigs par bya// rdo rje 'ges byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgas par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis// bgegs kyi rigs kun gzhom par bya// 
31b4(rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin bzod dga' dang / rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis// rdo rje rkang pas snun par bya/ bgegs 'joms pa yi phya d+ha yis// de na steng gi bgegs
31b5(rgyud): gzhom bya/ mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i mchog/ rdo rje chen po'i gsang rgyud las// rdo rje khro bo'i snyoms 'jug bya// brgya dang rtsa bcu lhag pa dang // rdo rje slob dpon bsang ba ni// rgyas pa/ 
31b6(rgyud): ru ni yongasu bstan// bgegs la sogs pa gdug pa kun/ chad pa bcad phyir btus pa yin/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub bya'i phyir/ sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ rnam pa brgyad dang rtsa bcu lhag
31b7(rgyud): rdo slob dpon gsang ba ni// 'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud chen po/ rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i sbyin sreg cho gar bcas// gzhan yang dang por rab bshad bya/ rnal 'byor chen po gsang ba'i ldan
31b8(rgyud): sbyin sreg las ni rgyud mi// las rnams thams cad btus pa yi// gsang ba rlung chen 'di ru ni/ sbyin sreg rnam pa nyi shu yis/ nga bsdus par 'gyur ba yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // mngon spyod tu ni/ 
32a1(rgyud): las dang ri/ tshe spel ba dang dgug pa dang / nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang / srung dang srung ba yid dang bgegs/ sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom dang / bcing dang bsad dang drag gi/ 
32a2(rgyud): dang / chags dang rjesu bcom pa dang // dbang du bya dang gzugs bzang nyid// 'dod dga'i gzugs snang ba dang / mkha' la 'gro dang dngos grub kyi/ rdzas ni grub par bya ba la/ sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor/ 
32a3(rgyud): byed pa yi// rdo slob dpon gyis de bya// de lta bu yi rnam pa yi// sbyin sreg bzang po nyi shur bshad// ji ltar sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin// sngon du thab khung bya ba yin// gru bzhi la ni rgyas pa ste// zlum po la ni zhi ba'o// gang
32a4(rgyud): zhig 'gug par byed pa yi// rdo rnam par yang dag bya// de bzhin pad+ma'i rnam pa bzhin// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste/ sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom phyir// zlum po rta babs ldan pa yin// rin
32a5(rgyud): rnam pa rigs rgyas la// tshe 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang / shin tu dag phyir phyag rgya'i dbyibs// srung la ga cha lta bu yin// bcing la ni 'obs kyis bskor// bsad la mche ba dang ldan pa'i/ ci 'dod
32a6(rgyud): gzugs la gang yang rung // mi snang ba la gzhu dang ldan// phyogs dang mkha' 'phur la lcags kyu/ bka' byed phyag rgya sgrub pa dang / dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa la// 'khor lo 'am ni gru bzhi'o// rdzas
32a7(rgyud): dang sman ni 'grub pa la thab khung bud med yan lag mtshungs// yang na thun mongs dngos grub kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji lta ba// sbyin sreg thab khung de mtshungs
32a8(rgyud): 'gyur// rig 'dzin dngos grub bzang ldan zhing // thams cad phun tshogs de ltar 'gyur// 'khor lo sogs la cung zad mthar// sbyin sreg thab lung bsgo bar bya// thab khung nyi shu/ 
32b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor cho ga thams cad la/ thab khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis/ sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ thab khung bstan pa bshad par bya/ sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing // tshon gyis sa phyog/ 
32b2(rgyud): legs par bri/ gru bzhir thig brgyad zhes bya ba// dbus kyi 'khor lo 'byung bar bya/ gru bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa ste/ legs par bgos shing legs bris pa/ rta 'bab bzhi dang yang dag ldar// 
32b3(rgyud): sgo khyud rnams kyi legs par spras/ sgo bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ sgo ni cha brgyad ldan par bya// dra ba zla ba phyed pad+ma/ rdo rje sgo khyud rdo rjer ldan/ pad+ma'i nags kyi lcags ma dang / phreng ba rab tu 'a
32b4(rgyud): ba dang / spyi blugs phyag rgya chen po dang / shar gyi phyo/ gas kyi cha ru bri/ rtse gsum zla ba phyed pa dang // ral gri khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan// 'od bcas bde ba phyag rgya che// lho yi phyor/ 
32b5(rgyud): su bri bar bya// 'khor lo dung dang dbyug to dang // rta bab sa glang po dang ni phag/ phyag rgya nub du bri bar bya// mdung thung d+ha/ la bu ba ngan dang // rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang // khyim bya 'thab
32b6(rgyud): mo la phyogs pa/ byang gi phyogasu bri bar bya// de yi dam tshig 'khor lo la/ sang+yas phyag rgya yang dag bri/ dbus kyi gnasu cod pan te// phyi rol rdo rjes nye bar spras// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba yi/ 
32b7(rgyud): rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/ lho ru nor bu sna tshogs pa/ rub tu pad+ma rdo rje'o// byang du rdo rje hUM mdzad de// bdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje thabs chen rnams/ 
32b8(rgyud): rol phyag rgya bcu drug tu// thab khung bskos pa gang yin pa// de yi bla ra rnam par sgom// me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis// ji bzhin du ni dkyil 'khor mchod// rang nyid khrus rkus yan lag
33a1(rgyud): byugs// sna tshogs gos dang rgyur ldan pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras/ dri dag bzang pos dbang bskur 'gyur// nga ni pad 'dzin rgyal po ste// ther tshugs dbus rang bzhin
33a2(rgyud): gshegs// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ldan// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ dpung po ram du bsdams byas te// mtshan ma bgreng bar rab gyur nas/ sbrid
33a3(rgyud): sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ e ma'o bde ba bde chen po/ 'dod chags bde ba bla na yang // rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags te/ 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag grub mdzod// 'dod dar bde ba rjes
33a4(rgyud): dran nas// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya// bud med khams ni bkug na su/ 'khrig pa bdun ni spang bar bya// mtshan ma la dras par rab gyur nas/ dbang po nye bar zhi byas te// 'dod chags
33a5(rgyud): rjes dran gyur nas ni// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsa ma/ mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes brjod// langs pa lhag par bya ba yin// rdo can gyi phyag mtshan mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar
33a6(rgyud): bya// rdo rje can dang byang sems kyi// byang chub sems ni brtan pa dang // pha rol phyin pa drug gi mtshan/ brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub ster/ shes rab thabs la dga' ba bstan// rtag tu bsted pa
33a7(rgyud): bya ba yin// mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas/ lhag par yang ni bsten par bya// mngon 'dod rig pa sdug gang yin/ de la rnal 'byor pas 'o bya/ lhag pas phyag rgya ngar gyur nas/ dpung pa dam du
33a8(rgyud): bsdam par bya/ rab tu dga' ba mang po gang // de ni rab dga'i sa ru 'dod// gang la chags par rab brtags pa/ yang dang yang du dran par bya/ rtse dang byams pas yang dag byugs/ khrel yod pa
33b1(rgyud): yi gos kyi dgag/ tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag byugs/ byang dub kyi ni sems kyis rgyan// de 'dra'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi/ tshen rtsi chen po snyan par bya// gzhan yang phyi yi yan lag dag
33b2(rgyud): gang phyir rdo rje can gyis 'dzin// sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga bzhir/ shar du kha lngas sbyin sreg bya/ ji skad gzhung las gsungs pa bzhin// rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya/ zhi la sangs rgyas byang chub mchog/ 
33b3(rgyud): rgyas la rdo rje rin chen gyis// rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/ ljags kyu yis ni 'gugs par bshad/ bcud kyi len la rdo rje'i sman// tshe 'phel de bzhin mi g.yo ba'i// rdo rje sman gyi rgya chen dang // rdo rje rtse mo
33b4(rgyud): nor 'phel la/ srung la 'khor lo cho ga ste/ bzlog pa la ni rdo rje gsung // g.yon pa lcags sgregs phyag rgya ches// sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad// bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste// gseng
33b5(rgyud): la rdo rje gsong byed do// chags la rdo rje rags pa yis/ rje su bstan pa la yang bshad// dbang la rdo rje dbang gis/ ci 'dod gzugs la sna tshogs te// mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub
33b6(rgyud): la// rdo rje'i dngos grub rnam 'phrul gyis// pad+ma'i sman gyi phyag rgya ches/ rdzas grub pa yi bde mchog yin// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i grub pa la// rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis// rig pa kun bdag
33b7(rgyud): rgyal po yi// phyag rgya'i mchog de yongasu gzung // dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la/ pad+ma chen po'i sman mchog gis/ lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing // g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ rdo
33b8(rgyud): rje sna tshogs phyag rgya yis// sbyin sreg las la rgyas gdab bya// g.yon pa hUM ldan bsdigs mdzub ste// g.yas pa mche ba gtsigs pa ste/ mngon spyod kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rus pa'i phye mas byo/ 
34a1(rgyud): rnams bcing // oM su~M b+ha ni suM b+hu hUM/ grah+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bA ra bi dAr dzA hUM phaT/ g.yon pa chos 'chang dang ldan zhing // g.yas pa yis ni sbyin
34a2(rgyud): sreg bya// sangs rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas// til bsregs pas ni sdog pa sreg/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA/ lag pa g.yon pa rin chen 'gyur// g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya// 'bru bdun
34a3(rgyud): yang na rin chen nas// yo byad kun gyis mnyes par bya/ oM ma Ni rat+na kra ma ka ye swA hA/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas ni// mngar bas ma ni rab sbar te// rnal 'byor pas ni 'bras bsregs na/ khyim ni nges
34a4(rgyud): par rgyas par 'gyur// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ya swA hA// shin tu mngar ba 'i bud shing gis/ me ni rab tu sbar byas te// ku sha'i myug gu tri la bcas pas// sbyin sreg byas na srung don mchog/ oM
34a5(rgyud): badz+ra a pra ti ha ta badz+ra swA hA/ yam shing mngar po nyid dang ni/ de bzhin du ba'i myu gu dag/ mar byugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/ bsreg san che 'phel byed pa'i mateg/ oM badz+ra a yu She swAhA/ 
34a6(rgyud): bud shing tsha ba rnams kyi ni// rdo rje khro bdag ting 'dzin gyis// thab khung du ni me sbar te/ tshor ma rnams kyi dgug par bya// oM badz+ra a kaR+Sha ya swA hA// de bzhin sna tshogs thams cad kyis// mkhas pa yis ni maM
34a7(rgyud): sbar te/ rtag tu chu skyes sbyin sreg byas// rdo rje 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin// oM badz+ra ban d+ha ya baM// de bzhin sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// mkhas pas yem shing bsreg bya zhing // 'bras bu kha ba'i sbyin sreg byas/ 
34a8(rgyud): skad cig gis ni gsod par 'gyur// oM badz+ra mA ra Na ye hUM/ de bzhin pa la sha mar po/ sregs na dbang du byed par 'gyur/ oM badz+ra rA ga na ya hrIH/ sha bus pas ni sbyin sreg byas// de bzhin chags/ 
34b1(rgyud): par byed pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra shaM ka ra ya swA hA/ khros pas 'dod pa'i 'bras bsregs na// ci 'dod gzugs ni thob par 'gyur// oM badz+ra kA ma ru pa Ni swA hA/ oM badz+ra kha ra tsi ri ni swAhA/ bud shing ro ni kha
34b2(rgyud): ba yis/ shin tu khros pas me sbar te// khros pas rdo rje me tog bsregs/ rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ hUM badz+ra shaM ka ra ye swA hA/ oM b+hU tA sha ra ya swA hA/ dngos grub kun gyi cho ga bzhin// mkhas
34b3(rgyud): pas nyungs kar sbyin bsreg bya/ yungs kar shin tu bkra shis pas// dngos grub sbyin sreg mchog yin no// oM sarba sid dA ya sU hA/ reg pa 'dzin pa grub bya'i phyir// mkhas pas swasti ka bsreg bya/ 
34b4(rgyud): grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// sbyin sreg rdo rje dkyil la khor du/ oM sid d+ha sid d+ha ye swA hA/ oM da la a d+hi pa ta yai swa hA/ maN+Da la a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ oM b+hu swA hA/ oM b+hu ba swahA
34b5(rgyud): oM swa swA hA/ oM b+hur b+ha ba swA hA/ oM swasta~M swA hA/ oM swasti ra ra swA hA/ oM sid d+hi pra b+hU ta ya swA hA/ oM sarba duHkha u pa sha ma na~M swA hA/ oM badz+ra sid d+ha ya~M swA hA/ oM kaR+Sha kA ra na~M pus+t+ra
34b6(rgyud): shan ti kaM swA hA/ yi ge phaT ni mngon spyod la/ yi ge dza yis 'gugs par 'gyur// yi ge baM ni bcing la sbyar// dbang du bya la yi ge shri/ yi ge hUM ni bsngags la sbyar// bsad pa la yang yi ge hUM/ ha ni
34b7(rgyud): srung ba bzang po la/ yi ge hUM ni bzlog pa la/ shrIs ni sna tshogs gzugs bsgrub bya/ oM ni mi snang bstan pa la/ ho ni chags dang dgug pa la// u ni gsang ba'i dag pa 'dzin// mngon spyod ldan la yi
34b8(rgyud): ge hUM/ hUM ni rdzu 'phrul sgrub byed pa/ lha mo chen po sgrub la aHoM ni kun la nges par sbyar// yam shing ser po rgyas pa la/ zhi ba la ni dkar po'o// dbang du bya ba dmar po ste// nag po mngon
35a1(rgyud): spyod las la'o// ni la mar gyis byug pa ste// rgyas pa la ni 'o ma bcas/ dbang du byA la lan tshwar ldan// tsha ba dang bcas mngon spyod la// dbye ba rgya chen dag gis ni// sbyin sreg las
35a2(rgyud): rnams shes par bya// de nyid sbyin sreg nyi shu 'di// rdo rje 'chang gis gsang ba yin// de kho na nyi shu pa zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi gsang ba'o// // de nas dngos grub thabs chen po/ thams cad
35a3(rgyud): 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor du// sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// dngos grub tshogs kyi sbyor ldan zhing // rdo rje yi ni slob dpon cha/ brtan bcas rigasu yang dag skyes/ theg pa chen por yang dag gnas/ 
35a4(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med mthar thug par// chos kyi shing rta chel zho na/ shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan// sems can kun gyi don la brtson// sangs rgyas kun gyi yengasu bzung // slob
35a5(rgyud): dpod chen po'i rul la gnas// mchog tu sa yi mthar byin pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigasu skyes// rdo rje slob dpon bka' thub che// bgegs rnams thams cad bsal nas ni// dkyil
35a6(rgyud): 'khor gnasu yang dag ldan// sbyin sreg cho ga byas nas kyang // chos sbyin chen po yang dag brtsam// dam chos snying po bcud las byung / sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
35a7(rgyud): par 'phrul/ shes rab thabs kyi tshul thob byed/ rgyal chen shes rab chen po dang // thabs kyi rmad 'byung chos nyid do// bram ze bzhin du rigs mchog skyes// byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen 'dzin/ 
35a8(rgyud): gal te nus na skal chen gyis/ gang che mchod pa rtsom pa nas// ji srid zin par gyur gyi bar/ bza' ba dag ni mi bya'o// dri dang bcas pa'i legs sbyar ba'i/ yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ 
35b1(rgyud): gang phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byin gyi slob pa mdzad par 'gyur// ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/ bza' ba dag ni mi bya ste// gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas// tshim par 'gyur bar the tshom med// 
35b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag ni dag byas shing / dri rnams kun gyi mngon 'dus byas// sngags kyi bsangs pa'i chu yis ni// thams cad kun ras chag chag gang ba/ gang tsha mchod par byang ba na// phyogs rnams/ 
35b3(rgyud): kun nas phyag bya zhing // bshags dang gso ba gad ba nyid dang / mchod pa'i sprin dang rje yi rang // bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i// las rnams rim bzhin byas nas ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po
35b4(rgyud): mnyam dbus su// sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi// skyil krung rnam pa bcu ru bshad// gsang chen de cing mchog 'di ni// pa'i 'kho
35b5(rgyud): thams cad mchod pa'o// dpal dang bkra shis bsdigs mdzub byed// de bzhin g.yas kyi phyed krung zhing // phyi rol brkyang dang bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin rin chen rang bzhin te// de dag bcu ru rang
35b6(rgyud): bzhin bshad// skyil krung brgya dang bcu lhag pa// gsang ba'i rgyud kyi gsang ba yi// rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ sems dpa'i skyil po krung bcas te// sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni// rgyu dang
35b7(rgyud): mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum khyams pa chen po rjes dran nas/ dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rnal 'byor pas ni stoms 'jug bya// de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ de nas yang ni las rgyal po/ 
35b8(rgyud): ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bzang po nas/ bcu phrag gcig lhag rgya ru bshad// las thams cad pa gsum du brjod// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// ting 'dzin sbyor ba med par ni/ dkyil 'khor brtan
36a1(rgyud): par mi 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba bad par ni// dngos grub nyid ni 'byung mi 'gyur// de bas rtag tu 'bad pas ni// ting 'dzin dngos grub dkyil 'khor bya// gal te mchog dugs
36a2(rgyud): ba ni// bla med theg pa'i gsang 'dod de// ting 'dzin gsum ni yang dag bya/ dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// de nas byang sems rnam 'phrul du// so so'i skye bos pa
36a3(rgyud): nuso// de rnams kyi ni ting 'dzin mchog sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya// dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bshad// blo ldan byang sems ting 'dzin gyi// bdag nyid rdzu
36a4(rgyud): 'phrul chen por bsam// dka' thub sna tshogs drag po ni// bdag gis dbyas pa bsam par bya// 'og min zhes bya gnas yin pa/ lha yig ra nas ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas thang 'dus pa yis/ 
36a5(rgyud): dag pa'i 'dus pa rnam par bsam/ dang por sangs rgyas phyag byas na sa// de nas thub rnams la de bzhin/ bka' mnos ji skad bstan/ pa yi// slar yang stsal krung bca' ba bya/ mngon par byang
36a6(rgyud): chub rnam pa lnga/ kun tu dga' byed bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad kyis rgyun pa'i// bdag nyid sangs rgyas sru dang ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang srur ma/ ldan bdag nyid la bsam bya/ 
36a7(rgyud): gnasu 'dug bya zhing // rtse mo mthon por bsam par bya// dang por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje shar du 'dug bya zhing // sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
36a8(rgyud): mang tsun gyi 'i ma 'i dkyil 'khor u par sdu gargyal ba dang ches gas kyil 'khor/  srung seg ma la sigs dang / lha mo dang bcas drag tu 'i/ skyong bas rdo rje can bang bcu
36b1(rgyud): lasu yang dag bya'o// bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' dbyings// sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te// sangs rgyas kur gyi rang bzhin nyid// dbang bskur bar ni yang dag bya// rdo rje chos 'dzin rgyal po
36b2(rgyud): ruka dkyil 'khor bkod la brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing // rdo rje can rnams mchog gzhug bya// bsgrub pa dang ni dbang du bya/ bya ba 'di ni mchog yin no// rang gi rigs ga
36b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// gnas de lhag par bos par bya// 'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin// phyag rgya ji bzhin dbang byas pa'o// las kyi matog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rang nyid khrus byas yar
36b4(rgyud): lag byugs// rgyad dang gos ni snga tshogs ldan// dpung rgyan gdu bu nying dang ri// de bzhin sor gdub dbu rgyad bcas// gser skud mu tig da nga ldan pa'i// lag pa rkang pa de nas ske// lus kun rnam
36b5(rgyud): bar rgyun 'gyur ba/ de bzhin ka shi'i ras lhag pa'i// zhes ngag gi zang po bgos shing gsang // yang ngos gos 'dzid pa ste/ sa sa rgyas phyag rgya rgyal ba ngan bzhin// gal te sa breg
36b6(rgyud): dge slong nga/ ring zhing 'khyil la mdog sngo ba'i// sgra ri sdong po bcang bar bya// yang darang gi go la skyes/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ yang rdo rje la su bya/ rnal 'byor rang bzhin gsang med
36b7(rgyud): par// dngos grub bzang po thob mi 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor dbu su panyam pa ru// tsi rigs par ni 'dug nasu/ shar du kha bltas langs nas ri// khengs pa pad cing ma 'khrul bar// rdo rje snyems par yongs
36b8(rgyud): bskor// mtshar brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lar gcig tu ni brjod par bya// stod pa byas nas rang bdag nyid// dngos grub sbyar ba yang dag bya/ snying rje chen po sbyar ba yis// bang gis drang srong bsku
37a1(rgyud): bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// dod yong dbang phyug dam pa ste// theg pa re btog skyes pa'i mchog byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ sapas/ 
37a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po thabs chen po// rdo rje 'khor lo mchod pa che// dngos grub chen po rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// rdo rje ming ni yang dag gzung // phyogs rnams kun tu yang dag bskor// dkyil
37a3(rgyud): 'khor rdzogs par lnga bya zhing / rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rjes drar bya// slar yang skyil po krung bcas te// nga ni rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing ba laM/ stong las nyung bar mi
37a4(rgyud): bya'o// tha na rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ de nyid phyag rgya yongasu gzung / langs nas tshig ni brjod par bya/ bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste// dkyil 'a khor chen por rab sgrub pa/ rdo rje la sogs kun gshes
37a5(rgyud): shig/ bdag ni rgyal po rdo rje 'jid/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag/ grub mdzod// tshon chen kha sbyar dri ldan pa'i/ srad bu lhag pad+ma/ mas par sprul/ rdo rje srang bu phyag rgya ches/ dkyil
37a6(rgyud): 'khor chen po thig gang ba bya// 'khar la chan pa thag gdab bya// 'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin// ji bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs nas/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dza bzhin bri// rdo rje'i thig ni
37a7(rgyud): yongasu gang ba// de ras de yi rang rig gsang // 'khor lo chen po rab tu grub/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo no// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// glu bzhi pa la sgo ba ni pa/ rta babs bzhis/ 
37a8(rgyud): ni mdzes byas pa'i// thig pazhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ ngar dang phreng bas rnam par rgyam mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo yi ste khyung mtsham su ni/ rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ phyim
37b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thigs gad ba bya// de yi nang gi rim pa ni// 'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya/ rdo rje phreng bas yongasu bskor// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje ka pa'i 'dun gnas pa'i/ dkyil 'khor
37b2(rgyud): lnga yis rnam par rgyad// ji ltar phyi rang rang gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor re rer rnam par dbye// dkyil 'khor gyi ring dbus nyid du/ dkyil 'khor lnga bris gang yin te// ka ba mchog de brgyad kyis spras
37b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yid par bshad// dbus kyi shin tu dbus song ras/ chos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste// rnam par snang mdzad khyab bdag de// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// sangs
37b4(rgyud): kyi ri phyogs kun tu// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbusu ni// dam tshig mchog rnams pa'i po yang // go rims bzhin du yang dag bri/ rdo rje se mas dpa' rgyal po che// mdun rgyab du ni gnas pa
37b5(rgyud): yid// rdo rje ljags kyu g.yas phyogasu/ rab kyi phyog su bdud 'joms pa/ rdo rje legs pa rgyal po che/ chos 'dzin chen po ba nga dang ldan/ chos 'dzin pa'i byang du ste/ mdun du
37b6(rgyud): rdo rje bsnyems tshu lo// de la de yi sring po gsang // shin tu rtogs par byed pa'i mchog sdug bsngal kun las rab grol byed// byang chub sems ni rab skul ba/ hUM dzaHhos/ shar phyogs cha
37b7(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus de ru/ mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya// rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni// the tshom gcod pa sdod 'gro can// tshogs
37b8(rgyud): sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste/ sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms byed/ oM be ga kla ma ho// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ thub pa skyes mchog mi bskyed pa/ glang po phyag rgya la gnas shing / 
38a1(rgyud): na ba'i phyag rgya yong su 'dzin/ de la snying po 'di yin te/ tsA/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ rdo rje mchog rnams dgod pa ni/ rgyan rnams thams cad kyis smras shing / 
38a2(rgyud): 'khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ rdo rje lcags kyu bstan pa che/ rdo rje 'dod chags bdud chen po/ rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rin chen dgod par bya/ rdo rje
38a3(rgyud): chags pa gang bshad pa// rdo rje chos ni dgod par bya// rdo rje legs par gang bshad pa/ rdo rje las ni yongasu bzung / dam tshig rnam pa bzhi po ri// 'khor los bsgyur ba dgod par bya// thams cadas
38a4(rgyud): rgyas cod pan ldan/ 'khor los sgyur bar dang dang bskur ba/ rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/ pad+ma sna tshogs dga' chen po/ bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis// byang chub mchog de yang
38a5(rgyud): ngag bzung // yan lag 'gyur ba lhag ma rnams / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dgod// de nas sangs rgyas ri gas bzhag ste// rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po la// phyag rgya dang ni snying po
38a6(rgyud): bshad/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu gzung // hUM dza hos/ yi ge dza sogs bshad pa la/ yi ge oM ni yang dag dgod// hod+ha chos dbyings yi ge a/ yi ges yi yongasu sgyur/ rdo rje shugs kyis lhor song
38a7(rgyud): nas// rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor lo// bcom ldan mchog ni yongasu 'dzin/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ rdo rje na rten la sogs bri/ rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen sa/ 
38a8(rgyud): yi rgyan bcas pa/ de la de rnams kyi snying po ni// oM a tra ha/ nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nasu// de yi dbus rdo rje chos/ 'od pag med ni dgod par bya'o// de mi snying po/ 
38b1(rgyud): / nid+h+r-iHde mi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ rdo rje dul sogs bri/ pad+ma rdo pa de bzhin d+hu/ sgrub pad+ma phyag rgya bcas/ de la 'di rnams kyi sing por/ hAd+ma mar/ rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni/ byang gi pa la
38b2(rgyud): 'khor dbus ni// bcom ldan 'das ni den yod grub// sangs rgyas nyid ni dgod par bya// nga yi snying po no kaM/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje las la sogs pa bri/ thams cad srung ba gnod
38b3(rgyud): sbyin rje// las dang khu chur shin tu brtan// de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ ka haM hUM baM/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ lha po bzhi ni yang dag bri/ rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/ pad+ma lA mo bzhi ru bshad// 
38b4(rgyud): de la de rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM a hri aM// thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las cha dang po'i dkyil 'khorarangadabus ma rdzog so// dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs nas ni/ 
38b5(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad yongasu bri/ phyag rgya de ni byed/ rlab pa/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu gzung / byang chub mchog tu dbus nas mchog shis pa shar gyi phyag rgya ste// lho yi phyogasu pa // 
38b6(rgyud): smin do// nub tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin/ byung du mi 'dzags sbyin zhes bya/ den yed grub pas yong su gzung / phyag rgya lhag ma phyag mtshan bcas/ de nas rdo rje sems tshogs sri kyil 'ar
38b7(rgyud): oM rgyal pa la lam pa mi rdul ba mi'i chen po sug zhes bya bajugs/ de dwags kyi sa su// gang phyogs pa tshul 'du
38b8(rgyud): rigs na thams dga' ba'i/ dkyil 'kho ldan yang dag gri gapa brgyang ni rje/ dkyil 'khor lnga yis dam pa rgyas pakyil 'khor ban dang ldan pa 'o/  rdzo kho la pa
39a1(rgyud): dzi/  ba rdzus basbyin/ dum pa rnams cad pa byed/ sangs rgyas bdu du rdo tshas 'bar ba'i dbusu byed pa bya/  na pabar dzum pas
39a2(rgyud): ngo bzhin rin chen sna tshogs mtshan/ de cing shar gyi 'khor lachi// shar gyim du song nas ni// de li kyil 'khor bus mo/ rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag bri/ zhal bani pa la phrag brgyad pa// phyag rgya brgya ni
39a3(rgyud): yongasu 'dzin/ mche bdag ni cung zad gtsigs/ khro bcas pa ni/ ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// lcags kyu rdo rje lhag sgrog dang / zhags pa phyag rgya bani ru bshad / mda' dang gdun
39a4(rgyud): gnyi su 'dzin// gnyis ni yi ge hUM gis bsdus// des ni rkang pa sa/ yon pa yis/ dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya// g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/ nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste// g.yon
39a5(rgyud): kyang pa yis legs par gnas// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab 'od ldan/ sku mdog sngon po drag po ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro ba
39a6(rgyud): dgod par bya/ thams cad khro bo'i 'bar bas khyab/ mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/ khro bo sems dpa' khro bo chags pa ste/ khro bo legs pa drag pa ste/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar
39a7(rgyud): bya da rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni/ khro bo'i rgyal po g.yas phyogasu// khro bo'i bdag nyid chen pos bskor/ dbus su khro bo khro gnyen can// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo
39b1(rgyud): dbang bskur ldan// thams cad bri zhing yang dag dgod// khro gnyer can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen khro bo dgod par bya// khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal ma ngan
39b2(rgyud): dang // khri bo bzhad pa shin tu byung // dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni// khro bo'i bdag nyid chen por bskor// rdo rje'i sde ni yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams
39b3(rgyud): thams cad du/ pad+ma'i khro bo dgod par bya// chos dang rnon po de bzhin rgyu// bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul che/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// las kyi rgyal po bdag
39b4(rgyud): nyid che// rdo rje dbab pa yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams ca da du// las kyi khro bo la sogs bri/ las kyi gnod sbyin srin po dang // bsdu ba'i rdzu 'phrul khu dur te// dkyil 'khor
39b5(rgyud): lnga po kun tu bri/ de ni rdo rje'i rigasu bshad/ dkyil 'khor chen po che zhes bya// gsang ba de nyid tshogs kyi bdag/ de nas kun gyi dri nga po ni/ rdo rje rigs kun nyams dga' ba'i// 
39b6(rgyud): rjed de/ ga sa stogs rgyu rgyu zhes smrag 'jig bur nga / mau kyil 'a' rgyal ba/  gas pa'igs sa /  sa na/ 
39b7(rgyud): lha mo pon ni yang drag bri// khro ba'i sems mi rin chen da / pad+ma dang nI las zhes bya/ kun nas mtshams rnams dag tu ni// phyag rgyang ma bcas de dge bzung / dkyil 'khor thams cad
39b8(rgyud): rgyal po las cha gnyis brjon pa// gang phyogs kyi che'i tsal 'khor yang rdzogs// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ ga pa'i phyis sel 'khor bu zhenas
40a1(rgyud): phreng ba de bzhin glu/ gar ma lha mo phyag rgya bcas/ shar gyi rdo rje rigs nyid la/ phyi rol gnasu de bzhin nyid / nyi ma la sbyang bzhi po ni/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba/ yi ge hUM
40a2(rgyud): ni kun tu dgod// de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po// yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do// phyag rgya rang gi yan lag 'gyur/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu gzung // phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor bas/ de dag gsang zhing
40a3(rgyud): mchog gsang bshad// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogaso// lha yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du/ 
40a4(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // de ru phun tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi/ 'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya// de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// rin chen chen
40a5(rgyud): po rta la bcibs// sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku// 'od zer phreng bas kun tu khyab// rin chen phre nga ba mchog 'dzin pa'i// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis
40a6(rgyud): brgyan pa/ so yi phreng ba rab bzhad cing // so yi phreng ba'i phyag rgyar ldan/ mthe bong rtse mo rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ nyi ma'i dbus na sangs rgyas te// zla ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku/ rdo rje nyi ba'i rigs mchog go/ 
40a7(rgyud): yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen sems dpa' yang dag ldan// rin chen sems dpa' pad+ma dang // de bzhin rdo rje las nyid do// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// 'khor los bsgyur ba/ 
40a8(rgyud): rnam par rgyan/ rin chen chen po rigs las 'byung / nor bu'i rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin// de nas snying po ni traM// lho yi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni// de yi dbus su sems dpa'/ 
40b1(rgyud): che// nor bu'i 'od can yang dag bri// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur ldan// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen de bzhin yang dag bri/ rin chen
40b2(rgyud): sems pa de bzhin chags/ rgyal po lags pa rdzu 'phrul che/ rdo rje rin chen sogs phyag rgya// rang gi phyage rgya phyag mtshan phrag/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / lce yi gnas kyi sdang 'dug nas/ 
40b3(rgyud): rin chen rigs ched bzang po la// rdo rje rin chen bzang po bri/ rin chen bzhi yi dbang bskur ldan// sangs rgyas spyi bo 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// rin chen phreng ba'i
40b4(rgyud): dbang bskur ldan// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sems ra dpa' bzhi ni yang dag bri// rin chen rgyal po rgyal mtshan dang // ba zhang dang rin cher rgyal po che// rdo rje shugs kyis song
40b5(rgyud): nas kyang // nub kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor la// pad+ma rin chen bdag nyid che// rin chen phreng bas dbang bskur 'di// rin chen pad+ma'i mdze/ ga 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas dbu rgyan sems dpa'
40b6(rgyud): ches/ rin chen zhi ba yongasu 'dzin/ zur mig 'dod chags chags pa'i spyan// skyes bu 'dul ba la gzigs pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rgyal po re// 'jig rten dbang phyug tshe dpag med// de yi phyogs rnam
40b7(rgyud): thams cad du/ rin ted pad+ma yang dag bri// rin chen pad+ma de bzhin no// de bzhin rgyu dang smra ba 'dzin/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ rin chen las chen rgyal ba
40b8(rgyud): ni// bdag nyid chen pos yang dag bri// bcom ldan thub pa'i dbang po don yod grub/ las kun 'dzin pas sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul pa'o// rdo rje las te rgyal po mdzod 'dzin pa// 'khor los sgyur
41a1(rgyud): / pa'i gtso bo mcho gangs pa// sangs rgyas rabu rgyan las rnams pani dang ldan/ rgyan rnams kun gyis yad lag legs par brgyad/ las kyi rin che dam pas rgyas gang ba ci 'aM
41a2(rgyud): chan dkyil 'khor tshogs chen mchog gyur pa'i// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi rin chen yang dag bri// las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang // de yi bsdu ba'i khu tshur 'dzin// de nas kun gyi sna
41a3(rgyud): po ni/ traM/ rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor pa/ yi ge traM ni brjod par bya/ ci rigs par ni rang nyid kyi/ phyag rgya phyag mtshan yang dag bri/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor
41a4(rgyud): chen po las rkang pa gsum pa rdzogaso// lde phyogs cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogaso// de nyid kyi ni grwa bani ru// lha mo bzhini yang dag bri/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor
41a5(rgyud): mdun gnasu// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ sems ma'i rin chen de bzhin chos/ lA pa 'khor le'i dkyil 'khor du// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ gar ma rnam par sgeg ma yi// nor bu rigs
41a6(rgyud): chen bzang po ni/ rin chen phyag rgyas kun khyab la/ phyag mchog rang gi phyag rgyas mtshon// 'od zer phreng bas khyab 'od ldan// rin chen rdo rje dbang skur ba/ rang rang phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin// rin chen
41a7(rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// rin chen las byung rin chen ldan// rin chen rang bzhin khang par gnas// spos dang rin chen ma tog bcas// rin chen mchog chen la gnas shing // lus la rin chen
41a8(rgyud): gos gyon pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las nor bu'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogaso// rdo rje shugs kyi so
41b1(rgyud): nas kyang // nub kyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po ni// dga' ba chen pos yang dag bri// de yi nub kyi dkyil 'khor la// dkyil 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri/ dbus kyi sde ba'i
41b2(rgyud): 'khor lo lo// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ pad+ma bzang po mdab ma brgyad/ mang ba ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// chos dbyings brtan pa'i rnal 'byor can/ pad+ma'i phreng bas rnam par
41b3(rgyud): mdzes// de yi dbus su rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs can rang bzhin mchog/ sangs rgyas shes rab thabs ldan pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu 'dzin/ pad+ma cig pa de gnas shing // de
41b4(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor la rten pa/ pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi po bri/ 'khor los sgyur ba 'jig pa med/ rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ sangs rgyas pad+ma dbang skur ldan/ rdo
41b5(rgyud): pad+ma la sogs bri/ pad+ma'i sems dpa' 'jig da med// kun kyang sangs rgyas cod par ldan// chos kyi phreng bas dbang sku ra bas// pad+ma'i phyag mtshan mtshon che bsnams/ 
41b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'phrul pas rnam par rol/ pad+ma'i sems dang de bzhin rgyal/ rin chen chos ni tshul chen po// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po ni// rim pa bzhin du yang dag bri/ nub kyi shar
41b7(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // de yi dbusu rgyal po che// sna tshogs 'khor lo dgod par bya// chos kyi snying po rab tu gnas/ pad+ma bang ba ma brgyad la ste/ pad+ma'i ge sar dbus
41b8(rgyud): swa ni/ sna tshogs gshug can dgod par bya// rgyad rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// gshugs bzang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang skur ldan/ spyan gsum phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ ther
42a1(rgyud): tshugs tshangs pa dpral bar dbang / me tog mtshon cha smin mtsham su// mig la nyi ma zla ba dgod// tha kar gnon du rna ba la/ khyab 'jug sna yi rtse po ste// mche ba nag po gsus
42a2(rgyud): po che/ lce la dbyangs can ma yin te// gsung dbyang la ni dbyang chen ma// ku mu da dang bad phreng can/ kha dang 'gram pa dag la gnas/ spyan la shes rab pha rol phyin// gdong gi phyed ni sprul par byed/ 
42a3(rgyud): phrag pa g.yas par seng ge ste// g.yon pa phrag ni yang dag gnas/ sna yi bu gu gnyis pa ni// rgya mtsho nye bar gdung ba dag/ dga' bo nyi dga' dpung pa la/ lto ba la ni rgya mtsho gnas/ brla gnyis
42a4(rgyud): pa la dpung chen gnas// tshogs kyi dbang phyug dbu nga pa la// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni// mtshan ma'i steng gi sgo na gnas// dpal be'u snying ka la gnas te// lhag pa lha mo chen mo
42a5(rgyud): dpal/ 'og gi kha yi s+pho ru ni/ gshin rje'i rgyal po rnam par rten/ rdzong dang 'jig byed lha mo tshe// dbus mo la ni yang ngag gnas/ rkang pa'i sor mo bcu la ni// ma mo bcu ni kun tu gnas// 
42a6(rgyud): drag po rje rang gnas pa nyid// chu yi lha mo rgyab na gnas// dpyid dang sos ka dbyar dang ni// ston dang dgun dang dgun smad la// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yi// rkang pa dag la yang dag gnas// 'og
42a7(rgyud): gi 'khor lo rtsibs stong la// drag po'i phung po 'chang ba dang // sgra gcan thag bzangs ris snang byed/ lha ma yin rnams kun tu gnas/ lag pa bcu yi thal mo la/ pha rol phyin pa bcu dag
42a8(rgyud): gnas// mngon par 'dod pa nyid dag gi/ lha chen la sogs 'di dag bri// zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste// zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa'i// gos dang gzugs ni bzang por ldan// de 'dra'i rang
42b1(rgyud): bzhin thub pa dgod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri/ pad+ma'i sems dpa' lcags kyu dang // mnga' dang pad+ma legs pa sbyin/ nub kyi lha mo'i phyogs ma dzeg
42b2(rgyud): tu// pad+ma'i shugs kyi song nas kyang // de yi dbusu sems dpa' che// rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri// zhal ni bcu gnyis ldan pa nyid// phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i mchog/ rin chen pad+mar yang dag
42b3(rgyud): bzhugs// rin chen las ni 'byung bar 'dod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ pad+ma'i rin chen drag sogs bri/ khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang // de bzhin zhal ni bcu gcig pa/ rab kyi
42b4(rgyud): phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ 'od dpag med ni dgod par bya/ pad+ma chen po rab ster ba/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gas
42b5(rgyud): spyan dang phyag ni stong par ldan// phyag rgya mtshon thams cad bcang // zhal bcu gnyis pa bzang po ste// pad+ma 'i lha mo yang dag ldan// pha rol phyin pa bcu dang ldan/ chags
42b6(rgyud): kyi dbus na rnam par rol// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri// sgrol ma gzhon nu'i mthu can dang // mgrin sngon tshangs pa'i mdog las byung / nub kyi byang gi cha ru
42b7(rgyud): ni// rdo rje shugs kyis seng nas kyang // de yi dbusu sems dpa' che// pad+ma la sogs dgod par bya// zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ chen po sna tshogs rab
42b8(rgyud): ster ba// pad+ma las ni yang dag bri/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun gnas pa/ pad+ma'i srin po gnod sbyin dang // pad+ma'i khu tshur yang dag
43a1(rgyud): gri/ g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab dang ni/ mdun nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de nas snying po ni ha/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po hri ste// thams cad snying po yid no// dkyil 'khor
43a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa bzhi pa rdzogaso// pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs dag gi/ dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs
43a3(rgyud): nas ni// de yi 'khor lo'i gru bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ pad+ma'i sems dpa'i rin chen dang // las dang chos ma yang dag bri/ sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ gar ma 'di ni yang dag bri/ 
43a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las pad+ma'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogaso// bya nga gi las kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi song
43a5(rgyud): nas kyang / de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/ 'khor lo lnga lnga dgod par bya/ de yi dbu su las chen po// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ chos 'dzin pa yi rgyal po che/ namakha'
43a6(rgyud): lding gi gdan la bzhugs// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi phyag rgya yang dag bri/ las kyi sems dpa' rin chen dang // de bzhin las dang chos nyid do// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas
43a7(rgyud): ni/ byung gi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la/ mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas che/ rdo rje las ni dgod par bya// de yi mchod pa mtshon cha bcas// de yi phyag rgya bcas pa bzung // las chen 'dzin pa bzad
43a8(rgyud): po ste/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi sems dpa' yang dag bri/ sems dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po che// legs pa de bzhin las nyin
43b1(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // byang gi lce yi cha ru ni/ rin chen tid 'dzin rgyal po che/ rin chen las ni yang dag bri// rin chen char ni rab 'bebs shing / sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'joms/ 
43b2(rgyud): de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen las ni yang dag bri// sems dpa'i gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang // las dang bzhad pa rnam sbyong ba// las kyi rin chen bzang po la// rin chen dkyil 'gro
43b3(rgyud): yang dag ldan// rdo rje shugs kyi seng nas kyang // byang gi nub kyi cha ru ni/ pad+ma'i las kyi sems dpa' che// dkyil 'khor dbusu yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i las ni
43b4(rgyud): yang dag bri// pad+ma rnon po de bzhin sku// de bzhin smra ba las yino// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang / byang gi byang phyogs dkyil 'khor la/ las chen 'dzin pa dbang ldan pa/ las kyi
43b5(rgyud): rgyal po yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ las kyi sems dpa' dgod par bya// las kyi srin po gno/ nga sbyin dang // de bzhin bdu ba'i khu tshur nyid// de nas
43b6(rgyud): snying po ni a/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni a ste// thams cad kyi snying po yin no// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa
43b7(rgyud): lnga pa rdzog so// / byang gi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogaso// byang du ji ltar rigs byas te// las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni// de yi 'khor lo'i grwa ba ni ru lba
43b8(rgyud): mo bzhi ni dgod par bya/ sngar gyi dam tshig bzhi po ni// nga su su cu gsum yin/ 'ayus mashe su chu gsu/ shar gyi phyogs na sum cu gsum// de bzhin nub kyi phyogs cha'o// byang dang lho yang de bzhin// 
44a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba las las kyi rigs zhes bya ba rdzog so// dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo/ 
44a2(rgyud): thams cad kyang rdzogaso// brgya drug cu rtsa lnga'o// de nas dkyil 'khor lo mchog thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che// 'khor lo chen po'i grwa bzhi ru/ dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya// 'khor
44a3(rgyud): lo sbyor chen shar lho ru// zla ba'i gzugasu dgod par bya/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgod par bya// 'dzum zhing zla ba'i mdog can te// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar/ 
44a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems chu la 'chang ba'i mchog/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje bsnams// de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems
44a5(rgyud): dpa' che// sems can kun gyi don sems pa// de yi pad+ma yang dang ga gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ lha mo bzhi ni yang / dag bri// gsang ba lnga ni yang dag bstan// dang po dang / 
44a6(rgyud): ni gnyis pa ni// g.yas kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa ni// g.yon logs na ni rab tu gnas/ lha me rdo rje ca co sgrogs// dbus mkhyud rang gi lha mo // de yi glon mgo
44a7(rgyud): bsgyur zhing // 'dzum bcas kun tu lta ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la 'jus// chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan sgreng // de yi glon bzhad bcas shing // rdeg byed skye dgu'i bdag mo yi// rdo rje ca co'i// 
44a8(rgyud): sgra sgrogs dang / de bzhin rdo rje don yod dga'/ lha mo rdo rje 'dod dbang phyug gzi brjid dga' ba'i rdo rje ma// lho dang nub kyi mtsham su ni// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dkyil 'khom
44b1(rgyud): dbusu ni// pad+ma chen po dgod par bya/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// pad+ma'i sems dpa' dgod par bya// zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa// de yi pad+mar
44b2(rgyud): yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ pad+ma'i rigs can las byung ba/ lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ kun nas gsang ba'i lha mo yi// de nas ming ni rab bshad bya// rdo rje dpal dang rdo rje
44b3(rgyud): dkar// rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje can// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ rdo rjenyi ma yang dag ldan/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
44b4(rgyud): dbus ni// rin chen sems dpa' dgod par bya// sngon mar gyi ni lto da kyis khyab/ rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// de yi pa/ d+ma yang dag gnas/ de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ 
44b5(rgyud): rin chen rigs chen las byung ba'i// lha mo bzhini yang dag dri/ namakha' las byung mapa' rdo rje/ na mkha'i mdog can skye dgu'i bdag rin che dpal ldan lha mor/ rin chen dang bcas
44b6(rgyud): rigs mdzes ma/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor lo la/ de bzhin ud pal sngon po'i mngag/ dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// ud pal sngon po dang bu su/ 
44b7(rgyud): las rnams 'dzin pa chen po'i mchog sangs rgyas kun la sogs bshad pa/ rdo rje'i las ni dgod par bya// de yi pad+mar yang dag gnas/ de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten cing // las kyi rigs ca
44b8(rgyud): las byung ba'i// lha mo bzhin yang dag bri/ las kyi rdo rje rin chen ma/ las mchos ma dpal ldan che// ji ltar sngon du rdo rje'i rigs/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ de nyid pho nya mo ru gnas
45a1(rgyud): de nyid lha mor yang dag gnas// de nyid sgeg mo rnam sge ga sogs/ phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho gzhan yang byed// ser mo dmar po nyi ma mtshungs// ud pal sngon po'i mngab 'drar 'gyur/ 
45a2(rgyud): bsnyems bcas zhi ba'i dbang bskur ldan/ rang gi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin// de nas snying po ni hUM hrI oM a/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang
45a3(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa drug pa rdzogaso// / mtshams rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang rdzog so// // brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa lngar ldan/ 'khor lo yongasu rdzogs nas kyang // de yi mtshams
45a4(rgyud): kyi logs rnams/ lha bzhi dag ni yang dag bri/ shar du rdo rje chen po ste// rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o// rdo rje rigs chen mtshan ma ste// 'bar ba'i phreng ba rab 'jigs pa'i// lho ru rin chen phun tshogs pa/ 
45a5(rgyud): chu lha rin chen chu srin rnams/ rin chen rigs chen mtshan ma ste/ sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod// nub tu sa lnga bri bar bya/ rtsal ldan skyes bu zhes bya yi/ dkyil 'khor chen
45a6(rgyud): bo 'dzin byed cing // pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'ang yin// byang du rlung gi skyes bu ni// rlung gi shugs kyis gos 'chang zhing // de bzhin las kyi rigs 'dzin ma/ g.yo zhing rtsal ldan bri bar bya/ 
45a7(rgyud): brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ru// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag sgrub/ chos kyi tshul gyi gru chen po// thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor
45a8(rgyud): chen po las 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba zhes bya ba rdzog so// / thun mong mchog tu gsang ba yi// rdo rje rigs pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rang rigs 'khor lo
45b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// phyogs gcig tu ni bshad par bya/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbusu ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad// seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// de ni byang chub mchog 'dzin pa/ 
45b2(rgyud): mi bskyod pa ni glang chen bcibs/ rin chen dbang ni rtal bcibs// bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni/ rma bya'i khri la yang dag bzhugs// don yod grub pa bla na med// mkha' lding dbang po yang dag
45b3(rgyud): bzhugs// 'di rnams kyi ni bzhon par bshad// rigs mchog kun gyi dbye ba'o// mi bskyod pa yis gnon te// de bzhin rin chen dbang mchog sbyin// tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin sbyin// don yod grub
45b4(rgyud): pa'o mi 'jigs sbyin/ sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar/ kha dog ljang ku las 'dzin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yid/ 'ong / sku mdog dkar po rab tu bsgrags/ de bzhin
45b5(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen la/ rdo rje phreng bas rdo rje brang bas rdo rje mtshan/ rdo/  dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ rdo rje'i ri mo yang dag bri/ pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po la/ pad+ma'i phreng bas pad+ma mtshan/ 
45b6(rgyud): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ pad+ma'i srang bus thig gad ba bya/ rin chen rigs can bzang po la/ rin chen phreng bas rin chen mtshan/ rin chen dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ rin chen ri mo rnam pa
45b7(rgyud): mdzes// las kyi rigs la sna tshogs bshad// de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs mchog la// 'on kyang rdo rje khyad par gyis// rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba'i// rdo shar gyi phyogs cha ru/ lho ru rin
45b8(rgyud): chen dkyil 'khor te// nub du pad+ma yang dag bshad/ byang du las ni yang dag sbyor// rdo rje can kun khro gnyer can/ rin chen tshogs ni rab bshad pa/ pad+ma chen po dul zhing 'aM// drag po zhi ba
46a1(rgyud): / 'dzin ga kyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo // 'kha ma chen po yang dag bri/  nas phyi la 'khor lo sags/ tshig 'di kun de dang 'dra/ kyil 'khor thams cad kyirtsal
46a2(rgyud): po gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsang ba zhes bya ba rkang pa bdun pa rdzogaso// / las kyi rnal 'byor las byung ba rdzog so// // nang gi dkyil
46a3(rgyud): 9 rdzogs rnamam/  tu ldas ni dag par bya/ thog da ni mi thams cad / chen ci kun kyis rab tu gang / dang benas ni mas du/ khri'i ma kyi 'khru maN+Da\u0f89\u0fa4
46a4(rgyud): cha mnyam pas// gru bzhi ru ni rab tu brtag zur bzhi pa la sgo ba ni dpa/ rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa/ ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ yid du 'ong shing legs par phye// thig pazhi dang / 
46a5(rgyud): ni yang dag ldan/ dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rdo rje rin che na srang bu yis/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gang ba bya// kha khyer/ gyis ni yongasu bskor// rdo rje kha khyer mdzes byas/ 
46a6(rgyud): la// zla ba phyed pa'i lcug mas khyab// rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs dang ldan// dra bas dra ba phyed pas spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// g.yer ka'i dra ba yang dag ldan/ kha dog sna tshogs rnam par
46a7(rgyud): rgyan// nga dang dbus kyis par theg la/ byang chub sems rnams yang dag bri/ bskal pa babang po stong dag ni/ 'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams/ shar du thams cang rdo rje mtshan/ lho ru na
46a8(rgyud): chen phyag mtshan bsdams/ nub tu bad+ma rje sogs/ byang du las kyi rdo rje bsnams/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag phyi rol thig la yang dag bri/ drag po la sogs lnga rten rnams/ snga ba / 
46b1(rgyud): las ri lus phyed phyung // dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che// khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon nu ni/ rigs bcas dpung dang bcas rgyal po/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/ 'khyil pa'i 'od cas
46b2(rgyud): gtum po dang // ser skya rdo rje ser skya rnams// rigs bcas 'khor lo yang dag ldan// lho yi phyogasu yang dag bri/ myos pa phreng ldan rgyal nyid pa// rnam par rgyal dang skyel byed rnams// rigs bcas
46b3(rgyud): dpung dang yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ru yang dag bri/ ko shi gos can me dang rlung / rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams/ nub kyi cha las 'og tu ni// byang gi cha ru yang dag bri/ de bzhin dpung dang bdag
46b4(rgyud): por bcas/ ma mo 'jig rten rab grags dang // gtso bo 'khor lo rnam rol pa/ lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che/ phyi rol 'khor lo'i rigasu bshad / rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya las/ 
46b5(rgyud): stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa rnams/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa/ bri/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas zur du// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya/ ma tog spos la sogs ldan pa/ mchod
46b6(rgyud): pa'i lha mo yang dag bri// ji ltar nus shing bri ba dang / ji ltar mdzes shing rje su 'thun// ji ltar rang gi rigs bshad pa// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po
46b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyad pa rdzog so// de bzhin gshegs pa
46b8(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa rdzog so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma lus pa dgug pa
47a1(rgyud): 'di 'byung ngo // 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dgug pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la thabs mkhas pa chen po 'jug par byed pa nyid
47a2(rgyud): dang / don thams cad la mngon tu phyogs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub chen po'i tshogs bsags pa// sems can gyi don la mi slu ba dang / theg pa chen po 'ang
47a3(rgyud): las theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed cing 'gyur ba med par 'ching ba nyid dang / thab dang shes rab dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bla dmed pa sdud pa
47a4(rgyud): byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do// de la shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags klu chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin dgod par bya'o// lho ru ni rdo rje
47a5(rgyud): zhags pa zhes bya ba dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po'i
47a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzog so// / de bzhin ga
47a7(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thob bya// dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs nas ni// dam rig mchog chen sems dpa' yis// skor ba dag ni lan gsum bya/ ma lus gsang
47a8(rgyud): ba blta bya zhing // kun tu tshogs nas dga' bar bya/ gsang ba chang na dag bya zhing / lhag pa rnam par sbyang bar bya// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ myur du phyag rgya che sten bya/ mtshan rgya rtsa
47b1(rgyud): dam pa ni// lan cig tu ni brjod par bya// 'khor lo zur ni yang dag gnas// rdo rje lha mo spyan drang bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod rten spyan drang bya// sgo yi
47b2(rgyud): dbus na gang gnas pa/ sgo srung rnams ni spyan drang bya/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// sems dpa' chen po spyan drang bya// de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ lcags kyu la sogs
47b3(rgyud): las byas te/ phyag rgya bzhin yang dag bcing // brgya dang rtsa brgyad dag bya ba/ rdo rje lcags kyu kun tu dgug/ rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya// rdo rje lcags sgrog kun tu bcing // rdo rje dril
47b4(rgyud): bus dbab par bya// sgo'i bya ba'o// de nas dbus su 'a dug byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ces// rdo rje dbye ba'i bya ga rgya yis// sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya// skye srung bar du
47b5(rgyud): dmigs nas ni// sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yin/ rdo rje bsdigs 'dzub phyag rgya yis// gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par bya/ gang tshe mchod ba yang dag tsem/ ji srid dus
47b6(rgyud): kyi rdzogs 'gyur ba/ gra ri thams cad dag tu ni// bdug spos rnams ni btul bar bya// sngon du sgo yi las byas te// de nas mchod pa yang dag bya// dang per me tog shing la sogs/ spos dang pa
47b7(rgyud): me phyag rgyar bcas/ matams kyi dus las sden du ni// bu pa pa rdo rje spur drang bya// rdo rje bum pa'i phyag rgya yis// ci rus par ri sprad drang bya/ bum pa shin tu bzang po gcig/ rin chen sna bdud lnga
47b8(rgyud): byas mdzes/ yang ri chen dang bsres pa'i// rdo rje dri y-i du ldan bya/ rje rje chu'i sngags dang ni/ rdo rje phyag rgya du gtsang ma/ spong dang rtsa brkyang bzlas byas de/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i mu ru 'gyur/ bum
48a1(rgyud): sngags ni oM badz+ra ud ka hUM/ me tog gi sngags ni oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ mar me'i sngags ni oM badz+ra A le ke hUM/ dri'i sngags ni oM badz+ra gad d+he hUM// bdug spos kyi sngags ni
48a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa/ thams cad phyag rgya ldan par bya/ rdo rje phrag rgya gzung byas nas/ rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor// dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams nas ni// khrus
48a3(rgyud): kyi cho ga yang dag bya/ lus la dri yis byugs pa dang // rgyan rnams kun gyi legs par brgyan/ rdo rje'i shugs kyi sngags dang ni// rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya yis// 'byung ba dang ni 'jug
48a4(rgyud): pa yis/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur// smid ma rdo rje ri mo mtshan/ sangs rgyas phyag rgya la sogs tshogs/ sems dpa' thams cad 'gom byas kyang / rdo rje rnam
48a5(rgyud): 'byor nyes mi 'gyur// der ni 'gyod ba med par 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba yis// cho ga chad dam lhag kyang rung // 'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyuraro// gal te 'di ni cho gar ldan/ kun tu
48a6(rgyud): 'jig par mi bya'o// grub pa'i rnal 'byor go ta yis// sangs rgyas sbyid du 'dzin mi mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/ dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas dkyil
48a7(rgyud): 'khor dbusu ni// rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya// rdo rje lcags kyu kun bcings nas// sor mo yis ni dgug par bya// de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu yis// rgyud las dgug pa nyid du gsungs// de bzhin rdo rje
48a8(rgyud): rigs chen la// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bcing // rin chen lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// rin po che ni dgug par bya// pad+ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag la bshad// las kyi
48b1(rgyud): lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// las kyi rigs chen dgug par bya// rdo rje chen po'i lcags kyu bcing // sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor
48b2(rgyud): thams cad spyan drang bya// phyi rol rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // phyi rol rdo rje rigs spyan drang // bkra shis rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis// byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang bya// byang mchog ljags kyu'i skye
48b3(rgyud): ba yis// dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang bya// rin chen lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya// spang po'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bya// rdo rje lcags
48b4(rgyud): klu'i sbyor ba yis// ku la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// bsnyems tshul sngags kyi phyag rgya yis// rngam snang yang dag spyan drang bya/ sangs rgyas lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin kho dar sangs
48b5(rgyud): rgyas rnams// dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis//  mchig sems dpa' spyan drang bya/ dgug pa'i sbyor ba byas da sa ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyang gdon par bya// mtshan brgya rtsa
48b6(rgyud): brgyad rdzogs nas ni// mchod pa'i sprin rnams yang dag sgrub/ bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i// ji skad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// bshags dang bsol gad ba mchod pa dang // bdag
48b7(rgyud): nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams// bdag gi bya ba rdzogs ni sa ni// phyag rgya bcing ba yang dag brtsam// brgya 'am yang na stong dag gim/ brgya phrag brgya ni bsdus pa yis// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni
48b8(rgyud): bcing byas nas/ dkyil 'khor dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te// ji srid spu rengs shar gyur pa'i// de srid phyag rgya yang dag cing // nges par dngos grub ser
49a1(rgyud): par byed nas langs te phyag rgya bcas/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni// gdug pa la sogs kun bsdigs te/ dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya// rang gi khrus
49a2(rgyud): byas lus dris byugs// ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gos ldan// shin tu mdzes pa'i gos gyon zhing / phreng ldan kha ni dri zhim pas// rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// me tog spyi bor bzhag byas te// rol
49a3(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje dga' ba yis// zhugs nas mgon la rab btud cing // de nyid 'dod chags rjes chags dang // de nyid bskul ba'i phyag rgya yis// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// sangs rgyas
49a4(rgyud): kun ni bskul bar bya/ skyon dang bral zhing brtag/ ba ste/ 'dod chags kun la rjes chags pa/ mchod 'os cha na po rgyal po che/ bcom ldan de nyid bdug grub mdzod// de nas
49a5(rgyud): dam tshig mchog gi ni// phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bcings nas/ rdo rje slob dpon zhugs nas ni/ lcags sgrog phyag rgya yang da ga bcing // de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu
49a6(rgyud): bcing / steng du sa gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ sangs rgyu sa bsdu ba'i sngags ni dza dza dza/ shar gyi sgo ru yi ge dza/ de bzhin lho ru yi ge hUM/ nub tu lhag smos
49a7(rgyud): chen po baM/ byang du kun tu dbab pa a/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ las 'di dag ni yang dge bshad// las ni kun tu rdzogs byas nas// de bzhin ngo mtshar mthong 'gyur ba// cho
49a8(rgyud): 'phrul chen po rmad 'byung che/ sna tshogs brgya dang rtsa bcu ste/ cho 'phrul rmang 'byung chen po rnams/ rdo slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur// dngos grub bdag nyid chen po kun/ dkyil 'khor
49b1(rgyud): kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur// rdo rje can dang byang chub sems// de bzhin rigs ni rnam lnga dang // rdo rje dbyings ni bdag nyid che/ bcom ldan mchog kyang gshegs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs
49b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas sras// ngo mtshar slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// ji bzhin cho ga bcas par 'gyur// de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dngos grub dag/ mthong nas dkyil
49b3(rgyud): 'khor bya ba yin// ji ltar bkod pa 'khor lo dang // ji ltar yo byang zad pa dang / ji ltar brtul zhugs spyod pa bzhin// de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
49b4(rgyud): mthu chen dang // sangs rgyas yang dag mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'khor lo chen po byon// 'di ni ngo mtshar mchog yin no// ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin// de bzhin 'khor
49b5(rgyud): lo yongasu gzung / ye shes bzang po khyab pa yi/ rmang 'byung dam pa thob par 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor ma da 'byung thams cad ni// sa ngag brdol nas mthong bar
49b6(rgyud): 'gyur// yang na dkyil 'khor bar snang gi/ nam kha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur// yang na sangs rgyas kun gang ba'i// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur// yang na phyogs
49b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku ni rab mthong 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bzhin du// rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong / yang na gsang ba lnga zhes pa'i// yang nasas
49b8(rgyud): rgyas mkhas pa'i mchog/ yang na dkyil 'khor gnas nga ni// stong phrag gsum ni yongasu bzung / yang na rdo rje sems gcig po// dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bshad do// de yi
50a1(rgyud): mtshan mo nyin mo mthong // nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun khyab pa'i// yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste/ yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dag pa'i zhing ni mthong na su// sangs rgyas
50a2(rgyud): rol pa mthong bar 'gyur// 'dus pa shin tu dag pa yi// dbang bskur ba ni mthong bar 'gyur/ rmad 'byung sna tshogs zhes bya ba// rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar 'di mthong 'gyur// rdo rje sleb dpon
50a3(rgyud): skal chen gyis// dkyil 'khor mchod pa sna tshogs 'gyur// yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni// gang zhig bsgribs par gyur pa yis// de bzhin ngo mtshar nyid mi mthong // rnal 'byor/ 
50a4(rgyud): gzhan ni yang dag rtsom// phyag rgya thad bcings nas ni/ sdig pa dral ba yang dag bya/ rmang byung sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ la lar zhugs pa tsam gyis ni// 'grub pa nyid du
50a5(rgyud): gdon mi za// dang po thun la 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin la lar mtshan phyed na// gsum pa'ang skya reng 'char na 'grub// de bzhin la lar nyi shar na/ de ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i/ 
50a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub mchog 'grub 'gyur// skal ldan thar bar 'dod 'gyur na/ sa ni dang por 'dong pa ste// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas/ gang gi gnas med 'gro ba'o// yang ni rig pa
50a7(rgyud): 'dzin nyid dam// de bzhin rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod par 'grub/ sangs rgyas byang chub yongasu 'dzin/ mtsham med lnga po byed pa dang // de bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas// gang
50a8(rgyud): tshe lan bdun byas nas ni// sgrub pas rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur// 'byung ba bzhi las gzugs can min// na mkha'i gzugasu rtag tu 'gyur// chos kyi dbyingasu 'gyur ba nyid// rje/ 
50b1(rgyud): rje bka' ni gzhan du min// gang gi lan bdun sgrubs nas ni// sdig pa dge pa nyid 'gyur zhing // nyes par byas pa bsod nams tshogs// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dad pa med
50b2(rgyud): par gnas pa dang // gang tshe the tshom za 'gyur ba// de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung // sngon du bsnyen pa nyams 'gyur te// rtag tu rtul zhugs
50b3(rgyud): nyams par 'gyur/ de 'dra la sogs bgeg mang dang // nga rgyal 'di dag rnam par spangs/ sdom pa yongasu ma bzung zhing // rnal 'byor de nyid tshul shes min// rdo rje slob dben mi brtan
50b4(rgyud): 'gyur// 'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyuraro// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyi// gal te rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas shing sngo ma pa blangs pa dang / byang chub sems ni yongasu gzung // gang
50b5(rgyud): tshe 'tsho ba don yod cing // gal te skye ba 'bras pa ces 'dod// 'bad pas thams cad nyid kyis ni// rnal 'a byor chen po yang dag brtsam// byang chub sems dang ldan
50b6(rgyud): gyur nas// rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa yi// de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub 'gyur// yang zhus pa/ rig pa'i rgyud ni rab 'grub phyir// sdom pa ji ltar
50b7(rgyud): blang bar gyi// ji ltar dam tshig srung bar bgyi// dam tshig nyams pa ji lta bu// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni// theg pa gzhan la 'dod mi bya// da nA/ 
50b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor yang dag rtsam// dkyil 'khor gang na gnas kyang rung // slob dpon gyi ni mdun song ste/ zhabs dag la ni btud nas brjod// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob
51a1(rgyud): dpor khyod na dgong su gsol// byang chub sebs pa'i tshul snyan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'cha'o/ dam tshig de nyid stsal tu gsol// sdob pa rnams kyang bag
51a2(rgyud): la stsol// gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol// slob dpon gyis ni nye bar brtag/ rnam pa kun tu dri bar bya// dam tshig brjod bya gang zhig ni// snod du rung ba de gzhug bya// bu dang slob ma ma yin/ 
51a3(rgyud): min// snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya// gal te snod dang ldan par shes/ srog dang bdog pa kun sbyin bya// sngon tu dkyil 'khor rab 'jug cing / cho ga bzhin du bcu nas ni// de nas me tog bcas
51a4(rgyud): thal mo// lus btud dga' ba che rnams kyi// bshags pa dang ni gsol ba gdab/ rje su yi rang kun tu bya// rgyud dbang gsang ba las gsung bzhin// mchod pa dang bcas yongasu bsngo// phyogs
51a5(rgyud): rnams kun tu phyag bya zhing / sdom pa chen po blang bar bya// slob dpon la ni rab tu brjod// gtso bo bdag la sngo pa gsol// thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag
51a6(rgyud): la dgong su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan// thar pa chen po'i grong / 
51a7(rgyud): khyer mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi// gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du/ slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzad/ mi ldog pa yi dbang skur ba/ skal ba chen po bdag la stsol
51a8(rgyud): mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing / dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sang+yas sku ni yid 'ong pa/ slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// dbang skur ba ni rmad byung che// sems can kun
51b1(rgyud): gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi// rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor lo ste/ rta babs bcas pa
51b2(rgyud): yang dag ldan// slob dpon gyur par shes par bya// bdag nyid nye bar zhi ba nyid// byang chub sems ni yongasu bzung // gsang ba yi ni 'khor lo ru// sdom pa dang bcas 'jug par bgyi// de na
51b3(rgyud): slob dpon gyi 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa// gsang ba yongasu 'dzin par ni// bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod ngam// des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par
51b4(rgyud): bya// yang slob dpon gyi 'di skad ces brjod pa ra bya ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ste// dkon mcho/ ga gsum la skyabasu song / 'di na sangs rgyas rigs dag
51b5(rgyud): pa'i// dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / blo chen gyis ni zung bar bgyi/ byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do// slob dpon dag kyang
51b6(rgyud): bzung bar bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rig dag pa'i// sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum
51b7(rgyud): du/ zang zing mi 'jig chos dang byams/ sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyi gzung bar bya/ 'di ni pad+ma'i rig dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa
51b8(rgyud): yin par gsungs/ las kyi rig mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni/ 
52a1(rgyud): phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/ spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ nyin re zhing ni bzla bar byed// gang che nyam
52a2(rgyud): gyur rnal 'byor pa// kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur// khyod kyi srog chags bsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod la log par mi spyad cing / brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// phung khrol kun gyi
52a3(rgyud): rtsa ba ni// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya// sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa// bya ba ma yin thams cad spang // dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing // rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi
52a4(rgyud): las ni rnam gsum dang / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// ci nus par ni rjesu skyongs// theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ sa ni don la rgyab
52a5(rgyud): phyogs min// 'khor ba dag kyang spang mi bya// rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ khyod kyis ba rus par mi bya zhing / phyag rgya gzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma
52a6(rgyud): 'gom par mi bya'o// 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad// khyod kyi rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ rjes 'thun sdom pa rgya cher ni// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// de nyid kyis kyang brjod par bya/ 
52a7(rgyud): 'dir ni slob dpon bdag la gson// gtso bo ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ byang chub sems ni bla
52a8(rgyud): na med/ dam pa bdag gi skyed par bgyi/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / dge pa'i chos ni sdud pa dang / sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ bdag gi
52b1(rgyud): brtan par gzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang ngage 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// deng nas brtsam te gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo dril bu phyag rgya yang
52b2(rgyud): yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ rin chen rigs mchog chen po yis// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu
52b3(rgyud): sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thang ldan par ni/ 
52b4(rgyud): yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyi/ mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ dam pa bdag gi skyed bgyis nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ bdag gi sdom pa ma lus
52b5(rgyud): bzung // ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi// ma brgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// de nas rdo slob dpon gyis/ 
52b6(rgyud): cho ga ji bzhin dbang bskur bya// rdo slob dpon dbang skur pa/ gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// de lta bu yi cho ga yis// rtag pa nyid du spyod pa na// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen du// 'di ni 'gyur ba the
52b7(rgyud): chom med// rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogaso// de nas slob ma gdug pa'i las/ yang dag nyid du bshad par bya// slob ma rdo rje sleb dpon gyis/ ji bzhin gsang ba chen por gzhug/ snod
52b8(rgyud): dang snod min rtag pa nyid/ bdag nyid chen pos mi bya'o// 'di ni mthong ba tsam gyi kyang // sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'dod// gal te de ni snron min na// de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya/ yang na gang
53a1(rgyud): zhig don gnyer 'gyur// de la ji ltar bde ba nyid/ ci ste gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur/ mkhas pas gzhug pa sbyin par bya// gang phyir mthong btsam gyi ni/ thams cad 'grub par gad
53a2(rgyud): mi za/ 'on kyag zhig 'dug par 'gyur// de la las ni bya ba min// gzhug pa tsam zhig sbyin bya'o// rnam pa thams cad nyid mi bya// dga' zhing dang dang ldan 'gyur na/ snod du rung ba brtag par bya/ 
53a3(rgyud): gsum la skyabs 'gro sngon song ba'o// de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ rdo rje slob ma la spyir bya/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/ sbyor bzhin su yin brjod pa
