53a4(rgyud): bya// dkar po dmar po dang ldan pa'i// gos kyi me gra ni bka' gyur dang / rdo rje 'jug byed phyag rgya yis// rdo rje slob ma bzhug par bya/ de nas sgo yi las bya ste// sngon la rdo rje lcags kyu
53a5(rgyud): yis da rdo rje lcags kyu dgug bya zhing / yi ge dzA ni brjod par bya/ badz+ra a~M ku sha dzaH/ rdo rje lcags kyus dgug nas ni// rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya/ lho yi sgor ni sbyor bya zhing / 
53a6(rgyud): yi ge hU~M ni brjod par bya/ hUM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ rdo rje zhags pas bcug nas ni// lcags sgrog ldan pas bcing bar bya/ nub kyi sgo ru bcing nas ni/ yi ge baM ni brjod par bya/ badz+ra s+pho Ta ba~M/ rdo rje lhag
53a7(rgyud): kyus yang dag dgug/ rdo rje zhags pas gzhug bya zhing // rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bya// rdo rje dril bus yang dag dbab/ badz+ra gar+b+he a/ rdo rje gzhug pa'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor
53a8(rgyud): mchod phyir gzhug par bya/ dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis/ rdo rje'i ye shes yang dgang bab/ sa ma ya ste/ dam tshig phrag rgya chen po la// rdo rje sngags ni rab skul bya/ dam tshig bdag cid
53b1(rgyud): nathamam/ sa sa rnas mas ba bad+hAg/ sam sa das tong ga r+b+ha sa/ mas dang tsug la sags tshogs rgyag kyang gan thas / rdo rje'i ldags
53b2(rgyud): skul bya// de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// rdo rje slob ma mna' brdeg bya/ badz+ra u nga // rdo rje ping gis dbang skur bas/ ji ltar 'dod pas dbang skur byA/ badz+ra a b+hi She// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// de nas
53b3(rgyud): ngi la dbab pa sbyin/ badz+ra a be sha a a/ bcu nyi shu/ sum cu/ bzhi bcu lnga bcu drug cu/ bdun cu// brgyad cu/ dgu bcu/ brgya/ rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// thams cad du ni yang dag dbab// de nas gdong
53b4(rgyud): g.yogs dgrol bar bya// rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa/ badz+ra ak+Shi/ rdo rje'i rigs ni skal ldan gyi// dkyil 'khor ltos shig zhes brjod bya// badz+ra pA sha ho// de nas de la bum pa bzang // rdo rje slob dpon
53b5(rgyud): gyis dbang skur// gang ming bzung ba tsam gyis ni// / sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shany+tsa/ snod ni yang dag brtag bya zhing // de yi ye shes yongasu spyad// gal te sdod
53b6(rgyud): du rung shes na// rnam par dbye bar dga' bar bya// ho badz+ra na ma/ lnga/ cho ga bcu/ gzugs nyi shu/ chu sum cu/ rdo rje bzhi bcu/ rin chen lnga bcu/ pheg rdob drug cu/ kha sbyar bdun cu/ bzhad pa brgyad cu/ 
53b7(rgyud): dag pa dgu bcu/ sems pa brgya/ sangs rgyas stong / las nyos stong// gzug sum stong / rnal 'byor ba ni stong / 'dzin pa lngas+ho/ gzung drug stong / kha dag bdun stong / dbyibs brgyang stong / mdzan
53b8(rgyud): ma dgu stong / tshig 'bum/ a 'bum phrag cig ni yong rdzogs nas/ 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// gsang ba yin spyod yul gzhan// de nas las ni rab bshang bya/ slob pa'i chog ring / 
54a1(rgyud): gi dam tshig rdzogaso// / ye shes dag pa bdag nyid che// de nas gsang ba rab bshad bya/ gang gi cho ga thams cad kyis// 'khor lo chen po brtan 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas
54a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid// sa yi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// gsang ba'i dam bcas yi rang bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag pa/ rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes
54a3(rgyud): dag pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin 'gyur nas ni// mtshan nyid dag ni yang dag brtag/ rnal 'byor dpe byad don ldan bya// mtshan nyid rjesu brtag par bya// rdo rje thugs kyi rjes sbyor bas// ye
54a4(rgyud): shes dag pa yang dag gzung // mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchogaye shes bzhugs pa kun tu bshad// de nas ye shes dam pa/ yis// 'jig rten 'das pa rab gzhug bya// mtshan
54a5(rgyud): nyid chen po dang ldan pa'i// rtog pa'i sa la yang dag rten/ rnal 'byor pa yi spyod yul mchog rdo rje chos ni yi 'ong ba'o// thim dang chos sku zhes bya dang // bsdigs dang 'od zer lnga pa
54a6(rgyud): klog dang rgun+da zhes bya bas// sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag 'thog tu yi zla ba bzang po yis/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor spang bar bya/ nyi ma lnga dang yang dag ldan// rigs chos skar ma zhes bya ba/ nyon
54a7(rgyud): mongs gnod pa 'joms byed pa// e ma'o gsang ba chen por bshad// gsang ba zhes bya rdor 'od 'byung // gzhan yang zla ba phyed par 'dod/ pho nya'i dkyil 'khor kha T+wAM ga/ bcing brtse gsum
54a8(rgyud): sbyor las byung / lcags kyu shin tu 'bar ba dang / gtum po rdo rje can gyi tshogs// rtog pa'i gnas ni longs 'gyur ba/ thob byed rdo rje chen por 'dod/ kun gyi gong ma'i 'og ma yis// nyi che ba de
54b1(rgyud): spang bar bya/ mchog tu gsang ba rdzogaso// de nas mchog tu gsang ba rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can/ zab pa/ rdul rgya che ba/ mkhas pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
54b2(rgyud): yul las kyis tshogs stod pa/ dga' ba chen po'i bkod pas kun khyab pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab la sogs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdza
54b3(rgyud): 'byung ba rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po 'di las phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud mchog ces bya ba 'byung ste/ gsang ba mchog tu rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab las rnams ston// rol pa'i 'khor lo
54b4(rgyud): chen po ru// chos kyi mdzod ni 'dzin par bya/ re shig dang por las kyi tshogs bstan par bya ste/ 'di lta ste hUM/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzung ba yi// sbyor thabs yi ge hUM brjod de// 'di yi
54b5(rgyud): kyang ni rgyal po dang // phyag rgya'i rgyal mo brgya ru 'gyur// gnyis pa ni byang chub chen po'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul la 'jug pa yin no// 'di
54b6(rgyud): lnga ste hUM// 'dis ni phyag rgya zhes bya yis/ yi ga hA ni brtan par 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya'i rgyal po rnam pa stong // gsum pa phyag rgya stong phrag ni// brgya yis tshog su 'grur
54b7(rgyud): ba yin/ sangs rgyas 'khor lor 'jug pa yi/ yi ge hUM gis brtan par 'gyur/ hUM/ rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i dbye ba ni// brgya phrag khri ru 'dir 'gyuraro// rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ phyag rgya'i
54b8(rgyud): rgyal mo kun hUM bcas// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ji snyed yod// mngag gzhug pa ni bye bar 'gyur// rtse gsum la sogs mtshon ra ni// rtag tu phyag rgya'i rgyal po yin/ hUM/ de nas sngags kyi tshogs
55a1(rgyud): 'byung ste/ k+ki bcu/  ny+tsi shu phaT sum cur bani bcu pacwa lnga bcu rin drug cu kha bdud du/ wAT brgya su taH dgu bcu/ \u0f7f baN+Da/ ka Na ni lan stong yin/ Sha dang / 
55a2(rgyud): wa zhes bya ba dang / Ta ni rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur// yi ge Da r-i lan gsum sbyar// yi ge a yang rnam pa bzhi// yi ge ba ni rnam pa lnga/ yi ge a ni lan drug sbyar// ka ni lan bdud yang dag sbyar/ yi ge d+ha ni
55a3(rgyud): lan brgyad sbyar// yi ge sha ni phyed du 'gyur// khiT ni stong phrag brgya ru 'gyur/ stong phrag brgya las rnal 'byor gyis/ phyag rgya'i rgyud ni btu bar bya// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa gsang ba'i
55a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen bo'i mdog de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu gsang ba rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo
55a5(rgyud): las/ byang chub pa'i tshul rgya chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzog so// / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzog so// 
55a6(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya chen po 'di las dkyil 'khor chen po'i dang por phyag rgya dang nye ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes 'byung ste/ gang che rdo rje slob dpon dang // rdo rje slob par
55a7(rgyud): gyur pa na/ phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bcing // gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas/ gang tshe rdo rje sems dpa' 'ching // rdo rje khu tshur dam du 'ching / gang te rdo rje rgyal po 'ching // rdo rje gnod sbyin rab
55a8(rgyud): tu 'ching // gang che rdo rje chags pa 'ching / rdo rje srin po rab tu 'ching // gang tshe rdo rje legs pa 'ching // rdo rje las ni rab tu 'ching / gang che rdo rje rin chen 'ching // rdo rje smra ba rab tu 'tshong / ga
55b1(rgyud): rdo rje gzi brjid 'ching // rdo rje rgyu ni rab tu 'ching / gang che rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching // rdo rje rnon po rab tu 'ching / gang che rdo rje bzhad pa 'ching // rdo rje chos ni rab tu bcing // de lta bu yi sbyor ba
55b2(rgyud): yis pa phyag rgya'i lan ni yang dag sbyar// phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya brtan par 'gyur// mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags// rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nasu// rdo rje'i
55b3(rgyud): mangs ni dgang bar bya// rdo rje'i mangs ni 'phangs nasu// rdo rje khu dur gyis bsgrub bya/ phyag rgya ji bzhin bkrol nas ni// de ni bcing bar rab tu bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni// rdo rje dkyil
55b4(rgyud): 'khor mchod par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pas gar bya zhing / g.yas pas khu tshur bcings nas ni// dpral bar yongasu ba skor na su/ kha yi mdun du dgod par bya// rdo rje nyi ma bzhad pas
55b5(rgyud): brgang / mnyam zhing cung zad gdangs te gnas/ rab gri dri ma meng snang bas// rdo rje glu ni glang bar bya/ rdo rje khro ba'i 2 rngub mo no// yang dag spring pa lags par smra ba/ de nas spyig cun
55b6(rgyud): kha dag tu// las byas dkyil 'khor mchod pa na// rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis// legs par sgrub pas gnas bsgrub bya/ dang por bdag nyid rdo rje sems// de bzhin lha nyid brtag par bya// brtul
55b7(rgyud): zhugs sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rigs kyi lha nyid bsgrub par bya// 'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod// ji ltar rigs de bzhin 'khor lo// ji ltar dgod pa de bzhin 'gyur// ji skad gsungs pa dgongs pa
55b8(rgyud): bzhin/ mdor bsdun ni rnam pa lnga/ rdo rje rin chen de bzhin tos/ pad+ma sna tshogs shin tu bstan// de bzhin sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gsang / 'khor lo rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ gsang ba rnam pa duru
56a1(rgyud): 'gyur// gsang ba rnam pa lnga ru brjod/ rgyas pa'i sgo nas rnam pa mang // sangs rgyas rje rin chen dang / chos dang las ni grags che na// cho ga rnam pa du ru brjod// mdor na rnam pa
56a2(rgyud): gsum du 'dong / zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // mngon spyod kyi ni rtog pa la/ rdo rje sbyor ba las byung du/ rdo rje'i sbyor ba bla med pa/ tshang med bgrang du med pa yis// ji ltar gdul bya rnams kyi khams/ 
56a3(rgyud): de bzhin rdo spyor 'byung rnams// rtsa ba'i rgyud du ji ltar brjod// gsang ba lnga ldan gang yin pa'i// de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya// dbang bskur phrag rgya chen po dang // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor 'byung
56a4(rgyud): ji ltar gsang ba'i rigs la byung // gang zhig sngon du chos nyid snang / yid la byed pa dang ldan pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi thabs chen po/ de bzhin gsang ba rab tu brtag/ 'di yi rtag tu
56a5(rgyud): nyid rig rje'i ye shes ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar bsgoms pas rdo rje/ can// mngon par sbyor ba de nyid rig/ de tshe ye shes rang bzhin sa mas// de nyid ye shes brtan par 'gyur/ mchog
56a6(rgyud): tu gsang ba ci 'drar brjod// phyag rgya rnam pa lnga ldan pa/ de ni mchog tu gsang ba bsgrags// phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bsdu/ nye bar band pa'i mchod pa'o// de nyid kyang ni ji lta bu/ rig pa'i sgom pa bstan
56a7(rgyud): pa dang / ting 'dzin sgo dang yang dag ldan/ rig pa'i lha mo'i 'khor gyi mchog / de nyid du na rtag tu 'gyur/ rdo rje phra ma ji ltar brjod/ shes rab can gyis bdag bsam bya/ nga ni su zhig bdag ming mi
56a8(rgyud): 'byung ba bani yang rang bzhin lus 'byung ba rnams las ji ltar 'byung / de nas lus 'di thams cad ni// rnal 'byer spyi bo nas brtsams te/ rkang pa yin mthil bdadu/ mi gtsang rdzas mi
56b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur// zla ba'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// yang na bdag nyid bsam par bya// yang na snying ka'i dbus ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ yang na zla gnyis yang dag ldan/ dbu su rdo rje rnam par
56b2(rgyud): skom/ yang na rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/ lus kun brtan par spo bar bya/ yang na rdo rje bdag nyid su// rdo rje'i dngos po rnam spangs pa'i// yong rnam pa' mtshungs chos shes pa'i/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byom
56b3(rgyud): yang dag bzung // lce ni rkan la sbyar byas te/ sna yi rtse mor blta bya zhing // rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas// sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg la// rtag tu mtshan ma'ang
56b4(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan ma de ni spro byas te/ phyogs kun du ni yo ngasu spro// s+pha ra Na badz+ra/ tsi ste sems ni spro bar 'dod// phyogs rnams kun tu yongasu spro/ sna yi rtse mor phyin bar du// semra
56b5(rgyud): ni sgor yang bsdu bar bya/ sa ha ran bsri nas brtsams te mi/ ma gzhag pas// gang zhigacung zang ci sgrim pa'o// chos dang / nga bag ba ga meng cing / gzung ngeng 'dzin pa sang
56b6(rgyud): pa'o// badz+ra badz+ra teSh+Tha badz+ra/ sems can gang la byams pa ni// rtag tu brtan par dmigs na su// sems ni spro ba'i spyod pa yis/ phyogs rnams kun tu yongasu spro/ ma hA badz+ra mai ti s+pha ra ta/ sdug
56b7(rgyud): bsngal kun la yang dag gnas// sems can 'di rnams rab tu dka'// snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba yis// phyogs rnams kun tu yongasu spro// ma hA ka ru tI s+pha ra Na/ mya ngan 'das la btang spoms
56b8(rgyud): banag sems can nan yang dag brgyab / khyim sems can pong gdul la khyenas rnams kun tu me su s+ho/ ma su pa rme sa / se nga ba na dag la bag sa na
57a1(rgyud): bdag nyid 'gyur// kun nas nyon mongs mi dmigs 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa grol ba'ang med/ sarba bud d+ha pra mong sA ra ta/ mkha' 'am gzhan gyi phyogs dag tu// rdo rje phra
57a2(rgyud): mo'i sbyor ba yis// snying ka'i rdo rje byang chub sems/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgo// rdo phra mo'i sbyor ba yis// go rim ji lta ba bzhin du// phyag na rdo'i gzugs chen po// dam pa'i chos nyid bsgrer
57a3(rgyud): par bya// rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sang+yas gzugasu rnar sgom// rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas rjesu dran par bya// bud d+ha a nu smr-i t+ya bi sha/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbu su ni// rang bdag
57a4(rgyud): nyid ni bsgom par bya// rang gi snying kha'i dkyil 'a khor du// zla sgom rmad 'byung rnal 'byor che// sa man+ta b+ha dra a bi sha/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// rang bdag nyid ni rdo rje'i gzugs/ rnam
57a5(rgyud): pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dang pa'i cho ga bzhin/ badz+ra satwa/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// snying ka zla ba'i dbusu ni// zla ba'i
57a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ badz+ra satwa sa mA dI dz+nyA na bi sha/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugasu rang bdag nyid// sgom zhing snying kar zla ba'i dkyil// dbusu sems dpa'
57a7(rgyud): rnam par sgom/ ta thA ga to haM// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam sgom pa/ rnam pa brgya dang rtsa bcu ni// rgyas pa ru ni ci rigs par// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// rdo rje phra mo rdzog so// 'jig rten
57a8(rgyud): pa ni ji ltar 'dod// rdo rje'i gzung ni gter gnas pa/ snying kar yongasu sgom par bya// sa yi gnas kyang sgoms na ni// gter dag rab tu mthong bar 'gyur/ badz+ra ni d+hiHrin chen chen po'i rdo gzug/ 
57b1(rgyud): namakha' la ni yongasu sgom// gang du ltung bar mthong ba ni/ de na gter yong shes par bya/ rat+na ni d+hiHlce la pad+ma'i gzugs dag ni/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// de na yod ces ba
57b2(rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje lce nyid rang nyid smra// d+harme Ni d+hiHlus kun rnal 'byor chen po yis// rdo rje'i gzugasu rnam par sgom// kun tu babs nas gar lhung ba// de na gter yod snyan pa yin/ karma Na
57b3(rgyud): d+hiH/ gter shes pa rdzogaso// rdo rje dbab pa 'byung ba yin// chu ni rdo rje gzugs rang bzhin// skem ning rdo rje'i shugs kyi ni// chu yi steng du 'gro bar bya/ badz+ra dz+wa la/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i
57b4(rgyud): gzugs ni// rdo rje sems sogs 'dod pa rnam sa/ rang bdag nyid ni sgom bya ste// 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid thob par 'gyur// badz+ra ru baM/ chos kun mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ dag
57b5(rgyud): ni da mkha' zhes rang cing // de nyid dag pa sgom bya ste/ de ni mi snang ba nyid 'gyur// badz+ra a kA sha/ rdo rje'i skas la 'dug nas ni// 'dzeg pa ru ni bsgom byas na// ji srid du ni 'jig pa
57b6(rgyud): gnas/ de srid na mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// badz+ra ma haM/ mi snang ba dang / mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu'i steng du 'gro bar bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid shes pa rdzogaso// zla ba'i
57b7(rgyud): gzugs la 'dug na su// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// lag na rdo rje bsgoms na ni/ rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ zla'i gzugs la 'dug nas ni/ rdo rje rin chen bdag rang nyid
57b8(rgyud): rab tu rin chen sgom nas ni/ rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ rat+na d+ha ra/ zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nasu// rdo rje 'dzin pa rang bdag nying // lag pa pad+ma dag tu sgom/ pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin
58a1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ pad+ma d+har/ d+hU ba'i gzugs la 'dug nasu/ rdo rje'i lasu yang dag brtan/ lag tu las ni sgom byas na/ las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// karmAng+ga ra/ rig pa
58a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rdzogaso// / phyag rgya kun gyi ting 'dzin/ nam pa' dbyingasu kun bsams nas// rdo rje bdag nyid ji srid 'dod / de srid skad cig gis 'bar
58a3(rgyud): 'gyur// badz+ra/ dngos grub kyi ni ting 'dzin ni// na mkha'i dbyingasu kun bsams nas/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing // myur du ye shes rang grub 'gyur/ shung dra shud d+ha/ rin chen rdo rje'i rang
58a4(rgyud): bzhin kun// na mkha'i dbyingasu kun bsams na das// rjesu dran pa stan pa yin// myur du rin chen 'dzin mtshungs 'gyur// badz+ra badz+ra/ thams cad sangs rgyas gzugs rang bzhin// 
58a5(rgyud): namakha'i dbyingasu mos byas nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyi che du 'gyur/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ mchog gi dngos grub rdzog so// rang nyid rdo khu tshur
58a6(rgyud): ni// chags pa'i dga' bas mig dngas pa/ de yis gang la bltas pa ni// des kyang rdo rje can du mthong // oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti maT/ gsal zhing rab tu 'bar ba'i mig/ mig 'bras kun tu 'dren byed
58a7(rgyud): pa 'bar ba'i lta ba zhe su brjod/ 'gro ba thams cad 'gug byed pa/ dpra dr-iSh+Ti oM ku shi dza/ khro gnyer bsnyer bar ba 'joms pa/ khros pas mig ni rab tu g.yo// khro bo'i lta ba la rten nas/ 
58a8(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum yang gzhom par bya// kro d+ha draSh+Ti ti// ri rab ri bo man+da ra/ rtan zhing mi 'dzum pa yi mig byams pa'i lta ba zhes bshad de// gdon dang rims dang dug 'joms pa'i/ 
58b1(rgyud): dr-iSh+Ti ti// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dgug pa dang // dbang du bya ba dang / chad pas bcang ba dang / yongasu skyabs pa'i las rdzogs// bde ba gzhan ni yod cing / 
58b2(rgyud): min/ rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chos/ 'on kyang dgug pa bde ba ste// de ni kun las khyad par 'phags/ dus 'dir skal pa chen po ni// dkyil 'khor chen po byed pa las/ dngos grub med kyang
58b3(rgyud): ba gang // bde ba kun las khyad par 'phags/ lha dang mi yi 'jig rten pa'i// bde ba sdus par 'gyur ba yis// rdo rje slob dpon bde ba gang // bcu drug char yang mi phong // yang na gang zhig dngos
58b4(rgyud): grub thob// sangs rgyas nyid du rab shes bya// rang gis rtog pa gang yin pa// gzhan dang gang gis shes par 'gyur// sar tu nga rgyal ba'i gnas dang ldan// gsang ba'i dngos grub ster mdzad pa/ 
58b5(rgyud): bang ba thob pa gang yin pa// de ni gsang ba 'arjid rje/ bzhin// gsang ba yi ni tshogs chen po// 'di la zhugs pa gang / yin pa// sa thob par ni shes bya ste/ mi ldog rgyal ba'i bdag nyid sras
58b6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i gnas kyis thob kyang // yid ches par ri bi 'gyur te// de yis sa brgyad kyi bar du// theg pa dpad pa spong mi 'gyur// gsang chen rtog pa 'di ru ni/ zhugs pa bdag nyid rgyal ba'i sras// theg
58b7(rgyud): chen la ni gzhol ba rnams/ yid ches par ni 'gyur ba te// gsang ba yi ni phan yon ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni rab tu mkhyen/ 'dir ni phan yon mdor bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas bde ba thob par 'gyur/ 
58b8(rgyud): yon tan gyi dbang du byas pa'i rgyud rdzogaso// byed pa po dang skyed byed mang // las dang 'bras bu gang las bshad/ nga ces ji skad bshad pa la// nga ni byed po skyed byed dang // 
59a1(rgyud): ni skye dgu'i bdag po yod// nga ni sna tshogs bdag po ste/ byed po skyed byed mes po yin// yang gsum pa/ dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po// sems dpa'i snying po zhes bya
59a2(rgyud): bshad/ nga ni de bzhin gshegs snying po// sems can thams cad bdag dang mtshungs/ mya ngan 'das bcas sa 'og sbeng / sa bla 'jig rten 'di sems can/ ma lus srid pa dag gi gnas/ 
59a3(rgyud): sems tsam du ni rab tu 'jug sems can kun gyis mas gang yin// doni byed po 'byin byed brjod// nga ri rgyal po sems dbang phyug ci phyir nga ni byed por bshad/ ji skad gsang ba gzhan lnga
59a4(rgyud): gsungs// nga nyid rang las byung ba ste/ mya ngan 'das bcas sa 'og steng // sa bla srid gsum 'jig rten gsum/ gang zhig gnas zhes bya ba'i sems/ gnas med las byung
59a5(rgyud): gang yin pa/ snying po de bzhin gshegs dag pa/ de nyid rang byung ba nyid// nga ni rdo can yang yin// sdug bsngal tha~Md spangs pa dang / nyes pa thams cad zad pas na// nga ni byang chub sems
59a6(rgyud): rdo rje/ nga nyid rang nyid byung ba'o// nga nyid yang ni khyab 'jug ste// gzung ba la sor kun spangs pa'o// dag pa de bzhin nyid rnam shes// bdag dang nyon mongs med pa ste/ de bas nga ni khyab 'jug bshad
59a7(rgyud): nga ni de bzhin nyi ma ste// ci phyir de nyid zhes bshad pa// zab me'i chos ni ngas rtogs pa// de phyir rang byung nga nyid ni/ nyi ma zhes ni bya bar brjod// nga ni zla ba ru brjod de/ nga ni chos rnams thad kyi/ zhi
59a8(rgyud): ba ru ni rtogs par bshad // de bas zhi ba chen po yis// nga ni zla ba blo gros che// nga ni gshin rje ste/ ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi// ye shes chen po lhag par bshad// de nyid rtogs pa gang yin/ 
59b1(rgyud): pa'ug shin rjeng ste gshin rje 'dzin/ dbang po ste/ dbang po mig 'phrul zhes b+ha ga/ 'khor ba las rgal pha rol phyin/ ye shes nor ni bsgrubs pa yis// nga ni dbang byed dbang po yin// skye dgu yi na pa
59b2(rgyud): bo ste/ chos rnams kun gyi rnam pa ni// skye brtsa nas 'don byed pa/ sdug bsngal chen po yongasu shes/ de phyir nga ni steng dgu'i bdag/ nga bdag nyid ni mas po ste/ nga yis bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs nas/ thar
59b3(rgyud): pa'i grong khyer chen po ru// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bas// nga nyid kho na mes po yin// nga ni 'dod pa'i 'jig rten yin/ ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs// sprul pa'i sku ni rab 'jug byed/ rol
59b4(rgyud): chen 'jig rten zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten lta ba ston byed yin/ srid pa'i 'jigs pa las bsgral yin// nyon mongs chen po rna ma par spang / srid par bshad de/ sring pa'i zhags pa gcod
59b5(rgyud): byed pa// nga ni srid pa'i rgyal po che// khams gsum pa ni// / rgyud ni khams zhes rab tu brjod// byang chub sems zhes bya bar bshad/ nga ni theg pa gsum 'dzin pas/ nga ni khams
59b6(rgyud): gsum pa ru bshad// sa 'og ni/ yang dag de nyid rdo rje che// stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces bshad// ji ltar sa ni 'dzin pas mchog/ de bzhin nga ni chos 'dzin pa/ sa steng ni/ sa sdang na mkha' zhesu
59b7(rgyud): brjod// nga ni rang bzhin gyis mkha' mtshungs// chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/ nga ni sa steng de nyid bshad/ me ni/ nga ni bzod nas ma skyes 'byung ba med// bdag min bdag mdang ni skye dgu
59b8(rgyud): bdag / srid pa'i 'khri shing gis bcings sems can gdungs// nga ni grol byed 'khri shing dag byed pa/ rlung ni/ mtshan ma rnam par bsgoms nas ni// mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas/ byang sems
60a1(rgyud): 'khri zhing zhags pa dag/ 'thor byed de bzhin rlung yin no// da ni dbang phyug chen po ste/ rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po chen po byed// nga ni sangs rgyas dbang phyug gzhan ci smos// bdud rtsi chen
60a2(rgyud): bo thar pa'i grong khyer che// nga ni dbang bsgyur dbang phyug ra// nga ni brtul zhugs zhes bshad de// nga ni nyon mongs 'joms par bshad// nga ni rga dang 'chi ba las/ nges par grol bas tshangs par bshad/ 
60a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyi lusu ni// zhags pa zhe sdang gti mug ni/ khams gsum 'jig rten gsum yin no// da ni srung ma bran du 'gyur// de rnams 'byung bas khams gsum nga / gdong drug ni/ sang+yas
60a4(rgyud): / rdo rje rin chen dang / chos dang las dang gsang 'dzin bcas// rnam pa drug ni 'khor lo che// nga ni gdong drug mchog chen po// gzhan yang graza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa/ nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung / 
60a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur// gang zhig gdon la sogs pa kun/ sem sa las kun tu byung ba'i rlabs// nga ni thugs 'dzin rgyal po ste// / des nang ni srid pa'i gnas// nga ni 'dod pa ste/ thar pa'i rang
60a6(rgyud): bzhin grong khyer che// dgongs pa mthar thug nga yis bshad/ nga ni sems can kun la 'dod// de bas nga ni 'dod par bshad// thar pa nga ste/ nga nyid thar cing sems can kun// so sor yang ni grol bar
60a7(rgyud): byed// des na rang 'byung ba nyid ni/ thar par 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yin// nga ni dmyal ba ste/ nga ni bdag dang chos rnams min// nga ni chags lnga kun tu bral / nga yis 'chi mang lam bstan pas/ nga ni dmyal/ 
60a8(rgyud): pa'i dmyal bad/ nga ni yi dgas te/ mngon par 'dod bang yis 'thog sems can sgom pa smin par byed/  yis pa kha ba'i gnas thab bas/ ngan mi dgas ma dgas skyes/ dung 'greng sa/ 
60b1(rgyud): 'khar ba'i chu bo na la dka' las/ sems can dag ni thams cang gnas/ ji ltar mi shes rmongs gyur pa/ de bzhin yis dgrol bar byed// gzhan yang nga ni chags pa ste/ sems can rtsa
60b2(rgyud): brjes chags phyir/ sring pa gcod phyir na sdang dang // gsang mdzod 'dzin pas sar sna can/ sems can 'dod pas 'dod pa dang // sems can smin byed sems can pa/ gsang ba 'dzin pa'i
60b3(rgyud): rgyal po gang // de ni nga yis 'jigs byed sras// des na gsang ba chen po yin// nga ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas byang chub gsang 'dzin po// de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag/ yang na byin
60b4(rgyud): gyis rlob pa dang // bsnyems bcas sgeg pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ tha ni de yi steng sbyar nas// gang du gsang bar brjod pa'o// dar d+ha ma da ra gsang // nga ni lnga lnga 'dzin pa yin/ rma bya chen mo mdzod ldan
60b5(rgyud): ba'i// nga ni gsang ba'i bdag por bshad// rtsa dang lpags par nu mar ldan/ mdzod sogs gsus pa 'phya bad nga // zla ba'i steng na gar byed pa// de rnams gsang ba'i rgyal po
60b6(rgyud): yin// sa la bsnyems pa'i gar byed pa/ rdo rje gar byed sgra dkar 'joms// dra ba sbubs len gsus pa can// mdzod ldan dang ni gos 'dzin ma/ yi ge ta 'don zla ba dang / mchog dang 'jig
60b7(rgyud): byed bzhin ldan ma// sgra can rdo rje rdzas 'thun sgra/ mche ba 'byin pa mos pas khyab// de bzhin spyod pa yang dag ldan// phreng ldan gti mug 'joms byed ma/ spyan 'dren 'dus byas thams cad ma/ 
60b8(rgyud): yun ring gar gyi tshogs ldan ma// rigs kyi gar ni spyod ma dang // 'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs byed dang // gar gyi gnas byed zhes bya dang // gar byed rdo rje'i gar byed ma dang // phul byung thams
61a1(rgyud): cang mthong byed ma// lnga phung skyabs dang 'dzin byed pa// rkang gdub kyis ni bdud kyi tshogs 'joms byed// 'brug gis bdag po rkang gdub kyis 'dir byed// rkang gdub
61a2(rgyud): kyis ni yang yang bdag chen skyel/ spyod pa'i 'dar 'dar brtan pa skyel byed pa/ lag pa nid pa ji bzhin bskyod pa'o// gar gyi rol pas kun du sdung byed ma// rdo rje gnyis ma sa yi gar/ 
61a3(rgyud): bzhin ni da ki si ri/ zas chen gar ma'i gsang ba ste// de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag hA hA hA thA ta pa kA sa ra mA ra hUM/ rnal 'byor chen po spyan 'drini ma// gus ldan ma dang sprul byed gzhan/ 
61a4(rgyud): 'phrog ma 'joms byed gzhu ma dang // snying po bdud ma sgra sgrogs ma// pheg rdob 'dzin dang drag po dang // gzhan yang rdo rje ldan par bshad// rnga gra'i tshogs ni drug ldan ma// 'od tshogs kyis ni ma
61a5(rgyud): mo 'joms byed ma// seng gi yi ni nga ro sgra sgrogs pa/ rta yi sgra sgrogs sgra gcan ma dang ni// gzhan yang gsang ba lhug pos/ khrus byed ma// sna tshogs ha ha sgra yis 'phrog padag/ 
61a6(rgyud): man spyan bzang yangs ma gsang ba ston byed ma// gzhan yang 'dab pas dga' ba nyid byed ma/ gzhan yang spyan yangs ud bal gyis rgyan ma// sprin 'joms byed bcings sa rnams kun
61a7(rgyud): 'joms ma// seng ge'i bzhin rol gong nas go rims ldan// de 'dra'i 'khor ni dam pa dang ldan pa// gzhan yang gsang ba'i yid las gtam sgrogs pa/ de bzhin rim gyis dge legs
61a8(rgyud): nyid byed ma/ ny+tsa hUM T+Ta hUM d+ha ri d+ha ri/ ma hA shi ri sha ya na shra yi ra kaM ma ta sa ta sa ta sa tra kaM/ de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba rdzogaso// de yi dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni// 'dod pa'i
61b1(rgyud): yon tan lnga mchog gis/ rnal 'byor pa ni rel byed na// des ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gsang ba'i mdo yi dbang bshad pa'i// sems can spyod pa ji lta bu// yang gsungs pa/ 'dod
61b2(rgyud): pa'i yon tan lnga bshad pa// gsang ba yi ni rab sgrub pa// dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// sgrub pa yi ni rol par bya// b+ha ga ci yin brjod par bya// 'joms pa b+ha ga zhesu brjod// 
61b3(rgyud): du nyon mongs 'joms byed pa/ shes rab lus 'joms nyon mongs pa// de bas shes rab b+ha gar brjod// de bas rtags ni ci yin brjod// rtags ni mtshan ma zhes byar bshad/ blo ldan
61b4(rgyud): rab rtags las byung / byang chub sems ni thabs chen po// de ni rtag su rab tu bsgrags// b+ha gar ling ga bcug na su// 'khor lo'i dngos grub sgrub bya// ting 'dzin dang gzungs gang yin/ 
61b5(rgyud): mkhas par sgo gnyis gzung bar bya// de ni bcug pa zhes/ bshad do// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur// de nas dgongs pa/ bshad pa yin/ b+ha ga ru ni rdzas sgrub pa// gas
61b6(rgyud): rgyud dbang po las gsungs bzhin// bsgrub pa dag ni ji ltar bya// b+ha gar gur gum phyung nas ni// mtshan ma yang ni gzhug par bya/ rdzas rnams bzang po thob par 'gyur// rnam pa bzhi yang
61b7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// b+ha ga pad+ma zhes byar brjod// mtshan ma rdo rje zhes bshad do// rdzas ni pad+ma'i steng bzhag nas// rdo rje srub mas bsgrub par bya// shin tu chags pas 'dod chags can/ 
61b8(rgyud): des ni gsang ba rab sgrub 'gyur// 'dod chags chags pa'i sbyor ba yis// dngos grub chen por ji ltar 'gyur// 'dir ni che can rab sgrub 'gyur// bden pa nyid du yang dag bshad/ 'ad
62a1(rgyud): chags bral ba gsang ba med/ des ni gsang ba 'grub mi 'gyur/ dang ba'i ngang pa chen po yis// gsang ba'i sbyor ba las byung chags// sgrub pa la ni 'jug 'gyur ba/ de yis sgrub pa
62a2(rgyud): gdon mi za// chags dang bral ba'i sdig pa ni// gang zhig gsang ba chags bral 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub spong byed pa// sdig chen kha na ma tho che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu spang // chos la kha na mthe
62a3(rgyud): med// de yis gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur// rnam pa thams cad nyon mongs kun// 'joms pa 'dod chags mchog yin no// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs nyon mongs// rtogs dang mtshungs pa'i chos
62a4(rgyud): med do// skye dgu kun bsad bsod nams ji lta bu// ji srid 'khor ba ru bcing bar du// srid pa zad par mi 'gyuraro// 'khor ba'i brtson ra' dri ru ni// sems can kun gyis gzhom par bya// gang zhig
62a5(rgyud): gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa// des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur// no ra ni 'khor ba zhes bshad de// sems can de rnams nyon mongs 'gyur// gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa/ byang chub
62a6(rgyud): sems ni rab 'grub 'gyur// bud med rnams dang lhan cig rtse// ngas ni gsang ba 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang / rig pa'i lha mo bla mad dang / lhan cig rnal 'byor rol pa yis// rol pa
62a7(rgyud): tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// gal te rigs ni 'grub 'dod na// brdzun pa'i tshig kyang smra bar bya/ chos kun dngos po med pa ste/ brjod min tshig spyod yul min// med pa gang yin brdzun tshig ldan/ 
62a8(rgyud): rig pa'i zla ba bden pa yin/ gal te dngos grub mchog ni sgrub 'dod na/ sems can bsad bya de bzhin bza' bar bya// sems can chags pa zhes bshad de/ ming dang gzugs la kun tu cha// 
62b1(rgyud): bkug nas zos par gyur na ni/ bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ 'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba ni/ 'khor ba spong ba gang yin pa/ sems can don la rgyab phyogs 'gyur// blo ldan
62b2(rgyud): theg pa dman dga' ba// de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin// mya ngan 'das la mngon dga' na// sems can don la phyir phyogs 'gyur/ blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba// de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin// ser
62b3(rgyud): sna can ni rigs sgrub 'gyur// tshul khrims rnam par dag 'gyur zhing / srog gi phyir yang gtong mi byed// rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan 'gyur ba// des ni gsang ba rab sgrub 'gyur// drag dang
62b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i sems ldan pa// des ni 'grub par 'gyur bar 'dod// sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i phyir// rtag tu drag po nyid du 'gyur// sdig pa sdang ba rnams spong na// des ni gsang ba rab
62b5(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur// chos min spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog grub yi// na// gzung dang 'dzin pa chos shes pa// gang tshe spong bar gyur/ pa ni// rtag tu chos mchog spyod pa ste// des ni gsang
62b6(rgyud): ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ srid gsum mngon par chags pas rnal la byor sgrub/ srid gsum la ni chags par 'gyur// sems tsam du ni rtogs pa'i phyir// de ni rnal 'byor sgrub pa yin// rtag
62b7(rgyud): tu 'dod pa'i 'dod nan rgyal 'gyur gang // gsang ba chen por brtan par sgrub pa yin/ 'dod par bya ba 'dod pa 'i/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad/ rab tu dga' la chags pa ste// rdo ldan na
62b8(rgyud): gros de la chags/ gci ba khyor ba gang 'thungs nas/ bshang ba cung zad bza' bar bya// thang dag pa'i brtul zhugs kyi/ myur du dngas grub mchog thob 'gyur/ gci brjo zhes bshad ba shing ba
63a1(rgyud): / pad+ma yang dag ldan/ dga' ba'i chos la reg pas ni// de nas thar pa'i grong khyer 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po b+ha ga 'thung / rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub par 'gyur// sang+yas kun gyi
63a2(rgyud): ye shes gang / b+ha ga yi ni sgra ru sgrags// gang zhig bdud rtsi btung ba btung / rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// bung mang sdug dang lhan gcig tu/ dkyil 'khor che ni po rtag par bya// rigs kyi lha
63a3(rgyud): mo rnal 'byor byung // rig pa sdug pa nyid yin te// dkyil 'khor gsang ba brtag byas na// skad cig de la rang 'grub 'gyur// khro zhing gtum la drag po ste// rdo yi ni rigasu 'gyur// gang zhig sdug
63a4(rgyud): bsngal rnams la khro// 'khor ba'i sbyor 'byung las snga nga ba/ rdo rnal 'byor phun tshegs 'gyur// rig ni nyams pa 'gyur ba yin// dge ba thaMd spangs nas ni// chos min pa ni yang dag spyad// bya
63a5(rgyud): min byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ las kyi dkyil 'khor 'a grub par 'gyur// rnam par rtogs pa kun spangs nas// dge ba la ni rab tu 'jug/ chos la lta bar gyur pa nyid// chos min kun
63a6(rgyud): tu spyod mi bya// bya min gang zhig dngos med de/ de nyid brtag par byed par 'gyur/ rnal 'byor chen po nga lta bus// rtog pa chen pos rab 'grub 'gyur// rtog pa thang bsdus pa'i drug pa gas
63a7(rgyud): ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo las rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dgongs pa rnam par 'grel pa zhes bya ba rnam par
63a8(rgyud): bshad pa gsum pa rdzogaso// rtog pa thaMng bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi chos mchog gsang ba'i chos kyi mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzog so// 
63b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' thangs srang la drag 'da'o/ dus gsum gshegs pa sras bcas la/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas/ mchog tu rang byung rig pa'i rgyung / mngar bsdus nas
63b2(rgyud): bshad par bya/ hUM ma dza ka ra/ ng+ga ra ho dA ra sa/ oM a dran ha ha he wa ra/ d+hidI d+ha/ d+hi d+hA ra ti/ ma hi to raka kra ta~M/ ka btse hUM gde la gsang ba mchog tu gsang / ye shes dam pa'i rang bzhin te/ rgyal ba
63b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i mang beng po// theg pa chen po kun tu bsdus/ rigs 'byung blo ldan chen po dang // sangs rgyas thang 'byung ba dang / rdo rje kun dbang chog ni/ shin tu rmang 'byung rab bshad bya// ngo bo nyid kyi
63b4(rgyud): sku ru ni// sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun 'byung // rmang 'byung chos kyi rgyud chen po// thar pa mchog tu ston pa ste// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad// thugs ka nas ni rgyud 'di 'byung // kun tu bzang po'i
63b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag phyag na rdo rje 'ad be che/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste// theg pa chen po byang chub sems/ bden pa dam tshig ces bya ba// thub pa chen po
63b6(rgyud): chos phung po/ stong phrag dag ni grangs med gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog chen gyi// chos kyi mngon par rtogs pa bshad// so sor rtogs pa'i mngon rtogs dang // de bzhin mngon pa
63b7(rgyud): byang chub dang / dpe byad mchog ni mngon du byung // de bzhin ye shes thob pa nyid/ ye shes chen po'i chos 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon rtog pashad/ theg pa chen po mngon rtogs yin/ shin
63b8(rgyud): tu gsang ba'i tshul chen po/ rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul chen po// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa mchog/ theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ mthar thugs sdes chen
64a1(rgyud): go sangs rgyas sa ni blan med/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs ye shes thob par rtogs byed pa/ spyod pa bcu mi byang chub che/ pha rol phyin pa ngam pa 'du/ sa bcu kun tu
64a2(rgyud): rtogs pa ste// theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ byang chub chen po rgya che ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog/ kun mkhyed ye shes rdzogs byang chub/ theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ mngon par byang
64a3(rgyud): chub rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ theg pa chen po chos kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // chos kyi gnas ni yong su 'gyur/ sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog tshe kyi
64a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor shin tu dag/ mkha' mnyam dang ni mtshungs pa yin// gnas ngan len ni kun las grol// rnam par rtog pa kun las grol// nyon mongs dri ma kun dag pa// dang por zla ba bzhin du mthong // thugs
64a5(rgyud): rje'i brtse ba yang dag byung sems can yongasu 'dzin par byed// byang chub sems ni dag pa che// sangs rgyas zhing ni gos pa med/ dge ba'i chos kyis kun tu gang // nyon mongs thad nges
64a6(rgyud): par 'joms// zla chen gang ba'i dbus su ni// byang chub zla ba gnyis pa ste/ bskal pa grangs meng gsum byang chub/ yang dag blangs las byung ba nyid// dam pa'i chos mchog grangs med pa/ sbyin
64a7(rgyud): pa'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan/ sa dang sa ru rtogs byed pa/ ye shes dag pa zag pa med// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// de ni rdo rje shin tu brtan/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin/ snang ba med
64a8(rgyud): cing gnas med pa/ ma skyes ma byas dag pa ste/ skye dang 'jig pa rnam par spangs// mi tshig michod mi phyed pa/ lhag ma med pa'i chos kyi sku/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag byung / rdo rje'i sku ni bla med/ 
64b1(rgyud): sru dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod/ spyong dul kun tu rtogs pa dang / lnga po de dag kun thun mong // sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can/ mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ chos kyi ye shes bla na med/ lnga por
64b2(rgyud): ngag gsang zhes bya/ snying por yang ni de dag gsungs// gang phyir don kun grub pa'i phyir// sngon ni don kun grub par byed/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dang // rdo rje'i las ni bla na med// rdo rje'i dbyings
64b3(rgyud): ni brtan pa'i bdag/ rnam par snang mdzad bla na med/ de dag gsang ba'i mtshan yin te// rnal 'byor gyi ni gnas skabs thob// de nas snying po ni oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+hi ka ro mi/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ti ut+pA da yA bi/ 
64b4(rgyud): oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM badz+ra At+ma kotsaM/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga tasta thA a haM// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// thub pa yini thugs kar bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsung // rdo rje'i rig pa
64b5(rgyud): 'di brjod do// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi saM bo d+hi DiT+Ta badz+ra tiSh+Tha/ sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad kyis// rig pa 'di ni brjod// pas na/ rnam par snang mdzad thub chen po// de nyid
64b6(rgyud): ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// nyid kyi thugs las byung bar gyur/ chos bzhi'i rnal 'byor chen po ni// byin nas lha mo dbang bskur 'gyur// sems can kun
64b7(rgyud): don yang dag ldan// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/ mkha' mtshungs brjod las yang dag byung // rin tan chen pos dbang bskur 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang // shes
64b8(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes che// 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po byin// bya ba kun la don yod pa/ dga' ldan la sogs rnam par 'phrul/ gdul bar bya ba thabs
65a1(rgyud): kyi las/ sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba gang / byang chub sems ni tshul chen po// nyon mongs kun las rnam par grol// sangs
65a2(rgyud): gtso bo chen pos byin// dbang bskur tsam gyis mod la ni// gsang ba'i ming ni yang dag byung // sangs rgyas kun bdag rgyal po ste// kun mchog dbang bskur dam pa'o// de nas snying po nam
65a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta e shwa dz+nyA a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ chos ni mngon sum gyur mdzad pa// stug po'i gnas nas gshegs nas ni// sangs rgyas lhan cig sna tshogs che// rnal
65a4(rgyud): 'byor dang bcas bdag nyid che// rdo'i dbang po'i gnasu gshegs// de nas ngo bo nyid sku las// slar yang byung ba spros par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las chen po/ ci bzhin sngon gyi rjes
65a5(rgyud): 'brangs nas// rdo rje'i dbusu bzhugs par 'gyur/ sngon gyi/ sangs rgyas mdzad pa bzhin// sang+yas kyi ni mdzad pa bstan// gsang ba rol pa'i 'khor lo ru/ sku ni long spyod
65a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thaMd bdag nyid che// sna tshogs rnal 'byor bdag nyid che/ 'khor lo thams cad bzhugs par 'gyur// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thaMd du// ci bzhin
65a7(rgyud): sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/ sangs rol pa yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas ston pa bzhug par 'gyur// dus gsum ye shes rjes 'thun ni// sang+yas kyi ni rnal 'byor brjod/ hUM badz+ra satwa/ 
65a8(rgyud): dzA badz+ra d+harma/ a badz+ra kar+m+ma/ bskal pa grangs med gsum sngon du// bcom ldan byang chub mdzad pa gang / rnal 'byor sems dpa' bzhir bcas pa'i// rdo'i dkyil 'khor snang bar bgyi/ 
65b1(rgyud): / byang chub chen po chos kyi mchog/ byang chub sems ni tshul chen po// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor smang / pha rol phyin pa spyad pa ni/ sngon du bcom ldan spyad pa
65b2(rgyud): gang // rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis// zla ba ya ni dkyil 'khor snang / theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// chos kyi mchog ni rab rtogs pa/ rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang // 
65b3(rgyud): sems can smin cing grol bar byed// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu 'jug/ brtson 'grus dang ldan las chen po// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang // byang chub sems ni gsang chen po// bsod
65b4(rgyud): nams tshogs dang shes rab dang // byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor pa/ rgyal po bzhi ni rab tu 'byung // go cha'i sbyor ba gang yi na dang // spyod pa de bzhin mngon rtogs te// rdzogs
65b5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub che// rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung / byang chub snying po mngon rtog dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dang // chos kyi 'khor los btul ba dang / rgyal po bzhi ni
65b6(rgyud): rnam par byung // chos mchog mngon par rtogs pa dang // ting 'dzin sgo gzungs dang ni// sangs rgyas thams cad thabs chen po// rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung // rgyal chen rdzogs pa'i bya
65b7(rgyud): chub dang // de bzhin chos ni mngon rdzogs dang // chos mchog byang chub chen po dang // rnam pa bzhi ni yongasu byung // mgon po thugs ka nas spros nas/ rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung // phyon
65b8(rgyud): rnams thams cad kun nas ni// sa ni thams cad g.yos byas nas/ phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni// 'od kyis snang bas gsal bar byas// mgon chen sangs rgyas thad kyis/ 
66a1(rgyud): ched du brjod pa ched brjod de// e ma'o gsang ba'i chos chen po/ e ma'o ye shes bla na med// e ma'o rol pa'i 'khor lo'o// e ma'o sangs rmang zung che/ e ma
66a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thabs chen po/ e ma'o ngo mtshar ldan pa nyid/ mi snang rang bzhin chos rnams ni// 'di ni snang ba bcas par dmigs// rgyal po rnal 'byor che de rnams/ phyogs rnams kun
66a3(rgyud): tu gsal byed cing // chos kyi sku yi ting 'dzin brnyes// namakha' dang mtshungs rmad 'byung ba// gang zhig shar gyi phyogs cha ru// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun/ rdo rje sems dpa'
66a4(rgyud): rgyal po che/ chos kyi dbyingasu yang dag spros// chos kyi sku ru spros nas ni// chos kyi dbyings ni lhug por 'gyur// gang phyir shwar du yang dag byung // mi skyod pa ni bdag nyid byas/ lho
66a5(rgyud): ru rdo rin chen te// nub tu rdo rje chos yin no// byang du rdo rje las/ nyid de/ chos kyi sku ru ldan par 'gyur// ma lus mchog tu/ brtan pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs
66a6(rgyud): ba nA ru/ mi bskyod rdo rje rin chen dbang // don yong grub pa bla na med/ rgyal po bzhi ni phyogs bani ru/ rdo rje'i steng du zhugs par 'gyur/ phyogs dang po'i mtshams pa ni ngag tu// mnyam par
66a7(rgyud): dmigs nas zhugs par 'gyur// rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyal po che/ sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag bsdus/ chos dbyings bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid/ gsang ba kun du khyab par bsdus/ dbus
66a8(rgyud): mgon po rnam snang mdzad// sangs rgyas thang dbang bskur ba/ phyogs dang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kun/ rtan par mdzad nas rab tu bzhugs// gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// thub pa
66b1(rgyud): skyes mchog mi bskyo pa// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ shar gyi phyogasu yang dag bzhugs// dbang bskur ba ni rgyal po che// nam mkha' thub pa'i skyes mchog ni// sangs rgyas
66b2(rgyud): thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ lho yi phyogasu bzhugs par gyur// dag pa'i chos 'dzin rgyal po che// chos 'dzin gtso bo chen po ni// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas// nub kyi phyogs
66b3(rgyud): bzhugs par gyur// sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'dzin rgyal po// don yod grub pa bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ byang gi phyogasu bzhugs par gyur// mi skyod rdo rje
66b4(rgyud): sems dpa' ste// mkha' snying rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med// rdo rje las ni don yod / pa// gsang zhing shin tu gsang ba mchog/ chos dbyings
66b5(rgyud): brtan pa gang yin pa// de nyid mgon po rnam snang mdzad// sangase rgyas kun gyi bdag por bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru// sbyin pa bzhi ni rab tu bshad// phyogs mtshams
66b6(rgyud): drug ni brtan mdzad nas// rnam par snang mdzad yang dag ldan/ shar gyi sangs rgyas dbang phyug rgya la// rdo rje sems dpa' 'jig mi mnga'// thub pa mi bskyod snang ba nges// snying po bzhi ni
66b7(rgyud): gsungs par 'gyur/ hUM badz+ra satwa/ dza badz+ra rA dza/ ho badz+ra rAg/ sa badz+ra swA hUM/ dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// 'jigs pa mi mnga' sems
66b8(rgyud): dpa' ba'i/ mgon po yan thugs les byung / phyag na rdzo bzang po mchog rje legs kyu chen po bsdams/  rje chags pa bdud chen po// rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rgyal po ba'i thu
67a1(rgyud): ga thub pa'i thug ka nas byung ga grangs pa ni dang ni ldan pa dag 'khor lo'i rim gyi bzhugs par gyur/ rdo rje rin chen skal ba che// rin chen 'byung ldan rab grags
67a2(rgyud): paka lnga yi bdag po sangs ches/ snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur// oM badz+ra rat+na/ aM badz+ra te dzo taM badz+ra ke tu/ ha badz+ra hA sa/ rdo rje rin chen stobs po che// grangs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rin cha
67a3(rgyud): rgyal po las byung ba// thub pa'i thugs ka nas byung ba/ rdo rje rin chen rin po che// rdo gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tra mthong // rdo rje bzhadang pa rdzu 'phrul te// de dag re re las
67a4(rgyud): kyang ni// rgyal po grangs meng rab tu byung // g.yas dang g.yon ngang rgyab dag dang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bzhugs// dag/ pa'i chos ni ye shes che// de bzhin gshegs pa che
67a5(rgyud): dpag med/ shes rab pha rol byin dag pas// snying po bani ni \u0f7f/ sungs par gyur/ hrIHbadz+ra d+harma/ d+hIHbadz+ra tIk+Sha ma~M badz+ra haM tu/ ri badz+ra b+hA Sha/ chos kyi rgyal po bzhi yang ni// mgon po'i thug
67a6(rgyud): ka nas byung ba// sems can kun la phan don du/ 'khor lo rims bzhin bzhugs par gyur// chos rnams kun la don yod pa// spyod pa yis ni slob dpon mchog don yod grub pa rgyal po ches/ 
67a7(rgyud): snying po bzhi ni gsung par 'gyur/ kaM badz+ra karma/ haM badz+ra rak+Sha/ hUM badz+ra yak+Sha/ baM badz+ra mu ShI k+Sha/ kun kyang 'khor lo yang dag ldan// ye shes dam pa mchog rnams// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor
67a8(rgyud): lo no// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/ sngon gyi byang chub sems gang ni/ rdo sems dpa' rnam par byung / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni// rdo rin chen nyid du 'gyur/ shes rab pha rol/ 
67b1(rgyud): phyin dag pa// de ni rdo rje chos mchog ldan// thabs lamakhas pas 'khor lon// rdo rje la su rnam par 'phrul// de nas chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ chos dang long srong rdzogs pa'i rngan// byung gyur byung / 
67b2(rgyud): dang 'byung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzad pa bla na med// byang chub sems ni mchog tu 'dzin// dag pa'i chos kyi 'dul mdzad pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che// dbu ma'i chos las rnam par
67b3(rgyud): byung // gzhan yang rje su brtse dang de bzhin sbyin/ shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi rgyal po bzhi po de/ rnam par snang mdzad thugs las byung // 'du shes 'du shes med pa min// 
67b4(rgyud): btags pa ma yin gnas pa med// bdag dang chos nyid lta ba min// rnam rtog las ni byung ba min// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni// so sor snang ba yang dag byung // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi/ 
67b5(rgyud): ni na chos kyi longs spyod 'di lta bu// thams cad brjod par nga bral zhing // zhi dang phra ba lta bar dka'/ sangs rgyas rnam sa ni dgongs mdzad cing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul
67b6(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// de nyid theg pa che rang bzhin// mdzod chen po yi rang bzhin mchog/ shes rab chen po thabs chen po// theg pa chen po'i mngon par bsdus// sangang+yas ye shes mngon par
67b7(rgyud): rtogs// sngon du bcom ldan mdzad gang yin// sems dpa' bzhi po de rnams te// theg chen mngon par rtogs par 'dod// byang chub kyi ni sems de las// thub pa mi bskyong rnar byung // sems
67b8(rgyud): de yang ni rnam pa ba ni// rnam pa bzhi ni yang dag byung // byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ rdo rje phyag na rdo rje yin// sgrol dang grol dang dbugs 'byin pa/ lcags kyu 'dzin pa rab tu gnas/ sems
68a1(rgyud): dpa' bstan pa don yod pa/ ye shes de nyid shin tu chags// slar yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ legs pa las ni yang dag byung / gang zhig mgon po thub 'byin pa// sen
68a2(rgyud): rjesu 'dzin mdzad pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya ba// de ni slar yang rnam pa bzhi// chos kyi sbyin pa rin po che// mi 'jigs gzi brjid yang dag gnas// byams pa rgyal mtshan yang dag brjod// 
68a3(rgyud): zang zing bzhad par yang dag ldan// shes rab pha rol phyin rgyal po// tshe dpag med ni rnam pa bani// so sor rig pa mngon par rdzogs// tingange 'dzin sgo pad+ma can// sdug bsngal gcod pa shin tu rno// tshwa/ 
68a4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo tshe dang ldan// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul ga/ na// brjod du med pa'i chos kyi mchog/ don yod grub pa mdzad pa ste/ thabs de yang ni rnam pa bani// sen la sogs
68a5(rgyud): 'dul ba las// rdo rje las ni mchod pa che// theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug pa// rdo rje srung bar rab tu brjod// gdug pa gdul zhing nges byed pa/ phyir mi ldog pa khu tshur yin// de nas 'di rnams
68a6(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i mtshan ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje rgyal po// rdo rje chags pa/ rdo rje legs pa/ rdo rje rin chen/ rdo rje gzi brjid/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan rdo rje bzhad pa/ rdo rje chos/ rdo rje rnon po/ rdo rje rgyu/ rdo rje smra ba/ 
68a7(rgyud): rdo rje las/ rdo rje srung ba/ rdo rje gnod sbyin/ rdo rje khu tshur/ de la dang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'// rdo rje chos/ rdo rje rin chen rdo rje las/ de nas rnam grangs mi bskyod pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan/ 'od dpag tu med
68a8(rgyud): pa/ don yod par grub pa/ de nas 'di rnams gsang ba'i snying po ni hU~M oM AH/ rgyal po'i snying po ni hUM hrI ho/ bcu drug gi snying po ni hUM dza hos/ oM a t+yaMH/ oM d+hi ma re/ ka tsa hUM baM/ shin tu
68b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa rnam pa bcu drug tu yang dag par byung ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o// byang chub spyod pa'i mthu yis ni// sangs rgyas
68b2(rgyud): nyid kyis pha rol phyin// de nas pha rol phyin ldan pa// rdo rje sems mar brjod par bya// bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi// so sor rtog pa mngon par rdzogs// chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni// rdo rje rin chen
68b3(rgyud): ma ru brjod// gsang ba'i chos kyi ye shes ni// de nyid pha rol phyin pa mchog pha rol phyin pa che las byung / rdo rje chos mar brjod par bya/ sbyor ba yang dag shes pa gang // rdo rje las mar brjod
68b4(rgyud): par bya// rgyal po pha rol phyin bzhin ni// rdo rje pha rol phyin pa ma dacho ga/ gang phyir rnam par rol pa mchog/ sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phrin/ rgyan pa'i lus can yid 'phrog pa/ phreng ba tshul
68b5(rgyud): khrims pha rol phyin// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// glu ma ba zod pa'i pha rol phyin/ myur du sangs rgyas ster byed pa/ gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/ 'dod pa'i 'dam
68b6(rgyud): gyis ma gos pa// me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin// kun tu mtshungs par 'gro ba yi/ gdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin// dri ngam dgo las phyir phyogs// thabs ni dri dang yang dag ldan// 
68b7(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed pa/ smon lam snang ba chen mo yin// thob pa'i pha rol phyin zhes pa/ stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog/ mi shes mun pa 'joms byed pa/ lha mo ye shes
68b8(rgyud): pha rol phyin// bdud rnams thams cad pham byed pa// lha mo mi thub pha rol phyin/ byang chub rdzogs pa'i byang chub che// rdo rje'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad ma/ 
69a1(rgyud): bdag med chos kyi rang bzhin mchog rdo rje'i lha mo yang dag byung / rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni/ rdo rje sems ma/ rdo rin chen ma/ 
69a2(rgyud): rdo rje chos ma/ rdo rje las ma/ rdo rje sgeg mo/ rdo rje phreng ba ma/ rdo rje glu ma/ rdo rje gar na// rdo rje me tog ma/ rdo rje gdug pa ma/ rdo rje dri ma/ rdo rje mar me ma/ rdo rje tho ba ma/ rdo rje ye shes ma/ rdo rje mi thub ma
69a3(rgyud): las ma/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu 'jug/ sems can dgug pa'i thabs chen po/ rdo rje lcags kyu zhes byar bshad// byang chub spyod pa la spyod la/ rdo zhag par
69a4(rgyud): rab tu bsgrags// theg pa gzhan la 'dod mang ba// de ni rdo rje lcags sgrogs bshad// chos rnams theng skye ba med // 8 ba tu 'od gsal gzod nas zhi// rdo rje thag pa theg chen po/ 
69a5(rgyud): dril bu zhes byar brjod// de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming dag ni rdo rje lcags kyu/ rdo rje zhags pa/ rdo rje lcags sgrog/ rdo rje dril bu/ de nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyi 'khor
69a6(rgyud): lo de dag thaMd kyi snying po ni hUM traM hri ho// rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi'o// dzaHhUM baM ho/ 'khor lo'i rol pa la gnas pa// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// chos kyi longs spyod rdo rje can// chos
69a7(rgyud): sru bla na med par 'gyur/ dbus kyi sangs rgyas sangs pa ni// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun/ rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'thob mdzad pa/ re ra zhing yang rngon/ grangs
69a8(rgyud): meng pas kyang yongasu bskor// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung // dag pa'i chos kyi tshul chen po// de rnams kyi stong po ni// oM satwa badz+ri/ oM rat+na badz+rI/ oM d+haHbadz+ra/ oM karma badz+ri/ oM
69b1(rgyud): badz+ra lA s+ye/ oM badz+ra mA le/ oM badz+ra gI ti/ oM badz+ra nr-i ti/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ oM badz+ra A le kaM/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha/ oM badz+ra pA sha/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De/ de nas 'di dag
69b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi thun mong gi snying po ni hU~M/ mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che// 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzhi// sems dpa' chen po bcu drug dang // gsang chen lha mo bcu gnyis dang // sgo srung
69b3(rgyud): ba ni bzhi ngag ste/ sum cu rtsa bdun las mi nyung / gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi po ni// phyis kyi pha ral phyin pa mchog/ gsang ba'i lha po kun las ni// rjes thogs ning du yang dag byung // byang chub sems
69b4(rgyud): dpa' bdag nyid ches// sum cu rtsa bdun bgrang mi bya// rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas// chos kyi rigs mchog yang dag byung / byang chub sems las kun tu byung // mi bskyod la
69b5(rgyud): sogs tsho chen po// nga yi rdo rje rig su brjod// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// sbyin pa'i spyod pa kun tu byung // rin chen 'a byung ldan la sogs pa/ nga yi rir chen rig su bshad/ rin chen
69b6(rgyud): rdo rje bdag nyid che// sbyin pa spyod pa kun tu byung / dag pa'i chos la kun tu byung // tshe dpag med pa la sogs pa// nga ni pad+ma'i rig su bshad// rdo rje chos ni bdag nyid che// grub pa'i las las kun tu byung / 
69b7(rgyud): yod grub pa la sogs las/ de ni las kyi rigasu bshad/ namakha'i mdzad ni las chen po/ rdo rje ji bzhin lha mo yang // lha mo je bzhin bstan te 'dra// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin ni// ji ltar zhi ba de bzhi
69b8(rgyud): byung // rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod mtshungs// shar gyi phyogasu yang dag bzhugs// rdo rin chen rin chen mchog/ lho yi phyogasu yang dag bzhugs// rgyal po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon// nub kyi
70a1(rgyud): phyog suM yang dag bzhugs/ bya ba kun la don yod pa/ byung phrogasu ni bzhugs par 'gyur// dbu su mgon po rnam snang mdzad// kun mkhyen ye shes rnal 'byor che/ 
70a2(rgyud): ba gang ba bzhin du zhi// rdo 'khor lo bla na med// gang phyir kun tu sngon 'gro ba/ rdo rje byang chub sems don ldan// de las spyod pa de las chos// de las spyod pa spyad dka' ba/ sede' chen po bla med
70a3(rgyud): pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gcig gis// mgon po la ni gsol ba btab// thub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje sems// mgon po la ni gsol ba
70a4(rgyud): 'debs/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus/ khyod la brten nas de bzhin gshegs// sang+yas sras dang bcas pa/ kun/ khyod la brten nas byung bar gyur// dang po'i
70a5(rgyud): thub ni rnal 'byor che// byad sems shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ sangs rgyas chos kyi snod min pa/ sems can kun gyi don ched du// 'khor lo'i dkyil
70a6(rgyud): 'khor dam pa gsungs// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis// mgon po'i gsung ni gsan na su// 'khor lo'i sbyor ba gsungs par 'gyur/ de nas yang / 
70a7(rgyud): dag bshad par bya/ 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che// sang+yas kun gyi thugs las byung / snying po'i chos mchog rnal 'byor ldan// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i bstan pa yi/ sen 'di dag gdul bya min/ 
70a8(rgyud): de rnams bde ba'i don ched du// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya/ rdo rje slob dpon cho ga'i tshul/ bdag nyid ji bzhin rnal 'byor byas// sangs rgyas byang chub thob 'gyur ba// de la dang / 
70b1(rgyud): por rab bshad bya// de ru sems can thams cad kun// shin tu brtan par rab 'jug na// sangs byang chub rdo rje nyid// thob 'gyur de la the tshom med / theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ 
70b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub shin tu gsang // thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid/ sngon du gzhung mchog mnyen par bya/ bskal pa brgya phrag dag tu ni// ji ste mngon par brtson byas kyang // gang zag
70b3(rgyud): bzhi ni 'jig rten du// sbubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// byang chub sems ni ma skyes dang / the tsom ldan pa nyid dang ni// bka' bzhin du ni mi byed pa/ dad pa med nyid 'grub mi 'gyur// ji
70b4(rgyud): ltar dus gsum gshegs de bzhin/ byang chub tu ni sems skyed nas/ dkon mchog gsum la dang byas te// the tsom med par byed pa'i mchog khyim pa dang ni rab tu byung // phyoT ni gnyis po
70b5(rgyud): 'dis sgrub bya// ji ltar 'os shing mtsham pa ru// go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya// byang chub sems ni lhur blangs nas/ lha gzhan 'dod pa brtson mi bya// dkon mchog gsum
70b6(rgyud): la dang bya ste// de gzhol ba la brtson par bya// srog gcod sku dang 'khrig pa dang // rdzun dang myos byed rnam par spang // khyim pa'i sdom pa la gnas nas// de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub/ gal te de ni rab
70b7(rgyud): byung gyur// sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// rig 'dzin sdom pa mchog yin no// zla ba 'am yang na lo re'o// de bzhin yang na lo cig tu// gal te dngos grub
70b8(rgyud): mchog 'dod na/ sngon du rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya// nyin re zhing ni ci nus par// thun gsum du ni cho ga sgrub/ rtog pa 'di ni thun bzhi ru// ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham par ni// sdig pa thaMng bsha
71a1(rgyud): par bya// bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang / sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gang ba/ de yi bsod nams byang chub sngo// de bzhin phyogs cu'i 'jig rten gyi// sangs rgyas bla med
71a2(rgyud): thams cad la// gsol ba gdab cing rab btud nas// zhabs la mnyam gzhag phyag bya'o// ji skad gzhung rgya che las gsung // phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyor ba yis// rgyud gzhan dag ni thad kyi// rdo rje'i
71a3(rgyud): sngags ni rab brjod bya// de la snying po ni 'di yin te// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dze bas+tha nA ya at+ma naM nir+yA tA yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra bar+t+ta ya ma~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a bi She kA ya At+ma
71a4(rgyud): naM nir+yA ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta nA ya at+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra bar+t+ta ya maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga pU dza karma Ne at+ma
71a5(rgyud): na nir+yA ta yA mo sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru maM// // phyag rgya dang bcas cho gar ldan/ yang dag nyid du rab bshad bya// sor mo thams cad sbyar ba ni// rdo rje thal mar rab tu brjod/ 
71a6(rgyud): sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas ni// mkhas pas yan lag kun phyag bya// rdo rje thal me rkang nas ni// rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya// mgo bos de bzhin byas nas ni// mkhas pas/ 
71a7(rgyud): bral bas phyag bya'o// mgo bo nas ni phab byas nas// de bzhin kha yis phyag bya'o// de bzhin snying kar bzhag byas nas// spyi bo nas ni phyag bya'o// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rnal 'byor
71a8(rgyud): pas phyag bya// slar yang cho ga la gnas te// mchod pas cho ga dang ldan pa/ spos dang me tog mar me dang // dri dang phreng ba byug pa ni// sangs rgyas rje su dran byas nas// sen kun la mi 'ja/ 
71b1(rgyud): sbyin// sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yis// ci nus par ni mkhas pas dbul// gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan// gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ rdo rje'i sdom pa bla med pa/ 
71b2(rgyud): bslab pa'i gnas ni blang bar bya/ sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yi// dad cing de la rab gzhol bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // slob dpon yang ni phyi ma yin/ nyin re zhing ni ci
71b3(rgyud): nus par// khrus bzhi dag ni rab tu bya// rnal 'byor ji ltar khrus bya ba/ go rim bzhin du rab tu bshad/ sdom pa sum la rab tu gnas/ dang po khru su brjod pa yin// gnyis pa rgyud las
71b4(rgyud): gsungs pa yi/ bshags dang gsol ba 'di/ bas la sogs// phyag rgya bcing ba gsum pa te// bzhi bachu ste tha ma yin// khrus kyi cho ga 'di yis ni// mkhas pas
71b5(rgyud): 'dir ni khrus bya'o// gos ni lan gsum brje ba yo// sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bya// sdom pa la ni legs gnas pa// gos ni dang por brje ba dang // gnyis pa che ga sgrub pa dang // gsum pa de
71b6(rgyud): tsha khrel yod pa// gtsang ma'i gos ni gsum po dag/ lan gsum du ni brje bar bya/ gang la kha na ma the med// thad bza' zhing sten par bya// sha dang 'chang dang sgog pa sogs// bza' ba min pa rnam
71b7(rgyud): par spang / dri nga ba dang mi gtsang nyid// bza' dang btung ba rnam par spang // gzhan la gnod pa dang ldan pa/ lus kyi phyir yang bya ba min// 'khrig pa bdun dang yang dag ldan// mi sdug sgom pas
71b8(rgyud): spang bar bya// yid gzhungs mkhas shing gsal ba dang // theg pa chen po'i don sems pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya che// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// klog pa dang ni bsam pa dang // 
72a1(rgyud): yang dag yang du gsol ba gang ba/ dgra dang grogs dang bar ma la// sems snyoms mi 'jig rab tu byin// snyan cing bden par smra ba yis// zhe sdang 'joms byed byams bsgob
72a2(rgyud): chos dang gang zag bdag med cing // 'dus byas dang ni 'khrul pa tsam// blo ldan brtag pas brtag par bya// 'dus byas kun la rmongs mi bya// 'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni// byang chub sems ni dor
72a3(rgyud): mi bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ shes rab dril bu zhes bya gzhan// slob dpon la ni rAs mi bya// bla ma sang+yas kun dang mnyam/ sbyor ba
72a4(rgyud): lhong par mi bya zhing // cho ga ston pa lhur blang bya/ pha rol bya ngan dug spyod pa la/ go rims bzhin du brlab par bya// sems na gyi ni don ldan pas/ byang chub sede'i spyod pa spyad/ 
72a5(rgyud): na ma tho chung ngu yang / srog ni btang snyoms ngor mi bya// khyi ma pa'am rab tu byung ba'ang rung / 'dris pa thams cad rnam par spang // bu dang chung ma dag la yang // srid pa'i bcing ba las grol
72a6(rgyud): bya/ brkam zhing chags la sdang ba dang / rmongs shing la lo ldan pa'ang min// bag yod shin tu brtson pa yis/ rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub par bya// lta ba kun las rnam par grol// de nyid las ni legs
72a7(rgyud): par mthong // dge zhing dgongs pa bshad pa yis// don shes don ni rtogs par 'gyur// rigs dang mi rigs cho ga shes/ de nyid rnal 'byor shin tu mkhas/ brtse ldan byang chub spyod par ldan// spyod
72a8(rgyud): pa rnams la rab tu ma khas/ de 'dra'i tshul ni sna tshogs dang / de lta bu yi sgrub pa yis/ dngos grub dang ni thar pa 'thob/ dngos grub kun la the tshom med/ gnas dang gos dang bza' ba yi/ lhag/ 
72b1(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par spang / lha rnams bgom par mi bya zhing / bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / le lo med par nyin re zhing // bsrung ba yi ni cho ga bya// bgegs meng 'jigs par mi bya ste/ rang sam
72b2(rgyud): 'di ni gdul bar dka'// pha dang ma ru 'dzin pa dang // bram ze dge slong de dag 'dra// dag cing dul la zhi ba dang // bsdams shing thar bapar shes pa dang // rgyal srid mtho ris long spyod min// 'dod
72b3(rgyud): pa'i longs spyod 'phel phyir min// gzhan du sems can don gyi phyir// rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges byas pa// zas kyi tshod ni shes pa dang // mtshan mo gnyid kyang sad par bya// 'dod chags skyon la
72b4(rgyud): sogs pa gzhan// sems kyis rnam par mi brtago/ sem sa ni rab tu dang byas nas// g.yo ba med cing nges byas pa// legs par smra zhing rab tu 'byed// chos ni nges par don gnyer
72b5(rgyud): byed// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba bzhin// sems can gnod dang 'tshe mi bya// nyes ldan gdug pa'i sems can rnams// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag mi bya// lha yi sku dang phyag mtshan
72b6(rgyud): dang // lha yi bzhon pa dag dang ni/ dman ma lnga yi grib ma dang // lha yi mtshan mthad dang // bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa// mtshan ma'i gzugasu byas pa dang // 'gom par mo bya bza' mi bya/ 
72b7(rgyud): nam yang brdzi bar mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum dang 'brel pa'i zas// nam yang nye bar longs mi spyad// tha na phul dang dman ma yi// dri yang bsnam par mi bya'o// ri bo 'am ni nags kyi
72b8(rgyud): nang // gtsang zhing yid 'ong dben pa 'am// chu bo'i 'gram 'am bskyed mos tshal// ne'u sing shin tu yid 'ong 'am/ lha khang gtsang ma nyams dga' 'am/ khang pa gtsang ma dben pa
73a1(rgyud): // 'am/ gang du tshogs pa med pa ru/ sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni// gtsang ma'i grags dang lhan cig du// de 'dra'i gan su 'dug nas ni// thar pa mchog tu bstan
73a2(rgyud): pa nyid// rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brtsam// thun bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// mgon po mchog la phyag bya zhing // sangs rgyas rjes dran sgom pa pos// bshags pa la sogs de bya'o// mchod
73a3(rgyud): pa nyid kyang ci nas bya'o// gzhan yang phyag rgya yang dag bcing // mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad ni// phyogs kun du ni yang dag spro/ sa pa ni dag ni ma lus nyid// kun nas rin chen shing ldan dang / 
73a4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs mchog ldan dang / rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya// me tog shing dang bdug pa dang // dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong dang / rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho ni// thub pa'i
73a5(rgyud): dbang phyug rnams la dbul// de nas phyogs rnams thams cad du/ me tog bdug pa la sogs sprin/ rol mo'i tshogs ni yid 'ong ba// mchod pa'i sprin ni rnam par bsam// mchod pa thang
73a6(rgyud): rab byed pa// rig pa'i rgyal chen 'di rnams dang // phyag rgya dag kyang yongs gsal ba'i// bsam pa yis ni bzung bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM oM
73a7(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta brik+Sha pu dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pu dza me g+ha sa mu du s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gang du rgyal chen me tog dang / bdug pa dang ni dri yi tshogs// de
73a8(rgyud): bzhin kun tu yang dag sbyar// tha na rgyan spel rnams kyang ngo // mchod pa'i phyag rgya tshul chen dang / phyag rgya chen po bslab par bya// theg pa chen po bsdus pa las// ji skad rgya chen gsungs de bzhin
73b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / bde ba chen po'i rgyu dang ni// 'gro ba gsum las grol ba'i phyir// de lta bu yi bsam pa bya// 'dir ni lha rnams thad kyi// bag med nye bar zhi ba dang // mi
73b2(rgyud): rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa// rab tu mthar phyin de bzhin nyid// theg pa dpan par 'dod byed pa// 'khor ba rnam par gzhol ba'i phyir// rdo rje rnal 'byor bdag nyid ches// 'di de bsam par
73b3(rgyud): bya ba yin/ bdag gi bsod nams stobs dag gis/ bde ba thang tshogs kyi mchog/ sems can thams cad bde chen ldan/ ma lus par ni grub gyur cig/ san thams cad bde gyur cig/ 
73b4(rgyud): 'byung po kun la byams par shog/ dud 'gro thams cad 'jigs med shog/ ngan song thams cad ni gyur cig/ bde ba chen po 'di bsams nas/ sdig pa dral ba bcing bar bya// 
73b5(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad dral byas shing // de bzhin ngan seng thad de// / phyogs rnams thams cad sangs rgyas kun// yang dang yang / du rjes dran nas// gsang ba'i mdo sde ma lus pa/ 
73b6(rgyud): yang dang yang du bklag par bya/ mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ru/ gcig tu 'gyur 'dod sems kyis bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya// zla ba 'ab yang
73b7(rgyud): na zla ba drug/ le gcig gam ni de las gzhan// rig pa'i brtul zhugs 'di 'drar bya// phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing // sangs rgyas rnams la nyin re bzhin// nges par lha bshos dbul
73b8(rgyud): bar bya// lha bshos snang ba ster byed pa// de bzhin rig pa'i lnga bshes la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che// thams cad du ni rjes dran bya// 'ching ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga ni// rdo khu tshur gyi brtan bya/ dza/ 
74a1(rgyud): go cha'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor kun tu bsrung bar bya// de lta bu yi cho ga yis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// srung ba byas shing brtson 'grus brtsam// stobs
74a2(rgyud): chen spro ba bskyed pa yis// nyin re zhing ni brtags nasu// rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// sku mdog dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par// ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru// dgug pa la so// sa las rnams
74a3(rgyud): ni// thams cad mnyam par gzhag par bya// ci nus par ni nyin re zhing // rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mtshams mang lnga po byed pa yang // lo gcig na ni rab 'grub 'gyur// theg pa chen po tshogs dang
74a4(rgyud): nan/ mchog 'gyur rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// rgyud gzhan gyi ni cho ga dang // mdo sde dang bcas ci bzhin du// de nas rig dpa'i brtul zhugs blang // sdom pa'ang dor bar mi bya zhing // kha na
74a5(rgyud): mtho rdul tsam yang / 'gyod pa ru ni bya ba yin// ga/ nas ni yang dag brtag par bya/ tsher ma la sogs dang bral ba/ ri bo 'aman dgon pa 'am/ lha khang bskyed mos tshal dang ni/ 
74a6(rgyud): chu yi 'gram dang 'brog dgon par/ gang du phyogs ni phyogs gtsang mar// gseg ma gyo mo bong ba dang / rdo ba dag ni bsal bar bya/ shin tu legs par dag bya te// gang phyir lha rnams yod
74a7(rgyud): su 'dzin// gal te de ni sbyor lhong gyur// rnam pa kun tu 'jigs mi bya// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che/ chos kyi bdag po dgongs pa can// thugs rje snying por ldan gyur pa// sangs rgyas nyes/ 
74a8(rgyud): par 'dzin mi 'gyur// gnas ni kun tu dag bya zhing // dkyil 'khor yang ni ci nus par/ rgya ru dpag tshad tsam bya ste/ khru drug las ni dma' ba min// sngon la phur bu ga ba bya ste// rdo rje lta la so/ 
74b1(rgyud): pas bcing // de nas yo byad thad ni// cho ga mchog gis blang bar bya/ rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid 'dir// dkyil 'khor dag ni bsgrub par bya/ thal ba la sogs dus ji bzhin// mkhas pas dkyil
74b2(rgyud): 'khor brtag par bya// ji ltar nus shing spro ba dang // ji ltar rdzas ni 'byor pa dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor chen pos bya// yang na sems kyi rtag par bya// ci ste sgrub pa rgyal po 'gyur// cho ga gzhan
74b3(rgyud): gyi blo ldan pas// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ dkyil 'khor dag ni dag par bya// mtshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// khru ni stong dang ldan pa mchog/ yang na rgyang grags tshad tsam du/ 
74b4(rgyud): sa yi cha ni thig gdab bya// gal te 'byor pa lnga na pa min// khru bzhi mdo ru sdus pas bya// yang na phyogs rnam sa thams cad du// khru brgyad dang ni yang dag ldan// in dra na
74b5(rgyud): la shin tu sngo// tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya// pad+ma rA ga shin tu dmar/ tshon rtsi dmar po zhes byar bshad// rdo rje mchu dang chu chen po// ser po yang ni yang dag ldan// dag cing ngang ba'i gas
74b6(rgyud): dang ni// kha dog ser po ldan par bya// shin tu dag pa shel dang bas// tshon rtsi dri dang yang dag ldan// gang phyir rgyal po nor chen ldan// tshen rtsi 'di dag yang dag bshang// phyug cing nor dang ya
74b7(rgyud): dag ldan// gal te de ni khyim bdag gyur// khru rgya yongasu tshang bar bya// bcu drug las ni nyung mi bya/ tshen rtsi dri dang yang dag ldan/ gu gum la sogs dang bsres pa// tshen rtsi lnga dang yang dag
74b8(rgyud): ldan na mkhas pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya/ phyug cing nor dang yang dag ldan// tshong dpon yang ni dang dpon nam// khyim pa 'byor pa dang ldan pa// gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na// rin chem
75a1(rgyud): phye ma dang sres pa'i// tshe rtsi chen po rab tu bya// rams dang ba bla la sogs pa/ tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// bdag cing drung ba'am che ba 'am rung // de yi 'byor pa rba/ 
75a2(rgyud): bya ba/ ji ltar rig par nges par sbyar/ rgyal po la ni tshad bshad pa/ khyim bdag la yang de bzhin no// tshong dpon dang ni ded dpon gyi/ khru ni lnga bcu nyid kyang ngo // gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ong gyur na/ 
75a3(rgyud): khru ni nyi shur byas pa yin// gal te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na/ khru drug las ni chung mi bya/ mang po de bzhin nyung ba yang / dri dang kun tu yang dug ldan// rtag tu sna tshogs dri yis ni// sngon du
75a4(rgyud): sa gzhi dag par bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor ngos dag gi/ grA ni/ bzhi po thams cad du/ shes rab can gyis bdug spos sreg/ gang phyir rdo rje can dag gshegs// de nas dkyi
75a5(rgyud): 'khor gnas de ni/ sngags kyi gsang ba'i dri ru yi// rtag tu le/ gas par chag chag gdab// gang phyir rdo rje rang bzhin 'gyur/ nyin zhag drug gam bdun brgyang dang / mar dang 'o ma 'bras
75a6(rgyud): can nyid// slob dpon zas ni dkar gsum bza'// yang na thun mongs gyur pa'i zas// ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du// mi bza' bar ni bsgrub par bya// gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas// stob
75a7(rgyud): ldan gyur par the tshom med/ dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyal chen po// gang yin bsam pas bya ba'o// bco lnga la ni brtsams nasu// gnyis pa'i nyal rdzogs par bya// yang na mar gyi ngo la ni/ bcu pani
75a8(rgyud): la ni yang dag brtsam/ bco lnga la ni thub par bya// legs pa ru ni rdzogs par bya/ yang na tshes rgyang nas brtsams te/ tha ma nya la kun tu bri/ yang na bcu bzhi la brtsams te/ nyin zhag gnyis
75b1(rgyud): par yang dag bri/ yang na bco lnga de yi ni// snga dro de yi yang dag brtsam// tshul chen po dang mchung ba yis// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri// gang gi tshe nas brtsams na su// ji srid rdzogs
75b2(rgyud): par ma gyur par// gal te kun nas mi bza' bar/ brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya// dri dang bcas shing legs byas pa/ yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ gang phyir rgyal ba'i rdo rje
75b3(rgyud): 'dzin// byin gyi brlab par mdzad par 'gyur// bsod nams che zhing bkra shis pa'i// nyin zhag dag pa gang yin pa/ de la rdo rje slob dpon ni// skal pa chen pos dkyil 'khor brtsam// sems
75b4(rgyud): dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dbus kyi cha ru 'dug par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad la dmigs nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom// sems ni yongasu 'dzin byed pa/ 
75b5(rgyud): lus ni drang por byas nasu// bshags la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// thams cad sngon du bya ba yin/ byang chub sem/ sa la brtson 'gyur cing / reg pa'i brtul
75b6(rgyud): zhugs smad pa yis// phyogs bcu ru ni phyag byas nas// bdag nyid kyang ni spro ba skyed// deng ni sde pa 'bras bur bcas// bdag gi 'tshe ba 'ad 'bras bu yod// sangs rnams dang dam
75b7(rgyud): tshig gis// deng ni srid par mnyam par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig pa'i// sems kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i// bdag 'gyur
75b8(rgyud): bar ni the tshom med// deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ deng ni bdag mchod bla na med// sang+yas thang spyan// sems na dga' zhag mgu ba yas// chag na'ang skang brjed par bya// yan
76a1(rgyud): 'dren pas// deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yid do// de ltar dga' ba dang ldan pas// de nas dbu su 'dug gyur nas// spos kyi reng bu lag thogs pas// sangs rgyas thams cad
76a2(rgyud): spyan drangs bya// sems ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis// cig ni 'di skad brjod par bya// yan lag kun gyi rab btud de/ sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gang ba/ ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi// 
76a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bdag la dgongasu gsol// rdo rje bdag ming 'di zhes bya// bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal// sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs te// dngos grub 'di ni bdag la gsol// 
76a4(rgyud): tshig ni de skad brjod na su// sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/ chos chen po la snyoms zhugs nas// bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan bya/ gal 'a dus na skal pa ches// yang na
76a5(rgyud): sems kyi sgrub par bya// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khol rgyal po mchogating 'dzin zhes bya ci 'dra dang / rdo rje'i gzugs dang ldan pa la// rnal 'byor pa yis snyoms 'jug bya// yang
76a6(rgyud): na rnal 'byer gang rung la// nus na snyoms par 'jug par bya// sems ni mnyam par bzhag 'gyur ba// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// bcom ldan sngon ni ci 'dra ba'i// byang chub sems
76a7(rgyud): dpa' nyid 'gyur ba'i// de 'dra bar ni bdag rang nyid// rnal 'byor don sems bsam par bya/ dka' thub sdom pa sna tshogs pa/ bdag gi bya bar bsam par bya// sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen
76a8(rgyud): po ni/ stong gsum pa ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas bskul ba bla na mas shes rab can gyi bskul ba bsam/ sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas shing // ci 'dod pa ni bka' nong bya// nges par
76b1(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rang sems so so brtag par bya/ byang sems yang dag skyed nas ni// dbus zla ba brtag par bya/ de nas rang gi ye shes brtag/ zla ba'i dbus rdo rje bzhin/ rang lus
76b2(rgyud): rdo rje gzugasu ste// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid// de nas sangs rgyas mngon rtogs nas/ rang bdag nyid ni dbang skur bya// rang bdag sangs rgyas thams cad du/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ba lnga
76b3(rgyud): bar bya// ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// stug po'i gnas las babs nasu/ rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug na su/ sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bya// sems dpa' bzhin phyung nas/ phyogs rnams kun tu
76b4(rgyud): yongasu spro// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan byas nas/ phyogs pa ni ru ni dgong par bya// mtsham su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs/ phyogs
76b5(rgyud): bzhi ru ni sangs rgyas kyi// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen bo byung // 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas nyid// dkyil 'khor thams cad blta bar bya// sems dpa' gsang ba'i
76b6(rgyud): lha mor bcas// sgo srung rnams ni bsam par bya// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag pa ni/ snying po chen po rtag par bya// rang gi 'khor lo yang dag bzhugs// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ 
76b7(rgyud): thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mtshan ni rjesu dran pa sgom// ting 'dzin las langs nas kyang // rdo'i lta bas blta bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// slar yang snyoms
76b8(rgyud): par 'jug par bya// rnam par snang mdzad thugs dbusu/ byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par ni// mgon po'i snying kha nas gzung bya// sems dpa' kun gyi
77a1(rgyud): spyan snga ru// bka' ni rims bzhin nod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur gyis/ rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya// gsol ba btab pa gsan par bya/ 
77a2(rgyud): bdag ni rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor mchog chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ ting 'dzin shin tu bla na med// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun// kun gyis rlab pa mdzad par 'gyur// ting 'dzin
77a3(rgyud): las langs nas kyang // bka' ni nye bar gnod bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// skyil krung bshig ste langs nas ni// rang gis 'dren pa'i zhabs
77a4(rgyud): phyag bya// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ba ru/ phyogs rnams pa zhi ni lta bar bya// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// rdo rje'i tshe ga ni brjod par bya/ bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can// rdo
77a5(rgyud): sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ bdag ni stobs chen rdo rje can/ bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal// bdag ni phyag na rdo rje mchog/ oM
77a6(rgyud): badz+ra satwa hUM// rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di// lan cig nyid ni brjod par bya// bdag ni gtso bo rdo rje che// byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor// sangs rgyas rgya mtshos kun tu gang / 'khor los
77a7(rgyud): lnga par yang dag gnas// bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni// rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan par bya// slar yang bdag nyid go bgo zhing // bdag nyid dbang ni bskur bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin
77a8(rgyud): phyag rgya yis// bgags rnams thams cad bcang bar bya// laganyeng ba yi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rab tu mnye// rdo rje gtun shing nyid kyis ni// bgeg rnams thams cad brdung bar bya/ 
77b1(rgyud): rdo rje ral gri rab rdo bas// bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya// rdo rje mche ba drag po yis/ bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje bzang po'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad
77b2(rgyud): gzhom par bya// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje mche ba rab grags pas// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis/ 
77b3(rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje nags pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya/ 
77b4(rgyud): rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis/ bgegs rnams thams cadad bug par bya// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnam sa thams cad skyel bar bya/ rgyas pa yis ni ci nus
77b5(rgyud): par// lus rnams thams cad dgug par bya// bgegs ni 'a ga' yang yod min zhes/ sems ni dag par gyur pa yin/ rang sems bdud ces bya bar bshad/ bgegs nyid kyang ni rang
