77b6(rgyud): gi sems/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsal/ rnam rtog las ni bgegs rnams 'byung // gdul bar dka' ba'i sems gzung zhing // 'dod pa lnga ni spang bar bya// sngon du rjes dran nas brtsams
77b7(rgyud): te// yang na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ bcom zhing nges par bcad nas ni/ yi ge hUM gi skrag par bya/ rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje rab bcing bar bya/ hUM mdzad rdo rje snga mas bya zhing // de na
77b8(rgyud): rdo rje ra bas skor// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/ dkyil 'khor yang dag byin rlabs nas/ ci nus par ni rgyas pa ru/ rab mchog ni bcing bar bya// rtog pa kun la nges sbyar nas// sems ni
78a1(rgyud): dag par 'gyur ba yin/ dkyil 'khor dag ni mtshan nyid ni// mkhas pa yis ni bzung bar bya/ grogs dag dang ni thams cad la/ g.yel ba med par srung bar bya/ 
78a2(rgyud): gsar zhing legs par bkal ba dang / tshang dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang / dri zhim reg bya 'jam pa dang / legs par byas shing sra ba dang // dri gsung dang ni yang dag ldan/ sna tshogs tshon gyis/ 
78a3(rgyud): kun tu khyab// dri bcas tshon du spang bya zhing // chos kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ de nas de ni yang dag bshad/ dkyil 'khor mchog ni chen po ste/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ 
78a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas brtan pa'i rdo rje can/ sems can 'di/ rnams gdul bya min/ bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho che/ tshe gas ni kun tu ma bsags pas// bsod nams tshogs dang / 
78a5(rgyud): mi ldan zhing / sangs rgyas 'byung la chags dang bral/ sems can de rnams mos bya'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor chen po bstan pa yi na// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor
78a6(rgyud): 'dzin du 'jug/ yang na bsod nams ngag gi tshogs// de ni rang nyid kyi mthong 'gyur/ gang phyir tshogs bcas longs spyod dang // chos kyi sku ni bla na med/ rdo rje'i dam chos las byung ba'i// sangs
78a7(rgyud): rgyas 'byung ba 'dzin du gzhug/ gal te de ni tshogs bsags gyur// sngon du sangs rgyas rjesu mthong / dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la gnas te// sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong 'gyur// tshogs ni/ 
78a8(rgyud): bsags pa med pa dang // sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru/ des ni thos pa rnyed mi 'gyur/ dang por 'dir 'dug smos ci dgos// gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'di ni gsang ba mtshungs ma
78b1(rgyud): pa// 'di ni theg chen snying po ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bla med// bskal pa grangs med pa ru blang / sa yi pha rol phyin pa mchog/ gang phyir gsang ba mthe ba thob/ rab tu dgar ba sgrub par 'gyur// 
78b2(rgyud): gal te rnal 'byor bde brtson/ tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan 'das/ rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob cing / rdo rje nyid ni the tshom meng / yang na mthong ba tsam gyi ni// skye ba bcu drug mya ngan 'das/ rab tu dga' ba
78b3(rgyud): thob pa dang // yang na rdo rje nyid kyang ngo // sa la nyi zla ltung byed cing / de ni namakha'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ so so'i skye bos sangs rgyas cing // 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ rnal 'byor mchog
78b4(rgyud): ni bla med pa// de phyir rnal 'byor chen po sbyor// gal te sangs rgyas nyid 'dod na// brtson 'grus chen pos brdad mi bya/ tshad ni ji skad bshad pa ru/ de bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs na/ 
78b5(rgyud): phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gang ba bya// gang phyir rdo rje la dzin pa'i gnas/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// theg pa ni dang ni yang dag ldan/ cham
78b6(rgyud): bas ni mdzes par gyur/ ngar gyis rkun pos rgyar gyur cing / rin chen dra bas rnam par rgyan/ g.yer ka'i dra bas yang dag ldan// kha dog lnga pos rab tu mdzes/ dril bu'i dra bas shin tu
78b7(rgyud): spras/ rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa// phreng brda yab bla re dang // nyi zla dag gis nye bar mdzes// kun nas phyi rol gnas dag tu/ rdo rje kha khyer yang dag rten/ kun tu kha khyer dang ldan pa'i// 
78b8(rgyud): ske ni kha khyer med pa'o// rtse mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin/ gzhan ni gser gyi mdag cad dang / dmar po pad+ma lta bu dang / gzhan yang shel ltar dkar ba dang / rin chen rang bzhin mchog kun gyis/ 
79a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri bar bya/ sna tshogs gzugs ni mdzes pa mchog/ rdo rje lnga po'i tshigs kyi mchod/ rim gnyis sgo nga yang dag ldan// rtababs sna tshogs das
79a2(rgyud): ldan pa// dkar zhing gsal dang rdo rje dang / 'i zla dag gis rnam par spras/ mdab ma bani dang yang dag ldan/ sgo bzhi dag ni mchog tu mdzes/ mtho zhing yangs la mdzes pa ste/ rdo rje rdo rjer yang dag
79a3(rgyud): ldan/ rdo rje sde srung skal chen po// bdag cing rdo rje lcags su 'dzin/ gtum mo srung byed rnal 'byor pa/ shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ lho ru rdo rje nags pa ste/ nub tu rdo rje lpags sgeg go// rdo rjes
79a4(rgyud): bus la chen po/ byang gi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ 'jug/ ba dang ni 'byung ba'ang rung / rdo rje shugs ni brjed bar bya/ mo ngamanam brdzis byas na/ dam tshig de nyid mthong mi 'gyul
79a5(rgyud): oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM/ gang gi dusu thig 'debs pa/ rdo rje'i thig ni brjod par bya/ sa ya~M tsa ni ma lus gathams cad rdo rje rang bzhin 'gyur/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya su t+ya ma Ni kram hUM/ 
79a6(rgyud): sngon du chen rtsi'i phyi me la/ 'bar ba'i lta bas yang dag palta// badz+ra ra gA zhes brjod na// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ oM badz+ra ra g+ha hUM/ mtshams kyi tshan thams cad dang / sgra chung
79a7(rgyud): rkyen mtshams rnams// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gang ba bya/ logs dang tshan mnyam pa dang // kun nas tshe ni rnam par byed/ datsal 'khor chani rnam/ 
79a8(rgyud): par gsal/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab bye/ de yi nang gi rim pa ru/ zhugs nas 'khor lo de mtshungs pa/ kun tu chan mnyam par bri/ ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ rdo
79b1(rgyud): ka ba'i mdun gnas su/ dkyil 'khor dag ni lnga yis rgyan// gnas lnga dag ni thams cad du// 'khor lo lnga ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// kun tu bri zhing dgod par
79b2(rgyud): bya// rdo rje bsnyems tshul gyis bltas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' gzung bar bya// oM badz+ra satwa hU~M/ de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas rgyal po dgod par bya// gang gi thugs las
79b3(rgyud): nges byung ba// gsang ba'i tshogs ni stug cing brten// rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor che// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal// gang gi thub pa don yod grub pa dgod// de yi phyogs
79b4(rgyud): rnams thams cad du// las chen po bdag yang dag bri/ kun nas phyogs ni bzhi dag tu// phyag na rang gi phyag mtshan mtsho na/ mdun du rdo rje las yin te// g.yasu rdo rje srung ba'o// 
79b5(rgyud): g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ rdo rje khu tshur rgyab tu'o// de nas phyug mtshan bcu drug dang / dbus ma nyi shur rab pa shang bya/ bcu drug dbus ma nyi shu ni// go rims bzhin du
79b6(rgyud): rab bshad bya// ji ltar rigs shing tsham pa la// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// rdo rje rin chen rin po che// rdo rje pad+ma chen po dang // rdo rje rnon po dbus ma yin// phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje che// de bzhin rdo rje ljags
79b7(rgyud): kyu 'dzin// rdo rje chags pa gzhu nyid do// rdo rje legs pa'i rdo rje gnyis/ rdo rje rin chen rin po che// rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma ste/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan sbeng // rdo rje gnang pa chos chen po// rdo rje
79b8(rgyud): chos kyi pad+ma ches/ rdo rje chos kyi ral gri bzang // rdo rje chu yi 'khor lo cha// rdo rje'i smra ba'i yo geste/ rdo rje rnon po las chen po/ rdo rje srung ba'i cho gas// rdo rje gnang sbyin mche ba che// rdo rje 'u
80a1(rgyud): chur sngams pa ste// lcags kyu zhags pa ljags sgrog dang / dril bu dag ni spro ba bani// rdo rje sems ma'i rdo rje che// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen nor// pad+ma rdo rje chos ma ste/ 
80a2(rgyud): rnon po las ma yin// grwa bzhi dag tu gsang ba yi// phyag mtshan de rnams dgod par bya// 'khor lo chen po'i phyi rol gyi// grwa bzhi dag ni thams cad du/ gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi/ 
80a3(rgyud): rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri/ rdo rje sgeg ma rdor phreng ma// de bani na rdo rje glu ma nyid/ bsnyems bcas phreng ba'i pi bang dang / glu gar gsang ba'i lha mo rnams/ phyi rol pakyil 'tshar
80a4(rgyud): mtshams rnams// mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri/ me d+ha/ ga spos dang de bzhin dri/ mar me nub byang mtsham su 'ong // mar me la sogs par nyid kyi/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor thad
80a5(rgyud): du// bskal pa bzang po'i sems dpa' che// stong ni nges par dgod par bya/ mtshan ma ji bzhin ci rigs pas/ byams pa la sogs ma lus pa/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa yi// se ra
80a6(rgyud): chen po dgod par bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya/ rang gi snying pos kun dbab phyir// rang rang gi ni snying po yin// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// 
80a7(rgyud): badz+ra pA Ni hUM/ badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHbadz+ra rA ga ho/ badz+ra sA d+ha sa/ dam tshig mchog gi snying po'o// oM badz+ra ma Ni/ oM badz+ra te dze a/ badz+ra ke tu hUM/ badz+ra hA sa hA/ badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na d+haM/ badz+ra he tu maM/ badz+ra b+ha la/ 
80a8(rgyud): raM/ dbang gi sems dpa' dang / ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o// badz+ra karma kaM/ badz+ra rak+Sha haM/ badz+ra yak+Sha hUM/ badz+ra muSh+Ti baM/ las kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o// de rnam
80b1(rgyud): ni rab tu gnas pa'i snying po yin no// de nas sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni/ badz+ra hUM/ rat+na traM/ d+harma hrI/ karma.a/ lha mo rnams kyi sngar bshad zin to// sgo srung rnams kyi yang de bzhin// cho ga'i sbyor
80b2(rgyud): ba 'di yis ni/ dkyil 'khor len na// nga nas sangs rgyas kyi spang ba na/ badz+ra hA/ rat+na tra/ d+harma hA/ karma a/ lha ma rnams kyi sngar bshad zan te/ skra srung rnams kyi yang nga bzhin na/ 
80b3(rgyud): thams cad dgod par bya// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi las bshad par bya ste/ kun nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis// chos kyi blo can gyis bri byar/ dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa'i// 
80b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ lan bdun du ni brjod par bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya/ 'khor lo
80b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni// ma khrangs thams cad ba lta bar bya// gal te chad dam lhag kyang rung // rdo rje shugs// kyis dag par bya/ 'khor lo chen po dag par byas/ 
80b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnal 'byor yang dag gzung / rgyal ba rnams la bdag nyid ni/ dbul ba'i las ni kun tu bya// de nas yo byad tha kyis/ dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya// ci 'byor
80b7(rgyud): bas ni bya ba ste// dman par gyur kyang nyes pa med// 'byor pa ci snyed yod pa kun// go rims bzhin du rab tu dbul/ bum pa gang ba 'bum phrag gam/ stong ngam yang na brgya
80b8(rgyud): yang rung // mar me 'bum phrag stong de ni/ yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung / dri dang spos kyi snod 'bum mam// yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung // ga pur a ga ru nyid dang / du ru ka dang
81a1(rgyud): tsan ngan sogs/ mang sbyar dri zhim dang ldan pa/ spos rnams 'di dag bsreg par bya/ gser ram dngul gyi snod dag dang / sa las byas kyang nyes pa med// yo byad ji snyed yod
81a2(rgyud): pa kun// dkyil 'khor du ni bzhag par bya// de la skong bu stong phrag gam// mar me sdong bu shin tu 'bar/ tha na mar me snod gcig ste// ma tshang gyur kyang nyes pa med// dar ni phyar bar bye ba bre// rnga yab
81a3(rgyud): phreng bas rnam par rgyan// dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ sna tshogs bzhon pa brgya 'am ni// stong phrag gcig kyang nyes pa med// thams cad ma tshang gcig nyid kyang / bde
81a4(rgyud): bas rol mo mchog rnams bya// phan pa'i zas ni stong phrag dang / bye ba phrag ni rgya mtsho tshogs// bca' ba sna tshogs pa ya dang ste// gal te ma tshang nyes pa med// dri dang gos bzang tha~Md dang // 
81a5(rgyud): dri zhim pa yi byug pa dang // bya ba mchog ni sdom sa par mdzes/ bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs rje yi chus bkang ba/ bum pa shin tu yid 'ong dang / me tog shing
81a6(rgyud): ni brgya nyid dang / bzhi yang nyes par mi 'gyuraro// dri dang me tog thang dang // bdug pa yid du 'ong ba kun/ gal te sbyor ba ldan gyur na/ mchod pa rnam pa thams cad bya// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma
81a7(rgyud): nyid// ji bzhin sgrub pa pos de phul/ de bzhin dngos grub rdzu 'phrul ni// mthong ba'i chos la thob par 'gyur// sngar ni ji skad bsgrags pa bzhin// thang cho ga bzhin du dgod/ sangs rgyas kun la
81a8(rgyud): dbul bya zhing // mchod pa nyid kyang rab tu bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yo/ dbus kyi 'khor lo phyag byas nas/ dbus mo btsugs te 'dug nas ni// yang dag par ni dgug par bye/ sa la/ 
81b1(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // rdo rje lcags kyu brjod par bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig zlas pa yi// de bzhin gshegs rnams kun du gshegs// de nas sgo srung bcings nas ni/ yi ge dza na yongasu brjod// rdo rje
81b2(rgyud): can ni thams cad dgug/ the tshom med par gshegs par gyur// rdo rje zhags pa bcings nas ni// cho ga ji bzhin nges par gzhug rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings nas ni// dbang du yang ni rtag tu bya/ 
81b3(rgyud): dril bu'i phyag rgya yis// de dag nyid kyang dbab par bya// rdo rje gnas pa'i phyag rgya yi// gnas rnams kun ni dgod par bya// ci nus par ni rab tu sgrags// de nas mchod pa rab tu bya/ spos dang me
81b4(rgyud): tog la sogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun la sbyar// bdag nyid dbul dang mchod pa dang / bshegs dang ga sol ba btab la sogs/ byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang / 
81b5(rgyud): sdom pa yang dag smad par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya// se gol dag ni brdab bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// sangs rgyas sras
81b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa kun/ bkug cing rab tu bcug nas ni// rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag dbapa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches// dral nas de ni yang dag dpag/ rdo rje ye shes bla na med// ye shes dag
81b7(rgyud): pa skye bar 'gyur// sems dpa'i ye shes 'bab par 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa yang dag brjod// ji ste babs par ma gyur na/ yi ge a yis dril bu dkrol// mtshams meng lnga po byed pa yang / 
81b8(rgyud): rdo rje slob dben 'di lta bu/ ye shes dam pa skye 'gyur zhing // rmang du byung ba'ang 'dis mthong 'gyur// brgya las rtsa bdun lhag pa nyid// mtshan ma'ang de las lhag 'byung 'gyur// gzhan
82a1(rgyud): // dag gang yang rung ba nyid/ gal te bsod nams sbal pa che// des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mthong / yang na byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ yang na rdo rje 'dzin gang shi
82a2(rgyud): na 'od zer 'phros pa mthong // hUM sgrogs 'brug gi sgra dang ni// spos dang me tog dag gi bar// ba spu langs pa la sogs byung // de nas rdo rje slob dpon no// dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/ samra
82a3(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya ldan gyur pas// ser mo gnyis kyi phreng bas zung / gar gyi tshul gyis zhugs nas ni// rdo rje gar gyi rab bskor bas// dbus kyi 'khor lo rab zhugs nas// phreng ba nyid ni dor bar
82a4(rgyud): bya// phreng ba de ni gar babs pa// de dang de ni skad cig 'grub// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// phyag rgya thams cad bcing byas na/ dngos grub thams cad nges pa ru// 'grub
82a5(rgyud): 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gzhan yang de la rdo rje 'chang / byin gyi rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/ langs nas der ni bac+doMs// yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang rung // 'angar ba dang ni g.yo ba'ang
82a6(rgyud): rung // de bzhin yan lag 'khum pa dang // yang na tshig ni byung ba dang // ci ste hUM ni brjod pa'ang rung // nges par leg so zhes bya ba/ cho 'phrul bde ba chen po ni/ rmang 'byung bsam gyi mi khyab ste/ 
82a7(rgyud): rje slob dpon skal pa ches// mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom meng / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// de nas langs te brjod par bya// mgon po thub pa la btud nas// ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya/ 
82a8(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi// rgyu dang mi rgyu khams gsum gyi// sems can kun
82b1(rgyud): gyi bde gang yin// des ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzog so// / de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thang
82b2(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po der ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad 'jug tu rung ngo // snod dang snod ma yin pa yongasu brtag par mi
82b3(rgyud): bya ste// gzhug pa la mngon par zhen pa yongasu gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mdo la phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro// dad pa med pa dang / 
82b4(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa dang / rgyud yongasu ma smin pa dang / mos pa med pa mang du zin kyang 'on kyang mthong ba tsam gyi so// gang gi phyir gsang ba chen po 'di ni de bzhin
82b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gsang bas 'dul ba'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i tshul dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul
82b6(rgyud): pa ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i sras ni 'jig pa med// ngan seng sgo ni bcad pa dang / thams cad thar pa la gzhal dang // 
82b7(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste// byang chub sems ni skyed du gzhug/ sems can kun gyi don bsams nas/ sdom pa yang ni sbyin par bya/ srog gcod pa
82b8(rgyud): dang ma byin par len pa dang // 'dod pas leg par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / gcos pa'i chang dang / myos par gyur pa dag de nas brtsams te spang bar bya'o// 
83a1(rgyud): / sngon la sdom pa 'di dag ni// ji ltar 'dod cing mos pa ru/ mkhas pa yis ni sbyin bya ste/ rang dbang med par sprin mi bya/ gal te de ni dang gyur na// de la sdom pa sbyin
83a2(rgyud): par bya// sdom pa gsum la bkod nas ni// de nas dkyil 'khor brtan par bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dkon mchog gsum la skabs song ste/ slab pa lnga la rnam par gnas// byang
83a3(rgyud): chub sems la mchog brtson bya/ sems can shin tu gdul dka' gang // sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed cing // dang dang ldan pa med pa'ang / 'jug pa nyid ni dgag mi bya// ji ltar sangs rgyas thugs
83a4(rgyud): rje can// de dag gi ni sku ru 'gyur/ mthong ba tsam gyi mdo la ni/ sdom pa dag par 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid ngan pa'i sems can gang // khro zhing shin tu gshe ba dang // gnang gang byed
83a5(rgyud): cing 'phyar yang rung // de nyid rgyu ru 'gyur ba yin// gzhug pa'i tshe ga rgyas pa ru// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// ji ltar 'os shi nga 'tsham pa ru/ rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// sbyor
83a6(rgyud): ba ba ni yis phyag bya zhing // rdo rje sngags kyang sgom par bya/ sngar bshad cho ga ji bzhin du// phyag bzhi dag kyang bya ba yin// stod g.yog gos ni dmar po dang // dmar pos mig kyang dgab par bya// gos
83a7(rgyud): ni dmar po skon byas te/ gang phyir sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// shin tu gsal ba 'ching du gzhug/ snying po lan cig brjod bya zhing // sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya brjod// dga'
83a8(rgyud): zhing mgu la rangs pa yi/ sor mo gnyis kyi phreng ba blangs// snying po 'di dag nyid kyi ni// slob dpon chen po gzhug par bya/ sa ma la hUM/ shar gyi sgo yi nang du ni/ yi ge dza no yang dag brjod// lho ru
83b1(rgyud): zhag pa'i yi ge hUM/ nub tu lcags sgrog baM lhan cig/ byang du dril bu byang chub par/ yi ge a ni brjod par bya/ dus phyis rol pa dang bcas pa// bkug ste phrag kyang btsal bar bya// bshags
83b2(rgyud): dang gso gang ba mdzangad pa dang // yong su sngo dang rjes yi rang / bdag nyid dbul ba nyid kyang ni/ go rims bzhin du byed du gzhug / deng bdag ye shes rdo rje ni// the tshom med par skyed par bya/ khyod kyis brlas
83b3(rgyud): par mi bya ste// khyod ni phung bar gyur ta re// brjod nas phreng ba dor du gzhug rdo rje'i phreng ba sbyin par bya/ phreng ba de ni gang du babs// 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med// oM badz+ra mA laM/ rdo rje tshig ni rab
83b4(rgyud): brjod cing // deng nas gdong g.yog dgrol bar bya/ nges par ying ches spyir bya zhing / dkyil 'khor ltos zhes brjed par bya/ mo nga ni rdo rje sems rang cid // sangs rgyas snying po las
83b5(rgyud): byung ba// rdo rje mig ni dbye bar bya// kye rdo rje'i dkyil 'khol ltos// / dam tshig nyid ni sbyin bya zhing // sems ma'i phyag rgya steng du bcing // / 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig 'joms// rdo rje tshig ni brjod par
83b6(rgyud): bya// oM ud kaT/ rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// phyag na rdo rjes srung bar byed// dmachog nyid ni nyams 'gyur na// 'bras bu 'di ni thob mi 'gyur// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'dra
83b7(rgyud): na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrung bas 'grub par 'gyur// 'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi 'thung / rdo rje sems dpa'i mna' yino// snying po 'dis ni gnas bsgrag go// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
83b8(rgyud): nyid ni/ de ring khyod kyi snying la zhugs// gal te tshul 'di smras na na// skad cig de la dral nas gshegs gang zhig sdom pa mi len cing // shin tu gdul dka' dang med la// gzhug pa tsam ni sbyin
84a1(rgyud): bar bya/ de la las ni mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la dad dang ldan// sdig la 'jigs shing rab tu bsdam/ dang dang dang ba phun sum tshogs// de la dam tshig sbyin par bya/ 
84a2(rgyud): de la dam tshig gang zhe na// sangs rgyas chos dang ngage 'dun dang // gtso bo de dag lhur blang bya// 'tshe ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/ byang sems nges par dor mi bya// lha rnams la ni smad mi bya// sngags dang phyag
84a3(rgyud): rgya nam yang min// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas mi bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// bzhon pa mtshon cha phyag mtshan dang / dman lus kyi grib ma rnams/ gya nom du ni rdzi mi bya// nam yang bza' bar mi
84a4(rgyud): bya'o// bdag gi sngon ni ji ltar mthong / sems can gzhan la brjod ma bya/ sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa ni// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sems can bsad par mi bya zhing / theg pa gzhan la dag
84a5(rgyud): mi bya// sems can don dang 'khor ba las/ nam yang skye ng+ga/ ra mi bya'o// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni// nam yang dor bar mi bya// 'o// bya ba ma yin rtag tu spang // khyod kyi dam tshig sdom
84a6(rgyud): pa yin/ gal te snod ldan mchog yin na// 'di 'dra'i dam tshig brjod par bya/ ci ste min na btang snyoms gzhug/ ci ste 'dod pa bde bar bya// sbyor ba 'di dag thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor
84a7(rgyud): thams cad sdus pa ru/ rgyud rnams kun gyi dam tshig mchog/ thams cad du ni sbyar bar bya/ cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ rdo rje chos ni sgrub pa yis// dngos grub mchog
84a8(rgyud): kyang sbyin pa bye/ gal te rdo rje can rang grug mkhas pas gzhan la'ang slab par bya/ rang nyid ye shes yang dag skyes/ de bzhin gzhan la skyid par bya/ dkyil 'khor mthong zhing cho ga shes/ sa
84b1(rgyud): tshig dngos grub dang ldan pa'i// ngang dang ldan pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ 'di ni slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// de yis mchod pa byas nas ni/ batshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ mtshams med
84b2(rgyud): lnga po byed pa yang / lan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje slob ma la brjod bya// 'di las 'jig rten gzhan du min// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// khyod 'dir rdo rje can du 'gyur/ 
84b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod sprul zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu skye// 'khor ba'i gnas kyi brtson ra ru// slar yang sdug bsngal 'a gyur pa med// deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas// sang+yas
84b4(rgyud): kun dang mtshungs pa ru// de rang khyod ni gyur pa yin// nga la spyi bes gus pas gtugs/ lus ni theg gsum pha rol phyin/ mi khoms par ni skye mi 'gyur// byang chub spyod pas nyes
84b5(rgyud): ba med// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur/ rdo rje can khyod brtson bar gyis/ gzhan che bcu drug gi thob pa/ tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i sras kyis sa thob kyang // dkyil 'khor
84b6(rgyud): gsang ba mthong ma gyur/ ji ltar khyod ni dang byung ba// de bzhin theg pa yid ches min// skye dang skye ba thams cad du// rdo rje can ni mngon brtson 'gyur// skye ba bcu drug mthar thug pas// zhi bar
84b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gnas kyi sa thob cing // bskal grangs med gnyis dka' ba spyod// gsang ba'i theg par ma zhugs par// bcu drug gis ni 'gyur ba yin// 'byung po
84b8(rgyud): kun gyis mthong mi 'gyur/ khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ lha tshogs gdug pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje can ni zil mi non// rims gdon dug dang phyag rgya dang // mkha' 'gro la sogs
85a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i gdong / nga rgyal dang bcas gzhan dag gis// slar yang khyed ni zil non min// de ni bskal pa brgya ru yang // rdo rje'i yon tan nyid brjod 'gyur// gsang
85a2(rgyud): nga'i snying po mchog mthong 'gyur// nam yang 'jigs par mi 'gyuro// sems dpa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya bcing / brtson 'grus chen pos brtan par bya/ ji skad du ni brjod par bya// dbab pa
85a3(rgyud): bla na med pa ste// 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/ rdo rje ye shes bla med pa/ de nyid kyis ni dbab par bya/ badz+ra a be sha a/ de nas dbab par gyur pa nyid// mngon par
85a4(rgyud): shes pa drug thob cing / ye shes dam pa thang cig sa// sngon byung min pa'i dga' bde dang // dga' ba mgu ba mtsho ga dag dang // rig pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul
85a5(rgyud): ngag ni rdzogs par 'gyur// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rdo rjes phyag rgya snying kar dkrol// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rtag tu snying khar zhugs par 'gyur// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha sha
85a6(rgyud): sha to me b+ha ba/ hr-i da yaM me a d+hi taSh+Thi/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha hUM ha ha ha ha hoH/ de nas snying po 'd-i yis ni// phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya// pra tits+tsha ho// gnas gang du ni phreng ba babs// de yi lha ni ri
85a7(rgyud): de yin// go rims bzhin du dkrol 'khor gyi/ gsang ba chen po bstan par bya/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas sa ni the tshom med// dri dang ldan zhing yid 'ong ba/ bum
85a8(rgyud): pa'i chu ni blangs nas ni/ snying po 'di yis dbang skur bya/ sdug bsngal rab tu 'khrung ba'i mchog/ oM badz+ra a b+hiShi ny+tsa/ de nas phyag rgya gang rung bas/ phreng ba byin nas dbang bskur bya/ 
85b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i mod ni dbang bskur la/ ming gi sgra ni rab spar bya/ oM badz+ra satwa ma b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ badz+ra na ma a b+hi She ka ta he badz+ran ma// slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// rdo rje blon med/ 
85b2(rgyud): de la ye shes bslab par bya// bzhi las gang yang rung ba ni/ bskal pa ji bzhin dri bar bya/ gal te nor gyi dngos grub smra// de ni rnam bzhir bshad par bya// nor gyi ye shes chen po bani/ 
85b3(rgyud): dngos grub rnams ni bslab par bya// gang na gter ni yod re ba/ der ni skyil mo krung bcas te/ snying kar rdo rje bsgoms nas ni/ gter gyi gnas ni rab mthong 'gyur// badz+ra ni d+hi/ na mkha'
85b4(rgyud): rdo rje bsgom bya zhing // me long la ni yang dag blta/ gang du lhung bar mthong 'gyur ba// de na gter ni yod par bstan// tA ni d+hi/ rang gi lce la rdo rje sgom// 'di na yod ces rang nyid
85b5(rgyud): sma /  d+harma ni d+hiHrdo rje las ni yang dag babs/ gang du babs pa der bstan to// karma ni d+hi/ gal te rdo rje'i dngos gru be smra/ rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya/ chu ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin
85b6(rgyud): mthong // shin tu mnyam gzhag dga' bar 'gyur/ chu ni stug po'i rang bzhin mthong // chu yi steng du bcag par 'gyur// badz+ra dza la/ bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan pas// yang dang yang du
85b7(rgyud): dga' bar bya/ bdag nyid dga' ba'i gzugs ni/ bsgoms na de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// badz+ra rU pa/ bdag nyid na mkha'i rang bzhin mtshungs// rang bzhin med pa nyid bsgoms shing // rdo rje
85b8(rgyud): dbab pa skyed byas nas/ myur du mi snang ba nyid 'gyur/ badz+ra A kA sha/ rdo rje'i skas ni namakha' la/ bsgom zhing steng du 'dzeg byas na/ ji srid du ni 'dzeg pa'i gnas/ de srid mkha' la
86a1(rgyud): / 'gro bar 'gyur/ badz+ra ma hA/ rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod smra ba/ ye shes rnam pa'i sbyid par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // dmakha' la ni bdag cing gnas/ 
86a2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dang ldan par// bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya/ rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// gal te chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod// gnas sam yang na gzhan yang rung / bdag nyid gnas par bsgom
86a3(rgyud): na ni// de ltar gnas shing lag pa ru/ rdo rje pad+ma rab sgom zhing // bdag cid rdo rje tshe su te/ pad+ma rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// badz+ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste// bdag nyid las
86a4(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan// na mkha' la gnas bdag nyid ni// las kyi da rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen dang // de bzhin du ni bdag nyid gnas// lag tu rin chen rnams bsgoms
86a5(rgyud): na/  rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ karma d+ha ra/ rat+na d+har// gal te sangs rgyas dngos grub smra// ye shes rnam bzhi brjo da par bya// rtag tu rnamakhar bsgoms nas ni/ lus
86a6(rgyud): ni yang ba nyid 'gyur zhing / rdzu 'phrul gyi ni gnas thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du 'phar// badz+ra rad+hi/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan// rdo rje'i
86a7(rgyud): bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur/ badz+ra badz+ra/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dag/ yan lag pad+ma dang ldan zhing // bdag nyid dag par rab bsgoms nas/ mngon pa
86a8(rgyud): shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/ shur+ya shu/ nyin mtshan brtson 'grus dang bcas pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa' yi/ dbying su bzhugs par bsams na ni/ rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ 
86b1(rgyud): khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni// sangs rgyas gzugasu mos byas nas// brtan par rje su dran grub na// sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba yin// satwa satwa/ bung d+ha bud d+ha/ gang tshe gsang ba'i
86b2(rgyud): lha mor 'gyur/ de yi rigs kyi lha ru 'gyur// ye shes dag pa brjod bya zhing / de la mna' yang bsgrag par bya/ ji skad gsang mdo dbang gsungs pa/ de bzhin b+ha gar gzhug par bya// yid
86b3(rgyud): kyis thams cad bcug nas ni// de yi lus ni mnyam du spro// pi bskyod thugs ka nas byung ste/ rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// sangs rgyas kun ni mnyam
86b4(rgyud): du spro// ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te// mnyam par gzhag/ pas pheg rdob bya/ rdo rje thal mo'i'o theg brdabs pas/ dngos grub thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ badz+ra pA sha rin
86b5(rgyud): dbang thugs kha nas byung te// rnam par snang mdzad thugs kan sa/ sangs rgyas kun ni bcug nas kyang / bdag nyid rdo rje'i lha mo ru/ rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni// rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'thil
86b6(rgyud): brdab bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub bya zhing // rdo rje ye shes yang dag brdag/ rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ de bzhin du ni b+ha gar zhugs/ rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni/ sor mo'i rtse mos mnyam du brdag
86b7(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // rtag tu nyon mongs dang 'brel pa/ nyon mongs zhes bya'i sgrib pa dag skad cig gis ni rigs brgya 'joms/ badz+ra ha na/ de bzhin b+ha gar gnas nas ni/ 
86b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku ni mnyam du spro// rdo rje lha mor rang bdag nyid/ rnam par snang mdzad thugs kar gnas/ rdo rje lha mo bcings nas ni badz+ra badz+ra lan gnyis brjod/ rdo rje bsdams pa nges bkrol
87a1(rgyud): na/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog badz+ras pa/ de nus rnam par snang mdzad sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag d+ha nA~M/ sngar gyi ting 'dzin ji bzhin du/ rdo rje dbyas
87a2(rgyud): ni rab tu bya/ rnal 'byor lnga la'ang rab tu gnas/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro maM/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko na~M/ oM ya thAs
87a3(rgyud): ta thA ga ta ta thA a haM/ rnal 'byor lnga po 'di yis ni// phyag rgya lnga ni yang dag sgrub/ rnam par snang mdzad rang bdag nyid// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thang
87a4(rgyud): kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyag rgya rnamaso// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug ste/ rdo rje gsor la bzung bar bya/ sku dang ga sung thug phyag rgya dag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rang nyid
87a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ badz+ra satwa haM/ sgrub pa dag gi mchog chen po// de na sa yang dag bshad par bya/ rang nyid rdo rje gsung gi bshad// rdo rje rnal 'byor sgrub par bya/ sdom bcas rdo rje
87a6(rgyud): gsor nas ni// rdo rje snyem tshul yang dag gzung // rdo rje dbab par rang gyur nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje zhi byar sgom// badz+ra satwa haM/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan zhing // dkyil 'khor ma lus ston
87a7(rgyud): mdzad pa/ phreng ba'i rnam pa 'od dang ldan// rgyan dang gos dang kha dog ldan// Da ba ta ni brjod bya zhing / sems dpa' chen po rjes dran bya/ ye shes sems dpa' gos pa med// dga' dag ji srid
87a8(rgyud): mthong bar du/ badz+ra satwa dr-i sh+ye/ sems dpa' mdun du ltas nas ni// bdag nyid la ni yang dag bab/ oM badz+ra satwa a/ sdug cing che ba'i sku de ni/ rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug/ dzaHhUM
87b1(rgyud): ho rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yi// bdag nyid chen pos lta bar bya/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka ru/ slar yang de yi snying kar gzhug/ sa ma ya a/ zhes brjod nas ni rnal 'byor pa/ zla ba dang
87b2(rgyud): ldan steng du gnas/ ci 'dod pa yi bya ba byed/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsgrub par bya/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ji bzhin/ de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i// rdo rje can kun
87b3(rgyud): sgom par bya/ gang dag gang la mos gyur pa// de bzhin snying po bzla bar bya/ rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje can dang mtshungs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rjes dran rab grub nas/ chos kyi 'khor
87b4(rgyud): lo rab bskor bya// gang dag gang lams gyur pa// de banan spang ba bzla bar bya/ rnga rje'i sbyar ba 'ang / rang gi phyag rgya yo ngas 'dzin pa'i/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thug grub pas/ 
87b5(rgyud): 'khor lo sbyar ba nyid thob 'gyur/ rgyal po bya ba sngon 'gro bas// mnyes pa dang ni dbang bskur bya// thun ni yongasu rdzod pa dang / chos kyi bzhad dang dga' bar gyur// ting 'dzin gzungs kyi
87b6(rgyud): ka 'khor lo dang // gsang ba'i mdzod ni bla na med// smin pa dang ni grol ba nyid/ sang+yas byang chub snyan pa'i mchog/ rtog pa gsang chen 'di las ni// phyag rgya grangs med yang dag byung // rig kyi dbye
87b7(rgyud): ba yang dag ldan// rgya cher rab tu bsgrags pa yin// ge cha ma bgos snod mi 'gyur/ le lo khro dang g.yeng bcas pas// nges par 'dzin par mi nus te/ de bas nyung bar rab tu bsgrags// mdo sde'i dbang
87b8(rgyud): bo gsang rgyal po// de nas phyag rgya rab tu bshad/ theg pa chen po mngon par rngog/ rin chen snod du lta bar bya/ ye shes kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdzogaso// rdo 'chang rnams kyi snying po/ gang las 'khro
88a1(rgyud): / lo yang dag byung / rnal 'byor thams cad kun 'byung ba/ mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya/ dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag bshad/ rnam 'phrul zhes ni rab tu bsta/ 
88a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul te// 'khor lo thabs ni rab ston pa// 'khor lo lnga ru yang dag bshad/ thabs ni rnam pa lnga yang yin// gsang ba yi ni dbye ba gnas// 'khor lo yi ni rnam
88a3(rgyud): 'phrul ston// dbus ma gang yin byang chub sems/ shar gyi sdu ba rnam pa bzhi/ lho yi tshig su bshad pa ste// bsod nams chon dang yang dag ldan// ting 'dzin dang gzungs dang rnams dang / chosu
88a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// nub tu yang dag brjod pa yin/ byang ni sen smin byas te/ phyi rol grwa bzhi gang yin pa/ tshad med pa ni bani dang bcas/ byams pa snying rje btang snyoms dang // dga' ba
88a5(rgyud): zhes ni bya bar bshad/ gang zhig thig srung yang dag bshad// chos kyi rgyun gyi lam las byung / lta ba thang rnam ngag 'di/ ga pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs/ gang zhig kha khyer na
88a6(rgyud): bya bag/ ting 'dzin chos nyid dag pa ste/ rdo lha mor yang dag bshad// gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya bar bshad// sgo ru yang dag bshad pa gang / tha ra ba'i sgo ni bzhi po yin// rta babs dang ni dra ba nyid// chos
88a7(rgyud): mdzod rang bzhin grong khyer yin// dra ba dra phyed bla re ni// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pa/ tshon rtsi yang dag bshad pa dang / de 'dra ba yi byang chub tshegs/ gang zhig mar ma yang dag bshad // de ni chos
88a8(rgyud): kyi snang ba mchog / dri ru yang dag bshad pa gang / grags pa'i dri ni bla na med/ rdzu 'phrul byug pa gang yin pa// tshul khrims dri yis byugs pa yin// bza' ba dag ni sna tsher pa/ chos kyi zas ni bla
88b1(rgyud): na med// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bar bshad// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ grong khyer du ni bshad pa gang / de ni thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad// chos
88b2(rgyud): kyi snying po rang bzhin grong // nang med ces ni bya bar brjod/ de ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dbus rnam snang mdzad ces pa// chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyal po gtso bo
88b3(rgyud): ched/ phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bshad/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin mchog/ de bas rgyal po byang chub sems// byang chub sa#
88b4(rgyud): ga []/ sems ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya/ sgrol dang grol dang dbugs dbyung dang / mya ngan 'da' bar lug kyu'o// rdo rje chags par yang dag bshad// byang chub
88b5(rgyud): spyod pa la sbyor ba/ rdo rje legs par yang dag bshad// rab tu sbyor ba ston pa nyid// rdo rje rin chen yang dag bshad// sen bsam pa yongs rdzogs shing // rdo gzi brjid yang dag bshad
88b6(rgyud): chos kyi sbyor ba 'od byed pa// rdo rgyal mtshan yang dag bshad// sems can 'khor ba las grol byed// rdo rje bzhad par yang dag bshad// sems can the tshom gcod par byed// rdo chosu
88b7(rgyud): yang dag bshad// chos kyi ye shes bla na med// rdo rnon por yang dag bshad/ nyon mongs gcod cing 'joms byed pa/ rdo rje rgyu ru yang dag bshad/ 'khor lo rnam 'phrul sngon byed pa/ 
88b8(rgyud): rdo smra bar yang dag bshad/ rdo rje chos ni sten byed pa'i// rdo la su yang dag bshad/ sen 'dul bar byed pa'i mchog rdo rje srung bar yang dag bshad// san grol bar byed pa'i mchog rdo rje
89a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin yang dag bshad/ 'khor ba'i zhags pa za byed pa/ rdo rje khu tshur yang dag bshad// byang chub mchog ni brtan par byed// rdo rje sems ma rdo chos// rin chen las
89a2(rgyud): kyi rdo rje ma// rdo rje rin chen chos chen po// las kyi gsang ba las byung ba// rdo rje lha mo lhag par brgyad// pha rol phyin mchog lhag ma brgyad// chos ma shes rab pha rol phyin// las ma thabs kyi mchog yin no// 
89a3(rgyud): pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ni// sa bcu dag tu yang dag bshad// dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung // byang chub sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/ e ma'o ye shes e ma'o chos/ e ma'o thar pa'i grong khyer
89a4(rgyud): mchog e ma'o rnam 'phrul 'khor lo no// thub pa'i dbang phyug dag gis bstan// chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mgon pos thar pa par dgod par mdzad/ gang du sangs rgyas rgal gyur nas// sems
89a5(rgyud): can rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad/ 'di ni chos kyi rang / bzhin grub/ 'di chos rang bzhin shing rta ste/ chos kyi rang bzhin snying po ste/ 'di chos rang bzhin grong khyer yin/ de kho na nyid mchog
89a6(rgyud): tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje rtse mo las de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa dang po rdzog so// 
89a7(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad bla na med// de nas gsang ba bshad par bya// rdo rje'i rigs pa 'dzin pa ni/ bdag nyid kyis ni sbyar bar bya/ cho ga ji lta bu bzhin du/ phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya/ ci rigs par
89a8(rgyud): ni bcing bya yi// gzhan du myur du 'grub mi 'gyur// thal mo mnyam pa bcing bya ste// sngon la thal mo mnyam par bya// de nas rdo rje thal mo bcings/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar bya// sor mo rdo/ 
89b1(rgyud): rje bsdams bcing nas/ snying po brjod cing dral bar bya// de nas phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom meng // badz+ra ban+d+ha tra tha/ 'di ni sngon du brjod bya zhing // de nas phyag rgya yang dag
89b2(rgyud): bcing // gang gi drung du bcings pa ni// bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs/ sa ma ya sa tra haM/ shes rab can gyi dbab pa bsam/ bdag la sems dpa' dbab par bya// dam tshig phyag rgya bcing
89b3(rgyud): nas ni// snying po yang ni brjod par bya/ a phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi ni// yan lag kun la yongasu gnas// snying po brjod par bya ba ste/ snying po 'di dag nyid yin no// sa ma ya haM/ de nas bdag nyid kyi
89b4(rgyud): rlabs nas// rang lha yang dag rje su dran// snying po 'di ngag nyid kyis ni// snying po brjod par bya ba yin/ sa ma ya sa twA ya d+hi tiSh+Tha sA maM/ phyag rgya sgrub pa lhur len pa// de nas shes rab ca
89b5(rgyud): gyis sgrug/ dam tshig sems dpa' chen po dag/ rnam pa bzhin bsgrub par bya// de la 'di rnams kyi gsad pa'i snying po ni// aHsad+mo/ badz+ra so ng+ge/ badz+ra bir/ bad+d+ha sa/ de nas phyag rgya brtan par byed pa
89b6(rgyud): ni/ oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra sarba twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-idri D+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ga su po Sho me b+ha ga a nu rak+to me b+ha ga sarba sid+d+ham+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shri yaH/ ku ru hA/ 6
89b7(rgyud): ha ho/ b+ha ga wA/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA me muny+tsa badz+ri b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH/ mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // rdo rje senga' dang 'drar 'gyur// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing // thams cad
89b8(rgyud): 'grub par the tshom med// de nas thad dgrel pa ni thun mong yin no// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// tha mar bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ sor me'i rtse mos phreng ba che// rnam bzhi yang na rnam pa
90a1(rgyud): gsum/ oM badz+ra rat+ne a b+hi Shany+tsa/ shes rab can gyis go cha bcing // ci nus par ni dbang bskur bya// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ phyag rgya thad brtan par bya/ badz+ra ka ba tse na pa/ 
90a2(rgyud): gang nas byung ba der grol te// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// gnas de ru ni dgrol bar bya// gzhan du bya ba mi bye'o// oM badz+ra muH/ mgon po thal mo mnyes bya zhing // rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya// snying po
90a3(rgyud): 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rdo rje can kun mnyes par bya/ badz+ra tuSh+Ta ho// cho ga 'di yis dgrol bya ste/ phyag rgya dgrol ba mchog yin no// phyag rgya thams cad brtan gyur nas// rdo rje can ni mnyes par 'gyur/ 
90a4(rgyud): snga dro'i dus nyin re zhing / shin tu bsdams shing gsang b.ra'agyur/ rdo sems dpa' ci 'dod bzlas/ bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// badz+ra sa te/ gsang ba'i yi ge hUM bzlas/ 
90a5(rgyud): pas// rnam pa lnga ni mthong bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyi la 'khor dbusu ni/ zla ba gnyis pa yongasu sgom/ dag
90a6(rgyud): nyid sangs rgyas dang ldan pa// rdo rje'i dbusu bsgom par bya// mdor na rdo rje'i dbus ni/ yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya// rdo'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// yi ge hUM ni bsgrub par bya/ hUM de ltar rnam pa bcu drug ni/ phyag
90a7(rgyud): mtshan thaMd rab tu sgom// zla ba'i dbus rab sbyor bas/ bdag nyid thams cad skad cig 'grub/ yang na yi ge sbyor bas ni// dbusu sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// zla ba yi ni sbyor ba yis/ yi ge dza sogs 'grub
90a8(rgyud): ma 'gyur// yi ge ho dang sa dang ni// yi ge oM sogs rab sbyor bas// zla ba la ni oM a traM/ yi ga haM ni rab tu sgrub/ hri dang d+hi dang ma ba ra/ kaM haM hUM ba~M bsgrub par bya// rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag gis// rdo bzlas
90b1(rgyud): bas 'grub par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ bcu drug bdag nyid rab sbyor bas/ rnal 'byor rgyud du bsgrub bya zhing / zla ba'i dbusu bsgom par bya// de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
90b2(rgyud): ni// nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te// bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bya// rdo rje can rnams bzod par gsol// phyag rgya thad bcing bya zhing / rdo rje thal mos mnyes par
90b3(rgyud): bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// thams cad byas nas gdon par bya// lan gsum dang ni lan bdun du/ bskor ba dag kyang rab tu bya/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// mkhas pa yis ni dral bar
90b4(rgyud): bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// 'khor lo'i dbusu steng du bcing // gang gis sems ni ngag gyur pa// phyag rgya thams da yang dag bcing // oM badz+ra muHsnying po 'di ni brjod
90b5(rgyud): na su// phyag rgya thad steng du bcing / sgo dang phyi rol mchod pa la// rdo rje'i mu ni brjod par bya// gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba che// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ shes rab can gyis kun mi bstan/ 
90b6(rgyud): sdom dang ldan pa mchog la sbyin/ shin tu snod ldan pha rol la/ de ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs te// lag pa g.yasu rdo rje ste/ g.yon du dril bu sbyin par bya// rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gsang chen po/ snying po
90b7(rgyud): 'di ni sbyin par bya// de byin snying kar 'dzin du gzhug/ thaMd sgrub pa'i mchog yin no// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // phyag na
90b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha staM d+ha ra yA mi badz+ra sAtwa/ hi hi hi ho hU~M/ de nas thams cad mtshungs pa ru// phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor dgrol bar bya/ 
91a1(rgyud): badz+ra satwa muH/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba rdzogaso// ji ltar cho gar rab ldan nyid// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// de bzhin kun tu bsgrub pa
91a2(rgyud): bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis// rnal 'byor gyi ni rgyud bsdus pa/ mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur// e ma'o sangs rgyas mgon po che// spyod pa spyad
91a3(rgyud): phyir byung ba ste/ chos kyi mgon po rnal 'byor che// rgyud rnams thams cad yang dag byud/ sangs rgyas med cing sems dpa' med/ rnal 'byor rnal 'byor sgrub pa med// sa dang gsang ba
91a4(rgyud): med de// de bzhin gdul ba'i don du byung // sangs rgyas mchog dang dam tshig mchog/ sems dpa' mchog gi sgrub pa dang // gsang mchog sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog rdo rje rnal 'byor yang
91a5(rgyud): dag byung // yon tan mchog dran dam chog rnams kyi mchog/ yon mtsha dran dbu rgyan dam pa ste// grag chen dang ldan spyod pa mchog 'dzin pa/ yon tan mchog ldan rnams kyi spyod
91a6(rgyud): pa mchog/ rdo rje chen po rab bsdams can// rnal 'a byor chen po spyod pa chen po spyod// gsang ba chen po'i yon tan 'dzin mdzad pa/ bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung ba gsol/ yon tan mchog dran
91a7(rgyud): ldan bcod pan mchog/ dam tshig tshogs mchog 'byung bas brgyan gyur pa/ mi g.yo rab mchog mchog ster dri ma med// spyod mchog spyod pa'i mchog ste dri ma meng // tshogs kyi bskor ba shin
91a8(rgyud): tu gzhang mdzad pa// gnod byed 'joms pa tra Ta traT sgrogs// g.yo byad skyed pa'i band cing bzhad par mdzad/ yon tan mchog drag tsal tsa la pa/ had ha da pa ya gnod mdzes 'joms/ 
91b1(rgyud): ha ra ha ra ha re ha re las mchog 'joms// gnas chen po ni stobs kyi grub mdzad pa/ rig mchog stobs kyi grol zhing sgrol mdzad pa/ ha ha ha ha ha hA ha ha hA/ hi hi hI hi ho hA hi hi hi hi tsi hA/ 
91b2(rgyud): hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/ rab mchog bdag nyid mkhas pas 'dren gyur pa/ Ta Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti TaT Ti Ta Ta TI TaT TITA TA Ti Ta Ta TI/ TaT nu Tu/ D+ya n+da Ta Ta Ta D+ha T+Tan+dan+ya Te/ rgyan gyi spyod pa 'angar zhing 'dir bar mdzad/ 
91b3(rgyud): spyod pa spyod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/ spyod pa spyod byed rab mchog bdag nyid ce na/ dam tshig rgyan te rig drug mchod gyur pa/ bdag po chen po 'phrog byed 'jom par mdzad/ phrog byed sgrub
91b4(rgyud): pa rnams ni grub mdzad pa// mchog gsol mtsha/ ga gi bdag nyid yang dag byung / ta te ta te bstan pa'i spyan mang 'a ba/ yi ge dza las rab byung mchog ni ster ba hU~M ni dang po las
91b5(rgyud): sbyor ba/ ho ci 'dod chags mchog ldan bud med bston byengs ni len par ba ster ba/ oM ni dang po bla med TaT Ta Tis a ni ga zo brjid rab 'bar ga/ tra tra rjesu chags pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs byed
91b6(rgyud): ha ni bzhad pa yang dag sbyor/ hri ni chos can byed cing rab rno dri med hi ni rgyu'i 'khor lo che// haM dang ra ni mkha' dgyes smra ba'i sbyor ba 'ching byed a ni sna tshogs byed// ha ni srung ba tra ta 'ges byed/ 
91b7(rgyud): Ta ta Ti sa ni hUM ni za zhing 'cha'/ be ni dga' byed dga' ste cha ta tsha tiT ni rab dga' byed/ nyon rdo rje bstan pa dang bcas bde bstan 'dod chags bcas pa dga' byed do// he ni mgon po skye ba mchog
91b8(rgyud): rgyur gyur hr-i ni dga' ba bdag nyid can/ ho ni spyod pa 'gong byed dul spong mchog ste dus gsum mgon pos bskor gyur pa// gsang zhing gsang ba'i yon tan kun mchog dri mang nyon byang chub spyod/ 
92a1(rgyud): pa mchog/ mchog gi mchog ste mchog gsol go 'phang mchog thob yi ge hUM ni gsel ba mchog/ nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 'joms shing rab 'phro hUM gi mche ba'i ma
92a2(rgyud): chad ldan// sna tshogs dga' ba mchog gis rnam par rgyan mdzes yi ge oM dang yang dag spe la/ he he hi ni yod 'ong hUM gis sna tshogs 'joms// gnod mdzes nges 'joms bdag nyid can// bde ma
92a3(rgyud): glu dang rol mo dang bcas pa// gzugs bzang dang ldan lha mo rnams kyis mchod// zla ba ltar dkar 'phro ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ rdo rje gsang ba 'i yon tan brtsegs pas mtshan// rin chen kun
92a4(rgyud): gyis rnam spras yid 'ong ba// rin chen dra ba'i bla res rnam par ma/ dzes// rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod cing mdzes// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ni 'jigs med pa// sa rnams su
92a5(rgyud): gyis rnam spyang dri med pa/ byang chub spyod pa yongs rtogs bdag nyid can/ chos mdzad yongasu rtogs pa'i zas dang ldan// bsod nams de yis bskyed pa'i dga' ba che// tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor gru bzhir la
92a6(rgyud): dag gnas// chos mchog go rims bzhin du thig btab pas// 'khor lo mu khyud rab tu mdzes bris pa/ rdo'i dkyil 'khor la ni gtso bo bzhugs// ting 'dzin mchog rnams kha khyer gyis mdzes pa/ 
92a7(rgyud): gzungs kyi lha yi tshogs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs// thar pa'i theg pas byams pa'i sgo yis brgyan/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/ rol phyin sa btsun mo gar byed pa/ sems can
92a8(rgyud): smin byed rnam par 'phrul la dga'// bsam gtan zas ldan mngon shes mchog gis brgyan// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/ dkyil 'khor de ni gtso bo'i chos nyid can/ 
92b1(rgyud): nyid bstan pa'i snying po kun zhugs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs 'dus mdzes pa yis// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes byar bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam po che// gsang
92b2(rgyud): ba kun 'byung ting 'dzin yang dag gnas// de ni rnam snang thub pa'i chos nyid gzigs// gzungs dang dam tshig yang dag 'byung ba mchog/ dga' ba'i chos bzhin rdo rje yang dag gnas// de ni rnam snang
92b3(rgyud): thub pa'i dbang phyug gtso// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nges par phyung / hUM shin tu dag pa'i chos nyid lta bur byung / sang+yas dbang phyug dam pa'i kun gyi mchog/ rtse gcig dang bcas e ma'o dga'
92b4(rgyud): ba che// sangs sku yang bud med gzugs can te// sems can khams ni gdul phyir yang dag gnas// bud med gzugs kyang chos nyid dag pa ste/ sangs kun gyi gdung rgyur gnas gyur pa/ rang
92b5(rgyud): gi rigs chen byung ba des byung mdzod// oM badz+ra d+ha ti hU~M/ oM badz+ra badz+ra NA hUM/ oM rat+na badz+ri NI hUM/ oM d+harma badz+ri NI hUM/ oM karma badz+ri NI hUM/ mchog gi dang po rmang byung gsang ba lnga/ sangs
92b6(rgyud): rgyas lngas byas bud med gzugs can te// rmad byung dang bcas dbang phyug dam par gnas// rdo rje gsang chos nyid kyi gsang ba mchog/ 'khor lo'i sbyor bas kyang ni bzhugs gyur pas/ rdo'i
92b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis ni shar du bzhugs// de ni rigs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor brjod/ re re zhing yang rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan/ rnal 'byor 'khor lor yongasu bshad pa mchog/ de yi mi skyong/ 
92b8(rgyud): mchog tu byung ba yi// mchog tu gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor gsung // oM badz+ra satwa gu h+ya sa ma ya hUM/ oM gu h+ya badz+ra saM aM ku sha hAM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya sa d+hi shwa ri hUM/ rdo rin chen
93a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bstan gyur pa/ de yi slar yang snying po bani gsung ba/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ra t+ne sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya pri bi hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hA dzA gra gu h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gud hA sa hUM/ dzaM chos
93a2(rgyud): ni dbang phyug dam pa che// de yi slar yang snying po bzhi gsung so// oM badz+ra d+harma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra g+he Sha gu h+ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ye maN+Da le hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya dza ba sa ma ya hUM/ oM rdo rje las ni yongasu
93a3(rgyud): dag pas mchod/ 'khor lo tha~Mng la ni yongs gnas mdzes// chos mchog dbang phyug dam pa mchog gyur pa// de yos snying po bzhi ni gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra guh+ya
93a4(rgyud): ka ba tsa hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya daMSh+Ta d+hA ra NI hUM/ oM ba dz+ra gu h+ya muSh+Ti hUM/ sngar bzhin 'khor lo'i grong khyer yongs gnas pa/ rdo rje'i gzugasu yongs gnas mdzes gyur pa// de nyid sang+yas sras
93a5(rgyud): te rdo rjer bcas/ 'on kyang de ltar bud med gzug su sprul/ de dag srid pa dag byed rab tu 'bar/ thar pa'i grong du 'dod cha/  dag byed pa/ rtog dang rnam par rtog pa zlog pas dag chos
93a6(rgyud): la dga' zhing sku mchog 'byung ba gyur pa/ bden dang mi bden rnam dag nyi shu dang / chos dang chos min dga' zhing dga' ba'i snod// byed dang byed min rdo rje tha dad gcig/ rdo tha dad bstan pa ho yis
93a7(rgyud): rab sbyangs yod/ gsang 'byor rin chen las byas chos grong ste/ rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di nam pa mngon// rdo bla ra'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// gsang dbang rdo rje chen po yis// thar pa'i rang bzhin
93a8(rgyud): grong khyer mdzad/ san kun la phan don du/ 'khor lo lnga ni yang dag byung / de bzhin gshegs rigs zhes bya dang / mi phyed brtan par byed pa dang / byang chub spyod pa rab spyod mchog/ theg pa chen po
93b1(rgyud): tshul gyi mchog/ gdul bya ji bzhin 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gtso bo'i spyod pa ji bzhin lhan cig spyod// sen gdul bya ma yin snod mchog min// mthu chen rnams ni dngos grub rtsol mi
93b2(rgyud): mdzad// der ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag yon tan mang po yang dag byung // sen rnams ni gdul bya'i phyir/ rdo'i btsun mo dag las byung // de nyid sangs rgyas sras bcas pa/ de nyid 'khor lo'i grong khyer rtse// 
93b3(rgyud): mchod pa sgo srung dang bcas pa// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag byung / mgon po rdo rje gsang dbang phyug rdo dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yi// rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog sngon
93b4(rgyud): ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis// de bzhin dbusu rab tu ga nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs yin te// gsang ba'i sbyor ba yang dag byung // rdo rje dbyings ni ji skad brjod/ de nyid gsang ba lnga
93b5(rgyud): byar brjod// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ rgyas par phyag rgya dang bcas par// 'khor lo lnga yi dkyil 'khor ma cho ga/ rgyas pa ru ni yang dag bshad/ mdo sde'i gsang dbang rgyal
93b6(rgyud): po ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// gsang ba'i rgyud dang phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zla ba dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni// de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad// rdo dbyings kyi
93b7(rgyud): snying rab mchog/ mdor na drug tu bshad pa yin// dam chos spyod pa dang ldan pa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ nus pa ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin// ji ltar spyod pa dkyil 'khor mchog / ci rigs
93b8(rgyud): par ni cho ga bzhin/ mchog tu rmang byung bshad par bya// sngon la de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/ sems dpa' nga yis dbye bar bya// nga yis mdo sde gsang dbang bshad// gang du byis pa dag
94a1(rgyud): rmongs pa/ rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu drug ni// gsang ba nges par bslab par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
94a2(rgyud): dbu su ni// rkang lag thal sbyar rdo rje ni// kha gyes pa ni bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje can yang chags par bya// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// zla ba gcig tu yongasu bsdu// rdo'i dbang phyug lha mo nga // 
94a3(rgyud): dbus ma la ni yongasu gzung // sgeg pa dang bcas 'gro bya zhing // rnar 'phrul pas bzhin rmongs bya// sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ rdo rje can yang mnyes par bya// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas
94a4(rgyud): nas ni// spyi bor thal mo sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings nasu / bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlab/ sgom pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sku yi phyag rgya rnam par bcing // lag ngar lcags kyur
94a5(rgyud): bskum bya zhing // bdag nyid yongasu bsgrub par bya/ de bzhin sgo ma pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo'i mda' ni kun tu gang // lag pas log so zhes bya zhing // dpung pas bdag nyid go bag
94a6(rgyud): bya// slar yang gsang bar bya ba ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni/ bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu gnas// gsang ba lha mo'i dbang phyug mchog de bzhin lag ngar bkug bya zhing // spyi bor rdo bsam
94a7(rgyud): par bya// phyoT gcig tu ni nga 'dug ste/ rdo rje gnyis kyi go cha bya// thams cad rdo rje'i lus yin te/ rin chen mig ni yongs gsal ba/ gdong dang tshig ni pad+ma dang // me tog kun 'dar bsgom par bya// 
94a8(rgyud): byis pa bzhin du mig bskyod cing // bud med rgyu mtshan yang dag sgrub// smin ma bskyod cing khor gnyer gtsigs// khro bo'i lta bas mig gdangs pa// khro bo'i lta ba 'dod chags che// 'dzum bcas
94b1(rgyud): mig ni btsum par bya// mig gdangs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ rdo rje'i lta bas bgrad par bya/ slar yang tshig ni rnam pa bzhi/ ho ni rkan dang lkog ma la/ dza ni lce yi dbus dang rtse// oM ni lkog ma
94b2(rgyud): mchu dag la// mchu dang mchu yi rtsa la baM/ de rnams gsang ba rab rgyas pa/ bskad dang spros dang bcad pa dang / bcing ba rdo rje tshig gis bya// de bzhin kho nar zla dbus na// phyag na rdo rje'i rang
94b3(rgyud): bzhin nyid// rin chen chos dang de bzhin las/ gsang ba'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ cho ga thang rgyas pa ru/ rdo rje gsang ba rje su srung / ji ltar rnal 'byor yang dag gnas// de bzhin gsang
94b4(rgyud): mchog 'dzin pa gnas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bla na med// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag gan sa// rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya/ dpa' bo rdo rje sangal
94b5(rgyud): ni// phyi rol las grol yang dag gnas// langs sam yang na'adug kyang rung // rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// theg pa chen po'i tshul dag pa// spyod pa chen po tshul chen po// bdag nyid
94b6(rgyud): chos chen rab bsgoms na// rdo'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'du byed sdug bsngal chen po las// dga' ba'i spyod pas spro bar bya// snying rje chen pos dmigs nas ni// sen btang snyoms ngor
94b7(rgyud): mi bya// lce ni dkan la sbyar bya zhing // sna yi rtse mor bsgom par bya// rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sna yi rtse mor de bzhin gnas/ snying ka'i spyi bo ci nus par// su ni thaMd yongasu ste/ rdo rje phra
94b8(rgyud): mo'i bde reg pas// sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur// rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje ste/ rdo rje'i dbusu bsgom par bya/ rdo rje bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ rdo rje phra mo yongasu spro// rang gi
95a1(rgyud): lus kyi mdun du ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dbus// rdo rje kun gyi dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus ni/ lte bar
95a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya/ rdo rje rnam bsgoms sems gang zhig/ gzugs med bstan du med pa dang // rmongs pa med cing 'jigs pa med// rdo phra
95a3(rgyud): mor 'dir brjod do// dngos po med cing rdzas med pas// snang ba meng par rab tu sgom// bdag med sen med pa ru/ rnal 'byor pas ni rnal 'byor sgom// lus ni rdzas lnga'i bdag nyid can// kham
95a4(rgyud): bzhi la ni yang dag brten// skye mched bcu gnyis nyid dang ni/ gzhan yang khams ni bco brgyad dag/ sha dang rus pa khrag nyid dang // rkang dang glad pas kun tu khyab/ sna tshon rdzas kyis
95a5(rgyud): kun tu khyab/ khang kan mkhris pa la sogs tshogs// sna chog sa srin bu'i rigs kyis khyab/ dri ngan mi gtsang 'byung ba ru// / rang gi lus la so sor brtag/ sdug bsngal gtsu
95a6(rgyud): ni kun 'byung bar/ nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni// lus ni rje su dran pa sgom rang sems sor brtag bya ste/ gang zhig de ru yang dag byung // 'gro ba med cing song ba med// de la 'pho ba yod ma yin// de
95a7(rgyud): la 'byung ba yod min pa// gang las sems ni yang dag byung // yang dag ma yin kun rtog 'di/ brdzun bzhin sems ni rmongs par byed// sems med tsam yang yod ma yin// brdzun bzhin
95a8(rgyud): 'byung bar snang bar 'gyur// 'di la gnas dang mtshan nyid dang // rab gnas 'byung ba yod ma yin// gzung bar dga' ba gti mug che// rdo rje phra mor brjod par bya// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis// sems
95b1(rgyud): sgom pa yi rnam pa bani// lus dang sems dang tsher ba dag/ phra mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya// suk+Sh+ma badz+ra/ rdo rje reg pa'i mtshan ma yi// gnas ni yang dag shes par bya// de ni byung na spro bya ste// stong gsum du
95b2(rgyud): ni yongasu spro/ s+pha ra Na badz+ra/ reg pas sbyor ba bsdu bya ste// skrag cing rmongs par mi bya'o// gnas ga sum du yang bsdu bya ste// blo yis so sor brtag par bya// saM ha ra Na badz+ra/ chos la dmigs pa'i sems
95b3(rgyud): nyid ni/ rmongs shing gzhom par mi bya'o// rdo rje de ni brtan bya zhing // rdo phra mo reg par bya/ badz+ra dri D+ha tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje sanga' 'jigs meng pa// rgyal po tshangs pa'i gtsug pud can// spyi bor sanga' bsgom bya zhing // sku ni
95b4(rgyud): tha yongasu spro/ badz+ra at+ma ka/ dpral bar rdo rje rin chen ni// mnyam pa/ ra gzhag pas bsgom par bya/ mtshan ma dag ni spro bya zhing / sams dpa' kun yang spro bar bya// badz+ra rat+na at+mA// 
95b5(rgyud): rdo rje chos ni shin tu dag sA la~M nr-i mor bsgom par bya// de lo mtshan ma spro bya zhing / lus rnams kun yang spro bar bya/ badz+ra bad+hA swA twA ka/ lus kun la ni yang dag phyag chos kyi dbyings ni ye
95b6(rgyud): sgoms// da yi mtshan ma spo bya zhing // sada' kun yang spro bar bya/ sarba badz+ra at+ma ka/ sems dpa' de bzhin rin chen las// chos ni spyi bor bsgom par bya// da yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing // sku ni thang yongasu
95b7(rgyud): spro// sarba badz+ra/ sna la lcags kyu yang dag gnas// blo ldan mi yis bsam par bya/ sangs rgyas thang gzhug bya zhing // rang gi lus ni brtan par bya// snying kha 'dod chags gnasu ni// 'dod cha/ 
95b8(rgyud): rnam par dag pa bsam// sangs rgyas tha~Mng mnyes bya ste// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par 'gyur// leg so zhes pa gzung bya ste/ spyi bor yang dag gnas pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thang mnyes bya
96a1(rgyud): zhing // chos kyi dbyings ni yongasu spro/ hring badz+ra ma ku sha/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra rA ga hri nga ye/ a ngi badz+ra du'i/ snying khar rdo rje nyi ma ni// blo ldan mi yis bsgom par bya/ 'od kyi gzi brjid smra
96a2(rgyud): bya zhing // 'jig rten kun kyang spro bar bya/ spyi bor 'khri shing 'od bcas pa/ rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam par bsam// rin tshan char dag spro bya zhing // snod kyi sprin ni yang dag spro/ bzhad pas bde ba bsams
96a3(rgyud): nas ni/ shin tu sdug bsngal nges par sbyar/ chos kyi char yang spro bya zhing / snang ba'i sprin yang spro bar bya/ hr-i da ya badz+ra sUr+ya/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra d+ha dzA gre/ hr-i ya badz+ra hA sa/ spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams
96a4(rgyud): nas// ral gri gtso bo bsam par bya/ 'khor ba'i// sdug bsngal bcang bya zhing / sems dpa' thams cad spro ba/ bya// snying kha'i 'khor lo'i gnas ni/ chos kyi rgyu mthun sgom pa
96a5(rgyud): bya sha namakho' kun tu spro bya zhing / chos kyi dbyings ni yid su smai/ de yi rigs las byung ba'i sgra/ shes rab can gyis lce rje bsam/ chos kyi tshig ni spro bya zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu yongasu
96a6(rgyud): spro/ hring badz+ra g+ho Sha/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra hr-i da ya/ pra be sha badz+ra wa gra/ spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams te/ mchod pa'i las ni rnam par bsam/ mchod pa'i phyir ni rdo rje spro/ phyon rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ snying khar rdog ma
96a7(rgyud): nid/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam// sdug bsngal kun las grol byed pa/ go cha'i rnam pa spro bar bya// spyi bo nas btsams rkang 'thil du// rdo bsdams pa bsam par bya// rdo rje'i snying po
96a8(rgyud): gzhug bya zhing / rdo rje'i rang bzhin thams cad s+pho/ yak+Sha pU dza hr-i badz+ra ka ba tsa/ badz+ra muSh+Ti hr-id yaM/ grogs dang grogs min ma lus pa/ 'byung po kun la byams pa ni/ ma lus lus pa med pa ru// mnyam du
96b1(rgyud): khyab par spro bar bya// kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ 'gro ba lnga ru kun tu 'khyam// nyin dang mtshan du rab sbyor bas/ snying rje nyid ni spro bar bya// nyin mtshan dge dang zhe sdang med// sen dge ba don
96b2(rgyud): gnyer gang // rje su yi rang bde chen po/ sems can kun la yongasu spro// rgal bar dka' ba'i lam zhugs shing // sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas pa// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// blo chen
96b3(rgyud): ldan pas btang snyoms gnag/ ma dA ma tri swa ra Na/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya sA ra Na/ sar+b+ba bud d+ha/ pra mo sA ra Na/ ma ho bek+Sha sA ra ta/ na mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsam/ 
96b4(rgyud): sems can mnyam par dmigs pa yis// namakha' su na tu yongasu spro// badz+ra muSh+Ti b+ha ga/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ snying kha rdo rje chos nyid brtan/ don rnams thaMng bsgom par bya/ 
96b5(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni yongasu spro// sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te/ rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs nyid// de ni rang gi bdag nyid sgom// chos kyi dbyings ni yongasu spro// rdo rje phra mo gzhan dang ldan
96b6(rgyud): chos rnams thang rnam sgom pa/ myur du phyogs kun yongasu spro/ snying khar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing / ma hA bo d+hi satwa bi shwa/ bud+d+ha a nu smr-i te bi shwa/ badz+ra pa Ni dar sha ya sa ru paM/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
96b7(rgyud): ni// byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya// sa man+ta b+ha dra bi shwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par bsgoms// badz+ra satwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ rdor
96b8(rgyud): bsnyems pha rol bcas pa/ badz+ra sa twa sa ma ya sa ma d+hi dz+nyA na bi shwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas gzugs rang bdag nyid// ta thA ga ta sa mo haM/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms
97a1(rgyud): 'jug pa/ rdo rje slob dpon ngag gi bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ shes rab can gyis nges par bya/ ma'am par gzhag pa'i sems kyi ni// sangs rgyas rjes
97a2(rgyud): su dran pa bsam// ji bzhin mtshan gyi rgyan pa ru// rtag tu bdag cid rnam par skem/ ji ltar sangs rgyas de bzhin bdag bdag nyid sangs rgyas rtag tu skem// sangs rgyas gang yin de bdag cing / 
97a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas mang por yang dag gnas/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs/ rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni snyom su 'jug pa/ sang+yas kun kyang mnyes par bya/ mas
97a4(rgyud): thA ga tu sa ma sa/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ ji ltar stsas dag tshogs na/ dbang po gnyis ni yang dag gnas/ de ni/ bdag ni drug tu ska maM/ oM badz+ras tra sa ma
97a5(rgyud): ni rdo rje seder mtshungs// rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// nges par 'jig rten pham par bya// khams kyi snying po gang yin dag/ de ni rdul dral dri med
97a6(rgyud): dag bdag ni rdo rje chos nyid du// rtag tu bsgom par bya ba yin/ badz+ra d+harma sa mo haM/ bdag nyid rdo ches dang mtshungs/ rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rje'i ches
97a7(rgyud): ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje'i las ni bdag nyid de// tha dad med cing rtags gcig gis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod de// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// oM badz+ra karma sa mo haM/ bdag ni
97a8(rgyud): rdo rje las dang mtshungs/ rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ nga ni rdo rje rin chen nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang skur pa
97b1(rgyud): rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur// oM badz+ra rat+na sa mo he// bdag ni rdo rje rin chen mtshungs// rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod// rdo rin chen sbyor ba yis// sangs dbang
97b2(rgyud): bskur thob par 'gyur// gzugs gnyis 'brel ba ni dbang po gnyis zhes bya'o// bdag gis lus gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gang yin pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni dbang po gnyis
97b3(rgyud): snyems par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ rdo rje gcig tu mos byas shing / sangs rgyas gzugs dang tshungs pa ru// dbusu bdag nyid sgom par
97b4(rgyud): byad/ na mkha' la ni rdo rje sgom// rdo rje gcig la yongs bsal ba/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi/ dbusu bdag nyid sgom par bya// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rdo rje gcig ni yeng
97b5(rgyud): bsal bas// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyi/ dbusu bdag nyid sgom bar bya/ ci nus par ni byin gyis brlab/ rdo rje gcig ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag
97b6(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing // rin chen bdag nyid dbusu sgom// kun tu rdo rje'i dbus ni// rtag tu bdag nyi da la su sgom/ gtso bo gang dang gtso dag gis/ su
97b7(rgyud): mchog cha byad ji bzhin du// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// sen dam pa de nyid thog/ bdag gtso rdo rje'i tshig brjod cing // rdo rje'i thug su bsam par bya// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ 
97b8(rgyud): 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// yang na sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni// rang dbang du ni rab bshad bya/ ji ltar yid las byung ba bzhin/ rdo'i rnal 'byor rnam par sgom/ sna yi rtse mo la brten nas// sems kyi rgyu
98a1(rgyud): ni yang dag gnas// brgya las rtsa bdun lhag par ni// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// gal te sgom pas dngos grub 'dong // rdo rje sgom pa bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran skye
98a2(rgyud): ba yis// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yang dag gnas// sems dpa' rjes dran sbyor ba yis// gdon mi za bar nges par bya// gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid// bdag nyid rdor bsgom par bya// sku mdog rnal 'byor ji bzhin
98a3(rgyud): du ci rigs par ni sna tshogs bdag/ yang na rdo rje sgom gtso bo// grub pa yang ni bsgom par bya/ e ma'o ngo mtshar rnam 'phrul 'khor lo byA nga // e ma'o ngo mtshar spyod mchog dam pa sprug/ kye ma'i ngo
98a4(rgyud): mtshar gsang mchog gnas thob pa/ bdag ni rdo rje'i rnal 'byor/ sgom pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i sgrub pa ste/ rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub byed pa/ mchod pa sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis/ 
98a5(rgyud): nas mchod pa rab bshad bya// thun pazhi dang ni kha dog bzhi/ dus pa zhib ni rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brjod byed cing // sangs rgyas la ni mchod par bya/ phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su
98a6(rgyud): shing // mchod pa rnams ni yongs spro zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pas// rtag tu yang dag rnal 'byor sgom// mchod la spro ba yang dag sbyor// zhes bya chos ni yongasu spro// ting 'dzin sbyor ba la
98a7(rgyud): gnas te/ chos kyi mchod pa rab tu bya/ oM ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa/ a nut+ta ra pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di// yang dang yang du rab tu bzlas// rdo rje dbyings ni sbyor ba yis// phyag
98a8(rgyud): rgya lnga ni rab tu bya/ so sor rtogs dang mngon rtogs dang / rdo rje de bzhin rdo rje bdag rgyas pa ru ni sngar bshad pa/ rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu skyed// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ma lus pa/ rang gi bdag nyid
98b1(rgyud): bsgoms nas// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// thub pa dbang phyug dag la dbul/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi/ thub la mchod pa phul nas ni/ bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad// bdag gi
98b2(rgyud): khams ni rnam par spros/ byang chub sems ni spros na su// thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yos ni/ mchod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa/ a nut+ma
98b3(rgyud): ra pU dza s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje rin chen spros nas ni// bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad// bdag gi khams ni rnam par spros// rdo rje sngags kyi 'grub par
98b4(rgyud): 'gyur// thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul/ rin chen mchod paM rab spre zhing // bsdams pa'i sbyor ba rab tu sba ba/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a nut+ta ra pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ snga ma ji lta ba
98b5(rgyud): bzhin du// rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin gyis// ji ltar sem sa dpa' phyung ba bzhin// de bzhin bdag ni bsgom par bya/ rang bdag nyid ni bsgom na su/ rmang 'byung chen po yongs
98b6(rgyud): spro zhing // sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ de lta bu la snyems zhugs te/ rdo rje chos ni rab tu byu nga // phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing / sangs rgyas
98b7(rgyud): la dbul bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma/ a nut+ta ra pU dza sA ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/ rdo rje las rnams spro bya zhing // sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / thams cad
98b8(rgyud): du ni spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma a nut+ta ra pA dze s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM/ mchod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// thun pazhi ru ni sgom par bya// mchod pa'i cho gas 'grub 'gyur te/ sdig pa can
99a1(rgyud): / yang 'grub par 'gyur// mchod pa'i las ni bla na med// ci rigs par ni rab bshad bya/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyal por ldan/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba
99a2(rgyud): At+ma nir+yA tA na pA dza s+pha ra Na karma badz+ra a/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya// bdag nyid yang dang yang du ni// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga
99a3(rgyud): ta sarba At+ma ni r+yA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma gri dza/ rdo rje lcags kyu rang bdag nyid// phyogs kun du ni spro bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad nga gug bya zhing / thub pa dag la dbul bar bya// oM sarba
99a4(rgyud): thA ga ta sarba at+ma ni rA ti ni a nu rA ga pU dza s+pha ra Na karma ba ni/ hUM b+h+yo/ rdo rje rigs ni rjes chags pa/ rtag tu bdag nyid bsgo/ par bya/ chos rnams ngag la mnyes byas shing / 'di
99a5(rgyud): brjod nas ni spro bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza s+pha ra Na karma duSh+Ti maM/ rdo rje rin chen rnal 'byor che/ bdag nyid yongasu sgom par bya// rin chen mchod pa bla na mang / 
99a6(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya a bi She ka rat+na b+h+yo badz+ra ma ni oM// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che/ byang chub snying por dbang bskur ba// sems kyang de ltar bsam nas ni/ 
99a7(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen nyid thob 'gyur / bdag nyid rdo rje gzi brjid ni/ phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad skul bya zhing // mchod pa gzi brjid yongasu spro/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sUr+ye b+he/ 
99a8(rgyud): badz+ra te dze ni dz+wa la hrIHrdo rje rgyal mtshan kun tu mthong / shes rab can gyis rgyal mtshan sbeng // sangs rgyas thaMd mchod bya zhing / rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a sha / 
99b1(rgyud): ri su ni tsir t+ya mai tradA dza a gre traM/ grags chen sangs rgyas thaMd kyi/ dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyi lha// rtag tu bdag cing dga' bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab bskul bya/ oM na maHsarba thA ga ta ma hA pra Shapra
99b2(rgyud): mo da ka re b+h+yo badz+ra hA se hI sa/ sems can thams cad chos chen po// bdag nyid chos chen dag pa ste// sangs rgyas thang rab bskul bya// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kun/ dkyil 'khor grong khyer thams
99b3(rgyud): cad bdag/ shes rab can gyi bdag cid bsam// rdo rje'i sngags kyi rab srul bya/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma tras to b+h+rU~M tu no mi ma hA d+harma a gr-i hU~Mr+b+ha bdag ni shes rab ral gri no// shes rab pha rol phyin
99b4(rgyud): pa'i tshul// 'khor lo'i yig rab tu bskor// mdo sde thams cad 'dzin pa yin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra dzA bA ra mi tI b+hi ni ra hA re tu mo ma hA gu Sha nu ge d+haM/ sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/ bdag ni
99b5(rgyud): sems dpa' smra ba brtan// rdo rje smra ba gsang ba'i bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta swa b+hA ba shud/ d+ha sa~M gI ti b+hirka la sku na mo badz+ra wa tserbe// bdag ni chos kyi
99b6(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sprin byed pa/ rdo rje'i 'khor lo longasu bsngo/ mchod pa thams cad yongs spro bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra pa ri badze d+ha na sarba mu dra ni sku no mo sarba maN+Da la maM/ 
99b7(rgyud): bdag ni rdo rje las rgyal po// phyogs rnams kun tu rab mchod byed// me tog bdug pa la sogs dri// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya/ oM sarba Tha thA ga tra d+hU pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dz+ra karma ka ra/ cho ga bgos pa
99b8(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ me tog mchod pa 'bul byed pa/ bdag nyid rang nyid rgyal po ste// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab skul bya/ oM sarba ta thA ge ta puSh+pa pra sa ra sA ra Na pU dza karma ba ro// bdag ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ nyon mongs tha
100a1(rgyud): byed chos sgron 'bar// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing / snang ba 'bar ba yang dag spro/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ka dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dza karma b+ha ra b+ha ra/ rdo rje khu chur yang dag nyid/ 
100a2(rgyud): dri yi snod dang yang dag ldan/ phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing / char rnams kun gyi rab mchong byed// oM sarba Sha thA ga tA ga nA sa mu s+pha ra Na pU dze karma ku ru ku ru// sems can kun de na yang dag ldan khya
100a3(rgyud): chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang // sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ mchod pa mchog ni rab sgrub pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a ma nir+yAHna pU dza me g+ha sa bu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ shes rab can
100a4(rgyud): gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ yan lag kun gyis rab btud bya/ sangs// rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya nir+yA tA na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra
100a5(rgyud): Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa ni/ rdo rje rin chen bla ne meng// rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas// rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur// rdo rje yi na glu 'di yis// rang bdag nyid ni dga' bar bya/ 
100a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags kyang rab brjod bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga ni ru ta na bu dza me g+ha sa mu dra swa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs rnams kun tu mchod pa kun/ mkhas pa yis
100a7(rgyud): ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ti tsit+ta na rA tA na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phul nas shes rab can gyis ni/ 
100a8(rgyud): rdo rje tsun mo'i ting 'dzin pasam/ rdzas mchog ldan pas spro bya zhing / sangs rgyas kun la yongasu dbul/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a rut+ta ra wa ra 'i ra raHpra ti su~M kha a duSh+Ta pradz+nyA pU dz+ra me g+ha sa mu
100b1(rgyud): s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod bya// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor thams cad kun bsdus
100b2(rgyud): pa/ shes rab can gyi dkyil 'khor bsam// mchod pa'i tshogs ni bla med pas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// tshe dang mdog dang nad med nyid// phun tshegs
100b3(rgyud): bde bas thams cad 'thob/ sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gang zhig gis// nyin re bzhin du mchod byas nas// the tshom med par dngos grub kun/ rdo rje rnal 'byor pas thob 'gyur
100b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i sngags kyis bslab pa dang // phyag rgya thams cad bsam par bya// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// phyag rgya shin tu rgyas par bshad// rdo rje'i las kyi ge rims bzhin/ shes rab can
100b5(rgyud): gyis dkyil 'khor bslab/ rdo rje dbyings dang rab mtshungs pa/ slar yang rnal 'byor pa la bshad// 'jig rten mgon po rdzu 'phrul che// rtag tu de bzhin mdzod bya ba// gsang
100b6(rgyud): mchog rnal 'byor pa dag a// de las gzhan yang rab bshad bya// gang tshe sngon du sems bskyed pa/ rdo rje sems ni bla na med// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas// mchod pa'i bya ba bslab
100b7(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyis sbyor ba/ rdo rje dga' ba bsam par bya// 'dod chags dga' ba bskyed nas ni// dga' ba'i mchod pa rab tu mchod// bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgom bya zhing // bsgoms
100b8(rgyud): nas mchod pa rab tu bya/ dga' ba chen po'i bde don du// rig pa'i lha mo rab 'grol bas/ bud d+ha at+ma ke hu~M/ byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsapa bya/ 
101a1(rgyud): stobs dang mi 'jigs sogs rnams kyis// rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/ bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas zhes bsam
101a2(rgyud): byad/ rdo rje yi ni glu blang zhing // bdag nyid mngon par mchod par bya/ bud+d+ha sid+d+hi ka ro mi// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya// rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing / 
101a3(rgyud): mkhas pas bdag nyid mchod par bya/ bud+d+ha budz+ra/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ sbyar bas de bzhin phyag byas shing / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas nas/ nges par phyag ni byas par
101a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ pa Na mA mi/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung // sangs rgyas bsod nams chen po kun// rje su yi rang mchog bdag gi sa// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ a nu mo de/ bdag nyid
101a5(rgyud): dbul ba la sogs pa/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo/ rje yi// mchod pa kun gyi sangs rgyas nyid/ mchod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis mchod/ bud+d+ha pU dza/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung / 
101a6(rgyud): dge ba'i tshegs ni thams cad kun// yongasu bsngo ba'i mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshung bar 'gyur// pa ri tA maHchos kyi dbyings ni snying po che// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis mgos pa// bzod
101a7(rgyud): nas dag pas skye ba med/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pad+ma mtshungs/ sarba shud+d+haHchos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ bzod nas ni zhing gos pa med/ blo bur dri mas gos pa med/ yi ge a yis
101a8(rgyud): rnam par sbyangs/ sa man+ta b+ha dra/ e ma'o 'khor lo bde rang bzhin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// chos rnams thams cad nyid kyi ni// 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu/ d+ha ma tsakra/ smra ban
101b1(rgyud): dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgra// med de gzhan yang yod ma yin// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin du// bdag ces bya ba 'ga' yang med// nis pra pany+tsa/ sngon du blo dang ldan pas bsam// mnyam
101b2(rgyud): par gzhag pas sgom bya zhing // de 'og rdo rje sna tshogs brjod// de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i// rang gi lus ni phra rab dag/ rdo rje'i gzugasu bsgom bya zhing / 
101b3(rgyud): rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya// badz+ra kA ya/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i// yan lag rnam pa ji snyed pa'o// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing // thams cad yongasu spro bar bya// d+harma kA ya/ 
101b4(rgyud): rang gi lus la gnas pa yaM// phra rab rdul ni ji snyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// don yod mchod pas ra/ ba mchod bya// satwa kA ya/ de bzhin lus ni thams cad kyi// rang gi
101b5(rgyud): phra rab rdul rnams ni// kun tu bgod pa'i bsgom byas te// de ni sangs rgyas mchod par bshad// bud+d+ha ka ya/ sangs rgyas thams cang rje su mnyes/ byang chub sems dpa' slob gang yin/ shes
