101b6(rgyud): rab can gyis mchog gsang bslab// sangs rgyas sa ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// lus rnams thams cad yongasu bsdams// yan lag kun la chags pa dang // ting 'dzin dang
101b7(rgyud): bcas pa yis// lus kun la ni yongasu chags/ bde ba'i mchod pa rang byung ba/ e ma'o rjesu chags mchong bdag// rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya// e ma'o yid 'ong e ma'o sdug e ma'o dga' ba
101b8(rgyud): rab tu mdzes/ chos kyi chags pa 'dod chags che/ gang la rab dga' chags 'gyur ba/ chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/ stong pa 'dod chags brjod par bya/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang bya zhing / 
102a1(rgyud): sems can yang ni der mo bya/ sred pa dang ni chags dang spyod// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spang / mi dang gzugs ni shes bya shing / mtshan nyid gsub ni rtogs par bya// theg chen
102a2(rgyud): bde ba zhes bya ba/ 'dod chags chags par rab brjod par/ lta ba thams cad mi gzung zhing // srid pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par spang / rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med// sdug bsngal thams cad nges par gcod// 
102a3(rgyud): phung po dang ni skye mched khams/ rtog pa rdul tsam yod ma yin// de la 'dus byas yod ma yin// 'dus byas min pa nyid kyang med// skyes pa bud med dag nyid med// bdag dang sems can rnam rtog med// 
102a4(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/ nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs spangs// de lta bu yi chags pa yis// gang du rdo rje can chagaras 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes chags
102a5(rgyud): byaMn/ kha yi 'o na tshig dag pa// gsang ba'i sbyor bas/ rab bsgrub bya/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa/ rjesu chags pa'i tshe ga bstan/ dpung pa dam por bsdams bya zhing / 'dod chags cam
102a6(rgyud): par bstan pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub 'gyur// chags pa lnga las rnam grol bas// 'dod la chags par mi bya zhing / blo ldan chos chags dga' ba yis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub
102a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis// gsang ba thams cad rab bstan bya// zhi ba thams cad mnyes bya zhing // rdo rje sems sogs mnyes par bya/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ 
102a8(rgyud): rdo rje can dang dga' chen po/ 'dod chags chen po 'di lta bus/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ oM sarba rA ga ra ti su kha yA mi hUM/ mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog/ gang zhig byas nas
102b1(rgyud): gsang ba kun// brtags nas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ lhag par shes rab can gyis bslab/ mtshan ma brtan por rab 'grub nas/ pad+ma'i lte bar 'dug bya zhing // mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs
102b2(rgyud): nas// rang bdag rdo rje mtshungs pa nyid// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// de yis shin tu gsang tshig gsungs// de ni dgongs pas gsungs pa ste// de ni dgongs par shes par bya// mtshan ma phyag
102b3(rgyud): mtshan zhes byar brjod// brtan pa lhag pa nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gang // mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya/ pha rol phyin pa drug spyod pa/ de yi mtshan mar rab tu bsgrag
102b4(rgyud): gang phyir lhag par brten par bya// rdo ldan rnams kyi rigs 'byung 'dod// mtshan ma brtan par rang 'gyur ba/ ded ga kho nar rab tu bsgrags/ pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni// rdo rje rags
102b5(rgyud): brjod par bya/ byang chub sems gang dardo/ rdo rnamaHnamang 'ang brjod bya/ byang chub sems kyi rab sbyor bas/ mnam brtan par brjod par bya/ pad+me shes rab pha rol phyin/ 
102b6(rgyud): lte bar 'dug bya ba/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi// rnal 'byor yang yang snyoms 'jug bya/ b+ha ga ling ga'i sbyor ba ni// yang dang yang du bsten byas nas// g.yo dang nyes pa rnams spangs par// gdon na
102b7(rgyud): za bar yang dag byung / shes rab dang ni byang chub sems/ yang dang yang du bsten byas nas/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul / byang chub gdon mi za bar 'gyur/ bsgrub byar gyur pa'i chos 'di ni// lus
102b8(rgyud): can kun gyis rnyed par dka'/ byang chub sems dang shes rab che/ mchod rten mtshan ma'i rjes chags bya/ rnal 'byor pas ni 'di sgom dang / 'di lta bu yi sgrub pa dang / spyod pa gsang ba 'di yis mi
103a1(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba nyid thob 'gyur// gsang ba dgongs pas bsdus pa yi/ mo las rtsacher ji skad gsungs// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad rnam
103a2(rgyud): par sgom// rdo rje gsang dbang bsdus pa yi// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ gsang ba chen po bsgrubs na ni/ skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur/ kha cig nyin zhag de nyid la/ yang dang yang du 'grub
103a3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ nyi ma gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am// drug dang bdun la the tshom med// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // ci rigs pa yi cho ga yis// lo gcig tu ni rab sbyor bas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom
103a4(rgyud): med/ rdo rje gsang ba'i cho ga rdzogaso// gsang ba yin dkyil 'khor mchog rdo rje slob dpon tshig ni/ dza lhar rigs shing 'tsham pa ru/ de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ mngo
103a5(rgyud): na rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni// gong du dkyil 'kho ra las bshad bzhin// ci ltar spro zhing ci nus par/ sngon du mkha sa pas bshad par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' skal pa che// rgyal po
103a6(rgyud): kun tu khyab pa'i 'od// the tshom med par stong phrag brgya/ rtag tu rdo rje'i tshig brjod bya/ sems dpa'i rdo rje goms bya ste/ rdo rje rnal 'byor goms byas te/ chos rnams dag pa goms par bya/ 
103a7(rgyud): goms pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ nyon mongs rab spong nyon mongs bzlog par bya/ rnal 'byor goms pa yis ni rnal 'byor sgrub// bzlas pa tsam gyis dga' chen 'grub 'gyur te/ rnam
103a8(rgyud): 'byor cho gas sgrub pa sgrub par 'gyur// yang na bzlas pa tsam nyid ni// bzlas pa mchog gis bzlas par bya// rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub pa'i phyir// dngos grub chogs bzlas par bya// de ni rnal 'byor
103b1(rgyud): cho ga yis// skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// rnal 'byor cho gas med par ni// 'grub min 'di la the tshom med// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis// gsang ba bzhi ni yang dag bshad/ gsang ba
103b2(rgyud): chen po tshad med pa// bzhi po thams cad bsdus pa yin// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga dang // phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len pa// rig pa'i mchog gi cho ga ni// gsang ba bsdus pa dang po yin// gsang dang
103b3(rgyud): skem byed phur pas btab/ gdeg pa dang na mngon spyod dang / bgegs bslang ba yi 'khrul 'khor 'di/ gsang ba'i bsdus pa gnyis pa yin/ go cha mi 'gyur bcing ba dang / spyod dang de bzhin
103b4(rgyud): rab bskyod dang / bdag nyid mngon par srung nyi/  dang / bgegs rnams bsal bar bya ba dang / rdzas 'phrog/ pa dang gzhom pa dang / gdug pa thams cad mngon srung ba/ rig pa
103b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/ gsang ba bsdus pa ga/ sum pa yin/ sngags dang phyag rgya mchod pa dang / de bzhin rig pa'i dngos grub nyid/ bgegs rnams bsod nams nye bar bsdu/ 
103b6(rgyud): gsang ba bzhi par 'dod pa yin// gsang ba bzhi po thams cad ni// rang bzhin rdzu 'phrul kun bsdus pa// gsang ba mchog gi rgyud chen po/ rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ bzlas brjod sbyin
103b7(rgyud): sreg cho ga ni// de ni rgyud mchog las bshad bya// gang phyir rig pa 'dzin kun gyis/ zlas brjod sbyin sreg bsgrub par bya// bzlas brjod sbyor ba meng par ni/ rig pa'i dngos 'grub 'byung mi 'gyur// 
103b8(rgyud): sbyin sreg tsam ni med pa ru/ rig pa'i bya ba byed mi 'gyur// gang gis rnal 'byor brtson 'grus pa/ bzlas pa'i rim pa bshad bya ba/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/ snying po 'di ni gsang mchog
104a1(rgyud): yin// gsang ba'i rigs 'dir bzlas pa ni// rnal 'byor nyi shu yang dag byung / bzlas pa rnam pa nyi shu ni// gsang ba'i rgyung du nyi shu gcig/ gnas ngan len gyi bag chags rdeg/ 
104a2(rgyud): rtog pa bag chags zhes bya ste// bzlas pa tsam gyis thim 'gyur te// bzlas pa tsam gyis brjod par bya/ nyes pa byas pa spong ba dang // de bzhin srid pa sbyor byed cing / rmad 'byung sna tshogs mthong 'gyur
104a3(rgyud): te/ de bas bzlas pa brjod par bya// byang chub spyod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing // tshul mchog mthong bar 'gyur ba ste// de bas bzlas pa'i cho ga ni// rnal 'byor pas ni nges par bya// gsang ba chen po'i rgyud
104a4(rgyud): 'di ru/ hUM ni dang por rab tu bsgrags// gsang ba thams cad yang dag 'byung / hUM gis bzlas pa brjod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis gtso bo ni/ de bzhin yi ge hUM rab mchog/ gsang ba
104a5(rgyud): thams cad 'khor lor bcas/ rigs lnga dag dang ba/ ces pa 'byung // 'dir ni yi ge hUM 'byung bar// sngon la shes rab can gyis brtag/ lce sogs thams cad khong stong du// lus
104a6(rgyud): kun la ni brtag par bya// sbyor ba bcu las 'byung mi 'gyur// so las rnam pa kun tu min// lce dang rtsa ba las kyang min// dkan las rnam pa kun tu min// gnas gang las ni sbyor ba 'byung // snying
104a7(rgyud): ka nyid las 'byung mi 'gyur/ khong stong dngos po thams cad la/ skyeng pa nyid ni snang mi 'gyur// yig hUM gi sbyor ba yis// rang gi dbyangs la yang dag sbyar// de nyid nyon mongs can mi 'gyur/ kun
104a8(rgyud): gzhi sa bon thams cad pa/ dkan dang lkog ma'i 'bad pa dang // lce yi tshogs las yang dag 'byung / yi ge hUM gi sgra byung ba// de ni mi rtog yang dag byung / de ltar 'byung ba'i sbyor ba las// gnas
104b1(rgyud): kyi nyon mongs can mi 'gyur// tshig dang bcas pa'i ji bzhin sgra// 'dus byas thams cad dor bar bya// ji bzhin hUM gi sbyor ba las/ chos rnams thams cad skye ba med/ rnam par rtog las yang dag
104b2(rgyud): byung // de ni mi rtog yang dag 'byung // 'khor ba dag gi thog ma ni// ji ltar yang ni shes mi 'gyur// 'dir ni skye ba ma snang zhing // 'dus byas dag ni 'jig pa min// de bas yig hUM tsam gyis// 'dus byas
104b3(rgyud): so sor brtag par bya// dag cing mthar thug gnas nyid ni/ hUM gis kyang ni sbyar bar bya/ rang bzhin med pa'i sgra 'di ni// yi ge hUM las yang dga' byung / 'di la dngos po yang ma yin// rang bzhin med
104b4(rgyud): cing bdag med pa/ de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi/ rang bzhin nyid ni yod ma yin/ bdag gam sems can ga so ba med/ gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ zag pa med
104b5(rgyud): cing 'dus byas min// gnas ni dag pa brtan par bya// dngos grub sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ yi ge hUM ni yang dag 'byung / 
104b6(rgyud): ye shes dag pa yang dag 'byung // chos kyi dbyings kyis brtan par bya// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po yang / 'dir ni nye bar mi dmigs te/ gang phyir dus gsum gshegs snying po// sang+yas
104b7(rgyud): snying po chog su bshad// sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad dang // rdo rje can ni rgyal sras bcas/ hUM tsam gyi ni sbyor ba yis/ kun tu yang dag dgug par bya// yi ge'i sbyor pa gcig gis mas
104b8(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi snying po bstan/ gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// 'di ni rang gi sbyor bas gnas/ chos kyi rgyu 'thun bag chags ni/ byang chub sems ni ma rtogs par// thog ma med ldan 'khor ba las/ 
105a1(rgyud): 'byung ba cung zad yod ma yin// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul ni// byang chub kyi ni sems med par// 'gas kyang mya ngan 'da' mi nus// gal
105a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'byung med na// nyan thos dag ni ga las 'byung // sangs rgyas 'byung ba yong min na// rang rgyal de ni 'byung mi 'gyur// gal te byang chub sems dpa' med// sangs rgyas rnams ni gang las
105a3(rgyud): byung // gal te byang chub sems med na// de bas 'khor lo 'di kun no// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // byang sems gsang ba chen po ni// yi ge hUM las yang dag byung // sangs rgyas thams cad
105a4(rgyud): rab 'byung ba/ yi ge hUM gi snang bar 'gyur// gang phyir mtshan ldan gzugs can ni/ rtag tu sangs rgyas rab 'byung ba/ hUM yig gi ni sbyor ba hUM/ de nyid rdo rje yang dag byung // chos dbyings rab sbyor
105a5(rgyud): rdo rje ni/ de las yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur// de la/ sa rdo rje rnal 'byor che/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug bla na med/ 2tshe ma med par rnal 'byor kun/ yi ge hUM gi sbyor bas 'grub/  la
105a6(rgyud): bu yi bzlas pa yis// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni// sngon ni bsngo ba mdzad pa ltar// la 'byor las byas dge ba bsngo/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// rang gi sems kyang bsngo bar bya/ 
105a7(rgyud): chen po mthar phyin byed/ byang chub sems kyis bsgral bar bya/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che/ sen thad gos pa med// thams cad de bzhin gshegs snying po// nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med/ ji lta
105a8(rgyud): zla ba bzhin du dag/ zla ba gang ba'i 'od gsal ba/ rtag tu yang dag rdzogs par gnas// rab tu dang ba 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni dang po chos ye shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin// rtag tu dag/ 
105b1(rgyud): par gnas pa ste/ rang gi nyon mongs dag gis bsgribs/ de bas rang sems rnam pa ni// zla ba gang bar shes par bya// bdag ni dga' yang yod ma yin// chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas shes// ye she
105b2(rgyud): zla ba gang ba min/ gang phyir bdag ni yod ma yin// zla ba gang ba dang mtshungs rigs/ gang phyir dag cing gos pa med// sangs rgyas ye shes skyon med pa/ zla ba'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// mthong nas
105b3(rgyud): shes rab can gyis bsam// 'di yang gang gis rtog sa par 'gyur// yun ring du su sdug bsngal ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// nyon mongs pa yi bag chags kun/ de
105b4(rgyud): bzhin sbyong bar byed par bsam// byang chub sems ni sems chen po// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms byed pa// chos kyi rgyu 'thun bag chags kyi// gnyen be ru ni byung ba yin// de bas
105b5(rgyud): 'di yi mthu yis ni// sangs ye shes rnam par spyong // gnas ngan lan ni bag char bcas// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis gos pa med/ nyi ma lta bu'i sems chen po// nyon mongs rtsani rab sreg byed// zla ba lnga
105b6(rgyud): bu'i sems chen po dge ba'i sman ni rnam 'phel byed// sos ka' tsha ba'i zla ba bzhin// nyi ma'i gdung bar bsreg byed// shar bar gyur pas zhi bar byed/ nyon mongs gdung bas ma gdungs shing // mi shes
105b7(rgyud): pa la nyi ma nyid// byang chub sems ni zla ba che// nyon mongs gdung bzhi byed par// kun nas nyon mongs bag chags bcas// gnas ngan len ni 'joms pa'i mchog khab len gyis ni lAb bzhin du/ nyon
105b8(rgyud): mongs bag char 'dren byed pa// rdo'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pas// byang chub sems de bsgom par bya/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas de ru// slar yang zla ba rnam par sgom// byang chub sems kyi mthu yis ni/ bas
106a1(rgyud): chags thams cad sreg byed pa/ ye shes de ru 'byung 'gyur te/ gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa spangs// rnam par mi rtog mtshungs med pa/ bdag med de bzhin stong pa nyid/ 
106a2(rgyud): shes ri 'o 'joms par byed/ rdo rje dang mtshungs khong stong med/ rdo'i rang bzhin snying po che// 'jig tshogs ri bo brtan pa ni/ rdo nges ni 'joms par byed/ de phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan/ 
106a3(rgyud): bas rdo'i rnal 'byor pas// zla ba'i dbus zla ba mtshungs// zla ba gnyis dbus rdo yis// rdo ye shes brtan par bya/ stong nyid de bzhin nyid de nyid// yang dag mtha' dang 'dus ma byas// skye ba
106a4(rgyud): med cing 'gag pa med/ yi ge hUM ni sgom par bshad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mchog/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni/ zla ba'i dbusu bsgom par bya/ hUM gi sbyor bde
106a5(rgyud): yis ni// rdo'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// lus kun la ni spro bya zhing / stong pa nyid dang mtshungs par spros// gzugs 'di nyid ni ming tsam ste/ dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin// cha shas kyi ni rnam
106a6(rgyud): dpyad na// gzuT zhes bya ba yong ma yin// 'jig rten kun rdzob zhes bya ste// dam pa'i don du yang ma yin/ de lta bu yi rang bzhin du// gzub zhes bya ba yod ma yin// de dag phra rab rnam brtags kyang / phra
106a7(rgyud): ra ba zhes bya yod ma yin/ 'jig rten kun rdzob zhes bya ste// dam pa'i don du yod ma yin// de lta bu yi rang bzhin du// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs de yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar yod ces
106a8(rgyud): bya ba yin// gal te gzugs de yod min na// ming yang de la yod ma yin// ming ni gang las yang dag byung / ming zhes bya ba ci 'dra bar// dngos zhes bya ba de dang mtshungs// ming nges sor brtaDa byas na/ 
106b1(rgyud): gnas gang zhig na rab tu gnas/ dngos po gcig ni rnam phyer/ ming ni mang po yang dag byung // re re yi ni dbye ba yis/ sngar gyi ming ni nyams par 'gyur// de la ming ni yod min pa/ ming ni yang dag
106b2(rgyud): 'byung ba med// gang la ming ni yod min na// ji ltar ming du brjod par bya// gang gis ming ni rab gnas pa/ rnam pa kun tu dmigs mi 'gyur// gzugs ni nye bar mi dmigs la/ de la gzugs ni ji ltar
106b3(rgyud): yod// 'di ni yang dag min rtog pa// bag chags dag gis kun nas dkris// gang du byis pa rab rmongs shing // mya ngan 'das pa thob mi 'gyur// ji ltar gzugs ni rnam bsgom pa/ de bzhin tsher dang
106b4(rgyud): 'du shes dang / so so ru ni rnam phyed na// de la snying po dmigs mi 'gyur/ gang la snying po yang min pa/ de la dngos po ji ltar yod/ gang la dngos po mi dmigs pa/ dam pa'i don ni ji ltar
106b5(rgyud): yod// gang zhin bstan par mi dmigs pa/ de ni yong min dang / sa por med/ chos rnams thang med pas na// skye ba med par brjod/ par bya// gang zhig ma skyes de yod min// gang zhig yod
106b6(rgyud): min ji ltar yod// mkhas pas chos rnams tha~Mng ni// 'gag pa med ces bya bar brjod// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/ de ni bzod nas zhi bar 'dod// de phyir rang bzhin mya ngan 'das// 'di ni stong pa nyid brjod// 
106b7(rgyud): 'di ni yang dag de nyid che// yang dag mthar ru brjod par bya// chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che// theg pa chen por brjod par bya/ de ni snying po khong stong med// rdo brtan pa bla na med// lus kun la ni smye byi ste// 
106b8(rgyud): bdag gis lus ni 'di lta bu// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya gang / yi ge hUM ni yongasu spro// sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i chos ni skye ba med/ 'di
107a1(rgyud): / yang 'byung ba snang ba yang / hUM zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba yis/ skye bar yang ni snang mi 'gyur/ chos nyid dag pa bded pa gang / yang dag mtha' ni zag pa med/ chos dbyings bstan pa dam
107a2(rgyud): pa ni// yi ge hUM du 'dir rab bsgrags/ rdo rje yi ge hUM de nyid// chos dbyings stug po bstan pa yin/ byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ rdo rje gang yin de nyid hUM// chos nyid dag pa 'di lta bu/ rdo rje ye
107a3(rgyud): shes yid 'ong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// rdo rje bdag gi lag na gnas/ de bas rdo rje can kun gyi// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad dang / yi ge hUM la sbyor ba yis/ spros med rnal
107a4(rgyud): 'byor bsam par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ snying ka'i dbus bsgom par bya/ zla ba de la zla ba gnyis/ dbus su zla ba rab bsgob bya/ zla ba'i dbus rdo rje ni// mkhas pa yis
107a5(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya/ rdo rje'i dbusu yi ge hUM/ sangs// rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya/ de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ lus// kun rab tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad bzlas pa yis/ rje
107a6(rgyud): bdag nyid myur du thob/ hUM rdo rje hUM mdzad sgom pa rdzog so// hUM gi sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ yi ge thams cad rnam par bsgom/ sems dpa' chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ yi ge bcu drug dag pa
107a7(rgyud): yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi yi ge hUM/ gang phyir sangs rgyas rigs byung ba/ rdo rje can dag kun gyi hUM/ drag po gcod kun rab tu sgom// oM ni rin chen yang dag ldan/ hri ni pad+mar yang dag ldan/ 
107a8(rgyud): yi ge a ni sna tshogs brjod// de lta bur yang bsgom par bya/ hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje dag/ traM ni rdo rje snying po ste// yi ge hrIHni rdo rje bstan// sna tshogs rdo rje yi ge a/ hU~M ni rdo rje sems dpa
107b1(rgyud): ste/ he ni rdo rje chags pa ste/ rdo rje legs pa yi ge sa// oM ni rdo rje rin chen te/ rdo rje gzi brjid yi ge a/ traM ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje gzhang pa yi ge ha/ yi ge hriHni rdo rje spyan/ rdo rje rnon pa
107b2(rgyud): yi ge d+hIHma ni rdo rje 'khor lo ste/ rdo rje smra ba yi ges/ yi ge shaM ni rdo rje las// rdo rje srung ba yi ge hUM/ hUM ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ rdo rje khu dur yi ge baM/ gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/ snying kar
107b3(rgyud): bzhin bsgom par bya// yi ge hUM ni rnal 'byor pa/ de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yi ras// gzugs gcig rnam par spro bar bya/ yi ge hUM bzlas
107b4(rgyud): tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'a gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugasu ste// rdo gcig
107b5(rgyud): ni rnam par bsgom/ rdo rje'i dbus kyi lte bar ni// de ru yig hUM bsgom bya/ theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// ji bzhin mdo yi rjes 'brangs nas// ji bzhin rgyal po skyes bur bcas/ yig
107b6(rgyud): hUM ni dang por bshad// de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas// snying ka ru ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugasu ste// dbusu yi ge hUM bsgom bya// de bzhin yi ge tha~Md kyang // rnal 'byor pas
107b7(rgyud): ni snying kar bsgom// zla ba'i gzugs las yang dag gnas// bdag nyid yongasu bsgom bya zhing / rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ rdo rje sems dpa' gang 'ga'
107b8(rgyud): zhig/ gang dang gang zhig mngon 'dod pa// rig pa de ni snying kar sgom// yi ge hUM ni dang por sbyar// gang phyir de las rtogs pa 'byung // de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas// snying kar bsgom pas
108a1(rgyud): bsgom par bya// yang na namakha'i sbyor ba yis// yi ge hUM ni dang por sbyar// nam pa'i rang bzhin bsgom bya zhing // yi ge dag ni thaMd sbyar// yang na namakha'i zla dbus/ 
108a2(rgyud): gnas pa'i yi ge hUM bsgom bya// bdag nyid rigs kyi lha mor bsam/ skad cig nga la rab 'grub 'gyur/ hU~M ri ji skad bstan pa bzhin// sngags kun rab tu bsgom par bya// rig pa kun gyi gsang
108a3(rgyud): ba ni// rgyud kun yang dag bsdus pa ste/ bzlas pa'i gsang ba nges sbas pa/ gsang ba 'di ni rnam pa drug rig 'dzin rnams kyi snying po dang / rnal 'byor rgyung ni bsdus pa dang / don yong shin tu mang
108a4(rgyud): 'byung ba// gsang ba las kyang mchog gsang bshadang / bzlas brjod tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// lta ba'i ri bo 'joms par 'gyur/ rang gi snying ka'i dbus ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ zlab
108a5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor de dbu su// zla ba gnyis pa bsgom par bya/ dbu// gas 'byung rngub pa gang yin pa// rdo rje yi ge hUM du sgom// me bsrub sa pa yi sbyor ba yis// steng dang 'og tu rgyu bar bya/ 
108a6(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas// dbu su yi ge hrIHbsgom bya/ steng 'og 'gro ba bsgom par bya// yi ge hUM ni de sbyar nas/ ji ltar shing skam gtsub brtan pa// gtsub shing yang dag sbyor ba yis// 
108a7(rgyud): rtsol ba byas pa tsam gyis ni// skad cig gis ni me 'byung bzhin// yi ge a ni gtsub bstan te// yi ge hUM ni gtsub shing yin/ rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni// skad cig gis ni ye shes skye/ shes rab
108a8(rgyud): pha rol phyin ye shes/ yi ge hrIHru 'dir brjod bya/ byang chub sems ni yi ge hUM/ me yi sbyor bas bsrub par bya/ bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ ye shes dam pa skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje de ni bsrem
108b1(rgyud): bya ste/ rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ b+ha ga sangs rgyas kun shes rab/ ling ga rdo rjer brjod par bya/ byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ b+ha ga ling kar rab tu sgrub/ b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni// mdo sngags
108b2(rgyud): dbang las gsung so// b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mkhas pas ling ga gzhug par bya// gsang ba gzo brjid chen po 'di// ma bsrubs pa yi sbyor ba yis// 'ga' zhig gis ni 'di bsgrubs na// skad
108b3(rgyud): cig gis ni ye shes skye// bzlas pa gsang ba rnam pa bdun rdzogaso// sbas pa gsang ba rgyud chen po// 'di nyid rnal 'byor kun tu bsdus// de nyid chen po bsdus pa ni// de
108b4(rgyud): nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// zla ba gang ba yang dag gnas// bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya// de yi dbusu rdo rje ste// rdo rje gas kyi bzlas pa bya/ zla ba gang ba la gnas par/ 
108b5(rgyud): bdag nyid pad+mar bsgom par bya// de yi dbu su pad+ma de/ pad+ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya// zla ba gang ba la gnas par// bdag nyid nor bur bsgom par bya// de yi dbusu rin chen dang // rin chen rigs
108b6(rgyud): kyi bzlas par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu ni// rdo rje rnon por rab tu sgom// de yi las kyi rigs mchog la// las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te/ sangs
108b7(rgyud): rgyas gzugasu rnam par sgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// sangs rgyas rigs kun bzlas par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen po// sems dpa' gcig ni rnam par bsgom// de yi
108b8(rgyud): thugs kar zhugs nas ni// rdo rje rigs kun bzlas par bya// pad+ma'i sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs// 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par bsgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// pad+ma'i rigs
109a1(rgyud): kun bzlas par bya/ nor bu rin rten skal ba te/ rdo rje rin chen rnam par sgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// rin chen rigs kun bzlas par bya// sems dpa' chen
109a2(rgyud): po rdo rje las// sems dpa'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya// bden pa dam tshig mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad
109a3(rgyud): rab grol byed// thos pa tsam gyis thabs chen po// yang na snying kar rdo rang bzhin// sna tshogs bdag po bzlas brjod mtshungs// shes rab can gyis gang bsam pa// phun sum tshogs kun bde bar
109a4(rgyud): thob// gsang ba yang dag bshad par bya// sangs rgyas pa gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// de yi thugs kar 'jug bya zhing // yi da kyis thams cad bcug nas ni// de yi sku ni mtshungs par spro/ 
109a5(rgyud): de yi thugs ka'i dbusu ni// rdo rje'i rigs ni rab tu bshad/ ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spro/ de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin gshegs
109a6(rgyud): ba'i rigs bzlas na// the tshom med par sangs rgyas kun/ skad cig de nyid kyis 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje'i mda' ni zhi ba 'di// 'di lta bu yi gzugs bsgom bya// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ rje
109a7(rgyud): gar dang mtshungs par sgom// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i rigs can thams cad ni// the tshom med par dngos grub kun// ye shes bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i sems dpa' bsgom bya/ 
109a8(rgyud): zhing // thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya// sna tshogs thabs ni rab bsgoms na/ pad+ma'i rigs can 'grub par 'gyur/ rdo rje rin chen bsgom bya zhing // thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya/ rin
109b1(rgyud): chen mdzod ni bcug nasu// yang dang yang du spro bar bya/ de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rin chen dga' chen po// the tshom med par dngos grub kun/ bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// stong gsum
109b2(rgyud): gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ rdo la su rnam par bas ma/ ngal thugs kar zhugs nas ni// sna tshogs rnam 'phrul spro bar bya// nga lta bu yi sbyar ba yi/ sna tshogs mdzod ni rab spros nas/ the tshom med par
109b3(rgyud): dngos grub kun// bzlas pa tsam gyi 'grub par 'gyur// shin tu gsang ba 'di lta ni// bzlas pa gsang ba bla na med// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// bzlas
109b4(rgyud): pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di/ rgyud kyi snying po kun bsdus shing // nyon mongs thad rab 'joms shing / rig pa 'dzin pas bzlas par bya// bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ rig pa'i brtul
109b5(rgyud): zhugs nges par blang / gal te 'di ni dngos grub 'dod // rnal 'byor pa yis brtul zhugs bya/ bzlas brjod spyir sreg chog ni/ rnal 'byor mchog tu brtson par bya/ theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ bye bag su
109b6(rgyud): ni yongasu bzla/ bye ba gsum ni bzlas byas nas/ sgrub pa dag ni brtsam par bya/ byang chub sems ni dga' chen po/ shes rab can gyi dkyil 'khor bri// rdo rje seda'i rgyal po che// sen cig sa yang dag bri// gang phyir
109b7(rgyud): rgyal po mchog gsang dbang // rdo rje mchog ni rab ster byed/ rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// de ni sngon du yang dag brtsam/ shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ khru ni bcu par yang dag bri gru bzhi pa la sgo
109b8(rgyud): bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhis ni rnar brgyan// ka ba brkyang dang yang dag ldan/ dar gyis rkun pos rnam par brgyan// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// kha khyer dag gis shin tu spras/ rin chen dra bas yongasu brags
110a1(rgyud): sku'i dril bu g.yer khas brgyan// sgo khyung dang ni mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje 'ching bas rab tu bcing / rdo rje rin chen rab tu bkod// rdo rje thig gis thig btab pa// dri yi sbyor ba
110a2(rgyud): cho ga dang // phur bus bgegs ni bsal bya zhing / tshon rtsi lnga yi srang bu ni/ rdo rje gsang bas bsrung bar bya/ rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gang ba bya// ji skad sngar bshad de cing
110a3(rgyud): ni// rdo rje gsang ba yongs bkod nas/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// rdo rje 'khor lo rab mdzes la// 'khor lo'i dbusu rab tu dgod/ rdo rje chags pa yongasu dgod / tshen rtsi lnga ni rab tu dbye/ 
110a4(rgyud): sbyang gsang rgyud las gsungs bzhin/ dkar po sna tshogs 'ong 'bar ba/ sngon po ser po shin tu 'bar// btsod sogs dang ni rab tu ldan// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs
110a5(rgyud): tshon rtsis bri bar bya/ 'ong zer dmar po sna tshogs no bar/ rdo rje 'khor lo yongs bkod nas/ zla ba gang bar rabang gong / 'khor la khrong yongasu bzung / kha dog nga bzhin rigs pa
110a6(rgyud): bzhin// ji ltar mdzes shing shin tu dkar/ ji bzhin zla ba nyab mdungs// zla ba gang ba yang dag buM/ zla ba gang ba'i dbus ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bri/ gang gis mtshan ni bzung ba yis ska
110a7(rgyud): cig gis ni sdig pa 'grol// mdzum pa dang bcas zla ba'i mdog/ shin tu chags pa dga' chen po// myur du rdo rje'i tshogs brjod do// rdo rje nyid kyi snying po yin/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa hUM dzaHhUM
110a8(rgyud): rdo rje'i glu ni blang bya zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed// 'dod pa'i chags pa yang dag dran/ thang rjes chags bde ba thugs mchog ma ngar// rdo rje sems
110b1(rgyud): dpa' rab tu dga' ba mchog/ kye khyod bde chen bstan pas 'phel mdzad pa// rab tu myur du sgrub pa 'grub pa mdzod/ rdo rje'i glu ni de lta bu// blang zhing 'khor lo spyan drang bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal ba cha/ 
110b2(rgyud): rjes chags shing rab 'grub 'gyur// sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag gnas// rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/ rol pa dang bcas spyan g.yo ba/ snyems tshul chen po dga' ba che// gagra
110b3(rgyud): pa'i phyag gis rdo rjen// thugs ka ru ni 'dzin pa'i mchog grayon pa dril bu yang dag ldan// slar yang bsnyems tshul dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje che// rgyal po chen po thub pa che/ spyod
110b4(rgyud): pa chen po theg pa che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag gru/ ba mdzod/ rin chen chen po rdo rje che/ rgyal mtshan chen po dran pa de// sangs rgyas dran pa rdo rje cha/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ 
110b5(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ bde ba chen po bla na meg sa dang pha rol phyin bde ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ shes rab chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba// byang chub
110b6(rgyud): sems ni rdo rje che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// rdo rje chen po chags pa che// rgyal po chen po thub pa che// don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzad// chos kyi srid pa 'khor
110b7(rgyud): lo che/ smra ba'i las ni blan med/ srung zhing bsrung ba drag po che// rdo rje khu tshur bdag grub mdzod/ rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis// de nyid mchog tu bskul nas ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// 'grub
110b8(rgyud): 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// dkyil 'kho
111a1(rgyud): snga ma dang mtshungs par// dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bri// de nas rdo rje las nas ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya// chos kyi rig pa 'dzin pa ni// dbab dang gzhug pa la
111a2(rgyud): sogs pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad yang dag bya// bum pa la sogs yo byad dang // spos dang me tog la sogs mchog/ rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams
111a3(rgyud): thams cad yang dag bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i rig pa yis// bum pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ de ni zhabs kyi drung bzhag na// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga ji
111a4(rgyud): bzhin 'jug bya zhing // rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya// hUM gis yang dag zhugs nas ni// rdo rje mchod pas yang dag mchod/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
111a5(rgyud): gyis/ tsi rigs par ni bsgrub par bya/ zla ba'i dkyi/ la 'khor gang bar gnas/ phyag rgya chen po yongasu gzung / rdorje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang bdag nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ 
111a6(rgyud): de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che// skad cig re re bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// brtan par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bsgrubs nas ni/ shin tu brtan pa bla med pa/ 
111a7(rgyud): rjes chags sems dpa' chen po ni// skad cig gis ni bsgrub par bya/ de 'dra'i mchog tu gsang ba mthar phyin pa/ sems dpa' rgyal chen yong su dag pa mchog/ dag pa'i tshul 'di cung zad mtshungs
111a8(rgyud): pa med/ rjes chags 'dod chags yongasu dag pa mchog/ rdo rje rgyal mchog rab dag dri ma med/ gsang ba las byung 'khor lo dam pa 'dzin// rig pa'i gsang sngags tshul 'di byang chub byed// snying
111b1(rgyud): rje dang ldan spyod pa spyod byed pa/ de bzhin rab 'jigs sdug bsngal chen po'i pha rol phyin gyur pa/ mchog tu mkhas shing phra ba rgyung dang rgyud dag las byung ba// de ru srid pa dag gi dra ba chen po gcod
111b2(rgyud): mdzad pa// gsang sngags 'khor lo las byung ba yi pa pa 'khor lo ste// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dgongs pa gcig sras kyi gtso bo dbang bsgyur rgyal po ste/ de yis tha
111b3(rgyud): pa'i grong khyer rab tu bshad// gsang ba rnal 'byoran po de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde gsang ba'i
111b4(rgyud): dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bya le'u gnyis pa rdzogaso// de nas rnal 'byor gsang ba che// / sangs rgyas thams cad kun bsdus pa/ chos kyi dbyings na
111b5(rgyud): bstan pa'i mchog na mkha' sna tshogs dngos ldan pa/ ri dbang rgyal po chen po ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa sprul// rdo rje dbang po chen po'o gnas// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'das/ rdo rje rgyal po rtse mo
111b6(rgyud): ste/ gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshungs// rdo rje kun gyi rang mdzes pa/ mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas de ru/ rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ 
111b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsungs bzhugs/ sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs// gtso bos chos kun dbang du gyur/ rol bcas rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan/ rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// sangs
111b8(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi gnas gcig ste/ chos chen po'i rnal 'byor mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol btab/ rdo rje rnal 'byor che/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga'
112a1(rgyud): chen po// sems dpa' byang sems las byung ba/ rang gi rigs 'byung ba shad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste// rgyud kyi snying po gsang ba che// gsang ba chen po rigs
112a2(rgyud): kyi dbang // mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po ste// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// zhi bas byang chub 'grub 'gyur te// thams cad yang dag bsdus pa min// gtum po thams cad rab 'joms
112a3(rgyud): pa// rang rigs rtag tu bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste// kun tu mi gsungs bzhugs par gyu// mi gsungs gsang ba ma gsungs te// zhi ba'i bde ba la bzhugs gyur// gsang bde
112a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ sems dpa' chen po snyoms par bzhugs/ rtogs shing gzigs par mi mdzad de/ gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
112a5(rgyud): nas ni/ chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad/ sang sa rgyas gcig bzhin yang dag 'gyur// don long grub pa blan me nga// sangs rgyas thams cad rnal 'byor che// gsang ba 'dun
112a6(rgyud): las yang dag byung / rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyi sa/ rdo rje can la bskul bar gsungs// oM badz+ra satwa u tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje bskul ba gsungs pa na/ chos dbyings sangs rgyas gcig pu nyid / 
112a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par 'gyur// thub pas mgon rnams la btung nas/ tshig ni 'di skad gsungs par gyur/ rnam pa kun tu ci zhig bgyi/ 
112a8(rgyud): bdag la sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs// phyag na rdo rje brtan pa la// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// gsang ba rdo rje rigs zhes pa// rib kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// sang+yas kun
112b1(rgyud): gyi gsung thos nas/ rdo rje dbang po'i gnas snang byed/ rab tu btud nas tshig gsungs pa/ mgon po rnal 'byor gzigasu gsol/ bdag gi snod dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'di na sems can
112b2(rgyud): 'ga' yang med/ gang phyir mu stegs la chags shing / skye dgu lta ba'i dri mas khyab/ sems can 'di dag 'dul bya min// sang+yas chos kyi snod ma yin// log pa'i lam du yang dag zhugs/ 
112b3(rgyud): mun pa stug po la gnol ba/ la la lha yi lta ba cha/ kha cig brtul zhugs lta bu'i gnas/ kha cig dka' thub gdungs pas 'khrul/ nyon mongs pas ni 'khrugs pa'i sems/ 'dod pa'i
112b4(rgyud): yon tan lnga la chags/ skyo bar yang ni mi 'gyur te/ rdo rje rigs kyi gsang 'di la/ nam yang sbyor ba mi 'gyuraro// de nga/ 'dod chags che la chags/ 'dod pa'i chags pa dag las rgyal/ 
112b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub chags bral ba/ gsang ba 'di la sbyor ma 'gyur/ lta ba'i chags pas rgyal bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i chag sa pas lta ba can/ srid pa'i zhags pas shin tu chags// sang+yas
112b6(rgyud): bstan pa la chags bral// nga rgyal lhag pa'i nga rgyal cing / gdug cing drag la shin tu khro/ snying rje med cing brtse med 'gyur// de la gsang ba rung ma yin/ rmongs pa kun mkhyen yin snyam pa// yas
112b7(rgyud): chen po la mkhas pa// gsang ba 'ang ni rung ma yin// 'dren pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po nyid/ sha za 'byung po gsang ba pa/ lha la sogs pa gdug chen po// bstan pa la ni
112b8(rgyud): 'jug mi 'gyur// nga ni sangs rgyas rab tu ni// byang chub sems ni dga' chen po// seMn 'di dag shin tu gdug/ bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni rgyal chen theg chen la// na mkha' dbyings
113a1(rgyud): bzhin rab tu yang / kye ma sems can 'di dag dmam bdag gi tshig na 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni theg chen dag pa ste/ nyon mongs 'dam gyis gas pa med/ kye ma'o sems can 'di
113a2(rgyud): nyon mongs/ bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni shes rab ye shes che/ thag pa che la shin tu brtan/ kye ma sems can shes rab ngan/ bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// bsod nams chen
113a3(rgyud): po ye shes che// nga ni mchod pa chen po'i tshogs/ kye ma sems can bsod nams chung // bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/ sems can 'di dag nye bar 'tshe/ 'jigs pa sna tshogs kun tu khyab/ 
113a4(rgyud): rnam rtog gis bskyod shes rab dan// sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ bang // ga po chen po dbang phyug kyang / rmongs pa kun sel nyid gyur pa/ 
113a5(rgyud): stobs chen rdzu 'phrul chen po ste// de la rgyal po grog byed yod/ sgyu ma'i sngags ni yongasu 'dzin// de ni mi rgyud ces bya ste// se mas can rmongs byed lhur len pa// de ni rgyal po lha chen po// gtso bo rgyal
113a6(rgyud): po chen po mtshungs// de ni dbang phyug che zhes bya// gdug pa'i seM ni 'joms byed pa// de yi gzugs can rgyal po che// bskyed byed byed pa po bdag po// tshangs pa chen po rgyal po che// lta ba sna tshogs rab
113a7(rgyud): ster ba// 'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal po che// dbang po zhes bya sha tsi'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dbang phyug chen po'i bu// gdong drug rdzu 'phrul chen po can// dpung chen zhes bya'i ming che ste// gzhon nu mig
113a8(rgyud): ldan 'od can pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di lnga ni/ khams gsum gyi ni bdag por bshad/ rgyal po lnga ni gzi brjid che/ lus gsum gyi ni ngo mtshar che// skul byed dbang phyug chen po ni// tshangs pa khyab
113b1(rgyud): 'jug dbang phyug che// de yi lus can rgyal po che/ dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa// sems can gdug pa shin tu drag/ sngags bcas 'khor dang bcas pa yi// rgyal po lnga po de dag ni// se dag
113b2(rgyud): ni rnam rmongs byed/ lta ba chen po 'dzin byed cing // bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa ste// nyon mongs chen pos rab nyon mongs// gzhan yang kun nas nyon mongs byed// sems can dag ni 'joms byed cing // 
113b3(rgyud): bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid ni ga rjid pA yid chen po// de lta bu yi rnam rtog gis// sems can rnam par rmongs par byed// tshangs pa 'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag
113b4(rgyud): byed pa rang bdag byed pa po// lta ba chen po de lta bus// srin dag ni rnam rmongs byed// khyab 'jug kun song khyab byed pa// khyab 'jug rang bzhin grong khyer kun// de ltar yang dag mi 'dzin pa/ 
113b5(rgyud): lta ba'i 'ching ba rab ster byed// rgya cher rgyal po de rnams ni// lta bar smra la nges par ston// rmongs pa ma bas pa yin sems shing / san 'ching bar byed pa yin// sems can
113b6(rgyud): rnams gzhan gyis bskul// lta ba sme bar nges par sten// khyab 'jug tshangs pa la son pa// dbang phyug chen po phyag bye'o// sang+yas ye shes rnam kun du// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi byed// san 'di
113b7(rgyud): rnams rmongs par 'gyur// de la gsang ba rung ma yin// de lta bu yi rnam pa yis/ rdo rje sade'adaga' chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis mkhyen nas ni/ rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs/ mgon po chen po
113b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun/ thub pa nyi ma ma lus pas// gsung gcig gis ni gsang ba che// rdo rje yi ni tshi ga gsungs pa/ kye ma'o san 'di gdul dka'// gdug cing drag la shin tu gtum// sadus kun
114a1(rgyud): gyis mi 'dul ba/ de phyir bdag cag gsol ba 'debs// mgon khyod shes rab chen po ste/ de ni thabs chen brjod par bya// byang chub sems ni thabs chen po// nyon mongs thaMd
114a2(rgyud): nges par 'joms// gdug pa thams cad rab gdul ba/ mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs// gdug pa 'dul byed rnam 'phrul pa/ thabs chen po ni rab tu gsungs// sangs rgyas kun gyis sems can 'di/ 
114a3(rgyud): 'dul bar mi 'gyur snod min la/ thabs chen khro bo chen po ni// thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig gsan nas/ phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// tshig dag gis ni zhugs gyur pa// sangs
114a4(rgyud): rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/ e ma 'o gsang ba 'khor lo che/ thabs chen bdag nyid chen po ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa'i dngos/ thabs kyi 'khor lo rab ston pa/ ji skad
114a5(rgyud): du ni bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi/ seMn kun la phan bya'i phyir/ drag po nyid ni bstan par bya// de skad gsungs nas se 'a che// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// mi gsung bcu
114a6(rgyud): nas rnal 'byor gyis/ drag po nyid la snyoms par zhugs// drag po'i 'idakyil 'khor rdo rje mchog/ zhes bya'i ting 'dzin de lta bu// drag po chen po snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ba/ 
114a7(rgyud): drag po 'jig rung yi ge hUM/ khro ba chen po brjod par gyur// rdo rje hUM mdzad khro rgyal po// mgon po thugs ka nas phyung gyur/ sa bzhi ma lus g.yos gyur cing // sa 'di dag ni sgra sgrogs gyur// stong gsu
114a8(rgyud): ma lus 'di dag ni/ hUM hUM zhes bya brjod par gyur// chad med gzhal du med pa yi/ khro bo'i rgyal po byung gyur pas// phyogs rnams kun tu gdug chen dag/ skad cig de la gtum par gyur// slar yang
114b1(rgyud): gcig nyid gyur nas ni// gong bur byas nas rab bsdams te// khro ba'i rgyal po sku chen po// 'jig su rung ba cig tu gyur// de ni khro bo'i rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi grags chen po// khro rgyal mdun du
114b2(rgyud): 'dug nas ni// slar yang snying po rab tu mdzod// hUM t+ya hUM t+ya/ 'jig su rung ba'i spu langs byed// gnod sbyin kun bdag gnod sbyin te// rdo rje gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che// khro bo chen po brjod pa yin/ 
114b3(rgyud): steng gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od kyis khyab/ rdo rje moni drag po che/ ma lus gsal zhing me 'bar gyur/ phyi rol gyi ni gdug pa can// ma lus dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ 
114b4(rgyud): rngo me ni rab 'bar bas// g.yo ba med cing shi bar gyur// lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams// gang dag rigs kyi da dkyil 'khor rnams// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gsungs nas/ g.yo ba
114b5(rgyud): med cing 'bar bar gyur// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ drag po'i gzugs can rab 'jigs byed// khro gnyer bsnyer ba 'i gdong can te// de bzhin gnag dang sngo bar gyur// mche ba gci
114b6(rgyud): pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ dbu skra gyen brjes shin tu skrag/ spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin rdo bstan pa'i zhal// drag po rdo rje drag tshegs 'dzin// gcig pu 'bar ba rab ldan pa// zhags pa lpa k+Shu
114b7(rgyud): rdo bdag/ sangs rgyas tha~Mng 'jigs byed pa/ sa rnams ma lus g.yo bar byed// sa 'di yang ni g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin chen po 'byung po sogs// g.yo ba med cing 'og tu 'gyel// de ni drag po gnod sbyin
114b8(rgyud): che na/ sang+yas thams cad 'jigs par byed// de yi spyan sngar 'dug nas ni// cheng du brjod pa yang dag brjod// e ma'o byang chub kyi ni sems// kun tu bzang po kun dge ba/ sems can 'dul ba'i thab su ni/ 
115a1(rgyud): / brtse med khro bo nyid du gyur/ sngar ni rdo rje sems dpa' gang / zhi ba'i gzugasu rnam gnas pa/ rdo rje gnod sbyin 'dzin gyur nas// rdo rje drag po zhes byar grags// de ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin/ 'dzi/ 
115a2(rgyud): rung ba spu langs par byed/ yi ge hUM bzhi'i phyag rgya yi/ snying po gtum po cid kyang gsungs/ oM sum+b+ha ri sam+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA ba ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn+da badz+ra hUM phaT/ shin tu gtum
115a3(rgyud): zhing cher grags pa/ de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste// zhal bzhi dang ni phyag brgyad pa// bskal pa yi ni me ltar drag / rdo dus kyi me ltar byung / nyon mongs phyogs ni rab sreg byed// smin me bskyod pas gtsigs
115a4(rgyud): pa'i zhal// de bzhin rnam par 'jigs pa'i gdong / 'jig rten gsum sreg dam tshig ste/ rdo rje can kun sreg par byed// / 'bar phreng kun tu 'khrigs pa'i sgra/ rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar
115a5(rgyud): 'bar/ rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ni/ phyag gnyis kyis ni yongasu bzung // rdo bsdams pa 'dzin rgyal po// lcags kyu dang ni zhag pas brgyan// rdo yi ni lugu rgyud / phyag gnyis na bsdams 'jigs rung
115a6(rgyud): zhal// sangs rgyas thang sdigs byed pa// rdo rje gtum pos yang dag byung / drag po bka' ni nod par byed// myur ba ru ni bka' stsol cig min ni sangs rgyas khyed rnams kun// the tshom med par bza' bar
115a7(rgyud): bya// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs/ Tak+ki hUM dza hUM shin tu drag/ rigs dang bcas par lha chen po/ stobs chen po yis dgug par gyis// de nas rig pa'i mchog rgyal po// snyems pa'i tshul gyi
115a8(rgyud): bshang byed cing // khro bo drag po rnga sgra sgrogs/ rdo zhags pa bskul bar bya// rdo rje nags pa drag po che/ dpung bcas grob dang bcas pa dang // de bzhin rigs dang dkyil 'khor bcas// song la dbang phyun
115b1(rgyud): chen po khug badz+ra pA sha hUM/ dbang ldan rgyal po chen po ni// sna tshogs rang gi 'khor na gnas/ 'jigs byed ma dang lhan cig tu// 'dod pa can ni mchog tu rol/ rdo rje nags pa der song ste// khro ba'i dgra
115b2(rgyud): yis bsdigs par gyur// dbang ldan rgyal po la smras pa/ khyod la ston pa spyan 'dren mdzad// skrag cing khros nas lha chen pos// 'jigs pa yi na tshig brjod pa// nga ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal po/ nga la
115b3(rgyud): ston pa gzhan yod dam/ rdo rje zhags pas khro bo ches/ tshig ni lan gsum brjod par gyur/ rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/ khyod la shin tu spyan 'dren mdzad// lha chen dbang phyug chen po yis/ slar yang lan
115b4(rgyud): gsum smras pa dang // nga ni kho ra rgyal po rang // nga la spyar 'dren gang zhig yod// de nas zhags pas bka' bzhin byed// khro bo drag por rab 'jigs pas// yan lag thang bcings nas
115b5(rgyud): ni// dbang phyug chen po bkug par gyur// 'jigs shing skrag nas lha chen po/ shin tu smre sngags 'don cing du/ skyabs ni ga yang yod ma yin/ 'jigs pa chen po kun du byung / 
115b6(rgyud): stobs dang de bzhin nga rgyal gyis/ stobs dang shugs ni bstan na su// zhags pa bcad nas bros par gyur/ rang gi gan su song gyur nas// 'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams bos// lha dang lha min
115b7(rgyud): dri zar bcas/ skad cig gis ni 'dus gyur na/ 'khor rnams ngag ni ngu bar gyur// ji ltar sngon gyi ma byas pa'i// de lta bu ni yang dag mthong // sen rab drag 'di su zhig/ rdo rje dgas pas 'dud song
115b8(rgyud): ste// rdo rje rig pa mchog la nus/ dbang phyug chen pos bdag bcad// drag po rangs pa rab tu bros/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po khro bo gtum po shin tu drag/ de lta bu mi tshigags na nas zang
116a1(rgyud): ni 'bar bar gyur/ khre bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud// drag po las ni bka' bsgo ba/ myur du sol lha chen po// rigs chen po dang bcas pa khrag khro bo'i rgyal po lu gu rlung / gsan nas dbang
116a2(rgyud): phyug che gnas song // yan lag thams cad bcings nasu// lha mo dang bcas kun tu bkug/ skad cig 'jigs pas du byed cing // lha rnams thams cad shin tu 'jigs/ 'jigs pas sdug bsngal
116a3(rgyud): smre sngags 'don// di ring 'dra na lha chen min// stobs dang shugs ni thams cad kyis// rdo rje kun dang 'thab par 'gyur// mthu dang stobs dang shugs kyis ni// bcag nas thams cad bros par gyur// 
116a4(rgyud): lha chen la sogs thad ni// phyogs rnams kun tu bro sa par gyur/ mun pa yis ni kun tu 'khrug phyogs rnams su na tu 'jigs par 'gyur/ khre bo lugu rlung 'ongs nas/ rna
116a5(rgyud): pa kun tu smra bar byed// ma lus phyogs rnams thad du// bdag cag nas ni bros par gyur// khro bo rdo rje rig pa mchog/ slar yang tshe/ na tu khros par gyur// 'bar ba'i phreng bas rab 'bar zhing // rdo drag
116a6(rgyud): pa nyid du gyur/ drag po ha ha zhes bzhad dgod// rang gi yan lag za bar byed// rang gi mgo la rdeg byed cing // rdo gsor ba bskor bar 'bar/ de lta bu yi khyad par dang // bcas pas khro bo yang dag byung / 
116a7(rgyud): slar yang rang gi bdag nyid dran/ khro bo'i rgyal po brjod par gyur/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM/ phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po bcas nas ni// yig
116a8(rgyud): dza ni yongasu brjod// rdo rje lcags kyur rab tu bsngags// stobs dang ldan pa khug la shog/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la ag+ni sa triSha oM ku sha dza dza/ rdo rje 'bar ba lcags kyu ni/ song nas phyogs kun bdag ci
116b1(rgyud): chen skad cig gis ni stobs chen rnams// lha rnams thams cad bkug par gyur// rgyal po dbang phyug lnga dang ni// lha rnams thams cad grangs med par// rigs bcas dpung dang bcas pa nyid// gcig
116b2(rgyud): nyid du ni bsdus par gyur/ rdo rje lcags sgrogs rab tu mngags/ chings shig stobs chen dang ldan pa/ tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kun/ bcing ba lnga yis bcing bar gyur// rang gi 'khor dang
116b3(rgyud): bcas pa'i tshogs// lha tshogs gnod sbyin srin po dang // lha mir rlung dang 'byung po'i tshogs// gzhan yang gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni// thams cad bcing bar gyur nas ni// rdo rje bzhar pa rab tu mngag/ 
116b4(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu dang bcas par// song la dkyil 'kho Ta dag khug shig/ rdo rje zhags pas mngon chags pas// yan lag kun las yongasu spro// rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhags pa ste// brtan pa
116b5(rgyud): gyur par the tshom med/ bye ba dag ni grangs med bcurdo lcags kyu rab tu byung // lha la sogs pa'i re re zhing / spyi bon sa 'gugs yang dag skyer// lha chen dbang phyug chen po yi/ spyib
116b6(rgyud): gtsug tu btab nas ni/ rdo lcags kyu rgyal po yis// dbang phyug chen po 'gug par byed/ lha sogs 'khor dang bcas pa kun/ phan tshun du ni ngu bar byed// shugs rings kun tu phyung nas ni// phan dun du
116b7(rgyud): ni smra bar byed// kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o shi/ tshogs kyi gang du khyer bar gyur/ rdo 'bar ba chen po des/ skad cig de la bsregs gyur nas/ ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// lha la sogs pa thams cad bku
116b8(rgyud): gnas de ru ni thams cad dag/ yongasu bskor nas kun tu gnas// rdo rje kha khyer phyi rol tu/ lha rnams de dag thams cad gnas// rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du// lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug/ phyi rol
117a1(rgyud): rdo rje ra ba ni// lcags bsregs rang bzhin rdo rje mtshungs rdo rje can gyi rdor 'bar mes/ nang nas shin tu gdungs par 'gyur/ lha tshogs sems can de dag kyang / 'jig su rung ba'i
117a2(rgyud): 'o dod 'bod/ stong gsum 'di dag thams cad kyang / hUM hUM sgra ni yongasu brjod// 'o dong bos nas smra bar byed// ngan song dag ni ci zhig byed// sngon ma mthong ba 'di ci zhig/ 'dir ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ 
117a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin par rgyal po de/ slar yang thugs rje kun tu skyes/ thams cad bcings pa las bkrol te/ rdo rje me yi nye bar mdzes/ rdo rje gnod spyan drag po che/ rang gi dkyil 'khor nas phyung ste/ 
117a4(rgyud): lha la sogs pa kun pos te/ nga yi tshig 'di rab tu nyon// de nas lha rgyal la sogs pa/ khyod ni su yin smra bar byed// nged kyis khyod ni sngar ma mthong // gnas mchog 'di yang sngar ma
117a5(rgyud): mthong // rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/ ha ha zhes dgod bzhad pa yis/ smras pa rdo rje gnod sbyin pa// thams cad za byed bzed dka' ba// de nas lha chen gyis smras pa/ rdo gnod sbyin ngas mi shes/ nga yis
117a6(rgyud): khyod ni sngar ma mthong // bdag nyid kho na rang byung ba/ rdo rje drag pos rab smras pa// nga yi bka' las myur gnas gyis/ min na rdo rje 'bar ba 'angs// rang gi rigs ni sreg par byed/ lha chen po yis tshig smras
117a7(rgyud): bka bstan pa la ning mi gnas/ 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug nga// su yi bstan pa la gnas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa'i stobs gang yin// de ring nga yis bstan par bya// khyod la stobs ni ci yod
117a8(rgyud): // stobs chen ldan par bstan par gyis// dbang phyug chen po rgyal po che// 'byung po'i tshogs bcas lhan cig tu// tshig dag smras par gyur pa ni/ drag po nyid ni bstan par bya// stong gsum gyi/ 
117b1(rgyud): ni 'jig rten 'di/ 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ ha ha zhes bya shin tu drag/ dbang phyug chen pos bstan par bya// oM shu la a tri shU la ma hA sa ha sra shU la A yu d+he/ rtse gsum mngag gnas
117b2(rgyud): rgyal po ni// stong phrag gcig ni 'byung bar gyur/ rtsa bcas kun tu 'bar ba yis// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// nA rA ya nas smras pa/ oM ma hA sa ha sra tsa tsakre a yu d+hi/ khyab 'jug gis ni de dag
117b3(rgyud): smras/ 'khor lo gcig tu rnam pa stong / thams cad 'od zer 'bar bas khyab/ rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ oM ma hA sa ha sra badz+ra A yu d+haM// rdo rje stong ni byung bar gyur/ 
117b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba tsha bas khyab// brgya byin gyis ni smras pa yin// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// gzhon nus smras pa// oM ma hA sa ha sra shakya A yu d+he// gzhon nus de skad smras nas ni// mdung
117b5(rgyud): ni rtsa gsum stong byung gyur/ sgra ni drag po sgrogs byed cing // rdo can dang lhan cig 'thab/ tshangs pas smras pa/ oM ma hA sa ha sradat+ta A yu d+he/ tshangs pas de skad smras nas ni/ 
117b6(rgyud): dbyug to stong ni byung gyur nas// mtshon cha drag po 'a jig byed pas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/ gzhan yang lhag ma ma lus pa/ rnams kyis yang ni mtshon cha dag re re stong phrag gcig gyur nas/ 
117b7(rgyud): rdo can dang lhan cig 'thab/ tha na sprul pa gang yin dang / phyi rol gyi ni dam ldan pa// de rnams nges par stong gyur nas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thag than sal pa gang yan dang / me yang kun tu 'bar gyur
117b8(rgyud): cing // 'jigs par byed pa'i rlung yang byung // 'brug gi sgra dang glog chen pos// khyab par sring gsum gnas par gyur/ ha la ha la'i sgra chen po// namakha'i bar snang la ni drag rdo drag po tshogs che
118a1(rgyud): / go/ lha rnams thams cad 'thab par byed// de nas rdul po rdo rje 'dzin/ gtum po drag po 'jig byed pas/ lha la lan gyi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje yin sdong po gsungs/ oM mahAs
118a2(rgyud): sar badz+ra tsakre/ oM ma hA badz+ra shU le/ oM dIpU dz+wa la ag+ni badz+ra/ oM badz+ra shak+ki/ oM ma hA badz+ra ni d+hi/ de lta bu'i rnam pa ru/ snying po dag ni stong phrag gcig srid gsum zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// rdo 'chang ni chen po
118a3(rgyud): phyung // gtum po 'od zer 'bar bas khyab/ rdo rje ma dang yang dag ldan// drag po'i snying po las byung gyur// rdo rje 'atang ni dbus na bzhugs/ lha tshogs phyag rgya de dag ni/ ra bshig cing dum bur byas// 
118a4(rgyud): bcom zhing bsdams te bsreg nas ni/ phyogs rnams kun tu thim par gyur// rdo rje me yi rab bsdams pus// lha yi rgyal po 'bar bar gyur/ 'og nas sa ni rab tu 'bar// steng nas mini shi
118a5(rgyud): tu gdungs// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches// dbang phyug cha na po la gsungs pa/ lus srul po ni drag po che/ ta yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// dur khrod gnas la rab tu dga'// lus la thal ba
118a6(rgyud): ngag gis byug mi yi sha ni za bar byed// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// khrag rlon gyi ni rab tu bskus// lpags pa rlon pa gosu gyon// lha rnams thang khyod kyi 'khor// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/ gdug pa drag
118a7(rgyud): chen mtshan mo rgyu ba slongs mo ba// khrag la spangs pa'i lpags can lus la thal bas byugs/ nga yi bka' nyon drag po'i sems ldan lus srul po// min na bskal pa'i me yis rtsa bzhin khyed bsreg
118a8(rgyud): byad/ ro bsregs thal ba'i phung po bzhin du thal bar 'gyur// bskal pa'i mtshan dang mtshungs pas ni rab 'jigs 'gyur// rigs bcas dpung ldan dkyil 'khor dang bcas gnod sbyin drag/ 
118b1(rgyud): rdo rje drag po yis ni rab gzhom gzhig par bya/ dbang phyug chen pos smras pa// nga ni ma lus dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur// 'jig rten gsum gyi lha tshogs ma lus pa yi 'khor/ 
118b2(rgyud): shin tu drag cing rnam gtsigs 'jig rten khyod yin yang / khyod kyi nga yi bka' ni gnyen par gyis/ gdug dang sangs rgyas mang po'i 'khor ni sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas nga yis sprul/ 
118b3(rgyud): zhi zhing de la rnam 'dul gsang ba dri med nyon mongs med pa'i pha rol phyir// de 'dra'i mgon po dga' ba dus gsum bzhugs pa thad ngas dbang bskur/ slar yang nga yis 'byung po'i tshig can
118b4(rgyud): zhes pa'i tshig ni 'di la bu// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzi na// 'dul ba'i don la shin tu mkhas// khro ba gdug pa gtum chen po/ rab 'bar khro bo'i rgyal po ni// rdo'i byin rlabs phyag rgya
118b5(rgyud): las// bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas seder ches/ rang rig khro bo las byung ba/ gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// khro bo'i chos kyi tshul bzung nas/ rkang pa nas brtsams/ 
118b6(rgyud): spyi bo'i bar// lus kun las ni rnam par phyung // oM badz+ra kro d+ha uSh+NI Sha hUM/ rdo'i gtsug tor khro bo che// 'bar ba'i spyi bo nas phyung nas// sa rnams thang g.yo byed cing // khro bo'i rgyal po tha~Mng 'joms/ 
118b7(rgyud): oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can/ mdzod spu nas ni rab tu byung / 'jigs byed drag po yang dag ldan/ lus rnams thang 'bar 'gyur ba/ oM ni sum+b+ha badz+ra hUM/ rdo rje rig
118b8(rgyud): pa mchog rgyal po// kha las rab tu byung bar gyur/ spyi bo nas brtsams rkang mthil bar// rdo 'bar ba yang dag ldan// k+ki hUM dza/ thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che// thugs ka nas ni rab tu byung
119a1(rgyud): / 'bar pa'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/ dzagasu rung ba skulangs byed/ oM badz+ra a~M ku ka mA kAn+ta ya hUM/ rdo rje lcags kyu khrob sa/ brag pa g.yas nas rab tu byung / de rje
119a2(rgyud): klu gsor byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ oM badz+ra pa sha kro d+ha A kan+t+ra hUM phaT/ rdo rje zhags pa khro bo che// phrag pa g.yon nas rab tu phyung / rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan rdo rje zhags pas bas
119a3(rgyud): bar byed// oM badz+ra kI li kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu thogs/ lte bo'i dbus nas rab tu phyung // kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ blo mchog rdo rje gnod sbyin mtshungs/ oM badz+ra me
119a4(rgyud): la kro d+ha hUM/ khro bo chen po ske rags ni/ rkeng pa'i rdo rje rab tu phyung / kun nas 'bar bar yang dag ldan/ phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig ldan/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ba la hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po
119a5(rgyud): chen po stobs/ dpung pa g.yas nas rab tu phyung / rdo 'bar bas 'bar bar gyur/ me yis shin tu nga rgyal gyur// oM badz+ra pA la ya kro d+ha hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po gdu bu ni/ dngu
119a6(rgyud): pa g.yon las yang dag byung // gsang zhing rdo 'bar bas phyag/ rdo rje khro bo rab tu khengs/ oM sa ma ya badz+ra kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT// dam tshig khro bo'i rgyal po ni// de bzhin khro bo'i gnod byed pa// khu tshur g.yas
119a7(rgyud): nas rab tu byung // kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti kro d+ha hUM phaT/ khro bo khu dur drag po che// khu tshur g.yon las rab tu byung / rdo rje 'bar ba dag gis gsal/ rdo rje ma yis ra
119a8(rgyud): tu brgyan/ oM badz+ra ban d+ha kro d+ha hUM sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra any+dza li ban d+ha kro d+ha hU~M sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje 'ching ba rgyal po che/ de bzhin rdo rje sor mo nyid// khro bo lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi// sor mo dag lnga
119b1(rgyud): yang dag byung // oM badz+ran la hU~M/ oM badz+ra krod+ha a~M ku li ma hA kr-i d+ha hUM/ rdo rje sder mo khro ba che/ de bzhin rdo rje sder mo'i gdong // phyag ni g.yon dang g.yas pa li/ sor mo dag las rab tu byung / 
119b2(rgyud): oM badz+ra ke mA ra kro d+ha ka he rA ga hU~M/ oM badz+ra ku mA ra kre d+ha mu d+ha d+ha ka hUM paT/ khro bo'i rgyal po rkang pa dang // de bzhin khro bo spyi btsugs dag / rgyal po bla ni g.yon pa dang // g.yas pa dag las rab tu byung / 
119b3(rgyud): oM shri kha la ma hA kro d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+ha a sha ban d+ha hU~M/ gnam lcags rdo lu gu rgyud khro bo'i rgyal ba rdzu 'phrul che// rgyal po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyag dbus mo'i lhang dag las byung
119b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra ban d+ha kro d+ha ha ma hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha aM ku sha hUM phaT/ rdo rje dbyig pa khro bo che// rdo rje yini yan lag drangs// 'bar ba dang / bcas gnod sbyin gnyis// rje ngar dag las rab tu
119b5(rgyud): phyung // oM b+hu d+ha ba kro d+ha hUM/ oM d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha ma g+ha bai ga a na ya hUM phaT/ de nas dka' thub khro bo che/ de bzhin rdo rje don yong nyid // rgyal po shugs chen gnyis po ni// gdong gi mchu las rab tu
119b6(rgyud): byung // oM badz+ra ban d+ha ha la kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pa ta la mA ra ya kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rkang pa khro bo shugs chen po// de bzhin mthil gyi khro bo nyid// 'bar ba 'phro ba lhur len pa// gnyis po zhabs kyi mthil lnga
119b7(rgyud): byung // de dag la sogs rgyal po ni// dpag tu med par rab tu byung // gang ga'i bye snyed grangs med par// phra rab rdul gyi khams ngag ni// ba spu'i gseb ni thang dang / lus kyi gseb ni thams cad nas/ 
119b8(rgyud): khro bo rgyal po che// rang gi snying po las byung gyur// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spro te/ slar yang gcig tu gyur nas ni/ dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag gnas/ sangs rgyas
120a1(rgyud): kun tu spyan sngar 'dus/ ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/ se ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po/ e ma'o ye shes shin tu bzang / sangs rgyas kun gyi cing 'dzin no// theg pa chen po zhes
120a2(rgyud): byar bshad/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ dpag tu med pa zhes byar gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi khro bo 'di/ thams cad rdo rje rigasu bshad/ sems cad kur gyi don bya'i phyir/ de nyid sangs rgyas rigs can
120a3(rgyud): po 'di nas de yi gsang ba'i mtshan/ thams cad rdo rje'i rigasu bshad/ khro bo che las yang dag byung // rdo rje khro bo'i dbang phyug bshad/ rdo rje gtsug tor rdor 'dzin sku// gdod mdzes bdag cag stobs po che
120a4(rgyud): thugs kyi khro ba rgyal po che/ rgyal pos 'khor los bsnung ba dang / rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje zhags/ rked pa'i khro ba stobs po che/ de rags stobs ldan nyid dang ni/ lag gdub bzhin dam tshig dang / rdo rje khu dur rdo rje
120a5(rgyud): bsdams// rdo rje sor mo shin tu drag rdo rje sen mo rdo rje gdong // de bzhin ni/ dpa khro rgyal po// khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po lu/ gu rgyud// rdo rje gnam lcags rdo rje dbyig/ rdo rje khro bo ya
120a6(rgyud): lag drag/ rdo rje dkar thub rdor don yod// rdo rje zhags dang de bzhin mthil/ dam tshig rdo rje rgyal po 'di// rdo rje yi ni rig su bshad// de dag la sogs rgyal po ni// rgyal po chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ byang chub sems las
120a7(rgyud): yang dag byung // rtag tu gnan yang grang med pa// khros pas rang gi sha za zhing / 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab par gnas/ bskal pa yi ni ma ltar 'bar/ rdo rje khro bos dkyil 'khor na// rdo rje rigs ni bskyed nas kyang // 
120a8(rgyud): rab tu drag 'dzin bka' bsgom pas/ gdug pa rnams ni 'dul bar gyis/ nga mi ka' yang mnyan par gyis/ rdo rje can kun rang nyid kyi/ gaga' thob nas ni bzung bya ste// lha rnams kun gyi gsung gcig gis/ 
120b1(rgyud): rig pa 'dri ni brjod par gyur/ oMn su bya badz+nyA hU pa// rdo rje khro za spobs po che// bcug tor la sogs kun gsungs pa/ lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams/ 'og tu kha ltas 'grel bar gyur/ rdo rje khro ba
120b2(rgyud): stobs po che// lha rnams rgyal bar gyur nas ni/ rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhes pas// snying po dag ni yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra a na la da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po rdo rje'i me/ skad cig de las byung
120b3(rgyud): nas ni// lha rnams de dag bsregs nas kyang // de bzhin 'og tu sbrel bar gyur// rdo rje mas ni rab tu sreg/ rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar gyur// tshig cing bcos par gyur nas ni/ lha la sogs pa'o dong 'bong// 
120b4(rgyud): rdo rje khro chen de rnams de/ de bzhim the chen la sogs pas/ thams cad gsung cig byas nas ni/ slar yang snying po gsungs par gyur/ oM badz+ra a be sha a/ rdo rje dbab pa'i khro bo che/ rngo can gyi thugs lnga
120b5(rgyud): byung // lha rnams kun gyi gnas song nas// de bzhin lha chen la sogs pa// lha rnams kun la yang dag babs// rdo rje dbab par rab sdug bsngal/ babs nas rang gi yan lag dang // gcig la gcig
120b6(rgyud): ni ba par byed// rdo rje can dang bcas pa kun/ rdo rje nags pa yang dag brjod/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la ag+ni/ pra dipra ma hA badz+ra aM ku sha u kaR+Sha ya hUM/ rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal song nas/ skad gcig gis ni yang dag
120b7(rgyud): 'gug lha rnams thams cad bkug nas ni/ spyi bo ru ni ldang bar byed/ rdo rje lugs kyu yang dag 'gugs/ rje nags pas drangs par gyur// rdo rje 'bar bas rab bsregs nas// steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ 
120b8(rgyud): ha he zhes ni sgrogs byed cing / 'jigs pa'i skad cig sdug bsngal gyur/ dza rje can la gsol ba 'dabs/ sebs chen gnom par ma mdzad cig/ de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun/ dkyil 'khor du ni u
121a1(rgyud): par gyur// rdo rje can dang bcas kun gyis// rdo rje ljags sgrogs yang dag brjod/ oM badz+ra phaT bar d+ha hUM phaT/ lce tshogs gdugs pa de dag ni// 'ching ba lnga yis bcings par gyur/ 
121a2(rgyud): rjerje lcags sgeg khro bo che/ 'ching ba bstan pa bcings par gyur/ khro ba rdo rje rgyal po che/ shin tu gtum pa stobs po che/ slar yang snying po yang dag dran/ rang gi snying po yang dag brjod/ hUM snying po drag pa
121a3(rgyud): brjod pa yis// gdug pa de rnams rab tu 'gyel// g.yo med shi ba bzhin du gyur// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar thob// de nas rgyal po rnam snang mdzad// ches kun dbang phyug dbang dang ldan// rdo rje khro bo rgyal
121a4(rgyud): po che/ rdo rje 'chang la bos par gyur// sems dpa' che na po mnyan par gyis// 'di rnams sems can rab 'jigs byed// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di// srog ni gzhom par mi bya zhing // de nas
121a5(rgyud): rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje kun bdag dbang ldan pas// sangs rgyas gsung ni thos na su// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra uta tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje slong ba rdzu 'phrul che// de ni brjod pa tsam
121a6(rgyud): gyis ni// lha la sogs pa thams cad ni// slar yang gson pa nyid du gyur// sdug bsngal kun dang rab tu bral/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur// rdo rje spong ba'i byams pa yis// sangs rgyas thams
121a7(rgyud): cad rab bskul bas// de nas lha la sogs pa kun// sangs rgyas byams pas langs par gyur// thal mo sbyar nas tshig gcag gis// bcom ldan 'das la zhus gyur pa// bcom ldan nyes pa gang gin
121a8(rgyud): bdag cag 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad/ sangs rgyas thugs rje can kun gyis// bdag cag yong su bskyab tu gsaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag yongasu bskyab pa dang // pan gag/ 
121b1(rgyud): par ni ngas mi nus/ 'di ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag por bshad/ de rnams kyis gsol pa khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don// ji ltar rung lags mi 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs/ 
121b2(rgyud): rgyas bdag por gyur// sangs rgyas 'phags pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub gang // de ni rdo rje can du gyur/ byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ rdo rje gang
121b3(rgyud): yin drag po 'dzin/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu ni// de ni byang chub de dang mtshungs// brtse dang byang chub sems las byung // de 'dra'i drag po ga las byung // bcom ldan 'das
121b4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ni thabs kyis 'dul ba ste// gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ 
121b5(rgyud): khro bo bdag chen pos// lha tshogs kun la bos nas ni// dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa/ nga yis bstan pa'i bka' ngag ni/ kye bdug pa dag mnyan par gyis// min na rdo rje 'bar ba yis/ 
121b6(rgyud): rigs dang bcas pa nga yis bsreg/ khyab 'jug la se gas lha rnams kyis// tshig gcig tu ni 'di skad zhus/ gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin bgyi// de nas lha chen gyis spras
121b7(rgyud): pad rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes/ nga ni rang nyid rgyal po ste// nga yis bka' ni mnyan par gyis/ lha chen po yi tshig gsan nas/ rdo rje khro bo rab 'bar bas// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'joms zhes pa/ khro bo
121b8(rgyud): rgyal po yang dag brjod/ oM badz+ra ni sum+b+ha hUM/ shin tu gtum po stobs chen po/ khro bo 'di ni brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen po brgyal gyur nas// de bzhin sa la 'gyel bar gyur// g.yo mang 'chi ba'i dbang
122a1(rgyud): du gyur/ shing 'grel bzhin du gnas par gyur/ 'gul ba med cing g.yo ba med// rdo rje khro bas gdungs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje khro ba thams ca
122a2(rgyud): mkhyen/ bdag nyid chen po 'di yis ni// srog gi rgyu ni zad pa dang // de nyid nyams par ci phyir byed// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba yin// rdo rje che zhes bya ba ste// rdo rje rigs pa
122a3(rgyud): 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra A yur rig pa 'di ni brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen pos yang dag langs// rdo rje tshe yis gson byas nas// bde ba chen po theb par gyur// rnam par snang mdzad thub chen la// 
122a4(rgyud): zhabs ngag la ni btud nas gsol// dgon po bcom ldan skyabs gasrel// rdo rje 'dzin pa de gdug min// kun mkhyen bcom ldan bka' stsa la pra// nga yis brtse bar bya mi nus// 'di ni gdug pa shin tu drag/ 
122a5(rgyud): de nyid la ni skyabasu song // rdo rje khro bos lha chen po// kun tu bos nas 'di skad spras/ nga yos bstan pa'i bka' dag ni// gdug pa/ chen po mnyan par gyis// rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag chen la/ 
122a6(rgyud): lnga chen po yos slar smras pa/ 'chi ba chen po bzod nus kyi/ khyod kyi bka' la gnas mi byed/ rdo rje khro bo drag po che// khros pas gdug pa 'phel gyur nas/ tsu ni shin tu 'jigs byed pa/ snying po drag
122a7(rgyud): po brjod par gyur/ hU~M yog hUM ni brjod pa yis/ dbang phyug chen po slar yang 'gyel/ rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ rkang par dgug pa yang dag brjod/ oM pA tra A kAR+Sha Na badz+ra hUM/ de nas rdo dbang po 'di/ brjod
122a8(rgyud): pas rdo rje khro bo phyung / tshig ni 'di skad brjod par 'gyur/ bka' stsol brjod cig 'od chen po/ rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa/ oM pa ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ke tsar phaT badz+ra hUM dza// khro bo chen po
122b1(rgyud): 'dzigasungs nas/ dbang thug chen po sum banas// dang pas 'gug pa'i rdo rje las/ rdo rje dang pa dag gis bkug/ rdo rje khra ba de dag 'thug/ steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ 'jig rten thams cad datsang
122b2(rgyud): gyur cing / rdo rje gdung bas gdungs par gyur/ de nas rgyas po rdo rje 'dzin/ dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas/ zhabs kyis mnan nas rdo rngo yis/ dbang phyug chen po rdeg par byed/ des ni rkang pa g.yon pa
122b3(rgyud): yosaH/ dbang phyug chen po mnan byas nas/ g.yas pas lha mo u ma yaM/ nu ma dag gi bar du btsir// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// dbang phyug chen po rab tu mnan/ oM badz+ra a kra ma do// slar yang
122b4(rgyud): dbab pa'i rig pa ni// rdo rje khro bos yang dag brjod/ oM badz+ra a be shra ha na ha na tru ka/ dbang phyug chen po babs gyur pas// rang gi lag pas lan stong du// rang gdong 'jig su rung la brdeg
122b5(rgyud): stong phrag cig tu yang dag gyur/ 'jig rten gsum gnas tha mas cad ni/ 'o dong chen po 'bod par gyur// bdag cag gis ni rgyal po 'di/ 'di lta bu yi bdag nyid gyur/ de nas rgyal
122b6(rgyud): po rdo rje 'dzin// brtse dang snying rje skyes par gyur// snying rje steng du gzhug bya ste// sangs rgyas byams pa yang dag brjod// oM bud+d+ha pe tri rak+Sha/ dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gtso bos// de nas sngags 'a
122b7(rgyud): gsungs pa yis/ dbang phyug chen po'i sdug bsngal de/ skad cig de la nye bar ni// phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs dag gis// reg pas dbang phyug chen pos ni/ sa chen po ni yang dag 'thob ting
122b8(rgyud): 'dzin dang gzungs de bzhin/ tha mal pa yi lus bor nas/ rdo rje 'dzin la phul bar gyur/ lha chen 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ shi bzhin lus ni bor nasu// gang gsum cu rtsa gnyis kyi/ bye sa
123a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam/ thal bas g.yogs pa'i gnas zhes pa/ sangs rgyas 'ang ni yid 'ong ba/ de ru song nas lha chen po// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang bstan par gyur
123a2(rgyud): thal ba'i dbang phyug sgra dbyangs can// de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas gyur// de nas shi ba'i lus de yis// ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni// tshigs bcad ga
123a3(rgyud): ni mngon par brjod/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ bsad nas skad cig dag gis ni/ mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas dged mdzad// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ 
123a4(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po yang dag phyung // khyab 'jug la sogs lnga rnams la/ kun tu bos nas 'di gsungs pa/ rab mchog dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ gtso bo rab tu gzhugs par gyis// gal te
123a5(rgyud): bzhin mi byed na/ dbang phyug chen po bzhin du bya/ de na sa lha kun 'jigs gyur te/ skrag nas thams cad kyis zhu sa pa// de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal// bdag cag
123a6(rgyud): khyed kyi bran du gyur/ rgyal po khyed kyi dam tshig ni/ ji ltar sgrub par mi bgyid lags// bdag cag rnams ni khyod kyi 'khor// skal ba chen po bka' stsol cig/ rdo rje khro bas bka'
123a7(rgyud): stsal pa/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// skyabs su rab tu 'gro bar gyis// byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni// sems can kun la yang dag sbyor// srog gcod pa ni spang
123a8(rgyud): bar gyis// rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang / gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin du// de ni dang por spang bar gyis// sems can gnod dang ldan pa ni// ci nas kyang ni mi bya'o// byang chub spyod pa rab skye
123b1(rgyud): ga/ de la lhong min brtson par bya// nga yi bstan pa'i bka' yi ni// 'di dag dam tshig yang dag brjod// nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis// min na khyod ni kun tu bsregs// de nas 'jig rten
123b2(rgyud): gsum 'khor los// de nas tshig ni blangs nas kyang // byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni// dkon mchog gsum la sbyangasu song // rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ kun du phyag rgya byin nas kyang // phyag
123b3(rgyud): rgya'i snying po 'di yos ni// rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bcug gyur pas// oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sa ma ye/ badz+ra satwa sa ma ya ma nu smar/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya traM/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ 
123b4(rgyud): a pra ti ha ro me b+ha ba sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta shre ya/ ku ru ha hra ha ha hUM/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni// phyag rgya kun tu babs par gyur// rdo rje ti ri na ti ri yo// phyag rgya kun tu bstan par gyur// 
123b5(rgyud): ngag rim bzhin bcu gnas ni// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje mtshan ma lag byin nas// rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur gyur// de la lha rnams thams cad ni// rdo rje ming gis dbang
123b6(rgyud): bskur 'gyur// sngon la 'jig rten gsum bdag po// go rims bzhin du dbang bskur 'gyur// khyab 'jug zhes byar gnas par ni// sgyu ma'i rdo rje zhes byar grags// gzhon nu rdo rje dril bu ste// 
123b7(rgyud): tshangs pa rdo rje thub pa nyid/ dbang po rdo rje mtshan ma nyid// de dag rig pa'i bdag bor bshad/ rgyal ba zin pa gzi brjid che/ rdzu 'phrul chen po slobs chen pos/ khar snang la ni hU~M ba nyid// rdo rje
123b8(rgyud): mong gis dbang bskur gyur/ nyim rdo rje 'khril ba ste// de bzhin zla ba rdo rje'ang/ dbyig chen rdo rje dbyig toste/ ser skya rdo rje ser skya yin/ de la sogs pa khro rgyal po/ nga rje khro bo dbang bsku
124a1(rgyud): gyur 'de nas mkha' spyod lnga rnams ni/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur gyur// myos chen rdo rje myos pa ste// rdo rje phreng ba sbrang rtsi byed/ rnam par rgyal dang rgyal byed dang // rdo rje
124a2(rgyud): shis dang rgyal bar ldan// tshogs kyi rgyal po bdag po dag/ zhes bya la sogs dbang bskur gyur// de nas sa la gnas pa rnams/ rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur// gtun shing mdzod ni srung ba
124a3(rgyud): ste/ men de bzhin rdo rje me// rdo rje rlung ni rlung chen po// rdo rje 'jigs byed ngan rdo rje/ de 'dra la sogs po nya rnams// rdo rje mchog gi dbang bskur gyur// de nas sa 'og gnas pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu dang / 
124a4(rgyud): za ba// de bzhin gshin rje rdo rje gnag/ sa yi gtsug ni bgegs rdo rje/ chu lha mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// de nas lha mo ji bzhin du// go rims bzhi na du dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur
124a5(rgyud): gyis// yum gyi mchog rnams dbang bskur gyur// khyab 'jug ma/ ni rdo rje gser/ drug ldan rdo rje gnon nu ma/ tshangs pa rdo rje brgyad cu ma/ dbang po rdo rje khu tshur ma/ gsod byed rdo rje
124a6(rgyud): gsong byed ma// snar ma rdo rje 'od ldan ma// de las dbyibs pa rdor mchog ma// 'phrog ma rdo rje ske rags te// gsod byed rdo rje 'jig ma ste// gnam lcags rdo rje gnam lcags ma// nam gru rdo rje
124a7(rgyud): dbang ldan ma// gos can rdo rje gos can ma// rdo rje pho nya zhi ba ma// rlung lha rdo rje shugs can ma/ lus ngan ma ni rdo rje gdengs// me lha de bzhin rdo rje 'bar/ phag mo rdo rje gdong can ma// rdo rje nag/ 
124a8(rgyud): mo n+da mud+hi/ chu lha rdo rje nu srin ma/ sna chang mni sbrul mo ste/ de 'dra la sogs grangs med pa// lha mo rnams ni dbang bskur gyur/ rang rang rigs ni rtogs na sa// ji bzhin lha yi bdag
124b1(rgyud): por bshad// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba byin// de bzhin dam tshig snying po'o// lha rnams kun gyi bdag po kun/ bkug nas de bzhin dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas/ sdig mdzub dang ni
124b2(rgyud): lcags kyu bcings/ 'ching ba dang ni grol byed par// dngos po bya ba'i don sems dpa'/ de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni/ bya ba sgrub phyir gnas par gyis// khyod kyi srog ni nyams gyur pa'i// de bzhin
124b3(rgyud): dam tshig sbyin mi bya// rgya cher phyag rgya chen por ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor byed pa// de nyid zhes bya bstan pa yis// dkyil 'khor mchog rnams de dag dang // de bzhin lha la
124b4(rgyud): sogs pa kun// bkug cing rab tu bcug par gyur/ rdo rje can gyi sa dbang byas nas// rdo rje thams cad dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje ming gi sa mtshan par byas// lha chen po ni gcig pu nyid// 
124b5(rgyud): kyi 'og tu brtabs nas bzhag/ 'jig rten 'dug pa cher gyur pa// gdug pa'i snying po zhes byar grags// gdug pa'i dkyil 'a khor rgyal po yi/ sems can 'ongs par the tshom
124b6(rgyud): med// thang cig tshes grangs re re ma// gang du zla gcig dkyil 'khor du// sems can stong phrag brgya dag ni/ skad cig de la sdug bsngal byed// yid ni nye bar mjal bar byed// mdangs ni nye bar
124b7(rgyud): 'phrog pa'i nang / mi yi skye bo gsod pa dang // tha na dug chen nyid dang ni// grong khyer dang ni grong rdal dang // grong dag 'joms par byed pa dag/ sems can rnams ni gcod byed dang / skye bo stong pa sbyor
124b8(rgyud): byed dang / de ltar drag tsong 'jig su rung / brtse ba med cing sdig byed dang / gsod pa dang ni 'joms par byed/ shes rab 'phrog par byed pa dang / drag po sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin pa/ dung badz+ran
125a1(rgyud): 'gro ba'i bar dang ni// sems can rnams la gnod byed dang // myur du mdangs ni 'phrog pa dang // le nyes thog dang char dang ni// char ni mi 'bab byed pa dang // grang dang dro
125a2(rgyud): ba'i gdung ba dag skad cig de la skyed pa dang // gdon ni 'bab par byed pa dang // de bzhin gdung mchog bskyed pa dang // sems ni rnam par g.yeng byed dang / de 'dri gnod sbyin mtha' yas dang // de nas rgyal
125a3(rgyud): po rdo rje 'dzin/ dkon mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ste// skye dgu sna tshogs nad kyis btag/ ye shes kyi ni spyan gyis gzigs// dam tshig sdang ba'i sems can dang // yams dang de bzhin nye bar 'tshe/ 
125a4(rgyud): rims dang gdon dang dug drag po// skye dgu 'di rnams 'joms par byed// sna tshogs sdug bsngal kun tu 'khrugs/ 'jigs pa sna tshogs dag gis khyab/ thams cad nyams shing rtsil
125a5(rgyud): gyis non// sdug bsngal drag pos sdug bsnga/ la gyur// slar yang bde bar bya ba'i phyir// nag po'i sngags/ ni yongasu bzung // mkha' 'gro ma mo rnal 'byor mas// 'gro ba'i dis
125a6(rgyud): ni kun tu khyab/ rims dang gdon dang 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po dang // gdug pa rnams kyis kun tu khyob/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal snod 'di ni// gzigs nas rdo 'dzin rgyal po
125a7(rgyud): thugs rje dag ni bskyed par gyur/ kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ de la rje su 'arje byed med/ nga ni kho na rang byung ste/ de bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog/ nga la log par rtog pa ste/ skye
125a8(rgyud): del brtsi ba med/ dbang phyug chen po gang yin dang // gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/ yang dag byang chub rang byung gyur/ skye dgu ma lus bskyab par bya/ thams cad dag ni dgug bya nong / 
125b1(rgyud): na mchog bsrung ba bya// gang dang 'an pa zlas nas ni/ smye bu'ang rnam par mog/ de nas rnal pa rdo rje 'dzin/ dkyil 'khor slob dang pan 'dags pa zhes bya 'ja
125b2(rgyud): 'dzin la/ sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugaso// mgon po chen sangs rgyas kun/ 'di ltar bka' ni nod par byed// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// de bzhin snying po phyung bar gyur/ ma
125b3(rgyud): badz+ra sum+ba ni sum+b+ha hUM phaT// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ sangs rgyas bka' ni bzung nas kyang / phyi rol dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i phyir/ lcags kyu'i snying po rab tu phyung // oM badz+ra sa ma ya At+pany+dza
125b4(rgyud): ya sarba ma~MN+Da la badz+ra d+ha ra satwa mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rig pa 'dzin pas brjod par gyur pa yis// rdo rje lcags kyu shin tubartan// lcags kyu bdag nyid re mchog ni// brgya phrag grangs mang byung / 
125b5(rgyud): bar gyur/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rims bzhin rab tu thim par gyur// gang zhig phyogs rnams bcu po ru// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur// gdug pa de rnam
