125b6(rgyud): bkug nas kyang / de bzhin gong bu gcig tu bya/ rdo rje ma yis kun tu gdungs/ ri rab rtse mo pham nas ni/ tshad med bgrang du med pa rnams/ phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'ongs/ rdo rje dbang po'i
125b7(rgyud): gnas kun du/ 'khor nyid du ni yang dag gnas/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bos nas ni/ kye gdug skye gu rnams la ni/ rnam par 'che ba spang bar gyis/ khyed rnams
125b8(rgyud): kyis ni mtshig yong// sreg chags thams cad gsong pa slong / mad khyod rnams galas 'bang bas/ de bzhin mithal bang bya/ gdug pa'i dam tshig kyil labar gyis tshig na kyi
126a1(rgyud): zhus gyur pa// mgon po bdag cag sha za ste// ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos// ma bsdams pa yi tshig gsan nas// rdo rje khro bo rab brjid pa
126a2(rgyud): snying po drag po gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha nad ha ba tsa bi d+hi sa ya bi kri ta sarba duSh+TA na/ sa ma ya mu dra maN+Da la/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mdza mtha khA da khA / pa ra maN+Da/ badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ khrom
126a3(rgyud): chen pos 'di brjod pas/ rab drag gdug pa dag ni/ tshig cing rab tu 'grel gyur cing / dam tshig phyag rgya nyams par gyur/  dod 'bod cing ngu bar gyur// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// ji skad smrab
126a4(rgyud): bzhin byas te/ 'on kyang bden pa smra mi byi/ rdo rjesem/ sa dpa' drag po che/ rang bzhin gyis ni sangs rgyas bdag stosas chen gsang ba'i dbang po las/ bcom ldan thams cad na
126a5(rgyud): pas gsungs/ oMn sum+b+ha ha nang ha ba tsa grah+NA banad+hahUM pakade nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ sangs nas bka' la rab gnas pas/ rdo rje khro bo rab ba byed// snying po drag po brjod par gyur/ 
126a6(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha pA da sarba duSh+Ta maN+Da la b+hi Sha sha ya/ sarbe duSh+Ta sa ma ya yan bi ki ra bi d+hi sa ya s+pho Ta ya/ b+he dza ya b+haM dza ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu dra ban+d+ha/ gr-ih+Na ha nad ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya satwa sa ma ya hUM
126a7(rgyud): paT// de nas 'di ni brjod tsam gyis/ rdo rje khro ba bdag nyid che// gtum po drag po shin tu 'jig/ rdo rje khro bo rab tu byung / rigs bcas dpung da bcas ldan pa/ dam tshig sdang ba bzung nas ni/ 
126a8(rgyud): tu 'jigs pas skrag gyur cing // rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu sbrul/ phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gis/ rnam par bcom cing zil gyis mnan// rdo rje ma yis bsregs nas ni/ thams cad du ni thal ba
126b1(rgyud): byas 'byang sems las byung rdo rje can/ ji ltar sems can sreg par byed// 'di ni gzhug pa'i tshig yin te// 'phad pa'i rigs can rgyal bdag skyes// 'dod chags skyon la sogs lta ba/ nyon
126b2(rgyud): mongs dri ma gang shes nas/ rdo rje can gyis dri ma 'di/ bzung nas ye shes me yis bsregs/ sems can shin tu 'jigs te skrag/ byang chub spyod pas byang chub gnas/ mi bskyod pa yi
126b3(rgyud): gnas skyes shing // rdo rje can ni mchog tu gyur/ phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che// rdo rje chen po phyag rgya 'gugs// zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// 'dzegs pa med par snyoms par zhugs// mkha'
126b4(rgyud): 'gro ma ni rjes sbyang phyir// rgyal ba la ni bka' nod gyur/ phyag na rdo rje stobs chen la/ de nas sangs kun gsung das pa/ oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos/ 
126b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs thos nas/ 'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni/ rang nyid kyi ni sngags 'di brjed/ oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha yaSh+Ta kr-i/ sarba duSh+Ta gan badz+ra d+hAs t+yen hUM dza/ de
126b6(rgyud): nas brjod pa tsam gyi ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni mdangs 'phrog pa// rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas/ ri rab tu ni kun tu 'dus// rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// 'bar ba dang bcas 'bar
126b7(rgyud): bar gyur// spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas tshig/ smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas skyobs// skal chen rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye gdug pa'i tshogs chen myur ba ru/ gsod pa spongs la bka' nyan gyis// de dag
126b8(rgyud): re re zhing smras pa/ bdag cag 'di rnams sha za ste// gang zhig rtag tu gson gyur pa/ bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / de yi thabs ni 'di gsung so// zla gcig/ 
127a1(rgyud): lon nas shi ba gang / de ni bza' ba blang bar gyis// byang chub sems la chags bral nas/ gsang ba smong pa lhur len pa// khyod dang lhan cig yang dag sbyor/ de bza' ba ni gnang
127a2(rgyud): bar gyis/ phyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di/ rtag tu bcang bar bya ba ste/ phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung bar gyis// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hri da ya A kaR+Sha ya/ tsar+ya yaM me sa d+ho d+ha
127a3(rgyud): na mi ni ya te ha sa ri dA la~M ni rnam du sa ma ya hU~M dza/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan khro ba spyo gtsug rgyal po ni/ rnal 'byor pa ni nga yis spros// gal te dam tshig las 'das
127a4(rgyud): na/ khro bo bdag nyid chen po yis// rtag tu mgo bo 'gres byed cing / rigs dang bcas pa nges par sreg/ bdud rtsi sman gyiHdal po zhes/ bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ sems dpa' chen po
127a5(rgyud): snyoms zhugs nas/ nad kyi don du tshol bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ oM badz+ra hUM pha// de nas rgya la po rdo rje 'dzin/ sems can thams cad 'jigs byed pas/ 
127a6(rgyud): nang rnams thams cad bkug nas ni// 'gugs pa yi ni snying po brjod/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya a na ya sarba duSh+Ta dz+wa ra ni di nA shA ya hUM phaT/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // nad dang gdon gyi tshogs kun
127a7(rgyud): dang // rims sogs kyis ni de thos nas// stang du rkang pa'i 'og tu mgo/ 'bar ba'i me dang yang dag ldan/ ha ha zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/ bdag cag rims ni ma gzhom par/ khro bo chen po bka'
127a8(rgyud): stsol cig/ rdo rje rnal 'byor chen pos gsungs/ nga yis bka' ni rab tu nyon/ sems can nye bar 'joms pa spongs// mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal po rdobs
127b1(rgyud): cag gi/ srog gi srung ba mdzad du gsol// bdag cag kun ni gzi brjid za/ thabs ni cung zad bstsal du gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nas stobs chen gyis smras pa// nga yi sngags dang phyag
127b2(rgyud): rgya dag// gang zhig bsrungs la gnod ma byed/ oM badz+ra karma bi sho d+ha ya sarba A pa ra Na ni bud d+ha sa twa ma sa ye hUM/ de nas phyag rgya chen po kun/ theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ mdo sde gsang ba rgyal po
127b3(rgyud): la// yongasu bshad pa thams cad kun/ sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na// rtag par rab tu spyod byed pas// gnas de ru yang rtag pa ru/ khyed rnams shin tu gnod ma byed// de skad gsungs pas
127b4(rgyud): gdon kun ni/ hi hi zhes ni sgrogs par gyur/ spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni// gnod pa byed pa thams cad gdang // de nas/ rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis/ 
127b5(rgyud): sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya che// blo gros chen po snyoms par zhugs// ngan song bcing bar bya ba'i phyir// mgon po dag la bka' nod bye nga// mgon chen sangs rgyas thaMd kyis// kun nas snying po brjod par
127b6(rgyud): gyur/ oM shak+ka pa ya badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs chen po// rdo rje las ni yang dag byung / sems can rnams la brtse bya'i phyir/ sdig pa thams cad bkug par gyur// oM sarba pA paM a pA ya
127b7(rgyud): bi sho d+ha na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches/ skad cig gis ni ngan song bkug/ ri yi rgyal po nye ba ru// ngu 'bod la sogs snang bar gyur// rdo rje sada' rnal 'byor ches// ngan song sen
127b8(rgyud): la smras pa// dkon mchog gsum dang nga bstan la/ myur du bstan pa skyab su song // de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ stobs chen bdag cag bskyab tu gsol// gtso bos ji skad bka' stsal ga/ de bshin
128a1(rgyud): du ni bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sdig pa dral ba nges 'ching ba// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa// mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur/ oM badz+ra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya/ 
128a2(rgyud): sarba A pA ya ban+d+ha ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarba pri ya ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa tAM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya tra tha/ sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams/ rig pa 'di yis dbang bskur bas// ngan song 'khor lo dral bar gyur// 
128a3(rgyud): rgya mtsho ru ni rab tu ltung / de bzhin ngan song sha 'phos nas/ de kun rab tu grol bar gyur/ sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas thob gyur/ de bzhin thub pa rnam snang gi/ zhabs drung du
128a4(rgyud): ni skyes par gyur/ rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ de bzhin mo khom zad par gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// de nas skad cig res ni thog rmad 'byung sna tshogs gsang chen
128a5(rgyud): po/ cho 'phrul dag ni skyes par 'gyur/ stong gsu ma gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas/ rin gyi na bdun gyis rab tu spras/ rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes// de yi
128a6(rgyud): kyi ngan song kun// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spangs// sems can bde ba skyes par gyur// rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan// mchog chen po yi zhing 'di ni// dag pa'i zhing du rab tu grags// sems can
128a7(rgyud): dag pa kun tu khya gang bzhin rnal 'byor rdor rang bzhin/ slar yang shing gi nags la sogs/ rmang 'byung chen po snang ba med/ rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin kun// nags dang rdul skyes par gyur/ mngon
128a8(rgyud): dman dag dang rnam par bral// lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang / ka tsa li ltar reg na bde// stong gsum rab tu gnas par gyur// dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal kun/ dang por ngan song nye bar
128b1(rgyud): zhi/ bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ kun tu 'gags par rnam par gnas/ rgya mtsho kun tu thim par gyur// ri bo gzugs kyang kun tu khyab/ gzhan 'phrul gyi ni lha rnams dang // mtshungs pa ru na
128b2(rgyud): mi rnams gyur// slar yang mu khrung 'khor lo med// ri rab man ngar dag med// lnga yi 'jig rten gnas kyang med// rgya mtsho med cing lha min med/ klu yi gnas bzhi dag kyang med// mi yi khyim dang khang pa
128b3(rgyud): med/ grong khyer ljongs dang yul 'khor dang / phug dang bcas par rnam par bral/ mi yi gnas kyang med pa nyid// chu bo phug dang lung ba med/ mi dag gi ni lus kyang med// sems can 'ga' yang 'dir mi
128b4(rgyud): snang ngan song 'khor lo dag kyang med/ ma khom med cing sdug bsngal med/ bud med skyes pa la sogs med/ mo glang po lug kyang med/ dpag bsam shing dang spos kyi shing / 
128b5(rgyud): rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin mdzes/ spos kyi chu yiHmtsho dang / ran chen sna tshogs rnams kyi mdzes/ shing ni yid nga thams cad la/ rol mo'i sgra ni mngon par phyung // rol mos chos
128b6(rgyud): kyi sgra dag kyang // stong gsum du ni yongasu byung // ji ltar rdo rje dbang po'i gnas// ri rab ri yi brtse mo ltar// de bzhin stong gsum gyi ni gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs 'od 'bar gyur/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig
128b7(rgyud): rten 'di/ gru ba ni rab tu gnas par gyur// kun nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni// kha khyer du yang snang bar gyur// slar yang nyi ma zla ba med// skar ma med cing lha yang med// rang gi khang pa'i nang du yang / lha rnams
128b8(rgyud): nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'od kyis yongasu gsal/ 'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa/ gang gis zhing ni yang dag sbyangs/ rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ldan/ rdo rje dbang po'i gnas nyid kyang / 
129a1(rgyud): / slar yang snang bar mi 'gyuraro// gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas// gang du sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul pa/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// lha yaM pad+ma yongasu gsal/ rin
129a2(rgyud): sna bdun rab tu mdzes// dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong ldan/ bskal pa chen po'i zhing gi dbus/ dkyil 'khor shin tu sdug steng du/ dpag chad stong phrag brgyang cu yi/ rdo rje seng ge'i khri byung gyur/ 
129a3(rgyud): kun nas phyogs rnams thams cad du// dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu ldan// rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin mdzes// seng ge'i khri na pa ni byung gyur// rdo rje blar rnam par bres// dar gyi chun pos rnam par 'phyang / 
129a4(rgyud): dril bu'i dra ba rnam par 'phrang / zhing ni kun tu rab/ tu sbas/ me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram/ sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs/ sna tshogs dri yis kun tu khyab/ dpag bsam
129a5(rgyud): gis nye bar sbas/ dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan/  'i rol mo mdzes pa dge/ sgrani mngon par 'byin par byed/ 'di nyid de ni lhan cig zhing / sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du// phyogs rnams
129a6(rgyud): kun tu snang bar gyur/ slar yang 'jigs par 'gyur ba med/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// gang ga'i bye snyed grangs med pa/ shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad yongasu gsal/ 
129a7(rgyud): zil gyi gang bu gang ba bzhin/ sangs rgyas thams cad yongasu gsal/ phyogs rnams kun nas ma lus par// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs 'gyur/ dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dag la/ chos
129a8(rgyud): dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la/ rnam par snang mdzad stobs chen po/ ston pa bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur/ shar du yang ni mi bskyod pa/ lce ru rin chen 'byung ldan te/ nub tu 'ang dpag med pa/ 
129b1(rgyud): yin// byang du don yong grub pa ste// mgon po chen po phyogs bzhi ru/ rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs// phrogs dang phyogs mtshams ngag tu ni// mnyam du dmigs nas rnam par gnas/ chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa
129b2(rgyud): gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan par bzhugs// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad// sangs rgyas grangs med thams cad ni// rdo rje can ni lnga la gzhugs// phyogs
129b3(rgyud): ni re rer khyab gyur pa/ sangs rgyas gcig gis yang dag bzhugs// mtshams dang steng dang 'og dag gi/ rnam snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan gyur pa// dbus kyi phyogs
129b4(rgyud): kyi sangs rgyas bzhugs// de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'a phrul pa/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs snying po/ byang chub sems dad pa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang nyid kyi/ sa
129b5(rgyud): ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhugs/ grangs med tshad ni med/ pa yi/ sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa/ ri mo gsal ba dang / mtshungs par// stong gsum dag ni ma lus gyur// byang chub se
129b6(rgyud): dga' ba che// pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par gyur/ dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag ldan/ bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// sangs rgyas rol pa dang ldan par/ rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhugs// shar gyi
129b7(rgyud): chal yang dag bzhugs// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ rdo rje rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ lho yi phyogs na thams cad gnas/ bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ rin
129b8(rgyud): chen rnam 'phrul yang dag ldan/ 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/ pad+ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan
130a1(rgyud): // bzhugs par gyur/ bye bdag ni grangs med lnga/ byang gi phyogs na rnam par gnas/ las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ gsang dang mchod pag
130a2(rgyud): yin dang / lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni// grangs med chad ni med pa dag/ bcu gnyis kyi ni dkyil 'khor gang / sgo bsrungs dag ni grangs med pa/ rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa bzhi// rgyal po shar dang lho dag tu/ 
130a3(rgyud): nub dang byang dang yang dag gnas/ chos kyi sku las yang dag byung / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa// sems dpa' chen po de dag kun/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs la byung // gang zhig phyogs
130a4(rgyud): bcu dag gi yang byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni// / rnal 'byor chen po'i sa thob pa/ de dag kun kyang 'dir 'ongs/ pa// sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA yi/ khyim dang mnyam ji snyed pa/ 
130a5(rgyud): yongasu gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs/ de dag thams cad/ yang dag gshegs/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni// zhing dag / rtsan chen por gyur// dul rnams thams cad bya ba yang / gnod pa
130a6(rgyud): med cing 'tshe ba'ang med/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten pa'i// ji ltar sngon ni bar med pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ bar med pa ni de bzhin gnas// gang nas sangs rgyas mi snang ba/ 
130a7(rgyud): phyogs ni rdul tsam yong ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che// gang dag sa ni bzhi bcu dang // yang na chos las byung ba nyid // sangs rgyas sras ni grags pa che// rigs lnga byung ba la sogs pa/ 
130a8(rgyud): sang+yas rnam 'phrul ston pa dang / 'dir gnas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mthong // sangs rgyas dag ni grangs med kun/ lha rnams yang dag gnas 'di
130b1(rgyud): ru// sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur// sangs rgyas dgra bcom ma gtogs par/ zhing 'dir 'ga' yang mthong ma gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo mon// dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshogs kyang min// dbus
130b2(rgyud): dang phyogs ni yang dag bzhugs/ sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur/ dbang phyug chen po gnod byed pa'i/ rdo rje khro bo mthong bar gyur/ sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du// khro bo drug bdun rnam par gnas/ 
130b3(rgyud): tshangs sogs lnga rnams de dag kyang / ngo mtshar dag ni skyes par gyur/ 'jigs shing skrag nas lha de dag/ gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ gca bo ji bzhin mthong 'gyur zhing / shin tu ngo mtshar cinag/ 
130b4(rgyud): snang // slar yang lha yi 'jig rten dag srid pa nang du/ mthong ma gyur// 'gro ba lnga yi sems can mon/ ri rab dang niHmtsho min// zla ba nyi ma mthong zhing / ri dang khang pa dag kyang min/ 
130b5(rgyud): ci bdag cag ni rmongs gyur tam// yang na mig ni long bang gyur// yang na bdag cag sems g.yengs pa/ sgyu ma'i rnam rdul 'di ci zhig/ bdag cag gos ni sngar 'jigs mthong / 
130b6(rgyud): drag cing bkug nas thal bar byas/ ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/ sdug bsngal chen pos gzir bar gyur/ slar yang ri rab yong ma yin/ khro bo rdzu 'phrul chen po meng // gzhan dang khro bo chen po gcig dang
130b7(rgyud): phyug chen po gnod par byed// gnas ni chung ngur gyur pa yang / rgya chen po ru 'di ru srang / stong gsum 'di yang mi snang ste// bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa// gcig la
130b8(rgyud): gcig ni smra bar byed/ mi smra bar ni gnas gyur nas/ rdo can la lta bar byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs// gdug pa kun dang gdon sogs kyis// mun par khyab pa bzhin du ni// stong gsum 'ang
131a1(rgyud): ni mthong bar gyur// gzhan ni cung zad ma mthong ste// gzhan du phyogs ngag mud pas khyab/ rdo rje khro ba 'khrul gyur cing // kun tu rmongs pa nyid gyur cing / gcig la gcig ni rmongs
131a2(rgyud): bar gyur// ha ha zhes bya'i sgra sgrogs shing // bdag cag 'dir ni gang du phyin/ tshig ni rab tu brjod byed cing // gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// 'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang // 'di ni su yi gam du phyin/ 
131a3(rgyud): bdag cag rang gi gnas na ltung / bdag cag 'jig rten bgran du phyin/ rdo rje khro bos bsad par gyur/ 'o na 'don cizhig yin/ lnga lI gnas kyang ma mthong bzhin/ rdo rje can yang mthong ma gyur/ sa
131a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo min// bdag cag rnams/ ni mun par gyur/ rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing / ri rab nyid/ kyang mthong ma gyur/ mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min/ skar ma zla ba
131a5(rgyud): nyi ma min// bdag cag thad gang nas 'ongs// yul gang zhig tu 'gro bar bya/ 'gro ba lnga yang yod ma yin// 'jig rten med cing me mo med// mi dang mi ma yin pa dag / rnam pa kun tu mthong ma gyur// sngon
131a6(rgyud): ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis/ rmad du byung ba nyid ma gyur// gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur// rlung dag gis ni rnam par bskyod// 'brug gi sgra dang glog chen po/ sdug bsngal thad yang dag ldan// bkres skom la sogs
131a7(rgyud): sdug bsngal dang / bral min kun du sdug bsngal gyur/ nga ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dag/ rnam par nyams shing ba shig par gyur/ sdig pa / 
131a8(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya yis// ngan song gsum ni nye bar ni// lha gang 'du shes med pa dang // gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas/ phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid/ ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong gyur nas/ rang bdag nyid
131b1(rgyud): la'ang rtog par byed// gcig la gcig kyang lta bar byed// de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'jigs// ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig/ tshad med bskal pa chen po ru/ bdag cag dag par gnas pa
131b2(rgyud): gyur// bdag mchog las ni bdag cag grol// slar yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur// sngon gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la// srid gsum gnas ni mthong bar gyur// srid pa gsum yang mthong ma yin// 
131b3(rgyud): de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med// gzhan du shin tu dag par gcig/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par smra la/ sang+yas lnga nyid mthong bar gyur// srid gsum gnas ni gzhan dag min// tshogs la thad mnyes par
131b4(rgyud): gyur// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// 'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang // bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// sngon ni bdag gis 'jig rten 'di// 'gro ba lnga bcas de bzhin du/ ri rab dang ni rgya mtsho
131b5(rgyud): bcas// lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong // srid pa gsum gyi lha rnams ni// gang zhig 'di ni mthong ma gyur// gzhal yas khang dang sen ni// gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur// de 'dra'i
131b6(rgyud): ngo mtshar sna tshogs pa// gnas chen 'di ru mthong bar gyur// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul 'di/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rol pa yin/ gang zhig stong gsum 'di yi ni// rang rgyal bdag nyid mchog gyur
131b7(rgyud): pa// de yang kun tu rmongs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul pa'ang mthong ma gyur// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang mim/ chos kyi dbyings ni brtan zhig gnas ni de ru mthe
131b8(rgyud): ma gyur// gzhan du stong ni gsum po 'di/ rnam pa kun tu ma mthong nyid// sa dang me dang chu khams min// gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang min// 'gro ba lnga yi san min// zla ba nyi ma ngag kyang min// skar
132a1(rgyud): ma gza' dang rgyung skar min// sems can dag kyang khams gsum zin/ 'di dag thams cad stong bar gyur// gzhan du namakha'i dkyil 'khor min/ de dag thams cad
132a2(rgyud): 'jig skrag nas// mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob/ gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi// nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa rnams// byang sems can ni chen po yis// de dag kun ni skrag par gyur// rang rang
132a3(rgyud): gi ni zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyur// 'dus pa chen po dag dang ni/ chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min// zhing de yi ni sems can min// lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min// khang pa med cing
132a4(rgyud): zhing yang med// sa dang me dang rlung yang med/ rang gi zhing yang ma mthong zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur/ skad cig gi ni mi dgar gyur/ thar cig du ni rmongs par gyur// de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul
132a5(rgyud): du// byang chub sems ni rab tu snang / snod kyi bskal pa chen po la// 'khor lo rnam par 'khrul pa bstan// bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// de lta bu ni byin gyis brlabs// sen gang / 
132a6(rgyud): dag 'don gnas/ nyin dang mtshan ma mo shes gyur/ do nas de nyid bsang ba che/ chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i tshogs/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sangs rgyas/ de lta bu mo rnam 'phrul byung / 
132a7(rgyud): stong gsum yong su bsdus pa yi// lha yi gnas ni bkod par gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas gcig pu// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ la lar sngon po rab tu mdzes// sa la phyogs ni/ 
132a8(rgyud): rab tu sbas/ rdo sngon pas rab tu rgyan/ la lar gser gyi mdog tu snang/ kha dag gser pos rnam par rgyam/ sa yi cha yang rab tu smras/ rdo rje se pos rab tu rgyan/ la la ba la dog dmar po na khyi
132b1(rgyud): bus rab tu mdzes/ sa yi cha yang rab tu spras// rdo rje dmar pos tu rgyad// la lar btsag gi mdog can gyi// bai DUR+Ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes/ sa yi cha yang rnam par spras// rdo rje gcod kyis rnam par mdzes/ 
132b2(rgyud): la lar shel gyi mdog can gyi// shin tu snang bas rab tu mdzes/ sa ya char yang rnam par spras/ rdo rje shal gyis rnam par rgyan/ shar du sngon po chen po ste/ lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ nub kyi ma
132b3(rgyud): ni dmar po ste/ byang ni btsod dang yang dag ldan// dbus kyi sa yi cha dag ni// shel gyi mdog can bla na med// rdo rje chen pos shin tu dag/ tshon rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bshad/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ 
132b4(rgyud): babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes// cha mnyam legs par bgos pa ste/ go rims dang ni yang dag ldan/ kun nas phyi rol gnas dag na/ rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan// kun nas kha
132b5(rgyud): khyer dang ldan zhing // snre la la khyer dag gis smras/ oM rdo rje sto nga pa'in/ gzhan yang gser gyi mdog can da / kha dog dmar po mchog dang ni// gzhan yang shel ni bzang po/ 
132b6(rgyud): rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin mchog dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa/ sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rdo rje lha me tshogs kyis mchod// dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ zla ba phyed pas
132b7(rgyud): bar mdzes// g.yer ka'i dra bas kun tu khebs/ dril bu'i mchog ni kun tu 'phyang // sna tshogs shing ni yid 'ong ldan/ dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan// spos dang me tog de bzhin dri/ snang ba'i
132b8(rgyud): shing mchog yang dag ldan/ sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan/ sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// mtsho mchog chu yis gang bar gyur/ rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen ldan/ me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram/ 
133a1(rgyud): sna tshogs gdug pa dag gis bdugs/ sna tshogs dri yi chu yis gtor/ sna tshogs dri yis kun tu khyab/ drag po chen po sras bcu dag/ de nas nyams dga' ba dag khyung // shing dang pad
133a2(rgyud): thams cad las// chos rnams 'byung ba thos par gyur/ phyogs rnams kun tu rnam phyung nas// dag pa'i zhing du stong nyid bcas// rnam par sgra ni gang zhig grag/ chos kyi bde ba 'byung bar gyur// yalaM/ 
133a3(rgyud): shaM khaM/ oM badz+ra satwa kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha rA gA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya sA d+hA sA d+hu hUM phaT/ khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba bkod bka' bas/ 
133a4(rgyud): khro ba rdo rje bla na med/ mchog tu gsang ba gsungs pa b+hair/ oM badz+ra b+hi kuT+Ti kr-i d+ha ha ne hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya ma hA dz+ra 9 d+ha ma la dz+wa la ya sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ke tu ma hA kro d+ha d+han hUM
133a5(rgyud): aT+Ta hA sa badz+ra man+ta hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/ khro ba chen po rdo rje chos/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab gyur pas/ khri bo'i rgyal bar ba bzod dka'/ mchog tu 'jig su rung ba smras/ oM badz+ra d+harma ba
133a6(rgyud): d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM tIn+ta kr-i b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsa d+ha kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da la sarba hU~M phag/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha b+ha Sha ta pA tra hU~M phaT/ rdo rje las ni rgyal po che/ gsang ba thams cad kun bsdus pas/ 'bar ba
133a7(rgyud): gas pa pas khyab pa byung // khri ba rgyal pos brjod par gyur/ oM badz+ra karma kro d+ha hU~M phe~MH/ oM badz+ra ka btsakra d+hA rAk+Sha ra/ hU~M bka/ sa~M badz+ra lak+Sha kro d+ha khAng ljang hUM ga/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+hi mA \u0f7fsa d+hA la sa ma ya hUMH/ 
133a8(rgyud): sems dpa' 'di mas gsang ba na pa'i 'dzugs las rnam par gyur/ rdo rje khri badrag pa ma'abar mi nga kyi'i lal la bzugs kya/ nas rgyal ba rjorje 'dzin/ bri ba can pa sa / 
133b1(rgyud): po che/ gsang ba 'di rnams yong su brjod/ mchod pa ri lha mes gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra la s+ye ra ga ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsi ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ga te ka ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra nr-i te ba shi ku ru
133b2(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa bA dza s+phar Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+d+ha pU dza sA ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+hU pa pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra a lo ka pu dza swa re Na sa ma yi hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin
133b3(rgyud): khro bo drag po shin tu gdug rdo rje khro bo rab gtum pa/ sgo srung dag ni kun tu byung // oM a~M ku sha ma hA kro d+ha a kaR+Sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sa ma hUM hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho
133b4(rgyud): ma hAkro d+hi ban+d+ha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM be/ oM badz+ra a be sha ma hA kro d+ha a be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM ho// 'khor lo yongasu zlum por ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur// khro bo chen po'i tshogs kyis khyab/ dkyil
133b5(rgyud): 'khor chen po yang dag ldan// ga nas chen po dang yang/ ngag ldan/ dkyil 'khor chen po kun bsdus pas/ shin tug/ sang ba chas chen po/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ 
133b6(rgyud): nyid snying po gsang ba che/ thar pa chen po grong khyer ma chog/ dkyil 'khor rgyal po chen po ste/ sems can don kun ya nga dag ldan/ chos nyid rdzogs par byang chub pa/ 'di 'dra ches dang
133b7(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs/ rigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin pa/ gdon mi za bar byed pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhi ba/ gang phyir dag pa'i tshogs chen po// de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs dag pa/ gang du
133b8(rgyud): lha chen rab 'dul byed/ lha chen la sogs sprul byed pa/ de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs mchog su// gang phyir gdul bya'i sems can rnams/ sprul pa sna tshogs yang dag byung / sprul pa'i 'khor lo na
134a1(rgyud): ste/ 'drag po'i mchod pa rab bskor ba/ sna tshogs rigs can 'khor lo ste/ rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog ni// shar gyi 'khor lo
134a2(rgyud): yang dag byung // de nas rdo rje'i rigs drag po/ sems can don du yang dag 'jigs// rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po 'di// dkyil 'khor tshogs ni kun bsdus pa// gsang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po che// 
134a3(rgyud): gang phyir gsang ba'i bdag por bshad// rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus pa// rang gi rigs mchog bshad nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ches/ dkyil 'khor chen po kun du sprul// lha la sor pa gdug
134a4(rgyud): ba kun/ skad cig de la yang dag bkug/ slar ni bcug par byas/ nas kyang / skad cig gis ni dam tshig phog// rdo rje mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba// dam tshig ldan pa byin nas ni// bkug ste rab
134a5(rgyud): tu bcug nas kyang // de bzhin bcings te dbang du byas// dam tshig/ la ni brtson byas te/ dam tshig sdom pa de bzhin no// mi rnams la ni pha na pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur/ 
134a6(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste/ khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ 'jig rten gsum tshogs pham byas nas// lha la soT pa rab bcu
134a7(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gnas/ 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ gang ming bzung ba tsam nyid kyi/ sems can rab tu bcom nas ni// gdon la sogs pa 'bros par byed/ rims dang
134a8(rgyud): gdon dang dug dag dang / drag po gdug pa dam tshig dang // mtshan bzung ba yi mdo nyid la// skrag pa dang ni g.yo bar gyur// sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog mi gang dag ni gdul bya min/ de bas rje
134b1(rgyud): 'dzin rgyal ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par gyur/ rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che/ shin tu byang zhing rab tu mkhas// dgongs pa yi ni cho ga shes/ gzung rnams thos shing don la mkhas/ rab tu
134b2(rgyud): ngang zhing blo ldan brtan// rigs dang rigs min rab tu shes/ byang chub sems la brtson par gyur// lha gzhan dag la 'dod ldan min// gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba// snying rje bdag nyid ba
134b3(rgyud): ldan pa/ dag cing des la rnam par dul// rang gi ngang gis rnam par gnas// zhen cing chags la gdug pa min/ rmongs pa med cing le lo med// brtse ldan phan pa'i bsam pa can// rtag tu rnar das
134b4(rgyud): la dga'/ gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan la/ chags shring lhag par rgyal gyur nas/ srid la sems ni skrag par byed/ sring la mngon par chags pa med// theg pa chen po'i tshul la
134b5(rgyud): brtson// theg pa gzhan la 'dod ldan min// sems can rnam sa kyi don la brtson/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog byung ba/  na mongs kun tu chags pa spangs// gnyen po dag ni
134b6(rgyud): tu sgom// 'dod chags la soT nyon mongs che// mi sdug pa la sogs pa sgom// rigs dang rigs min cho ga shes/ sngags dang phyag rgya shin tu mkhas// dkug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du
134b7(rgyud): bya dang gshegs gsol dang / ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshang bzhin/ sngon du rig pa'i brtul bzhugs bya/ kha na ma tho rdul tsam la// kun tu 'dzem par bya ba yin/ tshad dang tshen rtsi srang bu dang // yod
134b8(rgyud): byang chog yang dag ldan/ bcing dang phur bus gdab pa nyid// sngar bshad rdo rje dbyings bzhin du/ bza' ba dang ni mi bza' ba/ rdo rje snyoms tshul ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil la
135a1(rgyud): du// sngar ni ji ltar de bzhin bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// dkyil 'khor chen po mchod gyur pa/ rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs// dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog grubazhi
135a2(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar gyis chun pos rnam par rgyan// rgya cher ji ltar rigs pa ru// ji bzhin rdo rje grong khyer che/ rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu
135a3(rgyud): mtshungs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong khyer bri/ 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ de dbus rang bzhin 'khor lo lo/ dbu su sangs rgyas dgod par bya/ rnam par snang mdzad sa
135a4(rgyud): pa che/  rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/ byang chub sems dpa' rtul bro che/ sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni// 'bar ba'i dbusu dgod par bya/ rje
135a5(rgyud): ltar 'bar nyid ni// phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa/ lasu rin chen phyag rgya ni// 'bar ba'i dbusu dgod par bya// g.yo na du pad+ma'i phyag rgya bri/ rgyab tu rdo rje rnon po no// 'bar ba
135a6(rgyud): dbusu dgod par bya/ brag rgya yi ni rgyal po ba'o// 'bar ba'i me dang rab tu ldan/ rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor che/ chos dbyings grong khyer chen po la/ 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po yo/ phyag
135a7(rgyud): rgya dag kyang dgod par byed// gang dang gang gi thig gyur pa// dkyil 'khor shes rab can thig gdab/ rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ rdo rje'i thig ni yongasu bzung / oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU tre mA ti
135a8(rgyud): ma hUM/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsdus pa yi// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bsdus pa// rgyal po bri zhing dgod par bya/ oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM// tshon rtsi thams cad
135b1(rgyud): yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i lta bas thams cad blta// rdo rje tshon rtsi bgyi bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ oM badz+ra tsi ta tra sa ma ya hUM/ phyag rgya gang zhig dgod par du// snying po thams
135b2(rgyud): cad dgod par bya/ sngar ni dgod pa gang yin pa/ rdo rje gzugs ni bskor byed pa/ rdo rje du mdzad dkyil 'khor du rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang / rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ mo bskyod shin tu
135b3(rgyud): mnyam bzhag pa// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ 'che ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar bas khyab/ phyag na phyag rgya dang bcas mtshon// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ni/ steng du phyag
135b4(rgyud): gnyis yang dag ldan// de bzhin kho nar phyag gnyis dag/ lcag ras kyur 'phyang ba yang dag ldan// phyag gcig gis ni zhags padasnams// gcig gis rdo rje yang dag bsnams/ mangs/ 
135b5(rgyud): 'gengs pa yi phyag rgya dang / phyag gnyis dag ni shin tu ldan/ rje rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ste/ dbang phyug chen po kun tu mnan// g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/ nu ma'i bar du gnon par byed/ 
135b6(rgyud): de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar// khro bo 'jigs par byed pa mchog mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ste// g.ya su rdo rje rgyal ba'i
135b7(rgyud): g.yon du rdo rje chags pa ste/ rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // lho ru khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can// khro bos yongasu bskor ba bri/ thad
135b8(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba khyab/ gdong ni khro bcas band ldan pa/ rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rgyar ldan// khro gnyer can ni yongasu brjod/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che/ 
136a1(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya yongasu bsdu/ rang gi gnasu yang dag bri/ mdun du rdo rje rin chen te// gal su khro bo gzi brjid do// g.yon du rgyal mngan drag po ste/ rgyab tu khro bo bzhang pa'o// 
136a2(rgyud): rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // dub kyi phyogasu dkyil 'khor de/ khro bo chen po rdo rje ste// khre bdag chen po rnams kyis bskos// rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste// rdo rje rnon po g.ya su'o// de bzhin g.yon du rdo rje rgyu
136a3(rgyud): rgyab dri rdo rje smra ba'o// rdo rje shugs kyis seng nas kyang / dkyil 'khor dag ni mchog bzhi pa/ rdo rje dbab pa las chen po/ khro bo chen pos yongasu bskor// rdo rje las ni mdun du ste/ gas su rdo rje srung ba'o// 
136a4(rgyud): g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rgyag tu rdo rje khu dur ro// dbus kyi 'kho ra lo'i mtshams bani ru// lha mo bzhini yang dag bri/ mtsham su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri/ 
136a5(rgyud): phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje me tog la sogs bri/ rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// ji skad sngar bshadag bzhin/ sgo bzhi dag ni thams cad du/ sgo srung rnams
136a6(rgyud): ni dgod par bya/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / dril bu dbab pa bla na med/ rang gi phyag rgya snying kar bzhag/ rang rang gi ni snying po yis/ rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan/ rnam par snang man
136a7(rgyud): rnam par dgod// bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo no// gtso bo rdo rje rig pa mchog/ rdo rje rgyal po mchog byin rlag rang nyid rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog/ de yis dkyil 'khor de bris nas// rdo rje ti rin ti 'jug
136a8(rgyud): yang dag par ni brtag byas la/ lan bdun du ni bskor ba bya/ chad pa gang yin yong su dag/ mkhas pas lhag par dbri bar bya/ rdo rje dril bu rtogs par bya/ grub par 'gyur te nyes pa med/ 
136b1(rgyud): rdo rje lpags kyu la sogs kun/ mnyam par gnag pas las rnams bya/ 'khor lo'i dbusu zhugs nas ni/ mkhas pas smon dbye bar bya/ yid kyis rdo rjer man/ bteg cing kun tu phye nas kyang / 
136b2(rgyud): rdo ston pani po dag yod kyis dbye bar bya ba yin/ de la stong po na 'di yon te/ mo badz+ra d+ha bsung gA tha la pra be sha la sa ma ya hUM/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams phyi'i rdo rje rigs dag dri
136b3(rgyud): khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams ni// kha khyer gyi ni phyed la gnas/ 'khor lo dang bcas rigs bcas te/ sems can gdug pa gdon la sogs/ rims dang 'byung po sha za dang / mkha' 'gro
136b4(rgyud): 'byung ba ma mo dang / lha ma mtshon cha dang ldan kun/ ji ltar mngon bar 'dod pa bri/ phyi rol kha khyer gnasu ni/ rdo rje kha khyer mdzes pa rnams// de nas sngon la slob dpon ches/ dkyil 'khor
136b5(rgyud): dbus 'dug nas ni/ rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas te// ting nge 'dzi na la snyoms 'jug bya// ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba/ de bzhin bdag nyid rnam par bsam// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal
136b6(rgyud): po// bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlab// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog/ zhes bya de 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi// skal ba chen po snyoms zhugs nas// ji sad gong du
136b7(rgyud): grags pa bzhin/ shes rab can gyis thams cad bsam// ji ltar rdo rje rigs 'byung ba// ji ltar rdo rje rags 'byung ba/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/ rgya chen gsang ba chen po dang / 
136b8(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon cho ga mchog/ rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/ rtog pa 'di las rab tu bshad/ de nas dbus 'dug byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// 
137a1(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad yongasu bcings khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu bcings// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// ba ngan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya// 
137a2(rgyud): rdo rje me tog sogs mchod pa// 'dren pa thams cad mthong bar bya// gsang ba'i mdod pa gang bya ba// phyag rgya thams cad yengasu bcing / phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya lngan/ de bzhin du ni mchod pa nyid/ 
137a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i lan la gos pa kun// cho ga rab tu ldan pa dbul// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bya zhing // gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdigs par bya// gdug pa'i sems ni gdul bya zhing // nyon mongs mchog
137a4(rgyud): tu bsang par bya/ dbab cing brjod pa nyid du byu/ rdo rje mchod pas mchod par bya// glu dang mchod pa yang dag ldan/ rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ rdo rje yi ni glu 'ad dag/ blang zhing mchog rnams
137a5(rgyud): mnyes par bya// btud cing dbul bar bya ba nyid// rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ shaM ta ga tam ta sa ta ti ri/ Tata Ta ta br-i ti pra ta ha ta/ ta sha pra ta ka ka ku Ta bi Ta bi TaT a ba kra mi te/ 
137a6(rgyud): taT Ta Ta/ ka ra Ta ra Ta ra ra Ta/ rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi/ phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ ji ltar 'dod pa bka' mnos nas// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// sngon po gos kyis stod g.yogs
137a7(rgyud): /  sngon po yis ni mag dgapa bya/ rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi// phyag rgya rdo rje slob ma bcing // oM grah+Na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM baM/ tsi rigs par ni gzhug bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags ni bskul bar bya// rje la
137a8(rgyud): ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya pra be sha yA mi// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji ltar snga ma bzhin/ ye shes dbab pa'i las ngag ni// 
137b1(rgyud): mkhas padag gis bya nyid ngo // mchong ba dang ni gtor ma nyid / rdo rje can gyis sngar gsungs nyid / shes rab can gyis kun bslab cing // bdag nyid dang bas rab tu bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag
137b2(rgyud): rgya yi/ shes rab can gyis hUM bsgrub bya// lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun// bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bslab bya zhing // bdag nyid dam ni gzhan yang rung // rdo rje phreng bas
137b3(rgyud): dbang bskur bya// rdo rje mna' yo phyag rgya yis// sngon la mna' ni bsgrags par bya/ rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ rje ye shes rab bsgrub bya// lag pas rdo rje mtshan ma gzung // rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgrub
137b4(rgyud): bya ba rdo rje yo ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje mtshan ma rab tu sbyin// oM badz+ra pA Ni karma ka rong b+ha ba/ de nas ming gi dbang bskur zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// rdo yo ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje med
137b5(rgyud): gi dbang bskur bya/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha staM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma~M/ oM badz+ra nan/ a b+hi She ka ta he badz+ra mAm/ ye shes 'byung ba phun sum tshogs// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ shes rab
137b6(rgyud): mchog gis bslab bya zhing // rdo rnal 'byor rab tu sgrug/ snying kar rdo rje bris nas ni/ sna tshogs las rnams yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar/ snying kar rdo rje bsgom par bya/ 
137b7(rgyud): rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya// rgyal ba las rnams tha~Md 'dzin// bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya/ yang na khro bo'i nang nas gcig bdag nyid yongasu bsgom
137b8(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// 'gro ba thaMng dbab par bya/ hU~M satwa badz+ra krod+ha A be sha a/ khro bo rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ rdo rje rin chen yang dag bris/ bdag nyid rdo rje rin chenaH/ 
138a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thad dbang du bya/ rdo rje pad+ma 'grin bcings nas// lkog ma'i phyog su yang dag bri/ bdag nyid rdo rje chos bsgoms nas// de nas nyon mongs tha~Md 'joms// spro bar/ 
138a2(rgyud): rdo rje bri bya zhing // rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa dge // bdag nyid rdo rje las bsgoms nas// gdug pa thaMd bsal bar bya// ho badz+ra rat+na kro d+ha ba sha mA nA ya tra/ hriHbadz+ra d+harma kro d+ha nA sha ya phaT/ hU~M karma/ 
138a3(rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ lha tshogs sang+yas thams cad ni// phyag rgya dang bcas dgug par bya// ye shes rlab cing de nas bzung // de bzhin kho nar yang ngag rlob// lag par rdo rje lcags kyu bri// bsdigs
138a4(rgyud): mdzub yi ge hUM ldan pa// khro bo yis ni ser mo bskyod// lha rnams 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog oM badz+ra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya ra hUM phaT/ de bzhin 'og tu rkang 'thil la// rdo lcags kyu yang da/ 
138a5(rgyud): briH/ de yis lha ni gang zhig mnan// de ni dgug pa'o// mchog yon/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a kra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ dpung pa brkyang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag
138a6(rgyud): bri/ lha ni gang dang gang la mnan// de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha na A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ stan la rdo rje lcags kyu ni// yang dag bris pas de mnan zhing // lha ni gang zhig kun tu mnan/ 
138a7(rgyud): de dang de ni 'gugs pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha A sa na A gats+tsha ya A kaR+Sha ya mi te he badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M phaT/ phyag rgya dbab par yang dag dpab/ mkhas pas ye shes bslab pa bya/ 
138a8(rgyud): rdo rje sbyor ba thad kyi/ sgrub pa dag kyang yang dag brtsam// g.yon brkyang ba yos gnas rnamasu// bdag nyid khro bor bsgom par bya// myur du sang+yas ye shes ni// ring por mi thogs yang dag dbab// 
138b1(rgyud): oM badz+re kro d+ha kA ya a be sha hUM a/ rdo rje du mdzad yang dag spyor// khro bo bdag nyid bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag dgug// rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ oM badz+ra da du
138b2(rgyud): ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya haM b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo bsgom bya zhing // khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya// 'khor ba'i brtson ra 'jigs rung bar// sen thangad bsad par bya/ oM draSh+Ta
138b3(rgyud): ma hA kro d+ha mA ra ya sarba satwa hUM/ rtag tu rang nyid go dgos par// yid kyis bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing // gzhan dag kyang ni bsgom byas nas// 'gro ba 'di kun srung bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha sa
138b4(rgyud): satwa hUM phaT// gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor che// rnam pa de bzhi ni bslab par bya// rdo rje ye shes de nyid che// sangs byang chub ye shes zasram// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// seMn gang phyir kun tu chags/ 
138b5(rgyud): yid kyis gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing / yaM ge hUM ni rab tu brjod/ rdo sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ rdo rje mkhar 'gro'i phyag rgya yis/ seMn sa/ nga la yongasu chags/ de yi nyon mongs rnar nyams/ k+ki a sa la
138b6(rgyud): pe a la pe ats+tsha Tak+ki hUM phaT/ 'di ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang // kun nas nyon mongs zhu zhing g.yo// Tak+ki dza/ sems can gang gi rgyud la ni// rdo rje yi ni lta bas bltas// rdo rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pos// de yi
138b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal nyams par gyur/ Tak+ki hUM/ yi ge hUM ni gyur pa las// nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa/ de yi snong kar rdo rje yang / shes rab can gyis yid kyis bsam// de nas 'jigs pa thang las// phyir mi
138b8(rgyud): ldog pa'i phyag rgya yang / rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang // rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab par bya/ Tak+ki ho// rdo rje rnal 'byor rmang 'byung che/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo rje gang // rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dkyil 'phe
139a1(rgyud): ni// shes rab can gyis mchog gsang rtag dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ yan lag kun la yongasu 'khyud / yi ge hU ni snor byed pa/ sdug bsngal rnam par nyams pa
139a2(rgyud): gyur// rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin// gcig tu mchog tu gsang ba bdag/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'ang rung // bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs
139a3(rgyud): pa ru// lus ni yang dag sbyor ba ni// dbang po snyoms 'jug brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am// rdo rje khro bo 'am/ sems dpa' gzhan de'i lus gang yin pa dang bdag gi lus
139a4(rgyud): gang yin pa mtshungs par shes pa nyid 'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// yang na/ ma par sgom pa yis// ji skad bshang bzhin yan lag 'khyud// rdo rje sa ngas
139a5(rgyud): rgyal po che// dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya// yan lag kun la yongs 'khyud pas/ sangs rgyas byang chub ra ba grub 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni snyems 'jug pa/ 'dod pa'i 'dod

139a7(rgyud): ni bde ba don yod thob// hUM dza/ sems can thams cad bde byed pa// yi ge hUM de rab sbyor zhing // bdag nyid khro bor rnams sbyangs nas// de nas bde ba thob par 'gyur// hUM/ gang gis hUM ni rab sbyor zhing /

139b1(rgyud): / bzhin 'khor lo'i 'khor bcas pas// mkhas pa yis ni bslab par bya// sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sangs

139b8(rgyud): ni 'di yis skad cig 'grub/ hUM/ rdo rje phyag rgyas lan cig bcing / mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas pas brjod/ ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyung du bshad/ gzhan du khro bo bzung bar bya/ yid kyis kyang de
140a1(rgyud): brjod bya zhing // lus kyi phyag rgyas bskul bar bya// dkyil 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas/ skad cig de la mkhas pas smug/ de nas nyams dga' rdo rje'i rigs
140a2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po grangs med pa/ lus kyi phyag rgya yang dag ldan// gang phyir sems can spyod min pa/ de yi phyir na nyung bar gsungs// phyag rgya chen po yengs bsdu ba// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus
140a3(rgyud): las// rgyud chen gsang ba zhes byag / rgyud der rab tu bshad pa yin// gsang ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas
140a4(rgyud): 'grub// 'dir ni phan yon mang po dag/ rang gi las la de sra par sbyar// gang zhig brtul zhing mngon par sbyor/ skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // zhug
140a5(rgyud): nas mngon par brtson 'gyur zhing // rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub byed na// 'grub par 'gyur bar the tsom med/ tshe 'di la ni rnal 'byor pas// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur// ga
140a6(rgyud): gis rdo rje can sbyor bas// gdon mi za bar sa thob 'gyur// bskal pa grangs med dka' ba ni// spyod pa'i bdag nyid med par min// rnal 'byor 'di la mngon par brtson/ de bas sa ni rnyed dka' min
140a7(rgyud): theg chen 'di ni gsang ba ste/ sang+yas chos kyi tshul bstan pa/ sangs rgyas byang chub snying po che// de las sa ni thob dka' min// g.yon brkyang cha lugs gnas nas ni/ khro bo'i tshig ni rab tu
140a8(rgyud): brjod// khro bo'o lta bas yang ngag khros// las rnams thaMd bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi mdo sde'i dbang po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ba de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu
140b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse me las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa gsum pa rdzogaso// / rdo rje'i rigs las le'u dang po'o// / de
140b2(rgyud): nas gsang ba dag ni kun bsdus mchog/ sems kyi dga' bkur sbyor yang dag byung // bya ba byas shing mchog tu rnam par mdzes// rdo rje dbang phyug thams cad rnam 'phrul togs// de nas sangs
140b3(rgyud): kyi ni rigs chen mchog/ rdo rje sring po'i thugs byung bang ldan pa/ shin tu gsang ba'i yon tan mchog bsdus pa/ rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs car gyur// e ma'o bud ming dga' ba che spyod pa/ 
140b4(rgyud): gsang ba kun tu bsdus pa las byung ba/ rdo rje sam sa dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de yis gsungs nas cang mi gsung bzhug so// gzungs kyi dam tshig yang dag byung
140b5(rgyud): ba mchog ting 'dzin gnas nas ches nyid gsang ba'i ni/ spyi bo rkang mthil kun bsdus bstan pa las/ de yi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs dag phyung // hrIHde nas dga' ba'i ming can dag kyang
140b6(rgyud): phyung // rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog/ gzugs khams mchog gi lha las shin tu 'das// rdo rje'i mtshams rnams lha mo'i tshig ngag grag/ dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang ldan spyan mnga' ba
140b7(rgyud): bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i zhal ldan pa// tshangs sogs rigs kyi lnga yi lha mo ste/ yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos rgyal 'gyur ba/ lha me rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang / 'khor lo'i dbu su gar+tha
140b8(rgyud): nas rtog byed pa/ de yi rigs bsdus mdzes shing yid du 'ong // rdo rje chen po rdo rje rmongs byed ma/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA rA ga me ha na ya ha// snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed pas gsungs/ 
141a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed dga'// sangs rgyas gzugs ngag yongasu sgyur ba mchog rnam snang thub pa'i
141a2(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog da ni/ bud med gzugs kyi sprul pa nyid du gyur// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul chen po mchog de ni// 'khor gyi sring mo gang yin bzhi por gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye sna de nas gsang ba'i
141a3(rgyud): brtan pa'i tshogs zhi ba/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs skus kun khyab pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byed bdag / sangs rgyas btsun mo chos nyid la gzhugs pa'i// sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos
141a4(rgyud): par gyur/ 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcu dag tu gsal/ lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams/ zil gyis mnan cing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang chungs lha me'i tshogs
141a5(rgyud): de dag rang gi gzhal yas khang na gnas// de nas sa/ ngas rgyas rin chen 'byung ba yi// gsang ba'i dbang phyug 'dren dpa ste// rdo rje dga' ba chen po rnam par dgod// gdug pa kun gyi dab
141a6(rgyud): phyug yi ge sI/ snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa ste/ rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbus ma lnga/ dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi shar phyogs cha la gnas// mi bskyod pa yi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog
141a7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje rigs can las byung ba'i// shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcas/ mi bsod dam pa'i bdag nyid can/ de yis snying po bskul ba gsungs par gyur/ snying po rab mchog
141a8(rgyud): 'byung ba gsungs par gyur/ oM bdug dus ma yang/ mi 'dza ba las sug ya la la dzadzi/ mo bcwa po gam bdun shim yan yang sa/ yo badra dun gro cwal sa ngag na thung / 
141b1(rgyud): rdod du meng bajugs 'di chen pa chog tu yid du 'ong ba des/ 'khor gyi snying po dag ni ngan po gsungs// oM badz+ra b+hi ku Ta kro ng+ga ha ra ha ra sa rba gar+dz+dza tri/ i badz+ra dz+wa la mA la pra be sham dA kle b+has g+ha rdu la la
141b2(rgyud): sarba ra bi sha dza dze/ oM badz+ra d+hadza a gra ke ye re ma hA kri d+da de hi sarba dzi oM badz+ra anan+ta d+ha si ni hA sa ma ar+tha D+ha ha ra he ra dzi/ yi ga dzi ni shin tu brtan par gnas/ snying po shin tu mchog tu gyur pa
141b3(rgyud): gsungs/ rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni/ snying po bskul bar byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs// snying po mchog de gsungs par gyur/ 'od dpag mang de bud med gzugs gyur pa/ rdo
141b4(rgyud): btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i mchog snying po bani bai dag ni gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra shud d+hi ha na duSh+Ti d+hi/ oM tik+Sh+Na kro d+hi tshin+da na sarba d+hi ri// badz+ra he tu ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya
141b5(rgyud): sar+b+ba d+hiHoM badz+ra dzi hA ma hA kro d+ha b+hA Sha pa tsa uta ga rA ya d+hIHsnying po rigs mchog brtan pa gsungs par gyur/ pa d+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa mchog/ 'od dpag med pa
141b6(rgyud): gsang mchog bstan pa ste// snying po bskul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur// Ni/ dga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang phyung // don yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur pas// las la shin tu
141b7(rgyud): bskul ba dang ldan te// 'khor gyi snying mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs/ oM sarba mu khe karma badz+ri Ni ma hA kro d+ha ku ru sarba Ni/ oM badz+ra ka ba tsa kro d+hi rak+Sha ma ni/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ma hA yak+Shi Ni badz+ra daMSh+Ta ka rA le bi la
141b8(rgyud): ba ga sarba Ni/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti badz+ra kro d+ha ni// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dag/ mchog tu gsang ba bsdus pa dga' chen po/ dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor bskul byed pa/ las kyi btsun mo
142a1(rgyud): snying po mchog 'di gsungs/ hUM/ dbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba/ gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad gsungs/ oM badz+ra shwa rI hUM/ oM rat+ne shA rI hUM/ oM
142a2(rgyud): pad me shwa rI hUM/ oM karme shwa rI hUM/ rdo rje rgyal po dang bcas bskul ba las byung gang yin pa/ rdo rje btsun mo rnal 'byor bzhi yis dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas// rdo rje rin chen chos ldan du
142a3(rgyud): mo yan lag mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ 'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs las gzhan du rna lhor mchog ni 'ga' yang med/ rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de ni rang gi 'khor tshegs dbus na
142a4(rgyud): bzhugs// des ni brtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gsungs gyur// de nas 'khor lo'i grong khyer bstan byas nas/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal
142a5(rgyud): ba'i bdag nyid de/ rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bcu na mo y-i/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri/ grong khyer rnam pa gnyis yang dag bri/ 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis sgra
142a6(rgyud): bar bya/ de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag 'ang ba dang / yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri/ de yang phyag tu dag gi tshogs dang bcas/ sgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag gri yang na gsang ba
142a7(rgyud): chos kyis mchod gyur pa/ nga ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri/ dbus kyi rim par rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs// zhags pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgya bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba nor bu pad+ma las/ 24
142a8(rgyud): ba dang bcas me dang ldan par gzhag/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lnga yi bdag nyid che/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gang du mi bskyod gtso// rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang rol par gyur/ dbang phyug chen
142b1(rgyud): po rtse gsum ldan non mchog/ de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag dang / rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dang dga' ba dag/ 'bar ba'i me yi 'od zer yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga/ 
142b2(rgyud): nas rin chen rigs ni yid 'ong ba// rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs// de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag tu/ rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan bzhad pag rgya/ de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs ni yid 'o
142b3(rgyud): la// rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste/ de nas phyogs bzhi'i mtshams ngag tu/ pad+ma ral gyi 'khor lo de bzhin smra/ de bzhin las kyis byas pa'i rigs de las// rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa// de yi phyogs
142b4(rgyud): bzhi'i mtshams ni brtan pa ru// las dang gnod sbyin srung ba'i khu tshur rnams// de las rgya cher gzugs kyi cho gas dag la// rdo rje btsun mo'i mchog drag mkha' 'gro ma// 'bar
142b5(rgyud): ba'i mche ba chen po 'jig rung ma/ dbus na rdo rje nyi ma 'bor bar ldan// sa dag srung ba'i cho gar bcas/ rgya cher gzhung mchog rtag tu blta bar bya/ sbyang dang dbab pa'i las rnams
142b6(rgyud): thams cad ni// yan lag mchog ldan dam pa nas gzung bya// de nas phyag rgya phyag rgya'i yan lag brlab/ mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar brjod/ de nas sgo dang mtshams bcas dkyil
142b7(rgyud): 'khor du// btsun mo dag pas gnam lcags gnod sbyin mchog/ de nas sgor 'jug pa'i tshogs la ni// badz+ra dza dza/ dgug pa'i pheg rdob sbyin ni rgya che ba/ badz+ra hUM hUM/ de bzhin 'ching ba'i chos ni ster/ 
142b8(rgyud): byed pa/ badz+ra be baM/ de nas ye shes chos nyid sna tshogs pa/ badz+ra a a/ de nas gsang ba'i sgeg pa dang bcas mchod// badz+ra hUM khaM/ de nas yan lag phreng ba sna tshogs ldan// badz+ra hUM hUM/ de nas glu blang ba
143a1(rgyud): dang rol mo ga/ badz+ra hUMH/ de bzhin gzhan dag dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchog/ badz+ra hUM te/ de nas phyi rol le tog rgya chen po badz+ra ti te/ de bzhin rol cha stong phrag dag brdungs pa/ 
143a2(rgyud): Ta ta/ spos dang dri ldan rim pa dag bri ba/ badz+ra d+hA tu/ de nas 'od zer snang ba rab tu spro/ badz+ra kle d+he/ de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs kyis dgug par bya/ dga' bas mnyes bya rdo rje yang dag ldan/ oM sing d+hi ya
143a3(rgyud): badz+raHA na ya badz+ra/ de nas chags pa'i sa dang 'dod chags pa/ rA ga la badz+ra sa ha badz+ra/ de bzhin nyi ma la lba badz+wa la ya badz+ra rgyal mtshan gyi ni de hi badz+ra/ band pa'i ni ha sa badz+ra/ de bzhin rjesu chags pa/ 
143a4(rgyud): ni kA ma ya badz+ra/ ral gri gzung bar bya ba ni ts+tshe da ya badz+ra/ gzhan yang bskor ba yi ni/ b+ha ma ya badz+ra/ de nas tshig gi tshogs dbyung ba bru hi badz+ra// las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i cho ga
143a5(rgyud): ni t+yaM badz+ra/ de nas go cha'i ni rak+Sha badz+ra/ de bzhin du bza' ba'i ni khA hi/ badz+ra/ yid 'ong lus ni brtan par bcing bar bya/ ban d+he ya badz+ra de nas ye shes kyi ni de bzhin brkyang // de nas khros
143a6(rgyud): pa'i yid kyis bskul bar bya/ so ngag gis ni ma mthu bsdam par bya/ de bzhin mig dag kyang ni btsum par bya// de nas khro bo'i ting 'dzin skom// gsang ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdud pa ni bcom/ de
143a7(rgyud): nas rdo rje'i tshig gis snying po brjod// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs rlab/ lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs dag ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin du/ rgyas
143a8(rgyud): pa ru ni yong su brjod// gsang ba mchog rdzogaso// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni/ rdo rje phra mo la bzhugs nas/ rdo rje phra mo brjod par gyur/ 
143b1(rgyud): sarba da thA gta swak+Sh+ma badz+ra kod+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs ni// phan pa'i don du rnam bsam bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni/ sems ni zhi ba nyid du gyur/ oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hUM/ rdo rje
143b2(rgyud): rig pa mchog rgyal po/ bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni/ rang sems skad cig gis 'dul 'gyur/ oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra rAt+na kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ rdo rje rin chen reng bdag nyid// mkhas
143b3(rgyud): pa yis ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas chos ni myur thob cing // rin chen kun mchog gtso bor 'gyur// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+harma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ bdag nyid dag ni rdo rje chos// bzod nas dag pa rnam par sgom
143b4(rgyud): gsung gi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// / oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra karma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ bdag nyid rdo rje la su ni/ ya nga dang yang du bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje sngags kyis bsku
143b5(rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ dbang bskur ba yi sems dpa' tshe// 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po ru/ rtag tu bdag nyid bsgo ma byas na// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/

144a1(rgyud): chen rgyal pong // dbang bskur ba ni bcan pa'i mchog rdo rje sngags kyis bskul byas nas/ rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur/ oM sak+Sh+ma badz+ra b+ha ku tsi kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/

144a7(rgyud): yits+tshin da hUM phaT/ nga ni brjod byed brjod bya min// bdag ni rdo rje smra ba brtan// chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas/ rdo rje smra ba thob par gyur// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra hUM kA ra kro d+ha ha ra pa tsa ya wa mu dwe Na hUM
144a8(rgyud): phaT/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing / rdo rje las ni brtan par brtag/ rdo rje tshig gis chos bshad na// rdo rje las ni thob par gyur// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra ka ma kro d+ha sarba kar hring ya hUM phaT/ Sha
144b1(rgyud): ni rgyal pa byams pa che/ rdo rje srung ba brtan pa'i bdag cag tu bdag nyid sgom byas nas/ ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badz+ra ka pa sa kro d+ha rak+Sha d+hu phaT/ sdig pa thams cad bza' bya
144b2(rgyud): shing // rdo rje srung ba bsgom par bya/ rdo rje sngags ni bskul byas na/ rdo rje na mongs thams cad 'joms/ oM swak+Sh+ma badz+ra yak+Sha Nar b+hak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta badz+ra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ rdo rje khu nur rgyal po bdag byang chub
144b3(rgyud): sems ni rje su dran// bgeg rnams thams cad bcing byas na// rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+re muSh+Ti ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ sna yi rtse mo'i sems de ni// brtan par byas nas yang
144b4(rgyud): dag brtsams// yi ge hUM nyid sbyor byas na// nyon mongs thams cad rnams nyams 'gyur/ hUM/ dang po snying ka sna rtse ru// brtan par byas nas de rang bzhin// mtshan ma de ni spro byas na// nang sogs

145a1(rgyud): thams cad bzod nas ngag e ma'o bde ba e ma'o chos/ phyogs rnams kun tu yong su spro/ hUM kur bi shud d+ha hUM phaT/ 'khor ba'i sems can la dmigs nas/ bde ba dang

146a1(rgyud): bo yis// khro bo'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma sa ma ya b+hi d+hi bsti ri trai lo kyo bi dza ye shwa ra sarba duSh+TAn ma hA sa ma ya badz+ri hUM/ khre gnyer can kun

146b1(rgyud): chen rgyal po che/ rang bdag cid ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing // rin chen char ni kun tu dbab// oM badz+ra thA ku TI ba sha~M ku ru hUM/ rdo rje tsa mar rang bdag nyid// 'od zer phreng ba
146b2(rgyud): dang ldan sgom// sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang bya zhing // phyogs rnams ni 'od zer spro// oM badz+ra sUr+ya maN+Da la be shaM ku ru hUM// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang ba zhing // bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po cad// sama?
146b3(rgyud): can bsam kun rdzogs par bya// rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod/ oM badz+ra d+ha dzA gra ke pA ra ba shrI ku ru hUM// ha ha zhis dgod bzhad bya zhing // rdo rje bzhad pa bdag nyid de// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du

146b5(rgyud): chags bya// 'dod la chags pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra pad+ma rA gI ya hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan// bdag gis nyon mongs bcad bya zhing /

146b8(rgyud): bya// oM bAka ra g+ha rA ga ya hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid las yin te// phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu grags// bdag ni na mkha'i mdzod kyang yin// mchong ba'i char gyis rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra karma
147a1(rgyud): sa ma ye pU dza hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid srung ba ste// sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa bdag/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod pa bya/ chos kyi mchod pas kun tu mchong // oM badz+raka ba
147a2(rgyud): bad d+ha rak+Sha hUM/ bdag gis nyon mongs bza' bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya// chos kyis mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra yak+Sha pA ra ya badz+ra paSh+Ta hUM
147a3(rgyud): phaT/ nga ni sangs rgyas byang rkub yin/ rdo rje khu tshur rang bdag nyid/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste/ las kyi mched pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra karma muSh+Ta sid d+ha sid+d+ha hUM phaT/ 'di 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun/ 
147a4(rgyud): ye shes gsang sngags rab thob byed// ma lus lha mo sems dpa' kun// rgyal po ji bzhin rab snying hUM/ sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ gar ma me tog sogs sbyar bas// sems dpa' la sogs lha me dag
147a5(rgyud): shin tu srung ba'i mchod pa yis mchod pa'o// de nas las ni thabs chen po// gang gis myur du rab grub 'gyur// gang gis dga' ba la sbyor ba/ sbyin sregs las kyi cho ga
147a6(rgyud): ji ltar sbyin sregs dngos grub kyis// las ni bla na med pa ltar// de bzhin rig pa'i las rnams kun/ de lta bu ni byed pa min// sbyin sreg rnam pa mang ldan pa// mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga// rgyas par rnal
147a7(rgyud): 'byor chen po yi// gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ ji ltar sbyin sreg rnam pa yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur ba/ mdor bsdus rab tu bshad
147a8(rgyud): par bya// sbyin sreg las ni rnam pa lnga// re re zhing yang rnam pa mang // zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid// mngon spyod kyi ni gsum pa ste// dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin// lnga pa dbang dang yang dag ldan// sbyin sreg
147b1(rgyud): lnga po de rnams ni/ dbang du byed pa mchog yin no// de nas thab khung rab bshad bya// sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya// zhi la thab khung zlum po ste/ kun nas yongasu zlum po yin// rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste/ 
147b2(rgyud): mngon spyod la ni gru gsum yin// thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can// kun tu dgug par byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin thab khung ring por bya/ dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ 
147b3(rgyud): khung las ni bla na med// sred kyi dus su zhi ba bya// snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las/ bi ma byed na mngon spyod kyi// drag po'i las ni nges par bya// nga gug pa dus rnams thams cad du// mtshan me dbang du bya ba
147b4(rgyud): yin/  sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya// shar du kha bltas ni don du// rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas/ lho ru kha bltas gyur pa yis// mngon
147b5(rgyud): spyod kyi ni las rnams so// steng du kha bltas de bzhin dgug/ phyogs rnams kun tu bltas dbang bya/ phyogs 'tshams thams cad mnyam sbyar bsam// yang na nub kyi phyogasu bshad/ 
147b6(rgyud): zhi la sangs rgyas phyag rgya ste// rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan ma se/ rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la// dbang la pad+ma'i rigs kyis// shin tu dgug pa dang ldan pa// rdo rje lcags kyu dgug pa la/ sbyor ba lnga po 'di
147b7(rgyud): yis ni/ sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sgrub/ zhi ba'i shing ni mngar ba ste/ rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur bcas// mab mngon spyod las ngag la// dgug pa la ni cher ma can/ dbang la me tog bcas par
147b8(rgyud): bshad/ de rnams yam shing go rims bzhin// sdosngod la yam shing rnam pa lnga// rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag sbyor// de la 'dam gyis byugs pa yi// shing la zhi ba rab tu bsgrags// gang du sdug pa
148a1(rgyud): rnams 'jig shing // kun tu 'khrug par bsregs 'gyur ba/ bud shing mngar bdag gi me// mnyam par gzhag pas rab sbar nas/ til mar gyis ni sbyin sreg byas// sdig pa
148a2(rgyud): thams cad sreg par 'gyur// oM sarba pA ba da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA// bud shing mngar ba dag gis ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas spar// 'bras kyi sprin sreg byas nas ni// bsod nams tshogs ni
148a3(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ bud shing mngar po dag gis ni// mnyam par gzhag pas me sbar nas/ mar sprugs dur ba'i sbyin sreg gis// rdo rje che ni mngon 'phel 'gyur/ 
148a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// dge ba 'byung bsam sbar nas// ku sha'i myu gu'i til ma ra gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang srung bar 'gyur// oM a pra
148a5(rgyud): tiha ta badz+ra ya swA hA/ sngon la zhi basbyar bar bya/ dbus kyi gnyis la rgyas de bzhin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa yi// sbyin sreg las ni dang bar 'gyur// shing ni tsha ba'i yam shing gis// mngon spyod kyi
148a6(rgyud): ni las ngag la// mngon spyod dang ni bcas pa yi/ dgug pa la yang de nyid kyi/ rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyi/ sngo la tsha ba'i yam shing gis// khros pas me ni rab sbar nas// mkhas pas tshor
148a7(rgyud): mas sbyin bsreg bya// tshor ma dang bcas shing dag kyang // tsher ma can gyis nges par dgug/ gang dang gang ni 'dod gyur pa/ sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs/ oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya/ 
148a8(rgyud): dzaHbud shing me tog dmar sogs kyis/ rab tu 'bar ba'i me sbar nas/ me tog 'bras bu dmar po yang // sbyin sreg byas na dbang byed mchog/ hUM badz+ra pA sha ya dzaHtsha ba'i yam shing
148b1(rgyud): dag bya zhing // rab tu drag po'i me sbar nas// 'bras bu khab bsregs byas na// mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yin no// hUM badz+ra mA ra ya phaT/ gsang ba'i sbyin sreg thams cad ni// de nas gzhan yang rab
148b2(rgyud): bshad bya// sbyin sreg 'khor lo cho ga yi// de nyid du ni ji bzhin sbyar// yam shing tsha ba dag gis ni// shin tu drag pas me spar nas// 'jigs rung lcags kyus sbyin bsreg bya// gdug pa thams
148b3(rgyud): cad rab 'jigs 'gyur// oM badz+ra ban d+ha ya phaT/ me tog dang bcas shing me la// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngags sogs 'bras bu'i sbyin sregs ni/ dbang du byed pa mchog yin no// 
148b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra ba shaM ka ra ya swA hA/ kha ba dang ni mngar ba nyi dra/ yam shing mngar po sbyar bya zhing // 'dod pa'i me tog 'bras bsregs ni// 'dod pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'gyur/ oM
148b5(rgyud): kA ma rU pU Ne swA hA/ de nas bud shing de dag nyid kyi sa ni// rab tu khros pas mo sbar nas/ smyug ma'i 'bras bu pra mo bsregs// myur du mi snang nyid du 'gyur/ oM badz+ra a tra
148b6(rgyud): ya// shes rab bud shing de nyid kyis// drag po'i me no rab spar nas// na mkha' stebs kyi me tog dang // bsreg na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra khe tsa ri ni swa hA// de nas mngag gzhug pa
148b7(rgyud): dang g.yog/ bka' bzhin byed pa rab tu bskul// ci nas kyang ni myur 'grub pa'i// go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya// shing ni kha bos bud shing bya// thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibasu brko// khros pas rdo rje
148b8(rgyud): me tog sreg/ yi ge dza ni yongasu brjod// sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// rdo rje me tog dag bsregs na// bka' byed mchog ni rnyed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra AH
149a1(rgyud): kA ra ya dza// yam shing de dag nyid dang ni/ thab khung de nyid brko bya zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i sman ma gang / bsreg na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra so ri ba shaM kar
149a2(rgyud): ya dza/ bud shing de dag nyid kyis me/ kun tu thab khung de khe na// rdo rje sems dpa' sman ma ni// bsregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ hUM badz+ra pA Ni ba shaM ka ra ya dza/ yang na sangs rgyas dman
149a3(rgyud): ma 'am// yang na bdag dang mtshan ma dag/ sgrub pa'i sbyor bas sbyin bsreg bya// sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// oM bud d+ha shaM ka ra ya dzaHtshig gi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sbyin bsreg bya zhing myur
149a4(rgyud): du grug rdo rje'i sbyor bas dngos grub kun/ the tshom med par grub par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs la sogs kun kyang / de nas gsang ba phrag rgya/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rab sgrub phyir/ rnal 'byer
149a5(rgyud): chen po bsgrub par bya/ rig pa gang zhig yid 'ong ba/ sring mo'i rigs ni thob bya'i phyir// rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan par// shin tu rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya/ bud med sdug dang lhan
149a6(rgyud): cig du// mkhas pas gdug pa sten par bya/ mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las/ de nyid du ni ji skad bshad// kun tu gur gum phye ma dang / b+ha gar mig sman bcug nas ni// de yi sems dpa' shes pa
149a7(rgyud): bya// gang phyir dgongs pa rab tu bsgrags// sdug pa nga yi rig pa ni// mngon par 'dod pa gang yin 'od // rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang // de ni bud med zhes byar grags/ rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni// rang gi
149a8(rgyud): rig kyi lha dag sprug/ mig sman lasags gzugs pa ni/ pad+ma'i steng du yang dag gong // b+hag pad+ma zhes bshad te/ gsug pa dgang par bshad par bya// byu ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ mig sman dag ni
149b1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya/ b+ha gamig sman gzhug pa ni/ pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod / pad+ma dang ni lhan cig dgong / rnam pa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ oM gu h+ya ra Ni badz+ra shi ka ri sid+d+ho ts+tsha/ gro ngang du ba 'bar da
149b2(rgyud): rdul rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/ oM gu h+ya badz+ra sad+ha n+tu/ b+ha gar gi wang bzhag nas ni// gsangadra ba'i phyag rgya gzhag par 'gyur/ mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi dag gis/ dngos grub rnam pa ba'i
149b3(rgyud): bai shang / a~M gu h+ya badz+ra sitrA~M hU~M/ dzasams dpa'i phyag rgya yis/ b+hag dgur dgum bcunas te/ dgab cing doni 'bar 'gyur na// rnam pa bzhini 'grub par 'gyur/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra gu h+ya ma d+ha hU~M/ de rje ba pa'i skye
149b4(rgyud): bdang / rdo rje phyag rgya bsdus pa dang /  rjeza ba sems 'jug de/  rdze du chur snar ba dang / rab tshig mcheg ni 'di dag dang / tshugs ma sbyor ba dngo / chos kyi phyag mye ban
149b5(rgyud): oM lasags par yo gi dang / spyod sreg cig 'ad mas do/ shes byas rgya ba smu bya/ rgyas pa tshun thams cad da// gsang ba'i drung dub tu bshang / chag la sbyor ba'ang yas na/ 
149b6(rgyud): slobang po dka'athug sa//  'ad gang sa sangs rgyas ni// mchog pang sgrub par 'gyur ba yin/  rdzo gas chen yang 'ang garlung chen kun las 'atus pa la// gang zhig mdzin par brjen 'gyur pa
149b7(rgyud): na yong pa'i dngas 'grub 'gyur/ tshogs ni bsags pa meng pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru/ gsang ba'i spong ba chen po 'di/ thos pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i rnal 'byo
149b8(rgyud): mchog rdzogs// / de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya ba'i// dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bslab par bya// ye shes de nyid gsang ba yang // yongasu sgrub pas rab tu bskor/ shin zhugs
150a1(rgyud): pa chen po ni// dngos po thams cad khyab la dgod// 'di ni rdo rje drag po bzhi/ rang nyid lnga pa dang bcas pa/ gsang ba'i brjod du med pa mchog/ ye shes mchog gi tshul thob byed
150a2(rgyud): bde ba chen po rab grub don// dga' ba chen po shin tu brtan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ hUM badz+ra ma Ta/ oM badz+ra pra ta b+h+r-i ku Ti badz+ra ra ta/ oM pad+ma badz+ra ti ta/ oM badz+ra karma a tri kro d+ha/ shar dang
150a3(rgyud): lho yi phyogs cha dang // nub dang byang gi phyogs cha dang // dbus dang phyogs bzhi dag tu ni// sbyor bas phyag rgya dgod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// thams cad bri zhing dgod par bya/ 
150a4(rgyud): sems dpa' rgyal po che/ mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor bzhin// rdo rje rnal/ 'byor rjes sbyor skyes/ rnal 'byor dag ni lhag ma dag/ de dag
150a5(rgyud): thams cad brtan par bya/ shin tu gsang ba de nyid che// mchog tu gsang ba de nyid mchog/ gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dzin// rdo rje gsang ba brtan pa che// rig pa mngon par 'dod
150a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba/ rang gi lag gis yang dag bri/ rgyal mo chen mo brjod byas na/ dkyil 'khor du ni skad cig 'grub/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+ha d+harma hoH/ rang gis dkyil 'khor che bris nas// rig pa
150a7(rgyud): brjod pa la brtson bya/ byams pas dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ 'khor ba snying rje spyad par bya// oM bi shud d+ha d+heSh+Tha dzaHrang gis gsang sngags bris nas ni// bu mo'i mchu la 'o byas te// 'jig
150a8(rgyud): rten dbang phyug btsun mo che/ shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// oM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ha mu khe hUM/ pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yi/ byang chub spyod pa rab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ban
150b1(rgyud): gyur na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dkyil 'khor 'di ni 'jug bya zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan mchog lnga yis// rol cing dga' ba nyid du bya// mdo sde gsang dbang las bshad pa/ 
150b2(rgyud): gsang ba lnga ni rab sgrub pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru brjod// 'dod pa'o sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skal ba can
150b3(rgyud): gyis dngos grub thob// gsang ba de nyid chen po ste/ rigs lnga dag ni rab sgrub pa// 'dod chags chen po rab sgrub phyir// rol cing rab tu dga' bar bya// bde ba chen po grub don du/ spyod pa
150b4(rgyud): chen po tshul chen po// de nyid rnal 'byor kun bsdus pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// ji ltar yi ge hU~M las
150b5(rgyud): byung // gsang ba rgyal po chen po byed// rdo rje hUM maHda sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// de ltar min na phyag rgya che// dam tshig zhes bya gtan mi 'grub// phyag rgya
150b6(rgyud): chen po mdor bsdus nas// rdo phyag rgya yongasu gzung // de nas grub pa'i phyag rgya che// grub pa cho ga yang dag gis// myur du rab tu 'grub 'gyur ba// rmad byung chen po rab bshad bya// oM saH
150b7(rgyud): ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhugs// phyag rgya chen po yongasu gzung // rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // sa byas byang chub rab tu smra ba/ hUM badz+ra ma ta/ rdo rje rig/ 
150b8(rgyud): pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongasu bsgom bya zhing // sangs rgyas tha~Md 'jig byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ oM b+h+r-i ku TI ba ra ta/ rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur ba// rin chen phyag rgya
151a1(rgyud): yongasu gzung // rin chen char ni rab phab nas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM pad+ma badz+ra hrIHkra/ shes rab spun du rang bdag nyid// rdo sngags kyis bskul
151a2(rgyud): zhing // pad+ma'i rigs chen bskul bar bya// hUM karma badz+ra kri ti ta sna tshogs rdo rje rgyal po che/ bya ba sna tshogs bdag nyid che// sang+yas thaMd mchod byas na// dngos grub las ni thob par 'gyur// bud
151a3(rgyud): med sdug dang ldan cig tu/ dkrol 'khor dag ni yang dag bya/ mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu byung // de nas mtshan nyid sna tsher yongs bsdus pa/ rab tu sman yang dga'
151a4(rgyud): chen po mchog/ de bzhin tshogs dang rdo spyan ldan ga/ shes rab spyan gyis btsun mo mchog chen ldan// oM badz+ra karmaho// badz+ra hUM hUM/ ka Ta ma Ter Ta ba TA ka ra Na badz+ri gr-i/ badz+dza
151a5(rgyud): gu ru/ badz+ra phaT/ ka rar gr-i/ shud d+ha g+hi/ shud d+hiTad d+ha gr-i/ bud d+hi/ satwa rA grwa ra gA/ duSh+Ti/ rAt+na/ te dza/ ke Sh+Ta trAs/ d+harma/ d+h+r-ik+Sh+Na/ Ne tA/ g+ho Sha~M/ karba/ rarAk+Sha/ yak+Sha/ san+d+hi sin+ni/ lo ga gu h+ya
151a6(rgyud): shaM ka/ tsAr+ya/ tsa ri dz+nyA na/ ra tA/ su b+ha/ ta ka kr-i/ hUM phaT/ hUM gaM hUM tse/ hUM ma/ hUM sa/ hUM ha/ hUM hUM/ hUM dzaM/ hUM ho/ hUM sa/ hUM aM/ hUM a/ hUM traM/ hUM She hUMH/ hUM d+haM/ hU~M d+hI/ hUM maM/ hUM re/ hUM kaM/ hUM haM/ hU~M \u0f7f/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
151a7(rgyud): a b+hi dz+nyi/ oM sarba ta thA ge ta tsakre sa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bai shA nA~M/ oM san ta thA ga ta tsak+She d+hi/ oM i nu ta ba na na a/ oM a nu ruHa~M/ ai an le oM/ oM nI li oM/ oM rat+na u/ ai rat+na U/ oM sa u
151a8(rgyud): ra// oM la a rI/ oM a ta li/ oM A hA ra ra lI/ oM a sha naM e/ oM b+he ha g+haM aM/ oM sarba shA ba ra~M bu ne o/ oM b+ha ra de mau/ oM s+pha ra Ne aM/ oM bi shwa aHoM maho tse pre ka/ oM tiSh+Tha kha oM a mu
151b1(rgyud): kha ga/ oM a b+hi She g+ha/ oM dz+nyA ne da/ oM ts+tshe da tsa/ oM bA ra hrir tsha/ oM b+ha she dza/ oM b+ha d+he dzA/ oM pra sha me ta/ oM kro d+hoH/ oM har Ne wa/ oM b+hi g+ha Da/ oM kA pe D+ha/ oM a Nu Na/ oM TakI le ta/ aM bi su le tha/ maur+d+ha
151b2(rgyud): ra Ni nga / oM ba ta ke d+ha/ oM ba le ke na/ oM tra ta pa/ oM sarba ha ra Ni pa/ oM b+hu sha ni ba/ oM b+hi ba sha ni b+ha/ oM A ra te ma/ oM a li ni/ ya/ oM tra trar/ oM ba sha la/ oM bud d+ha wa/ oM d+ha me sha/ oM yaM b+ha Sha/ oM
151b3(rgyud): sarbe sa/ oM d+ha li ni ha/ ho tha/ hUM dzaHhA sa/ oM a kha haM/ a ro/ ni gi da sha/ tra ra d+hi/ b+hu ga sa ya/ a hi/ kro d+ha/ dA ma sha/ b+ha ra ya/ yuk+Shi/ der sha na/ hA sa ya/ he ma hA Ne/ d+ha ra Na/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa
151b4(rgyud): bidz+rA ma hA mu te ra dzA gaN+Do rA dzA kra ya hi hUM hUM hUM hUM sa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di// mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs pas/ chos dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin
151b5(rgyud): te// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung // brda legs sgom pa byas dang mtshungs pa med// e ma'o gsang ba che na po gsung ba kun bsdus pa/ rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mchu
151b6(rgyud): pa med/ bde ba chen po 'di ni brtan pa'i dngos por gyur// dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste// mchod 'os gsang ba'i kun bsdus pa// kun mkhyen gsung las byung ba'i dkyil
151b7(rgyud): 'khor kun bsdus pa/ tshegs rgyas rab tu 'phel bar gyur pa gsungs pa yin// rdo rje chen po skal pa ches// gsang ba thams cad rjesu bslab// de nyid chos ni rnal 'byor che// stug pa bsdus pa 'jug
151b8(rgyud): par bya/ brgya dang sum cu rtsa drug lhag/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// bri dang rdor tshig yi ge yis/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya// rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ dkyil
152a1(rgyud): 'khor gsang ba 'di ru ni/ de nyid yige rnam dag pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po 'jug par bya/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// thig bzhi dang
152a2(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/ rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// sdug po gsang ba shin tu brtan/ de nyid gsang ba bslab bya'i phyir// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor
152a3(rgyud): bslab/ e ma'o dkyil 'khor sbyar ba yis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus sha/ rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod// gru bzhi mnyam pa'i rim pa ni/ 
152a4(rgyud): thaMd kyi nang du bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// de yi phyogs na mas thams cad du// ci rigs par ni yang dag bri/ ngos bzhi'i ra
152a5(rgyud): bzhin dkyil 'khor la// yi ge sum cu rtsa drug dgod// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/ yig bcu drug yang da ga bri/ yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni// phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 'od bcas pa/
