152a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i logs bzhi ru// yi ge rnams ni yang dag bri// yi ge sum cu sum cu ni// phyogs rnams kun tu dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbu su ni// yig hUM ni sbyar bar bya// gang
152a7(rgyud): zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyi// sangs rgyas dbus dgod par bya// rdo rje yi ge rab sbyor byed/ shes rab can gyi yi ge rnams/ rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yis// dbusu rdo rje rdo rje bzhi/ shar du yi ge sum
152a8(rgyud): cu bri/ yi ge sum cu de bzhin lhor// sum cu byang gi phyogs cha ru// nub tu sum cu sbyar bar bya// yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor// dbusu sangs rgyas pa ni ldan bya// dornal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ 
152b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ dpal ldan 'jig rten rnal 'byor ldan// dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur pa// smra ba las byung rgyal ba che// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'jug par bya// u re ti ke ta
152b2(rgyud): ma hU r+ya yo d+har+ya ba ra te nA ma naM// de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya// ha ha ho co gsang chen po'i// rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa// rgya chen gzi brjid chen po'i don// rdo rje thig
152b3(rgyud): gis yongasu bskor// slob dpon chen pos blta byas nas// yi ge rab tu brjod par bya// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor le yos// rdo rje'i 'khor lo kun tu spro/ a A'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung // i
152b4(rgyud): oM dbang phyug chen po'i 'od/ u u rnon po 'cha nga ba ste/ e aM sgra dbyangs rab bskul ba/ oM oM skyabs byed rtsibs chen po// a aHshes rab ston bzang ba// rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis
152b5(rgyud): kyang // rdo rje 'chang ni bskul bar bya// ji ltar 'kho ra lo dzaM ltar rigs// ji 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i tsho gas// de bzhin khor lo yongasu dgod// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// skal ba chen
152b6(rgyud): po gsang ba 'di// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag sbyor// rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bskor// 'khor lo dbab dang gzhug pa dang // cho ga ji bzhin 'jug par bya/ rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas
152b7(rgyud): bar ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // 'khor lo dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'khor lo'i gnas ni dbang du 'gyur/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ rdo rje 'gugs
152b8(rgyud): dang skal ldan dang / nges byed rin chen gzi brjid dang // rgyal mtshan bzhad pa yang dag ldan// chos dang rnon po gtso bo mchog/ rgyu dang gtum po drag po che// las dang srung ba gnod sbyin grub/ sna tshog
153a1(rgyud): sbyor ba yang dag ldan// 'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung // de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje 'khor lo kun tu bri/ rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor 'di
153a2(rgyud): ni gzhug par bya// bu dang slob ma min pa la/ gsang ba'i tshegs chen sbyin mo bya// gzhan du skal ba dang ldan pa// gzhung 'di khyed kyis ci bder byin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
153a3(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid shin tu gsang ba'i bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa
153a4(rgyud): rdzogs// de nas bcom ldan 'ad sa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ba ces pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na
153a5(rgyud): nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur te/ rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje ma ga/ rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje'i mda'/ rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lus
153a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba rgyal mtshan che/ rdo rje gang rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag rdo rje sde ste chos mchog 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu no// rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che// las kyi rdo rje rdo rje che// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jig
153a7(rgyud): chen po// rdo rje phyag rgya sgra chen po// rdo rje khu tshur brtan pa che/ rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che/ las chen po ste mnga' chen po// rdo rje legs pa dga' ba che// rdo rje rgyan ni 'phrog byed pa/ rdo rje 'od nga rgyal mtshan
153a8(rgyud): rdo rje tshems ni rab dga' ba/ rdo rje pad+ma shin tu gcod// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje rig/ rdo rje ljags te sna tshogs che/ sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu ma 'a// go cha chen po rdo rje sku// rdo rje mcheb
153b1(rgyud): 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje che// rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu mdzod chen po// zhags pa chen po dbang chen mo/ rje b+h+rUM lcags sgrogs 'byebs po che// rdo rje dbab pa 'jigs
153b2(rgyud): byed pa// yi ge dza ste yi ge hUM/ yi ge hUM ni dam du 'ching // yi ge hoHste yi ge haHrdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che// lcags kyu bsdig med rdo rje khre// rdo rje bdud sde bdud
153b3(rgyud): kyi mchog/ bdud kyi bdud ni rab 'joms pa/ rdo rje dga' bzhi pa che/ rdo rje dka' thub shis mdzad pa// rdo rje drag po shin tu gdug/ rdo rje rang dbang rdo rje mdzad// rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo che/ rdo rje sgra
153b4(rgyud): ste sgra chen po// sangs rgyas hUM mdzad yig hUM/ yi ge phaT sogs dang mnyam pa/ yi ge phaT ni 'bar ba'i bka'/ yaM ge swAhA rang bdag med/ gtso bo gsod dang slob mdzad pa/ dri med
153b5(rgyud): skrag dang dbugs 'byin mdzad/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khro bo che/ khro bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// 'dod/ gas las byung de bzhin nyid/ rdo rje khro bo khyed phyag 'tshal/ mtsha/ 
153b6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// nyin ra zhing du lan gcig ni// gang zhig 'don par byed pa de// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de dag la ni 'jig pa med// phongs dang bran dag nyid mi 'gyur/ 
153b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa/ dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba 'debs// gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba dang // de bzhin sems can don bya'i phyir/ tshul chen
153b8(rgyud): bskyed par mdzad du gsol// gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje sleb dpon chen po karma badz+ri zhal snga nas dang / 
154a1(rgyud): lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon du tshul khrims kyi sgyur cing zhus pa'o// / bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// rgya gar skad du// sarba ra ha s+ya
154a2(rgyud): na ma tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 'byung lnga nyid kyis lnga yi bdag nyid can// mi rnams lus
154a3(rgyud): la nges par mthong ba dag/ rang sems rab tu bsgom par gyur na ni// dngos der bsgom pas nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur// rang shes gsang ba dam pa ni// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med de// gnyis med
154a4(rgyud): gnyis kyi tshul can te/ sangs rgyas rtag par rab tu dung // yang dag bdag med las byung zhing / gnyis med ye shes/ las byung ba/ sdug dang mi sdug rnam spangs pa/ ci la'ang phyag ni ma
154a5(rgyud): 'tshal to// ma skyes pa ni yang dag skyed// skyes pa'ig tu rtag par ni// sangs rgyas skur ni sgom pa de// rang gi ye shes mcho ga phyag 'tshal// rnal 'byer ba dang sems can kun// ma skyes pa
154a6(rgyud): ni yang dag skyed// skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni// nyon mongs bag chags kyis sun 'byin// lus can rnams ni 'khor gyur pa/ sdug dang mi sdug rnam 'byed yin// sems gang de nyid sdug bsngal te/ 
154a7(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi lus 'byung ngo // sems de yi ni rgyun nyid kyis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mgon// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus gcig pu/ sangs rgyas
154a8(rgyud): thams cad rtogs gyur pa// sangs rgyas 'khor ba sgrol ba po// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ thugs rje'i nyams dang yang dag ldan/ rgyu yi de nyid mnyam sbyor bas// 'bras bu'i de nyid rnams
154b1(rgyud): kyang ston// 'bras bu'i de nyid yang dag zhugs// rgyu yi de nyid mi 'dod do// gang du 'dod pa skyes gyur pa// de nyid 'khor ba'i bag chags yin// mkhas pa yi ni cho ga yis// sgom pa ru ni yongasu btags/ 
154b2(rgyud): gang zhig slar yang gcig gyur pa/ rnal 'byor pa yo rnal 'byor byung / sangs rgyas rjes dran la dmigs shing / chos ni rje su dmigs pa yi/ tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis// rkang gnyis dam pa
154b3(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag ste// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam par bsgom/ sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sprin ni bsgom par bya/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag ste/ rdo rje
154b4(rgyud): chos ni rnam par sgom// chos ni rjes dran rnal 'byor pa// chos kyi sprin las char rab 'bebs/ mtshan ma ling ga zhes bshad de/ phyag rgya'i mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi// 'joms pas b+ha ga zhes
154b5(rgyud): bshad de// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i dam pa yin// sems can kun gyi dngos kun gyi// rang sems chos ni bsdu sa pa yin/ chos bdag med pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsang na rang
154b6(rgyud): nyid 'chi bar 'gyur// rang gi sems nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// rtogs par bya ba sems nyid yin// rang gi sems nyid bsad bya ba// sems nyid kho na bsad par bya/ sbyor ba nyid dang yang dag
154b7(rgyud): 'phel/ gang yang srid pa 'byung ma yin/ gang tshe sangs rgyas de tshen/ sbyor lnga sangs rgyas bdag ces sgom// ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba/ sangs rgyas nyid phyir mdor bsdus pa// sangs
154b8(rgyud): rgyas rnal 'byor med par ni/ rnal 'byor pa ni 'tshang ma rgya/ phra mo'i dngos po ji bzhin mthong // sdug pa'i dngos por de bzhin te// dngos dang dngos med khyad par ni// sgom pa kun tu brtags pa
155a1(rgyud): yin dngos po sgom pa'i dngos ma yin// sgom par bya ba sgom pa min// dngos po sgom par gyur pa yis/ rang gi sems ni yongasu sbyang // sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yul ma
155a2(rgyud): yin// sems can yul du'ang mi 'gyur gyi/ rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rtogs pas min// gnyis med sbyor ba 'od la yang / ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes brtsag
155a3(rgyud): d+hu yi de cing ji ltar mthong // 'bras bu'i de nyid de nyid yin/ rgyu yi de nyid cung zad med/ 'bras bu'i de nyid de bzhin no// de nyid de ni de bzhin shes/ de nyid rnal 'byor pa kun spyod// rgyu yis rgyu ni dngos por
155a4(rgyud): min// 'bras bu'i dngos por 'bras bus min// rgyu de 'bras bu'i dngos por rung / rang gi sems ni so sor snang // ya sha sa de ni rgyu dngos te// gsang de 'bras bu'i dngos po yin// gsang ba
155a5(rgyud): gnyis med spyod pa yis// de yis dngos pos mchon/ yin no// de nyid de nyid rtogs gyur pa/ gsang de gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba de rig shes pa ste/ mchog ni mchog gi rnal
155a6(rgyud): 'byor pa/ sdug pa'i ngo bor gang bshad pa/ mi sdug pa yang de yi dngos// sdug dang mo sdug gzugs gang yin/ mi mthong den de bzhin gshegs/ rnam shes tsam ni med pa ru/ rnal 'byor rnal
155a7(rgyud): 'byung mi 'gyur// ji ltar ye shes mchog dag pa/ de ltar dag pa de bzhin gshegs/ rnam par shes pa rnam pa bzhi/ phyag rgya ba ni yi cho ga yis// gsang ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ sku gsung
155a8(rgyud): thugs ni yang dag byung // thugs ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ dam tshig phyag rgya kun tu 'gro/ chos kyi phyag rgya gsung gi ste/ las kyi phyag rgya sku yi yin/ rgya yis rgyas btab dngos po no// gsang bdag/ 
155b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o// rang rig pa yi ngo bo yis// ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin// lus ngag semasu rnam brtags pa'i/ bya ba rgyud du rnam brtags pa// gsang ba rnam pa gsum
155b2(rgyud): du bshad/ rdo rje las can sna tshogs bzhin// sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid ni// gsang ba'i ye shes bla med yin// phyag rgya bzhi po gsang ba de// rnal 'byor pa yis las grub byed/ 'byung ba chen
155b3(rgyud): bo bzhi po yang / phyag rgya ba ni zhes bshad pa yin/ phyag rgya ba'i yis mnyam sbyor ba/ lha mo ba'i dang yang dag sbyor/ sa ni spyan zhes bshad pa yin// chu na mA ma ki zhes bshad/ me dang rlung zhes
155b4(rgyud): grags pa ni// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma yin/ dbang chen sa yi khams yin te/ chu yi khams ni chu dkyil 'kho ra/ me ni me yi khams yin te/ rlung ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro// 
155b5(rgyud): dbang chen kha dog ser po ste// gru bzhi pa ste rgyas pa yin/ chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste// dkar po'i mdog can zhi ba'i yin/ me yi dkyil 'khor kha dog dmar/ grugasu
155b6(rgyud): dbang gis las rnams la'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs// nag po'i gdug pa'i las rnams la// 'byung ba che'i bdag las grub pa/ las kyi dngos grub yon tan bani/ las
155b7(rgyud): kyi dngos grub dngos grub mchog/ 'khor los bsgyur ba rnam pa ba ni// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul/ rgyas pa pad+ma'i rdo rje can dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas/ rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la'o// 
155b8(rgyud): zhi ba dgongs ka bya ba yin// de bzhin rgyas pa lnga dro la// gdug pa'i las rnams nyi ma'i gung / dbang gi las ni mtshan phyed bya// zhi la dkar po sbyar bar bya/ ser por snang ba rgyas pa la/ 
156a1(rgyud): dbang gi las la dmar po ste/ gdug pa nag po rab sbyar/ ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba/ las kyi sgrub pa dam pa yin/ bcom ldan dag pa bsgom bya ste/ sangs
156a2(rgyud): rgyas kun las mi g.yo gyur// b+ha ga'i dbusu gsang ba'i bdag/ rdo rje'i dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs// lnga yi bdag gyur bdag nyid ni// bsgoms na g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ snying la gnas
156a3(rgyud): pa'i lha mo che// rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor bskyed// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed mdzad yum/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang pos bshad/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste/ 'di dag 'jig rten
156a4(rgyud): dug gsum yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug me mnga'// rdo rje dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs/ chags dang sdang / dang rmongs pa rnams// bsgoms nas khams gsum pa yi bdag/ 
156a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gyur te/ sangs rgya sa bden pas dug bcom mo// rang sems so so rtogs pa yis// gti mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ rmongs pa nyid ni 'jig
156a6(rgyud): rten gyur// sems can kun la blta bar bya// zhe sdang sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ phra mo'i ye shes yang dag bskyed// sdang gyur rdo rje nyid du gyur// sems can thams cad gzhig par
156a7(rgyud): bya 'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshegs// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ chags gyur bzang po nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad chags par bya/ byams pa'i sems
156a8(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs// nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni// mdza' bor gyur cing kun nyid gyur// sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya// chags pa'i lta bas byams pa ste// thugs rje'i chos ni smra sa
156b1(rgyud): dang / kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya'o// rnal 'byor sbyin las rab dga' ste/ tshul khrims ldan las dri med 'gyur/ bzod pa las ni 'od byed pa/ brtson la
156b2(rgyud): 'od 'phro can dang ldan// bsam gtan las ni sbyangs dkar ba/ shes rab kyis ni mngon gyur mthong // thabs chen las ni ring du song / stobs dang ldan las mi g.yo 'gyur/ smon lam gyis ni/ 
156b3(rgyud): legs blo ldan// ye shes ldan las chos kyi sprin// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni// rang ri bdag nyid bcu gcig 'gyur// pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang // stobs dang dbang ni rdzogs
156b4(rgyud): gyur cing // sa bcu las ni 'das gyur pa/ mtshan ma brtan gyur de las ni// rdo rje chu ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud len yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtha' yas pa// 
156b5(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yin// chos kyi bdu da rtsi bcud kyis len/ rdo rje'i chu ni dag 'thungs pas// rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor pa/ gdod nas dag par de tshe 'gyur/ 
156b6(rgyud): gdod nas dag par gnas gyur pa// de nas byang chub semasu 'gyur/ byang chub sems kyi bdag can 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rnam par grol ba'i ras
156b7(rgyud): kyis g.yogs byang chub sems ni bla na mang/ yang dag bskyed gyur rnal 'byor pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' snying la 'dug/ sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i// mar gyur dam tshig
156b8(rgyud): 'dzin byed pa// rdo rje dam tshig gis spyad na// rtag tu dam tshig gnas par gyur// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// bud med ces bshad ji snyed pa// cho ga bzhin du kun spyad cing / 
157a1(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje smad mi bya// rdo rje gsum gyi skul gnas/ dam tshig phyag rgya ji snyed pa/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum gyis bya// gsung gi rdo rje smad mi bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las
157a2(rgyud): byung ba'i// phyag rgya kun ni bud med bzang // de rnams bstan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ phyag rgya thams cad dbang du 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ces bya ji srid pa// phyag rgya chen po
157a3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// de dag kun la nye bar spyad// gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin/ gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// nga rgyal ma yin hUM ma yin// rig pa ma yin sngags
157a4(rgyud): reg min// lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang mi bca'o// mchod rten gyi ni las mi bya// glegs bam dag kyang bklag mi bya// dkyil 'khor dag ni mi bya zhing // rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi 'tshal
157a5(rgyud): slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang ma nyam// khyod kyi srog chags bsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// khyod kyis ma byin blang bya zhing // gzhan gyi
157a6(rgyud): bud med bsten par bya// sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan min// lus ngag yid ni mi phyed pa// gzhan min sems kyis bya ba ste// 'di ni bsad pa'i mchog yin no// sngags rnams thams cad rab tu
157a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor kun kyang rnam kun tu// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas chos nyid sgom par bya// ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad po// sangs rgyas chos zhes bshad pa yin/ de rnams rtag tu
157a8(rgyud): sgom pa ni/ sangs rgyas chos ni sgrub byed yin/ bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi// rtag tu thob par byas pa dang // 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug de yis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub
157b1(rgyud): rab tu sgrub// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chosu yang dag bshad pa gang // de rnams bsgom pas dag pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan yin// 'gro ba rnams la spro ba'i sems/ ba
157b2(rgyud): zhing snying po rab bsgoms pa/ stong pa de nyid las byung ba// rdo rje ye shes zhes bya bshad// chos bdag me las yang dag byung // gnyis med ye shes dam pa ste/ chos nyid mchog gi ye shes ni// chos kyi
157b3(rgyud): dbyings zhes yang dag bshad// 'di ni chos dbyings ye shes te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes// rdo rje ye shes rang bzhin sems// rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar bshad// sems kyi spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ phra
157b4(rgyud): mo'i ye shes sogs sbyor ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// rnam par snang mdzad ces byar bshad// byams pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// ster ba sbed par byed pa'i mchog/ zag mang brtan
157b5(rgyud): par gyur pa yi// thugs ni mi sbeng pa zhes bshad// thugs rje sgra ba'i tshul gyis ni// sems can phan 'dogs mdzad pa pe// thug sa ni 'gro don yang dag ldan// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes
157b6(rgyud): bshad do// dga' bas spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// theg chen mchog ni dri ma med// thugs ni 'od gsal dag pa ni// 'od dpag med ces de bshad de// btang snyoms spro bar mdzad pa'i shugs// sems can thas
157b7(rgyud): rtogs mdzad pa/ don yang bla med bya ba ni// don yod grub par de bshad do// byang chub rang bzhin ye shes mchog/ de 'dir rdo rje ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpar de bshad do// sangs rgyas
157b8(rgyud): thams cad spyan 'dren pa// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad de/ rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi rgyal// rdo rje rgyal por nga bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad chags byed pas// mnyes par byed pa zhes
158a1(rgyud): bshad do// bdud kyi sbyor ba chags pa che// rdo rje chags par de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing // leg so zhes pa rab sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed
158a2(rgyud): pas // rdo rje legs par de bshad do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang / mkha' mnyam rdo rje las byung ba// don yang rin chen chen po de// rdo rje rin chen de bshad do// ma rig bral ba'i ye shes ni// chog
158a3(rgyud): dag las ni nges par byung // thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// rdo rje nyi mar de bshad do// rnam pa kun gyi dngos ye shes/ thar pa'i lam 'jug thob mdzad gang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan tog chen po// rdo rje
158a4(rgyud): dpal du de bshad do// rdo rje bzhad pa rnal 'byor che/ sa ngas rgyas kun 'byung rmad byung ba/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' che// rdo rje bzhad par de bshad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor
158a5(rgyud): che// sangs rgyas chos ni rtogs mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag pa// rdo rje cho su de bshad do// shes rab rnon po theg pa che// nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod mdzad
158a6(rgyud): shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pa po// rdo rje rnon por de bshad do// sangs rgyas rol mo'i 'khor le ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bas// sems dpa' chen po theg pa che// rdo rje rgyu zhes de bshad do// 
158a7(rgyud): shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/ gsung gi sgra ni rnam par spang // 'jam pa'i gsung gi bdag nyid gyur// rdo rje smra bar de bshad do// pha rol phyin pa kun gyi zhabs// ches rnams thams cad
158a8(rgyud): rtogs mdzad pa// sems can kun don sprul pa po// rdo rje las zhes bya bar bshad// sangs rgyas rjes dran yang dag grub// theg pa dman pa rnam spangs shing // byang chub sems la rab zhugs pa/ 
158b1(rgyud): rdo rje srung bar de bshad do// sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing / de bzhin nyon mongs rnams sreg la/ nyon mongs zad pa nyer len pas/ rdo rje'i gnod sbyin de bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
158b2(rgyud): rnams// bcing ba ru ni yang dag gyur// de nyid de nyid ye shes te// rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las yang dag byung // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gyur pa/ lA
158b3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya zhes bshad do// nga rgyal med cing snang ba med// mtshan ma med cing zhen pa med// bdag med mnyam nyid ye shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad// gsang ba'i mnyam par 'byer
158b4(rgyud): ba 'dir// ye shes pha rol phyin dge ba// rnam pa bcu gnyis yang dag byung // rdo rje pha rol phyin pa'i 'od// byang chub sa mas ni rab bsgom pas// pha rol sangs rgyas nyid son pa'o// 
158b5(rgyud): pha rol phyin thob ye shes ni// rdo rje sems mar ba shad pa yin// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams ni/ shes rab pa rol phyin rdo rje/ chos pani gcig tu gyur pa ni/ rdo rje rin chen mar
158b6(rgyud): bshad do// gsang ba'i ye shes ye shes che// de nyid pha rol phyin dge ba/ pha rol phyin pa che las byung // rdo rje chos mar shes par bya// pha rol phyin pa'i dge ba ni// sbyor ba'i thab su rab bstan pa/ 
158b7(rgyud): rdo rje las mar shes par bya// gang phyir de ni rol pa dge/ sgeg me sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge bas/ rgyan pa'i yan lag yid 'ong yin// glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// tsha
158b8(rgyud): du brjod pa'i chos brjod pa'o// gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin// myur du sangs rgyas nying ster ba'o// gdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin// kun tu khyab par spros phyir ro// me tog bsam gtan pa
159a1(rgyud): rol phyin/ 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa'o// mar me smon lam pa rol phyin// phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin// dri ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// dri ngan thur sa la dag
159a2(rgyud): ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// dbye ba rnam pa bzhi yis gnas// thams cad 'dod pa'i thabs chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad do// byang chub spyad pa spyod byed pa/ rdo rje zhags
159a3(rgyud): pa zhes bshad// theg pa 'di la brten gyur gang // rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bshad do// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes shing // gdod nas zhi ba mkha' dang mnyam// de lta'i tshig ni rab 'jug pa/ 
159a4(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu zhes bshad do// tshogs gnyis krin sbyor ba yis/ sems can kun gyi don ston pa'i// sems ni ra nga bzhin gyis 'od gsal// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par
159a5(rgyud): bshad// yang dag rdo rje rtogs pa ste// 'dzin pa'i sgra ra nyid lcags kyu yin// phra rab 'bigs pa mda' zhes bya// dgye sa pas legaso zhes bya ba/ spras pas rin po che ru bshad// 
159a6(rgyud): gzi brjid ces bya nyi ma yin// sgreng bas tog tu bshad pa ste// rnam par 'byed pas bzhad par bshad/ 'dod chags dag pa pad+ma yin// nyon mongs dgra bcom ral gri ste// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba
159a7(rgyud): 'khor lo yin// gang gi brjod pas smra bar bshad// kun nyid sna tshogs rdo rje yin// gzhig dka' sbyor ba go cha yin// 'jigs pa'i spyod pas mche ba ste// phyag rgya'i sbyor nyid bcing ba yin/ 
159a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni gang bshad pa// yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// gzhal yas khang ni ye shes te/ sems kyi brtsegs pasgreng ba yin/ phyi yi gru bzhi pa gang yin// tshad kyis mnyam
159b1(rgyud): pa nyid gyur pa/ byams pa la sogs sems gang yin// thig bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// chos kyi sbyor ba rjes dran nyid/ gang de rdo thig du ba shad// lta ba kun las rnam grol ba/ ye shes thig tu bshad
159b2(rgyud): pa yin/ tshul khrims tshogs kyi dam pa ni// gang zhig rgyan du bshad pa yin// dang dbang la sogs sems gang yin// rab lngar ni yang dag byung // rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni// sgo rnamasu ni yang
159b3(rgyud): dag bshad// yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni/ rta babs rnams dang ka bar byung / dran pa nyer bzhag pa ni po ni// khyams rnams bzhi por shes par bya/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni/ de ni sgo khyung rnam bani/ 
159b4(rgyud): yin// byang chub yan lag bdun po ni/ phreng ba me tog chun rgyan pa/ 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po ni// ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad/ sgrib pa gnyis las rnam grol zhing / ting / 
159b5(rgyud): 'dzin ye shes kyis brtags pa/ lam gyi ye shes khyad par rnams// rnga yab ces ni yang dag bshad// nyon mongs tha mas cad nges gcod cing / nyon mongs 'phrog pas dra ba ste/ yang / 
159b6(rgyud): ngag gcod cing spong ba nyid// sel ba'i spong ba la gnas pa// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba nyid// nyon mongs pa yi phyed 'phrog pa// dra ba phyed ces bya bar bshad// rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin pa// 
159b7(rgyud): byang chub sems ni bla med yin// sems ni don kun bskyed byed pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes// thar pa'i snang bag ni
159b8(rgyud): brjid che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// tshon rtsi lngar ni yang dag zhes/ lta ba lnga yi me tog yin/ ye shes lnga yi nges sbyor cing / sangs rgyas lnga zhes yang dag bshad/ namakha' bzhin
160a1(rgyud): du bdag med pa'i// rnam shes ye shes ngam pa yin// ye shes de yi rgyan bshad pa/ chags pa'i sems zhes bya bar bshad// chags bral las ni byang chub 'byung / chags pa
160a2(rgyud): sems las gzhan yin du bas chags dang chags bral ba/ byang chub sems zhes yang dag bshad// 'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul// phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las byung // der ni thabs kyi
160a3(rgyud): sgom pa dag/ dngos grub thams cad ster ba yin// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba// de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis spyang// ji ltar gdul bya dag gyur pa// zhen pa kun tu mchod par 'gyur// mtshan nyid gang
160a4(rgyud): zhig yang dag bshad// mtshan nyid nges ni mngon par gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis// rgyas btab ye shes yin bar bshad// phyag rgya bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu phyag
160a5(rgyud): rgya'i bdag can 'gyur// rgyas btab dngos po shes nas ni/ bskams na phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// mtshan dang mtshan nyid 'bral ba ni/ shes nas rnal 'byor yang dag spyod// ji ltar
160a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid yang dag grub/ de bzhin dag pa myur du 'grub// g.yas pa'i cha yi mtshan ma ni/ shes rab can ni rab tu bstan/ g.yen gyi mtshan ma ji ltar mthong // de yis thugs rje mtshon pa yin// phyag ni
160a7(rgyud): gnyis ka'i mnyam sbyor las// ting 'dzin gnyisu bshad pa yin// zhabs gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma yis// tshegs gnyis dag ni bstan pa yin// sor mo lnga yi mnyam sbyor las// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan
160a8(rgyud): pa yin/ sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon byang chub// rim pa bzhin du bstan bya ste/ gang zhig gung mo ston pa ni// na mkha' las ni byung ba mtshon// gang zhig mdzub me ston pa ni// des ni dbang chen
160b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yin// srin lag tu ni yang dag bshad// chu yi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad do// gang zhig mthe bo sten pa ni// de yos me ni mtshon pa yin// gang zhig mthe'u chung sten pa ni// rlung gi dkyil 'kho
160b2(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur// gang zhig lte bsten pa ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug bshad// gang zhig snying ka ston pa ni// rdo rje sems mar rjesu dpag/ gang zhig smin mtshams sten pa ni// rdo rje rin chen ma zhes bya/ 
160b3(rgyud): gang zhig lkog ma ston pa ni// rdo rje chos mar shes par bya// gang zhig spyi bo ston pa ni// rdo rje las mar shes par bya// byang chub lngar mngon byang chub pa 'am/ yang na ye shes lnga rnams sam// sangs
160b4(rgyud): rgyas lnga dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor byang chub yin par bstan// sngon gyi sgrar ni ji skad bshad// mdun du ni rab tu bstan// rgyab kyi sgrar ni ji ltar bshad// phyi mar de ni yang dag
160b5(rgyud): bstan// gang du thog ma'i sgrar gyur pa// de ni rgyu yi sgra ru bstan// gang zhig tha ma'i sgrar gyur pa// 'dir ni 'bras bur yang dag bstan// sangs rgyas bcom ldan gnyis mi mnga'
160b6(rgyud): rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan 'gyur min// gang phyir thog ma tha ma med// de phyir rtag pa zhes bshad do// rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te/ rtogs par bya ba'ang sems nyid yin// sangs rgyas
160b7(rgyud): zhing zhes bshad pa dang // byang chub sems su shes par bya/ rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can ni/ kun tu rig par yang dag bshad// sems can rang bzhin dag pa ni// byang chub sems su shes
160b8(rgyud): par bya// dang por gyur pa snying kar rdebs// brtan pa nyid du'ang rang nyid 'gyur// sgra 'dzin pa ni ral ba'i dbus// 'od dpag med du mnyam bzhag yin// tsum pa nar ni rjes bshad pa// de bzhin
161a1(rgyud): gshegs pa rdo rje gsung // dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba/ rnam par snang mdzad ces bshad do// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis par/ skyes mchog thub pas gang
161a2(rgyud): gsungs pa// pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyisu// gsungs kyi gzhan du mi btag go// bu mo lo grangs bcu drug par// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'
161a3(rgyud): yid/ sgom pa'i don gyi sgra yin no// lha me lo grangs nyi shu par/ 'khor los bsgyur bas ji skad gsungs// mchod pa nyi shu'i bdag nyid can// nyi shu po dang rims bzhin no// rang gi chung ma rang
161a4(rgyud): rig las// byung ba'i rang rig yin par bshad/ degazhan gyi chung mar gang bstan pa/ gzhan sdug gzhan gyi rig pa yin// gci dang rdo rje zhes bshad pa// rdo rje ye shes bla med
161a5(rgyud): yin// bshang dang pad+ma zhes bshad pa/ chos kyi ye shes snyoms med yin/ yongasu gsal ba rnam shes pa// dkyil 'khor thugs kyi dam pa yin// sku gsung thugs kyi
161a6(rgyud): spyod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni mchod byed pa/ rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis las byung ba yi/ rang gi khu ba thig le yis/ rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par bya// tshogs gnyis kyi ni
161a7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ gnyis med gnyis nyid la bsten pa// thugs rje nyams dang yang dag ldan// dbang po gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor bas// rang gi khu ba
161a8(rgyud): mkhas pa yis// rnal 'byor chen po byung nas ni// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab// dgod dam rab tu smra ba 'am// sangs rgyas rol mo'i gar byed pa// lha mo bzhi yis mnyam sbyor bas/ 
161b1(rgyud): rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyis rol// gsar zhing legs par bsgril ba dang / chang dang ldan zhing mdzes pa yis/ shes rab can gyi thig gdab pa/ sku gsung thugs ni bsgom paso// zur bani pa la sku
161b2(rgyud): bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyo ni nang rnams// rdo rin chen spras pas
161b3(rgyud): ni 'phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// rdo rje'i thig gis yongs bskor cing // ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// ka ba brgyad kyi nang gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor brgyad par brtan pa dang / 
161b4(rgyud): grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar ni// rdo rje lha mo'i tshigs kyis mchod// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ dkyil 'khor lnga yi sa rnam par rgyan// dra badra phyed kyis rgyan cing // rnga yab kyis ni
161b5(rgyud): nyer spras pa/ khru ni bcu gnyis bya ba 'am/ khru bcu dra gtu rab tu brtag yang na khruni nyi shu tsam/ nyi shu lnga dang ldan pa yis// khwa ni nyi shu lnga pa las/ dkyil 'khor yang dag byin
161b6(rgyud): gyis brlab// sgo rnams kyi ni dbus me'i cha// cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba/ dkyil 'khor sgo ru bsams nas ni// sgo khyud der ni bya ba yin// sgo khyud dkyil 'khor rnam pa ni// snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang
161b7(rgyud): mnyam par/ dgu cha ru ni rnam bgos te/ grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar bya// tha mar khyams dang ldan pa yi/ dkyil 'khor lngas ni rgyan pa dang // kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan// gru bzhi par ni brta/ 
161b8(rgyud): par bya// lta ba lnga pa bgod dka' che/ kha dog lnga yi de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas/ sa ni tshon gyis rab tu bsgyur/ dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus ni/ sangs rgyas lnga
162a1(rgyud): ni dgod par bya/ kha dog lnga dang ting 'dzin gyis/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyad// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thaMd gcig bsdus pa// de bzhin gshegs pa
162a2(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad// dpa' bo'o lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ in dra nI la'i 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje thams cad gcig bsdus pa// mi bskyod ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// 'dzam bu'i
162a3(rgyud): gser gyi 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ sems can kun gyi don du byung // 'bar ba'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ mchen po pad+ma 'dra// pad+ma rA gA'i nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi ye shes
162a4(rgyud): las byung ba// chags pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ margad kyi ni 'od 'dra zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kun gcig las byung ba// byams pa'i blta ba de
162a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs// dbus ma'i sa yi gzhi dag pa// nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra ba/ shar phyogs nyid du sngon po che// lho rus ra po yang dag ldan// nub phyogs der ni dmar po ste/ byang du ldang dang
162a6(rgyud): yang dag ldan// kun tu khyams dang ldan pa la// sgor ni khyams dang bral ba'o// gang zhig dbus mas yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med yin/ gzhan dag don kun yang dag ldan// ting 'dzin
162a7(rgyud): ye shes dam pa yin// namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// spyan ni dbusu bsam par bya// bzhin bzang spyan ni
162a8(rgyud): yangs pa dang // nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra la// mtshan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs// bud med sgyu ma'i mchog 'dzin pa// phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom bya ste// khams gsum pa ni dbang byed pa// 
162b1(rgyud): dngos kun grub byed ye shes ni// 'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu'i mdog/ namakha'i rdo rje dbus chud par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// na mkha'i rdo rje
162b2(rgyud): mchog sgom mo// zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang // ud pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// na mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog bsam mo// phyag tu ud pal sngon
162b3(rgyud): dmar te// khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i dngos grub rdo rje can/ na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus chud par/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs
162b4(rgyud): rgyas sku ni rnams bsgoms la// rdo rje chos mar rnam par bsam/ mdzes pa'i zhal la spyan yangs ma// pad+ma ra ga lta bu'i mdog/ sku mdog dmar po yang dag byung // chags pa'i pad+ma/ 
162b5(rgyud): 'dzin sdug pa// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// phyag tu ud pal dmar po no// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa'o// 
162b6(rgyud): chos kyi ye shes byed pa mchog/ gsang ba dam tshig rdo rje can// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus chud par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzun ni rnam bsgoms la// sgrol ma
162b7(rgyud): mchog ni bsam par bya// zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang // sna tshogs rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// kha dog ser po nyid bsam zhing // bud med sgyu ma'i dregs bdo ba// phyag tu ud pal dam pa ni// sar
162b8(rgyud): po snang ba bsgom par bya// rdo nyid 'dzin las byung ba/ sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'o// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM shaM ka re shAn+ti ka re g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ti ni
163a1(rgyud): ta ya g+huts+tshi na swA hA/ oM ka Te bi ka Ta ni ka TaM ka Te swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ rig pa'i lha mo bzhi'o// sku ni lus kyi ngo bo yis// thugs ni sems kyi rnam pa nyid// gsu
163a2(rgyud): ni ngag gi rnam pa yis// mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsrung bya ste/ bsrungs na mchog tu gsang ba ni// rtag par kun tu 'byung bar
163a3(rgyud): 'gyur// dngos po yongasu dag pa ni// med pas kun tu brtag mi 'byung // rnal 'byor pa yis rnal 'byor thob/ tshogs meng yang dag mi mthong ngo // de bas gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung // rnal 'phye
163a4(rgyud): kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin/ ba'i thabs// ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin// chos rnams tha mas cad rnam dag pa/ dag pa nyid du gyur pa ni// ji ltar lha yi nor
163a5(rgyud): bu ni/ rang gi 'od kyis rtag tu snang // srid pa yongasu dag pa yang / rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thob byed yin// rdo rje dbyings ni gsang chen du/ gang zhig dbang bskur mkhas pa la// thugs kyi
163a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog mkhas pas de la bshad par bya// thad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma kA ra barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dag
163a7(rgyud): slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ trai lo kya bi dza ya ma hA kal+la ra dzA/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
163a8(rgyud): ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das ri rab nyi'i rtse mon// rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che'i tshe
163b1(rgyud): mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang // brjed byed dang / mi
163b2(rgyud): rnams dang / bltar rung ba dang / bltar mi rung ba du ma sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems
163b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po na mkha'i dkyil nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol te// yang bcom
163b4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis lha chen po la sogs pa sems nam rung ba de dag la dam tshig 'dzin du stsal der 'tshal na/ tsa ma ldan 'das de'i slangad du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes
163b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshig bco ma ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas gsan nas phyag na rdo rje la 'ad skad ces gsung so// gnod sbyin khyod shin
163b6(rgyud): tu khengs pa/ shin tu khro gshin tu 'thur ba/ de ji ltar khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'
163b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can ma lus pa 'dul bar bgyid do// gang gi phyir na bdag gis 'dod pa'i bde ba can rnams dbang du bgyi ba
163b8(rgyud): lags pas btul nas bla na med pa'i bde ba la dgod par 'tshalo// sems can ma rungs pa rnams bsad pa la sogs pas sbyangs te/ zhi ba la dgod par 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag na
164a1(rgyud): rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje legaso leg so// 'jig rten thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / phan pa'i phyir dang / bde ba'i phyir snying
164a2(rgyud): po 'di smos shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' lha thams cad nas/ mi rnams thams cad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs pa
164a3(rgyud): ngag sangs rgyas la skyabasu dang shig/ nga'i bka' yang rjesu skyongs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
164a4(rgyud): rnying po 'ad gsung sa/ e su b+han tsu b+ha hUM/ ng+ga sa/ hU~M/ kr-i pa la gr-i ba la hU~M/ An la po b+ha ga pan badz+ra hUM phaH/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jog rten gsum
164a5(rgyud): thams cad g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 2gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu dgu'o// 'phar rab tu 'phar/ kun tu rab tu 'pha re// de nas lha thams cad la sogs pa
164a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'dar yid yong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te// kho ra khor yug dang kho ra khor yug che na po'o ri la sogs pa tshun chad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
164a7(rgyud): gyi khams thang du sems can thams cad kyis gang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas 'di skad gsungs
164a8(rgyud): so// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa la skyabasu 'gro bar khas long zhing / nga'i bka' yang rjesu skyongs shig/ de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'das
164b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje skrag ste 'angar yeng yang nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabasu dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chen po'i lha dang / mthu bo che dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi 'di
164b2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar byin che zhing bdag cag 'chos pa 'di su lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bstan
164b3(rgyud): pa'i phyir tshig su bcad pa 'di glengs te gsungaso// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis bslabs/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyid skyes
164b4(rgyud): 'di// phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// ma rungs 'chol la dbang ba ste// gang ming brjod pa de yis ni// sangs rgyas pa ya/ nga thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpal
164b5(rgyud): chen pos yang gsungs pa/ kye kye lnga dag sangs rgyas la skyabasu nged la nga'i bka' bzhin du yang gyis shig/ rje rje 'bar ba gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'das khyed thang gtan
164b6(rgyud): bsregs par gyur ta re// de nas lha chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras// khyod ni gnod sbyin ngeng ni lha bas na nged kyis gnod sbyin gyi bka' rjesu skyong bar mi nuso// de nas phyag na rdo
164b7(rgyud): rjes 'di thos nas khros te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar dbang bskur te bsres// 
164b8(rgyud): de bas na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal na lha chen po 'di 'dul bar 'tsha'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha chen po la 'di skad ces gsung so// sems can chen
165a1(rgyud): po khas long shog 'das khyod gas dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das la lnga chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum thams cad kyi dbang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gso
165a2(rgyud): to/ bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di'i bka' bzhin byed pa bdag cag ma lag so// de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das
165a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras// kye gnod sbyin nga ni thams cad kyi dbang po chen po/ byed pa po/ 'joms pa po/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'o// gtogs 'dod do// dbang phyug chen
165a4(rgyud): po'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po khros nas 'di skad gsung so// khyod ni lus bsrul pe me sha za ba/ ma rungs pa/ drag shul gyi las byed pas na gtum
165a5(rgyud): po ste/ sha za'i lus srel ba na ji ltar chang sa pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug chen po yin/ 8 sa pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'o// gtogs 'dod ces bya ba na
165a6(rgyud): thar pa'o// dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po deng yin pas 'dul nus so// de nas dbang phyug chen po lnga chen po khros
165a7(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig su rung ba chen po'i gzugs khros pa chen po'i gad mos bgang nas 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/ 'bar ba chen po gcong
165a8(rgyud): ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mtha' med par gzugs sna tshog su byas/ 'bar ba chen po'i grub pa/ mi mtshungs pa/ rdo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / shaka ti dang / be tsen
165b1(rgyud): dang / mi mtshungs pa'i mtshon cha 'bebs shing gtong ba rnams kyi tshogs dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas par kun btan to/ bdud dang / bzhag byed pa dang / mtha' dang mu med pa'i gzu
165b2(rgyud): sna tshogasu sprul/ khro bo rab tu mi bzang ba ma rungs pa'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu rab tu 'thab cing shin tu bgyed pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan me'i mun nag tu byas/ 'bar ba
165b3(rgyud): chen po'i phung pos blangs te rab tu snang bar byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'chang ba chen po cung zad du mche ba'i thog ma gtsigs pa/ smin ma'i mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod
165b4(rgyud): pa da mig g.yon pa cher bgrang de/ rdo'i lta ba'i khro ba dang bcas pas zab me'i tshig gis shigs pa/ snying po mchog 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba 'ang
165b5(rgyud): gsung so// hU~M de nas hUM zhes bya ba des stong gsu gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun sgra des gang nas/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yoso// khrol rab tu 'khrol/ kun
165b6(rgyud): tu rab tu 'khrol lo// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i tshogs thaMd bac+doMs la bskyab du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bskyab tu gsol zhes nas bac+doMs la skyabasu dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'dra
165b7(rgyud): kyis phyag na rdol 'di skad gsung so// gang 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra ba ni khyod rab tu mi bgrung so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bac+doMs kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ yang 'jig rten gsum las
165b8(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba 'di gsung so// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-iha gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ An la ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa lnga'i bdag
166a1(rgyud): po thams cad 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gang bder mgo rkang bzlog ste/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas brlams par byas te/ btso
166a2(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs g.yon pas mnan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la leg so lagaso zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis
166a3(rgyud): 'di 'dra bar sems can 'dul bar byed pa lag so leg so// de bas na thul la dbugs phyung shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi don gyi phyir rdo rjes bcings pa di
166a4(rgyud): gsung so// oM badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sar+b+ba na swA hA/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa de dag dran pa reng ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad gsungs
166a5(rgyud): so// grogs po dag sems can chen po 'di'i bka' ba nin byed par khas long shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la de dag thams cad mgron gcig tu bdag cag mchid kyis 'tshal zhes
166a6(rgyud): gsol to// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang rang gi snying po 'di gsung sa// hUM Tak+ki ho// de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha la sogs pa thams cad dbang du byas te/ 
166a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas mchi ma blags te nga ro bton nas skyabasu dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la skyab tu gsol/ de bdag cag khyod kyi bka' 'an na ji ltar bgyi ba stsal du
166a8(rgyud): gsol zheso// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag byang chub kyi sems dang / sdom pa gzung bar khas long shig/ de dag gi
166b1(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'tshalo// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems
166b2(rgyud): dpa' chen pos yang de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du gtsud nas sdom pa bzung du bcug ste byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba stsol/ phyag na rdo rje bdag che dang / 
166b3(rgyud): 'dod pa smad par mi bya'o// 'di ni gsang ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de dag sdom pa 'dzin du bcu gnas dam tshig byin pa ni/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa bi rA ga ya sar+b+ba ka mAn hUM phaT/ de nas de
166b4(rgyud): ngag gis smras pa/ 'di ni bdud kyis smras pas na/ bang gra cag mi can to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa de dag la khyed cag gis 'di la ma brnyas shig ces gsungs
166b5(rgyud): pa dang / de dag gis gsol pa/ ji ltar 'dod chags nga bral ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye
166b6(rgyud): grogs po dag nga ni ji ltar 'dul bzhin byed pa ste/ de nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sun 'byin te/ ji ltar bde la mi chags pa dang / sdug bsngal 'dod chags pa ji lta bus 'jig rten 'dul
166b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba'i chos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'chad par mdzad de/ de dag sbyang ba'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpas ci nas
166b8(rgyud): kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma bi rA ga ya sar+b+ba kA maM hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gis ji
167a1(rgyud): ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes gsol to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes lag tu rdo rje byin te/ rdo rje dbang bskur ba 'di byin no// oM badz+ra a b+hi
167a2(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha rad tA badz+ra pA Ni hri ha ha ha ha/ de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni rdo rje rig sngags mchog ge/ mthu be che ni rdo rje sgyu ma'o// tshangs pa
167a3(rgyud): rdo rje mi smra ba'o// sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o// dbang po ni rdo rje 'thab cha ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po thams cad rig pa'i blon po chen por dbang bskur// de nas par snang la
167a4(rgyud): rgyu ba rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 2 dri lta ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni/ rdo rje 'khyil pa'o// zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do// be con rtse mo ni rdo rje be con no// skya gleng ni rdo skya glang
167a5(rgyud): ste/ de rnams ni rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur ro// de nas na mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byi na pa ni 'di lta ste/ chang gis myos pa ni rdo srin pa'o// chang byed
167a6(rgyud): ni rdo rje phreng ba'o// rgyal ba ni rdo dbang ngo // rgyal ba skyed pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni tshor kyi bdag por dbang bskuro// de nas sa pa rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni dza
167a7(rgyud): lha ste/ mdzod skyong na rngo gru shing / rlung ni rdo rje rlung ngo // mni rdo rje ma'o// ku be ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nyar dbang bsku'o// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i dbang po theng rdo ming gis dang
167a8(rgyud): bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ bag ni rdo rje kyo ba'o// gshin rje ni rdo rje nag po'o// sa'i spyi bo na rdo rje nam 'dren no// bA ru/ ni rdo rje glu ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo bran du dbang bskuro// de nas 'jig
167b1(rgyud): gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyis lha mo thams cad kyi lag tu rdo rje byin te/ rdo rjes dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ 'on mongs pa ni rdo rje khro ba ma'o// nor can ni rdzogs
167b2(rgyud): ma'o// tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ba'o// dug mo ni rdo rje gnon nu ma'o// dbang po ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de dag la sogs pa ni rigs kyi blon mo chen mor dbang bskur ro// de nas bar snang la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang
167b3(rgyud): bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje bdud rtso ma'o// khrung ma ni rdo rje sdug gu ma'o// be con 'chang ma ni rdo rje be con rtse mo'o// skye 'phrog ma ni rdo rje bskyed 'chings ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa
167b4(rgyud): ni rdo rje khro mor dbang bskuro// de nas na mkha' la rgyu ba ri ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ gsong ma ni rdo rje gsong ma'o// za ba mo ni rdo rje za ba ma'o// gos ni rdo rje bgo ba me
167b5(rgyud): dga' mo ni rdo rje dbang mo ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje tshogs ma mor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa la rgyu ba'i ma dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ zhi ma ni rdo phonya mo'o// 
167b6(rgyud): rlung ma ni rdo rje mgyogs ma'o// ma ni rdo rje 'bar ba'o// ku be ram ni rdo rje thag gum ste/ de ngag la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba
167b7(rgyud): byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ phag me ni rdo rje gdong ngo // mgo lpags ma ni rdo rje nag mo'o// sna chang ma ni rdo rje phyags ma'o// klu mo ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni bran mor dbang bskur ro// de nas/ 
167b8(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos btsung ba dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed nas rdo'i rim tshig byin pa'o// oM ba li tong ba li tong badz+ra A kArA ya hUM / lha rnam/ 
168a1(rgyud): dgug pa'o// oM badz+ra a gra bi Ta ya sa ma ya hUM/ bar snang la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra mA lA gra laM/ phreng ba 'chang ba rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra ban d+ha ha~M/ sa la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// 
168a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra pA ta la bany+dza b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya sar+b+ba duSh+TAM sa ma ya mu pra bAn d+ha tsakra hU~M phaT/ ma rnams thams cad kyi'o// de nas bac+doMs kyi zhabs gnyis la
168a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thaMd 'dul ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la dza
168a4(rgyud): ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gang gis sems can de rnams sen thams cad la phan pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
168a5(rgyud): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid la tshud cig/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes gas la pa/ bac+doMs mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'di dag la na
168a6(rgyud): tan ji ltar bgyi/ rims la sogs pa ji ltar bgyi/ dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gi rnams ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ dam tshig de nyid la nan tan byed du chud cig/ 
168a7(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'di rnams ji ltar nan tan bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
168a8(rgyud): btsud nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du chud cig/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du btsud nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du chud cig/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du bcud nas las kyi dkyil 'khor du
168b1(rgyud): chud cig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te/ tshig su bcad pa 'di smraso// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas
168b2(rgyud): kun gyis byin brlabs te/ grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen por bshad par bya'o// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// chos kyi dkyil 'kho
168b3(rgyud): tshul 'dra bar// dkyil 'khor tha~Mngad thig gdab po// de la srang bu bre ba'i cho ga ni 'di lta ste/ gsar zhing legs par byas pa dang / tshad ma bzang po'i srad pu yis/ shes rab can gyis srad bre ga/ 'jig
168b4(rgyud): rten gsum rgyal dran zhing ngo // de yi dbusu gdab pa ni// seng ljang phur ba brtan par ro// de las srang bu bre gsungs ba/ srang bu nyi lngab kyis bya ste/ bcu drug cha ru bgo bar bya/ tha
168b5(rgyud): du ni rim gsum mchog khor khor yug rig dgakyang // phur bu yis ni de bzhin no// de yi nang du bya ba ni/ srad bu rim bdun ldan par te// tshen ser dri zhim ldan pa yis// thig rnams
168b6(rgyud): kyang ni gdab par bya// de yi dbusu bzhag pa ni// shin tu bkrabs pa'i nas phul bzhi'o// de yi steng du mgon po ste// sang+yas gzugs bstan bzhag par bya// sang+yas thang 'khor thad du// byang chub
168b7(rgyud): brgyad ni rim bzhin par/ bri 'am yang dag bzhag par bya// tshon sna lnga mchog rnams kyis// sangs rgyas spyan lnga de ru ni// phyag na rdo rje de bzhin no// bri 'am bzhag par bya ba ni// rdo rje hUM zhes par
168b8(rgyud): 'dus pa'o// de yi zhabs ni g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug chen po gnan par bya'o// g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis btsir ba ni/ nyon mongs ma yin lha mo'o// 'dod grub spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang // srang
169a1(rgyud): bu rim bdun par dag tu/ bri 'am yang na bzhag par bya/ rdo rje shugs kyis dgongs na su/ phyi rol byung nas de ru yang / gling rnams pani yang bri bar bya/ dbyibs dang cho ga ji bzhin
169a2(rgyud): du// grwa yi ri mo legs par dgod// gling rnams kyi dbus thams cad du/ 'jig rten ji bzhin sogs par bya// tshangs pa la sogs de bzhin rnams// de ru 'jig rten dbang po dgod// kho ra khor yug pa'i/ 
169a3(rgyud): ri dang / glong rnams kyi yang bar dag du/ phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// ske srung bri bar bya ba yang / rdo rje sgo bzhi de dag tu/ rdo rje kyo bzhags pa dang / sgrog dang dril bu de/ 
169a4(rgyud): bzhin no// kho ra khor yug ri yi ni// phyi rol dmyal ba brgyad rnams// gnam ngal dang ni nad dag dang // mkha' 'gre ma da dang gdon drag rnams// bzhag gam yang na bri bar bya// chos min
169a5(rgyud): can ni gzhog phyir ro// de yi phyi rol du dgod pa// gtor ma sna tshogs mchog rnam so// de nas dkyil 'khor ma na po'i cho ga 'byung ste// de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyis/ 
169a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'jug pa ni gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ sa ral thag gu dmar po thogs nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de'i steng
169a7(rgyud): du dri zhim po'i me tog bzhag nas snying po 'di brjod la zhugs shig/ oM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha maM ha ha ha ha hi/ de nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas du ru ka'i bdug pa 'am/ ci bdeg
169a8(rgyud): pas gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin ma mdzub mo gnyis kyo btang du byas la snying po 'di brjod do// oM u ru gra gra bi ri Ni bi ri Ni badz+ra ma ya ho b+hi da ye swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na de las
169b1(rgyud): mtshan ma 'byung ba ni spu g.yo ba la sogs pa dang / sa g.yo ba 'am/ dri zhim po 'am/ 'od zer mthong ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor me tog gtor cig/ de nas slob ma gzhug ste/ de thog ma nyid du bkug
169b2(rgyud): nas slob ma gos gtsang ma bsten te/ gsum la skyab su btang ba dang / bslab pa'i sdom pa la so sor gnas par byas nas/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed cog/ de nas gdong ras kyi g.yog nas mno
169b3(rgyud): gtsug tor du byas te/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la chug shig/ bcug nas ma tog gtor te/ de nas gang la 'bab pa ngan nga' lha'o// de nas gang la 'bab pa de ni de'i lnga'o// de nas gdong bcings pa
169b4(rgyud): bkrol nas rang gi rig pa'i lha ston la/ de la mchod ci/ nga slob dpon la yang ci 'dod pa'i yon phul nas de rang gi rig pa la ma/ sngags bzlas te phyag rgya yang bcing // 'jig rten gsum las rnar
169b5(rgyud): rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsu ma gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas rdo rje kyil 'khor 'byung ste// rdo rje phreng ba mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje'i kyi
169b6(rgyud): 'khor brtag par bya// 'jug par bya ba de bzhin te/ las kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o// kyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni// de bzhin rdo rje gsor bar bya/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal rab bslabs nas// rdo rje mchog ni
169b7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje sgrub pa'i cho ga ni lag pa gnyis rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje bzung nas ji srid du 'gul ba de sring bzlas// de phyin cad rdo rje des las thams cad byed do// rdo rje'i dkyil
169b8(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor chen po kun bris nas/ mtshan ma thams cad bstan par bya// 'jug pa rdo rje dril bu dang // rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyag rgyaso// de la rdo
170a1(rgyud): rje dril bu'i phyag rgyani 'di yin no// rdo rje 'dzin makun byas nas/ rdo rje kun tu brtag bya ba// g.yas par bzhag nas g.yon pa yis/ dril bu bsil nas 'jug par bya/ btsud nas
170a2(rgyud): su ni dril bu de// mnyam par gzhag pas bsil bar bya/ slob dpon gyur cig dam tshig kyang // rtag tu bsrungs shes brjod par bya/ ji ltar dril bu'i sgra 'di ni// de yi mi rtag pa ru gsungs// de ltar
170a3(rgyud): khyod la byin na ni/ rdo rje chen po zhes bya 'dis/ nges par sreg par 'gyur ba ni// de ste rdo rje 'dzin dang dang // skyabs gsum brtul zhugs de bzhin te/ ji ltar byang chub sems 'dod rnams/ khyod kyis de che
170a4(rgyud): spangs gyur na'o// de la 'di ni dam tshig gi sngags/ oMHngan sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas de bzhin du 'dug la de nas rdo rje'i chu 'di byung ngo // de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas cho ga bzhin du bya'o// 
170a5(rgyud): dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris na su// cha lugs mang po bzhag par bya/ btsud nas las rnams thams cad kyang
170a6(rgyud): slob dpon gyis ni de bzhin brlab// de nas las kyi rab tu sbyar ba 'di'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thab gru bzhir byas la mngar po'i yam shing la ma bus la mngar po'i me tog dang 'bras
170a7(rgyud): bu rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar la sbags te/ bla gos g.yasu gzar la ku sha'i bam po la 'dug ste// rdo rje'i tshig tu bzlas shing / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa zhi ba'i las rnam
170a8(rgyud): la lag pa g.yon pas bdag gis phyag rgya bcings la/ g.yas pas bsregs na de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tu thab zur gsum du kha ba'i tsher ma rnon po'i yam shing
170b1(rgyud): dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / yal ga rtse mo dang / sdong bu dang / 'bras bu yang de dang 'dra bar rang gi khrag gi skus na stan ma khrang po la 'dug ste/ bla gos g.yon du gzar la/ khros pa'i tshig gis
170b2(rgyud): bzlas shing g.yon pas bsregs na dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gzhom pa dang / btsir ba dang / bskal ba dang / myos par bya ba dang / stan 'pho ba la sogs
170b3(rgyud): pa las drag po rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / dam tshig gi bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa grub pa thams
170b4(rgyud): cad kyi las ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gas su rtsa 'ja ma po bting ba la 'dug nas/ stong g.yogs sbyar ma ltar bgos te/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas shing 'khor lo lta bu'i thab tu ngu ba
170b5(rgyud): med pa'i 'dag ma la til dang 'bras la sogs pa nas 'bras g.yas g.yon gyis sreg go// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du rdo rje lta bu'i thab byas la stod g.yogs kyis
170b6(rgyud): yan lag thams cad bcings la rlong stan 'jam po la 'dug nas/ lam shing thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'dzings pa'i me la lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas lag pa
170b7(rgyud): g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pas gzar bu gzung nas 'dzum zhing dga' bar byas te/ rdo rje tshig gis zlos shing ro thams cad bsregs na/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba
170b8(rgyud): dang / dbang du byas pa la sogs pa dam pa 'grub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga'o// de nas yod
171a1(rgyud): byang bshad par bya'o zhes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad mthong nas sgrub bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor du na ma
171a2(rgyud): zhugs sam/ dam tshig spangs par gyur pa ni// phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub pa// gsang ba yang dag ma shes pas// bcom ldan sems dpa' 'dod pa'o// chags dang rdo rje de nyid de// de la chags par ma gyur na// 
171a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub bo// de bas yang dag ma mthong bas/ dkyil 'khor du ni grub ma gsungs/ yang dag ma mthong grub pa ni// the tshom can gyis mi grub bo// bar du 'jigs pa rnyeng nas su// nad kyis kyang
171a4(rgyud): ni 'jigs par byed/ gdon yang de la rtson par 'gyu dar// shinas ngu 'bong du ltung ngo // de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cang du chug la nang dang gdon la sogs pa sten cig/ bcom ldan
171a5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog ras la bri bar bya ste// de'i thang 'khor kun tu byang chub sems dang 'a brgyad bri ba ni 'di lta ste/ g.yas phyogasu ni 'phags pa
171a6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang / 'jal dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// g.yon phyogs su ni rdo rje khu tshur dang / byams pa dang / namakha'i mdzod do// steng du nam
171a7(rgyud): mkha'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa gnyis kyi bcing ngo // lag pa gnyis po gzhan la g.yas pa ni rdo rje gsor
171a8(rgyud): g.yon pas ni me tog gi gzhu dang 'da' lnga bsnams pa/ sku mdog ni ud pa la sngon po lta bu/ yid tsam 'dzum la mche ba cung zad gartsigs la/ khro ba dang bcas pas banang pa'i zhal/ phyir
171b1(rgyud): brkyang bskum du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon pas lha chen po ldan pa g.yon par mnan/ zhabs g.yas pa bskum pas u ma'i nu mar btsir te/ spyod g.yog khra bos yan
171b2(rgyud): lag g.yog pa/ ke rlon gyi smad g.yog can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbu rgyan du thogs pa'o// de nas tshes zhag gcig nas bgo brtsams te/ tshes bco lngar ram/ zla bar ram lo'i bar du
171b3(rgyud): nyin re zhing brgya stong bzlas te/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos la bdag gi khyim du gnas shing zas gtsang ma yid bzhin du zos te bzlas na de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang / zla ba dang pos ni hUM zhes
171b4(rgyud): bya bas phyi rol gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyu ro// gnyi sa kyis ni las thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// gsum gyis ni bcom ldan 'das rmi lam du ston cing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
171b5(rgyud): pa thams cad ston to// bzhis ni sems can thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang du bya bar nuso// zla ba lngas ni yid bzhi na snang ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyuraro// zla ba drug gis ni ci 'dod pa
171b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi gzugasu 'gyuraro// zla ba bdun gyi ni bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyag na rdo rjer ston cing cho 'phrul thams cad kyang sten to// zla ba brgyad kyi stong
171b7(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byed cing lasu bsgre'o// zla ba dgus ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams thad
171b8(rgyud): dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byed do// zla ba bcus ni sa bcu thob par 'gyuraro// zla ba bcu gcig gis ni bcu cig pa sangs rgyas kyi sa tho ba// zla ba bcu gnyis pas ni
172a1(rgyud): rje 'dzin par 'gyuro// de nas sgrub pa bstan te/ ras la rdo rje hUM zhes pa de bzhin du bris la/ de'i thang 'khor thams cad du mthu chen po la sogs pa nas/ klu ba ru na'i mtha' b.rang
172a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la sgong zhing dbus mo gtsugs pa bris la/ de nas de bzhin du bzlas pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa ni phyag rgya grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba'i mtha'i bar du/ tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan thal
172a3(rgyud): byung bzlas na/ nang par thams cad 'ong ngo // 'ongs nas kyang dbang du 'gyur te thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du byed do// de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bro nas gser gyi 'das
172a4(rgyud): kyi lha mo la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi phyag rgya ste nga nas gar byed cing mi sdug pa 'jigs pa'i gzugasu bri'o// da nas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gis mtshan thal byung du zlos shig/ 
172a5(rgyud): nas nang par kun lhags te/ de bzhin du gar dag gis sgrub pa po la mchod do// 'di la rtog pa 'dir bris pa bzhin no// snyam du bsams nas nges mi 'jigs par bya'o// de nas dbang du
172a6(rgyud): 'byung ste/ rtag tu las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyuraro// de nas cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du brgyad stong du bzlas na nub tha ma la rdo rje 'dzin
172a7(rgyud): pa thob ste/ ci 'dod pa grub pa'i mchog kyang thob bo// gzhan yang sgrub pa phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum zlos shig/ de nas bgos pa kun bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad do// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar ci
172a8(rgyud): 'dod par yam shing thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gis lo gcig gis bar du bsregs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bris pa de'i spyan sngar lo gcig gis bar du grangs mang pa
172b1(rgyud): zlos shig de nas tha mar bcom ldan 'das rang gci 'dod pa'i mchog rtsol bar 'gyuro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman sngar rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings de bzhin gshegs pa
172b2(rgyud): 'gul gyi bar du zlos shig/ de nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// grub pa des na dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gzhug pa dang / drang ba dang / ltung ba dang / dbab pa dang / stan 'pho ba la sogs pa la
172b3(rgyud): phran tshegs kyi bcings pas hUM zhes pa mdzad do// de nas cho ga gzhan te rig pas dbang bskur bar bya bar 'dod na dro'am 'ji ba las phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs byas la phyag gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'jim
172b4(rgyud): to// de zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ tshe sa bco lnga'i bar du mar ba zhi bre brgyad kyis khrus shig/ de nas tha mar mtshan thal byung bzla so// de nas nang par gzugs de bzhad
172b5(rgyud): de nas rig pa thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// de na sa sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cha lugs dri'am 'ji ba la de bzhin du phyag brkyang ba rdo rje 'dzin
172b6(rgyud): par byas la de'i zhabs kyi bar du spos chus bkrus nas/ de phyin chad yad bzhin du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub pa gzhan he ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi par byas la/ de'i phyag
172b7(rgyud): g.yas par pad+mo// g.yon par rdo rje/ g.yas par rdo rje hUM zhes pa/ g.yon par mnga' dang gzhu/ de nas de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya zlas pa'i 'jug tu zhag gsum bsnyung ba byas te/ mtshan thal byung
172b8(rgyud): bzlas na/ de'i nang par de dang 'dra ba'i gzugasu 'gyur te/ bskal par gnas shing mi dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de nas dkyil
173a1(rgyud): sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkrol 'khor mthong bas lci ba gsum gyis khrus byas/ dus gsum du gos brjes la/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas brgyad stong dus gsum du na
173a2(rgyud): bdun bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzugasu byas nas rmi lam du thams cad smra'o// de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bas zla ba gcig gis
173a3(rgyud): bar du de bzhin du dus gsum du khrus byas nas dus gsum du gos brjes/ dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ rno lcags kyi mtshon chas der rdo rje bris la/ de la lta zhing rdo rje 'dzin ma'i
173a4(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings te/ brgyad brgya bzlas na zla ba gcig gi mthar bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // de nas rdo rje sgrub pa 'byu nga ste/ rdo rje ras sam/ rtsig pa'am/ shing lab la bris nas de
173a5(rgyud): la mchod pa byas te rdo rje khu tshur gyi bzung la/ log cig tshun cad rdo rje nam 'bar gyi bar du zlos shig/ 'bar bde sa na na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lo gcig lon pa'i las phyag
173a6(rgyud): na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang / stobs dang / mdog tu gyur te/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// tshe yang lo stong phrag brgyar
173a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas ral gri sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi ral gri bzung la lo gcig gi bar du bzlas na rigs 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// de nas 'khor lo sgrub
173a8(rgyud): pa 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris la lcags kyi 'khor lo thogs nas/ nam rdo rjer gyur cing slar yang 'khor lor gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas de thogs pas na rig 'dzin thams
173b1(rgyud): cad kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyu ro// de nas kyo ba~M dang sgrub par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar gser gyi kyo ba tang byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ grub pa rnam gsum du gyur
173b2(rgyud): gyi bar du bzlas la dros pa tsam gyis thams cad kun 'gugs nus par 'gyuraro// dud pa byung ba tsam gyis thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// 'bar bas ni thams cad 'gugs nus pa dang / dbang du bya
173b3(rgyud): nus shing rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyuro// de nas lha la sogs pa 'gugs pa 'byung ste/ lha chen po la sogs pa lnga rnams gang yang rung ba'i cha lugs rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag
173b4(rgyud): rgya bcings te/ bsdigs shing zla ba gcig gi mtha' ba dar bzlas na lha thams cad lhags te/ las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na klu'i mtshor lte ba
173b5(rgyud): man cad chu'i nang du bcug la lo gcig tshun cad glu/ mas cad rang gi gzugasu ston cing las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar
173b6(rgyud): 'dod pas gnod sbyin gang la gnas pa'i gnas dar rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la gnod sbyin de dag lhags te bka' ci stsal ces smra ba'i bar bzlaso// de phyin cad bka' thams cad bye ba'i
173b7(rgyud): g.yog tu 'gyu ro de nas ma rnams thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod pas ma'i gnas su song nas khro mo'i snying kar rdog pas gnan la zla ba gcig lon gyi bar du bzlas na tshes nyi shu dgu la 'jigs
173b8(rgyud): su rung ba'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed de/ de nas dbang du gyur nas bka' bzhin byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur te/ phrag pa la khyer nas mtho ris su khrid de slar yang khrid 'ong nas tshegs kyi bdag
174a1(rgyud): bor bcug cing de dag gi mchod de/ sngon ma byung ba'i don thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad dang / na chung thams cad 'gugo/ 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor yang ster te/ nal 'phye
174a2(rgyud): gang gi khro bo 'jig rten du yang 'gre zhing phyir yang 'ong ngo // de la sus kyang cung zad kyang byed mi nus// de nas dpal chen mo sgrub par 'dod pa nges phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku las/ 
174a3(rgyud): lha mo'i lus mthong gi bar du ste/ de las ma 'gul ces bsgo'o// de phyin cad don thams cad ster bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas pa yang ster ba'i bar du'o// de nas mtsho dbyangs ma dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ 
174a4(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar yig phreng bar byas la phreng ba'i yi ge bkod cing mthar phyin pa'i bar du bklags te/ nyin re zhing dus gsum du las byas la/ de nas brgyad stong
174a5(rgyud): bzlas na zla ba gcig lon pa dang mtshe dbyangs ma mthong ngo // de phyin cad thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
174a6(rgyud): gtsug lag thams cad dang / shes nyen can du bya ba thams cad dang / bzo thams cad kyang ma bslabs par des rab tu shes so// de nas lig bu mig dang / gur gum dang / ldong ros dang / 
174a7(rgyud): ba bla rnams la sgrub pa 'byung ste/ lig bu mig blangs la/ 'jom pa'i steng du bzhag nas lag pas mnan ste grub pa rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlaso// gcig gis ni mi snang bar 'gyu ro// gnyis
174a8(rgyud): pas ni gzugs mang por 'gyur ro// gsum pas ni gnas gong mar 'dzeg pa na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyu ro// gur gum la sogs pa bzung ste/ 'jom pa'i bu gar bcug la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i
174b1(rgyud): phyag rgyas mnan nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang / rig 'dzin dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang / tsha lo stong du thub par 'gyur ro// de nas sA la bAny+tsi ka sgrub pa 'byung ste/ gnas gang na sa la
174b2(rgyud): bany+tsa ka ri mo bris pa'am/ gzug su byas pa de'i 'jom pa la sor mo bzhag ste/ zla ba gcig gi bar du zlos shig/ de nas zla ba gcig gi mthar mtshan thog thag zlos shig/ de nas nad pa rang gi gzugasu
174b3(rgyud): bstan nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i chung mar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin ma sgrub par 'dod pas gnod sbyin ma gang na 'dug pa'i gnas der 'dug la rang gi gzugasu 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas na de la 'dod
174b4(rgyud): ba thams cad ster ba'i bran mor 'gyu ro// de nas sha za mo sgrub par 'dod pas phyag dar phung po mas btang ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma de bzung la g.yas pas zags
174b5(rgyud): ma sregs pa ni phyag dar gyi phung po de las ji tsam du/ za mo gdong mangs gzugs mi sdug pa 'ongs te rang gi gzugasu gnas so// de yang de bzhin du bran mor 'gyur ro// de nas ci bgyi
174b6(rgyud): sgrub par 'dod pas nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba byas la/ chos nyi shu dgu la brgyad stong bzlas te/ de nas zla ba gcig slong mo la za zhing grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba cig lon pa dang nub
174b7(rgyud): gsum srung nas mtshan thog thag zlaso// de nas nang par ci bgyi 'ongs nas des mi 'jigs par byas te/ de nas de rang nas 'grub bo// de phyin cang 'dod pa thams cad 'bul ba'i g.yog tu
174b8(rgyud): 'gyur te/ mtho ris kyi lha mo yang 'grub cing 'bu'o// de yang skyel zhing slar yang 'dug go// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi thams cad kyang smra'o// gzhan gyi nor thams cad kyang
175a1(rgyud): phrogs nas 'bu'o// de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya bar 'dod pa dngos grub med pa gang yin pa des zla ba drug gi bar du nyin zhag bcu bcu zhing // spyad pa snga ma
175a2(rgyud): brjes la spong mo'i kha zas la sogs pa nas rlung bza' ba'i bar du// de nas 'jug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par sangs rgyas pa yang sbyin par 'gyuraro// de nas nyin re zhing bco brgyad kyi bar
175a3(rgyud): du sngon gyi spyad pa rnams byas la de'i 'jug tu mtshan thal 'byung bzlas na nang par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni hUM zhes thang cig brjod pas kyang ngo // de nas ro langs sgrub pa 'byung
175a4(rgyud): ste/ ma smras ma nyams pa'i ri ro blangs la legs bar bkrus nas byug pas legs par byugs te/ me tog gi phreng bas btags nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la dbugs
175a5(rgyud): 'byung gi bar du bzlas na de sdang ste langs pa dang / de nyon na thams cad du 'gro zhing che yang le stong phrag rgyara' gyuro// de nas ro langs kyi grub pa mchog sgrub pa 'byung snyam
175a6(rgyud): smas ma nyams pa'i mi ro blangs nas de bzhin du rab tu brgyan pa zhon te langs shing yang bgyel pa'i bar du bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro// de phyug pa la khyer na de bzhin gshegs
175a7(rgyud): pa thad srel ba'i rig 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thad du rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang / tshe yang skal par 'gyu ro zhes bac+doMs phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// de nas ma sgrubs kyang dkyil 'khor
175a8(rgyud): mthong ba nyid kyi lasu 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ thang cig brjod pas ni bdag dang / gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po la sogs pa srung bar 'gyur ro// mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa ni brtan par blta bas/ 
175b1(rgyud): mtshams bcang pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mi mnga' na gzhan lnga ci smos/ sa'i dkyil 'khor dang / namakha' dang / phyogs bcings pa yang lta ba des// dbab pa ni reg pa dang ma reg pas
175b2(rgyud): ral gri dang / me long dang / snod dang / mthe bo dang / shing ljon pa dang / bris pa dang / cha lugs dang / gzhu dang / mnga' dang / rdo rje la sogs pa dbab pa'i phyag rgya gos kyi g.yog la bcings te/ gul gul gyi
175b3(rgyud): gdug pas dbab po// gdon zhi bar bya ba ni hUM zhes pas// hU~M zhes pa'i phyag rgyas ni sems can thams cad 'phungs par byed do// rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas ni byad ma'i gdon las thar par 'gyur ro// haM
175b4(rgyud): ru ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan pas ni byad mas bsad pa la da slar gso bar bya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bzung bas skra las bzung ste/ bslangs pas ni dug mnan pa dang / dug bslang ba dang / dug zhi
175b5(rgyud): bar bya ba dang / dug spo ba dang / dug gzhig par bya ba dang / dug gi shi ba las gso bar bya ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa gcig gis// gter 'byung ba ni zangs kyi ril ba rkus bkang la/ rdo rje hUM nas
175b6(rgyud): ba'i mdzub mo dang gu gul gyis bdug pa byas te bzlas na gal te gter yod na ni chung ldang ngo // de ste med ni ni 'khyil lo// de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i hUM zhes pa bzlas te blang ngo // 
175b7(rgyud): snang ba dgug pa ni dong ka'i ljon pa'i yam shing gis ma bus te/ zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis ra dza ko sha ti ka'i me tog la bskus nas stong phrag brgya bsregs na snang ba thob bo// 'og gi gan su rdo rje'og
175b8(rgyud): gi phyag rgyas 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas te zhugs na de la sus kyang gtse bar mi 'gyu ro// gtogs 'dod kyi 'khor los kyang ci yang byed par mi 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje'i
176a1(rgyud): spyan sngar rdo rje'ang/ mer bu ma rag ti'am/ pad+ma rAgA 'am / lu rig gam/ gser ma dbyig sam/ gzhan ci yang rung ba 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud ngam/ sangs rgyas kyi sdug rngu
176a2(rgyud): la le gcig gi bar du dus gsum du bcwa brgyar bzlas nas/ de nas le gcig len na brgya 'gyur du 'gyu ro// de sreng du brgyar bzlas na de nyid kyi brgyar 'gyur// de nas stong du bzlas na yang stong du 'gyur/ 
176a3(rgyud): spyod dgug pa ni stong phrag brgyar bzlaso// dgug pa ni rdo rje kyo ba tang gi phyag rgyas zla ba bzhis khugs/ dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje khu dur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// sems can thams cad gtan 'pho ba ni rdorje
176a4(rgyud): hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings te stong phrag brgyar ba zlas na/ sems can thams cad yid kyis dmigs pa bzhin gaHna 'phe'o// chu mnan pa ni rdo rje phyag rgya bcings la chu'i steng du 'gror
176a5(rgyud): rung ba'i bar du bzla so// me mnan pa ni thang cig bzlas pas so// le tog srung ba ni rdo rje blta ba ste/ de la srog chags rnam sa gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / byi ba la sogs pa yang
176a6(rgyud): 'da' bar mi bye'o// rdeg pa spong ba ni khro bo'i lta bas te gang du bltas pa der 'pho'o// bza' ba dang btung ba thams cad spong ba ni 'bar ba'i lta bas rang gi snod 'pho'o// sdig pa dang sbrul thams cad mang
176a7(rgyud): par bya ba ni thang cig brjod paso// gcan srin thams cad la thang cig bzlas pas med par 'gyuraro// rkun po thams cad pham pa ni rdo rje khu tshur bcangs paso// dpag las sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas
176a8(rgyud): so/ gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / rgyal mtshan mnan nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas te/ de thogs na dmag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// zhal che la ni thang gcig brjod pas rtsod pa'i lan
176b1(rgyud): thabs par 'gyur ro// zhi ba thams cad ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so// rgyas pa thams cad ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so// gtan 'pho ba thams cad ni tsher ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// 'tshe ba dang / 
176b2(rgyud): gnam ngal dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhol ba ni til dang / 'bras kyi sbyid sreg gis so// gnom pa thams cad ni hUM zhes paso// dgong du gzhug pa dang / myos par bya ba thams cad la phaT ces bya
176b3(rgyud): bas so// thams cad gnyid log tu gzhug pa ni bskum la mig btsums te/ brgya bzlas pas thams cad gnyid log par byas pa yin no// sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas
