176b4(rgyud): bltas na rgyas btab par 'gyur te/ nyin bdun la das lhag par mi gson no// ngagang brog pa ni rang gi lce sos bzung na sa hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyor ba'o// snying drang ba ni rdo rje sor mo'i phyag
176b5(rgyud): rgyas dpung pa bsnol te/ rang gi mtshan khung du glong zhing snying po bzlas na nub bdun tshun cad 'pho bar 'gyuraro// snying bcad pa ni rdo rje blangs te bcad par bya'o// snying dbye ba ni rdo rje lcas
176b6(rgyud): phur gyis btab ste/ ming nas smos shing gzug so// snying spo ba ni lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje blangs te mtshan bdun du rab tu sbyor ba byas pas 'pho bar 'gyuraro// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams las
176b7(rgyud): thar par bya ba bshad de/ des rgyas 'debs pa la ni khu tshur dam paso'o// ngagang brog pa la ni rdo rje ngag gos bzlas paso// snying 'dren pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya stong kar dgrol lo// bcad pa la ni rdo rje
176b8(rgyud): hUM zhes pa bzlas nas 'o mas khrus shig/ phye ba la phur bu phyung nas rdo rje dris skus shig/ snying spos pa la ni rdo rje snying pos thar bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byad ma'i phyag rgya yang spo bar 'gyuraro// nga
177a1(rgyud): sgrub par 'dod na bud med kyi snying kar bzlas na de'i snying ka nas sgra thos par 'gyuraro// skyes pa'i snying kar yang de bzhin du bya ste/ snying ka thams cad du yang de ltar ro// de nas pha rol
177a2(rgyud): gyi sems shes pa sgrub par 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas na pha rol gyi sems shes so// sngon gyi gnas shes par bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas paso// rmi lam mthong bar 'dod pas ni rdo rje
177a3(rgyud): hUM zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing gdug pas ka pi tsis bdugs te/ gnyid log na de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi shes pa ston to// tshig sgrub
177a4(rgyud): par 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gi stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo/ rje tshig gis rang gi lces smras pa thams cad bden par 'gyur/ te ci bslangs pa de stsol to// cho 'phrul ston pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa
177a5(rgyud): tshig gis brgyad brgya bzlas na rang gi lus la cho 'phru la du gyur pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la
177a6(rgyud): sogs pa sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du ston to// rang gi gzugs ci dga' bar bsgyur bar 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gis rdo rje bzlas pas stong phrag brgya bzlas na gzugs gang
177a7(rgyud): dang gang 'dod pa de dang bdag sangs rgyas kyi gzugasu yang byed par 'gyuraro// mi snang bar 'dod pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung la rdo rje bzung bas/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlaso// 
177a8(rgyud): btang bas ni 'grol lo// khri'u la 'dug nas rdo rje lag tu blangs te/ nam 'phar gyi bar du bzlas so// gdon gyis 'dzin du 'jug na rdo rje hUM zhes paso// gdon gar byed du 'jug pa ni haM zhes paso// 
177b1(rgyud): gdon bskyod pa ni hag ces pas so// gdon gzhom pa ni phaT ces paso// gcer bar bya ba ni mi'i skra'i skud pas rang gi dpung pa bcings na gcer bar 'gyur te gos brje bar 'gyuraro// sdang bar bya ba ni rdo rje
177b2(rgyud): khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgral bso// spang ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phang ngo // dgos pa bskyed pa ni mtshan thog thag sha chen rang gi khrag gis bslus te sreg go// gnan gyi bud med dgug pa na
177b3(rgyud): rdo rje bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gam/ yang na thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes pa thams cad bya'o// bud med thams cad dga' bar spyod pa ni rang gi rtags rdo rje bcings pas bzung la nyin
177b4(rgyud): bdun dus gsum du langs kyi bar du brlab bo// de nas mjug tu nam phyed bar du brlabs na rtag tu ldang la mi snyoms shi nga bcud mang la rtags shugs drag por 'gyuraro// bu mo sprad pa ni
177b5(rgyud): rdo rje bzung nas thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes bya ba bya sa nas spyang ngo // bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje hUM na sa pa'i phyag rgya bcing la stong phrag bzlas na/ bud med thams
177b6(rgyud): cad mgu bar 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag rgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad
177b7(rgyud): dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khu tshur gyi bcings pas rdo rje bzung la nam 'gul gyi bar du bzlas// snang ba la dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje blangs te rang gi spyi bar bzhag la spyi bor rdo rje brtan par gyur
177b8(rgyud): gyi bar du bzla so// de nas snang ba'i mdun du 'dug na des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur ba yang stsol to// nor dgug pa ni rin po che'i gtso bo'i phye mas sbyin sreg bya bso// char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM
178a1(rgyud): zhes pa stong banas/ char bcad pa ni hUM zhes pa'o// ser ba bcad pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya so// gdon dgag pa yang phyag rgya de nyid kyiso// sprin dgag pa ni rdo rjehUM zhes pa
178a2(rgyud): brgyar bzlas paso// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me tog dang / bdug pas mchod de/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la rdo rje langs kyi bar du bzlas// de thogs nas sa bskor na tsa 'dod
178a3(rgyud): ba bzhin du rgyu'i las rnams ston te/ rdo rjes bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang / me tog mthong ngo // nam mkha' la me tog gi phreng ba chags par bya ba ni dbugs bsdams la rdo rje chu
178a4(rgyud): chur bcings te gtor na 'chag so// cha lugs bzhad par bya ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya so// gar byed par bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin mas so// sgra bar bya ba na hUM zhes paso// rgyug par byi rdo rje dgug/ 
178a5(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgyaso// smin ma 'gul bar bya ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje thogs la rang gi smin mtsham su bskul bas so// sa gas bar bya ni rkang pa g.yon pa brdabs paso// khyim
178a6(rgyud): bskul ba ni rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya so// khang pa dgug pa ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo ba tang gi phyag rgya bcings paso// sprin med par char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas paso// skad cig tu sprin 'du zhing ston
178a7(rgyud): pa ni rdo rjes bskor bso// zla ba dang / nyi ma dbab cing bstan pa ni 'dra ba paso// nyi ma dang / zla ba mang por bstan na/ rdo rje bzhin na mkha' la gtor bso// dmag rnam pazhi bstan na rdo rje bskor bso// ma
178a8(rgyud): mo nyin bar du bya na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bas so// nyin par mtshan mor bya na mig brtsams la rdo rje bskor bso// thams cad nas rdo rje bstan na brgya bzlas te rdo rje bskor bso// thams cad nas
178b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bstan na stong bzlas te rdo rje bskor bso// phyag na rdo rje thams cad la bstan na stong phrag brgya bzlas te bskor bso// thams cad nas sangs rgyas bstan na rdo rje la bye ba bzla so// 
178b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i rtog pa chen po rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
178b3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsung so// ngas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po
178b4(rgyud): 'dir brtson par 'gyur ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di sbyin no// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas cog tsog por 'dug ste mnos
178b5(rgyud): pa/ oM badz+ra bi swA'o// de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsu ma gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos/ sem sa can thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas phyag
178b6(rgyud): 'tshal zhing dbang du gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad
178b7(rgyud): ngo// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dkyil 'khor thams cad brtags te/ de'i dbusu nas phul bzhi la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje yid kyis kyang cog cog
178b8(rgyud): bor ban go/ de nas de bzhin du gzhug go// zhugs nas 'di skad du khyod deng nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do// de su dang na de bshado zhes bsgos shig/ des smras pa/ gsungs shig ces
179a1(rgyud): pa dang / de nas khyod deng phan cad de bzhin gshegs par gyur to zhes smos shig/ des spras gci'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phyir zhes des smras shig/ gang dkyil
179a2(rgyud): 'khor 'dir bzhugs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du blta ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam/ pha rol la thob par 'gyur ro// zhes smras nas/ phyag rgya slobs shig de bzhin gshegs
179a3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad do// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la/ rdo rje'i sgrub pa sgrub bo/ lag
179a4(rgyud): pa gnyis kyi rdo rje gzung la rang gi phyag rgya sgom mo// rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ snying po sgom pa ste/ rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na des de bzhi na gshegs pa yang tshe 'di 'am gzhan la thob par
179a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro// thams cad dam tshig chen potsha tshul du byas la 'di spros shig/ dang brtan phyag na rdo rje la/ de ba zhin gshegs rigs de bzhin no// sems can thang
179a6(rgyud): mgu ba ru/ khyod kyi de ltar brtag par bya// deng nas khyod kyi de ltar ma byas na/ sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcug na
179a7(rgyud): las rnam bzhi yang bslab bo// lus thams cad kyis gtugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas te sdig pa thams cad bshags
179a8(rgyud): de nas langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ dbus mo gnyis sa la gtugs nas/ bsod nams thams cad kyi rje su yi rang ngo // de nas langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gcugs la/ rdo rje 'dzin
179b1(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig gi badz+ra bide brjod cig/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje la phyag bya ba dang / bkur sti
179b2(rgyud): dang / mchod par 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu ro// mchod pa'i cho ga'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rig pa sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong nas ras
179b3(rgyud): la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i g.yasu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po// g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa bya'o// de nas gso sbyin can du dus gsum du khrus byed
179b4(rgyud): pa dus gsum du bkrus pa'i gos gyon la/ stong phrag brgyar ba/ zla so// de'i 'jug du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par
179b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd gshegs te zhal ston to// mchog ci 'dod pa stsal te/ sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang stsol to// de na sa yang cho ga bzhin te/ ras la de bzhin gshegs
179b6(rgyud): pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par byas la/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje thal mo sbyar te/ gcog tsog por 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogasu rdo rje phyag na
179b7(rgyud): rdo rje ya gcig gi rdo rje gsor g.yon pa na pad+ma'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogasu rdo rje khu tshur te khu tshur gnyis kyi rdo rje bsnams par byas la/ de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig
179b8(rgyud): de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba chang nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas/ mchog ci 'dod pa stsol to// yang tshig gzhan ni ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhinag ce
180a1(rgyud): pa bris la de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du bzlas te/ 'jug la nyin mtshan gsum du bsrung te phyag na rdo rje byon nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas
180a2(rgyud): so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'jug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // nam mkha' la ltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na na mkha' la de bzhin gshegs
180a3(rgyud): pa thams cad mthong ngo // des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin cig bzhin stsol to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na mchog 'thob bo// phyag na rdo rje spyan sngar stong phrag brgya
180a4(rgyud): bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad stsol to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lag nas bzung
180a5(rgyud): spe bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du khrid cing slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal bo las de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa rdzogs// 
180a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal
180a7(rgyud): po 'dir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba yang bskyod cing 'dren na sems can gzhan lta ci smos/ gang dran pa tsam gyis kyang 'jig pa
180a8(rgyud): thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// gang brjod pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad la srung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyag
180b1(rgyud): na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog stsol ba dang / don thams cad sgrub pa dang / dgongs pa thams cad byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang / gang
180b2(rgyud): bslabs pa tsam gyis sgrub pa thams cad mngon par 'gyur bar stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces
180b3(rgyud): bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis legs par smos shig/ ngas kyang bzung // de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor te/ rang gi snying khar stong pa'i tshul gyis bzung
180b4(rgyud): nas rang gi snying po 'di gsung so// Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos//  bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yos// rab tu
180b5(rgyud): g.yos/ 'phar rab tu 'phar/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu bskyod par gyur to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma rung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa
180b6(rgyud): sa'i snying por gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brtan par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa yang sra bar gyur to// bdud dang mi 'grungs pa'i
180b7(rgyud): phyogs thams cad kyang brlag par bya'o// gdon thams cad bcos bsang bcom ste/ 'angar pang pang nas/ bac+doMs la skyabasu dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skyobs/ bde bar gshegs pa
180b8(rgyud): bdag cag skyobs shig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid la skyabasu dang shig/ 'di nyid khyed la skyob par bye'o// phyag na rdo rje'i snying gnas
181a1(rgyud): kun tu 'bar bas bskor bas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'dzum zhing khro ba phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi
181a2(rgyud): gzhu 'gengs pa/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM zhes pa bac+doMs rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo phyung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos sbyangs na phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'du
181a3(rgyud): ste bka' nod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/  ji lta ba bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can tha~Md kyi don gyis shig ce so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsung so// 
181a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje de bas na khyod snying po gang gis sems can 'di dag thang brgyal ba dang / bcos pa dang / bcom pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rdo rje'i lus thob par 'gyur de smos shig
181a5(rgyud): oM T+wAM rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya 'dis/ bdag nyid go / sa na rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i tshe thob cing srung bar yang 'gyur/ te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du tha~Md kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// de nas phyag na
181a6(rgyud): rdo rje byang chub sems dpas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsung so// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// gru bzhi pa de sgo bzhi pa'o// rta babs bzhi pa
181a7(rgyud): bcas pa ste/ bcu drug cha dang ldan paro// rdo rje'i ra bas mdzes pa ste/ grwa dang sgo yi zur dag dang / de bzhin rta babs mtshams rnamasu// rdo rin chen ldan par bya// ba dan phreng ba dril gyis brgyan// dang po'i
181a8(rgyud): phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ snying po bzlas shing bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo yang / rdo rje srang bu mnyam ldan pa'o// rdo rje'i ka ba brgyad ldan zhing // rdo rje'i ka ba mdun gnasu// dkyil 'khor brgyad
181b1(rgyud): kyi tshul du ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa'o// de yi dbusu sems dpa' che// phyag na rdo rje bzhugs par bya// sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad dag/ dbu rgyan du ni brgyan thogs pa/ cung zad tsam
181b2(rgyud): du bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje snyems par mdzad pa ste/ me tog mda' gzhu 'chang ba'o// de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs nyid de// khro gnyer bzhad pa'i zhal ngo can// gnyis kyis
181b3(rgyud): me tog gzhu 'gengs shing // gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad pa'o// rdo rje can gyis g.yas phyogasu// rdo rje dga' ba bri bar bya// snying khar rdo rje brtan 'dzin cing // 'khyud pa lta bu'i sbyor bso// phyag
181b4(rgyud): na rdo rje'i rgyab tu ni/ chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste/ seng rdo rje dpal can te// rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs// rdo can gyi g.yon bris pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' dmar po ste/ gnyis
181b5(rgyud): kyis rdo rje sems pa 'dzin// sgeg pas mchod ci nga 'dud pa'o// dkyil 'khor grwa yi gnas rnamasu// mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya// dpyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje'i sprin// ston ka'i rdo rje khab mo// 
181b6(rgyud): phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa dag tu// 'dod pa'i gzugs la soDa ba bri/ sgo yi dpung rnams thad du// rdo rje 'dod pa'i kyo ba sogs// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po der// rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya bcing
181b7(rgyud): la zhugs la 'di skad du smos shig/ san kun gyi ying khyab cing // sems can kun la bde ba stsol// sems can kun gyi phar gyur pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag dang 'grub/ Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas de skad smras pa
181b8(rgyud): dang 'bab par 'gyur te/ de ltar babs pa tsam gyi phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bstan pas grub pa thams cad kyang stsol te/ la la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ la la ni 'tshang rgya
182a1(rgyud): / bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma gzhug ste/ snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la/ des phreng ba bzung nas gos dmar pos yan lag bcings la/ ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste bcug
182a2(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces smros shig/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mi mkhas pa su la yang gsang ba 'di dag mi bsnyad par byos shig/ 'byung po'i gdon dang / 'phra men ma la sogs pa'i gdon
182a3(rgyud): gyis bsad par gyur ta re/ shi nas kyang dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes sgo nas gdong khrol cig/ de nas 'di skad ces smros shig/ gang dpung na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ste/ 'di ni dang
182a4(rgyud): po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i dbang po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'o// gang mdun na pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i thugs yin te 'dod pa'i khro bo'o// gang g.yas na ba 'di ni sems
182a5(rgyud): can thams cad kyi reg pa'i bde ba ste/ rdo rje dga' ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o// gang rgyab na ba 'di ni bcoM ma ldan 'das bdag nyid che ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ sems dpa' thad
182a6(rgyud): kyi byams pa spong ba dang nor sbyin pa'o// gang g.yon phyogs na pa 'di ni bdag nyid che ba'i bdud de/ sems can thams cad chags par byed pa'o// gang gA'i bzhi po 'di rnams ni dus kyi mchod pa me
182a7(rgyud): tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri'i lha'o// gang phyi'i grwa'i gnas na ba de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan no// gang sgo bsrung de dag ni mig dang 'dod chags pa dang / 'dza' ba
182a8(rgyud): sme kyo ba tang dang / zhags pa dang / sgrog dang / 'bebs pa dag ni rgol bar mi 'gyur ro// khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po la smong par ma byed cig/ gang sangs kyi
182b1(rgyud): bstan pa la sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu stegs can gyi rnams 'dod chags bral ba'i chos des thar pa'o// de bzhin
182b2(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams chags pa rnams ni sems can thams cad la chags pas na thar pa ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi chung mas kyang sems can sdud par byed de/ 'dod chags
182b3(rgyud): ni byang chub tu bstan pa'o zheso// de nas snying po byin cig/ Tak+ki hUM dza/ 'di bsgrubs na bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das grub pas na 'dod pa'i khro bo grub
182b4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying po 'di bdag nyid che ba ste// zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// hUM zhes pa ni khro ba'o// de nyid dgug pa'i phyir dza zhes bya ba ni/ 'di khyod kyis bsgrub par
182b5(rgyud): bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po shes par slobs shig/ de nas dam tshig phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i thugs bslabs nas lag pa gnyis rdo sbyin pa'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra
182b6(rgyud): pra tad d+ha ra ya sid+d+hi \u0f7fk+ki hUM dza/ de nas phreng ba phyag na rdo rje la phul bas de'i mgo la bsgono// de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang sbyin pa snying po 'diso// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba karme shA ra tra i daM badz+ra na
182b7(rgyud): ma nam ad+hiSh+Thita dr-i D+ho s+ya b+ha ga/ oM k+ki hUM/ de nas der 'dug ste/ phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje tshig gis brgyad stong bzlas na de nas sa g.yo ste/ grub pa thang lan gcig bzlas pas
182b8(rgyud): 'gru'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la brgya bzlas na de'i thugs dbang du 'gyuraro// de phyin cad sems can tha~Md kyi snying shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying la dbang byed do// / 
183a1(rgyud): kyi stong du sdug par 'gyur/ thams cad kyi brtan par chags/ sing thams cad las tshiganas par 'gyur// gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang / ltar gyi tshig bden par 'gyur// bangs
183a2(rgyud): snying las kyang cho 'phrul rnam pa bani mthong zhing gzhan la yang ston to// de'i snying las rdo rje 'byung bar 'gyuraro// des na sems can thams cad kyis mi gsod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mi gcod pa dang / 
183a3(rgyud): mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i lusu 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa byaste/ rdo rje'i thugs stong pa'i glus bsad do/ de phyin cang grub pa thams cad rdzogs par
183a4(rgyud): 'gyur / da pa thams cad dang / gsang ba'i ma pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas mchod pa thams cang kyis 'dra ba mdzad nas ji sang pa'i bas dang /  dang / stsangs
183a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi tshim par byas nas 'byung ngo // rdo rje 'tsha ra lo chen po'i tshig rgyas pa'o// de nas rdo rje'i la 'khor du rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo la sogs pa'i phyag rgyaji ltab
183a6(rgyud): bzhin bris te zhugs nas mchod pa'i lha rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas sim pa ma stong bar byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngang rdo rje'i glu
183a7(rgyud): bzlas pas 'bum bzlas/ de nas rdo rje de khri bar 'gyuraro// de nas slar yang bar 'gyur// de nas de ltar mtshan gcig pa la byung du bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin tam/ rdo rje khro ba stong gsum gyi stong chen gyi
183a8(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag po lha'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rgyan dang / spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa rdo rje 'dod pa'i mngangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje khra ba snang gsum gyi spang / 
183b1(rgyud): 'dzin gyi tsher 'gyuraro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i srang bus thig btab te/ de nas lha mo rnams bris la de'i dbusu bac+doMs ji lta ba
183b2(rgyud): bzhin du bzhag nas 'di skad smos shig/ ho badz+ra satwa su ra ta s+t+waM/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje gzhu 'gengs pa'i gzhu bris te/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra ashwe hUM/ g.ya su rdo rje dga' mgu 'khyud par bya'o// de'i
183b3(rgyud): phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra ki li hUM/ rgyab tu chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba byams pa'i rdo rje bri/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra a gr-i ho// g.yon du rdo rje sems ma bris te/ rdo rje g.yon du sbyor bar bya/ de'i phyag rgya 'di'o// 
183b4(rgyud): badz+ra gar+b+he hi ni/ de nas grwa dang sgor yang rang gi lha mo pra/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid shin tu chas la rdo rje lag tu thogs bud med kyang brgyan te/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la/ 
183b5(rgyud): dpung pa gnyis kyis 'khyud de zhugs la 'di skad brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM a he/ su ra ta phoTak+ki hUM \u0f7f/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis bac+doMs ston par mdzad de// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa
183b6(rgyud): dang / dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa yang stsol to// de nas de bzhin du snying po'i rdo rje de nyid kyi bcud nas 'di zhes smos shig/ khyod kyi dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' shig/ mi bde ba ma spangs par myur du
183b7(rgyud): shi zhing ngu 'bod chen por skyes par gyur ta re/ de nas dam tshig brjod do// bdag che kun gyi phyag rgya ni// 'dod pa bsam las yang dag 'byung // de bas khyod kyis sdig mang ba'i// 'dod dang bsam pa ma
183b8(rgyud): btang shig/ 'di ni dam tshig srung ba'i sngag so// oM Tak+ki hU~M phaT/ 'dis rdo rje'i chu blud do// gang dngos po gzhan thams cad kyi phyir yang mnas bsgag ste/ de dag la yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas blung // 
184a1(rgyud): gang gis 'di las 'das na/ zla ba phyed kyis snying 'gaso zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig chen pos gsung so// de nas phyag rgya bcings pa bslab bo// de nas de bzhin du
184a2(rgyud): 'byung ngo // shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas nyid kyi sku'am mtshan ma bzhag go// der btsud nas las rnam bzhi
184a3(rgyud): bslab par bya'o// de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje 'dzin phyag bzhi pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan
184a4(rgyud): gyis brgyan pa'i skur bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi ba du bzla so// de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad nus par 'gyuraro// de na sa khro ba'i las bslab ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcing la
184a5(rgyud): bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thang cig ba zlas te/ hUM zhes pas bsdogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'gre la bar 'gyuraro// de phyin chad 'gro ba gnas pa thaMd kyang 'gyel nus
184a6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// de nas phyag na rdo rje las 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa dang / khro bo gnyis kyis 'dul bar 'dod na/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas ma tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ 
184a7(rgyud): rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bdag gi snying khar bcings la phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin thob pa de srid du bzlas// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi las byed pas 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byang
184a8(rgyud): chub tu sems bskyed la sbyin pa sbyin/ dul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom// brtson 'grus brtsam/ bsam gtan la snyoms par bzhag/ shes rab yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ ci 'dod ci nus kyi bya zhing
184b1(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bskur mthong gi bar du bya'o// de nas sa bcu po 'thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyuraro// las
184b2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs par/ dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang // slob ma ma yin gzhan rnams la/ mi zad snying po 'di mi sbyin/ 
184b3(rgyud): 'khor mthong bas sgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyuraro// de nas ras la bris te/ ras kyi dbusu ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bri/ de'i
184b4(rgyud): g.yas phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi pa'i thugs 'byung ba de ba zhin du bri/ g.yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag bzhi pa ste/ gnyis na ni pad+mo'i ting 'dzin 'chang / gnyis kyis ni me tog gi
184b5(rgyud): gzhu dgengs pa/ kha dog dmar po bri/ spyan sngar de bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo bri'o// steng du na mkha'i snying po bro grwa mchod pa'i lha rang gi mchod pas bkram pa dang mgo bor ro// 
184b6(rgyud): nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhin dus bzhir stong bzlas shing bsgrubs na de na zla ba tshang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang rtsol bar 'gyuraro// ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi
184b7(rgyud): tshul du bris la/ sems dpa' chen po dang / lha mo yang de bzhin du bya'o// de'i spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu grangs med par bzlas shing 'dod pa thams cad zos la bsgrubs te/ de nas zla ba gcig lon pa
184b8(rgyud): dang / phyag na rdo rje phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin 'thob bo// ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed kyi bar du rtag pa
185a1(rgyud): bzlas pa mi nyal mi mnal bar bzlas te/ de nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang / mtshan mo yang thal byung du bzlas na nang par phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs skye
185a2(rgyud): chen po dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyang 'thob cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan 'das khro bo de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya bcings
185a3(rgyud): te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin du las thams cad byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang khyer zhang slar yang khyer zhing slang yang khyer te 'ong ngo // sang+yas
185a4(rgyud): kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba tha~Mngad khyer te 'ongs na sa de la sbyin no// des kyang longs spyod par nus na lha'i bu mo thams cad lta ci smos/ brgya byin yang stsol to// phyag na
185a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsgo bas stsol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd bkug ste dbang du byedado// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar
185a6(rgyud): rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi dpal gyi lha mo khrid byon nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dor ro// de nas sgrub pa pos bac+doMs khyod nyid bdag nyid grub
185a7(rgyud): par 'tshal gyi/ 'di ci 'tshal zhes smos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te/ ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thad kyang 'gru go/ spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar 'bum
185a8(rgyud): bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// na mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na dbang stsol bar 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par mdzad// rdo
185b1(rgyud): bzhag ste de'i mdun du 'bum bzlas na de nas las thams cad yid bzhin du grub par byed do// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog stsol to// dam tshig gi
185b2(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin mngon du mthong zhing phyag rgya'i las kun grub pa yang stsol bar 'gyuraro// rdo rje lag tu thogs nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung ba tsam gyi
185b3(rgyud): mi snang bar 'gyu ro// 'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo'i rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// kyo ba tang thogs te 'bum bzlas na/ kyo ba tang des thad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// zhags pa
185b4(rgyud): thogs te 'bum bzlas na zhags pa des thams cad drang nus par 'gyu ro// lag pa gnyis rdo rjes bcings pa bsdams te/ 'bum pa zlas na seMn thams cad bcing nus par 'gyuraro// rdo rje
185b5(rgyud): dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na gnas pa dang 'gro ba thaMd dbab nus par 'gyu ro// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na hUM zhes bya ba
185b6(rgyud): gcig gi gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad skad cig gis ltung bar byed nus par 'gyur ro// lha chen po rkang pa g.yen pas mnan la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings
185b7(rgyud): nas 'bum bzlas na/ zla ba gcig tshun cad kyis der 'ongs te dbang du 'gyu ro// mthu bo che rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo thob ste/ 'khor le de thogs na 'grub par 'gyur
185b8(rgyud): ro// tshangs pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// brgya byin rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje smyon par 'gyur te/ rdo rje bskor bas char bcad pa dang / dbab
186a1(rgyud): pa dang / thang gcig gis ni gnam lcags dang // ser ba 'beb so// sa nad gnon nu mnan te 'bum bzlas na/ gzhon nu ma thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyuraro// las thad
186a2(rgyud): kyang byed par 'gyuraro// nyi ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bdud rtsi rna cha sbyin par 'gyur te/ des na lha'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// zla ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas mgu bar bltas te stong phrag
186a3(rgyud): brgya bzlas na gnyi su mthong ste/ de phyin chad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang mdang su 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing sems can thang snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// bza'
186a4(rgyud): chen po'i gzugs la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de nas be con thogs te/ be con des ni 'thabs na dgra las rgyal te nor thams cad 'thob po// skya slong gi gan su song ste/ 'bum
186a5(rgyud): bzlas na skya slang las kun byed do// rgun gyis myos pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na chang gi snod thang nam 'tsho'i ba ra du mi zad par 'gyuraro// ma d+hu ka ra la bltas te stong phrag
186a6(rgyud): brgya bzlas na dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyuraro// rgyal ba la bltas te 'bum bzlas na 'thab mo dang rtsod pa'i g.yul thaMd las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// rgyal ba thob pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na thang
186a7(rgyud): las rgyal bar 'gyu ro// mdzod skyong rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na bza' ba dang btung ba mi zad par 'gyu ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang 'di la zad par mi nuso// rlung mngon
186a8(rgyud): du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na rlung gis de dang 'thun par 'dod pa thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// me la bltas te 'bum bzlas na me'i dbusu 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro na yang mi
186b1(rgyud): 'tshig ste ma'i gzir gyur cing nyin gcig kyang gser srang re re sprin no// ngal bso po mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag por gyur nas nor thams cad kyang sbyin par 'gyuro// 
186b2(rgyud): phag mo mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas nas la 'dug pa'i gter 'byin no// gshin rje mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi 'chi bar 'gyuraro// gnam 'dren pa'i cha lugs la bltas te steng
186b3(rgyud): phrag brgya bzlas na de las thang ba'i g.yog tu 'gyu ro// klu ba ru Na mnan te 'bum bzlas na klu thams cad las kun byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyuraro// ma'i gan su song nas stong phrag brgya bzlas
186b4(rgyud): na ma thams cad g.yog byed cing don thad byed paragyu ro// sa la 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na sa'i dbang por 'gyuraro// / na mkha' la bltas te 'bum bzlas na namapa' la 'gro ga
186b5(rgyud): sems can thaMd bsgyel ba dang / dbang byed par 'a gyur zhing na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sa'i 'og mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na sa'i 'og na 'khod pa kun
186b6(rgyud): la dbang du 'gyu ro// rin po che thogs te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyuraro// gser gyi dong tshe la se Da pa yang de bzhino// skyes pa bzung ste 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar
186b7(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyu ro// bud med bzung ste stong phrag brgya bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyuraro// rta la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyu ro// glang po che la zhon te 'bum
186b8(rgyud): bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyuraro// ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rwa gnyis bzung te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyuraro// gos dang rgyan gyi chas la stong phrag brgya
187a1(rgyud): bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dpal mo la bltas te 'bum bzlas na dbang du 'gyu ro// mtsho dbyangs ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na tshig nar dag/ 
187a2(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// de nas spangs na ci bslangs pa de kun ster bar 'gyuraro// gtsug lag thams cad dang rnam par shes pa thams cad shes par 'gyuraro// grub byed ma bzung nas 'bum bzlas na 'dra/ 
187a3(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa kun kyang ston cing ched du ma bslangs par nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// sA la b+han tsi ka mnan nas 'bum bzlas na nyin re bzhin yang gser gyi dong tshe brgyad
187a4(rgyud): brgyad ster bar 'gyuraro// gos kyi sgrog ma la man dan te 'bum bzlas na ma zad par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gi sno da mnan te 'bum bzlas na de dang de mi zad par 'gyuraro// gne/ 
187a5(rgyud): sbyin gyi cha lugs mnan te 'bum bzlas na gan da sbyin gyis ci dang ci 'dod pa kun sbyin par 'gyur ro// srin po ma nan te 'bum bzlas na da de'i g.yog tu 'gyuraro// 'byung po mnan
187a6(rgyud): te 'bum bzlas na 'byung po tha~Md kyi bdag por 'gyuraro// sha za'i cha lugs bris pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa yang sgra go ri
187a7(rgyud): la 'dzegs te 'bum bzlas na ni ri thaMd dbang du 'gyu ro// phyugs kyi lha su 'dug te 'bum bzlas na phyung thaMd la dbang du 'gyuraro// shing ljon gyi drung du 'bum bzlas na shing ljon pa'i lha rnams mchog
187a8(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyuraro// nga la 'dug te 'bum bzlas na bza' 'bum dang ldan par 'gyuraro// tshong ba dang bcas pa'i grong du 'bum bzlas na nor thad ma bslabs par thob par 'gyuraro// gnas byin can
187b1(rgyud): du 'bum bzlas na thams cad la dbang du 'gyuro// grong du 'bum bzlas na zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis grong de thob bo// gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na gtsug lag khang na gnas pas nor thang / 
187b2(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha'i sten du 'bum bzlas na lhas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyuraro// khang pa stong par 'bum bzlas na sha za thams cad de'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad sbyor
187b3(rgyud): bor 'gyu ro// snang ba'i gnasu 'bum bzlas na snang ba dbang du 'gyuraro// skyed mos tshal du 'bum bzlas na bskyed mos tshal gyi me tog dang 'bras bu thang rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyuraro// ma
187b4(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang bar 'gyuraro// gter gyi gnasu 'bum bzlas na gter rang 'byung bar 'gyuro// da god cing 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur te// 'gang
187b5(rgyud): pa tsam gyis las thams cad byed par 'gyu ro// khros pas 'bum bzlas na thang gtan 'pho bar nus par 'gyuraro// cang mi zer bar 'bum bzlas na sen thams cad
187b6(rgyud): dbang du 'gyu ro// lkugs pa'i brtul zhugs kyi 'bum bzlas na tshig thaMd kyi dbang du 'gyu ro// bud med kyi 'joms par rtags btsugs te/ 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po
187b7(rgyud): dang namakha' la 'gri ba 'grub par 'gyu ro// 'dzem pa la 'dzub mo btsugs te 'bum bzlas na de byas pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba dang thams cad 'dren cing 'gugs pa/ gtong ba dang / 'gyel ba dang
187b8(rgyud): slong bar 'gyuraro// 'jom pa lta zhing 'bum bzlas na bud med thaMd dga' bar 'gyuraro// 'dzem par lig bu mig bcug ste 'bum bzlas na mi snang bar 'gyuraro// 'jom par gur gum bskus te 'bum
188a1(rgyud): bzlas na des bskus pas 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyuraro// 'dzem par ba bla bcug ste 'bum bzlas nanam mkha' la 'gro bar 'grub par 'gyu ro// 'jom par ldong ros bcug ste
188a2(rgyud): bzlas na rig 'dzin du 'gyuro// ral gri thogs te 'bum bzlas na ral gri can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyuraro// 'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyu ro// kyo ba tang thogs te
188a3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na kyo ba tang des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyuro// rdo rje gsor nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje rig 'dzin du 'gyu ro// phyag na rdo rje lag gi bzung nas 'bum bzlas nang ba
188a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin du 'dra/ ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la lag gis gzung ste 'bum bzlas na dri bzhin gshegs pa thang la mchod pa byed pa'i dam
188a5(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas rjesu dran zhing 'bum bzlas nas ng+yas thaMd mthong bas 'grub par 'gyu ro// phywa gan rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas na phyag
188a6(rgyud): na rdo rjes kyang de mchod na gzhan gyi lha ci smos/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs las bzung ste 'bum bzlas na ting 'dzin thob bo// rdo rje snying po bzung nas 'bum bzlas na nor thad sbyin
188a7(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// rdo rje khu tshur gyi cangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bsdams pa tsam gyi las kun byed nus par 'gyu ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nu la blta zhing 'bum bzlas
188a8(rgyud): nan mkha' la yi ge snang ste/ thang smra ba dang / spobs pa thogs pa med par thob par 'gyuraro// sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor byang chub sems dpa' la bskor cing 'bum bzlas/ 
188b1(rgyud): na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyuraro// na mkha'i mdzod la ltas te 'bum bzlas na na mkha' las rgyu ba thams cad dang / don thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la
188b2(rgyud): sogs pa thaMd kyi bar du ston to// byams pa'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bum bzlas na mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyam su myong bar 'gyu ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor
188b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag po slob dpon dang / yid kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor chen por brtags te zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang bcwa
188b4(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyil 'khor chan pa bcangs la dkyil 'khar chen por 'dug ste/ rje'i bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rdo rje tshig gis bzlas
188b5(rgyud): na dngos grub thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thaMd dang / sa nyen thams cad dang / las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyuraro// 'dod pa'i bdag po dang / dbang phyug dang / byed pa po nga
188b6(rgyud): 'byin pa dang / mi bzang mo nyams pa dang / 'dod pa thad nyamasu myong zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad snyed cing 'thob ste sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba 'grub pa'i sbyin par
188b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / de rang gi gnyen dang bshes gnyen dang / grogs tha~Md kyis kyang mthong ngo // de dag la yang 'grub par byed// bsam pa tsam gyi sgyu ma thams cad ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi
188b8(rgyud): gzugs kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi cho 'phrul yang ston to// de bzhin gshe pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang sngon to// skad cig gi gzugs sna tshog su ston par 'gyur
189a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshe dang / stobs dang / gzugs dang / na tshong dang shes pa ci tsam pa dang mtshungs par 'gyuro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// dkyil 'khor chen po
189a2(rgyud): 'dug ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas khro bo'i tshig gi bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing don gyis 'bum bzlas na des rdo rje khro bo lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyuraro// hUM zhes pas kyang de bzhin ga
189a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyang 'dzin pa dang khams gsum gyi dbang po dang / spyan gsum pa'i khro bo chen por gyur nas ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa dang / sems
189a4(rgyud): can thams cad grub pa gsol te/ de ltar mi zad ma nyams par 'gyu ro zhes bac+doMs phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// /  jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen
189a5(rgyud): po'i rgyal po las phyag na rdo rje'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad
189a6(rgyud): gsol to// bac+doMs bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di stsal to// gang brjod pa tsam gyi de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi ti
189a7(rgyud): 'dzin mngon du grub pa dang / 'jig pa dang / gnam ngal dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub se
189a8(rgyud): la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ leg so leg so// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyi spros shig/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang
189b1(rgyud): gi snying po 'di gsung so// a ro li ka/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan gcig tu 'dus te/ ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs
189b2(rgyud): pa ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur zhe zhug so// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' ses
189b3(rgyud): chen pos rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas yang dag par bshad pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de dbus
189b4(rgyud): srang bu mnyam pa ru// grwa bzhi par ni gdab pa ru/ gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgor bstan te// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor brgya dkyi tshul du ste/ dbusu thig ni bzhi yang bri// tshen rtsa
189b5(rgyud): dmar po dag gi ni// pad+mo 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// de yi snying po dbus su ni// 'jig rten mgon po bzhugs par bya// 'dab ma kun gyi ste nga rnamasu// sangs rgyas cha lugs bri bar bya// pad+ma che
189b6(rgyud): mchog phyag rgya yis// der ni slob dpon zhugs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor gnas 'dug nas ni// rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug par bya// ji ltar pad+mo rku rnams dang // nyes pa'i bag chags mang po yis
189b7(rgyud): chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir// 'gro ba chags pas dag par gyur pa yin/ 'di lan cig brjod nas bsgom ste/ de nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi kyo btang gis kun drangs la pad+mo chen po de spyan
189b8(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar gro'o// de la pad+mo chen po'i kyo ba tang ni 'di'o// oM ma hA pad+ma hUM dza hriMHde nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po cing byon te/ slob dpon
190a1(rgyud): la zhal ston par mdzad nas yang na 'od zer yang 'gyed ngo do// de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyi slob ma gzhug go// dkar pos g.yogs la gos dkar po bgos la thod dkar pos
190a2(rgyud): mgo la gtsug tor byas nas bcug ste/ tshigasu bcad pa 'dis brjod nas don kyang bstan par bya'o// de nas lag pa g.yen par pad+mo byin/ g.yas par sngags kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skad
190a3(rgyud): smes shig/ sangs rgyas thams cad pad+mo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rtag par ru ni rtag par bya// khyod ni deng nas spyan ras gzigs// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang // ting nge 'dzin
190a4(rgyud): la sogs pa bslab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po pad+mo zhes bya'o// de nas pad+mo'i dkyer 'byung ste/ pad mo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la// dbus
190a5(rgyud): kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca dkyi ting 'dzin la pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul gyi lta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'phab pa kun tu
190a6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob bo// pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung te/ dkyil 'khor de ban na du byas la de'i dbusu pad+mo stong bzhag ste/ de nas
190a7(rgyud): pad+mo re re zhing bzang po thang res bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo stong 'bu'o// de nas slob ma bcug ste dam tshig brjod do// slob min bu min ma yin te// dam tshig can la dam tshig bstan// 'dod
190a8(rgyud): pa'i 'dod chags thad ni// dag pa nyid ni pad+ma bzhin/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris la mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod// sangs rgyas thad yid kyis
190b1(rgyud): te/ phyag na rdo rje'i tshig gi so// lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste// rnam pa'i sdong po las kyiso// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang pos sgrub pa'i cho ga/ 
190b2(rgyud): 'di gsung so// ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo na/ rang gi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs shing de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad mtha' kun tu bzhugs par bri/ de
190b3(rgyud): nas zla ba yar gyi tshes zhag gcig nas brtsams nas rtag tu thaMd dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyun tu bzlas te/ nam spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas skrag
190b4(rgyud): pa po'i pad+mo'i dbusu zhugs te/ yang de las gzhan pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur ba'i gnasu brtan par 'gyu ra gyi bar du bzla so// de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi skur
190b5(rgyud): kun gyur te/ skad cig cig gi bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su 'gro zhing ldog go// sems can thams cad kyang mthong ste/ tshe bag tu med par 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'bum
190b6(rgyud): bzlas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyu ro// nyis 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs pa sdig pa tha~Md ma lus par byang bar 'gyuraro// sum 'bum bzlas na bsod nams thams cad
190b7(rgyud): mngon du 'gyur// de nas dngos grub thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes nyen thams cad mngon du 'gyuraro// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings
190b8(rgyud): te stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i 'jug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na de'i nang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de'i snying khar zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thob bo// 
191a1(rgyud): yang na khar zhugs na spyan ras gzigs dbang po thob bo// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang la su 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas ngag srung ngo // gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan dang / 
191a2(rgyud): grong dang grong khyer srung ngo // gsum pa brjod pas ni las thams cad byed do// dbab pa ni tsan dan gyi bdug paso// gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hri zhes bya ba so// sems can thams cad dbang du
191a3(rgyud): bya ba ni rdo rje me tog bzlas te byin no// sems can thams cad mnan pa ni sa ser pos so// bud med dbang du bya ba ni sum ni me tog la bsngags paso// chom rkun mnan pa ni yung kar gyi sbyin sregs
191a4(rgyud): ri dgas dang bya mnan pa ni yungs kar gtor bso// sgyu ma mnan pa ni rma bya'i chang buso// rmi lam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsu dam du bzlas paso// rmi lam ngan pa gzhil ba ni til gyi sbyin sreg
191a5(rgyud): gis so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni khyim bya'i sgo'i sbyin sreg gis so// bu mo thor bu dbang du bya kha ni bu mo'i skra'i sbyin sreg giso// lugs sa mo dbang du bya ba
191a6(rgyud): ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin sreg giso// bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin sreg giso// 'dod pa thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs
191a7(rgyud): dbang po la mchod pa byas nas/ nub gsum rangs par bzlas na de nas 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu thob par 'gyuraro// spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan
191a8(rgyud): gsum bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis re ba ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zla ba gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan gsum bzlas na
191b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom
191b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
191b3(rgyud): rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal por rang gi snying po 'bul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi su gsol/ 'dis sems can thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad
191b4(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'ad das kyis 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la skyes bu chen po spros shig ces bka' stsal te/ de nas 'phags
191b5(rgyud): pa na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsung so// traM bA bA Ta Ta ha ta/ de nas 'di brjed pa na mkha' la dbang bskur ba thaMd la sogs
191b6(rgyud): ba rin po che'i rgyan thams cad gos dang / gser dang / nor rin po che'i dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char bab po// bac+doMs kyi sku kun tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyad te bzhug so// de nas na mkha'i snying
191b7(rgyud): po byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungaso// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin te// rdo rje rin chen mnyam ldan zhing // grwa brkyang shin tu mnyam par bya// rin chen kun dang ldan par bya/ 
191b8(rgyud): der slob dpon zhugs te rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gnasu bzhag la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do// re ba thams cad grub pa yi// namakha' grub pa mchog yin te// grub shig grub
192a1(rgyud): shig sems chen po/ bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlob par mdzad// de nas dkyil 'khor
192a2(rgyud): gyi dbusu na mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bzhag la de'i thang 'khor kun tu phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa brgyad bzhag par bya'o// de nas slob ma rdo khu tshur gyis bzhugo/ bcug nas 'di
192a3(rgyud): skad ces brjod do// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bsam pa tha~Md rdzogs bya'i phyir// don shes bstan pa gang yin te// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// de nas sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bsla'o// de la dbang
192a4(rgyud): bskur ba sbyin pa dang // nor sbyin pa dang / zas sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa'o// de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o// nor sbyin pa ni sen thams cad la'o// zas
192a5(rgyud): sbyin pa ni byol song tha~Md la'o// chos sbyin pa ni sems can mi sna nga ba thad la'o// de nas snying po byon la/ rin po che tha~Md kyi byin gyi rnam sa pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod/ 
192a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra rat+na b+hi She kA b+hi Shany+tsi sarba d+hi pa traM hUM bA pA Ta Ta ha ha/ de nas rdo rje nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya slab ste/ sngags ni 'di'o// hUM bA ta ha/ de nas rdo rje rin po ches phyag rgya bcings te sngags ni 'di'o// oM bA hA
192a7(rgyud): ta mu gaM de nas mchod pa rnam bzhi bya ste 'byung // dbang thams cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje rin po che dbusu bris la lag tu nor bu thogs nas
192a8(rgyud): rdo rje rin po che langs kyi bar du bzlaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te dbang bskur bar mdzad do// dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyuraro// rin po che'i dkyil 'khora'o// de nas ngam/ 
192b1(rgyud): tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ na mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bris la/ spyan sngar nor dang gser dang / mu tig dang / nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la de nas de tsud de thams cad bstan na/ 
192b2(rgyud): dam tshig 'di sbyin no// sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag/ gal te nyin re mchod stong na// khyod kyi nor dang don bsags pa/ tshe rabs kun tu 'jig par 'gyur// de la 'di ni mo'i snying po'o// oM
192b3(rgyud): bA pA Ta Ta ya swA hA/ de nas chus dbang bskuro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor bris la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste/ de'i dbusu bzhag nas der btsud
192b4(rgyud): de/ de nas las rnam pa lnga slab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dbang sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya'o// de nas nor sbyin pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa la ci nus kyis
192b5(rgyud): sbyin no// de nas zas sbyin pa ni byol song rnams la sbyin// de nas mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni gyod khrid thaMd la sbyin no// de nas chos sbyin pa ni mi snang ba'i seMn rnams la sbyin no// las kyi dkyil
192b6(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang skur ba bris te/ de'i g.yas phyogasu
192b7(rgyud): 'phags pa namakha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o// g.yon phyogasu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas ras la bris
192b8(rgyud): pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas pa'i mjug tu nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/ phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na de nas bac+doMs na mkha'i snying po ras la bris pa de las byung nas sgrub
193a1(rgyud): pa bo de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// dbang bskur ba de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyuro// de nas ma bsgrub par yang lasu 'gyur ba ni 'bum
193a2(rgyud): bzlas na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na gter chen po rnyeng ngo // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs
193a3(rgyud): dbang pos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// na mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyal sring thob bo// rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na na mkha' la khu tshur
193a4(rgyud): bcings pas gser gyi dong tshe 'byung // 'jam dpal gzhon nu la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang gzungs thob bo// des nor yang skye bar byed do// rdo rje 'khor lo srin lag gi sor
193a5(rgyud): mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyuraro// na mkha'i mdzod kun nas 'khyud de 'bum bzlas pas na mkha 'a las nor thad dang zas thaMd kyi yo byad zad mi
193a6(rgyud): shes par 'gyuro// byams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan rnam sa kyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo // de
193a7(rgyud): phyin chad 'dod pa thad kyi nor gyi bdag por 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las na mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis bya
193a8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
193b1(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rdo rje'i ri rab de bzhin gshegs pa las blangs te/ des 'jig rten gyi
193b2(rgyud): khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo skad kyi sems can rnams 'grub pa thams cad grub par byas te/ de'i bskyed pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs kyi bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dra
193b3(rgyud): kyis rdo rje khu tshur byang chub sems dpa' chen po la lag so zhes bya ba byin te legs leg so// rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis smos shig/ de nas rdo rje khur gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji
193b4(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas ra gi snying po 'di gsung so// oM ru Tu ru Ta hUM ma thA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
193b5(rgyud): dang / rdo rje dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas na r-i rab ri'iHmor bac+doMs ga la ba der lhags te lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
193b6(rgyud): byang chub la dmigs shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bkod// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thang phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs
193b7(rgyud): de nas gnan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'dra ba ni/ rdo rje khu tshur zhes gsungaso// nga yi dbusu sems chen po// rdo rje khu tshur bzhag par bya/ rdo rje'i khu tshur rdo rjer bcas/ 
193b8(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni btsir bar bya// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas gzugs rnams bzhag par bya/ de dag gi ni grwa kun du// byang chub sems dpa' kun bri'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir
194a1(rgyud): / rdo rje slob dpon gyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyi tshig gis phyag rgya bcings te/ zhugs la 'di brjod cig/ hUM kI Ni sma ra Na pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la
194a2(rgyud): grub par 'gyur te/ de la phyag rgya yang brtan par 'gyur zhing sus kyang dbye bar mi nu so// de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying khar dgrolo// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti hUM/ de nas slob ma gzhug pa ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam
194a3(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa// phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste/ de bzhin du ras dmar pos mig gnyis bka' ste/ de nas 'di zhes brjod do// deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas
194a4(rgyud): btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang / rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang bta'o/ khyod chos dang rdo rje las gang 'dod// des smras pa/ gnyis ka'o zhe na/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi rdo rje dang / de bzhin pa
194a5(rgyud): pa'i cha lugs blangs nas phreng ba de'i mgo la bzhag ste/ dgro la ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying kar dgro'o// de nas lag tu sbyin pa ni lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o// g.yas
194a6(rgyud): par de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de sde de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes zer na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sprono// de ste rdo rje'i zhes zer na de'i lag pa g.yon par rdo rje byin la 'di skad bsgo shig 'di
194a7(rgyud): gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod pa gyis shig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol la dkyil 'khor ston la 'di smos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ lus dang ngag sem
194a8(rgyud): rdorje rnams// bsdus pa khu tshur zhes bya ste/ bcings na rdo rje khu tshur bshad/ de nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slobs shig/ dam tshig gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag rgya'i
194b1(rgyud): 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du// dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bri/ de yi dbusu ci rigs par// sangs rgyas sku lus bzhag par bya// thams cad rgyan gyi brgyan pa yi// rje
194b2(rgyud): rje khu tshur kun 'dzin pa'o// de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ mchod pa rnam pa ni bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dbus rnamasu/ rdo rje rin chen yang de bzhin/ de bzhin rdo rje pad+mo'i dbus/ rdo rje rgya gram bri bar
194b3(rgyud): bya sha grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya// de nas btsud nas phyag rgya kun/ bcing ba yang ni bslab par bya// sgrub pa gsang ba dag dang ni/ bskul ba gsang ba bslab par bya/ 
194b4(rgyud): 'di rnams thams cad kun bris nas// bsgrubs shig ces ni brjod pa ra bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du mtshan ma bzhag nas 'di zhes
194b5(rgyud): brjod do// ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na// phyag rgya shes pa brtan na ni/ rdo rje rin chen rgyal ba dang // sna tshogs pas khyod gsod par 'gyur/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las
194b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag rgya'i las bslab bo// de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'di'i'o// rdo rje bcing ba kun byas la// sor
194b7(rgyud): mo thams cad dgug bya ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya bcing // de nas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo // de lta bur mo ldan na 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pas ni dam tshig
194b8(rgyud): chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thang cig bzlas pas phyag rgya thang bcing bar bya ste/ thams cad kyin ma yin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrub pa
195a1(rgyud): 'byung ste/ 'o ma mthung zhing rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na sngar snyen pa byas par 'gyuraro// de nas ras la bri bar bya ste/ ras la bcom ldan
195a2(rgyud): 'das 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa bris la phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje dbang skur ba'i dar gyi bcings la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad
195a3(rgyud): du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur du bcings par bya'o// byang chub
195a4(rgyud): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang tingange 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o// de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i
195a5(rgyud): mjug tu zhag bdun spungs nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur sgoms la/ mtshan thal byung du bzla so// de na sa nam phyed nas bdud kyi las sna tshogs snang bar
195a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas 'di brjod cig/ oM badz+ra maSh+Ti ha na ha na sarba mA ra Na phaT/ de nas nang par gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon te lus kun tu 'jug// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag
195a7(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyuro// yang ras kyi cho ga 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris te de'i g.yas
195a8(rgyud): phyogasu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog sngo bsangs ud pal sngon po lta bu rdo rje khu tshur gyis phyag g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yas
195b1(rgyud): pa mchog sbyin pa ste/ de'i g.yasu bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu tshur can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gzhon nu ma dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi rdo rje dam du 'tshir ba mdog dmar po bya'o// 
195b2(rgyud): de'i thang du rdo rje'i gsal pur ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje gsal thogs pa'o// bac+doMs kyi g.yon phyogasu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thor
195b3(rgyud): tshugs kyi dbu rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ pad+mo dang mchod sbyin gyi phyag tu byas la/ de'i g.yon du pad+mo chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sde zhes bya'o// de'i g.yon du rdo rje'i dpal mo dang / 
195b4(rgyud): rdo rje pho nya mo'o// rdo rje dpal mo ni ser gyi sku mdog// dpal gyi ga zugs 'chang ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje pho nya mo ni mdog sngo na mo la rdo rje khar ba 'chang ba'o// de nas zla ba yar
195b5(rgyud): gyi ngo tshas gcig nas brtsams te/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gau phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag rgya bzlas na/ gzugs kyi ras de las phaT ces bya ba thos nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
195b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ de phyin cad namakha'i dkyil na spyod tsang 'dod pa mi snang bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong du phar yang 'gro zhing gyen du yang 'gro'o// ci 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyu ro// kun
195b7(rgyud): tu 'khyil bas 'khyil ba'i sgra can lo bcu drug lon pa'i lusu gyur nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod thaMd la ci 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod par 'gyu ro// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas sen thams cad la
195b8(rgyud): phan gdags pa dang / chad pas bcad pa la sogs pa thams cad nus par 'gyuraro// gzugs bzang po bskal par gnas shing / rga ba dang shi bar yang mi 'gyuraro// yang cho ga gzhan te ras la bac+doMs
196a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i g.yas phyogasu phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa la sku mdog ud pal sngon po'i kha dog phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje
196a2(rgyud): tshur bcings te sbyar la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud bar bya/ de'i g.yon phyogasu bac+doMs ma dam tshig gi khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa yid tsam 'dud pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsha
196a3(rgyud): ga lag pa g.yas pa na a mra'i 'bras bu 'bul ba/ g.yon pa na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to// de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum bsrungs la/ gu gul gyi ril bu sran ma tsam
196a4(rgyud): du ru ka'i 'bru mar la sngags la brgyad stong du ba med pa'i 'dag me la sreg go// de nas gzugs de 'gul te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'dra
196a5(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur gyi mchog stsal ba ni rgyal po 'am/ 'khor lo ba skor ba 'am/ lha ma yin pa dbang ba 'am/ sa brjod pa 'am/ sa'i 'og pa 'am khams brjod pa 'am/ 'dod pa'i kha
196a6(rgyud): mi snang ba 'am/ na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang sgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la/ de bzhin du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i
196a7(rgyud): phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa ud pa la sngon po'i mdog tu byas la de'i spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug nyin mtshan gsum thal
196a8(rgyud): byung bzlas na nam phyed nas bcom ldan 'das nyid byon te/ mchog stsol bar 'gyuraro// ras sam/ shing leb 'am/ rtsig ngos la bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin du rdo rje dang a mri'i
196b1(rgyud): 'bras bu thogs par byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis las thams cad mngon mi za bar byed par 'gyuraro// de nas ma sgrub pa'i las rnam
196b2(rgyud): 'byung ste/ rdo rje dam tshig gi khu tshur bcings nas 'bum bzlas na// khu tshur bcings pas na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyu ro// lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu chur bcings na phyag
196b3(rgyud): na rdo rje la sogs gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'bum bzlas paso// lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ khu tshur bcings pa des mi snang bar 'gyuraro// phral na
196b4(rgyud): / snang bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje bcing ba'i khu tshur byas la 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bcangs pas bcing ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyuraro// nam pa
196b5(rgyud): la rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te/ 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bya ba pa tsam gyis na mkha' la nor dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung
196b6(rgyud): ba dang / ma dang / chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang // myu gu dang / yi ge dang / 'thab cha dang / ston skyobs dang / mtshon cha dang / glegs bam dang / rtog pa dang / mdo sde dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la segs
196b7(rgyud): pa dngos po gnas pa dang / 'gro ba ci 'dod pa dgug par byed do// g.yas pa rdo khu tshur bcangs la 'bum bzlas na rdo khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dgug pa dang / 'dren
196b8(rgyud): pa dang / 'gyel bar nus par 'gyur ro// khu tshur bsgyur bas thaMd bstan 'pho nus par 'gyu ro// g.yas pas rdo khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na rde khu tshur byabs pas tha~Mng las nor dang / 
197a1(rgyud): gser dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / mtshon cha dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa dngos po tha~Mng dgugo// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya las dam pa thaMd kyang
197a2(rgyud): dgu go/ bud med kyi nu ma dang / mngal phyogs dang / mig dang / sna dang / mnu dang / rna ba dang / mgo dang / brla dang / ska rags dang / gsang spu la sogs pa dngos po thad kyang 'gugo// bkrol na thar par
197a3(rgyud): 'gyu ro// nyim zhag gcig bsrungs pa lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu chur bcangs te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na nga phyin chad khu tshur bcangs pas las thang byed// de la las rnams ni dgug pa dang / gzhu/ 
197a4(rgyud): pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang // rmugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gnyid log pa dang // bslang ba dang / drang ba dang / bsgyel ba dang / brdabs
197a5(rgyud): pa dang / skud pa dang / dbye ba dang / go bzlog pa dang / gtan 'a pho ba dang / gso ba dang / sgyu ma thad bstan pa dang / dus tshigs bsgyur ba dang / sa la sogs pa g.yo ba dang / thams
197a6(rgyud): cad la dbab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa dang / sngon ma byung ba'i sbyor ba dang / so sor lung ston pa dang / khrul 'khor thams cad gzhom pa dang / sgo
197a7(rgyud): thang dbye ba dang / gdon thams cad 'jug pa dang / dug thams cad bslang ba dang / ma rungs par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi phyag rgya gnom pa dang / thams cad 'gebs pa dang / gas pa sbyar ba dang / sprul
197a8(rgyud): bskrad pa dang / bzung ba dang / btang ba dang / ser ba dang / char dbab pa dang / klog dbyung ba dang / thams cad bslar bcad pa dang / sngan chad med pa'i gos dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / me tig
197b1(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / bya dang ri dgas dgug pa dang / gtong ba dang / gzugs mang po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / na mkha' la 'gro bstan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin/ 
197b2(rgyud): las thams cad byed par 'gyuro// 'jig rten gsum la rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o// / de nas bac+doMs la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
197b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnar rgyal ba'i rtog pa 'dir stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis de
197b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyu'o// de nas bac+doMs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rigs kyi bu khyed kyi smos shi ga ces gsung so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
197b5(rgyud): gyur pas smras pa/ a ra ba tsa na/ de nas 'di brjod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thang mnyam pa nyid la sa yi ge mnyam pa nyid sems can thad kyis shes pa/ 
197b6(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ba bshadado// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshas bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la bris te/ de'i dbus kyi lta bar
197b7(rgyud): 'jam dpal bzhugs par bya'o// rdo rje ral gri dang glegs bam thogs par byas la/ de'i thang 'khor thang du yi ge a ra pa tsa na la sogs pa'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje
197b8(rgyud): gri dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhugs te/ niSh+Ta pany+dza gra zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di brjod do// de nas bac+doMs kyis slob dpon la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa yang stsol te/ de phyin chad bac+doMs kyis/ 
198a1(rgyud): na mkha' la yi ger bris te thams cad gsung ngo // de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste/ 'di zhes smos shig/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thob par 'gyur gyis/ 
198a2(rgyud): snying po 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig/ de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnam so// a ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa thaMngad thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// ra zhes bya ba ni
198a3(rgyud): chags pa'o// pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o// na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o// de ltar 'dod pa dang / chags pa dang / don dam pa dang / spyod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa nyid
198a4(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te/ de bas na snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs
198a5(rgyud): pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin kyang myur du thob par 'gyuraro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pa bsla'o// spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya 'o// de nas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du rdo rje kyil
198a6(rgyud): 'khor bris la de'i dbusu ral gri bzhag ste/ mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubs na/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsgrubs par 'gyu ro// rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'khor ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'gro
198a7(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du bris la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do// a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM/ a d+ya nud pan na tAta/ a zhes bya ba ni chos tha~Md kyi sgo ste thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// 
198a8(rgyud): zhes nang par langs nas nyin re lan re brjod na mtshams med pa thams cad kyis mi go so// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
198b1(rgyud): phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu bzhag nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod pa ni 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sgom paso// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub 'dod pas dkyil
198b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshul du ras la bris nas/ yi ge phreng ba thaMng brjod de 'di skad du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi sgrub pa'o zhes kyang brjod nas yi ge 'di 'bum bzlas na spobs pa mi zad par
198b3(rgyud): 'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang lasu 'gyur pa ni lan gcig bzlas pas sdug bsngal thad las grol lo// gnyis bzlas pas mtshams
198b4(rgyud): med pa tha~Md lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// gsum bzlas pas ting 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro// bzhi bzlas pas dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lnga bzlas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag
198b5(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yige phreng ba ga/ yas phyogs nas a zhes bya ba'i drung du na zhes bya ba phyin gyi
198b6(rgyud): dubri'o// de nas bskor zhing yi ge 'bum bzlas te/ yi ge re re 'bum rdzogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo cog char 'grub ste/ nyin re zhing mthong ba
198b7(rgyud): bstan nas chos bshad de slar gsheg so// tshe 'di nyid las sangs rgyas pa man chad kyang stsal to// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'jam dpal
198b8(rgyud): gzhon nu'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi kyang 'jig rten gsum las na rgyal
199a1(rgyud): pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po 'di stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyi dkyil 'khor thad du zhugs par 'gyuro// de nas bac+doMs kyi rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub
199a2(rgyud): sems dpa' la bsku'o// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra tsakra hUM/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyi de bzhin gshegs pa tha/ 
199a3(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhug so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'di bshad// rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin bris la/ rdo rje 'khor lo bdag
199a4(rgyud): che ga rang gi lag na phyag rgya thogs// de yi dbu su bzhag par bya// de yi thad 'khor thad du// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams/ bri/ de yang sems can chen po rnams de dag nyid ni legs par bri/ 
199a5(rgyud): de nas blo ldan thog ma ru// rdo rje 'khor los 'jug pa ra bya// zhugs nas snying po 'di bzla so// dzaHhUM baM ho// zhes brjod na de sa bcom ldan 'das dgyes te grub pa thad du stsal to// de bzhin
199a6(rgyud): du slob ma bcug nas de nyid du bsgrub par bya'o// rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyu ro// rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'o// rdo rje
199a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dbusu rdo rje bri ste/ de bzhin du bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyuro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas mtshan ma bzhag ste/ 'di zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'khor lo 'jug pa lI/ 
199a8(rgyud): mthong dang de bzhin sgrub na no// rtog pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// de bas rtags te bsgrub par bya// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ dkyil 'khor bris pa de nyid du/ phyag rgya shes pa sgrub pa'i
199b1(rgyud): phyir// brtson 'grus btan pas thams cad kyi// bla med pas ni slob par bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis ma sgrub par las thad byed de/ ji ltar dga' ba'i cho ga/ 
199b2(rgyud): 'am rtog pa las bshad pa bsgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la
199b3(rgyud): nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying
199b4(rgyud): be stsal bar bgyi ste/ snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa tha~Md kyi gan su 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spros shig/ ces gsungs// de nas na mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs pa/ 
199b5(rgyud): oM ga gan saM b+ha ba badz+ra ba tsa ho// de nas de'i dus pa com ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la namakha' las mchod pa kun 'byung bar byas// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ 
199b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin du bri/ de yi dbu su nor chen te// na mkha' dang por bzhugs par bya/ rgyal ba kun gyis bskor ba bya'o// nga por slob dpon 'jug pa ni/ mchod pa kun mchog phyag rgyas/ 
199b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de ru bzhugs nas ni// rdo rje thams cad brjod par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'grub ste/ de bzhin du slob ma yang bcug nas rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'ang brjod la
199b8(rgyud): phrag rgya yang spobs shig// mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas namakha'i dkyil 'khor te/ yid kyi dkyil 'khor bris la der zhugs shig/ zhugs nas 'di skad brjod
200a1(rgyud): / cig/ 'di dag thams cad ni rnam pa' nyid de bden pa gang gos nam gzugs med pa las gzugs 'byung ba des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / yid
200a2(rgyud): la 'dod pa'i grub pa thams cad na mkha' las 'byung bar gyur cig/ ces byas nas 'dug ste/ rdo rje kun gyi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na de nas na mkha' las mchod pa'i rnam pa thaMd
200a3(rgyud): dang / don thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas bcud de 'di ni khyed kyi dam tshig go zhes brjod cig 'byung
200a4(rgyud): ba kun las na mkha' ni// 'byung ba chen po lnga pa'o// na mkha' la ni 'dod pa 'byung // 'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig/ ces smras na/ 'dis khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd mchod cig
200a5(rgyud): ces bsgo shig/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// slob ma na mkha' la yid kyis dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug la/ der slob ma yid kyis mchod pa yang slobs shig/ yid kyis 'di skad
200a6(rgyud): brjod cig/ na mkha'i mchod pas de gshegs pa thaMd la mchod do zhes nyin re zhing byas na 'grub po// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i rto ga pa chen po'i rgyal po las na mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa'o// 
200a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i
200a8(rgyud): rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsol bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis sems can thaMd byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smos shig ces gsung so// 
200b1(rgyud): nga nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpas rang gi snying po 'di gsung so// oM me hr-i dr-i T+Ta tsi ha hoShA ho// de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa'i
200b2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhug so// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris pa der byams pa bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi
200b3(rgyud): bya ste/ cho ga bstan pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod do// badz+ra dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha/ de nas byams pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas slob ma de bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po thad du 'jug
200b4(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis btsungad de// btsud nas byams pa chen po'i bya gargya bslab ste/ de nas go chas bskon no// stan pa chen po zhes bya ba 'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas byams pa'i dkyil 'khor
200b5(rgyud): 'byung ste/ byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting 'dzin sbubs shig/ byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du bu ga la 'di zhes brjod do// rangs sam yang na khros kyang
200b6(rgyud): rung // mdza' dang sdang ba de bzhin te// 'gro las gal te rgyal 'dod na// byams pa chen po sgom par gyis// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khora'o// de nas dkyil 'khor du btsud la 'di bsla'o// sang+yas thaMd la
