225a2(rgyud): ma med pa mngon sum mthong // arga mchog brtags bsang la sogs pa yi// dbyangs snyan pa yi bstod dang lha rdzas kyi// mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod// de na
225a3(rgyud): 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya// sems can bkres shing skom pas gdungs pa dang // phyogs na gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag/ de yi gtor ma ji ltar 'thun par bya// de nas sngags
225a4(rgyud): pas bla med byang chub kyi// gan su slob ma yongasu smin bya ba// 'gro la pan phyir myur du byang chub par// de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du gzhug/ de rnams byin brlabs
225a5(rgyud): byang chub smon lam gdab/ zab cing rgya che ba yi chos bsgra gas la// srung bar byas nas brtul zhugs sdom gnas pa/ rang gi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya// dar
225a6(rgyud): la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas ni/ rdo rje 'dzin ma dpal gyi lag gnyis bya// me tog rin chen la sogs de/ rgyan la yon gyis lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya// sngags ni 'di rnams yin// 
225a7(rgyud): oM badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pra be sha hUM/ a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye hUM/ de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// 
225a8(rgyud): bdag la thugs brtsir dgongs nas ni// 'gro la phan phyir gtso chen gyis// sman par dgongs nas bzhi su gsol/ oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM pra tIts+tsha/ badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ me tog rin chen la sogs
225b1(rgyud): gang // khab par gyur pa'i rigs kyi lha// gtso ba'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas sngags pa mkhas pa yis// sngags 'dis dam tshig sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM
225b2(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hring ya me pra be sha dr-i T+Ta tiSh+Tha hUM/ de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyis dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub
225b3(rgyud): ni/  rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grug/ ci ste dam tshig 'das na ni// de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang // bdun brgyud rigs ni brlag par mdzad// de bas rtag tu bu khyod
225b4(rgyud): kyis// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'/ shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya// khyod kyis sro ga chags bsad mi bya/ ma byin par yang blang mi bya/ 
225b5(rgyud): brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams// dngos grub 'dod pas bya ma yin// chang 'di btung bar mi bya zhing // sha la sogs pa ba za' mi bya// sems can gnod par sbyor ba ni// nam
225b6(rgyud): kyang bya ba ma yin te// dkon mchog gsum na yongs mi spang // dus kun du ni byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang // lha dang bla ma de bzhin no// srog la sogs pa gang yin dang / 
225b7(rgyud): bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ lha la phul ba'i sring pa dang // de yi grib ma 'gom mi bya// phrag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin te// sngags dang lha la'ang slad mi bya// gdon gyi la sogs
225b8(rgyud): bya ma yin// mu stegs can la'ang smang mi bya// mdor na yid gnyis som gnyis the tshom ma bya ste/ bdag gi de cing dang ni sngags de bzhin no// mos pa bcan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas/ 
226a1(rgyud): sarba bi dus ji bzhin dbang bskur te// bum pa la sogs ji snyed mang thogs pas/ bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur// de nas lag tu dril dang rdo rje byin/ 
226a2(rgyud): 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la// mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo thob pa dang // sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya// sngags sgrub phyir ni mos ldan slob ma la// sngags pa
226a3(rgyud): bka' ni rab tu bsgomar bya// des kyang mos pas spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// tsi ste nor yong bla ma dbul bar bya// nor dang gter dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gser// gzhon dang khyim gdan bu pho bu mo
226a4(rgyud): rnams// skyes pa dag dang bud med yang na ni// grong dang grong khyer de bzhin ci bzhed rnams// rang gi sems ni rab tu dad pa yi sa// yon gyi mchog nyid dbul ba nyid du bya/ myur du
226a5(rgyud): 'grub phyir mos pas bla ma la/ mdor na rang gi lus kyang dbul bar bya// tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang // 'jig rten phyi ma 'i bde mchog dang // sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob
226a6(rgyud): 'gyur na// lha yi bde ba smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar mnyam// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas na ni// rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur bas// cung zad tsam yang brnyas mi bya// rdo rje spun dang
226a7(rgyud): sring mo dang // rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni// rnal 'byor can gyi brnyas ma yin// rtag tu khon gyi gcugs mi bya// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // bla ma snod byed ma rungs pa// dam chag
226a8(rgyud): las ni 'das pa dang // de la sogs pa'i gnod byed la// bzod pa bsgom par mi bya ste/ da ltar gyur na kun rig gis// gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sems can kun la pha
226b1(rgyud): pa dang / khartser ldan dngos grub thob par 'gyur// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang lha'i 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / ba
226b2(rgyud): ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsung so// ras la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de bzhin du bris la/ g.yasu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thad yongasu sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi
226b3(rgyud): rgyal po// g.yon phyogasu ni shAkya thub pa ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// shAkya thub pa'i 'og
226b4(rgyud): tu ni phyag na rdo rje de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi bla mdog sngon po phyag gcig na 'bras bu a ru ra bsnams// phyag gcig ni mtsho ga sbyin du bya/ rta 'grin dang / 'jig rten gsum
226b5(rgyud): las rna rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms pa la brtson bag nyis ni rang gi lha la rten par bri/ de gnyis kyi dbusu lo tsa nA dang / ma ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgron ma rnam
226b6(rgyud): rang rang gi mtshan ma phyag na bsnams par bri/ nga dag gi 'og tu pad+ma'i rdzing bu chu dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po dang / nya khar ba la sogs par bcas pa dang / 
226b7(rgyud): chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa du mas yongasu gang bar bri/ bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / bshos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa gri de'i 'og tu
226b8(rgyud): sgrub pa po nyid thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri/ de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs de mngon par mchod de/ bdag nyid kyis spyan dbye ba bya zhing bden pa la byin gyis brlabs
227a1(rgyud): par dmigs par bya'o// de nas ci ste mtshan ma zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro// 'on te ma mthong na ni ring mo zhig nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ band
227a2(rgyud): pa dang ni rnga sgra dang // dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dang // dge slong bram ze pho mo dang // 'bras bu mthong na myur du ni// mchog dang bar ma tha ma 'grub// de nas gzugs de gsang sngags dang // phyag
227a3(rgyud): rgya mngon par byin rlabs nas// ci bdog pas ni mchod par bya// rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis// bdag srung la sogs byas nas kyang // bdag gi
227a4(rgyud): de nyid bsams na su// dngos grub mtshan ma byung bar du/ 'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas// de nas dang na pa'i gnasu ni// brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya/ 
227a5(rgyud): sngags ni 'khrul pa med par bzlas// de nas bzlas pa 'i mjug tu ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la// ma chod pa rgya chen byas nas kyang // mtshan gcig thog/ 
227a6(rgyud): thag bzlas par bya// ci ste gtso 'am de yi sras// yang na lha rnams mthong gyur na// bsod nams snod la ci dga' bar/ dngos grub mchog ni gsol bar bya// lha ni dngos grub 'bras
227a7(rgyud): bu ni// de la rtag tu dgyes nas stsol// phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs blang // dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la// skal ba re re phul nas ni// de nas rtag tu bdag spyod cing // mdan/ 
227a8(rgyud): mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis/ blangs nas bdag nyid spyad par bya// sems can kun la phan brtson par// bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur// ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na// las rnams tha
227b1(rgyud): nus par 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar mda'i gdong la sogs// chad pas bcad cing bka' tsam gyis// zhi ba la sogs las kun ni// bram bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas lha rnams
227b2(rgyud): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams ji ltar
227b3(rgyud): na sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal spang ba'i slad du sgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ sems can dmyal
227b4(rgyud): ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa byed pa/ sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thabs skabs grol bar 'gyur
227b5(rgyud): ba nyon cig/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas mi// snga ma pa/ na du bum pa la// brgya rtsa brgyang du bzlas nas ni// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu brtag/ de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te/ 
227b6(rgyud): dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las// de ni myur du rnam par thar// srog las rnam grol bdag nyid de// dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi/ rigasu skyes par gyur nas kyang // de ni rtag tu sangs
227b7(rgyud): dang / chos 'gro ba ni thos par 'gyur// de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba 'am/ gur gum gyis ni ming yang rung // ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las// sems can rnams ni sgrol ba'i phyir/ sngasra
227b8(rgyud): mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing / stong rje can gyis dbang bsku ro// de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ sngags dang phyag rgya de dbang bskur// lha yi gzugasu brtags nas kyang // mchod rten dbus
228a1(rgyud): bzhag par bya/ rang gi lnga 'am lnga gzhan gyi// sring ze sring kar bris nas kyang / lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed dang / khyim gyi nang du banag par bya/ de yi ming yang smras nas
228a2(rgyud): ni 'gur gum bzang pos sngags bris la/ rim gyis 'bum ni chang tsam du// mchod rten las ni rab tu bya/ sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir/ bye ba srang ni tshang bar bya// de ltar byas nas nges
228a3(rgyud): par ni// dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur// yi dgas byol song sdug bsngal las// grol te lha yi gnasu skye// de nas ming yang brjod nas ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzla zhing // 
228a4(rgyud): 'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni// brgya phrag stong du chung / dngang // bye ba stong du rab bzlas na/ lha yi gnas nges par skye// de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang // mkhas pas 'bum pa
228a5(rgyud): brgya'am ni// yang na brgya phrag stong snang du// sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni// dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi/ sdig pa de la sa thar par 'gyur// ji srid mtshan ma shin tu ni/ 
228a6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i gnas na skyes gyur pa ra/ til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang // ra yi 'o mar ldan pa dang // dri yi bskus pa'i yam shing gis// cho ga bzhin du sprin bsregs bya// de nas don
228a7(rgyud): par yang // lha yi gnasu skyes gyur nas// de yi mtshan ma son par byed// yang na lha yi mchog tu 'gyur// yang na haM khung nang du ni// me yi lhas ni ston byed cing // lha yi gnasu skyes pa dang / 
228a8(rgyud): sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan mar ni/ dkar po nyid dang gas su 'bar// gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med/ zlum zhing rnam par mi 'phral// brtan la grol bzhon dri ma med// yang na me lha mod kyis ni/ 
228b1(rgyud): bdag nyid de bzhin ston byed de// zla ba dri med dkar 'dra la/ bzhin gdog dkar zhing lam mer 'bar// de ni mtshan ma 'di dag gis// dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing // sdig pa bcom nas bde
228b2(rgyud): 'gror ni// skyes pa yin par shes par bya// khru bzhi pa yi tshang du ni// cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la// rdo mtha' ma bskor ba yi// 'khor lo dbu su bri bar bya// rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams// ji bzhi/ 
228b3(rgyud): pa yi phyogasu bri// de bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 'jig rten gtso la sogs pa bri// bya dang bum pa gang ba dang // gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba dang // brgyad snying tsam du bzhag pa
228b4(rgyud): 'ams yang na bcu drug snying du bzhag/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i bshos// me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te// bla re rgyal mtshan da ra la sogs// gdugs mchog rnams kyis la/ 
228b5(rgyud): par rgyan// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam par ni// sbyin sregar btu bya ba ni/ cho ga shes pas bros nas kyang // lha rnams mang po spyan drangs la// sngags shes pas ni span phyag rgyas/ 
228b6(rgyud): arga phul bas shes nas kyang // mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni// lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la// ga phur gur gum la sogs pas// mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la// til dang yungs kar 'bras
228b7(rgyud): rnams dang // dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste// 'bras chan yos dpal du dang // sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan pa// brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la// yam shing la yang de bzhin te// rang gi sngags
228b8(rgyud): kyis btab pa'i shing // khung bu'i nang du bzhag par bya/ rol sngags kyis btab nas kyang / chu mchog gis ni bkrus nasu// bzlas pa'i dri yis byug par bya/ gos dang rgyan gyis
229a1(rgyud): klubs nas kyang // sngags kyis btab pa'i 'dug pas bdug me tog phreng la sogs pa mchod// gtsug phung dpung par de bzhin du// sngags bris nas ni gang ga
229a2(rgyud): par bya// snying ka lkog ma kha phyogasu/ sarba bid+yas byin gyis brlab// dpral ba mdzod spa rna ba gnyis// mgo bo gtsug pud dpung pa gnyis// sna dang rked pa dbus mo bo la// long bu sna yi
229a3(rgyud): rtse mo dang // mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi// dbang po rnams kyi gnas la ni// de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags// mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhago/ de nas ngan song sbyang ba'i phyir// stan
229a4(rgyud): dang bcas te thab dbus// banag pa nyid du bya ba yin/ nas sngags 'chang sngags kyis ni// btab pa'i gos kyis g.yos par bya// de nas byin za dge ba rab sbar la / 
229a5(rgyud): lce stong gis 'khrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus/ DU dkar dun ngayi ni la zhi ba'i lus/ mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyi me ga/ go la/ arga dbul bar brtags nas
229a6(rgyud): bzhin du// blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun du gzugs so Ta bzhag/ de bzhin gshegs tshogs de bzhin spyan drangs la// arga la sogs btag sa te de bzhin du// bde gshegs gsungs
229a7(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa la sogs bya// de nas byin za la ni brtag bya la// sreg byas bkang ste de yang sbar ba'i phyir// de nas sreg byas bkang ste rim gyis ni// rgyal la sogs la brgya rtsa brgyad du brtsa// 
229a8(rgyud): de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po la/ bsreg par bya ba nyi shu rtsa gcig brtag/ de nas spyan drangs yo byad lan gsum dang // arga la sogs pad+ma'i dkar zhal mchod// phyag na rdo rje pad+ma ma/ 
229b1(rgyud): bsnams pa'i// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs// zhabs kyi pad+mas sdig mnan cing // rgyan rnams kun ni rab rdzogs la// rdzogs sang+yas kyi dbu rgyan mtho/ bsams sa
229b2(rgyud): yang na bris kyang rung // de yi sring pos de bzhin du// brgya phrag stong ngam yang na ni// bye ba'i tshang du sbyin bsreg bya/ ci ste mtshan ma la sogs 'byung // de bzhin sdig can rgyud ces pa// de na
229b3(rgyud): thal bar gyur pa dang / rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni// cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar bya// thal ba de dang rus pa'i rdul/ sngags kyis btab pa'i dri chu dang // ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas/ 
229b4(rgyud): spong ba'i sngags kyis blo ldan gyis// 'bum du bzlas pas brdzes nas ni// ga pur dri dang sgos pa yis// 'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang // gzugasu bya ba 'am yang na mi/ 
229b5(rgyud): mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la// gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am lnga// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad bar du// swa Ta dang phyag rgyas btab nas// 'bum phrag gnyis kyi bar du
229b6(rgyud): bzlas// de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam// yang na gzun kyi zhal 'dzum 'am// dri dang bdug pa 'od kyang rung // snang ngam yang na ngang ldang ngam// lnga la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs pa na
229b7(rgyud): snang gar tam// rdzu 'phrul rnar 'phrul pa dang // me tog la so Ta 'dor ba dang // dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i sgra// gling bu pi wang la sogs rnams// ci ste mtshan ma 'di dag ni// sdig can blos ni
229b8(rgyud): ma mthong na// 'bum gyi phrag ni brgyang stong ngam// ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du// de bzhin gabye ba mchod nas ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya// de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang // 
230a1(rgyud): mngon gcig thog thag minyal bzlas// de nas de yi sdig pa ni// dag pa nyid du nges par mthong // lA yi lus kyi gzun gyur la/ rang gi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur// mtshan ma 'jis
230a2(rgyud): shes nas ni// rnar mi rtog sems kyis kyang // byams dang snying rjer ldan pa yis// las rnams thong byed par 'gyu// yang na med par gyur na yang // bzlas shing sgom pa'i tshul gyis ni// ming tsam
230a3(rgyud): legs par bris nas kyang // mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang // yang na gzugasu bris kyang rung // sbyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur na// gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye// thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs/ 
230a4(rgyud): rang gi ming smos sAT btab nas// bzlas pa byas te song nas kyang // rgya mtsho 'bab pa'i klung du dor// de ltar na ni sdig can yang // ngan song las ni thar 'gyur na// dge ba'i mchog ni bskyed pa dang / 
230a5(rgyud): byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag/ sang+yas 'bras bu'i rgyu ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par ldan/ tshul khrims rgyud dang / rab ldan pa// bzod pa brtson 'grus mnyam banag dang
230a6(rgyud): shes rab rnams kyis rgyu sgom pa'i// 'jig rten bsod nams ldan ci smos/ myur du de yi ngan song mi/ bcom par gyur te the tshom meng / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed la/ mang par lta ba gang yin dang / 
230a7(rgyud): byang chub lam las rnam log pas// bstan pa zhe sdang gnod byed cing // sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong la/ ma dang pha la snying ring zhing // byang chub sems la rten pa dang // 'dod chags bral ba bas
230a8(rgyud): pa'i rnams// ci ste lha rnams med gyur tam// sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs la soT/ shes rab thabs rnams med na ni// sdig can de dag mi thar zhes/ bde
230b1(rgyud): gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas brgya byin la sogs lha// pad+ma lta bu'i mig phye nas// legs shes bya bas mnyes byas te// rag tu mgu nas mchod byas nas// brgya byin gzhan la phan
230b2(rgyud): brtson pas// ji skad gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// shAkya'i gtso bos bka' stsal pa// bden pa nyid du byas gyur nas// de nas de ni dmyal ba yi/ sdug bsngal las ni thar nas kyang // dga' ldan
230b3(rgyud): gan su sen kun// phan phyir bde gshegs 'dra bar skyes// de nas dbang por bcas pa yi// grags chen lha rnams gar byed cing // mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas pas// de bzhin gshegs la mchod
230b4(rgyud): bya'i phyir// lha yi tshogs kyis mdun byas te/ tshe 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed nas/ lha rdza ngas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// me tog bdug pa byug pa dang / 
230b5(rgyud): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs// rgyan la sogs pa rab mdzes dang // na bza' rin chen char la sogs// dga' ba 'i tshal ni gang bar byas// de nas ya mtshan char gyur
230b6(rgyud): te Sha lha rnams kyis kyang phyag 'tshal nas/ dga' ba'i tshal ni yid 'ong ba// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yi// sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs
230b7(rgyud): po dag shes par gyis shig/ rdzu 'phrul rnar 'phrul pa 'di ni lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yin no// mtshams med pa'i dbang du gyur pa yang myong zhing mthong ba'i chos 'a
230b8(rgyud): nyid la bde 'gre'i dbang du gyur pa gang lags pa de ni bac+doMs ngo tshar lag so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lag so// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu tha~Md kyis mgrin gcig tu
231a1(rgyud): tshig 'di skad ces smra so// sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med// chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med// dge 'dun 'dra ba'i snod med// sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med// de nas
231a2(rgyud): lha'i bu de dag gis bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bac+doMldas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigasu skyes pa'i lha'i bu de ci 'dra ba zhig/ de'i rdzu 'phrul dang
231a3(rgyud): mthu ni ji lta bu lags pa lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de bdag cag lta bar 'tshalo// de nas bac+doMldas kyis lha thad kyi snying bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba nyid
231a4(rgyud): kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo gnyis las phyung // byung nas kyang nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i lus theng snang bar byas nas stong khar zhugs te bskul nas yang de nyid du mi snang
231a5(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de nyid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas lus kyi 'od zer gyis dpag tshad brgya phrag stong tshun chad kyi na mkha'i ngos thad gsal bar byas te// lha'i bu
231a6(rgyud): stong phrag du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas nas lha'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi snang bar byas te 'ongs nas dga' ba'i tshal thad gsal zhing snang bar byas te/ bac+doMs dang / brgya byin
231a7(rgyud): gnyis ma gtogs pa lha rnams kyi 'od zil gyis mnan to// de nas lha'i bu des bac+doMs kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kye ma shakya mgon po yi/ 
231a8(rgyud): sang+yas mdzad pa ya mtshan che// gang phyir ngan song ltung ba yi// sa ni myur du glog bzhin grol// de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi pad+mo thang rin po che les byas pa/ dag
231b1(rgyud): tshad brgya phrag stong du dri'i ngang ldang ba/ lha'i gla snyan pa'i sgra grag pa/ ya mtshan du ma yang dag par ston pa/ lha rdzas kyi glu dang / gar dang / brdung ba dang / gling bu dang / rnga dang / ka ra ko rnams kyi sgra snyan pa
231b2(rgyud): 'byin pa zhig bac+doMs kyi spyan sngar byung ste/ de mthong nas kyang shin tu ya mtshan skyes te 'di skad ces smraso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni bsam mi khyab// sngags kyi yon tan sna tshogs bas
231b3(rgyud): mo khyab// byang chub rten pa rnams kyang bsam mi khyab/ tshangs spyod tshul khrims dri med skye bas ma yas// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis blta bar 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces
231b4(rgyud): gsol to// lha'i bu de dang de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams blta bar 'tshalo// bac+doMs blta bar 'tshalo// bde bar gshegs pa blta bar 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang
231b5(rgyud): mthe bo gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer dri ma med pa de sa lha'i bu de dang lha'i 'khor de dag kun snang bar byas te bskul nas nga nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas nor bu dri ma
231b6(rgyud): med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi bac+doMs dang / brgya byin gnyis kyi gdan ma gtogs par dga' ba'i tshal thad g.yos par byas te/ lan brgya
231b7(rgyud): stong du mar bskor ba byas nas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sang+yas rnams kyi ni// sngags kyi byin brlabs ya mtshan che// gang phyir mtshams med lhung ba yi// sems can lha gnas myur
231b8(rgyud): du skyes// de nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bac+doMs la nor bu dang // gser dang // dngul dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / gdu bu dang / dpung
232a1(rgyud): rgyan dang / sran cha la sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / lda lnga dang / snga ma la sogs pa yo byad
232a2(rgyud): khrang par sna tshogs pa dang / seng ge'i gdan dang // gzim cha dang / pho brang dang // gzhal med khang dang / khang bu brtsegs pa la sogs pa gnas kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / me tog dang spos
232a3(rgyud): sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / rang gi lus dang ngag dang / sems rnams kyang phul te/ ba lang dang / rta dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spre'u dang / rko ba dang / thug re dang / ma
232a4(rgyud): dang / khong bu dang / rnga mo dang / chu srin dang / phag dang / ra dang / glang dang / kha dang / 'dod pa'i ba bzhon la sogs pa bzhon pa'i khyad par du ma yang phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'kho
232a5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod lha rnams// kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod de/ leg so zhes bya ba bsol
232a6(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis la bla ma dang / sti stang du byas te phyag 'tshal nas de bzhin du song ngo // de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams mchog tu
232a7(rgyud): ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du leg so zhes bya bas bstod cing mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du ma 'ongs pa'i byis
232a8(rgyud): pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'chang ba dang klog pa la spro bar bgyi ba'i slang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i yon tan bshad du gsol brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i
232b1(rgyud): lha'i bu rnams ngas bshad kyis/ legs par nyon la yid la bzung shig/ lha'i bu rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du thos par gyur gyi/ sems can ma
232b2(rgyud): rabs rnams kyi ni ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can phal pa ma rabs kyi ni ma yin no// sems can
232b3(rgyud): bsam pa nges pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan mang po mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la
232b4(rgyud): brten pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag yang dag par dga' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces
232b5(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa'o// bde bor gshegs pa bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa ste/ gang gi slad du bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
232b6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mtshan brjod pa 'di bcom ldan 'das pad+mo'i zhal nyid nas thos pas bdag
232b7(rgyud): cag ni ngan song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ dus ma lags par 'chi bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnar 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pas 'jigs
232b8(rgyud): par mi 'gyur te/ bac+doMs bdag cag ni gdon mi 'tshal ba sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i snod du gyur pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dis son rnams kyi don bgyid pa
233a1(rgyud): gang lags pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni cir 'gyur/ rnam par smin pa ni cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po de dag ni smras
233a2(rgyud): bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du lta bar bya ste/ lha'i dbang po gang gi phyir 'dzag rten pha rol tu phyin nas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sa
233a3(rgyud): dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu spong bar byed pa dang / byang chub la gdon mi za bar sten par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa
233a4(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phyir te/ lha'i dbang po dper na khyed kyi lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba mtshams ma dpa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i
233a5(rgyud): don byas pa bzhin no// lha'i dbang po de ltar gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i sems can ded gci so so'i skye bo yin snyam sems sam/ gsol
233a6(rgyud): pa bac+doMs ma lag so// bde bar gshegs pa ma lag so// lha'i dbang po sems can de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po/ gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba/ 
233a7(rgyud): mchod pa/ brjed pa/ sti stang du bya ba 'phrag la bskur bar bya ba yin na/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / 
233a8(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / gnod sprin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po nor bu bzla po dang / nor bu bzang po chen po la sogs pa byang chub sems
233b1(rgyud): dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgyas bskor ba rnams dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po pany+tsa ka dang / pIny+tsa
233b2(rgyud): ka chen po la sogs pa dang / gang gzhan dag kyang rgya che zhing rgya che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
233b3(rgyud): po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / rims dang / gnod dang / dug dang / skar ma la sogs pa tha~Md kyis 'grin cig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
233b4(rgyud): 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa che na be de'i rkang pa gnyis mgo bos blang bar bgyi'o// mdor na rtag/ ba rgyun tu dus thams cad du srung ba dang / bskyab
233b5(rgyud): pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang du brtag pa 'i rgyal po 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pas 'changam/ klog gam gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par
233b6(rgyud): 'chad par 'gyur ram/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan la sogs pas mchod par 'gyur ram// rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ 
233b7(rgyud): gzhan yang rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu 'am/ rgyal po'i bu mo 'am/ rgyal po'i brdzun mo 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor po 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor mo 'am/ gang su yang rung bas 'chang zhing klog
233b8(rgyud): pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad cing ston pa'i bar du bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad de'i bran du gyur pa lag so// rang gi skye bo dang
234a1(rgyud): gnyen gyi skye bo dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal ban po brang 'khor rnams yongasu brkyang bar bgyi// dus du su ra dbab par badz+ra/ 
234a2(rgyud): 'bru la sogs pa bskyed par bgyi/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du sgrub par bgyi/ pha rol gyi phru ma mang po gzhom par bgyi/ sems can ma rungs pa gnod cing 'tshe ba pos de la
234a3(rgyud): oM phan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag brlag par bgyi ba'i slad du sgrub par bgyi// ma rungs par bgyi/ de la bdud kyi las kyang bgyi/ gnod par bgyi ba la yang nye bar gnas par bgyi
234a4(rgyud): ste/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can/ mas la brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lta dbur gnas pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das
234a5(rgyud): bdag cag gis bu bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis ji ltar smras pa de de bzhin te/ brtag pa'i rgyal po de ni de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// lha'i dbang po la
234a6(rgyud): kyisar 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos la kun tu spyod pa/ sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i dong du bying ba'i sems can rnams
234a7(rgyud): la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por bag yod par byos la bsgrubs shig/ bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
234a8(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma 'di bshad// dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni// dgyes shing rdo gsor nas kyang // shAkya'i dbang
234b1(rgyud): bo dgyes mdzad pa/ thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ngan song thams cad las rnam par
234b2(rgyud): sbyong ba zhes bya ba rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung // oM sar+b+ba pA po da ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba bAM pa bi sho d+ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba karmA a bA rA Na ni b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM ts+tsha
234b3(rgyud): bo nA sha ya A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM b+haM bi sho d+ha ya A ba rA NA ni hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ ha na ha na/ sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM sruM sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra/ a ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM hUM
234b4(rgyud): ha ra sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM hUM phaT sar+b+ba A ba ra tA nis+t+wa~M Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM b+hU ta b+h+r-i ta/ sar+b+ba a ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM trAHtA/ sar+b+be A ba ra NA ni tsU tAM/ oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da sarba a bar
234b5(rgyud): tA ni hUM phaT/ oM bi dra ba bi dra ba sar+b+ba A pA ya tat+tar+N+Na ni nAM phaT/ oM da ha da ha sar+b+bA na ra ka ga ti he hUM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsas r+tha pre ta ga ti he hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sar+b+ba
234b6(rgyud): tir+ya ga ga ti he trAM hUM phaT/ de nas de dag rnams kyi yo byad ba shad// oM sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha na d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hU pa ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba durba ti bi sho d+ha na puSh+pa bi la kaM ni hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba A bar
234b7(rgyud): Na bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na a lo ka ka ri hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha sha na gan d+ha ba ti hUM phaT/ sgo ba rnams kyi sngags la/ oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ga ti uT+Ta ni hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ban+d+ha ni
234b8(rgyud): bi mo tsa na hUM ba~M phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya b+han d+ha na mo tsa na hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ga ti ga ha na bi nA sha ni hUM ho phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad // 'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor
235a1(rgyud): la/ shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan// nang gi rim pa bris nas ni// lte ba'i nang du shAkya yi/ bdag po thub pa bzhag par bya// la/ 
235a2(rgyud): na rdo rje stobs chen ni// dpa'o de yi spyan mngar bri// rgyab tu 'khor los bsgyur ba bri// g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug tor la// g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri// gzi brjid phung po mo'i phyeg/ 
235a3(rgyud): dbang po'i phyogasu gdugs dkar po// rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs// rnam par 'joms pa nai ri t+ya ra// bris nas phyi rol br-i bya ste/ gru bzhi pa la sgo ban pa/ sang ga rta babs rgyan par bya/ 
235a4(rgyud): bos lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu sman rnams bzhag/ grwa yi phyogs ni thad du// bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya// de na sa dri zhim dri la sogs// rang gi lus ni bskus nas

235a6(rgyud): mos pa skyed de mchod pa byas nas// de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thad las rnam par grol te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang / gong nas gong du sa rnamasu yang skye bar 'gyur// 
235a7(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyasu yang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyuraro/ 
235a8(rgyud): bya ba byas pas ni rims nad thams cad dang / gdon dang / dug la sogs pa las thar bar 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje'i hUM zhes bya bas las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// brtag pa gzhan gyi chog
235b1(rgyud): thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyuraro// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyud kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi shi ba'i ro 'am gzugs brnyan nam/ ming la sogs pa bris
235b2(rgyud): te bzlas pa dang / spyan sregs dang / dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongasu grol bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sang ga'i lha stangs kyis bac+doMs
235b3(rgyud): kyi zhal du bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya dam pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o// thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs gsang ba'i// rgyal ba kun
235b4(rgyud): gyi byin gyis rlobs// mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar/ ni// phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar// sangs rgyas bde gshegs skyes rnams kyi/ phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad// rnal
235b5(rgyud): 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogasu// thal mo snyim par smra bani// rtag tu pad+ma'i rigs nyid kyi/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang // snying kar gung mo'i
235b6(rgyud): mtha' sbyar ba// rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di// dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo gan rkyal du dbang du bzhag la// de yi steng du g.yas pa bzhag ste/ mthe
235b7(rgyud): bo'i ngos gnyis sprad la zhi ba'i lta bas lta ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste// dam tshig yin par bshad do// de nyid las bzlog ste lha 'og bsnol
235b8(rgyud): la mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lugu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te spong kar bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// thal mo rdzogs par sbyang ba
236a1(rgyud): las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsdams la lhag ma rnams rkyang ba 'dzi na pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsnams pa bsdams pa las/ gung mo gnyis
236a2(rgyud): / rdo rje 'dra bar bsnams la/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis dang srin
236a3(rgyud): lag pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// mtha'u
236a4(rgyud): tung dang mthe bos so sor bsdams la/ lhag ma rnams pa rkyang ba ni sdig pa thang sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du sbyar zhing bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi phyag
236a5(rgyud): 'o stong pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug pa'iphyag rgya'o// de las 'og nas gyen du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o//  ny-id las mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsdams
236a6(rgyud): la mdun du 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo gnyis
236a7(rgyud): nang du bcug pa ni arga'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bstan te/ tshigs dang po bcag la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni nar 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bo/ 
236a8(rgyud): rang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnar 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba'i gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs kar po
236b1(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te/ mdung la gyen du bskor ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis
236b2(rgyud): rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te/ lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la/ sor
236b3(rgyud): mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o// g.yas pa mchog skyon du byas la g.yon pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no// rdo rje bsdams
236b4(rgyud): pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o// de nyid las me tog 'dra bar byas
236b5(rgyud): pa ni 'di'i 'o// de nyid las slar bkug ste/ mthe'o gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o// de nyid las tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i 'o// de nyid las
236b6(rgyud): sor mo las 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyed pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o// de nyid las spyi bor bzhag pa dpal gyi'o// de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa bzhad pa'i 'o// de nyid las pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa
236b7(rgyud): ni pad+ma'i 'o// de bzhin nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'o// de nyid las gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i'o// de nyid las pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o// 
236b8(rgyud): de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam bkyed pa ni rgya gra mo// de nyid las shin tu bskyed pa ni srung ba'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o// dam du bkug pa ni bsdam/ 
237a1(rgyud): pa'i 'o// bsdams pa nyid mdun du bkug pa ni bdug pa'i 'o// de nyid gyen du bstod pa ni phreng ba'i 'o// mdun du mthe'o gnyis bsdams te bskor ba ni mar me'i 'o// de nyid
237a2(rgyud): byug pa ltar byas pa ni 'dri'i 'o// de nyid las mdzub me gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o// de nyid las gcig la gcig mdud pa ni/ 
237a3(rgyud): lcags sgrog gi'o// de nyid las bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i 'o// sku gzugs kyi cho ga yang 'dir de bzhin du byas te/ cung zad du na bac+doMs 'jig rten gsum las rnar rgyal ba'i gzugs dri'o// 
237a4(rgyud): yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum tsam zhig sngar spen pa byas nas las thang bya'o// de nas cha
237a5(rgyud): pa la sogs pa lnga'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'angs phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'angs las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu
237a6(rgyud): nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi
237a7(rgyud): brlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ris 'di nyid na mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ngan du/ 
237a8(rgyud): gtogs pa'i rgyal po lus mi bde ba zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ des mi shes pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas rgyal po 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi pha 'tsho ba/ 
237b1(rgyud): dang bral bar gyur pa dang / ma de'i mya ngan gyis gzir bas ma yang dus las 'daso// lan cig ci zhig gi rkyen kyis nags tshal smug po gzhan zhig du rtse zhing dga' ba'i phyir nye bar song
237b2(rgyud): ngo // de ni drang srong dgos pa med par byams pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de mthong ba dang rgyal po shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ kye ma 'di lta bu seng ge dang / stag dang / ri dgas dang / 
237b3(rgyud): dang / phag rgod dang / ba lang dang / ma he la sogs pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrul gdug pa can rnams kyis gtse ba/ bza' ba dang / btung ba
237b4(rgyud): dang / mgo ba dang / longs spyod rnams dang rnam par bral ga/ rlung dang grang bas yongasu gdung zhing 'tshe ba de na bdag nyid chen po 'di gan so snyam par sems kyi brtags
237b5(rgyud): nas de'i drung du nye bar song ste phyin pa dang / de la 'di skad ces smra so// drang srong chen po khyod ci'i phyir na rlung dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bdag la gnod par
237b6(rgyud): byed/ drang srong gi smras pa/ skyes bu chen po bskal pa brgya stong phrag du mar sgrib pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las/ sdug bsnga la gyi khur bu cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bla na med
237b7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzob par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas 'di ni sdug bsngal ma yin gyi/ skad cag tsam mam/ yud tsam zhig yul gyi bde ba rje su myong bas
237b8(rgyud): bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma mtha' thug pa med pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rdzasu myong bar 'gyuraro// yul gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir pha ma la sogs pa yang gsod par
238a1(rgyud): 'gyur na srog chags gzhan lta ci smos te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun yongasu mi shes pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad byed par 'gyu ro// drang srong gis
238a2(rgyud): smras pa'i tshig de skad ces thos pa dang shin tu 'jigs skrag skyo ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir nas 'di skad ces smraso// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ci
238a3(rgyud): zhig/ de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa dka' thub chen po smros shig dang / de la kho bo yang skyabasu 'chi'o// pha ma la gtses pa dang / srog chags rnams kyi srog bcang na sdig pa ji lta bu zhig
238a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig/ de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa yongasu shes na bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig yongasu 'thog phab ma bsad pa dang / 
238a5(rgyud): srog chags rnams kyang ma bsad na bsod nams ci 'dra ba cig 'thob/ 'bras bu ji lta bu zhig 'thob/ 'dod pa'i lo ngas spyod spangs na bsod nams dang 'bras bu ci
238a6(rgyud): 'dra ba zhig 'thob/ de nas drang srong des de la 'di skad ce sa smra so// ci ste sems can chen po khyod/ nga yi tshig 'di nyan 'dod na// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal la// gus par nyon dang
238a7(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// de bzhin bgyi zhes bsgrubs nas ni// ci mdog pas ni mchod byas te/ sangs rgyas spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi/ zab mo'i chos ni nyon par gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs
238a8(rgyud): ngag la// thos nas kyang ni skyabasu song // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib med chos// rgyal pos thos nas dga' bar 'gyur// yi dgas byol song dmyal ba rnams// sdig pa kun gyi 'bras bu/ 
238b1(rgyud): ste// yul spyod pa dang srog chags rnams// bsod cing shin tu mi zad dang // pha ma gtses pa'i rgyu las byung // bskal pa du mar rab sdug bsngal// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzang ba/ 
238b2(rgyud): mgon med skyabs kyang med pa ste// thos nas mya ngan zug rngu yis// rang gi yid la gdung ba ni// ji ltar rlung gis mar me bzhin// de nyid du ni dus las 'das// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni/ 
238b3(rgyud): dga' dang ldan pa'i lhar skyes na/ brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi// blon po gzugs dang ldan pa la// lha rnams kun dang yid 'thun zhing // rab dga' bde dang ldan par skyes// bde ba'i mchog
238b4(rgyud): ni myong gyur nas// ngan song du yang ltung bar 'gyur// de/ nas da ltar lha dbang po// khyod kyi mthus kyang de nyid ni// ngag 'a ldan gnas ni dga' ba'i mchog/ bde ma
238b5(rgyud): kun gyis gnasu skyes// lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang // gang gi tshe 'byung ba de'i dus na byung ba'i drang srong du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyed kyis shes par mi bya'o// 
238b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid do// phar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin pa khyod kyis
238b7(rgyud): shes par mi bya ste/ lha'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i phar gyur to// ma gang yin pa de bzhin yin par mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sha tsi ka nyid yin no// 'khor gyi
238b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par mi lta'i/ lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no// / de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab tu
239a1(rgyud): mgu zhing rangs te/ ba spu'i bu gnas spu rnams langs shing rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes skang chen por bos nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la ming bcu pa 'dis
239a2(rgyud): mngon par bstod de gsol ba btab po/ ko Ta ki Ta k+Sha/ ko TAHke nAHko TA ba sh+tsa ka TI ra ka/ ko la k+Sha ko la baHko la ko lA bash+tsa/ ko lasta tha i ti zhes byas nas/ brgya byin la sogs lha mchog
239a3(rgyud): rnams// sems can kun la phan pa dang / tshe dang nad med spel ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs/ bcom ldan 'das tshe thung ba dang // skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang / phan pa
239a4(rgyud): dang / bde ba dang / tshe sring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag po bshadu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha
239a5(rgyud): 'khor mang po de dag la gzigs nas legaso zhes bya ba las mgu bar byas te/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag par bskyed
239a6(rgyud): pa de ni lag so// legaso legs par sgrub shing bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sems can thaMd kyi tshe dpag tu med pas khyab pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
239a7(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med par 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas
239a8(rgyud): phyung ngo // oM pu N+ya ma hA bu t+ya/ a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi ti ka ri ni swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu ngan song
239b1(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas rnamasu skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis yang dag par she so// 'jig rten gyi khams cad
239b2(rgyud): rab tu snang bar byas te/ snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs
239b3(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa
239b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bshad do// oM a mi te/ a mi ta ud b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha ba/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi gran+ta/ gA mi naM/ sar+b+ba karma kle shak+Sha yaM ka re swA hA/ de nas 'di bshadang ma thag
239b5(rgyud): tu de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi 'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
239b6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzung 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung // oM kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ tra sa
239b7(rgyud): no d+ha sa naM/ pra ti ha na pra ti ham/ sar+b+ba kasma pa ra ba ra NI me sar+b+ba satwA nany+dza swAhA// 'di bshang ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrib pa
239b8(rgyud): thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams ma lus par 'joms pa zhes
240a1(rgyud): bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyungango // oM rat+ne rat+ne/ ma hA rat+ne/ rat+na saM b+ha be/ rat+na ki ra Ne/ rat+na mA lA bi shud+d+he shed+d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba pA pa ni hUM phaT/ 
240a2(rgyud): de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom/ rnam par bcom par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
240a3(rgyud): 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM a me g+ha a pra ti ha \u0f7f/ sar+b+ba a
240a4(rgyud): pa ra Na/ bi sho d+ha ni/ ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khas thams cad g.yos// rab tu g.yos// yang dag par rab tu g.yo so// bskyod rab tu bskyod/ 
240a5(rgyud): yang dag par rab tu bskyod do// bskul/ rab tu bskul/ 5 nga dag par rab tu bskul nas rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to// de nas dkyil 'khor ni
240a6(rgyud): 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ sgo ba rnams dang lnga na pa ste// rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya// lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan// de yi dbusu 'khor le yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya
240a7(rgyud): sde rtsibs bzhi dag dang ldan pa la// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// de yi dbusu gtso bo ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po// phyag na rdo rje dril bsnams shing // zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal 'dzum
240a8(rgyud): bri// shar gyi rtsibs kyi stang du ni// mgon po mi bskyong bri bar bya// lho yi phyogasu rin chen bri// nub phyogs chu skyes pad+ma la/ byang phyogasu ni gdon mi za// dpa' bo stobs chen bri bar bya// 
240b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// 'khor los bsgyur ba chas pa dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang // phyag ni mchog sbyor mi 'jigs pa// rdo rje'i
240b2(rgyud): skyil mo krung gzugs bri// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// de bzhin bdug sogs thams cad bri// sgo ba dag kyang khros pa la// khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa bri// de nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs// snga
240b3(rgyud): kyai lha rnams spyan drangs te// dzaHhU~M ba ho// b+ha ga baM badz+ra ai h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+waM// de nas gtso bo byon pa dang // mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang // 'tsho bdag sbal gyis 'jigs ldan rnams// 
240b4(rgyud): bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ rje ti rin ti ri bcings la// lag na rin chen thegs te gzhug/ yang na me tog phreng ba ste/ de ni dkyil 'khor zhing
240b5(rgyud): du dor// oM pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hUM/ de nas mna'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol ba ra bya ste/ oM badz+ra hA s+ya ud g+ha Ta ya hUM/ de nas 'dra
240b6(rgyud): bstan par bya ste/ oM badz+ra dr-i sh+ye ho// de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra a bi biny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a bi Shiny+tsa au/ oM rat+na a bi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa
240b7(rgyud): a/ de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa aM/ oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tre/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM karma
240b8(rgyud): ka la sha a b+hi Shany+tsa aHde nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM rat+na mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa dz+ra tr-i twai traM traM/ oM badz+ra pan+d+ha a ba laM ba na a b+hi Shany+tsa dzA/ aM badz+ra mu tra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha mu
241a1(rgyud): d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa aM oM rat+na mu trA a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM pad+ma mu tra a b+hi Shiny+tsahrIH/ oM karma mu d+ha a bi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM badz+ra na ma a bi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM hUM truM hrIMH/ aHoM badz+ra kar+m+ma
241a2(rgyud): a bi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ oM badz+ra tsakra a b+hi Shony+tsa hUM b+h+rUM/ oM badz+ra tsakra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hUM hUM/ oM oM ai/ tr-i t+sa twe/ hrI hrIHhrIHaHaHaHoM badz+ra d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ta thA ga ta
241a3(rgyud): d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa au/ aM rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsi tAM/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM kar+m+ma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHoM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gu N+ye a b+hi Shiny+dza au/ oM badz+ra gu h+yaM a bi Shiny+tsa hUM/ 
241a4(rgyud): rat+na gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~MH/ oM pad+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM kar+m+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ oM pra dz+nyA pa ya sa ma yo ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe srid pa'i rig pa
241a5(rgyud): sbyin par bya'o// oM b+h+rUM badz+ra A yuShe hUM aHde'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i tshe zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams ca
241a6(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa las bdud rtsi mdzag pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo brkyang la/ gdeng gyen du bcom ldan 'das
241a7(rgyud): la blta bar bros la mchod pa rnam pa lnga mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen po byas te ba dmar ser gyi mar snod sar bar bcug la
241a8(rgyud): rdo rje g.yon pas mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems shing mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas dri ma maram zhing mngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngang ldang la rlangs pa 'am// du ba
241b1(rgyud): 'am/ me byung ngam/ 'od zer ma me sgron nam/ 'ong byung ngam/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de 'am/ mar sar ram/ til mar ram/ chu 'am/ 'o ma 'am/ zho 'am/ chang ngam/ khrag
241b2(rgyud): gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa 'am/ sha 'am/ gang yang rung ba la rab tu smras te/ nang par sngar srung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te thungs sam zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin
241b3(rgyud): du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma dang yod kyi bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ tha mas ni tha ma 'grub pas 'di la the tshom ni mdo// mtshan ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad
241b4(rgyud): med/ ldo ba skyen/ lus la swa kar dang gnyer ma med par 'gyu ro// lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyu ro// gan na yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / 
241b5(rgyud): dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'gyur te the tshom med do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bac+doMs phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
241b6(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/ rjes kyi dka' stsal du gsol je 'dzin
241b7(rgyud): yul du gsol/ rgyal po chen po rnams legs kyi shong shig dang / ngas kyang rje su yi rang zhing byin gyis rlab par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das
241b8(rgyud): kyi gnang zhing rje su yi rang ste/ byin gyis brlabs pas rang gi snying po 'di bshad // oM bai/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM D+hi de nas
242a1(rgyud): grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes pos kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad/ oM gi nas klu'i rgyal po mog mi bzang gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad de/ oM k+Sha
242a2(rgyud): de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dkyil 'khor lngas ni rgyan pa ste// de yi dbusu gtso bo ni// phyag na rdo rje bgying bcas bri// de yi g.yon gyi phyogasu ni/ 
242a3(rgyud): rnam thos bu dge'i lag pa na// be con ne'u la thogs pa dang // rin chen rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang // sgom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// gser mdog gzi can ldan par bri// mkhas pas
242a4(rgyud): bum bzang la sogs// rin chen chu bo 'bar ba ra bri// mdun du yul 'khor srung nyid ni// pi wang len pa brtson pa dang // mdzes shing kha dog ljang ku ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis
242a5(rgyud): brgyan par bri// g.yas phyogs dpa' bo lus 'phags po// ral gri lag na thogs pa bri// nub phyogasu ni mi ga mi bzang // rdo rje zhag pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sbrul mgo bdu
242a6(rgyud): / gyi bskor ba la// mig kyang dmar zhing shin tu 'bar// sgo yi phyogs ni thad du// sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya bas// sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs na
242a7(rgyud): kyang // bcom ldan 'das ni spyan drangs te// de nas rgyal po spyan drang // spyan drang nas ni mkhas pas mchod// cho ga bzhin du arga dbul// de nas spaT mkhan sngags 'di dang // rdo 'dzin pa
242a8(rgyud): phyag rgya 'dis// slob ma rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // bram ze la sogs de bzhin te// me tog rin chen thogs te zhugs// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis
242b1(rgyud): dor bar bya'o// oM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha tAM ma ho ta ta ma// gang la bab pa'i rgyal po no// de ni 'dis 'grub gzhan du med// de nas gra la bzhag pa yi// bum pa bzhis ni dbang bskur te// dang pe phyag na
242b2(rgyud): rdo rje yi// phyag rgyas dbang ni bskur bar bya// de la sogs pa go rims kyis// dkyil 'khor nying du dbang bskur na/ rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur// rgyal po yin na che bar 'gyur// 'jam
242b3(rgyud): bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan// glang bzhi pa la dbang ba'i mchog/ lan bzhi dbang ni bskur ba dang // lan bzhir gzhug par byas nas ni// de la rdo 'dzin rgyal bdag/ bu sdug bzhin du bskyang
242b4(rgyud): ba dang // bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bran pa nga g.yog tu bcas pa dang // pho brang dang ni 'khor bcas pas/ rgyal po rtag tu bskyang bar bgyi// de gnang gzhan gyi phru ma da
242b5(rgyud): de yi nang dang 'chi bdag gi// 'jigs dang mu ga la sogs pa'i// gnod pa rnams ni gzhom par bgyi// rnam tho sa bus ni rgyas par bgyi// yul 'khor srung gi zhi bar bgyi/ 
242b6(rgyud): phyug dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i// 'chi bdag lus 'phags po yos 'joms// mig mi bzang gis bkra shis shing // mu ge la sogs rnar 'joms// mdor na bdag gis de yi no// ra dang
242b7(rgyud): bsam pa kun bgyi ste// dza ste nges pa ma lags na// phyag na rdo rje la 'khus 'gyur// de nas phyogs skyong ba rnams kyi bac+doMs la phyag tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
242b8(rgyud): 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can thad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams
243a1(rgyud): leg so legs// legs kyi phul cig/ de nas 'byung po rnams kyi bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM a~M/ a~M oM/ oM a/ a~M ya
243a2(rgyud): oM ri/ oM ba/ oM ya/ oM ku/ a~M a/ oM pra/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// mgon po dbu su de bzhin bzhag/ phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnasu/ 
243a3(rgyud): bzhag bya spyan sngar nyi ma dang // phag gi gzugs dang gnyis bzhag ste// sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhinano// de nas spyan drangs de kun la// mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya// de nas bdag nyid zhugs
243a4(rgyud): nas kyang // slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing // phyogs skyong rang gi sngags btab pa'i// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bsku ro// de nas phan par 'dod pa yis// bsgrub phyir snying
243a5(rgyud): po sbyin par bya// phyogs skyongs rang gi phyogs gnas rnam sa// brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag meg/ nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
243a6(rgyud): gang rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing // rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te/ dbang bskur ba thob pa 'am// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag/ 
243a7(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par dus thad du srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi phru ma kun gzhom par bgyi// dus dusu char pa dbab par bgyi/ 'bru dang / me
243a8(rgyud): tog dang / 'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o// de nas chos kyi rgyal po chen po gshin rjes bac+doMs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gri
243b1(rgyud): kyang rgyal po chen po de'i tshe srid par bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'chi ba brgyad po so so dgag par bgyi'o// srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po ni r-i tis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// 
243b2(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / mi 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad dang / yi dgas dang / 'dres mi 'jigs par bgyi/ 
243b3(rgyud): srin po la sogs pas 'jigs par mi bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis 'jigs par mi bgyi ste/ dus thams cad du srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// // de nas
243b4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru nas kyang 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rtag par dus tha radu du rgyal po de dang / yul thams cad so sor bskya
243b5(rgyud): par bgyi/ kun tu srung bar bgyi// 'bru rnams bskyed par bgyi/ klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi/ thog dang ser ba rnams mi dbab par bgyi/ dus ma yin par
243b6(rgyud): ba rnams so sor dgag par bgyi'o// de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang san chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi
243b7(rgyud): 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad bskyed par bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o// de
243b8(rgyud): nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ku be ras bac+doMs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad
244a1(rgyud): dang lhan cig du mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi/ nor dang / 'bru rnams
244a2(rgyud): thade legs par 'byor par bgyi/ rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / snag gnyen dang / rus kyi gnyen dang / grogs dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung
244a3(rgyud): ma la sogs pa srung bar bgyi/ glang dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / lug dang / ma ha dang / ba glang dang / rta dang / ra la sogs pa la yang srung bar bgyi'o// de nas 'byung ba tha~Md kyi bdag
244a4(rgyud): po dbang byed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la bya ga 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po de dang / rgyal po de dag gi bu dang / rgyal rigs
244a5(rgyud): dang / bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu bskyab pa dang / phan gdags pa dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / 
244a6(rgyud): dug bzhil ba dang / dug gzhom pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa'i 'og gi mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs kyi ma tshams bcad pa dang / rdo rje rabs bskor ba dang / rdo phur bus
244a7(rgyud): gdab pa dang / rdo rje dra ba rnams bre bar bgyi/ dgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi/ dgos pa dang / dgos pa ma lags pa rnams kyi mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi/ dge ba dang / 
244a8(rgyud): mi dge ba thaMd rmi lam du yang bsgo bar bgyi/ sgrub pa yang bgegs ma mchis par bgyi/ dngos grub thams stsal par bgyi'o// de nas yang na mkha' lding gi bdag po na mkha' la
244b1(rgyud): spyod pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / 
244b2(rgyud): rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag nyid 'khor tha~Mng dang bcas par mchis la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi/ mchog
244b3(rgyud): thams cad rab tu bstabs par bgyi/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba bgyi/ dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// de nas sa reg gi bdag po bag chen pos bcom ldan 'das
244b4(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang mi'i bdag po de dang / mi/ 'i bdag po'i bu dang / yang na lan gnyi su byung ba 'am/ la
244b5(rgyud): ga su byung ba'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / 'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyis dus thams cad don
244b6(rgyud): thams cad grub par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa thams cad las dus thaMd yang srung bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid kyang yongasu bskyab par bgyi'o// de nas bza' chen po brgyad dang / 'khor rgyu skar
244b7(rgyud): du bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi sngags kyi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal

245a1(rgyud): po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// oM a/ oM se oM ya/ oM bu/ oM br-i/ moM shu yaMs/ oM ra/ de nas de dag gi
245a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dbusu ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rna rgyal ba'i gzugasu bri'o// ngos rnamasu phyag rgya chen po bzhi bri'o// pa ba sangs ni
245a3(rgyud): mdun du la// zla ba rgyab du bri bar bya// g.ya su phur bu bri bya zhing // g.yon par gza' lhag bri bar bya// me yi phyogasu mig dmar dang // rlung gi phyogasu nyi ma ste// dbang ldan phyogasu spen

245a5(rgyud): mas zhugs nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ thams cad kyang ni spyan drang ngo // de nas slob ma rnams zhugs te/ oM badz+ra ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gra ha sa ma ya
245a6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gra ha pra tits+tsha sa ma ya hUM/ de nas gza' brgyad sngags btab pa'i// bum pa brgyad kyis dbang bskuro// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te// gza' rnams
245a7(rgyud): thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gza' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad
245a8(rgyud): kyis kyang rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la gtogs par dus thams cad du de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o// de nas rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang / 
245b1(rgyud): dus dang / zla tshogs dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / chu tshod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom/

245b4(rgyud): 'jig pa mi 'byung ngo // de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud tsas bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das de gnyis par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag

245b8(rgyud): ka nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang // pad+ma chu lha de bzhin du// mdor na mngab ma re re la// de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri// sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yis// mgul nas 'khyung dang bcas
246a1(rgyud): pa bri// bum pa brgyang dang gtor ma dang // bshos mdzes pa dang 'byung po yi/ mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ byas pa rnams ni bzhag par bya// de nas rdo rje bdag nyid

246a3(rgyud): bsal ba'i phyir// phud ces bya ba'i dbang bskur// de nas mong tsam brjod pas kyang // klu gnas de dag thams cad 'grub// de nas ngeg kun mgunas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te// spyan sngar thal
246a4(rgyud): mo sbyor 'khod nas/ smon lam rab tu 'debs par gyur// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ba snyan pa las mngon par dga' ba rnams gal te dkyil
246a5(rgyud): 'khor 'dir zhugs pa rnams la bslu bar gyur na/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid la srus par gyur cig/ de'i tshe bdag cag gi gnas bye mas sregs par gyur cig/ rdorje
246a6(rgyud): kun 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo bkas par gyur cig/ rtag pa dus thams cad du sems can chen po de srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyi/ byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson
246a7(rgyud): 'grus bskyed par bgyi/ de'i yul du dug ma mchis par bgyi// dus dusu char dbab par bgyi/ pha rol po'i g.yul thams cad la dus dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par gyi// 'jigs
246a8(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par gzhom par bgyi/ rgyal ba'i bka' dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dka' rab tu sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa bshad de lha rdzas 'od phreng dkar po yis// dbu la sprul
246b1(rgyud): mgo bzhis bskor ba'i// rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsam na su// bud ces bya ba 'bum bzlas la// de nas dug blangs phud ces ni/ bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas kyang // lha rdzas 'od zer phreng ba/ 
246b2(rgyud): gang // de la phud ces bya ba bsam// lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang // phud ces bya ba'i rlung gis gtor// lpags pa sha dang rus gnas pa'i// dug rnams thams cad ma lus par// phud ces
246b3(rgyud): bya ba'i lag pas drang // de nas las rnams kun byed cing // dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa// khu tshur gyis kyang kun phyin na/ sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos// de nas lha chen po rnams kyi
246b4(rgyud): bdag po 'jigs par byed pa chen po bud med ma na po brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis skrag
246b5(rgyud): pa dang / bud med rnams kyis skrag pas lha dang / klu la sogs pa thams cad skrag/ rnam par skrag/ rab tu skrag / kha sbub du 'gyel nas gos dang bral te/ sems kyang sto
246b6(rgyud): nas kun tu 'phyan pa de dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa de legs par byin gyis brlab du gsol/ 'jigs par byed

246b8(rgyud): phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// oM bai ra bai ra ba~M swAhA/ oM b+ha swA hA/ oM b+hi swA hA/ oM b+hu swA hA/ oM b+he swA hA/ oM b+hi sahA/ oM b+ha~M swa hA/ oM b+hai swA hA/ oM b+ha swA hA/ bac+doMs 'jigs byed chen po ni brgyad
247a1(rgyud): po de dag bdag gi dag nyan/ de nas de dag dkyil 'khor bshad// 'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad pa/ bris nas dbusu rdo rje 'dzin// khro chen 'jig rten gsum las ni// rnam rgyal
247a2(rgyud): bya bzhag par bya// de yi zhabs drung 'jigs byed pa'i// bdag po chen po khros pa ni// 'jigs byed ma dang bcas par bri/ rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du// gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad pe ni/ du
247a3(rgyud): meng rnams dang ldan pa la// khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros pas// ci bde bar ni bri bar bya// 'dir ni ske sgor de bzhin du// sngo ba shin tu khros ldan bri// de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas/ bkug snyam
247a4(rgyud): yi thod pa ni/ khrag gis bkang ste mchod nas kya/ sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang // snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang // mgo thong mgo yo dum bu dang / khrag gam chang bas
247a5(rgyud): bus pa brgyad / dkyil 'khor der ni bzhag par bya// de nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba'i// mchog gi slob ma gzhug par bya/ bum pa 'am mgo yi thod pa ni// de ltar brgya
247a6(rgyud): kyis dbang bskuro// de nas las rnams sbyin bya ste/ bud med khyim 'am mtshan gcig par// 'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog tshul bzhin du ni mchod nas kyang // 'bum phrag bzhir
247a7(rgyud): ni bzlas par bya// de nas 'jigs par byed pa yi// bdag nyid chen po'i sgra thos nas// mi 'jigs par ni mgo thod par// khrag mchog bkang ste arga dbul// de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa
247a8(rgyud): ma rungs yid can bud med kyi/ tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed pa// brgyad kyi bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// de mthong 'jigs pa med gyur la/ hUM zhes bya ba dran byed cing // sha 'am yang
247b1(rgyud): na chang mchog gis// thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya// de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms// mgu nas rab tu grub gyur nas// ci 'dod ces ni smras nas kyang // mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed// 
247b2(rgyud): sa rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs par// bde chen hU~M gi tshul gyis gsol// khu ba bro ba'i btung ba dang / rdzas dang ral gri 'khor lo dang // rtse gsum pa dang mtho ris dang / ming dang sa 'og rgyal
247b3(rgyud): po dang // gling dang gling bzhi brgya byin dang // gnod sbyin dbang po gnod sbyin nyid// rig 'dzin dang ni rig 'dzin gyi// 'khor lo bsgyur dang 'jig rten ni// gsum gyi bdag dang bka' nyan dang / Shang
247b4(rgyud): gi 'khod dang bud med kyi// dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni/ tsaM dga' bar yang smyon par byed// byin nas rgod cing 'gro bar byed// skrag na de ma thag tu gsod// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa
247b5(rgyud): lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal

247b7(rgyud): rnams bshad do// oM oM/ oM b+hi/ oM ru/ oM a~M/ oM kaM/ oM ga/ oM br-i oM ka/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ dbu su 'jig rten gsum 'dul
247b8(rgyud): ba/ de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni// dbang phyug rtse gsum lag thog bri// rgyab tu tshangs pa bri bya ste// g.yon par lag na 'khor lo thigs// g.yas pa dbang po rang gi ni// phyag rgya'i mtshan
248a1(rgyud): ma lag thig bri/ rang gi dkyil 'khor chung ma rnams// 'dir yang sgo ba de bzhin te// bya dang bum pa gang ba bzhag/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol tu// stobs bzang la segs mthu
248a2(rgyud): chen thogs// de nas zhugs nas lha rnams ni// mkhas pas kun nas dgug par bya// dzaHhUM baM hoHlha thams cad/ dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug par mdzod// de nas 'ongs par mthong ba dang // dga'
248a3(rgyud): ba chen pos mchod par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ phyag rgyas slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ oM pra tirA tA ma hA sa twa badz+ra d+har a dz+wa la hUM ha ha ha \u0f7f/ me tog cheg bzhin du dor// mig dbye nas ni bstan
248a4(rgyud): par bya// de nas sngags kyi btab pa ni/ bum pa'i chu sa ni dbang bsku'o// de nas lha rnams gang dga' ba'i// dngos gru ba rab tu sbyin par bya// 'bum gcig gam ni 'bum gnyis
248a5(rgyud): sam/ dang po bsnyen pa byas nas kyang // dab phyug la sogs lha mchog rnams/ de dag sgrub pas sgrub bya ste/ mtshan cig la sogs gnas sam ni// phyag na rdo rje ba brang
248a6(rgyud): dman yang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du// lha rnams thams cad tshi ga bzhin/ sgrub pas rtag tu bsgrub byas na/ nam phyed na ni lha bzhengs nas// khyod kyi 'dod pa
248a7(rgyud): gang yin pa// da ni ci bden sbyin bya yis// bzang pos myur du sems te smos// gang phyir mchog ni khyod la sbyin// de nas sngags shes dngos grub phyir// lha la mchod na gsol ba gang ba/ lha rdzas khu
248a8(rgyud): bro btung dang // mo snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang // ril bu rdzas dang rgyal la sogs// yid 'dod tshad med gsol ba gang ba// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas// bac+doMs la phyag 'tshal nas
248b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dang 'jig las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lha thams cad kyis sgrib pa
248b2(rgyud): thams cad rnam par sbyong ngo // mtho ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o// bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// ngan song ma lags pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan pa
248b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// dben pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// rnam par dben pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par
248b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// spyong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// nyon mongs med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//

249a1(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// mdor na brgya byin cid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / gtogs 'dod nyid dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das

249b2(rgyud): tshe thung ba'i sems can rnams che sring bar bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags par 'chi bdag gis nyes pa rnams gang gis dus ma lags pa 'chi ba las rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang /

249b6(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM pu N+ya pu N+ya/ ma hA pu t+ya a pa ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro paH
249b7(rgyud): te swA hA/ snying po'i rig pa'o// oM d+h+waM swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM b+h+rUM swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM kruM swA hA/ snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o// oM traM swAhA/ 
249b8(rgyud): snying po dam pa'o// oM hrI swA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la/ de'i dbus de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang / bsod
250a1(rgyud): nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / gzi brjid chad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhag ste/ b+h+rUM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// de'i spyan sngar ni phyag na rdo rje hrIHzhes bya
250a2(rgyud): snying po'o// g.yon par ni khro bo ste/ kruM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.yas par ni na ma kha'i snying be ste/ traM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// rgyab tu ni 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang

250a4(rgyud): sngags kyi btab la gzhag go// bdug pa la/ sogs pa las thams cad pa'i khro bo'i sngags kyi btab pa dang / mchod pa la sogs pa gzhag ste/ sgo thams cad
250a5(rgyud): kyang de bzhin no// de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la/ bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras dang 'bangasu bcas shing 'khor gyis bskor te/ rig pa dang lhan cig
250a6(rgyud): spyan drang ngo // de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la stong phrag brgya bzlas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras

250a8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badz+ra d+ha raH/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ bi Sho d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ ma tri kra ma/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+ha ra ko tsa/ zhes nga rgyal
250b1(rgyud): bskyed slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o// de nas 'dis me tog dor ba bya'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pra tIts+tsha so sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas phreng ba de nyid kyi mgo la bcings la/ dbang bskur bar bya'o// 
250b2(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shany+dza d+ha ra A dz+nyA ba ya hUM buM/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM b+h+rUM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsA hUM trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hrIH/ oM kar+m+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ daM nas dam tshig
250b3(rgyud): dang / bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems// bla ma dam pa rnams mi spang // srog chags rnams ni bsang mi bya// ma byin pa
250b4(rgyud): yang mi blang zhing // brdzun du smra bar bya ma yin// / pha rol bud med spyad mi bya// bla ma smad par mi bya ste// de yi grib ma mi 'gom zhing // slob dpon ma yin mi gzung la// rdo rje sleb
