281a2(rgyud): mdzad pa/ shAkya seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las// san kun la phan pa'i phyir// rang gi de nyid ston mdzad pa// rdo rje gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// mnyam nyid
281a3(rgyud): bsgoms pa yis// khams gsum la gnas thang la/ dbang bskur rab tu gsol mdzad pa/ rin chen gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// sa sor kun rtog rang bzhin can/ chos kyi bdud rtsi
281a4(rgyud): char 'bebs pas// sen dbugs 'byin mdzad pa po// pad+ma'i gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// sen sdug bsnga la zhi bya'i phyir/ bya ba rjes sgrub rang bzhin can// phrin las
281a5(rgyud): sna tshogs mdzad pa po// sna tshogs gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad nas// seMn kun gyis 'phab pa yi/ bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa po/ 
281a6(rgyud): gtsug tor gzi brjid khyod phyag 'tshal// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams// sbyin pas sen thad kyi// bsam pa thad rdzogs mdzad pa// gtsug tor rgyal mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal// 
281a7(rgyud): mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag/ gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas// sen byang chub thob mdzad pa// gtsug tor rnon po khyod phyag 'tshal// khams gsum 'gro ba thaMd kyis// gdu/ 
281a8(rgyud): kar gyi ni rgyan pa yo// chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa// gtsug tor gdugs dkar khyed phyag 'tshal// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ gar mkhan lha mo bzhi po dang // spos dang me chog
281b1(rgyud): mar me ma// dri yi lha mo khyog 'tshal// dad sogs ngo bo las byung ba// sgo bzhi'i dbus na gang bzhugs pa// lcags kyu zhags pa lu Da sgrog dril// sgo skyong khyed rnams la phyag 'tshal
281b2(rgyud): sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag na// khyams rnamasu ni bzhugs mdzad pa// rab dga' la sogs bcu gnyis gnas// byang chub senga' khyed phyag 'tshal// tshangs dbang drag po zla ba so// phyogs
281b3(rgyud): bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ me dang srin po rlung lha dang / 'byung po'i bdag po khyed phyag 'tshal// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// dkyil 'khor mdun du kun bstod nas// sngags
281b4(rgyud): pa rdo drol 'chang bas// bstod pa 'di dag yang ngag brjod// phyi nas rang gi lus la ni// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhugs// de ltar nges par bsgom bzhin pa'i// dkyil 'khru
281b5(rgyud): dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog zhes bya ba rab tu bshad pa ra bya ste/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM a d+ya nAta pan+d+ha tAH/ 
281b6(rgyud): de'i don ni nar thar pa las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thad stong pa nyid bcu drug tu lhag par mos par bya ste/ ngar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid du blta'o// do nas yi ge hUM
281b7(rgyud): las rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // yi ge raM gyis me'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du yi ge baM las chu gter chen po dang / de'i steng du yi ge kaM la gser gyi dkyil
281b8(rgyud): 'khor dang / de'i steng du dbu su hUM suM hUM zhes bya ba ste/ de las ri rab gru bzhi pa rin po che'i rang bzhin rin po che tha~Md kyis brgyan pa bskyed la/ oM badz+ra dr-iD+ha zhes pa la seT pa dang rdo/ 
282a1(rgyud): bsdams pa byin gyis brlab bo// de'i steng du rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas yi ge b+h+rUM dkar po las byung ba'i rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che'i rtse mo can gzhal yas
282a2(rgyud): khang gru bzhi pa la bsgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhi yis rnar rgyan// gru bzhi rnams ni thams cad du// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams// zla ba mtshan ma rdo rjes spras// dra ba dra phyed kyis rgyan
282a3(rgyud): cing / thig le dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// nang gi dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rdo rje phreng bas yongasu bskor ba'o// de'i lte ba'i steng du seng
282a4(rgyud): ge'i gdan no// de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// 2/ khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i nang rnamasu zla ba'i dkyil 'kho ra te lha rnams kyi gnaso// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi
282a5(rgyud): lha rnams kyi gnas ni snam bu rnams la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad blta'o// seng ge'i gdan gyi stong gi zla kha'i dkyil 'khor yi ge a la soT pa dang / yi ge
282a6(rgyud): ka la sogs pa shes rab dang thabs kyi yi ge zhu bar gyur pa mkha'i khyab kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis son gyi don gyi rlon pa'i sngags kyi
282a7(rgyud): gzungasu gyur te/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ya swA hA/ sngags 'dis dpal shAkya'i rgyal po rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sgrib pa thad sel ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o// de nas ti/ 
282a8(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i phyag rgya dang sngags bshad par bya ste// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rim gyis rnam par dbye bar bya// 
282b1(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni// 'khor ba thams cad gcod byed yin// de yi dpe ni 'di lta ste// ji ltar pad+ma la chags pa'i// bung ba la sogs bsdams pa rnams// pad+ma'i 'ad
282b2(rgyud): ma kha phye na// bcings pa'i sdug bsngal las thar byed// de bzhin 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi// srid gsum 'khor bar bcings pa 'di// thugs rje'i bdag nyid shAkya yi// 
282b3(rgyud): ges bcings pa las grol mdzad// de nas dpal shAkya thub pa'i thugs khar yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khoraro// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags tha~Md kyis bskyed par
282b4(rgyud): bya ste/ rdo rje gtsug tor nas brtsams te ji srid rdo 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa 'byung ba yin// de nas sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM na me b+ha ga ba te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA sa
282b5(rgyud): ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya kr-i bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sar+b+ba pA ba bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+ha bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba karma a ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swAhA/ sngags 'di nges par
282b6(rgyud): brjod do// de nas de'i phyir go rims bzhin yang dga'i mas bzhin yang dag rab bshad bya// oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ kha yi sgo nas phyung nas ni// kun nas 'od zer lnga par
282b7(rgyud): 'thon// kun nas phyogs bcur snang byas nas// sems can rnams ni thad kyi/ sdug bsngal rnams ni thar mdzad de// 'od zer rnams ni slar logs nas// thugs khar zhugs
282b8(rgyud): te de rjes la// sngags dang 'od zer gnyis 'dres pa// las byung sku ni yongs rdzogs pa/ nang gi dkyir 'khor lo'i rtsibs/ shar phyogs pad+ma zla bar bzhugs// rdo rje gtsus
283a1(rgyud): tor de bzhin gshegs// seMn kun la phan don du// thugs kha las byung bzhugs pa ni/ sku mdog dkar zhing 'od zer 'bar// sa mnon phyag rgya yang dag
283a2(rgyud): bzhugs// de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu ni// sngar bshad pa yi thams cad kyang // spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// sngags dang 'od zer legs 'dres dang // sku ni skyed cing yang dag
283a3(rgyud): rdzogs// ji bzhin gan su bzhugs par bya// oM rata no ta ta ma traM zhes bya bas dbyung bar bya'o// lho yi brtsib su yang dag bzhugs// pad+ma zla ba'i da bu su ni/ rin chen gtsug te
283a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// thugs kha nas ni nges gton nas/ sa ngas rgyas mtshan gyis yang dag rgyan// sku mdog sngo zhing shin tu mdzes// 'di'i phyag rgya mchog sbyin nyid// kham
283a5(rgyud): gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i// sems can kun la dbang bsku ra mdzod// sngar bzhin spro dang bsdus pa dang // gzugs bskyed pa yi rim pa yin// oM pad mod ta ma hri/ zhes
283a6(rgyud): dbyung bar bya'o// de nas nub kyi rtsibs gnas pa'i// pang stongs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// sa bon 'od zer gyis rdzogs pa'i// pad+ma gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// thugs kha las
283a7(rgyud): ni phyung gyur nas// rje su ston mdzad bzhugs pa ni/ pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'bar la// bsam gtan phyag rgyas rnam par bzhugs// oM bi sho d+ha ma a zhes dbyung // byang phyogs rtsibs
283a8(rgyud): gnas pad+ma yi/ steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// thugs kha nas bton sang+yas ni// sna tshogs gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// sku mdog ljang ku 'od 'bar ba// 'di yi phyag rgyas/ 
283b1(rgyud): mi 'jigs sbyin// phyag rgyas phrin las sna tshogs mdzad// seMn 'khor ba las sgrol ba'o// yi ge oM gyis sangs rgyas dbyung // gtsug tor gzi brjid de bzhin gshegs// me yi mtsham
283b2(rgyud): gnas pad+ma gnas// yang dag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// g.yas pa nyi ma yang dag bsnams// phyag g.yon pa ni skul gnas// sku mdog dkar dmar 'od kyis ni// khams gsum pa ni snga
283b3(rgyud): bar mdzad// hUM gi sa bon las byung ba// gtsug tor rgyal mtshan de bzhin gshegs// thugs kha las byung phyung nas ni// bden bral rtsibs la bzhugs nas ni// pad gnas zla ba'i gzun
283b4(rgyud): la yang / sku mi dag dmar zhing gnag pa la/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan rnams// sems can ser sna sbyong mdzad pa// d+hIHyig sa bon las rdzogs pa'i// gtsug tor rnon po de bzhin
283b5(rgyud): gshegs// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams// ga cod mdzad rlung gi rtsibasu phyung // pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs shing / 'di yi phyag mtshan g.yas ral gri// g.yon na
283b6(rgyud): glegs bam rnams pa ni// sku mdog mkha' ltar sngo ba'o// pad+ma la gnas zla bar bzhugs// kr-i yogs bon las byung ba'o// gtsug ter gdugs dkar de bzhin gshegs/ san / 
283b7(rgyud): kyi chos kyi rje// dbang ldan rtsibasu dbyung bar bya// kun da lta bu'i mdog lta bu// 'di yi phyag mtshan gdugs bsnams pa// de kun sna tshogs pad+mar gnas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs
283b8(rgyud): pa'i// oM traM hrIHaHsngags de rnamasu brjod na su// thugs kha nas ni dbyung ba dang // mtshams kyi gnas ni bzhi po ru// pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// sgeg me la sogs lha mo bani/ rigra
284a1(rgyud): kyi sku mdog 'dzin pa ste// dkar ser dmar po sna tshogs mngag/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba ni// sngar bshad ji skad bzhin du// bsngags pa nyid ni brjod na su// thugs khan
284a2(rgyud): kyang dbyangs bya ste// gdug pa la sogs lha mo bzhi// pad+ma la gnas zla ba yi// dkyil 'khor du ni mtshams bzhi'o// thams cad du yang sku mdog ni// rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis// oM
284a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba sa skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harmA te/ ga ga nas mung ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud dr-i ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ sngags kyi dbyung ste shar gyi sgo'o// gzhogs gnyis dag tu gnas pa ni// byams
284a4(rgyud): pa la sogs gnas bzhi po/ bang gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// thang sems dpa'i skyil krungs can// phyag rgya sgyum dog rim pa yang / byams pa thugs ni rnam sa
284a5(rgyud): pa/ sku mdog ser po 'od zer bzang // g.yas pa glu shing me tog can// g.yon pas spyi thugs bsnams pa'o// gnyis pa mthong ba don yang ni/ sku mang ga ser po 'a
284a6(rgyud): zer 'bar// phyag g.yas pad+ma spyan can te// g.yon pa'i phyag ni bkur bzhag pa'o// byang chub seMda' gsum pa yang // mtshan ni ngan song spong 'joms pa// sku mdog dkar po 'od 'bar
284a7(rgyud): zhing // phyag rgya lcags kyu bsnams pa can// bzhi pa mya ngan mun pa kun// nges 'joms blo gros de bzhin te// dkar ser 'dres pa'i mdog tu snang // de yi phyag rgya dbyug pa rnams// 
284a8(rgyud): pa khu tshur bkur bzhag cing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' bzhi rnams kyang // lho sgor rab tu bzhugs pa'o// dang po spos kyi glang po yang / 
284b1(rgyud): dkar po sngo ba'i sku mdog can// 'di yi phyag rgya phyag g.yas na// dri yi dung ni rab tu bkang // g.yon pa khu tshur bkur bzhag la// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spyod// gnyis pa dpa'
284b2(rgyud): bar 'gro ba mtshon// nyon mongs thad rab grol mdzad// shel gyi mdog can 'od bzang pa// 'di yi phyag rgya ral gri bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag ni bkur bzhag nas// san sdug bsngal
284b3(rgyud): zhi mdzad pa'o// gsum pa na mkha' mdzod ci // rgyan ni tha~Md kyis brgyan pa// dkar ser bsres pa'i sku mdog 'od// sgrib pa thang rnam par spangs// 'di yi phyag rgya phyag g.yas na// pad+ma
284b4(rgyud): la gnas chos kyi mdzod// g.yon pa'i phyag ni bkur bzhag la// namakha' nor kun 'chang ba po// bzhi pa yang ni ye shes tog/ bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// sngon po mdog
284b5(rgyud): cad yang dag gsal// yid sbyin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ba snams// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bkur 'jog cing // dbul ba 'i sdug bsngal dgrol bar mdzad// nub sge
284b6(rgyud): drung du pad+ma la// gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dang po bdud rtsi 'od ces bya// zla ba'i mdog gi rnar mdzes// bdud rtsi'i bum pa legs par bsnams// cod pan rin chen
284b7(rgyud): phyag gi so// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur 'jog cing // rgya chen tshe ni rtsol ba po// gnyis pa'i mtshan ni zla ba'i 'od// mi shes pa yi mun pa bsal/ sku mdog dkar po mdzes pa ni/ phyag
284b8(rgyud): rtsa g.yas pa'i phyag nyid kyis// pad+mar gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag pa'o// gsum pa bzang skyong zhes bya ba// dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdog
285a1(rgyud): can cing // chos rnams thams cad rab bsal mdzad// phyag rgya phyag ni g.yas pa yi// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o// bla
285a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' bzhi pa yang // dra ba can gyi 'od mtshan can// sku mchog dmar po 'od 'bar ba// rdo rje gur ni bsnams pa can// byang sgo'i rtsa bar pad+ma la// gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'gre/ 
285a3(rgyud): du// sangs rgyas sras po dang po cing // mtshan ni rdo rje sring po zhes// dkar zhing sngo ba'i mdog dang ldan// phyag rgya phyag ni g.yas pa yis// ud pa la ni rdo rje'i ldan// g.yon pa khu tshur
285a4(rgyud): dkur gnas pa'o// gnyis pa blo gros zhes pa yi// mi zad pa thar yang dag ldan// kun tu zla ba'i mdog ltar bsal// phyag rgya phyag ni gnyis pa yis/ yigs bum pa yang dag
285a5(rgyud): bsnams// seMn thams cad rab tshim mdzad// sangs rgyas sras po gsum pa yang // spobs pa brtsegs pa'i tha snyad can// sku mdog dmar zhing 'od 'bar ba// phyag
285a6(rgyud): rgya phyag g.yas pad+ma la// gnas pa'i rin chen phung po nyid// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o// rgyal ba'i sras po bzhi po ni// kun tu bzang po ces bya ste/ sku mdog ser zhing 'od
285a7(rgyud): 'bar ba// g.yas pa'i phyag gi phyag rgya ni// rin chen sde ma bsnams pa la// g.yon pa khu chur bstan pa'o// de lta'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// byang chub sems dpa' brtse bdag nyid
285a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu ne ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba dun ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te s+ya myakr-i puH
285b1(rgyud): / ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba kar+m+ma a ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ sngags 'dis shAkya'i rgyal po la sogs pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun yongasu rdzogs pa
285b2(rgyud): sgom mo// de nas de'i rjes la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang bar bya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam ldan pas// sgo ni dbye bar byas nasu// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// mdzub mo
285b3(rgyud): ni rab tu brkyang / mthe'u chung lug gu rgyud byas la// sgo dbye ba yi phyag rgya yis/ oM sar+b+ba bid+yA d+ha ra/ ud g+ha Ta ya hUM/ sgo dbye ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sgo dbye'o// rdo rje 'khor lo
285b4(rgyud): phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor yongasu gteg ste// oM sar+b+ba bid+yA ba dz+ra tsakra hUM// lag ngar dag ni rdo rjer bcings// rdo rje se gol rnam grol bas/ shAkya'i rgyal po sbyor ba dag dpal
285b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// g.yas pa se gol khardabs pa yis// mnyam par brdabs par grub par 'gyu ra// g.yas pa yis kyang brdab par gsungs
285b6(rgyud): gnyis ka yang ni sdud pa yin// oM badz+ra sa ma dzaHdzaHhUM ba ho// bka' bsgo ba 'di bsgrags tsam gyis/ 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs// sangs rgyas thang byon 'gyur
285b7(rgyud): te// gzhan rnams rab 'jug lta ci smos// de nas mdun gyi na mkhar dkyil 'khor la bltas la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis mchod yon gyi snod na gnas pa'i dri'i chu yis ya
285b8(rgyud): dag par bsangs te/ zhabs bsil dbu'o// de nas mchod yon gyi phyag rgyas mchod yon dbu'o// de nas zhabs bsil gyi phyag rgyas zhabs bsil dbu'o// de nas oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ 
286a1(rgyud): d+hU oM badz+ra d+hU pa hUM/ oM badz+ra dI pe hUM/ badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad la// dkyil 'khor du gzhu'o/ de nas yang phyag rgya dang por sngar bshad
286a2(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs dam tshig gi phyag rnams bcing ngo // de nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i sngags kyis las kyi phyag rgya bcing // 
286a3(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya chen po'i sngags kyis phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin chen rngom
286a4(rgyud): dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma rnams spros te/ dkyil 'khor dang ces pa'i lha dpal shAkya'i rgyal po nas brtsams pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa la dbang bsku
286a5(rgyud): ba sbyin par bya ste/ dbang bskur ba lnga dang / bdag po hUM sa bcu'i mthar thug pa sbyin no// dbang bskur ma thag tu/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA
286a6(rgyud): s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta dI pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu s+pha re Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gan+d+he pu dza maH/ 
286a7(rgyud): sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi yis mchod do// rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje'i tshig yige brgya pa sngon du 'gro bas sngar bzhin bstod par bya'o// de nas ma/ 
286a8(rgyud): med mi g.yo mnyam med snying po'i chos can ni// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ yon tan dngos grub thams cad mtha' yas sbyin mdzad pa// drim/ 
286b1(rgyud): mi g.yo mnyam med mchog rab chos can rnams// yon tan mchog ni phra mo'i cha la'ang mtshams medo// namakha' dang mnyam dper gyur pa nyid yong ma yin// san khams la grub
286b2(rgyud): mchog rtsol ba rnams la gsol// dngos grub mtha' yas rnams la dpe dang rnam par bral// dri med thugs rje brgya pa nyid kyi shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag
286b3(rgyud): pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ 'gro ba'i don sgrub lhur mdzad mtha' yas mnga' ba can// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // 'gag med nyid kyi thugs rje'i spyod pa
286b4(rgyud): mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum la mchog gi dngos grub rtsol ba 'jug/ dpag med dpag bral rnams la shin tu rdzogs nyid rdzogs// bde ba'i gnas gshegs kyang e ma'o chos
286b5(rgyud): nyid bzang // rtag tu mchog sbyin nyid de bde 'gro nyid du ga shegs// mtha' dang 'jig rten gsum la dngos grub mtsho ga ni stsol ba po// bde gshegs dus gsu
286b6(rgyud): bgrod nyid sgrib pa mi mnga' nyid// dam tshig gsum mchog dngos grub mchog sbyin bdag la stsol ces pa dang // tha~Mng la lce brgya pa'i kha yis bstod pa nye bar mos te// rdo rje
286b7(rgyud): dang dril bu 'dzin pas bstod par bya'o// de nas phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
286b8(rgyud): phyi rol gyi lha rnams la mchod pa thams cad dang gtor ma'i cho ga nye bar mkho ba dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dbu'o// dpung pa bzang po'i tshigs bcad brjod do// dang por se gal/ 
287a1(rgyud): la sogs spras// khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yis// sdig pa'i phung po dgug bya zhing // yi ge gsum sogs yang dag ldan// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa'i// 
287a2(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad mnyam po spong // dgug dang gdon dang bcing ba rnam par gzhoms// sngags bzhi po rnams legs par sbyar ba ni// bdag sogs sngags te nyung kar dkar po brdeg
287a3(rgyud): shi ba'i rus pa gos la rab bkru ba// oM sho d+ha ne zhes sogs sngags kyis ni// srid gsum dri ma chu yis bkru ba bya// oM kaM ka ni zhes sogs sngags kyis ni// ba yi rnam pa lnga yis
287a4(rgyud): bkru ba bya/ oM s+t+rai ra k+She sa sogs lcags kyis ma// / dI bzang rnams ni kun gyis bkru bar bya/ oM a ma g+ha aHna N+Da sa gas/ sngags kyis pa yi khams bkrupa
287a5(rgyud): bya// oM a mo te zhes gas/ sngags kyis char mchog gis kyang bkru bar bya// oM pu N+ye sogs pa'i sngags kyis ni// khar dang bar du chu yis bkru bar bya/ yang
287a6(rgyud): shes kyi glu blang zhing dbang bskuro// lam sbyang ba bya'o// gdugs pa la sogs lha mo bzhi'i sngag so// de nas 'di'i thab khung ni khru gang tsam la sbyin bsreg bya// ngan 'gro kun
287a7(rgyud): tu gnas pa yi// san de rjes dran byas nas// dge ba'i rgyud phyir sdig pa dang / sgrib pa zhi phyir bsreg bya ste// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang // 'bras yis nyungs kar bsres pa dang / 
287a8(rgyud): til dang 'bru dang 'bras la sogs// bud shing rnamasu lag gnyis kyis/ las rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang // snga ma ji ltar de ltar gyis// de yis myur du sen rnams// 
287b1(rgyud): / bde bar phun sum tshogs pa 'thob// las kyi rgyal po mchog ces pa'i tinge 'dzin to// de dag kyang sems can de la byas pa de nas de dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las rnam par grol
287b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur te// dga' ldan gyi gan su sems can thad la phan par mdzad pa bde bar gshegs pa dang ldan par skyeso// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams snyan grags dang
287b3(rgyud): bcas pas gar byed cing / sngags kyis mchod pa'i sprin mtha' yas skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i phyir lha'i tshogs rnams mdun du bya ste/ byang chub kyi
287b4(rgyud): sems bskyed nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / gdugs pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bad na la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang / rgyan du ma rnam
287b5(rgyud): kyis kyang mdzes shing na bza' rin po che'i char la so Da pas kyang dga' ba'i tshal yongasu gang bar bya'o// de nas ngo mtshar che bar gyur to// de nas bac+doMs byang
287b6(rgyud): chub senga' seda' chen po phyag na rdos bac+doMs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi mar gsungs te// dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni// dgyes pas
287b7(rgyud): rdo rje gsor zhing shAkya'i bdag po dgyes pa thub pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal nas sgrib pa thad rnam par sbyong ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas snong
287b8(rgyud): thang yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid rang gi thugs kha nas phyung // oM sar+b+ba pA pa da ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya bi sho d+ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra/ 
288a1(rgyud): NA ni b+hasmai ku ru hUM phaT/ oM b+h+rUM bi na sha ya A ba / ni hUM phaT/ oM d+hU bi sho d+ha ya a ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la d+ha ka d+ha ka tsa na ha na a ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM suM sa
288a2(rgyud): sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra A ba ra NA hUM phaT/ oM hUM ha ra ha ra sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hU~M paT/ oM hUM phaT sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM b+h+r-i ta b+h+r-i ta sar+b+ba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM tra Ta tra TA sar+b+ba A ba
288a3(rgyud): ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshi nai da sar+b+ba A ba raNA ni hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha sar+b+ba na ra ka gi ta he tu hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa sar+b+ba pre ta ga ti he hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma thi ma tha sar+b+ba ti ra ya ga ga ti ha hUM hUM
288a4(rgyud): phaT dade nas de dag gis nye bar mkho ba rnams spyad de/ oM sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne d+ha me d+hU pa ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba dun ti bi shwe d+ha ni puSh+pa bi lo ka ni hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA yA
288a5(rgyud): sho d+ha ni dz+nyA nA lo ka ka ri hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya gaSh+Nagan+d+ha nA sha ni gan+d+ha ba ti hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ga ti A kaR+Sha ni hUM dza phaT/ oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ud+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ aM
288a6(rgyud): sar+b+ba a pA ya ban d+ha na bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pa ya ga ti ga ha ni bi nA sha ni hUM ha~MHphaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo no/ rtsibs
288a7(rgyud): brgyad pa yis shin tu mdzes// lte ba mu khyud yang dag ldan// nang gi rim pa bris nas ni// lte bar shAkya'i dbang po yi// bdag po thub pa bri bar bya// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen ni// dpa'
288a8(rgyud): bo de yi spyan sngar bri/ rgyab tu 'khor lo sgyur ba yang // legs par mngon par bri bar bya// gas su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor bri// g.yon du rnam par rgyal ba bri/ gzi brjid phung po
288b1(rgyud): yang ni mar// dbang ldan du ni gdugs dkar po// rnam par mthor ba rlung nyid du// rnam par 'joms pa bden bral bri// de nas phyi rol yang dag bri// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rtabs
288b2(rgyud): bzhi pa shin tu mdzes// dpa' bo lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu bstan rnams bzhag/ grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya// de nas me tog
288b3(rgyud): phreng ba dang // dr-i sogs rang gi lus la byug/ slob dpon 'jug par bya ste// dzaHhUM baM ho/ b+ha ga bAM/ e h+ye hi ma hA/ kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoHzhes bya bas lha thad spyan drang // de bzhin du
288b4(rgyud): bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thad las rnam par grol te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang sa gong ma rnamasu skye bar 'gyu ro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par
288b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyuraro// snga ma bzhin du las tha kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa meng par
288b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pas rims thams cad dang gdon la sogs pa rnams las thar par 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas las thang byed do// brtag pa gzhan gyi tshogs
288b7(rgyud): kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi dbang du gyur pa rnams 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan
288b8(rgyud): la sogs pa mngon par bris pa las bzlas pa dang sbyin bsreg dang dbang bskur ba rnams kyis ngan song thang las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
289a1(rgyud): 'dzin pas seng ge'i lha stangs kyis zhal du bltas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya mchog gi mtshan nyid dam
289a2(rgyud): pa bshad par bya ste/ thugs rje'i gdung ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyal ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// tinge 'dzin du gnas par dpral ba thal mo sbyar te phyag
289a3(rgyud): 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor rig pas 'grin pa'i phyogasu thal mo kha phye ba pad+ma'i rnam par bya'o// thugs khar rdo rje thal mo byas sor mo dbus
289a4(rgyud): ma rtse mo sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dmachi ga gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa gan rkyal du dbang par bzhag la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzlog ste/ bzhag la mthe
289a5(rgyud): bong gnyis sbyar te zhi ba'i lta bas blta'o// 'dzi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid yongasu bskor te phan tshun sbyar
289a6(rgyud): mthe'u chung dag dang mthe bong dag lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par bcings la snying khar bzhago// 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// thal mo gang bar sbyar nas mthe'u chung dang
289a7(rgyud): mthe bong sbyar te bzung zhing lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba'o// 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams par brtan par byas nas// gung mo gnyis rdo rtse mor byas
289a8(rgyud): la na mthe'u chung dang mthe bo rab tu brkyang ba'o// 'di ni phyag na rdo'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyis mthe'u chung dang mthe bong gnyis de bzhin du byas byas la/ mdzub mo dang mang / 
289b1(rgyud): med pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par bya'o// 'di ni ngan song thad yongasu sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzub mo dang ming med dag rin po che'i rnam par bya'o// 'di ni dbang
289b2(rgyud): bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bong so so so sor sbyar nas lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba ni mtshon cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa de kho na
289b3(rgyud): bzhin du rab tu 'jug pa ni las thad pa'i phyag rgya'o// snyim pa gyen du mthong ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'og nas 'thor ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid mthe bong ga
289b4(rgyud): gyen du ma nyams la 'dzin pa ni mar ma'i phyag rgyu'o// de nyid 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid rab tu ba rkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid gung mo
289b5(rgyud): rnams nang du bcug pa ni arga'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis ma nyams te tshogs par ma bcag nas sor mo thang brkyang ba 'di ni rnam par mthor
289b6(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi snyim pa 'od zer gyi rnam pa ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid spyi bo'i
289b7(rgyud): gnasu bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings la bskor ba 'di ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// rdorje
289b8(rgyud): bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che ltar bya ste/ lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo/ 
290a1(rgyud): gnyis rdo rjer byas la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pas mchod sbyin dang g.yon pa mi 'ja
290a2(rgyud): pa sbyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu
290a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de nyid las rA 'dra bar byas pa ni mnga'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid phyag rgya dang mthe bong rtse sprang pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o// de nyid kyi tshigs par ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i 'o// 
290a4(rgyud): nyid sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra ba gzi brjid 'o// de nyid spyi bor bzhag pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid mdu na du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i'o// de nyid pad+ma 'dra bar byas pan
290a5(rgyud): pad+ma'o// de nyid gung mo dang mdzub mo bkug pa ni ral gri'o// de nyid gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i 'o// de nyid pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas ni lce'i 'o// de nyid bskye
290a6(rgyud): pa ni sna tshogs kyi'o// de nyid shin tu bskyed pa ni srung ba'i 'o// de rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o// de nyid dam du dkug pa ni bsdams pa'i 'o// de nyid mdzub mo gnyis
290a7(rgyud): bkug pa ni lcags kyu'o// de nyid rtse mo gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o// de nyid phan tshun mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o// de nyid bskyod pa ni dril bu'o// // de nas tshangs pa dang brgya
290a8(rgyud): byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil
290b1(rgyud): / 'khor chen po de dag la/ gzigs nas leg so zhes bya bas mgu bar bya ste/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams gang khyed la 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag par skyes pa de ni leg so// 
290b2(rgyud): leg so// legs par bsgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje thams cad tshe dpag tu med par khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
290b3(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas
290b4(rgyud): phyung ngo // oM pu t+yaM pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na sa b+ha ro pa tsi te ya ka ra Ni swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad
290b5(rgyud): pa tsam gyis ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang byol song gi 'gro ba rnamasu skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag
290b6(rgyud): nyid kyis rab tu sheso// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas shing snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi snying
290b7(rgyud): po'i chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
290b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad// oM a mi te a mi ta~M/ i ma tod b+ha be/ oM mo ta saM b+ha ge a mi ta bi kran+tu/ a
291a1(rgyud): ma ta bi ku nu gA mi ni sar+b+ba kar+m+ma kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'o// 
291a2(rgyud): nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi sgrib pa
291a3(rgyud): gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyu'o// oM kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni t+yA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sar+b+ba karma pa ra pa rA NI sar+b+ba
291a4(rgyud): satwa nAny+tsa swA hA/ 'di bshad pa tsam gyis thad te/ kho na bzhin du 'gyuraro// de nas slar yang bac+doMs kyis sgrib pa thaMd dri ma med cing rnar dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
291a5(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i stong po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kha nasa~M/ oM rat+ne rat+ne ma hA
291a6(rgyud): rat+ne rat+na saM b+ha be rat+na ki raNi/ rat+na mA lA bi shud d+he sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba pA paM hUM thAH/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom zhing rnam par bcom par gyur to// de nas slar
291a7(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms par sgrib pa thang rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi snying
291a8(rgyud): po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung // oM a mo g+ha a pa ti ha ta sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thad
291b1(rgyud): g.yos rab tu g.yos yang dag par rab tu g.yos bskyod rab tu bskyod yang dag par rab tu bskyod/ bskul rab tu bskul yang dag par rab tu bskul zhing ngo mtshar che zhing rmad du byung ba
291b2(rgyud): du ma 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyuraro// de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// logs bzhi dang yang yang dag ldan// rta babs bzhi dang kun tu ldan/ kha
291b3(rgyud): khyer dang ni sgo khyad bcas// de yi dbusu 'khor lo yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar ba// rtsibs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog yin// de yi dbusu mgon po ni// 
291b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje stobs che zhing // phyag na rdo rje dril bu can/ zla ba rgyas zhal 'dzum pa br-i/ shar gyi rtsibs kyi dbus kyi char// gtso bo ma bskyod pa nyid bri/ lhor ni rin chen bri bya
291b5(rgyud): zhing // nub tu chu skyes pad+ma ste/ byang du gdon mi za zhe grags/ dpa' bo stobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa thams cad ni// 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i cha lugs mdzad/ 
291b6(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa rnams// phyag na mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa// rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa bri// grwa yi cha rnams thams cad du// de bzhin
291b7(rgyud): bdug pa la srogs bri/ sgo skyong rnams kyang khro bo dang / mchog tu khro bar gzhol ba bri/ de nas rnal 'byor rang nyid zhugs// sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drangs te/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ b+ha ga baM/ 
291b8(rgyud): badz+ra a h+ye hi ni sa ma ye ste/ de nas mgon po byon pa la// mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni// 'chi bdag nyid dang sbrul 'jigs pa'i// 'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma
292a1(rgyud): le hUM/ rdo rje ta ran ti ra~M bcings/ lag na rin chen thogs pa gzhug/ yang na me tog phreng ldan pa// de dag dkyil 'khor nyid du dor/ oM pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hU/ de nas dam
292a2(rgyud): tshig sbyin te/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'dis gdong g.yog dgrol bar bya'o// oM badz+ra hA s+ya ud g+ha Ta ya hUM/ de nas 'dis brtan par bya'o// oM badz+ra dri sh+ya ho// de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin
292a3(rgyud): te/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM kar+m+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHde nas bum pa'i dbang byin te/ oM badz+ra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ aM/ 
292a4(rgyud): bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi ShiHtAM/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM kar+m+ma ka la sha a b+hi ShiHaHde nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// a
292a5(rgyud): rat+na mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa twAM trAM traM traM traM/ oM badz+ra paT a ba laM ba na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM badz+ra mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha mu dra a d+hi Shony+tsa oM/ oM rat+na mu dra a b+hi Shany+tsa tAM/ oM pad+ma mu
292a6(rgyud): dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM kar+m+ma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHoM badz+ra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM hUM traM hrIHaHoM badz+ra kar+m+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ aHoM badz+ra tsakra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM bruM/ oM badz+ra tsakra a d+hi pa d+hi ste/ 
292a7(rgyud): a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hUM hUM/ oM a~M oM/ trAM trAM tAM/ d+hI hrIM hU~M/ a a a/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ta thA ga ta d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shony+tsa oM/ oM rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra Ni a b+hi
292a8(rgyud): Shiny+tsa hrIHoM kar+m+ma d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHoM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gu h+ye a b+hi Shany+tsa oM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM rat+na gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsadz+dza/ oM pad+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrI/ oM kar+m+ma gu h+ya
292b1(rgyud): a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHoM pradz+nyo pA ya sa ma yo ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM aHde ltar dbang bskur nas tshe 'phel ba'i rig pa sbyin no// oM badz+ra a yu She hUM a/ 'di'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan
292b2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin mdzad pa las bdud rtsi
292b3(rgyud): 'dzag pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa thal mo sbyar ba brkyang ba gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa bya ste de'i spyan sngar stong phrag
292b4(rgyud): brgya bzlas// de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas la ba dmar ser gyi mar snod sar par bcug la g.yon pa'i rdo rjes mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems shing mtshan thog
292b5(rgyud): thag bzlas pa bya'o// de nas dri snyam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i dad kyang ldang ngo // dro ba dang du ba dang me yang 'byung ngo // 'od zer gyi snang ba rab tu 'phros te de la so// 
292b6(rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de mar gsar pa 'am/ til ma ram/ chu 'am/ 'o ma 'am/ zho 'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa 'am/ sha 'am/ gang yang rung ba dang lhan
292b7(rgyud): cig tu rab tu bsgrubs te nang par sngar srung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam/ zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba nyi ma ji srid pa'i tsher 'gyur zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i
292b8(rgyud): tsher yang 'gyuraro// tha mas ni dngos grub tha mar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med do// mtshan ma ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nang med pa dang yid gzhungs pa dang ldan zhing sgra dkar
293a1(rgyud): gnyer ma med pa dang lus brtan zhing tshe la brgya par 'gyur// gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brta
293a2(rgyud): mi dgos par 'grub ste the tshom med do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sen
293a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad pa 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' gnang par zhu// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' gnang par zhu// rgyal po
293a4(rgyud): chen po dag legaso legs shod cig dang / ngas rjesu yi rang zhing rang gi dam tshig byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ngal bso pos// bac+doMs kyis
293a5(rgyud): gnang zhing rje su yi rang ste byin gyis rlabs pas rang gi snying po rang gi snying ka nas phyung la/ oM baM/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis de kho na bzhin du rang gi
293a6(rgyud): snying po bshad pa oM d+hi/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa oM bi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis de kho na bzhin
293a7(rgyud): du rang gis snying po bshad pa oM k+Sha de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dkyil 'khor lngas ni rgan pa ste// de yi dbusu mgon po ni// phyag na rdo rje bgyid bcas
293a8(rgyud): drinade yi g.yon pa'i log su ni/ ngal bso dge ba lag pa na/ be con dang ni ne'u la// rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ sbom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// gser mdog gzi brjid ldan
293b1(rgyud): pa br-i/ mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs/ rin chen tshogs char 'bab pa bri/ mdun du yul 'khor skyong nyid ni/ pi wang sbags par yang dag brtson/ rol cing kha dog ljang gu nyid// rgyan
293b2(rgyud): rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri/ g.yasu dpa' bo lus 'phags po// ral gri phyag na bsnams par bri/ nub tu yang ni mig mi bzang // rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin cing mchog/ sbrul mgo bdun
293b3(rgyud): gyis yongasu bskor// mig ni dmar zhing shin tu 'bur/ sgo yi phyogs ni thad du// sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas sngags pa rang nyid 'jug/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes grags pa'i/ 
293b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan drang zhing // de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo // spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod// mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga bzhin// de nas slob ma rgyal rigs sam/ rjes
293b5(rgyud): rigs bram ze la sogs kyang // me tog phreng ba sa rnam brgyan pa// sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di dang // rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas gzhugs/ oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas
293b6(rgyud): me tog gi rin po che 'dis kyang dor bar bya'o// oM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha d+haM ma ho ta ta ma/ gang la lhung ba'i rgyal po de/ 'di yis 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// de nas gran gnas pa yi// bum pa bzhis
293b7(rgyud): kyang dbang bskur te// lnga pa phyag na rdo rje'i'o// phyag rgya nyid kyis dbang bskur bya// de la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin/ dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang bskur bas// rgyal po ma yin rgyal
293b8(rgyud): por 'gyur// rgyal po yin na chen por 'gyur// 'dzam bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan// gling bzhi pa yi bdag po mchog lan bzhir dbang ni bskur pa dang // lan bzhir rab tu zhugs na
294a1(rgyud): ni/ de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag/ rang gi bu bzhin brkyang bar bya// bdag cag rgyal chen bzhi pos kyang // 'bangs dang 'khor du bcas pa dang // yul 'khor pho brang
294a2(rgyud): bcas pa yi// rgyal pos rtag tu brkyang bgyi ste// de yi ma rungs pa rnams dang // de yi pha rol sde dang nad// 'chi bdag 'jigs pa mu ge dang // yams dang nyer 'tshe gzhom par bgyi// ngal
294a3(rgyud): bse bos ni rgyas par bgyid// yul 'khor srung gis zhi ba nyid// phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i// 'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms// mig mi bzang gis bde bar
294a4(rgyud): byed// mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms// ma dor na bdag gis de yi ni// ra ba kun dang bsam pa kun// bgyi ste gal te ma nges na// phyag na rdo rje bslus pa yin// de nas
294a5(rgyud): phyogs skyong bcus bcom ldan 'das la phywa ga tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs bdag cag kyang sems can thaMd la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying
294a6(rgyud): po rab tu dbu'o// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams legaso leg so// de legs par smos shig/ de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM i/ 
294a7(rgyud): oM aM/ oM a/ oM ya/ oM ri/ oM baM/ oM yaM/ oM ku/ oM aM/ oM bA/ de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad de// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// mgon po dbusu de bzhin bzhag/ phyoT skyong// 
294a8(rgyud): rang gi phyogs kyi char// bzhag bya spyan sngar rnam pa gnyis// nyi ma dang ni phag gi gzugs// sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhino// de nas de kun spyan drangs la/ mchod pa kun gyis mchod pa bya// 
294b1(rgyud): nas rang nyid zhugs nas kyang // slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing // phyogs skyong la sogs sngags bzlas pa'i// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bsku ro// de nas phan par 'dod pa yis// sgrub
294b2(rgyud): phyir snying po'i sbyin par bya// phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas rnams// khartag mi bgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
294b3(rgyud): gang su zhig rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur bas dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag bcom
294b4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag gis kun nas srung ba ta nga/ bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi sde rnams gzhom par bgyi'o// dus dang dusu char dbab par bgyi'o// 'bru dang / me tog
294b5(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o// de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
294b6(rgyud): 'das bdag gis rgyal po chen po de'i tshe sring bar bgyi'o// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi 'o// srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po bden bral gyis 'di
294b7(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po chen po dang / rgyal po chen po'i bu dang / bram ze 'am/ rje rigs sam/ mi gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad med pa dang / yi
294b8(rgyud): dwags dang / 'dres 'jigs pa med pa dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa med pa dang / dus thams cad du srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po chen/ 
295a1(rgyud): bo chu bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang / yul thang kun nas so sor srung bar bgyi'o// kun tu
295a2(rgyud): srung bar bgyi'o// 'bru rnams kyang bskyed par bgyi'o// klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o// dug dang thog kyang mi 'byung bar bgyi'o// me tog dang 'bras bu thad kyang yongasu rdzogs
295a3(rgyud): par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa thams cad kyang so sor dgag par bgyi'o// de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thad du
295a4(rgyud): rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa 'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi// 'bru dang me tog dang 'bru thad kyang yod su bskyed par bgyi'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal
295a5(rgyud): po chen po lus ngan pos/ bac+doMs la phyag 'tshal nas 'a de skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gnod/ sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad cu dang lhan cig
295a6(rgyud): tu mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sen chen po de la dus thong du 'jigs pa thaMd sor dgag par bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru tha~Md legs por 'byor par bgyi'o// rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi/ 
295a7(rgyud): skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / nags kyi gnyin dang / grogs dang / bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs pa yang srung bar bgyi'o// glang dang / kha dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / 
295a8(rgyud): lug dang / ma ha dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ra la sogs pa yang srung bar bgyi'o// de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 
295b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzungs
295b2(rgyud): ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chad pa yongasu spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gzhom pa dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / sa gzhi bcings pa dang / khyo
295b3(rgyud): bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje'i gur yang bgyi'o// bgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa rnams
295b4(rgyud): kyis mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi/ dge ba dang dge ba ma yin pa thang rmi lam du yang bsgo bar bgyi/ grub pa thams cad la bgegs ma mchis par dngos grub thad
295b5(rgyud): kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas yang na mkha' la spyod cing na mkha' la 'gro ba'i bas gro bac+doMs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
295b6(rgyud): 'das bdag gis dus tha~Mng du rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs lam la gnas pa thams cad bcas pa mchis te/ srung ba dang / sgrub
295b7(rgyud): pa dang / sba ba kun nas sgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyi gnas thams cad sor bzlog par bgyi'o// nang thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// 
295b8(rgyud): de nas sa'i 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mi'i bdag po dang / rje'i rigs dang / bram ze dang rma
296a1(rgyud): rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyis dus thams cad du don bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa thams cad las kyang srung bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang
296a2(rgyud): yongasu bskyab par bgyi'o// de nas gza' chen po brgyad 'khor rgyu skar dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang
296a3(rgyud): gi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na de la bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs du gsol/ legaso leg so// ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis gza' chen po rnams shod cig/ de nas nyi
296a4(rgyud): / ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po rnams kyis ba com ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ oM a/ oM so// oM aM/ oM bu/ oM br-i/ oM shu/ oM sa/ oM rA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor
296a5(rgyud): 'byung ste/ dbusu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnar rgyal ba'i gzugasu bri'o// mtha' rnams ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bri'o// de yi mdun du pa ba sangs/ 
296a6(rgyud): zla ba'i rgyab tu bri bar bya// g.ya su phur bu bri bya ni// g.yon du lhag pa bri bar bya/ me yi gnasu mig dmar nyid// rlung gi phyogasu nyi ma ste// dbang ldan du ni spen pa nyid/ srin po'i phyogasu sgra gcan
296a7(rgyud): brig dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu/ rgyu skar thad bri bar bya// sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams/ khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya/ rdo rje 'dzin pas 'jug bya ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ thang
296a8(rgyud): kyang ni spyan drang ngo // de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste// oM badz+ra ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gra ha sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gra ha pra tits+tsha hUM// de nas gza' brgyad sngags ni bsngags pa yis// bum pa
296b1(rgyud): brgyang po rnams kyis dbang bsku'o// de nas rdo rje phyag rgyas dbang bskur te// de nas gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gza' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
296b2(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la kun tu dus thams cad du// de kho na bzhin du thad bgyi'o// / 
296b3(rgyud): de nas rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam rnam so// tshes dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / mjug phod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de
296b4(rgyud): bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thad du sems ca na chen po'i bka' mi bcag cing dpon po bzhin du bskyang ba
296b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljong sa dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas thams cad so sor bskyab par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i
296b6(rgyud): tshan yang des bdag cag mchod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jigs pa de mi 'byung // // de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas
296b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rnams kyis gsang ba'i snying po rnams 'bul// klu chen po rnams legaso leg so// gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig/ de nas
296b8(rgyud): de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// oM phu/ oM phu/ aM phaM/ oM phu/ oM hrI/ oM pAM/ oM po/ oM pheM/ de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad/ 
297a1(rgyud): pad+machen po 'ad ba brgyad pa// kha dag dkar po legs par gr-i/ dkyil 'khor de la dbus bzhugs pa// phyag na rdo rje rab tu nag/ sbrul mag mtha' yas gdengs yahA/ 
297a2(rgyud): ltos 'gro chen pa bsngags pa bri/ mtha' yas 'jog pa de bzhin du/ stobs kyi chu dang rigs ldan dang / nor rgyas bu dang dung srong dang / pad+ma chu bdag de bzhin du// mngor na 'dab ma re la/ de
297a3(rgyud): ngag sbrul mgo 'bar ba thaM/ sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yi// mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas pa bri/ bum pa brgyad rnams bzhag bya ste// gtsor ma lnga bshes mdzes pa dang / mar dang 'o
297a4(rgyud): ma spang rtsir bcas/ bcos pa'i dbye ba rnams kyang // rdo rje'i bdag nyid bzhugs pa ni// sbrul mgos sbrul mgoHna rnams dgug/ phud ces bya ba lhan cig ste// rtsub moHzhes
297a5(rgyud): lda // nas rgyal po'am rgyal rigs na/ de dag thams cad bcu gnasas dug gi ces smyon bsal ra/ phud ces bya bas dbang bskur ra/ nanas ma ma
297a6(rgyud): bas kyang // klu rnams de dag thams cad 'grub/ de nas de dag kun mgunas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te// spyan sngar thal mo sbyar 'khong nas// smon lam rab tu 'debs par
297a7(rgyud): 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gang dag dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de dag bslus par gyur na de'i tshe/ 
297a8(rgyud): ldan 'das 'di cing la slus par gyur cig/ de'i tshe bdag bye chen gyis bsregs par gyur cig/ rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas bdag cag gi mga'i sems par gyur cig/ drag par dus thang du
297b1(rgyud): chen po de srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// gzi byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi'o// de'i dug rnams dug ma mchis par bgyi'o// dus dang dusu char dpa
297b2(rgyud): par bgyi'o// me tog thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi g.yul thams cad la dus dang dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa thams cad bskyed par bgyi'o// 
297b3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bka' dang rdo 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa bshad de/ lha rdzas 'od 'phro dkar po can// klu rnams 'dud pas gnas pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin gtse bsams na
297b4(rgyud): ni 'phud ces bya ba 'bum du bzlas// de nas dug gis zin pa la// phud ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// lha rdzas 'od zer phreng ba 'khrigs// bsams nas de la phung yig bas/ 
297b5(rgyud): lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang // phud kyis rlung gi lpags pa sha// rus gnas phud kyi rnam pa'i dug/ mtha' ngag drangs te gso bar bya// de nas las rnams kun byed cing / 
297b6(rgyud): dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa/ khu tshur gyis kyang kun sal na// sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos// de nas lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po 'jigs byed chen po'i ma mo chen mo brgyad
297b7(rgyud): kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jigs pa dang ma mo rnams kyis 'jigs pas lha dang klu la
297b8(rgyud): sogs pa kun tu skrag rnam par skrag te kha bub tu 'gyel nas gos dang bral te/ sems stor nas kun tu 'phyan pa dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag gi snying po 'bul bar
298a1(rgyud): 'tshal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs par byin gyis brlab du gsol// 'jigs byed chen po leg so legs// rab tu 'jigs par byed pas rang nyid dang lha'i bu ma
298a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po rnams shog cig/ de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// oM b+hai ra ba bai ra swA hA/ oM b+ha swA hA/ oM b+hi swA hA/ oM b+hu swA hA/ 
298a3(rgyud): oM b+he swAH/ oM b+haM swA hA/ oM b+hau swA hA/ oM b+haM swA hA/ oM b+haHswAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po ni// brgyad po de dag gangadam ngag nyan// de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de// 'khor
298a4(rgyud): lo chen po rtsibs brgyad bri// dbus phyag na rdo rje ni khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum/ rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya gzhag// de yi zhabs 'og ma rungs pa// 'jigs byed rnams kyi bdag
298a5(rgyud): po che// 'jigs byed ma dang bcas pa br-i/ bas kyi nang rnams thams cad du// gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni// ma mo rnams dang ldan pa ni// khros pa'i bzhin dang
298a6(rgyud): yid khros par// ci bde bar ni bri bar bya// 'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du/ sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri// de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas// bkug ste mgo bo'i thod pa ni// khrag gis gang
298a7(rgyud): bas mchod na su/ sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang / snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang // mgo thod mgo yi dum bu dang // khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brgyad// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni
298a8(rgyud): bzhag par bya// de nas 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// mchog gis slob ma rnams gzhug bya// thod pa dang ni bum pa yang // brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskuro// de nas las rnams sbyin pa/ 
298b1(rgyud): byas ma mo'i khyim mam mtshan gcig par/ 'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog/ tshul bzhin du ni mchod byas nas// 'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya// de nas 'dzegs par byed pa'i smras/ 
298b2(rgyud): bdag nyid chen pos thos gyur te// mi 'jigs pa ni thod pa ru// khrag mchog bkang ba'i arga dbul// de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa// ma rungs yid can ma mo ni// tshogs kyis bskor cing
298b3(rgyud): 'jigs byed ni// brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// de mthong 'jigs pa med byas la/ hUM zhes bya ba dran byed cing // sha 'am yang na chang mchog gis// thod pa bkang ste dbul bar
298b4(rgyud): byasade nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms/ mgu zhing rab tu 'grub gyur nas// ci 'dod smos shig zhes bya ba// mgu ba'i yid kyis de spyan byed/ sa rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs
298b5(rgyud): par// ro dang bcud len rdzas dang ni// ral gri 'a khor lo rtse gsum dang // mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og dang // gling dang gling bzhi'i rgyal srid dang / brgya byin nyid dang gnod sbyin
298b6(rgyud): dbang // srin po nyid dang rig 'dzin nyid// rig 'dzin 'khor lo bsgyur ba nyid // 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po nyid// bka' nyan nyid kyang rang nyid dam/ ma mo'i tshogs rnams ser bar
298b7(rgyud): 'gyur// dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni// ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya/ hUM gis rnam par mngon phyogs shing // byin nas dgod cing 'gro bar byed// skrag na de ma thag tu gsod// de nas
298b8(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa lnga chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis
299a1(rgyud): bka' gnang na rang gi rtog pa bshad par 'tshal gyis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol// de nas tshangs
299a2(rgyud): pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyi rang rang gi snying po rnams bshad // oM a/ oM bi/ oM ru/ oM i/ oM kaM/ oM ga/ oM br-i/ oM ka/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma
299a3(rgyud): bzhin bris la/ dbusu 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba/ de yi 'dun du dpa' bo ni// dbang phyug lag na rtse gsum bri// rgyab tu tshangs pa'i rnam par bri// g.yon du lag na 'khor lo can// g.yas
299a4(rgyud): na dbang po rang nyid kyi// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri/ sgo skyong rang bzhin 'dir de rnams/ chung ma rang gi dkyil 'khor du/ bum pa bum pa bkang ba yang // phyi rol dkyil
299a5(rgyud): 'khor du ni bzhag/ stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen yang // / de nas 'jug bya lha rnams yin// mkhas pas kun nas smra na drang zhing // dzaHhUM baM hos lha thams cad kho
299a6(rgyud): brang dam par 'jug par mdzod// de nas de rnams gshegs bltas nas// dga' ba chen po mchod par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// phyag rgya slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ oM pra tits+tsha d+ha/ 
299a7(rgyud): ma hA satwa badz+ra d+ha ra a dzA ya hUM ha ha ha ha ho// me tog ji lta bzhin du dor// mig phye nas ni bstan par bya// de nas mngon par bsngags pa yi// bum pa'i chu yis dbang bsku ro// de nas lha rnams
299a8(rgyud): gang 'dod pa// dngos grub rab tu sbyin par bya// 'bum phrag gcig gam 'bum phrag gnyis// sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni// dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog ni// de rnams sgrub pa po
299b1(rgyud): yis 'grub/ mtshan ma gcig pa la sogasu'am// yang na phyag na rdo rje'i gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ngam/ rang bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du// lha rnams thams cad chog
299b2(rgyud): bzhin// sgrub pa po yis rtag tu sgrub// de nas nam phyed na ni lha// 'ongs nas khyod kyi 'dod pa ci// ji ltar bde zhing phan pa ni// sbyin zhes nges par go bar byed// bzang po nyur du sems te smos// 
299b3(rgyud): gang phyir mchog ni khyod la sbyin// de nas sngags shes dngos grub dang // mchog gi lha la gsol ba gang ba// lha rdzas bcud dang bcud len dang // mi snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang // ril bu
299b4(rgyud): rgyal srong rdzas la sogs// yid 'dod tshad mang gsol ba gi dang// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'ang sa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
299b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'a ngas pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag gi bcom ldan 'a ngas bdag cag lha rnams kyis sgrib pa thad
299b6(rgyud): rnam par sbyang ngo // mtho ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o// bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o// sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// 
299b7(rgyud): rnar 'byed pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// nyon mongs pa
299b8(rgyud): med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// sang+yas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gru/ 
300a1(rgyud): / pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thang las srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'gro/ 
300a2(rgyud): dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams srung bar bgyi'o// yul dang phyogs dang grong khyer rnams kyang srung bar bgyi'o// rgyal po yang brtsal bar bgyi'o// rgyal po thob pa'i rgyal po che bar
300a3(rgyud): bgyi'o// gling gcig dang gling gnyis dang // gling gsum dang / gling bzhi pa dang / bde 'gro dang / sa stengs dang / sra 'og gi 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams sul bar bgyi'o// mdor na brgya
300a4(rgyud): byin nyid dang // tshangs pa nyid dang / khyab 'jug nyid dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang nyid kyi 'khor la gzis

300a6(rgyud): 'bar rab tu 'bar/ yang dag par rab tu 'bar/ dga' rab tu dga'/ yang dag par rab tu dga'/ rtse rab tu rtse yang dag par rab tu rtse zhing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yang dag par rab tu

300b1(rgyud): bstan du gsol// de nas bac+doMs phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i chog gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang sngon sadus
300b2(rgyud): thams cad kyis bshad pa 'chi bdag zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'joms par byed pa'i rig pa'i sngags gzi brjid chen po nyon cig/ de nas bac+doMs
300b3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun tu dga' zhing ba spu langs shing phyag 'tshal nas leg so zhes bya ba rab tu phul te/ bcom ldan 'das legaso legaso//

300b7(rgyud): pha rol gnon pa'i rig pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lnga rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin
300b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thaMd kyi snying po rig pa 'di rang gi sku gsung thugs rdo las phyu'o// oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa rtsi te swA hA/ snying po'i rig pa'o// 
301a1(rgyud): oM badz+ri swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM b+h+rUM swA hA/ snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM tra~M swA hA/ snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o// oM trA swAH/

301a4(rgyud): ni khro bo ste/ kr-i zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.yas su na mkha'i snying po ste/ trAM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// rgyab tu 'pha gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa
301a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba ste/ hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la reg par bri'o// bum pa lnga dang brkyang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags kyis
301a6(rgyud): btab la bzhago// las thod pas mngon par bsngags pa yang // bdug pa la sogs bzhago// mchod pa'i dang po can sgo skyong thad nyid kyang // de nas sngags pa yang dag par 'jug pa'i

301a8(rgyud): nas bdag nyid dbang bskur ste/ skyil mo krung gi 'dug la stong phrag brgyar bzlaso// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ 'phaT pa spyan/ 
301b1(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gam/ ji ltar 'dang pa'i mchog so sor thob bo// gang gi tshe mnyam par gzhag pa de'i tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyuraro// de nas slob mam
301b2(rgyud): bzhug ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas nga rgyal 'di skyed par bya ste/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ bi shwa d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya a ni ti kra ma/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+hA ra ko&ho zhes

302a1(rgyud): gnod byed dang / tha ma smod la brtson pa rnams/ mkhas pas bsgrims te bsad par bya// chos mi ldan dang sreg pa dag/ rtag tu sems can gnod brtson dang /

302a3(rgyud): rgyu mtshan dang // de bzhin dam tshig sgrub pa dang // dkyil 'khor don dang rgyal sras la// mchod pa'i don phyir bsams pa yis// nor 'phrog 'jungs pa'i nor yang 'ong // sems can

302a5(rgyud): tshig rnams ni srung ba dang // sngags rig pa yis sgrub pa 'i phyir// gzhan gyi bud med kyang sten bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug pas// thams cad spyod cing

302a8(rgyud): bya/ rdzas dang nor dang 'bru rnams dang // rta dang gzhon pa nyid dang ni// bran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang // rgyal srid dbang phyug de bzhin te/ bu dang bu mo chung ma dang // ma dang sring mo tsha mau dang // 
302b1(rgyud): / gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni// phan pa'i bsam pas bla ma dbul// de nas dngos grub sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sgrub dang gzhan yang ni// 'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams// ji ltar

303b8(rgyud): chen chu skyes mchog/ nga nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ phyi rol rdo rje rigs rnams kyi// phyag rgya rnams ni phyi rol bri// gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang / 
304a1(rgyud): / de ltar 'jig rten 'khor rnams kyang // gtso ba'i ra mo lugs ma dang // rdo rje can dang lhan cig banag/ bum pa bum pa gang ba dang // gtor ma lnga ba shes shin tu dag gamado
304a2(rgyud): na thig ni btab nas kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkar po'i gos ni gyon na su// sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas// ngan song 'gro bar gnas pa yi// san de rjes dran byed cing /

304b1(rgyud): mngar ba yi// gzhu ni kha dog dmar po bri// sngags 'dzin pa yis rtag par yang // phyi rol de yi lha yi bya// sems can de ni dran byas la// na gza' dmar po rgyan pa yi// me tog dmar zhi
304b2(rgyud): pad+ma yang // 'bras bu dmar dang khams bcas pa// mar dang gur gum bsres pa dang // tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma dang // sbyin sreg byas nas lha la sogs// thad de yi dbang du 'gyur//

304b4(rgyud): rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ rtse gsum pa yis mu ran bya/ sna tshogs rdo rje yang byas la/ dbyug pa mgo dang rtse gsum rnams/ dza dgra sta rtse gcig gis// phyi rol du yang mtshan
