304b6(rgyud): tu yang // de nas gos nag bgos shing khros// rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// lus can de yi sdig la sogs// de nas de yi sdig bcom zhing // bgegs dang bral ta ci bde ba/ 
304b7(rgyud): mtho ris 'jig rten mi rnams nyid// ji snyed khams gsum 'jig rten spyod// myur du go rims 'di nyid kyis// tshe 'dir gnas pa rnams la bya// de nas gang gi phyir byas pa// de yi phyi ni
304b8(rgyud): de bzhin 'gyur// gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kyang // snga ma ji bzhin de bzhin bya/ do na san rnams la yang // myur du bde skyid 'grub par 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha
305a1(rgyud): rnams yang dag par dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang ngan song du skyes pa'i seMn rnams kyi don da
305a2(rgyud): phan yon dang bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dri ba dang 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo de bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongasu bas
305a3(rgyud): bar bgyi ste/ yang ji ltar bshad pa ma tshang ba med par bgyid pa lta ci smos/ gang yang rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu dang rgyal po'i blon po ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags rje su slob pa de'i rgyu
305a4(rgyud): srid 'phel bar bgyi'o// yul dang phyogs dang skye bo'i gnas dang 'khor gyi skye bo'i lo thog la sogs pa yang srung bar bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi'o// bud med pa
305a5(rgyud): skyes pa dang / khye'u dang bu mo rnams phun sum tshogs par/ yang bgyi'o// 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang bde bar bgyi'o// gang zhig brtags pa'i rgyal
305a6(rgyud): po 'di la dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te grong dang grong khyer la sogs par 'jug pa bdag nyid kyis bsdu bar yang ba gyi'o// glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang gre
305a7(rgyud): khyer la sogs pa thad du bskor bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyis tshul lam du
305a8(rgyud): tshul du gnas pa shes par bgyi'o// gang na 'di rab tu spyod pa de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rang nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhugs par
305b1(rgyud): 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongasu song ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugasu bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// sa
305b2(rgyud): phyogs de yang mchod rten du gyur pa 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o// kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// gang yang brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rab tu sbyong ba'i rdo rje
305b3(rgyud): sleb dpon dka' thub chen po la bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis g.yog bgyi'o// bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o// mngag gzhugs pa nyid du gnas par bgyi'o// 
305b4(rgyud): bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o// phan pa dang bde ba thang dngos grub stsal bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dor na de'i rkang pa'i rdul mgro bos gzung bar brgya
305b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de'i phyi bzhin du rjesu 'brad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba de kho bo cag gis
305b6(rgyud): mnga' bdag tu 'tshal bar bgyi'o// phyag na rdo rjer 'tshal bar bgyi'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// 
305b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa
305b8(rgyud): la sogs pa lha rnams gang chos la rim gro gcig gnyis byas pas de ltar yang dag pa'i dam bca' ni lag so legs par bsgrubs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na
306a1(rgyud): rdo rjes sngags dang rig pa dang / snying po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM hUM d+hu badz+ra pA Ni dz+ri D+hi taSh+T+rI n+tu/ oM hUM AHoM badz+ra hU~M phaT
306a2(rgyud): driD+ha badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra hUM sa/ oM badz+ra hUM aHde nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// dbusu rdo rje bri bar bya// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// kun tu bzang po bde
306a3(rgyud): ba che/ spyan sngar phyag ni rdo rje nyid// g.ya su phyag na rin chen spyan// phyag na pad+ma nub phyogs bri/ byang du phyag na sna tshogs bri// phyi rol du ni zlum por bskor// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// de
306a4(rgyud): yo phyi rol sems dpa' rnams// go rims bzhin du bri bar bya/ de yi phyi rol sems dpa' yang // byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri// de phyir de bzhin dge slong ni// kun dga'
306a5(rgyud): bo sogs thub pa bri// rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i/ chang sa pa la sogs phyi rol bri/ bza' dang rgyu skar nyi ma dang / rgyal po bzhi po rnams dang ni// phyogs skyong 'jig
306a6(rgyud): rten skyong ba rnams// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni yang dag bri/ phyi rol du ni dmyal ba sogs// klu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i dpe/ sgo dang sgor ni de bzhin du// sgo skyong stobs kyis dam pa rnams// 
306a7(rgyud): dkar po 'dod pa'i nyi ma la// rab tu 'bad pas dkyil 'khor bri/ gang bsngags nag po'i phyogs la yang // dkyil 'khor 'gal ba ma yin no// lnga pa rdo rjes bdun pa dang // nya gang ba ni/ 
306a8(rgyud): khyad par ni// bsngags de phyag na pad+ma yi// dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga la'o// gang yang drag po'i las rnams la// de ni nag po la yang bri/ khro bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang // zla ba
306b1(rgyud): / pa khyad par du// rgyal ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bsngags/ gzhan yang rang gis 'dus byas pa'i/ dkyil 'khor la brtson gdab bya zhing // shar nas 'char ba'i dbang bya ste// phyogs
306b2(rgyud): kyi cha ni brtag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni// yid kyis yongasu brtag par bya// sngags dang rgyud ni dang por byas// 'jam zhing sngags gzugs dge zhing zhi// rjes 'thun rang
306b3(rgyud): gi slob nyid kyi// slob ma lhan cig tsam gyis spyad// de nas nang par rab sngar langs// legs bkrus gos dkar 'chang zhing gtsang // blo ldan bla ma slob mar bcas// dkyil 'khor drung du
306b4(rgyud): kun nas 'gro// dkyil 'khor phyogs nyid shin tu yang // 1bar byugs shing legs par mnyes// khro bo chen po bzlas pa yi// dri yi chu yos bsams pa yis// dbusu rig
306b5(rgyud): rnams snying po yis// lhag par gnas par bya ba nyid/ dkyi la 'khor gyi ni gtso bo yi// sngags kyi las rnams thamasadapya// sa la sor ni bcu gnyis pa'i// dkyil
306b6(rgyud): 'khor dri yi byas na su// dkyil 'khor rig pas lan bdun du// lhag pa de nas bzlas par bya// de rjes lha rnams nyid kyi yang // byang chub chen po zhes bya ba'i// snying pos skal pa ji lta
306b7(rgyud): bar// dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa// byas nas gtor ma dbul bya zhing // mngon par bsngags pa'i spos kyang ngo // de nas tsan dan la sogs pa// bsres pa'i chu la mngon par bsngags/ 
306b8(rgyud): de la dbul ba'i me tog dang // bdug pa la yang cho ga bzhin/ so shing u dum ba ra dang // a shwad tha sogs rma med cing // shin tu phra min sdom pa min// sor mo bcu gnyis tshad tsam
307a1(rgyud): / ni 'dri yi chu yis rab bskus shing // me tog phreng ba yis kyang bcings// dri bzang la sogs byugs shing bdug/ lag pas reg na sring po ni// mang po yang ni bzlas bya
307a2(rgyud): zhing // rigs nyid kyi ni lan bdun nam// slob ma rnams kyi tshad gzhal bar/ so zhing la sogs yang dag gzung // gcig la sogs pas go rims bzhin// rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya// 
307a3(rgyud): de nas mkhas pas bdag nyid kyis// slob ma srung ba brtan byas nas// sbyin sregs las ni mar byugs pa'i// yam shing rnams ni mar dang bcas// sbrang rtsi mar dang bsres pa dang // mar
307a4(rgyud): gyi bsregs blugs bsreg bya zhing // zho zan gyi yang sbyin bsra gas bya// dang por bgegs ni zhi bya'i phyir// de nas thugs kyi rje sa 'dzin phyir// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg zhing / 
307a5(rgyud): sdig pa zhi bar bya phyir ram// de nas slob ma rnams brtags nas// cho ga yi ni lhag gnas bya// de yis ji ltar nus pa yis// de bzhin sdom pa bzung bar bya// de rnams cho ga 'a
307a6(rgyud): yin te// gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos can ni// mdun du bltas te 'dug pa la/ lhag par gnas par brtsam par bya/ bla mas dang por skyabs gsum sbyin// de yi rjes la byang chub sama?/ 
307a7(rgyud): ma skyes pa ni bskyed bya zhing // bskyed pa slar yang rjes dran bya// de nas khro bo mngon bzlas pa'i// chu yis spyi bor gsang gtor bya// mgo bor kun tu reg nas ni// mnyam par gzhag par lan
307a8(rgyud): bdun bzlas// rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni// lag pas dri bzang sngags pa la/ 'jigs pa bzlog la mkhas pa yis// lan bdun rtag tu bzlas par bya// 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po
307b1(rgyud): yis// rig pa'i rgyal po yig gcig/ rta 'grin chu skyes rigs la ni// rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge bcu/ suM b+ha zhes bya rdo rje rigs/ rigs pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// yi ge hUM bzhi rnams
307b2(rgyud): dang ldan// las kun rab tu spros pa la'o// rigs gsum rnams la thun mong ba// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba nyid// bgegs kun rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir// gsang ba pa yi bdag po
307b3(rgyud): gsungs// las ni thams cad pa yi sngags// spyi bor reg cing bzlas de nas/ gsang gtor yang bya de nyid kyis// bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya// dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas// 
307b4(rgyud): 'bru la sogs pa tha~Md ldan// cung zad cung zad gang du blug sa// rig pa'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags// cho ga bzhin du lhag granas bya// dri yi chu yis mchod yon sbyin// me tog
307b5(rgyud): kyang ni gzhug par bya// gdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya/ dbang bskur pa ni bum pa bcas// mkhas pas yang dag yongasu bzlas// de yis dbang bskur bya ba yin/ 
307b6(rgyud): slar yang bzlas pa dkyil 'khor du// slob ma dam tshig can rnams ni// thal mo sbyar zhing mngon phyogs la// de nas so shing sbyin par bya// slob ma rnams ni go rims bzhin/ gzung / 
307b7(rgyud): shing shar du kha bltas te/ phyi rol nyid du so shing bca'// mags par ni mchos na su// logs ma yin par dor bya ste/ so shing mdun du dor byas pa/ gang tshe mdun du rtse mo
307b8(rgyud): lhung // de tshe dngos grub mchog shes bya// gang zhig steng du bltas pa yang // de bzhin shar du rtse mo bstan// dngos grub 'bring du yongasu grags/ byang du bltas na thang ka ci / 
308a1(rgyud): rig pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten pa/ so shing dor ba brgyal lam du// gang che 'og tu kha bltas pa/ de tshes 'og dngos grub ni// 'byung ba 'di la the tshom ma
308a2(rgyud): slob ma nye bar reg pa ni/ snga ma bzhin du bzung byas la/ thams cad las byed sngags kyis ni// bla mas dri bzang chu sbyin no// re re la yang btung ba'i phyir// khyor ba gsum ni sbyin
308a3(rgyud): par bya// de nas blo ldan langs nas su// 'di dag kun tu spyad par bya// de nas mchod pa yang byas nas// lag pas spos ni bteg na su// blo ldan gus pas lnga rnams la// gsol ba gdab
308a4(rgyud): cing gus gnas bya// dang por sngags ni bstan gsan dang ga/ de yi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa// de yis rim pa'i sbyin pa yis// lha rnams spyan 'dren pa yin no// bcom
308a5(rgyud): ldan che ge mo zhes bya// rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud/ slob ma rnams la rtse phyir dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rje la/ 
308a6(rgyud): bdag nyid kyang ni bri bar 'tshal// bcom ldan de ni bdag gus la// bka' drin mdzad pa rigs lag so// 'jig rten mgon po brtse ba can// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // 
308a7(rgyud): dgra bcom gang gzhan sngags kyi lha/ lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang // 'byung po rdzu 'phrul che gang dang // sangs rgyas bstan la mngon dga' rnams// bdag la yang dag
308a8(rgyud): dgongasu gsol// che ge mo zhes bya ba dang // che ge mo yi dkyil 'khor ni/ rang nying 'byung bar bgyid par 'tshal/ ji ltar gus pa'i nyer spyod kyis// slob ma dang bcas bdag la/ 
308b1(rgyud): ni/ rje su brtse bas nyer bzung nas// dkyil 'khor dang bcas thams cad ni// nye bar byon par mdzad par rigs// de skad smra te tshig gang zhig/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas// 
308b2(rgyud): bstod pa'i nyer spyod kyang byas nas// de dag gshegasu gsol bar bya// chags bral so sor ldan pa yi// slob ma rnams la chos bshad bya// blo ldan shar du mgo bstan te// dge ba'i
308b3(rgyud): gnyid kyis nyal du gzhug/ de nas snga dro nyid du ni// mtshan mo'i rmi lam mthong ba bri// gang tshe dge pa'am mi dag pa// dogs med nyin par thos na su// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas ni/ 
308b4(rgyud): rigs bdun rnams kyi dam tshig kyang // de nas bu khyod dam tshig dang // sdom pa rgyal ba yis gsungs pa// dang pa'i bla ma 'i bka' yang bskyang // khyed kyis srog chags
308b5(rgyud): bsang mi bya/ ma byin mi blang 'dod log dang / dngos grub 'dod pas mi bya'o// chang mo btung shing sha la sogs/ bza' ba nam yang ma yin nyid// sems can kun la/ 
308b6(rgyud): gnod mi bya// dkon mchog gsum yang mi spang zhing // dus rnams kun tu byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang // bla ma lha rnams de bzhin nyid// bla ma'i bka' las
308b7(rgyud): 'da' mi bya// gang las sdig 'gyur de las 'da'// de la phul ba'i rnying pa dang // grib ma la yang 'gom mi bya/ phyag rgya'i rnam pa'ang de bzhin nyid/ sngags dang lha la mi smad cing // gdon
308b8(rgyud): gyi las rnams mi bya'o// mu stegs pa yang smad mi bya// mdor na bdag nyid the tshom dang // som nyi yid gnyis mi bya ste// rgyad dang lha tshogs la de bzhin// dad pa brtan pas dam bcas nas// 
309a1(rgyud): sa rba bid kyis dbang de bzhin/ bum pa la sogs mchog rnams kyis/ dbang bskur bcu po 'dod ji bzhin// de nas lag na rdo rje dang // dril bu skyon bya de rjes la/ 
309a2(rgyud): 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun// bzung nas 'khor los bsgyur ba yi// rgyal po dbang phyug thob phyir dang // sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang bskur zhing // sngags sgrub 'dod pa'i slob
309a3(rgyud): ma la/ rjesu gnang ba mnyan du gzhug/ de nas bstod pas mgo bo yis// phyag 'tshal ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas// bla ma la ni dbul bya ste/ rin chen gter dang 'bru dang dbyig/ gser dang
309a4(rgyud): bzhon pa khyim dang gdan// bu dang bu mo skyes pa dang // bud na/ du rnams ni dbul bya zhing // grong dang grong khyer ci bzhed rnams// / rang gi sems ni rab dang bas// yon rnams
309a5(rgyud): nges par dbul bya zhing // dngos grub myur phyir bla ma la/ mdor na bdag nyid kyang 'bul bya// tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang // 'jig rten pha rol bde ba'i mchog/ 
309a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur te// lha yi bde ba lta ci smos// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa gang // de yis rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob/ de phyir slob
309a7(rgyud): dpon smad mi bya// rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang // gang yang smad par mi bya zhing // khon par yang ni mi bya'o// dkon mchog sum la gnod byed dang // bla ma smod byed ma rungs rnams/ 
309a8(rgyud): dam tshig 'das la bzod mi bya// de lta bu sogs gnod byed la'ang // de lta nyid do de byas na// kun rigs gis gsungs dngos grub thob// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// 
309b1(rgyud): dngos grub myur du 'byung ba 'thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po dang / lha dang bcas pa la 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs
309b2(rgyud): te/ bri gzhi la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de kho na bzhin du bri zhing g.yasu de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i rgyal po dang / g.yon du shAkya thub pa
309b3(rgyud): dang / ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma can dang // shAkya thub pa'i 'og na phyag
309b4(rgyud): na rdo rje dang / de dag gi dbu su sman pa'i rgyal po phyag gci ga gis a ru ra'i 'bras bu bsnams shing de las gzhan ni mchog sbyin du bya'o// rta mgrin dang 'jig rten
309b5(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms pa la brtson pa dag ni rang gi lha la mngon par phyogs par bri zhing de dag gi dbu su lo tsan dang / mA ma kI
309b6(rgyud): dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dag phyag na rang gi mtshan ma can bri'o// de rnams kyi 'og tu rdzing bu chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po la sogs pa dang
309b7(rgyud): bcas pa chu las skyes pa'i me tog du mas yongasu gang bar bri zhing 'dug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / zhal zas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs
309b8(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// 'og nyid du sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar te rab tu 'dug cing 'dud par bri'o// de nas de rdzogs pa la byin gyis brlab pa dmigs par bya ste/ spyan dbye ba byas nas
310a1(rgyud): mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de nas gal te mtshan ma mthong na myur du 'grub po// gal te ma mthong na ring mo zhig na 'grub pa'o// bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang / dril bu'i sgra
310a2(rgyud): dang 'brug sgra nyid// dge slong bram ze bu mo dang // 'bras bu mthong na dngos grub ni// mchog 'bring tha ma myur du 'grub// de nas sku gzugs phyag rgya dang // sngags rnams kyis ni byin gyis
310a3(rgyud): brlabs// ji ltar bskyed pas thob bya zhing // 'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal gyis// bdag srung la sogs byas nas su// bdag gi de nyid kyang bsgoms nas// ji srid dngos grub rtags
310a4(rgyud): 'byung ba// 'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas/ de nas dben pa'i gnasu ni// sngags kyang chad lhag bkang bya ste// / brgya phrag brgyad rnams bzlas par bya// de nas bzlas
310a5(rgyud): ba de yi mthar// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la/ mchod pa rgya chen yang byas nas// mtshan mo gcig ni bzlas pa ra bya// de nas gal te gtso bo 'am// sras sam
310a6(rgyud): lha rnams mthong gyur na// de tshe snod 'dod ji lta bar/ dngos grub mchog ni gsol ba gdag lha rnams rtag tu dgyes pa yis// dngos grub 'bras bu de la stsol// phyag byas kyang ni dngos gru
310a7(rgyud): ni// mchog la sogs pa blang bar bya// bla ma dkon mchog gsum po la// rang rang skal pa phul nas ni// de nas rtag tu bdag nyid spyad// de rnams med na shes rab can// blangs nas rang nyid spyad/ 
310a8(rgyud): par bya// sems can kun la phan brtson zhing // bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur// legs par bsgrubs na thang byed// gnod sbyin rgyu skar gdong la sogs// tshig tsam gyis ni bran pa ni/ 
310b1(rgyud): du ba zhi ba'i las la sogs pa ni// thams cad byed par 'gyur ba yin// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems
310b2(rgyud): can sdig pa bgyis pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams kyis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu spang ba'i phyir ji ltar sgrub par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis
310b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de rnams dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams las tshegs med
310b4(rgyud): par grol bar 'gyur ba de nyid de bzhin du nyon cig/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa yi// bum pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin// dbang bskur ba ni rtag
310b5(rgyud): par bya// de nas sngon gyi sdig byang zhing // dmyal ba la sa gas sdug bsngal ni// kun las myur du rnam grol 'gyur// snga ga las rnal grol bdag nyid che// de yang gnas
310b6(rgyud): gtsang ltar skyes nas/ rtag tu sangs rgyas chos bkra thos// phyir mi bzlog pa'i sa la gnas/ rims kyis byang chub mngon sum byed// de yi gzugs brnyan dang ni mong // gur gum
310b7(rgyud): gyis ni bris nasu// ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs chen las// sems can rnams ni thar pa'i phyir// sngags pa gzhan la phan brtson zhing // brtse bas mngon par dbang bsku ro// de nas rnam/ 
310b8(rgyud): 'byor can gyis ni/ sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te// lha yi gzugasu brtags na su// mchod rten dbusu bzhag par bya// rang gzhan lha yi snying po ni// snying kha de yi phyogs
311a1(rgyud): bris nas/ lha mnyam par ni sems bskyed de// khyim du yang ni gzhag par bya// de yi ming dang spel ba'i sngags// gur gum bzang pos bris nas ni/ 'bum ni yongasu rdzog
311a2(rgyud): bar du// mchod rten las ni rab tu bya// sdig chen sdig ni zad bya'i phyir// bye ba yang ni rdzogs par bya// de ltar byas na de nges par// dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur// de bzhin yi dwags byol
311a3(rgyud): song las// grol te lha rigs rnamasu skyes// de yi ming dang spel nas ni// ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags stong bzlas// gal te brgya phrag stong yang tshang // bye ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya// lha'i
311a4(rgyud): rigs rnams skye bar 'gyur// de yi ming nas spel ba yi// mkha sa pas 'bum khrag brgya 'am ni/ yang na brgya phrag spong snyed du// spyi na sreg byas na dmyal ba ni/ chen po'i sdog pa las/ 
311a5(rgyud): grol 'gyur// ji srid mtshan ma 'bar ba yi// gnasu yang da ga skye bar 'gyur// nyungs kar dkar po'i til dang 'bras// yi 'o ma yang dag ldan// de bskus yam shing
311a6(rgyud): de srid du cho ga ji bzhin skyon bsreg bya// de nas de ni nges par yang // lha rigs rnamasu skyes pa yi// mtshan ma nye bar mthong bar gyur// gal te lha yi mchog skyes dang // yang na thab khung
311a7(rgyud): nang du ni// dkar po g.yas bskor 'bar ba dang // gyen du 'greng zhing dri ma med// 'phro ba sdoms bzhin 'bar ba dang // glog bzhin dri ma med 'od bstan/ me rtags 'di rnams mthong ba
311a8(rgyud): 'gyur// yang na me lha bdag nyid ni// de bzhin kho nar ston 'gyur te// zla ba bzhin du dri ma med// dkar po bzhin mdog 'bar ba'o// mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba la// de nas dmyal sogs/ 
311b1(rgyud): rnams grol zhing // sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni// skyes pa yin par shes par bya/ khru bzhi pa laM tshad du ni// cho ga ji bzhin thab khung ba'o// rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi// 'khor lo dbu su
311b2(rgyud): bri bar bya// rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams// ji bzhin rang gi phyogasu bri// ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 'jig rten la sogs phyin nas br-i// de nas bum pa gang ba dang // gtor mas
311b3(rgyud): snod rnams bkang ba ni/ brgyad dam bcu drug dag tu bzhag/ bza' dang bcas pa zhal zas dang // me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te// bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs// gdugs mchog
311b4(rgyud): rnams kyis legs par rgyan// de ltar sbyin sreg thab khung ni/ mchog tu yang dag sbyin sreg bya// cho ga shes pas de bris nas// lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs te// sngags shes
311b5(rgyud): pas sngags phyag rgya yis/ arga la sogs phul nas ni ma dor bsdus mchod par byas nasu/ lnga yi sbyor bas rab gnas la/ ga bur gur gum la sogs pas/ mar
311b6(rgyud): 'o ma til bsgos la/ til dang nyungs kar 'bras rnams dang // dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste// 'bras chan spos dang la du ba/ sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan la// brgya phrag du mar longasu bzlas/ 
311b7(rgyud): yam shing la yang de bzhin te/ rang gis sngags kyis btab pa'i shing // khung bu'i nang du bzhag par bya// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za sogasu gnas pa yi// ro la sngags kyis
311b8(rgyud): btab na su// chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas ni// sngags bzlas dri yis byug par bya// gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan bya zhing // sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug/ me tog phreng
312a1(rgyud): ba la sogs mchog/ gtsug pud dpung par de bzhin du// sngags bris nas ni gdags par bya// snying kha mgrin pa kha phyogasu// sarba bi d+has byin gyis brlabs/ dpral
312a2(rgyud): ba mdzod spu na pa gnyis// mgo bo spyi gtsug dpung pa gnyis// rna ba gnyis dang dbus mo bo la// sna yi rtse mo long bu dang // mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi// dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni// 
312a3(rgyud): ltar gzhan du'ang gnas yi ge// mchog tu dge ba de dag gzhag/ de dag ngan song yongs sbyangs phyir// stan dang bcas te thab dbus gzhag/ de nas sngags pas sngags kyis ni// mngon pa
312a4(rgyud): sngags pa'i gos kyis g.yogs// de nas byin za yang dag rab spang la// me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus// / zla ba kun de bzhin du zhi ba'i yid// dpag med kun
312a5(rgyud): la mchod yon yongasu brtag/ de bzhin ji ltar gsungs pa 'i mchod pa bya// de nas dang po de yi sbyin sreg ni// rdzogs par byas shing 'bar ba nyid la ni// yongs brtags
312a6(rgyud): nas ni rgyal ba las// sogs pa rnams kyi brgyad ni lhag pa dang // bcas pa'i brgya ni yongasu brtag par bya// de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po yang // bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu
312a7(rgyud): brtag/ de nas zhal ras dkar po spyan drangs la/ yo byad rnams sam mchod yon sogs gsum mchod// phyag na rdo rje pad+ma zhags pa bsnams// rgyan rnams thad kyis ni rab brgyan ci
312a8(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbu rgyan can// bsam par bya zhing yang ni bri bar bya// de yi snying po brgya phrag stong ngam ni// ji srid bye ba'i bar du sbyin bsreg bya// yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung / 
312b1(rgyud): na ni// de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs par shes par bya// de nas thal bar 'gyur ba cho ga bzhin// rdo bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dri chu dang nye ba yi rnam lnga dang bcas la// sbyong ba
312b2(rgyud): sngags ni 'bum bzlas te// gong bu byas nas ga bur drir// sa dang legs par bsres byas la/ sku gzugs mchod rten lhar bsam zhing // lan gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am// yang na lan
312b3(rgyud): grangs brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin rlabs la// 'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas par bya// de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam// yang na sku gzugs zhal 'dzum mam// dri spos dang ldang
312b4(rgyud): 'od snang ngam/ lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul na ra 'phrul pa dang / me tog la sogs 'dor ba dang / dung dang rnga dang glang bu dang // pi wang la sogs sgra thos 'gyur
312b5(rgyud): gal te lha yi mtshan ma de// sdig mang nyid kyis ma mthong ba/ de tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong bzlas// ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni// mnyam par
312b6(rgyud): gzhag pas bzlas par byas// de mthar cho ga shes pa yis// mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas// de nas de yi sdig pa ni// rnam dag bdag nyid nges par mthong // lha yi lus kyis gzugs
312b7(rgyud): dang ni// de yi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur// mtshan ma 'di dag shes na su// nar mi rtog sems kyis ni// byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// las rnams thang rab tu bya// gal te de yang med gyuran/ 
312b8(rgyud): de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyi bya// de yi ming tsam bris na su// mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang // sku gzugs kyang ni byas nas// sbyin sreg dbang bskur byas gyur na/ gdon mi za bar ba
313a1(rgyud): 'gyur gyi/ bral bzung kar byem sogs/ mang spel sngags ni mngon pa mnas/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i mu klung ngo/  ltar byas na sdig pa can/ yon yang ngan songs
313a2(rgyud): las ni// rnam par thar par gyur nas kyang // dge ba mchog gi sa bon ni// bskyed dang ldan pas sangs rgyas nyid// 'bras bur yang dag ldan pa yi// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson
313a3(rgyud): 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rgyu// rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan// 'jig rten ngan song bcom pa ni// 'di ltar lha yang ci zhig smos// 'di la the tshom med pa yin// gang yang dag pa
313a4(rgyud): rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / gang yang meng pa'i lha ba can dang / gang byang chub kyi lam las rnam par 'das pas bstan pa la zhe sdang gis gnod pa byed pa dang / sdig pa'i rang
313a5(rgyud): bzhin mi shes pa pa dang ma la sems mi ba rtse ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la mi brten pa dang / 'dod cha/ sa dang bral ba bsad pa dang / lha dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos
313a6(rgyud): dang / dge 'dun dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la med pa nyid du lta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams la de lta bu'i shes rab can dang thabs med na grol ba
313a7(rgyud): med do zhes pa/ bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsung so// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa spyan pad+ma rgyas pa rnams lagaso zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzad// mnyes par mdzad
313a8(rgyud): nas mchod pa mdzad do// brgya byin gzhan la phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du byas// 'bras bu de bzhin du thob par gyur to// dbang ldan du 'grin pa sngon po glang khyu
313b1(rgyud): mchog la zhen pa// sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa'i dang po dang gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang mchog sbyin du bcas pa/ g.yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing tu
313b2(rgyud): bas ral gri 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te/ oM pa shu pa ti nI la kaN+Tha um pr-i ya swA hA zhes pa 'dis// de nas phyag rgya 'di yin te/ lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas pa
313b3(rgyud): mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje mtshan nyid du byas shing ming med dang mdzub mo yang rdo rje'i rnam par cung zad mdud par bya'o// 'di ni phyugs bdag gi phyag
313b4(rgyud): rgya'o// khyab 'jug khyung la zhon pa mdog nag/ po phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na dbyug tho dang rdo rje 'dzin cing g.yon pa dag na dung dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// gser gyi rdorje
313b5(rgyud): mkhyab 'jug lnga bu gser gyi mdog can du shes par bya'o// dza dza dz+wal bu rma bya la zhon pa/ dmar po gal sa pa dag na shag ti dang rdo rje/ g.yon pa dag na khyim byung
313b6(rgyud): dril bu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gnon nu ma rdo rje dril bur shes par bya'o// mi smra ba rdo rje dang pa la zhon pa/ gser mdog can / zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'grang phreng
313b7(rgyud): 'dzin cing // g.yon pa dag na dbyug tho dang / spyi lugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje zhi ba mtshangs pa lta bur shes par bya'o// rdo rje mtshon cha glang po che dkar po la zhon pa/ phyag g.yon pas rang gi rnga
313b8(rgyud): rje 'dzin cing g.yas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje mtshon cha ltar shes pa bya'o// rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo yang shing rta la zhen pa/ mdog dmar po g.ya/ 
314a1(rgyud): ba dang / g.yon pa na pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi ma dang rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid do// rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar po ngang pa la zhan
314a2(rgyud): pa g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing // g.yon pas pad+ma dang / zla ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo rje khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa mdog sngon po phyag g.yas na rdo rje
314a3(rgyud): 'dzin cing // g.yon pas dbyug pa rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje dmar ser khro bo glang po che la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas mi
314a4(rgyud): bzung nas za zhing gnas pa'o// rdo rje skye rags ma dze rje dmar ser khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje tshogs bdag glang sna glang po che zhon pa can phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas gshol
314a5(rgyud): 'dzin cing gnas pas/ mdog dkar po'o//  rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna lta bu'o// 'di ni khyad par te gang na na/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje phreng ba chog
314a6(rgyud): kyi bdag po mdog ljang ku khya ku li ka'i shing rta zhon pa phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje phreng ba lta bu'o// 'di ni khyad par
314a7(rgyud): te gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis sha ka ti 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje dbang can tso'i shing rta zhon pa/ mdog dkar ser phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// 
314a8(rgyud): rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste 'don khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ mdog dmar po'o// rnam rgyal rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po sbal ba zhon pa mdog dkar po'o// phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 
314b1(rgyud): / g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gdengs pa ma rnams rgyal rdo rje lta bu'o// rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo me tog gi shing rta'i khang bu zhon pa mdog dkar ser phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin
314b2(rgyud): pa// g.yon pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rlung gi pho nya mdog
314b3(rgyud): sngon po ri dgas zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas dar 'dzin pa'o// mgyogs pa'i rdo rje ma rdo rje rlung gi pho nya lta bu'o// rdo rje me'i pho nya mor skyes zhon pa/ mdog
314b4(rgyud): dmar po gyen du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang go cha 'dzin pa/ g.yo na pa dag na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje
314b5(rgyud): 'bar ba rdo rje me lta bu'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed/ nya sngon por langs zhon pa phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o// ji gtsigs pa ponyam
314b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje lcags kyu bran klu lhag pa zhon pa sngon po phag gi gdong pa can g.yas pa rdo rje 'dzin
314b7(rgyud): pa/ g.yon pas lcaT kyu 'dzin pa'o// rdo nag po bran mo ro langs kyi zhon pa can/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa mdog nag mo// rdo rje log 'dren phran bra
314b8(rgyud): ba byaM ba zhon pa/ mdog dkar po glang po che'i gdong pa can/ phyag g.yas dag na rdo dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rtse gsum dang ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thob pa'o// 
315a1(rgyud): rdo rje srul mo bran mo mdog sngon mo// g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pa phyags ma 'dzin pa bra ba byaM ba zhon pa'o// klu rdo rje'i chu srin zhon pa gdengs ka brgyad pa/ 
315a2(rgyud): mdog dkar po g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje srin ma bran mo chu srin zhon pa/ mdog dkar mo gdengs ka brgyad ma g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 
315a3(rgyud): g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o// 'jigs mdog ma ljang ku g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas ral gri phe Ta ka 'dzin pa'o// dpal mo mdog dkar ser g.yas
315a4(rgyud): pas rdo rje 'dzin cing // g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// dbyangs can ma mdog dkar mo// phyag g.yon pas rba dang g.yas pas rdo rje ma'o// dgrod ka mdog ljang ku seng ge la zhon pa
315a5(rgyud): phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o// ma mo tha~Md dang / dra ga po la sogs pa dang / chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi
315a6(rgyud): dang / gang phyag g.yasu rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thad rnar snang mdzad la mngon du bltas pa'o// de nas thun mtsham/ 
315a7(rgyud): kyis dusu rdo ti rin ti ris dag par bcings te me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug/ yaM ge hUM bzhi pa brjod cing rdos rnam par snang mdzad la bskor ba bdun dang / dung dang hrI/ 
315a8(rgyud): bu'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor tha~Md kyi yang lhag pa dang chad pa'i nyes po zhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te phreng ba bac+doMs la phul nas rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge hUM bzhi
315b1(rgyud): pa nyid kyis rang gi mgo bor bcing // ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang // gang zhig chad pa yongasu bskang // mkhas pas lhag pa rnams spang phyir// rdo rje dril bu kun rtog bya// 'grub 'gyur nyes pa
315b2(rgyud): spang mi bya zhes gsung so// de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas// rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams// yid kyi dbye bar bya ba nyid// oM badz+ra u ta g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra
315b3(rgyud): be sha hUM zhes bya'o// phyag rgya yang 'di yin te// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs te// mdzub mo gan rgyal yang dag bzung // legs par drag tu rnam par dpya// sgo dbye ba yi cho ga yin zhes pa'o// 
315b4(rgyud): de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la rin po che bdun las byas pa 'am/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa nag po la sogs pa med pa// 'grin pa ring ba// mchu
315b5(rgyud): 'chang ba/ lto ba che ba/ lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang / rin po tshe dang / sman thaMd dang / 'bru tha~Md kyis yongasu rdzogs pa/ yal 'ang ba dang bcas pa/ mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par
315b6(rgyud): bcings la byas pa/ phyi rol kun tu lha rdzas kyi dri rje su byugs pa/ me tog gi phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes steng du mtshan pa/ rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo ti rin ti ris yongs
315b7(rgyud): su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang ma tog gi yal 'dab kyis/ oM badz+ra ud ka hUM zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ga hUM bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas la
315b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdorjehUM mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par bzhag go// 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge hUM bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bad/ 
316a1(rgyud): go// de'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam ma bcings pa yang // byu ru de bzhin sa le sbram// dung dang de bzhin nor bun/ 
316a2(rgyud): rin chen kun te sing ha dang // byi g+h+r-i ga re be re be re/ sman kun til dang sran ma sha/ 'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste// sman lnga 'bru kun sgras mtshon pa'o// de'i rjes la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro
316a3(rgyud): ba'i sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gos sngon po la yang yongasu bzlas te/ sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis sgo skyong gis gdongs bcings pa rdo rje go chas stod g.yogs dang / gtsug
316a4(rgyud): tor la sogs pa can gyi slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin ti ris ma tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung nas/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma pra be shA mi zhe sa brjod cing zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thang
316a5(rgyud): la gsol ba gdab ste/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sog sa pa so// de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la/ phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la'ang
316a6(rgyud): rang gi mgo la bcings te gdong bcings pa dkrol la/ ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes pa la sogs pas gzhugs pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba yang byas la chu'i dbang
316a7(rgyud): bskur ba dang / sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang / dar spungs dang / rdo rje dang / phreng ba dang / bdag po la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bac+doMs kyi spyan snga nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas
316a8(rgyud): blangs pa de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang / dngos grub dang rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang bzung la me tog la sogs pas kyang bdag nyid legs par mchod de tshigasu bcad pa lnga pas
316b1(rgyud): rjesu gnang ba dang / yi ge hUM gi gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa yang smos la slar yang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang
316b2(rgyud): ste hUM kA ra badz+ra hUM zhes pa'o// rang gi mtshan brjod par bya yis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing la de'i sngags a'i rnam pa'i mtha' can nam snang mdzad kyi gnas de
316b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab bo// badz+ro&haM zhes bya ba yis rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms la de rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms te/ badz+ra d+hA tu a haM zhes pa'o// 
316b4(rgyud): de ltar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la byang gi sgor de'i sngags aH'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rdo rje rdo rje dril bu bdag nyid dbab pa'o// badz+ra g+ha
316b5(rgyud): zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed la de badz+ra a be sha kro d+ho&tsa na sa sgom mo// de lta bus rdo rjes bsgrubs pa yin no// de nas ya nga rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje lha
316b6(rgyud): krus bcings la se go la legs par gtog pa byed cing sangs rgyas thad 'dus par bya ste/ oM badz+ra sa ma dza dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brjod do// de nas myur
316b7(rgyud): du phyag rgya chen po dang / rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig brjod do// de ma thag tu mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa mchog go// de nas rdo lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rang gi sgo nas spyan drangs la bcug ste
316b8(rgyud): bcings nas dbang du byas la ji lta ba bzhin du byas la ji lta bzhin du yi ge hUM bzhi pas mchod yon phul te dpal rnar snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams
317a1(rgyud): dang / phaskal pa babang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te rang gi sngags brjod pa ji la bur brjod cing dza/ d+hU bcoHsa ma ya sa ma yats+tsha yaH/ nas
317a2(rgyud): rang gi sngags brjod do// de lta bus 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas dam tshig go phyag rgya rnams du byung du/ rdo las gsang dam pa byung // dam tshig mchog rnams nyid du grags// khro bo'i bcing
317a3(rgyud): pa bla med pa// de rnams bcing bar rab bshad bya// lag ngar rdo rje kun tu bsnol// mthe chung lcags kyu bcing ba nyid// mdzub mo dag ni rab tu brkyang // 'jig rten gsum po rnams
317a4(rgyud): rgyal zhes// de bzhin mdzub mo kha sprad cing // nor bu nyid ni bar ma bskums// bsnams la dbu ma pad+ma nyid// gung mo mdzub mo gnyis bsdigs mdzub// bsdigs mdzub ga
317a5(rgyud): ni rdo rje yang // g.yas pa bkug pa ljags kyu'o// de dag tsad sbyar yig hUM/ legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhin yang // mdzub gnyis logs gnas khro gnyer du// spying ka
317a6(rgyud): nyi ma mdzu ba gnyis zlum// lag pa mgo bor rab tu brkyang // mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can// mdzub mo sen mo kun tu rig/ g.yas po mdzod kyi khu tshur yang // gung mo'i mgo bcas
317a7(rgyud): 'khor lo nyid// kha las rab mchog thon pa yi// mdzub mo dbu ma rdo rje yang // mdzub mo 'grin pa bskor ba dang // mdzub mo lhag ma mche ba che/ rdo rje khu tshur mthe bong bsdams// sgeg
317a8(rgyud): mo la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje dbyingasu bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di ltar te/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcings na su// snying khar yang na mthe bong bsnyam// legs par rab brkyang phreng ba
317b1(rgyud): ma/ thal mo sbyar mchog kha nas dbyung // gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar// rdo rje bsdams pathur du sbyin/ thal mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor// mthe bong bsdams te nges par bsdams kha/ 
317b2(rgyud): tu btung ba byug pa yi mdzub mo gcig ni bkug pa dang / mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa bcings// mthe bong mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing // rdo rje la chur mchog bsdams nyid zhes pas
317b3(rgyud): spong ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa nar bsams la hUM gi rnam pa nyid brjod cing phyag rgya zad bcing bar bya'o// de nas phyag rgya'i nges par 'byung bas// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya/ 
317b4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje hUM mdzad// chos kyi rgyu mdzad las kyi hUM mdzad kyi gnasu yang ngo // de nas rin chen hUM mdzad la so// sa pa rnams kyi sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM
317b5(rgyud): badz+ra b+hi ku Ti kro d+ha A na ya sarba rat+na ni hrIHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra hrId+haSh+Ti krod+d+ha duSh+Ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi sha krot+ma ku ru sarba bi shwa ru pa yA pa d+ha ya hUM phaT/ phyag rgya gzhan
317b6(rgyud): rnams ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma nas brtsams par blta'o//  nyid kyi phyir rig pa thad kyi mchog rnams kyis rnar rgyal po'i sngagasu bshad do// rdo rje hUM mdzad dang bcas pa'i phyag
317b7(rgyud): bsdu bas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad klog par bya'o// gzhan rnams rdo rje hUM mdzad du 'gyur ba rigs pa yang ma yin te rgyud thad du hUM mdzad nges par bstan pa yang ma
317b8(rgyud): yin na/ de'i rjesu de khon bzhin lnga la rdo rje bgang de rim pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i chos kyi yo ge rnams dgang ngo //  rnams kyang tshu log sangs rgyas te/ 
318a1(rgyud): can/ hUM yig rdo rje'i snying po yaM/ hrIHyi rnam pa rdo rje'i snga / aHyig rdo rje sna tshogs kyi/ hUM sada' rdo rje'i ma'i// tA rin chen rdo rje ma'i/ dz+dzaHchos kyi rdo rje ma'i/ 
318a2(rgyud): aHlas kyi rdo rje'i mil// hU~M hUM/ trAMdz+dza/ hrIHhrIHaHaHzhes bya'o// rdo rje'i sems dpa' la sogs pa dga' bo chen po la hUM/ gzugs mdzes pa la hUM/ rna ba bde ba la hUM/ 
318a3(rgyud): mchod pa thaMd la hUM/ rab tu dga' ba la hUM// dbusu bgrod pa la hUM/ legs par gzi mchog la hUM/ dri bzang mchog la hUM/ a pi hi dza hUM/ a hi hUM hUM trAM/ he s+pho Ta baM hUM g+haN+Da a a
318a4(rgyud): hUM/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i ma thar thug pa rnams kyi'o// de ma thag tu a'i yi ge las stong khar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed pa las kyi phyag
318a5(rgyud): rgya bcing ngo // de la khro bo'i khu tshur rnam pa gnyis bya/ sa la g.yon pa'i rdo rje sen mo g.yas pa bzung zhing sgreng ba byang chub mchog zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di na
318a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu sbyar ro// gnyis po de dag gis 'gying ba dang bcas pas gsal bar byed pa ni rdo rje hUM mdzad dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang sada' rdo rje ma rnams
318a7(rgyud): kyi'o// lcags kyu 'dzin par yang dag gnas// mda' gsor ba yi sbyor ba dang // legaso zhes bya snying kar gnas// rdo rje gnyis nyid dbang bskur ba// rin chen hUM mdzad dang / 
318a8(rgyud): khro gnyer dang / khro bo dang / rin chen rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// snying kar nyi ma rab tu blta// g.yon gnas lag ngar dbyug pa dang // de bzhin 'di ni yongasu bzlog/ g.yas dang g.yas/ 
318b1(rgyud): min rnam par bsnol// chos kyi hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje chos dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// snying kar nyi ma la ral gri'o// 'gal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid/ rdo rje gnyis ni khar ga
318b2(rgyud): shing // rdo rje'i gar ni bgrol bas ni// 'gram pa spyi gtsug yang dag gnas// las kyi hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje las dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// go cha mthe chung mche ba mchog khu tshur
318b3(rgyud): gnyis ni nges par bcing // rdo rje 'gyings pa'i rab sbyor bas// bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya// phreng ba bcings te kha nas dbyung // gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar// 'og tu phyang
318b4(rgyud): dang gyen tu 'thor// mthe bo ma nyams te nges par gshig/ dri byug pa yi sbyor ba las// mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu grags// / mdzum lcags kyu bcings pa yis// mtha
318b5(rgyud): chung las ni lcags kyu che// 'khrig ma mdud pa mchog pa ga bsnol// rgyab dag kyang ni nges par gshibs// zhes sgo skyong rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// las kyi phyag rgya thad kyang
318b6(rgyud): gar las 'byung ba yin no// de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje sems dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi yang ste
318b7(rgyud): rje dang po dang / mthar gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po gang dang gang gi phyag rgya gang dang gang yin pa rnams bcing ngo // thad
318b8(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya dam tshig phyag rgya yang yin te/ g.yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gan rgyal du byas la lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag dang mthe chung nas brngam
319a1(rgyud): te kha phye ba'i thal mo kha sbyar ba'o// 'don byams pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//  rnams kyi rig pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid de// de rnams kyi rig pa ljags rnams la 'gon
319a2(rgyud): do// 'ad ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o// yi ge a las rang gi thugs khar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la de rnams 'dri ba'i phyir rjesu 'brangs nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni las kyi phyag
319a3(rgyud): rgyar 'gyur ro// rang gi thugs khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la bri bya'i rjesu 'brangs pa nyid las de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo // de nyid kyis yang rig pa'i thun mong pa'o// mthe'u chung
319a4(rgyud): dang mthe bong bcings nas kyang g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum po rtse gsum pa la dbus ma rtse mo yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu bzung zhing rdo rje'i rigs pa mchog 'di ni rdo
319a5(rgyud): rje'i dpal zhes grag so// de nas gzhan ni rab bshad bya// sgyu ma rdo rje sogs ming can// rdo rje bsdams pa bar+Nan byas la// g.yon pa rdo rje yang bcing bya/ rdo rje khu tshur zhes
319a6(rgyud): grags pa/ rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun la 'di// rdo rje rnam gnyis dang yang byas// mtshan ma thad bkod pa ni// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi// phyag rgya rnams ni'ang dgod par bya// mdun dang
319a7(rgyud): rgyab gnas rab tu brkyang // mthe bong rgan po 'dzin pa'i chos// oM gyi rnam pa spyi bor gnas// rdo rje shugs kyis rab tu gnas// rig pa'i rgyal po 'am phyag rgya chen po'i tshogaso// lag
319a8(rgyud): pa'i mdun nyid rab tu brkyang // lag pa'i mdun yang de bzhin du// lag pa gnyis kyang khu tshur gnas/ kha las yongasu bskor ba nyid// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i chog so// g.yon pa'i/ 
319b1(rgyud): mthe bo legs gnas kyang // phreng ba 'dzin pa nges rgyal nyid/ g.yas pas nor ni sbyin pa dang // ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur son// tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho ga so// g.yas pa gshol
319b2(rgyud): ni gzung ba dang / de bzhin lag pa rab tu brkyang // g.yas pa 'bar ba kun tu ston// rdo rje khu tshur rab tu 'dar/ pho nya chen po'i phyag rgya'i chog so// bsems bcas kha dang mche ba rtse/ 
319b3(rgyud): byugs pas 'joms pa rab tu sbyor// lag pa bskum pa sbyar ba dang // rdo rje g.yas pa 'phrog ma'o// bran gyi phyag rgya'i chog so// de nas u ma la sogs pa la mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'byung
319b4(rgyud): ste// g.yon pa rdo rje bsdams pa yis/ rtseg sum mtshan ma bcing bar bya'o// 'di bcings pa yis yang dag pa'i// dngos grub rig pa mchog rang nyid // rdo rje rigs rnams
319b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi// g.yon pa rdo rje mchog bsrungs pa// cho ga ji bzhin dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya bcing bar rab bshad bya// 'khor lo thams cad mchog kun bsdams// de bzhin
319b6(rgyud): bu yi phyag rgya dang / oM yig phyag rgya'ang de bzhin nyid// yi ge rna can yongasu gzung // phyag rgya mdzes pa can dang ni// 'bar ba yongasu gzung ba nyid// 'od zer bsdus pa kho na yang / 
319b7(rgyud): dbyug pa khu tshur bzung ba nyid// kha las yongasu bskor ba dang // khro bo'i dam tshig gdengs ka yis// phyag rgya phreng ba rdo rje bcings// ming med spyi bor gnas pa nyid/ rtsibs
319b8(rgyud): can dkyil 'khor bzhin du bza'// 'od can rtsibs can dam tshigs rnams// lag ngar bskum zhing kha phyogs dang // rgyab nas yongasu bskor ba nyid// 'od zer 'bar ba grol ba/ 
320a1(rgyud): dang // mdun du dul bar gnas pa nyid// pe nya'i dam tshig rnam so// gnyis mthar bzhugs pa rtse mo sbyar// bcings pa nyid dang rab ltung byed// lag ngar bsrel dang
320a2(rgyud): ma bsnol dang // de bzhin stobs ni 'phrog pa'o// bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig yin no// de nas lha chen po la sogs pa'i ljags rnams la sngags bkod la yi ge a las rang gi snying khar
320a3(rgyud): de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la de rnams kyi phyag rgya bcings te las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro// rang gi snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la phyag rgya chen po bri bya'i rje su 'brangs te bcing bar bya'o// 
320a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / bskal pa bzang po pa dang phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ma dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad la sekra
320a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang / phreng ba dang / dang sbyangs kyis dbang bsku ro// de nas mchod yon phul la mchod pa bya'o// de nas rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa bshad pa'i
320a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid can rdo rje la sogs rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa rnams phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dgod par bya'o// 
320a7(rgyud): bum pa gang ba rnams dang / gos zung 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am/ re re la re re 'am/ thun mong ba 'am/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bla re dang / zur bzhir rnam par
320a8(rgyud): bkra ba'i ba dan bcings pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyang yi ge oM dang / dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad yongasu bzlas la/ badz+ra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes pa 'dis lha tha~Md/ 
320b1(rgyud): / la nges par dbu'o// me tog gi shing brgya dang // bzhi 'am ljon shing rnams dang / me tog thams cad la rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang // oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM zhes pas me tog
320b2(rgyud): gi phyag rgya mngon par bsngag go// dri thams cad dang / ngang zhim po rnams dang / dri ma med pa'i dri bzang po rnams la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / oM badz+ra gan d+he zhes pa 'di 'dri'i
320b3(rgyud): phyag rgya dang bcas pa yiso// ga pur dang a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dam la sogs pa la legs par bsres la// de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM zhes pa
320b4(rgyud): 'dis bdug pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas spos phor 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am/ ji ltar rnyed pa la'o// sgron ma 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / 
320b5(rgyud): stong dang / brgya 'am/ sgron ma thams cad sgron ma'i sdong bu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i skong bu sngo dang / bcu 'am bcu gcig la de kho na bzhin du ma dang rdo rje ma dang / oM
320b6(rgyud): A lo ke hUM zhes pa 'di mar me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongasu bzlas la/ oM s+pha ra Na kha zhes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o// gtor ma'i nye bar spyod pa 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / 
320b7(rgyud): stong dang / brgya 'am/ bcu'i grangs sam/ bkra shis can dang por bya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la de bzhin du rdo rje me yongasu bzlas te/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA tA a
320b8(rgyud): d+ya nuta pan+d+ha twAHzhes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o// rol mo bcu dang / stong dang / stong phrag bcu dang / rol mo 'bum yang rung ba la yi ge hUM dang / rol mo'i phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur
321a1(rgyud): bdag gi lag pa yis rol mo rnams kyis rol ma'i stang skabs rnam pa bcu bzhi 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / dza mu ra dza dang / rnga mu kun dang / 'khar rnga dang
321a2(rgyud): rnga b+hi ri dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga kun dza dang / rnga ti mi la'i stang stabs// rol mo dang / zlos gar dang / gar dang / rna rgyan dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang yi ge oM gyis
321a3(rgyud): mngon par bsngags te'o// de bzhin du dar dpyangs 'phyang bar bya zhing me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab kyis rnam par rgyan pa dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa dang / zla ba phyed pa
321a4(rgyud): nye bar mdzes pa dang / rnga dang glang po che dang / ba lang dang / shing rta rnams 'bul te/ brtags pa dang bcas pa ya ngo // rta babs nyams dga' ba'i dril bu dang bcas pa rnams
321a5(rgyud): kyang badz+ra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes pa 'diso// oM badz+ra/ satwa su saM gra ha ta/ badz+ra rat+na ma nut+ta raM/ badz+ra d+harma gA ya baM/ dz+ra karma ka rod+b+ha be zhes brjod cing gar byas la/ rdo rje sgeg ma
321a6(rgyud): la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad po rnams kyis khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thang mchod par bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas
321a7(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis rab tu brkyangs pa khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis yin no// slar rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcu drug pa rnams kyis kyang legs par ma
321a8(rgyud): la/ khro bo'i rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sems can thad kyi don du dngos grub thams cad 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o// de nas phyi rol
321b1(rgyud): gyi mchod pa dbul te/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la 'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas// chu bcas zas bcas me tog bcas// sran chad bcas
321b2(rgyud): shing snum khur las// sogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la ni// yang a ka ro mu khaM zhes pa la sogs bzlas nas shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te/ gsum gsum gtor bar
321b3(rgyud): byas te dro dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang tha mar dbul bar bya'o// de la dang po re shig maN+Dal rnams byed du gzhug par
321b4(rgyud): bya'o// de nas spyan drang ngo // de nas dam tshig bsta no// de nas mchod yon yang phul te dri la sogs pas la gas par mchod la/ gtor ma dbu'o// de nas gshegs
321b5(rgyud): gsol lo// de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni la de yin te/ shar phyogasu kha bltas te g.yas brkyang gi gom pas 'dug cing lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje bstan la// ga
321b6(rgyud): pa dku'i phyogasu bzhag ste// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ngo // de'i mdzub mo lcags kyu dang bral ba ni/ brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa brkyang gi / 
321b7(rgyud): pas 'dug la spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang pa ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas de'i sngags ni// na mo badz+ra swa di shi da~M sha~M badz+ra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ ma
321b8(rgyud): phyogasu bltas te lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum po'i rnam par bkug ste/ gung mo sbreng ba'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni ma lha
322a1(rgyud): spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong mdzub mo'i gzhogs la bstan pa ni me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid lag pa'i
322a2(rgyud): dbusu mngon du phyogs te gcig tu sbyar ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni ag+na ye hi oM hi pI la dz+wa la dz+wa la ha ha sha~M khi ti la bai rU pA k+Sha swA hA/ gshin
322a3(rgyud): rjer bltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par byas la nang du rdo rje bsdams pa'i dbusu mthe bong gnyis dang phyi ru ming med gnyis sbyar zhing sgreng ste slar nang du bzung ba ni gshin rje
322a4(rgyud): spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du gzhibs te sgreng ba'i snying khar bzung ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o// de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni gshegs
322a5(rgyud): gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni ya mA ya swA hA/ ba na bral du bltas te mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa mdzub mo
322a6(rgyud): dang gung mo bkug ste bzung zhing gro'i rnam par bzhag la lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogasu g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug nas bzhag pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya
322a7(rgyud): de nyid lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogasu gnas par ral gri'i phyag rgya ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub me brkyang pa ni gshegasu gsol/ 
322a8(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni sarba b+hU ta b+hi yaM ku ru ku ru swAny+dza// chu'i lha'i phyogasu mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong dang mthu/ 
322b1(rgyud): / mo gcig tu sbyar te g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhag la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni chu bdag spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid g.yon pa'i mdzug
322b2(rgyud): mo khu tshur la sbyar te bzung bzhags pa'i phyag rgya chu bdag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i
322b3(rgyud): sngags ni tri tri su Da tri tri shi khi to li bi ru pak+Sha swA hA// rlung lha'i phyogasu bltas te 'dug pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs te gung mo sbreng ba'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo bkug/ 
322b4(rgyud): ba'i rtse mo btsugs la mngon du phyogs te brkyang ngo // lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te lha zur log su bzhag cing mthe bos bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i
322b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de nyid mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlu nga lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni ga gsu gsol ba'i
322b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// sngags ni oM swa sa khA la khu kha swAhA/ ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis kha sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas la mthe chung gnyis gshibs
322b7(rgyud): brkyang / de'i rgyab tu smon lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo dag sbeng ba rdo rje'i mdud pa bya ba ni ku be ra sman drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid kyis gung mo gnyis nang du
322b8(rgyud): rje gung mo bcing ba'i sbyor bas bzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i
323a1(rgyud): sngags ni oM ku be rA ya swAhA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogasu bltas te 'dug la lag pa dag gcig tu sbyar te thal mo sbyar ba bya ste/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung lag
323a2(rgyud): 'thil du rdo rje bcing ba byas te/ mthe bo zung dag gzhan la brten cing nang du bkug ste bsnol la/ gung mo gshibs te spring ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnar bzhag la de
323a3(rgyud): nyid bkug ste steng du phan tshun sen mo sprad par bya ba ni dbang ldan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzub mo sngar bzhin rdo rje'i rnar bzung ba na dbang ldan gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// 
323a4(rgyud): spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis pa rkyang ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni rdu dzu shi ra ba swA hA// g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dul la lag pa
323a5(rgyud): thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu ni tshangs pa la sog sa pa spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis/ 
323a6(rgyud): snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de rnams kyi sngags ni Ar d+hi brah+ma Ni swAhA
323a7(rgyud): oM su grA hA a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ oM tsan+d+ra nak+Sha tra a d+hi ba ta ya~M swA hA/ mnyam pa'i gom pa'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar ba ste sor mo'i rtse mo rnam par/ 
323a8(rgyud): mtshams med par phan tshun sbyar te mthe bong zlum po byas la 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drang ba'i phyag
323b1(rgyud): / t+ya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las sngar bzhin du mdzub mo dag bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo dag brkyang ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags rnams ni a
323b2(rgyud): d+ho pro thaM byaM swA hA/ a su re b+h+ya/ swA hAHnA ge b+h+yaHswA hA/ de nas rang gi sngags kyis thams cad la thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i chog su bcas pa la bgegs med par
323b3(rgyud): mdzod cig/ las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig ces brjod la thams cad gshegasu gsolo// / yang na dpung bzang gi ched du gsungs pa'i tshogs bcad rnams
323b4(rgyud): kyis gtor ma dbul te/ lha dang lha mon gnod sgron lho phye grul// na mkha' lding dang mnga' bzang lus srul / dri za srin po gdon gyi tshogs rnams dang // gang su sa la
323b5(rgyud): gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smad bcas ni nga g.yog 'khor bcas pa la// bdag gi dbus mo sa steng 'a dir btsugs nas// thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol
323b6(rgyud): 'debs kyis// gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir spyon cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi
323b7(rgyud): zla'i khyim gnas dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu bor kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang // mtsho dang rdzing bu steng ka chu ngos
323b8(rgyud): dang // g.ya' chu sil ma can dang khron par gnas// grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang / kha stong dang ni lha yaM khang par yang // gtsugs lag khang dang mchod rten gnas/ 
324a1(rgyud): ngag dang / dka' thub gnas dang blang chen bres dang ni/ rgyal po'i dge khang dag na gang gnas dang / lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang // gang dag
324a2(rgyud): lam po che dang shing gcig drung // dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang // seng ge dred dang gcan zan gnas dag dang // 'brog chen 'jig su rung bar gang gnas dang // gang dag gling
324a3(rgyud): mchog dag na gnas pa dang // lhun po dur khrod dag na gang gnas rnams// dgyes shing mgu bas phreng ba byug pa dri// bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod pa 'dis// gus 'bul sgom
324a4(rgyud): mdzod gsol mdzod 'thung mdzod cig/ las 'di rnams kyi sa 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gdon la mchod byas nas// rtse gcig yid kyis phyogs skyong mchod par byas// 
324a5(rgyud): dbang po rdo can gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas// gtor ma khyud 'phags 'di dag bzhi su gsol/ me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag/ chu bdag rlung bdag/ 
324a6(rgyud): nor gyi bdag po dang // dbang ldan lnga ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang // steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang // lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams gang // ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i
324a7(rgyud): cho gas 'dus rnams khung bcas sde bcas bu dang bshes gnyen bcas// rang gi skye bo'i tshogs shing mnyes pa rnams// so so'i thugs dgongs gcig mdzad nas// rang rang
324a8(rgyud): phyogasu legs par byon nas ni// rang gi bu smad mdza' tha shes gnyen 'dun dang // nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu// me tog dri dang byug pa mar me dang / 
324b1(rgyud): zhal zas gtor ma 'di dag bzhes nas kyang // gsol mdzod snyoms mdzod legs par 'thung mdzod cig/ las 'di rnams kyis 'bras bu mchis par mdzad/ de la 'ang
324b2(rgyud): ni phyi dang nang thad du gtor ma rab tu dbul ba'i sngags te// a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM a d+ya nuHpan na twA ta zhes pa'o// de nas nye reg bya ste shar sgor mngon par phyogs
324b3(rgyud): te gnas pa la// las thad pa'i thab khung gi dbusu dpal 'jig rten gsum rnang rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thad kyi sngags brjod cing me tog dmar po nges par bkod
324b4(rgyud): la sbyin sreg tshogs dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags kyi sa ba'i mar gyis bsregs thugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbu'o//  pal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
324b5(rgyud): sngags rdo rje 'bebs pa khro bo'i mthar thug par kyang bsregs thugs bdun bdun slar yang ngo // de nas ji lta ba bzhin du thab khung gi nor snang mdzad la sog/ 
324b6(rgyud): pa rnams me tog kho nas spyan drangs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi gan su dgod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs
324b7(rgyud): pa thams cad la phyag byas la/ bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba'i/ rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi/ 
324b8(rgyud): 'dir yang dkyil 'khor 'jug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bac+doMs seMn kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa de rdo rje hUM
325a1(rgyud): mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong ste zhugs nas ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 
325a2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la mi 'da' ba dang / sngar spyod pa la sogs pa 'dod cing mi nus pa'i sems can dag mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir
325a3(rgyud): ji ltar bya bar 'dod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gad mo dang / rtsed
325a4(rgyud): / mo dang / kha zas la spyad pa la dga' ba nyid kyis de zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lnga'i rigs dang dkyil 'khor
325a5(rgyud): gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin du rigs tha~Md kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yang dag par rdzogs bar 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / 
325a6(rgyud): mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung bar mdzad pa der ni bslab pa'i gnas la 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi
325a7(rgyud): lam du ji ltar gnas pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid kyi gnas skabs can de dag kyang dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud thad du/ 
325a8(rgyud): 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug tu rung // bcom ldan 'das chos ldan gyi seMn de bzhin gshegs/ 
325b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis sang+yas kyi byang chub tshol ba ni/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa dang / 
325b2(rgyud): sa rnams la 'bad pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thams cad
325b3(rgyud): kyang rnyed par dga' ba yang ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes gsol bar bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o// de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yod
325b4(rgyud): su bzung ba'i dge bsnyen ma/ dge sbyong 'am/ dge slong gi sdom pa yongasu bzung zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa/ slob dpon gyi zhabs dag la phrag byas te 'di skad
325b5(rgyud): ces brjod de/ bdag gi ston pa dge' chen khyod// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tsha'o// / dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub
325b6(rgyud): sems kyang bdag la stsol// skyabs gsum dag kyang dag la stsol zhes pa'o// de nas slob ma la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongasu bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g.yo smad g.yo
325b7(rgyud): dang / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo skyong ba ni bzlas pa'i gdong g.yogs bcing bar byas la phyag bzhi byed du bzhug/ yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob
325b8(rgyud): dpon la phyag byas la/ lag na me tog thogs pa nyid kyis bshags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod do// 
326a1(rgyud): po bdag la sdom pa stsol// thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba// slob dpon dbang du gnas pa
326a2(rgyud): la na sangs rgyas rol mo 'byung ba yi// phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun can// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi'o// gsang ba tha~Md rigs bsdus pa/ 
326a3(rgyud): slob dpon bdag ni 'jug par mdzod// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba/ skal pa chen po bdag la stsal/ mtshan rnams rjesu gsol btab pa// dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ 
326a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol// dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che// sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// 
326a5(rgyud): slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// de nas blo ba dpon gyi rigs thad la gsal ba gdab par bya ste/ che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni/ byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin
326a6(rgyud): pa/ gsang ba yis ni 'khor lo 'dir// 'jug cing byang chub sdom pa 'tshal// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog
326a7(rgyud): gsum la skyabasu song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa brtan por gyur// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // blo gros chen po khyod kyis zung / byang chub sems ga
326a8(rgyud): de rdo rje/ shes rab dril bu zhes pashadado// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dgas pa'i// sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsum/ 
326b1(rgyud): rin chen rigs ni bsdus pa ni// nyin mo gsum dang mtshan mo gsum/ zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnams bzhi rab sbyin bya// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam tshwa// 
326b2(rgyud): khyod kyi gzung bar bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// las chen rigs ni bsdus pa la// sdom pa gsum po yang dag ldan// mchod pa'i las kyang
326b3(rgyud): ci nus bzhin/ yang dag nyid du nges bzung gyis// de las gzhan pa bzhi po yang // 'di dag phas pham par ni bshad// mi spang dor bar yang mAM/ rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'di bshad do// nyin mo/ 
326b4(rgyud): gsum dang mtshan gsum du// nyin re nang ni brjod par bya// gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ ltung ba sbom po dang ga tu 'gyur// khyod kyis srog chags bsad mi bya// ma byin
326b5(rgyud): bar yang mi blang // 'dod pa logs par mi spyad cing // brdzun yang smra bar mi bya'o// phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ chang ni btung ba rnam par spang / seMn gdul phyir
326b6(rgyud): ma gtogs pa/ bya ba ma yin thad spang // dam pa'i drung du gnas bya zhing // rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum/ ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //

326b8(rgyud): 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par yang mi bya// 'di dag dam tshig zhes
327a1(rgyud): ba gang/ de dag ni blo gros khyed kyis bsrung bar bya// des kyang 'di skang brjod par bya// slob dpon khyod ni bdag la gson// gtso bo ji ltar bka' bas pa// de ltar bdag
327a2(rgyud): ni bgyid par 'tshal// ji ltar dus gsum dgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i zhes pa nas sen mya ngan las 'das la 'god ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o// gang zhig sdom
327a3(rgyud): pa mi 'dzin pa de la ni gzhug pa tsam sbyin par bya zhing deng khyod bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba yang mi bya'o// de nas oM sarba lo ga tsit+taM ud pA da
327a4(rgyud): yA mi zhes pa 'dis byang chub sems ni bla na med/ dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// de yi snying khar snying pos ni// rdo rje rab tu bzhag par bya/ su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM hoH@
327a5(rgyud): sid+d+hi ya tha su khaM zhes pa 'di so// de nas rdo hUM mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod dem/ tog phreng ba gdags shing / gdong dri zhim pos
327a6(rgyud): byugs la yon gyi mchog bzung ste/ phyi rol na gnas pa la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la// oM grah+Na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM baM zhes pa 'odas khro bo ti rin ti ri rang nyid bcings la slob ma
327a7(rgyud): mching du gzhug rdo bsdams pa nang byas la// mthe bong rdo rje dam pa yis/ yid kyi khro bas dga' bya bas// khro bo ti rine ti ra drin// de nas de nyid kyi mthe bong dag gi me tog gi phreng ba
327a8(rgyud): 'dzin du bcug la snying po 'dis bzhugs par bya ste/ badz+ra sa ma yaM pra ti sh+yA mi zhes pa'o// shar gyi sgor yang rdo lcags kyus de dgug cing lhor zhags pas gzhugo/ nub tu wu/ 
327b1(rgyud): sgrog gis bcing zhing / byang du rdo rje 'bebs pas dbab po// lang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod do// deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
327b2(rgyud): rigs kyi deng nas ngas khyod la rdo rje'i sems bskyed par bya/ ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan rnams lta ci
327b3(rgyud): spos/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o// khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid khro bo to rin ti ri kha gyen du lta
327b4(rgyud): ba dang bcas pas bcings la// rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor ban ga ste 'di skad ces smras te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te gal te khyed 'ga' zhig la smras na
327b5(rgyud): bo 'gems par 'gyuraro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang // mna'i snying po lan gcig bzlas pa'i chu rdo slob mde'akrung du gzhugo// de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ 
327b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzod// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// badz+ra ud da ka dzaHzhes bya'o// de nas slob ma la
327b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces smra'o// deng nas brtsams nas khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis// ngas 'di gyis shog ces gang bsgo ba de bya dgoso// khyod yang ba ma spangs par dus kyi bya ba byas nas dmya
327b8(rgyud): bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes pa'o// de'i rjes la rang gi snying khar yi ge a rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bsam mo// de nas slob ma'i snying kha dang / mdzod spu dang / 'gre/ 
328a1(rgyud): pa dang / spyi bo rnam su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs bsams te/ oM d+ha hrI aHzhes pa
328a2(rgyud): ngag gi go rims bzhin du'o// sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang dang slob ma'i snying khar phye la rang gi snying kha'i yi ge yaM las yi ge phyung la// slob ma'i snying khar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbusu
328a3(rgyud): blos bcug la lus thad gang bar bsam mo// 'di skad ces brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab
328a4(rgyud): du gsol zhes smros shig/ de nas myur du rdo rje slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin ti ri bcings la 'di skad brjo da par bya ste/ 'di de dam tshig rdo rje yin// rdo rje sada' zhes
328a5(rgyud): byar grags// rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ de la de nyid 'bab gyur cig/ badz+ra A ba sha a zhes pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu
328a6(rgyud): drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad cu dang / dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar brjod de nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la sems ma rngo ma'i phyag rgya dral bar
328a7(rgyud): bya zhing 'di dag brjod de/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn+da badz+ra rA dza hUM phaT/ aHaHaHaHaHbcu dang / nyi shu dang / su
328a8(rgyud): cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad cu dang / dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar brjod par bya'o// bac+doMs kyis kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la / 
328b1(rgyud): / hUM gi rnam pa'i 'od bar gyi mdog dmar po 'bar bar gang bzhin par bas mo// slar yang gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe dril bu dang bcas pas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dmachin
328b2(rgyud): gi phyag rgya bcings la rkang pa g.yon pas de'i rkang pa mnan la steng gi na mkha'i phyogasu rnar snang mdzad dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi steng du de nyid la dbab pa'i phyir khro bo hUM gi rnam
328b3(rgyud): pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis mnan bzhin pa dang / 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / hUM gis rnam pas brdeg bzhin pa dang / de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu
328b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnams kyis hUM tAM hrIHaHzhes bya ba rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsam zhi
328b5(rgyud): de la dbab ste/ hUM badz+ra A be sha ya aHzhesam ba brgyar brjed par bya'o// gal te sdig pa mang ba nyid kyis 'bab par ma gyur na de'i tshe sdig pa bral ba'i phyag rgyas de'i sdig pa
328b6(rgyud): rnams yang dang yang du bral bar bya'o// yam shing 'jag ma rnams kyis me// rab 'bar rdo rje khro bo yi// mnyam par bzhag pas dbul ba yi// de yi sdig pa thad ni// til gyi sbyin sreg des nges
328b7(rgyud): sreg/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / lag pa g.yas pa'i 'thil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ yi ge hUM dbusu bas mos te/ mdzub mo dang ma
328b8(rgyud): bong dag gis sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg thab khung las 'byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rnams kyis de'i lus la sdig pa sreg bzhin par bsams la de nas
329a1(rgyud): yang rdo rje babs pa de kho na bzhin du cings la dbab par byaste/ nges par 'bebs par 'gyur/ de la khrus kyang gang la bab par ma gyur pa de la dbang bskur ba m-i d+hag/ 
329a2(rgyud): babs na skad cig ma de nyid de'i mngon par shes pa lnga la sor par 'gyuraro// de nas yang dag par babs par shes nas yang oM badz+ra satwa su saM gra ha ta zhes pa la sogs pa'i glu brjod la/ 
329a3(rgyud): khro bo'i khu tshur dang de bzhin gshen kha rngo ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o// de phebs na rdo rje sedel khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i phyag rgyas bcing
329a4(rgyud): bar bya'o// de bzhin du ji srid du gyur na de'i tshe rdo bshad pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo // de'i tshe rdo rje chos khro bo'i phyag rgya ba ci // de lta bus nye bar byon cing dgongs par 'gyuraro// de nas
329a5(rgyud): de'i lce la rdo rje bsams te bruM h+Na badz+ra zhes pa dngo // de nas thaMd smra bar 'gyur/ de nas phreng ba de dkyil la na por dong Ni/ pra tIswA hU~MHzhes bya'o// de nas gang du babs
329a6(rgyud): de 'dis grub bo// de nas oM pra ti gr-ih+Na trAM i maM satwa ma ha ba la zhes bya ba bas phreng ba de nyid kyi mgo bor bcing // de nas oM de ring rdo sada' rang / khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson/ rdo'i mig
329a7(rgyud): ni bla na med/ thad mig ni bye bar 'gyur// haM badz+ra pa sh+ya zhes pa 'dis gdong g.yogs dgro'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo ldaT kyu nas brtsams te ji srid rnar snang mdzad kyi mthar thug
329a8(rgyud): par bstan no// de nas tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes pa la sor pas slob ma'i snying khar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du 'am/ phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar sgo la mngon
329b1(rgyud): par phyogs pa legs par bris la slob ma dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pas kyang byin gyis brlabs la/ phyag rgya chen po de la bzhag ste dbang bskuro// dri dang me tos
329b2(rgyud): la soT pas mchod mchod yon dbulo// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dan la soT pa dang / dung dang rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra bsgrags pa dang / de nas bkra shis kyi tshiDa bcang rnams kyis
329b3(rgyud): mngon par dga' bas dang po re shig chu'i dbang bskur ba dang / cod pan dang / dar dbyangs dang / rdo dang / bdag po dang / ming gis dbang bskur bdag gis dbang bskur la yang me tog la so// 
329b4(rgyud): pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchodado// slob ma na/ mas kyis rdo thal mo sbyar bas slob dpon la rab tu btud la yon gyi mchog phul la me tog la sor pa'i dbang bskur ba yang
329b5(rgyud): gzung bar bya'o// slob dpon gyis dbang bskurani dpal rdo hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgyas de kho na bzhin du ji ltar nges pa ra bstan pa'i gan su gzhag la/ ji tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis
329b6(rgyud): de'i lus la dpal rje hUM mdzad la son pa bkod slar yang / oM badz+ra a d+hi pa tis+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi dri D+ho mo b+ha ba dzaHhUM baM hoHhUM phaT zhes pa 'di rnarang rgyal ba'i bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong yongasu
329b7(rgyud): bzlas pa byas la/ de nas oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pa 'di brjod cing rdo khu tshur gyis nar rgyal ba'i bum pa nas chu blangs nas chu'i dbang bskur ba smi no// 'di yang brjod/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal
329b8(rgyud): ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chus 'grub bo// ji dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // dkyil 'khor can min na mo smra/ skye bo 'dus pa kan
330a1(rgyud): // ba ni/ nod dang ma dang pa la min/ de nas cho ga thang tham su blangs la mtshan bcu rtsa brgyad pas legs par bstod de tshigs bcad lngas rjesu gnang ba byin nas/ gzangs stod pa dang
330a2(rgyud): bstan pas slob ma thang lung bstano/ de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba 'byung ste/ slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa dkyil 'khor thad du bcug pa de ltar mdzod cig ces bya'o// 'di yi wa
330a3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang // tha ma 'bring dang mchog rnams ni// ma lus nges par 'thob par 'gyur// mchogs rnams gegs med 'grub// dngos grub phran tsheg
330a4(rgyud): slar ci zhig/ sa ng+yas nyid kyang sems can nyid// rdos mas nyid rnyed mi dka'/ gang la dngos grub nges 'byung dang // gang la sdig pa gdon chen dang / bgegs dang loT 'dren rnams

330b1(rgyud): dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas// rin chen gdugs sor mchog rnams ni// rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byas te// phyag na rdo rgyal dbang la/ dag pa'i bsam pas yang dag bstod// sang+yas kun pas snga
330b2(rgyud): sangs/ mau shes dri ma kun bcom pa/ rdo rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje'i sku ste sku che ba/ phyag na rdo phyag 'tshal 'dud/ rdo rje yan lag rdo rje mchog/ dza 'a bar ba cher 'bar ba/ dz+ra shur
330b3(rgyud): teshugs che ba/ rdo rje mtshan cha rdo rje che// phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po// rdo mda' ste rab 'bigs pa// rdo rje rnon po rno bo che/ che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che// rdo pad+ma byang chub che// byang chub sang+yas rang 'byung ba//
