330b7(rgyud): gshin rje mthar byed pa// rdo drag po drag pa che// 'od thug pa ni 'thug pa ste// na mkha' dang ni mnyam pa yi/ re ba thang rdzogs mdzad pa/ rdo dbang bskur rin chen mchog rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon
330b8(rgyud): mcho// rdo ye shes ye shes che/ ri pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod/ Na la ha la nag po che// sgra chen rnam par sgeg pa po// rdo 'dod pa 'dod pa che/ sdigs ma'i rnyog ma 'joms pa po// dus
331a1(rgyud): // kyi g.yo ba'i gcod pa'i mchog// zhal ni ljags kyi glog 'phros// rdo rje me ste rab tu gtum pa'i rab snang 'joms pa po// nyim stong gi 'od zer na la/ spyan dmar 'jigs pa

333a1(rgyud): lan gsum bar du brjod par bya'o// oM sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya ho sa ma ya haM/ ji ltar sangs thad ni// dga' ldan du ni gnas pa yi// lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar/ de bzhi/

333b7(rgyud): dang yungs kar ldan bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya// gtsug gtor rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/ gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi rdzi dang // bkra shis zhi rnams sman kyis ni// khrus kyi tshod du mngon/ 
333b8(rgyud): bar bsngags// 'am pa'i til mar dag dang ni// u dum ba ra'i lcug ma bzang // mkhar ba'i snod kyi nang dag tu// bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya// dri lnga yis ni de nas byug/ sa bon ldan/ 
334a1(rgyud): gtor bar bya// slob mtshogs dang bcas pa yi// sngags kyis gtsang sbras bkru bar bya// bkra shis zhes bya yid 'ong ba'i// blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod
334a2(rgyud): rig ma spyan ma ji bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du mngon dbang bskur// sngags ni ji ltar bsdams pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/ 
334a3(rgyud): de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo// zhes bya ba la sogs paso// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shrI hUM// lugs ma la ni dngos su bkru/ ri mo rnams ni me long la'o// dag
334a4(rgyud): byed lngas ni sngon du sgo// dur ba yis ni med par bya// ras sam lag pa dag gis ni// blo dang ldan pas sku lus phye// gur gum mar dang bcas pas bsku/ gos bzang dag kyang sku la
334a5(rgyud): gsol// blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di yis// dkyil 'kho ra dbusu bzhugasu gsol// oM d+hi badz+ra bA sa se swAhA/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he swAhA/ oM badz+ra A ba ra Na ba su Sha Ne swAhA/ 
334a6(rgyud): blo ldan gyis rang dam tshig bskul// phyag rgya sngags kyis dbang bskur la// ji ltar 'os par mngon dbang bskur// oM hUM aM badz+ra khaM/ do ltar cod pan bcing ba byas la/ bzhug su
334a7(rgyud): gsol te brtag pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyiso// mdun gyi phyogs ni ma nub cing // yo ba min zhing drang ba yis// de ltar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod/ de ltar min na skyon 'byung
334a8(rgyud): 'gyur// me tog sogs dang de bzhin dri// mar me na bza' sogs sbyor gang // de kun sngags dang ldan pa yis// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ oM puSh+pe AHhUM/ zhes bya ba 'di
334b1(rgyud): dag la sogs paso// mchog gi me tog 'di dag ni// chu dang thang las de bzhin skyes// mchog tu dad pas khyed la dbul// ci bde bar ni so sor ba zhes/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las
334b2(rgyud): byung // mchog gi bdug pa 'di dag ni// bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// ci bde bar ni bzhes gsol// lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung // mchog tu gyur pa'i dri 'di ni/ 
334b3(rgyud): mchog gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes// mun pa 'joms byed snang ba'i mchog/ mar dang til gyi mar me 'di// yang dag ye shes spyan dbye phyir/ 
334b4(rgyud): dad pas bdag gis dbul bar bgyi// bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs// kha dog dri ro rnams dang ldan// thams cad ldan pa lha yi bshos// bdag gis dbul
334b5(rgyud): gyis so sor ba zhes// de la son pa gang yang rung // cung za da ci 'byor sku gzugs la// de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyi sa// rim pa yis ni dbul bar bya// sngags
334b6(rgyud): kyi gtsang sbra tsA ru bya// der ni gser gyi rang bzhin gyi// thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya// zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas// oM tsuk+ShaHtsak+ShaHsa man+ta tsak+Sha ra bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ oM di byA a
334b7(rgyud): ne sa mA d+hi d+ha na pra Na me swA hA// de ltar byas te de rnams yang // slob ma rab tu bcug byas la// khyod kyis nga la gang gsol ba'i// sku gzugs drag ni khyad par du// ji ltar gsungs
334b8(rgyud): par rab gnas par// de dag don ni ngas byas te// de rnams don ni grub zin gyis// ci bde bar ni mchod par byos// de nas dam tshig dbang bskur bas// khyod la byas kyis bsregs
335a1(rgyud): blugs ni// stong ngam yang na de yi phyed// mngar gsum brtags la 'bru rnams kyis// 'o ma can gyi bud shing la// sreg khung gru bzhir bsregs blugs bya/ 
335a2(rgyud): de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis// lhag pa'i tsA ru phul byas pas// bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni// zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bar bya// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA// A gats+tsha ha ri ping ga la dap+ta k+Sha
335a3(rgyud): hi de hi dA pA ya i dan tsa me kar+yaM ku ru swA hA// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA// de ltar byas la 'bad pa yis/ khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya/ sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha'i// tshad tsam dun
335a4(rgyud): rab tu bsgrags// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+re swA hA/ me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas// phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya// oM in+d+ra ya swA hA// zhes bya ba dbang ldan la thug gi bar du
335a5(rgyud): rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ ga ge/ gsu gsol bar bya ba ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sra/ sa// tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang
335a6(rgyud): gang dag cho ga ma tshangs pas// de dag bzod pa mdzad pa'i rigs// kun tu zhi dang rgyas pa ru// yon bdag tshe la rab mdzad nas// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni// slar yang 'byon pa
335a7(rgyud): mdzad du gsol// sa dang chu dang me rlung gi/ lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs la// bskal pa brgya ru srung gnas mdzod// dgyes shing yid bzang 'gyur ba yis// slob dpon bla mar bcas
335a8(rgyud): pa yi/ khu dang tsha bo srung mdzad nas// rang gnas dge bar gshegasu gsol// dpyid zla ra ba 'am dpyid zla 'bring // dgun dang dpyid kyi tha chungs sam// dbyar zla de bzhin dbyar 'bri'o// 
335b1(rgyud): nyi ma byang du gnas pa yi// dkar po phyogs kyi gnyis pa 'am// rims bzhin de ltar gsum pa 'am// gang tshe gza' dang rjes 'thun na// nag po'i phyogs la'ang brtsam par bya// gang
335b2(rgyud): che thang 'thun gyur na/ mi rnams yun du 'phel bar byed/ bco lnga de bzhin brgyad pa dang // bcu gsum pa yangang bzhin no// gnam stong dang ni de bzhin du/ bcu bzhi pa la'ang bya ba min/ 
335b3(rgyud): thams cad du ni chu smad dang // snangar ma gro zhun de bzhin te// lag pa sbubs dang smon dang ni// rgyal dang chu smad de bzhin no// khrums smad dag kyang de bzhin du// rgyu skar 'di rnams thad du// 
335b4(rgyud): skye dgu 'phel zhing de yi ni// rab tu gnas pa mchog tu bya da// yid la 'dod pa ci yang rung // dngos grub me bzhis ster ra 'gyur// lung las shes pa'i yang dag pa/ 
335b5(rgyud): khrums sam yang na gro bzhin gyis// lag gis skal bza nga snar mas ni// gzhan dag las ni rgyal bar byed// mgo yis zhi ba nye bar ston// chu stod kyis ni bu dag gson// 
335b6(rgyud): rtag par dngos grub khrums smad kyis// rgyal gyis rtag par tshe ring 'gyur// snron gyis mchog tu bde bar byed/ lha mtshams kyis ni mchog ster 'gyur// pur bu lag dang pa ba sangs// zla ba
335b7(rgyud): gza' sogs shes bya ste// 'di rnams bzang ldan la byas na// rab tu gnas pa mchog tu dge/ gsum pa drug pa bdun pa la/ bcu dang bcu gcig la zla ba// gnyis pa bzhi pa de bzhin brgyad/ 
335b8(rgyud): dang bcu gcig rnams la lag/ gnyis dang bdun dang de bzhin dgu// de bzhin phur bu bcu gcig pa// dus sbyor bzhi pa la brten nas// de la lhag par gnas par bya// drug bdun bcu pa dor da/ 
336a1(rgyud): yis// pa ba sangs nyid dge ba yin// de ltar bza' rnams thad kyi// stobs ldan mi ldan der shes bya/ gang tshe zhi ba'i gza' rnams dang / zhing rnams zhi ba dge ba yin// dang
336a2(rgyud): lnga pa gsum de bzhin/ nor rnams 'joms pa spang bar bya// rje su 'thun par byed pa pos// skad cig de la yongs grub cing // ji ltar gsungs bzhin kun byas na// rab tu gnas pa mchog
336a3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // 'khor los bsgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni// thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gza' dang rgyu skar 'dir med de// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med// gza' rnams thad rjes
336a4(rgyud): 'thun phyir// bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid// de ru sgrub pa par kun gnas shing // gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyis// dngos grub dag ni ster bar mdzad// yid kyis cung zad
336a5(rgyud): gang bsams pa// skye dang skye ba 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnam sa ma lus pa yis ni// phyi nas gzo bo rnams la mchod// gang ngag de la grog byed pa// gzhan dag kyang ni mchod
336a6(rgyud): par bya// de nas de dag thang la// dga' bas 'di skad brjod par bya// ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams// bdag la 'thun pa'i nus ba med// de phyir khyod la bdag bzod gsol// sngag
336a7(rgyud): kyi gtsang sbra'i bza' bya dag/ gzugs brnyan dag la bzhin bya ste// bder gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni// zos shing sdig pa byang bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba so// glang po rta glang shing rta nor// yon
336a8(rgyud): gyi dam pa dbul bar bya// de nas de la nan tan gyis// longs spyod g.yo ba dbul bar bya// gal te lha nyid dgyes 'dod na// bla ma gus pas dgyes bya zhing // de ltar rnam pa thad du// bla ma ya
336b1(rgyud): / dag mnyes par bya// de nas gang dag brtul zhugs can/ dge slong dge bsnyen dge slong ma// mchog tu grub pas mchod byas la/ ji ltar 'os pa'i yon yang dbul/ dung ngam rol mo sgra la
336b2(rgyud): sogs// bzang ba'i glu dang gar rnams kyis// gnyen dang rigs brgyud 'khor rnams kyis// rol mo chen po mtshan ma dbul// de ltar thams cad phul zin nas// gar rung mchod sbyin dkyil
336b3(rgyud): 'khor la// phul lam dbul bar byed pa rnams// slob dpon la ni dbul bya yi// bzo bo la ni mi sbyin zhing // dge slong rnams la'ang sbyin mi bya// slob dpon mchog gi lha yin te// nor rnams
336b4(rgyud): thams cad de la dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor byug byas// ba yi lci bas byugs byas shing // rdul tshon chu bor rab dor ro// / de yis yang dag legs par 'gyur// rab tu
336b5(rgyud): gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzogaso// dud khrod dag dang shan pa yo// khyim dang srin po'i gnas rnams su// mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba// thab khung tha
336b6(rgyud): ma bar ma mchog/ phyed dang gsum mam// khru dgu pa ni byas pa las// stegs bu de yi tshad brtsigs te/ gru gsum pa 'am mdung rtse 'dra// lugs phyi sa la phye dug gis ni// bskus
336b7(rgyud): pas thab khung nag por bya/ dbus rdo rje rtsa dgu pa/ nag pa shin tu 'bar ba bri/ mu ran steng du rtse gsum dang // rgya gram pa yi rdo rjes mtshan// de yi phyi rol mu khyud la/ dbyug pa dang / 
336b8(rgyud): ni dgra sta dang // ral gri shin tu 'bar ba bri// de yi phyi rol keng rus te// bde gshegs la sogs phyag rgyas mtshan/ dung sprin mdog 'dra drang srong mchog/ ri yi steng bzhugs rtse
